HPO编号	主分类(中文)	名称(英文)	定义(英文)	中文译名	中文定义
HP:0000002	生长异常	Abnormality of body height	Deviation from the norm of height with respect to that which is expected according to age and gender norms.	身高异常	身高偏离该年龄性别预期身高的正常范围。
HP:0000003	泌尿生殖系统异常	Multicystic kidney dysplasia	Multicystic dysplasia of the kidney is characterized by multiple cysts of varying size in the kidney and the absence of a normal pelvocaliceal system. The condition is associated with ureteral or ureteropelvic atresia, and the affected kidney is nonfunctional.	多囊性肾发育不良	多囊性肾发育不良的特点是：肾脏有大小不一的肾囊肿，缺乏正常肾盂肾盏系统。这种状态伴发输尿管或肾盂输尿管闭锁，受累肾脏无功能。
HP:0000005	遗传模式	Mode of inheritance	The pattern in which a particular genetic trait or disorder is passed from one generation to the next.	遗传模式	#####
HP:0000006	遗传模式	Autosomal dominant inheritance	A mode of inheritance that is observed for traits related to a gene encoded on one of the autosomes (i.e., the human chromosomes 1-22) in which a trait manifests in heterozygotes. In the context of medical genetics, an autosomal dominant disorder is caused when a single copy of the mutant allele is present. Males and females are affected equally, and can both transmit the disorder with a risk of 50% for each child of inheriting the mutant allele.	常染色体显性遗传	#####
HP:0000007	遗传模式	Autosomal recessive inheritance	A mode of inheritance that is observed for traits related to a gene encoded on one of the autosomes (i.e., the human chromosomes 1-22) in which a trait manifests in homozygotes. In the context of medical genetics, autosomal recessive disorders manifest in homozygotes (with two copies of the mutant allele) or compound heterozygotes (whereby each copy of a gene has a distinct mutant allele).	常染色体隐性遗传	#####
HP:0000008	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of female internal genitalia	An abnormality of the `female internal genitalia` (FMA:45654).	女性内生殖器异常	女性内生殖器（FMA：45654）的异常。
HP:0000009	泌尿生殖系统异常	Functional abnormality of the bladder	`Dysfunction` (PATO:0001641) of the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900).	膀胱功能异常	膀胱（FMA：15900）的功能异常。
HP:0000010	泌尿生殖系统异常,免疫系统异常	Recurrent urinary tract infections	Repeated infections of the urinary tract.	复发性尿路感染	尿路反复感染。
HP:0000011	泌尿生殖系统异常	Neurogenic bladder	An inability to completely empty the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900) during the process of `urination` (GO:0060073) owing to a neurological condition.	神经源性膀胱功能障碍	由于神经系统疾患导致排尿过程中无法完全排空膀胱（FMA：15900）。
HP:0000012	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urinary urgency	Urge incontinence is the strong, sudden need to urinate.	尿急	突然的强烈排尿感导致急迫性尿失禁。
HP:0000013	泌尿生殖系统异常	Hypoplasia of the uterus	Underdevelopment of the `uterus` (FMA:17558).	子宫发育不良	子宫（FMA：17558）发育低下。
HP:0000014	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the bladder	An abnormality of the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900).	膀胱异常	发生在膀胱（FMA：15900）的异常。
HP:0000015	泌尿生殖系统异常	Bladder diverticulum	`Diverticulum` (MPATH:68) (sac or pouch) in the `wall of the urinary bladder` (FMA:15902).	膀胱憩室	膀胱壁（FMA：15902）上存在憩室（MPATH：68）。
HP:0000016	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urinary retention	Inability to completely empty the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900) during the process of `urination` (GO:0060073).	尿潴留	排尿过程中无法完全排空膀胱（FMA：15900）。
HP:0000017	泌尿生殖系统异常	Nocturia	Abnormally increased production of urine during the night leading to an unusually frequent need to urinate.	夜尿症	夜间尿量异常增多导致异乎寻常的频繁排尿。
HP:0000019	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urinary hesitancy	Difficulty in beginning the process of `urination` (GO:0060073).	排尿踌躇	排尿（GO：0060073）开始时不畅。
HP:0000020	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urinary incontinence	Loss of the ability to control the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900) leading to involuntary `urination` (GO:0060073).	尿失禁	膀胱（FMA：15900）控制能力丧失，导致非自主性排尿（GO：0060073）。
HP:0000021	泌尿生殖系统异常	Megacystis	Dilatation of the bladder postnatally.	巨膀胱症	出生后膀胱扩张。
HP:0000022	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of male internal genitalia	An abnormality of the `male internal genitalia` (FMA:45655).	男性内生殖器异常	男性内生殖器（FMA：45655）的异常。
HP:0000023	结缔组织异常,消化系统异常	Inguinal hernia	Protrusion of the contents of the abdominal cavity through the inguinal canal.	腹股沟疝	经由腹股沟的腹腔内容物的突起。
HP:0000024	泌尿生殖系统异常,免疫系统异常	Prostatitis	The presence of `inflammation` (MPATH:212) of the `prostate` (FMA:9600).	前列腺炎	前列腺（FMA：9600）出现炎症（MPATH：212）。
HP:0000025	泌尿生殖系统异常	Functional abnormality of male internal genitalia	#####	男性内生殖器功能异常	#####
HP:0000026	泌尿生殖系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Male hypogonadism	"Decreased functionality" (PATO:0001624) of the male gonad, i.e., of the "testis" (FMA:7210).	男性性腺功能减退症	男性性腺即睾丸功能减退。
HP:0000027	泌尿生殖系统异常	Azoospermia	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen.	无精症	精液中检测不到精子。
HP:0000028	泌尿生殖系统异常	Cryptorchidism	Absence of one or both testes from the scrotum owing to failure of the testis or testes to descend through the inguinal canal to the testis.	隐睾	阴囊内一侧或双侧睾丸缺如，是由于睾丸未通过腹股沟管下降到阴囊。
HP:0000029	泌尿生殖系统异常	Testicular atrophy	Wasting (atrophy) of the testicle (the male gonad) manifested by a decrease in size and potentially by a loss of fertility.	睾丸萎缩	睾丸萎缩表现为体积减小和潜在的生育能力丧失。
HP:0000030	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Testicular gonadoblastoma	The presence of a `gonadoblastoma` (MPATH:315) of the `testis` (FMA:7210).	睾丸性腺母细胞瘤	睾丸部位形成的性腺母细胞瘤。
HP:0000031	泌尿生殖系统异常,免疫系统异常	Epididymitis	The presence of `inflammation` (MPATH:212) of the `epididymis` (FMA:18255).	附睾炎	附睾发生的炎症 。
HP:0000032	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of male external genitalia	An abnormality of `male external genitalia` (FMA:45642).	男性外生殖器异常	男性外生殖器的异常。
HP:0000033	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ambiguous genitalia, male	`Ambiguous genitalia` (HP:0000062) in an individual with XY genetic gender.	男性外阴性别不明	遗传学性别为XY的个体，其外阴性别不明。
HP:0000034	泌尿生殖系统异常	Hydrocele testis	Accumulation of clear fluid in the  between the layers of membrane (tunica vaginalis) surrounding the testis.	睾丸鞘膜积液	睾丸鞘膜层之间积聚透明液体。
HP:0000035	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the testis	An anomaly of the testicle (the male gonad).	睾丸异常	睾丸（男性性腺）的异常。
HP:0000036	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the penis	#####	阴茎异常	#####
HP:0000037	泌尿生殖系统异常	Male pseudohermaphroditism	Hermaphroditism refers to a discrepancy between the morphology of the gonads and that of the external genitalia. In male pseudohermaphroditism, the genotype is male (XY) and the external genitalia are imcompletely virilized, ambiguous, or complete female. If gonads are present, they are testes.	男性假两性畸形	两性畸形是指性腺的形态和外生殖器不吻合。男性假两性畸形的染色体核型为男性（XY），但外生殖器呈不完全男性化、模棱两可或完全女性化。如果有性腺，则是睾丸。
HP:0000039	泌尿生殖系统异常	Epispadias	Displacement of the urethral opening on the dorsal (superior) surface of the penis.	尿道上裂	尿道口开口异常，开口在阴茎背侧（上面）。
HP:0000040	泌尿生殖系统异常	Enlarged penis	#####	阴茎增大	#####
HP:0000041	泌尿生殖系统异常	Chordee	A condition in which the head of the penis curves downward.	阴茎下曲	阴茎头向下弯曲。
HP:0000042	泌尿生殖系统异常	Absent external genitalia	Lack of external genitalia in a male or female individual.	外生殖器缺如	男性或女性无外生殖器。
HP:0000044	泌尿生殖系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism	Hypogonadotropic hypogonadism is characterized by reduced function of the gonads (testes in males or ovaries in females) and results from the absence of the gonadal stimulating pituitary hormones: follicle stimulating hormone (FSH) and luteinizing hormone (LH).	低促性腺激素性性腺功能减退症	低促性腺激素性性腺功能减退症以性腺（男性的睾丸，女性的卵巢）功能降低为特征，是垂体促性腺激素缺乏所致，如卵泡刺激素（FSH）和促黄体生成激素（LH）。
HP:0000045	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the scrotum	#####	阴囊异常	#####
HP:0000046	泌尿生殖系统异常	Scrotal hypoplasia	#####	阴囊发育不良	#####
HP:0000047	泌尿生殖系统异常	Hypospadias	Displacement of the urethral opening on the ventral (inferior) surface of the penis.	尿道下裂	尿道口开口位于阴茎的腹侧（下部）。
HP:0000048	泌尿生殖系统异常	Bifid scrotum	Separation of the two halves of the scrotum, whereby commonly the 2 halves of the scrotum meet above the penis.	阴囊对裂	阴囊分离成左右两部分，这两半阴囊通常在阴茎上部汇合。
HP:0000049	泌尿生殖系统异常	Shawl scrotum	A condition in which the upper scrotal skin rises over the base of the penis.	披肩状阴囊	阴囊上部皮肤上升至阴茎根部。
HP:0000050	泌尿生殖系统异常	Hypoplastic male external genitalia	Underdevelopment of part or all of the male external reproductive organs (which include the penis, the scrotum and the urethra).	男性外生殖器发育不良	男性外生殖器（包括阴茎、阴囊和尿道）全部或部分发育低下。
HP:0000051	泌尿生殖系统异常	Perineal hypospadias	Hypospadias with location of the urethral meatus in the perineal region.	会阴型尿道下裂	尿道口位于会阴部的尿道下裂。
HP:0000052	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urethral atresia, male	Congenital anomaly characterized by closure or failure to develop an opening in the urethra in males.	男性尿道闭锁	一种先天性异常，男性的尿道开口闭锁或未发育形成开口。
HP:0000053	泌尿生殖系统异常	Macroorchidism	The presence of abnormally large testes.	巨睾	异常的大睾丸。
HP:0000054	泌尿生殖系统异常	Micropenis	Abnormally small `penis` (FMA:9707). At birth, the normal penis is about 3 cm (stretched length from pubic tubercle to tip of penis) with micropenis less than 2.0-2.5 cm.	小阴茎	异常小的阴茎。出生时，正常阴茎大约长3厘米（从耻骨结节到龟头顶端拉直了量得的长度），小于2.0-2.5厘米为小阴茎。
HP:0000055	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of female external genitalia	An abnormality of the `female external genitalia` (FMA:45649).	女性外生殖器异常	女性外生殖器的异常。
HP:0000056	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the clitoris	An abnormality of the `clitoris` (FMA:9909).	阴蒂异常	阴蒂的异常。
HP:0000057		Clitoromegaly	`Increased size` (PATO:0000586) of the `clitoris` (FMA:9909).	阴蒂肥大	阴蒂体积增大。
HP:0000058	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the labia	An anomaly of the labia, the externally visible portions of the vulva.	阴唇异常	阴唇的异常，阴蒂是女阴外部可见部分。
HP:0000059	泌尿生殖系统异常	Hypoplastic labia majora	Undergrowth of the outer labia.	大阴唇发育不良	大阴唇发育低下。
HP:0000060	泌尿生殖系统异常	Clitoral hypoplasia	Developmental hypoplasia of the `clitoris` (FMA:9909).	阴蒂发育不良	阴蒂的发育低下。
HP:0000061	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ambiguous genitalia, female	`Ambiguous genitalia` (HP:0000062) in an individual with XX genetic gender.	女性外阴性别不明	遗传学性别为XX个体的外阴性别不明。
HP:0000062	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ambiguous genitalia	A genital phenotype that is not clearly assignable to a single gender. Ambiguous genitalia can be evaluated using the Prader scale: Prader 0: Normal female external genitalia. Prader 1: Female external genitalia with clitoromegaly. Prader 2: Clitoromegaly with partial labial fusion forming a funnel-shaped urogenital sinus. Prader 3: Increased phallic enlargement. Complete labioscrotal fusion forming a urogenital sinus with a single opening. Prader 4: Complete scrotal fusion with urogenital opening at the base or on the shaft of the phallus. Prader 5: Normal male external genitalia. The diagnosis of ambiguous genitalia is made for Prader 1-4.	外阴性别不明	根据生殖器外型无法确定是属于哪一种性别。外阴性别不明可以使用Prader计分来进行评估：Prader 0:正常女性外生殖器；Prader 1:女性外阴但阴蒂增大；Prader 2:阴蒂较大，阴唇部分融合，形成漏斗状阴道口；Prader 3:阴茎增大，阴唇完全融合形成尿生殖窦，有单一的尿道开口。Prader 4:阴囊完全融合，泌尿生殖口在阴茎的根部或阴茎上，类似尿道下裂；Prader 5:正常男性外生殖器。Prader 1-4 诊断为外阴性别不明。
HP:0000063	泌尿生殖系统异常	Fused labia minora	Fusion of the labia minora as a result of labial adhesions resulting in vaginal obstruction.	小阴唇融合	由于阴唇粘连造成小阴唇融合，导致阴道梗阻。
HP:0000064	泌尿生殖系统异常	Hypoplastic labia minora	#####	小阴唇发育不良	#####
HP:0000065	泌尿生殖系统异常	Labial hypertrophy	#####	阴唇肥厚	#####
HP:0000066	泌尿生殖系统异常	Labial hypoplasia	#####	阴唇发育不良	#####
HP:0000067	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urethral atresia, female	Congenital anomaly characterized by closure or failure to develop an opening in the urethra in females.	女性尿道闭锁	一种先天性异常，女性的尿道开口闭锁或未发育形成开口。
HP:0000068	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urethral atresia	Congenital anomaly characterized by closure or failure to develop an opening in the urethra.	尿道闭锁	一种先天性异常，尿道开口闭锁或未发育形成开口。
HP:0000069	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the ureter	An abnormality of the `ureter` (FMA:9704).	输尿管异常	输尿管的异常。
HP:0000070	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ureterocele	A ureterocele is a congenital saccular dilatation of the distal segment of the ureter.	输尿管囊肿	输尿管远端段先天性囊状扩张。
HP:0000071	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ureteral stenosis	The presence of a stenotic, i.e., `constricted` (PATO:0001847) `ureter` (FMA:9704).	输尿管狭窄	输尿管狭窄，即输尿管缢缩。
HP:0000072	泌尿生殖系统异常	Hydroureter	The distention of the `ureter` (FMA:9704) with urine.	输尿管积水	输尿管内潴留尿液导致其扩张。
HP:0000073	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ureteral duplication	A developmental anomaly characterized by the presence of two, instead of one, ureter connecting a kidney to the bladder.	输尿管重复	一种发育异常，一侧肾脏通过两根输尿管（而不是一根）连接到膀胱。
HP:0000074	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ureteropelvic junction obstruction	Blockage of urine flow from the renal pelvis to the proximal ureter.	肾盂输尿管连接部梗阻	在肾盂到近端输尿管尿处流受到阻断。
HP:0000075	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal duplication	A congenital anomaly of the urinary tract, in which the `kidney` (FMA:7203) is duplicated and is drained via two separate renal pelves and ureters.	肾重复	先天性泌尿道异常，肾发生重复并分别经由两个独立的肾盂和输尿管下排。
HP:0000076	泌尿生殖系统异常	Vesicoureteral reflux	Abnormal (retrograde) movement of urine from the bladder into ureters or kidneys related to inadequacy of the valvular mechanism at the ureterovesicular junction or other causes.	膀胱输尿管返流	尿液从膀胱异常（反向）流动进入输尿管或达到肾，与输尿管膀胱瓣膜结构异常有关，或存在其他原因。
HP:0000077	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the kidney	An abnormality of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	肾脏异常	肾脏的异常。
HP:0000078	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the genital system	An abnormality of the `genital system` (FMA:7160).	生殖系统异常	生殖系统的异常。
HP:0000079	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the urinary system	An abnormality of the `urinary system` (FMA:7159).	泌尿系统异常	泌尿系统的异常。
HP:0000080	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of genital physiology	An `abnormal` (PATO:0000460) `functionality` (PATO:0001509) of the `genital system` (FMA:7160).	生殖生理异常	生殖系统发生的功能异常。
HP:0000081	泌尿生殖系统异常	Duplicated collecting system	A duplication of the collecting system of the kidney.	集合管系统重复	肾集合管系统的重复。
HP:0000083	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal insufficiency	A reduction in the level of performance of the kidneys in areas of function comprising the concentration of urine, removal of wastes, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, homeostasis of blood pressure, and calcium metabolism.	肾功能不全	肾功能的降低，肾功能包括尿液的浓缩、廓清废物、维持电解质平衡、维持机体内血压平衡和钙代谢。
HP:0000085	泌尿生殖系统异常	Horseshoe kidney	A connection of the right and left kidney by an isthmus of functioning renal parenchyma or fibrous tissue that crosses the midline.	马蹄肾	由有肾功能的肾实质或纤维组织将左右肾在中线峡部连接起来，呈现马蹄状。
HP:0000086	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ectopic kidney	A developmental defect in which a kidney is located in an abnormal anatomic position.	异位肾	由发育异常导致肾脏不在正常解剖位置。
HP:0000089	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal hypoplasia	`Hypoplasia` (MPATH:133) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	肾发育不全	肾发育不良。
HP:0000090	泌尿生殖系统异常	Nephronophthisis	Presence of cysts at the corticomedullary junction of the kidney in combination with tubulointerstitial fibrosis.	肾消耗病	肾皮髓质交界处存在囊肿，伴肾小管间质性纤维化。
HP:0000091	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the renal tubule	An abnormality of the `renal tubules` (FMA:15627).	肾小管异常	肾小管的异常。
HP:0000092	泌尿生殖系统异常	Tubular atrophy	The presence of renal tubules with thick redundant basement membranes, or a reduction of greater than 50% in tubular diameter compared to surrounding non-atrophic tubules.	肾小管萎缩	肾小管形成增厚的冗余基底膜，或与周围未萎缩的小管相比直径减小超过一半。
HP:0000093	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Proteinuria	Increased levels of protein in the urine.	蛋白尿	尿液中蛋白质水平增加。
HP:0000095	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the glomerulus	A structural anomaly of the `glomerulus` (FMA:15624).	肾小球异常	肾小球的结构异常。
HP:0000096	泌尿生殖系统异常	Glomerulosclerosis	Accumulation of scar tissue within the glomerulus.	肾小球硬化	肾小球内疤痕组织占位。
HP:0000097	泌尿生殖系统异常	Focal segmental glomerulosclerosis	Segmental accumulation of scar tissue in individual (but not all) glomeruli.	局灶节段性肾小球硬化	在部分（而不是全部）肾小球存在节段性瘢痕组织增加。
HP:0000098	生长异常	Tall stature	A height above that which is expected according to age and gender norms.	高身材	身高高于该年龄性别预期身高的正常范围。
HP:0000099	泌尿生殖系统异常,免疫系统异常	Glomerulonephritis	Inflammation of the renal glomeruli.	肾小球肾炎	肾小球的炎症。
HP:0000100	泌尿生殖系统异常	Nephrotic syndrome	Nephrotic syndrome is a collection of findings resulting from glomerular dysfunction with an increase in glomerular capillary wall permeability associated with pronounced proteinuria. Nephrotic syndrome refers to the constellation of clinical findings that result from severe renal loss of protein, with Proteinuria and hypoalbuminemia, edema, and hyperlipidemia.	肾病综合征	肾病综合征包含一系列的异常，由肾小球功能障碍所致，伴肾小球毛细血管壁通透性增加而产生明显的蛋白尿。肾病综合征是指严重的肾性蛋白质损失，致蛋白尿、低白蛋白血症、浮肿和高血脂症等一系列临床表现。
HP:0000103	泌尿生殖系统异常	Polyuria	An `increased rate` (PATO:0000912) of urine production.	多尿	尿液生成率增加。
HP:0000104	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal agenesis	`Agenesis` (MPATH:57), that is, failure of the `kidney` (FMA:7203) to develop during embryogenesis and development.	肾缺如	肾缺如是指在胚胎形成和发育过程中没有肾脏发育。
HP:0000105	泌尿生殖系统异常	Enlarged kidneys	An abnormal increase in the size of the kidney.	肾脏增大	肾脏的大小异常增加。
HP:0000107	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal cyst	A fluid filled sac in the kidney.	肾囊肿	肾脏中有充满液体的囊。
HP:0000108	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal corticomedullary cysts	The presence of multiple cysts at the border between the renal cortex and medulla.	肾皮髓质交界处囊肿	肾皮质和髓质交界处多发性囊肿。
HP:0000110	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal dysplasia	The presence of `developmental dysplasia` (MPATH:64) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	肾发育不良	肾脏发育不良。
HP:0000111	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal juxtaglomerular cell hypertrophy/hyperplasia	Increased number and size of the juxtaglomerular cells.	肾小球球旁细胞肥大/增生	肾小球球旁细胞数量增加和体积增大。
HP:0000112	泌尿生殖系统异常	Nephropathy	A nonspecific term referring to disease or damage of the kidneys.	肾病	非特异性术语​​，通指肾脏的疾病或损伤。
HP:0000113	泌尿生殖系统异常	Polycystic kidney dysplasia	The presence of multiple cysts in both kidneys.	多囊性肾发育不良	双侧肾脏多发囊肿。
HP:0000114	泌尿生殖系统异常	Proximal tubulopathy	Dysfunction of the proximal tubule, which is the portion of the duct system of the nephron of the kidney which leads from Bowman's capsule to the loop of Henle.	近端肾小管病	近端肾小管功能障碍，近端肾小管是从肾小囊（鲍曼囊）通往细尿管袢（亨利袢）的肾单位管道系统的一部分。
HP:0000117	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Renal phosphate wasting	High urine phosphate in the presence of hypophosphatemia.	肾源性磷酸盐流失	低磷血症时尿液中出现高磷酸盐。
HP:0000119	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the genitourinary system	The presence of any abnormality of the `genitourinary system` (FMA:280610).	泌尿生殖系统异常	泌尿生殖系统的异常。
HP:0000121	泌尿生殖系统异常	Nephrocalcinosis	Nephrocalcinosis is the deposition of calcium salts in renal parenchyma.	肾钙质沉着症	肾钙质沉着症指是钙盐在肾实质的沉积。
HP:0000122	泌尿生殖系统异常	Unilateral renal agenesis	A `unilateral` (PATO:0000634) form of `agenesis` (MPATH:57) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	单侧肾缺如	单侧型肾缺如。
HP:0000123	泌尿生殖系统异常,免疫系统异常	Nephritis	The presence of `inflammation` (MPATH:212) affecting the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	肾炎	肾脏出现炎症反应。
HP:0000124	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal tubular dysfunction	#####	肾小管功能障碍	#####
HP:0000125	泌尿生殖系统异常	Pelvic kidney	A developmental defect in which a kidney is located in an abnormal anatomic position within the pelvis.	盆腔肾	一种肾发育缺陷，肾脏解剖位置异常，位于骨盆内。
HP:0000126	泌尿生殖系统异常	Hydronephrosis	Severe distention of the kidney with dilation of the renal pelvis and calices.	肾积水	肾脏严重扩张伴肾盂和肾盏扩张。
HP:0000127	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Renal salt wasting	A high concentration of one or more electrolytes in the urine in the presence of low serum concentrations of the electrolyte(s).	肾源性盐流失	在血清中电解质浓度低时，尿液中出现一种或多种高浓度的电解质。
HP:0000128	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Renal potassium wasting	High urine potassium in the presence of hypokalemia.	肾源性钾流失	低钾血症时，尿液中出现高浓度钾。

HP:0000175	头部和颈部的异常	Cleft palate	Cleft palate is a developmental defect of the `palate` (FMA:54549) resulting from a failure of fusion of the palatine processes and manifesting as a separation of the roof of the mouth (soft and hard palate).	腭裂	腭裂是由腭突融合失败造成的发育缺陷，表现为口腔顶（软硬腭）的分裂。
HP:0000176	头部和颈部的异常	Submucous cleft hard palate	Hard-palate submucous clefts are characterized by bony defects in the midline of the bony palate that are covered by the mucous membrane of the roof of the mouth. It may be possible to detect a submucous cleft hard palate upon palpation as a notch in the bony palate.	黏膜下硬裂腭	粘膜下硬腭裂以形成口腔顶部的骨性硬腭中间部缺损为特征。可能在触诊硬腭时检查出来。
HP:0000177	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of upper lip	An abnormality of the `upper lip` (FMA:59817).	上唇异常	上唇的异常。

The height of the vermilion of the lower lip in the midline is more than 2 SD above the mean. Alternatively, an apparently increased height of the vermilion of the lower lip in the frontal view (subjective).	厚下唇	下唇厚度增加，导致下唇外观突出。下唇中线唇红的高度大于平均值超过2个标准偏差。或者，从正面看下唇唇红的高度显得增加（主观）。

HP:0000182	头部和颈部的异常	Movement abnormality of the tongue	#####	舌头运动异常	#####

HP:0000185	头部和颈部的异常	Cleft soft palate	Cleft of the soft palate (also known as the velum, or muscular palate) as a result of a developmental defect occurring between the 7th and 12th week of pregnancy. Cleft soft palate can cause functional abnormalities of the Eustachian tube with resulting middle ear anomalies and hearing difficulties, as well as speech problems associated with hypernasal speech due to velopharyngeal insufficiency.	软腭裂	软腭（也称为软腭，或肌肉腭）的裂口，为第7周和第12周妊娠之间发生的发育缺陷的结果。软腭裂可导致咽鼓管功能异常，由此导致中耳畸形和听力困难，以及因腭咽闭合不全带来的伴有重鼻音的语言问题。

HP:0000201	头部和颈部的异常	Pierre-Robin sequence	Pierre Robin malformation is a sequence of developmental malformations characterized by `micrognathia (mandibular hypoplasia)` (HP:0000347), `glossoptosis` (HP:0000162) and `cleft palate` (HP:0000175).	皮埃尔 - 罗宾序列	皮埃尔-罗宾畸形的特点是小下颌（下颌发育不全），舌下垂和腭裂的发育畸形序列。
HP:0000202	头部和颈部的异常	Oral cleft	The presence of a cleft in the oral cavity, the two main types of which are cleft lip and cleft palate. In cleft lip, there is the congenital failure of the maxillary and median nasal processes to fuse, forming a groove or fissure in the lip. In cleft palate, there is a congenital failure of the palate to fuse properly, forming a grooved depression or fissure in the roof of the mouth. Clefts of the lip and palate can occur individually or together. It is preferable to code each defect separately.	口裂	口腔中有裂口，有唇裂和腭裂两种主要类型。唇裂指上颌和正中鼻突的先天性融合失败而形成在唇部的凹槽或裂缝。腭裂指腭先天性未能正确融合而在口腔顶部形成带槽凹陷或裂缝。唇颚裂可单独或合并发生。最好是每个缺陷分别编码。
HP:0000204	头部和颈部的异常	Cleft upper lip	A gap in the `upper lip` (FMA:59817). This is a congenital defect resulting from nonfusion of tissues of the lip during embryonal development.	上唇裂	上唇的间隙。这是胚胎发育过程中唇组织非融合造成的先天性缺陷。
HP:0000205	头部和颈部的异常	Pursed lips	An abnormality of the appearance of the face caused by constant contraction of the lips leading to a puckered or pursed appearance.	钱包状嘴唇	由于嘴唇收缩导致唇周皮肤呈放射状的一种面部畸形。
HP:0000206	头部和颈部的异常	Glossitis	Inflammation of the tongue.	舌炎	舌头发炎。
HP:0000207	头部和颈部的异常	Triangular mouth	The presence of a `triangular` (PATO:0001875) form of the `mouth` (FMA:49184).	三角嘴	嘴呈三角形。
HP:0000211	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Trismus	Limitation in the ability to open the mouth.	牙关紧闭	张口能力受限。
HP:0000212	头部和颈部的异常	Gingival overgrowth	`Hyperplasia` (MPATH:134) of the `gingiva` (FMA:59762, that is, a thickening of the soft tissue overlying the alveolar ridge. The degree of thickening ranges from involvement of the interdental papillae alone to gingival overgrowth covering the entire tooth crown.	牙龈增生	牙龈增生即覆盖在牙槽嵴上的软组织变厚。增厚范围从仅包括齿间乳头，到牙龈增生覆盖整个牙冠。
HP:0000214	心血管系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Lip telangiectasia	`Telangiectasia` (MPATH:476) (that is, the presence of small dilated superficial blood vessels) of the `lips` (FMA:59815).	唇部毛细血管扩张	唇部的毛细血管扩张（即浅表小血管扩张）。
HP:0000215	头部和颈部的异常	Thick upper lip vermilion	Height of the vermilion of the upper lip in the midline more than 2 SD above the mean. Alternatively, an apparently increased height of the vermilion of the upper lip in the frontal view (subjective).	厚上唇红	上唇中线唇红的高度大于平均值超过2个标准偏差。或者，从正面看下唇唇红的高度显得增加（主观）。
HP:0000216	头部和颈部的异常	Broad secondary alveolar ridge	#####	宽恒牙槽嵴	#####
HP:0000217	头部和颈部的异常	Xerostomia	Dryness of the mouth due to salivary gland dysfunction.	口腔干燥	因唾液腺功能障碍导致的口腔黏膜干燥。
HP:0000218	头部和颈部的异常	High palate	Height of the palate more than 2 SD above the mean (objective) or palatal height at the level of the first permanent molar more than twice the height of the teeth (subjective).	高腭	腭高大于平均值超过2个标准偏差（客观）或腭高在第一恒大臼齿处的水平高度超过该牙齿的高度的两倍（主观）。
HP:0000219	头部和颈部的异常	Thin upper lip vermilion	Height of the vermilion of the upper lip in the midline more than 2 SD below the mean. Alternatively, an apparently reduced height of the vermilion of the upper lip in the frontal view (subjective).	薄上唇红	上唇中线唇红的高度小于平均值超过2个标准偏差。或者，从正面看上唇唇红的高度显得变短（主观）。
HP:0000220	头部和颈部的异常	Velopharyngeal insufficiency	Inability of velopharyngeal sphincter to sufficiently separate the nasal cavity from the oral cavity during speech.	腭咽机能不全	腭咽括约肌功能下降，言语时不能把鼻腔与口腔分开。
HP:0000221	头部和颈部的异常	Furrowed tongue	Accentuation of the grooves on the dorsal surface of the tongue.	沟裂舌	舌头背侧表面上的凹槽加深。
HP:0000222	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Gingival hyperkeratosis	`Hyperkeratosis` (MPATH:154) of the `gingiva` (FMA:59762).	牙龈角化过度	牙龈发生过度角化
HP:0000223	神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of taste sensation	The taste patients feeling (subjective feeling) is different from normal while eating.	味觉异常	味觉异常是指在饮食时口舌感觉的味道（主观感觉）异于正常人，也可表现为进食无味、味觉减退或味觉完全丧失。
HP:0000224	神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Decreased taste sensation	The taste we feeling while eating is closely related to olfaction, vision as well as taste. Decreased taste sensation can be caused by a variety of reasons.	味觉减退	味觉是指食物在人的口腔内对味觉器官化学感受系统的刺激并产生的一种感觉。不同地域的人对味觉的分类不一样。使老人味觉减退的因素有很多，因为食物的滋味不仅来自于舌头的基本味觉，而且与嗅觉、视觉、神经等的作用有着密切的关系。
HP:0000225	头部和颈部的异常,血液和造血组织异常	Gingival bleeding	`Hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) affecting the `gingiva` (FMA:59762).	牙龈出血	累及牙龈的出血
HP:0000227	心血管系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Tongue telangiectasia	`Telangiectasia` (MPATH:476) (that is, the presence of small dilated superficial blood vessels) of the tongue.	舌毛细血管扩张	舌的毛细血管扩张（即舌体的浅表小血管扩张）。
HP:0000228	心血管系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Oral cavity teleangiectasia	Presence of teleangiectases in the oral cavity.	口腔毛细管扩张	口腔中的毛细血管扩张。
HP:0000230	头部和颈部的异常	Gingivitis	`Inflammation` (MPATH:212) of the `gingiva` (FMA:59762).	牙龈炎	牙龈发炎。
HP:0000232	头部和颈部的异常	Everted lower lip vermilion	An abnormal configuration of the `lower lip` (FMA:59818) such that it is turned outward i.e., `everted` (PATO:0001597), with the Inner aspect of the lower lip vermilion (normally opposing the teeth) being visible in a frontal view.	下唇唇红外翻	下唇异常外翻，即从正面可见下唇唇红的内部（通常与牙齿相对）。
HP:0000233	头部和颈部的异常	Thin vermilion border	Reduced width of the &quot;skin of vermilion border region of upper lip&quot; (FMA:312645).	薄嘴唇	上唇唇红区皮肤显得变窄。
HP:0000234	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the head	An abnormality of the `head` (FMA:7154).	头部异常	头部的异常。
HP:0000235	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the fontanelles and cranial sutures	Any abnormality of the fontanelles (the regions covered by a thick membrane that normally ossify in the first two years of life) or the cranial sutures (the fibrous joints in which the articulating bones or cartilages of the skull are connected by sutural ligaments ).	囟门和颅缝的异常	囟门（在出生两年内骨化的由厚膜覆盖的区域）和颅缝（颅骨之间由韧带和纤维性关节构成的结缔组织相连形成的缝隙）的任何异常
HP:0000236	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the anterior fontanelle	An abnormality of the anterior fontanelle, i.e., the cranial fontanelle that is located at the intersection of the coronal and sagittal sutures.	前囟异常	前囟的任何异常。前囟即颅囟，位于冠状缝和矢状缝的交点。
HP:0000237	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Small anterior fontanelle	Abnormally decreased size of  the `anterior fontanelle` (FMA:75439) with respect to age-dependent norms.	小前囟	#####
HP:0000238	神经系统异常	Hydrocephalus	Hydrocephalus is an active distension of the ventricular system of the brain resulting from inadequate passage of CSF from its point of production within the cerebral ventricles to its point of absorption into the systemic circulation.	脑积水	脑积水是从脑脊液产生到吸收至体循环通路异常导致的脑室系统主动扩张。
HP:0000239	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Large fontanelles	In newborns, the two frontal bones, two parietal bones, and one occipital bone are joined by fibrous sutures, which form a small posterior fontanelle, and a larger, diamond-shaped anterior fontanelle. These regions allow for the skull to pass the birth canal and for later growth. The fontanelles gradually ossify, whereby the posterior fontanelle usually closes by eight weeks and the anterior fontanelle by the 9th to 16th month of age. Large fontanelles are diagnosed if the fontanelles are larger than age-dependent norms.	大囟门	在新生儿中，两块额骨、两块顶骨和一块枕骨由纤维缝合线连接，形成一个小的后囟和一个较大的菱形前囟。这些区域允许头颅通过产道，以后可增长。出生后囟门逐渐骨化，后囟通常在出生后八周闭合，前囟在出生后9〜16个月时闭合。如果囟门比年龄相符的正常值大，则被诊断为大囟门。
HP:0000240	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of skull size	Any abnormality of the size of the skull.	颅骨的大小异常	颅骨大小的任何异常。
HP:0000242	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Parietal bossing	Parietal bossing is a marked prominence in the parietal region.	顶骨隆起	顶骨隆起是指在顶骨区明显突出。
HP:0000243	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Trigonocephaly	Wedge-shaped, or triangular head, with the apex of the triangle at the midline of the forehead and the base of the triangle at the occiput.	三角头畸形	头颅呈三角形或三角锥形，尖位于额部中线，底位于两侧枕骨连线。
HP:0000244	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Brachyturricephaly	A skull deformity characterized by a shortening of the anterior-posterior and an elongation of the transverse and vertical skulldiameters,, frequently combined with malformations of the occipital region.	短尖头畸形	颅骨畸形，呈前后径缩短，垂直径和水平径延长，常合并枕骨区畸形。
HP:0000245	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the sinuses	Abnormality of the paranasal (cranial) sinuses, which are air-filled spaces that are located within the bones of the skull and face and communicate with the nasal cavity. They comprise the maxillary sinuses, the frontal sinuses, the ethmoid sinuses, and the sphenoid sinuses.	鼻窦异常	鼻旁鼻（颅）窦的异常。鼻窦是头骨和面部的骨头内部与鼻腔相通的充满空气的空间，包括上颌窦，额窦，筛窦，和蝶窦。
HP:0000246	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,免疫系统异常	Sinusitis	Inflammation of the `paranasal sinuses` (FMA:59679) owing to a viral, bacterial, or fungal infection, allergy, or an autoimmune reaction.	鼻窦炎	由于病毒、细菌、真菌感染，过敏或自身免疫反应等原因所造成的鼻窦的炎症。（FMA:59679）
HP:0000248	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Brachycephaly	An `abnormality of skull shape` (HP:0002648) characterized by a `decreased anterior-posterior diameter` (PATO:0002042). That is, a cephalic index greater than 81%. Alternatively, an apparently shortened anteroposterior dimension (length) of the head compared to width.	短头畸形	头骨形状的异常，其特征为前后直径减小。即头指数大于81％，或头部的前后尺寸（长度）相比宽度显得缩短。
HP:0000250	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Dense calvaria	An abnormal increase of density of the bones making up the calvaria.	颅盖骨密度过高	颅盖骨骨骼密度的异常增加。
HP:0000252	神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Microcephaly	Occipito-frontal (head) circumference (OFC) less than -3 standard deviations compared to appropriate, age matched, normal standards (Ross JJ, Frias JL 1977,  PMID:9683597). Alternatively, decreased size of the `cranium` (FMA:46565).	小头畸形	枕额（头）围（OFC）比年龄匹配的正常标准少3个标准差以上(参见Ross JJ, Frias JL 1977,  PMID:9683597)。或者头盖骨尺寸减小。
HP:0000253	神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Progressive microcephaly	Progressive microcephaly is diagnosed when the head circumference falls progressively behind age- and gender-dependent norms.	渐进性小头畸形	头围逐渐落后于同年龄和同性别的正常值时，可诊断为渐进性小头畸形。
HP:0000255	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,免疫系统异常	Acute sinusitis	An `acute` (PATO:0000389) form of `sinusitis` (HP:0000246).	急性鼻窦炎	急性鼻窦炎
HP:0000256	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Macrocephaly	Occipitofrontal (head) circumference greater than 97th centile compared to appropriate, age matched, sex-matched normal standards. Alternatively, a apparently increased size of the `cranium` (FMA:46565).	巨头畸形	枕额（头）周长大于年龄和性别相匹配的正常值的第97百分位数。或者头盖骨尺寸显得增大。
HP:0000260	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Wide anterior fontanel	Enlargement of the `anterior fontanelle` (FMA:75439) with respect to age-dependent norms.	前囟增宽	与相应年龄正常值相比，前囟扩大。
HP:0000262	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Turricephaly	Tall head relative to width and length.	尖头畸形	头的高度与宽度和长度相比过大。
HP:0000263	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Oxycephaly	Oxycephaly (from Greek oxus, sharp, and kephalos, head) refers to a conical or pointed shape of the skull.	尖头畸形	尖头畸形（希腊oxus尖锐，kephalos头）是指头颅呈锥形或尖形。
HP:0000264	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the mastoid	An abnormality of the `mastoid process` (FMA:52872), which is the conical prominence projecting from the undersurface of the mastoid portion of the temporal bone.	乳突异常	乳突的异常。乳突指从颞骨乳突部底面突出的圆锥形突出。
HP:0000265	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Mastoiditis	A bacterial infection of the mastoid bone. The mastoid bone, which sits behind the ear, consists of air spaces that help drain the middle ear.	乳突炎	乳突骨的细菌感染炎症。乳突骨坐落于耳后，帮助空气从中耳排出。
HP:0000267	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Cranial asymmetry	Asymmetry of the bones of the skull.	颅骨不对称	#####
HP:0000268	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Dolichocephaly	An `abnormality of skull shape` (HP:0002648) characterized by a `increased anterior-posterior diameter` (PATO:0002043), i.e., an increased antero-posterior dimension of the skull. Cephalic index less than 76%. Alternatively, an apparently increased antero-posterior length of the head compared to width. Often due to premature closure of the sagittal suture.	长头畸形	一种以前-后直径过长为特征的颅骨形状异常，即头骨从面前到脑后的尺寸过长。头颅指数低于76％。或者说，相对于头部宽度，头部前-后长度显得过长。常由矢状缝的过早关闭导致。
HP:0000269	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Prominent occiput	Increased convexity of the `occiput` (FMA:49187) (posterior part of the skull).	枕骨突出	枕骨（颅骨后部）的凸度增加
HP:0000270	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Delayed cranial suture closure	Infants normally have two fontanels at birth, the diamond-shaped anterior fontanelle at the junction of the coronal and sagittal sutures, and the posterior fontanelle at the intersection of the occipital and parietal bones. The posterior fontanelle usually closes by the 8th week of life, and the anterior fontanel closes by the 18th month of life on average. This term applies if there is delay of closure of the fontanelles beyond the normal age.	颅缝闭合延迟	婴儿在出生时通常有两个囟门，菱形前囟在冠状缝和矢状缝交界处，后囟在枕顶骨的交点。后囟通常出生后第8周闭合，前囟平均出生后18个月闭合。本术语适用于的囟门闭合延迟/超出正常年龄。
HP:0000271	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the face	An abnormality of the `face` (FMA:24728).	脸部异常	脸部的异常
HP:0000272	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Malar flattening	Underdevelopment of the malar (frontal) process of the maxilla, appreciated in profile and/or by palpation.	扁平颧突	上颌骨颧（前）突发育落后，通过侧面观察和/或触诊来识别。
HP:0000273	头部和颈部的异常	Facial grimacing	#####	面部表情痛苦	#####
HP:0000274	头部和颈部的异常	Small face	A face that is short (HP:0011219) and narrow (HP:0000275).	小脸	面部既短又窄
HP:0000275	头部和颈部的异常	Narrow face	Bizygomatic (upper face) and bigonial (lower face) width are both more than 2 standard deviations below the mean (objective); or, an apparent reduction in the width of the upper and lower face (subjective).	脸狭窄	两颧间（脸上部）和下颌角间（脸下部）的宽度低于平均值超过2个标准偏差（客观）;或者脸的上部和下部的宽度显得减小（主观）。
HP:0000276	头部和颈部的异常	Long face	Facial height (length) is more than 2 standard deviations above the mean (objective); or, an apparent increase in the height (length) of the face (subjective).	长脸	面部高度（长度）比平均值高大于2个标准偏差（客观）；或者，面部高度（长度）显得增加（主观）。
HP:0000277	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the mandible	Any abnormality of the `mandible` (FMA:52748), the bone of the lower jaw.	下颌骨异常	下颌骨的任何异常
HP:0000278	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Retrognathia	An abnormality in which the `mandible` (FMA:52748) is `mislocalised posteriorly` (PATO:0001922).	下颌后缩	下颌骨后移所导致的一种畸形
HP:0000280	头部和颈部的异常	Coarse facial features	Absence of fine and sharp appearance of brows, nose, lips, mouth, and chin, usually because of rounded and heavy features or thickened skin with or without thickening of subcutaneous and bony tissues.	面容粗糙	眉毛，鼻子，嘴唇，嘴，下巴的外观不精细鲜明，通常是因为圆润和厚重的面部特征或伴有或没有皮下和骨组织增厚的皮肤增厚。
HP:0000282	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,头部和颈部的异常	Facial edema	#####	面部水肿	#####
HP:0000283	头部和颈部的异常	Broad face	Bizygomatic (upper face) and bigonial (lower face) width greater than 2 standard deviations above the mean (objective); or an apparent increase in the width of the face (subjective).	宽脸	双颧间（脸上部）和下颌角间（脸下部）宽度的大于平均值2个标准偏差（客观）;或者脸宽度显得增加（主观）。
HP:0000284		Abnormality of the ocular region	#####	眼部异常	#####
HP:0000286	头部和颈部的异常	Epicanthus	A fold of skin starting above the medial aspect of the upper eyelid and arching downward to cover, pass in front of and lateral to the medial canthus.	内眦赘皮	始于上眼睑中部之上，并向下弯覆盖至内眼角前面和侧面的皮肤褶皱。
HP:0000287	结缔组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Increased facial adipose tissue	An increased amount of subcutaneous fat tissue in the face.	面部脂肪组织增多	面部皮下脂肪组织的量增加。
HP:0000288	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the philtrum	An abnormality of the `philtrum` (FMA:59819).	人中异常	人中的异常。
HP:0000289	头部和颈部的异常	Broad philtrum	Distance between the philtral ridges, measured just above the vermilion border, more than 2 standard deviations above the mean, or alternatively, an apparently increased distance between the ridges of the philtrum.	宽人中	由正上方唇红边缘测得的人中脊之间的距离大于平均值2个标准偏差以上，或人中脊之间的距离显得增加。
HP:0000290	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the forehead	An anomalyof the `forehead` (FMA:63864).	前额异常	前额的异常。
HP:0000291	结缔组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of facial adipose tissue	#####	面部脂肪组织异常	#####
HP:0000292	结缔组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Loss of facial adipose tissue	Loss of normal subcutaneous fat tissue in the face.	面部脂肪组织丢失	面部正常的皮下脂肪组织失去。
HP:0000293	头部和颈部的异常	Full cheeks	Increased prominence or roundness of soft tissues between zygomata and mandible.	脸颊丰满	颧骨与下颌骨之间软组织更加鼓起或圆润。
HP:0000294	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Low anterior hairline	Distance between the hairline (trichion) and the glabella (the most prominent point on the frontal bone above the root of the nose), in the midline, more than two SD below the mean. Alternatively, an apparently decreased distance between the hairline and the glabella.	前发际低	位于中线位置的发际（发际中点）和眉间（鼻根上方位于额骨上的最突出的点）的距离，低于平均值两个标准差以上。也可以理解为发际和眉间之间距离明显缩短。
HP:0000295	头部和颈部的异常	Doll-like facies	A characteristic facial appearance with a round facial form, full cheeks, a short nose, and a relatively small chin.	娃娃脸	表现为圆脸形，圆脸颊，短鼻子以及相对较小的下巴的独特面部外观。
HP:0000297	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Facial hypotonia	Reduced muscle tone of a muscle that is innervated by the facial nerve (the seventh cranial nerve).	面部肌张力低下	由面神经（第七脑神经）支配的肌肉张力下降。
HP:0000298	头部和颈部的异常	Mask-like facies	A lack of facial expression often with staring eyes and a slightly open mouth.	面具般面容	缺乏面部表情，常常表现为瞪眼睛和嘴微张。
HP:0000300	头部和颈部的异常	Oval face	A face with a rounded and slightly elongated outline.	卵形脸	稍拉长的椭圆形脸轮廓。
HP:0000301	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of facial musculature	An anomaly of a muscle that is innervated by the facial nerve (the seventh cranial nerve).	面部肌肉异常	由面神经（第七脑神经）支配的肌肉异常。
HP:0000303	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Mandibular prognathia	Abnormal prominence of the `chin` (FMA:46495) related to `increased length` (PATO:0000573) of the `mandible` (FMA:52748).	下颌前突	与下颌长度增加相关的下巴异常突出
HP:0000306	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the chin	An abnormality of the `chin` (FMA:46495), i.e., of the inferior portion of the face lying inferior to the lower lip and including the central prominence of the lower jaw.	下巴异常	下巴的异常。下巴指面下部下唇以下部分，包括下颌中央突出部位。
HP:0000307	头部和颈部的异常	Pointed chin	A marked tapering of the lower face to the chin.	尖下巴	由面下部到下巴明显削尖。
HP:0000308	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Microretrognathia	A form of `developmental hypoplasia` (MPATH:10060) of the `mandible` (FMA:52748) in which the mandible is `mislocalised posteriorly` (PATO:0001922).	小下颌后移	下颌骨发育不全的一种形式，指下颌骨向后错位。
HP:0000309	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the midface	An anomaly of the midface, which is a region and not an anatomical term. It extends, superiorly, from the inferior orbital margin to, inferiorly, the level of nasal base. It is formed by the maxilla (upper jaw) and zygoma. Traditionally, the nose and premaxilla are not included in the midface.	面中部异常	面中部的异常。面中部指区域而不是解剖术语。其范围上至眼眶下缘，下至鼻基。它是由上颌骨（上颌）和颧骨形成。传统上，面中部不包括鼻和前颌骨。
HP:0000311	头部和颈部的异常	Round face	The facial appearance is more circular than usual as viewed from the front.	圆脸	从前方看面部外形较通常圆。
HP:0000315	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the orbital region	#####	眼眶区异常	#####
HP:0000316	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Hypertelorism	Interpupillary distance more than 2 SD above the mean (alternatively, the appearance of an increased interpupillary distance or widely spaced eyes).	眼距过宽	瞳距比平均值大2个标准差（或，表现为瞳距增加或双眼间隔过宽）。
HP:0000317	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Facial myokymia	Facial myokymia is a fine fibrillary activity of the facial muscles.	面肌颤搐	面肌纤维颤搐是面部肌肉的细微纤丝活动。
HP:0000319	头部和颈部的异常	Smooth philtrum	Flat skin surface, with no ridge formation in the central region of the upper lip between the nasal base and upper vermilion border.	人中扁平	在鼻基与上唇红之间的皮肤表面平坦，没有脊形成。
HP:0000320	头部和颈部的异常	Bird-like facies	#####	鸟样相脸	#####
HP:0000321	头部和颈部的异常	Square face	Facial contours, as viewed from the front, show a broad upper face/cranium and lower face/mandible, creating a square appearance.	方脸	面部轮廓，如从正面观察，可显示较宽的颜面上部/头颅和颜面下部/下颌骨，外形如一正方形。
HP:0000322	头部和颈部的异常	Short philtrum	Distance between nasal base and midline upper lip vermilion border more than 2 SD below the mean. Alternatively, an apparently decreased distance between nasal base and midline upper lip vermilion border.	人中短	鼻基与上唇中线红唇的距离低于平均值超过2个标准偏差，或者，鼻基和上唇中线唇红之间的距离显得缩短。
HP:0000324	头部和颈部的异常	Facial asymmetry	An abnormal difference between the left and right sides of the face.	面部不对称	脸的左侧和右侧之间存在异常的差别。
HP:0000325	头部和颈部的异常	Triangular face	Facial contour, as viewed from the front, triangular in shape, with breadth at the temples and tapering to a narrow chin.	三角脸	从正面看，面部轮廓呈三角形，两侧太阳穴处较宽，下巴窄小。
HP:0000326	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the maxilla	An abnormality of the `Maxilla` (FMA:9711) (upper jaw bone).	上颌骨异常	上颌骨的异常
HP:0000327	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Hypoplasia of the maxilla	Underdevelopment of the `Maxilla` (FMA:9711).	上颌骨发育不全	上颌骨发育不全。
HP:0000329	肿瘤,心血管系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Facial hemangioma	Hemangioma, a benign tumor of the vascular endothelial cells, occurring in the face.	面部血管瘤	发生在面部的血管瘤，是一种血管内皮细胞的良性肿瘤。
HP:0000331	头部和颈部的异常	Short chin	Decreased vertical distance from the vermilion border of the lower lip to the inferior-most point of the chin.	短下巴	从下唇唇红到下巴最下点的垂直距离减少。
HP:0000336	头部和颈部的异常	Prominent supraorbital ridges	Greater than average forward and/or lateral protrusion of the supraorbital portion of the frontal bones.	眶上脊突出	额骨的眉弓轮廓向前和/或向两侧突起增加。
HP:0000337	头部和颈部的异常	Broad forehead	Width of the forehead or distance between the frontotemporales is more than two standard deviations above the mean (objective); or apparently increased distance between the two sides of the forehead.	宽前额	前额宽度或前颞间距大于平均值两个标准偏差（客观）;或前额两侧之间的距离显得增加。
HP:0000338	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Hypomimic face	A reduced degree of motion of the muscles beneath the skin of the face, often associated with reduced facial crease formation.	面具面容	面部皮下肌肉的运动幅度降低，通常与面部皱纹形成减少有关。
HP:0000339	头部和颈部的异常	Pugilistic facies	Coarse facial features reminiscent of those of a boxer.	拳击面容	粗糙的面部特征让人联想起一个拳击手。
HP:0000340	头部和颈部的异常	Sloping forehead	Inclination of the anterior surface of the forehead from the vertical more than two standard deviations above the mean (objective); or apparently excessive posterior sloping of the forehead in a lateral view.	额头倾斜	额头的前表面倾斜度大于平均值超过2个标准偏差（客观）;或者从侧面观察额头显得过度向后倾斜。
HP:0000341	头部和颈部的异常	Narrow forehead	Width of the forehead or distance between the frontotemporales is more than two standard deviations below the mean (objective); or apparently narrow intertemporal region (subjective).	额头狭窄	前额的宽度或者额颞间距离低于平均值多于两个标准偏差（客观）;或显得狭窄的颞骨间区域（主观）。
HP:0000343	头部和颈部的异常	Long philtrum	Distance between nasal base and midline upper lip vermilion border more than 2 SD above the mean. Alternatively, an apparently increased distance between nasal base and midline upper lip vermilion border.	长人中	鼻基及上唇中线之间的距离超过平均值的2个标准偏差，或者鼻基和上唇中线之间的距离显得增加。
HP:0000346	头部和颈部的异常	Whistling appearance	An abnormality of facial morphology characterized by a small mouth opening and constant contraction of the lips as if the patient were whistling.	吹口哨面容	一种由于嘴唇不断的收缩导致张口减小的面部畸形，病人的嘴唇看起来像在吹口哨。
HP:0000347	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Micrognathia	`Developmental hypoplasia` (MPATH:10060) of the `mandible` (FMA:52748).	小下颌畸形	下颌骨发育不全。
HP:0000348	头部和颈部的异常	High forehead	An abnormally increased height of the forehead.	额头高	额头高度的异常增加。
HP:0000349	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Widow&#39;s peak	Frontal hairline with bilateral arcs to a low point in the midline of the forehead.	美人尖	两侧前额发际线呈弧形并在中线处略低，即额头的V型发尖。
HP:0000350	头部和颈部的异常	Small forehead	The presence of a forehead that is abnormally small.	小额头	异常小的前额。
HP:0000356	耳部异常	Abnormality of the outer ear	An abnormality of the `external ear` (FMA:52781).	外耳异常	在`外耳`的异常（FMA: 52781）。
HP:0000357	耳部异常	Abnormal location of ears	Abnormal location of the `ear` (FMA:52780).	耳位异常	耳朵（FMA: 52780）的位置异常。
HP:0000358	耳部异常	Posteriorly rotated ears	Abnormal location of the `ear` (FMA:52780).	后旋耳	一种耳位置的异常（===HP:0000357===），特征为耳朵位置向后旋转（耳朵的上部向头部的背面旋转，耳朵的下部向前方旋转）。
HP:0000359	耳部异常	Abnormality of the inner ear	An abnormality of the `inner ear` (FMA:60909).	内耳异常	“内耳”(FMA:60909)的异常。
HP:0000360	耳部异常	Tinnitus	Tinnitus is an auditory perception that can be described as the experience of sound, in the ear or in the head, in the absence of external acoustic stimulation.	耳鸣	耳鸣是一种没有外部声刺激却出现声音相关的听觉体验，这种体验常位于耳朵或头颅中。
HP:0000361		Pulsatile tinnitus (tympanic paraganglioma)	Pulsatile tinnitus related to a tympanic paraganglioma, which is a benign neoplasm of the middle ear.	搏动性耳鸣（鼓室副神经节瘤）	鼓室副神经节瘤（一种中耳良性肿瘤）相关的搏动性耳鸣。
HP:0000362	耳部异常	Otosclerosis	In otosclerosis, a callus of bone accumulates on the stapes creating a partial fixation. This limits the movement of the stapes bone, which results in hearing loss.	耳硬化症	在耳硬化症中，不正常的骨组织在镫骨及其周围聚集造成镫骨部分固定。这限制了镫骨运动从而导致耳聋。
HP:0000363	耳部异常	Abnormality of earlobe	An abnormality of the `lobule of pinna` (FMA:60984).	耳垂异常	在`pinna`小叶的异常（FMA: 60984）。

HP:0000366	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the nose	An abnormality of the `nose` (FMA:46472).	鼻异常	鼻子的异常。

HP:0000369	耳部异常	Low-set ears	Upper insertion of the ear to the scalp below an imaginary horizontal line drawn between the inner canthi of the eye and extending posteriorly to the ear.	低位耳	耳廓与头皮连接上缘低于眼内眦向后与耳连接的假想水平线。
HP:0000370	耳部异常	Abnormality of the middle ear	An abnormality of the `middle ear` (FMA:56513).	中耳异常	“中耳”（FMA: 56513）的异常。
HP:0000371	耳部异常,免疫系统异常	Acute otitis media	Acute otitis media is a short and generally painful infection of the middle ear.	急性中耳炎	急性中耳炎是中耳的广泛、短暂的疼痛性感染。
HP:0000372	耳部异常	Abnormality of the auditory canal	An abnormality of the `External acoustic tube` (FMA:61734) (also known as the auditory canal).	耳道异常	“外耳道”(FMA:61734)（也被称为耳道）的异常。
HP:0000375	耳部异常	Abnormality of cochlea	An abnormality of the `cochlea` (FMA:60201).	耳蜗异常	“耳蜗”（FMA: 60201）的异常。
HP:0000376	耳部异常	Incomplete partition of the cochlea type II	The cochlea is lacking the entire modiolus and cribriform area, resulting in a cystic appearance. This is accompanied by a large cystic vestibule.	II型耳蜗分隔不全	耳蜗缺乏蜗轴和筛区，导致囊性外观。这种情况下，前庭也常常呈囊性。
HP:0000377	耳部异常	Abnormality of the pinna	An abnormality of the `pinna` (FMA:56580), which is also referred to as the auricle or external ear.	耳廓异常	`pinna`（56580 FMA）的异常，指耳廓或外耳。
HP:0000378	耳部异常	Cupped ear	Laterally protruding ear that lacks antihelical folding (including absence of inferior and superior crura).	杯状耳	横向的招风耳，缺乏对耳轮的折叠（包含上下脚的缺失）。
HP:0000381	耳部异常	Stapes ankylosis	Stapes ankylosis refers to congenital or acquired fixation of the stapes (the stirrup-shaped small bone or ossicle in the middle ear), which is associated with conductive hearing resulting from impairment of the sound-conduction mechanism (the external auditory canal, tympanic membrane, and/or middle-ear ossicles).	镫骨固定	镫骨（中耳中的镫形小骨或听小骨）固定是指先天性或获得性的镫骨关节强直，其与声音传导机制（外耳道、鼓膜及/或中耳听小骨）障碍导致的传导性听力损失相关。
HP:0000383	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of periauricular region	#####	耳廓周异常	#####
HP:0000384	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Preauricular skin tag	A rudimentary tag of ear tissue often containing a core of cartilage and located just in front of the auricle (outer part of the ear).	耳前皮赘	核心为软骨的耳组织退行性赘生物，位于耳廓的前部（耳朵的外部）。
HP:0000385	耳部异常	Small earlobe	Reduced volume of the earlobe.	小耳垂	耳垂体积的减小。

HP:0000388	耳部异常,免疫系统异常	Otitis media	Inflammation or infection of the middle ear.	中耳炎	中耳炎症或感染。
HP:0000389	耳部异常,免疫系统异常	Chronic otitis media	Chronic otitis media refers to fluid, swelling, or infection of the middle ear that does not heal and may cause permanent damage to the ear.	慢性中耳炎	慢性中耳炎是指中耳流液、肿胀，或感染未痊愈导致耳永久性损害。
HP:0000391	耳部异常	Thickened helices	`Increased thickness` (PATO:0000591) of the`helix` (FMA:60992) of the ear.	耳轮增厚	` “耳轮”(FMA:60992)的“增厚”(PATO:0000591)。
HP:0000394	耳部异常	Lop ear	Anterior and inferior folding of the upper portion of the ear that obliterates triangular fossa and scapha.	罗布泊耳	耳上半部分向前下折叠导致三角窝和耳舟的形态不清。
HP:0000395	耳部异常	Prominent antihelix	The presence of an abnormally `prominent` (PATO:0001482) `antihelix` (FMA:60995).	对耳轮突出	对耳轮（FMA:60995）的异常突出（PATO:0001482）。
HP:0000396	耳部异常	Overfolded helix	A condition in which the `helix` (FMA:60992) is `folded` (PATO:0001910) over to a greater degree than normal. That is, excessive curling of the helix edge, whereby the free edge is parallel to the plane of the ear.	耳轮过度卷曲	耳轮（FMA: 60992）’卷曲程度超过正常（PATO: 0001910）。即，耳轮边缘过度卷曲，同时游离边缘平行于耳的平面。
HP:0000399	耳部异常	Prelingual sensorineural hearing impairment	A condition in which the `helix` (FMA:60992) is `folded` (PATO:0001910) over to a greater degree than normal. That is, excessive curling of the helix edge, whereby the free edge is parallel to the plane of the ear.	学语前感音神经性听力损失	感音神经性耳聋（===HP:0008538=== ）的一种，先天性（===HP:0003577===）或婴幼儿期发病（===HP:0003593===），即在学会语言前发病。
HP:0000400	耳部异常	Macrotia	Median longitudinal ear length greater than two standard deviations above the mean and median ear width greater than two standard deviations above the mean (objective); or, apparent increase in length and width of the pinna (subjective).	巨耳畸形	客观判断耳朵的平均纵长和宽度超过平均值2个标准偏差以上，或主观判断耳廓长度和宽度明显增加。
HP:0000402	耳部异常	Stenosis of the external auditory canal	An abnormal narrowing of the external auditory canal.	外耳道狭窄	外耳道的异常缩小。
HP:0000403	耳部异常,免疫系统异常	Recurrent otitis media	Increased susceptibility to otitis media, as manifested by recurrent episodes of otitis media.	反复发作型中耳炎	中耳炎易感性增加，表现为中耳炎反复发作。
HP:0000405	耳部异常	Conductive hearing impairment	An abnormality of `vibrational conductance of sound to the inner ear` (GO:0055127) leading to impairment of `sensory perception of sound` (GO:0007605).	传导性听力障碍	“声音振动传导到内耳”（GO: 0055127）的异常，导致“声音的感官知觉障碍”（GO: 0007605）。
HP:0000407	耳部异常	Sensorineural hearing impairment	An abnormality of `vibrational conductance of sound to the inner ear` (GO:0055127) leading to impairment of `sensory perception of sound` (GO:0007605).	感音神经性耳聋	与“耳蜗神经”(FMA:53431)“功能”(PATO:0001509)“异常”(PATO:0000460)相关的单耳或双耳的“听力损失”类型。
HP:0000408	耳部异常	Progressive sensorineural hearing impairment	An abnormality of `vibrational conductance of sound to the inner ear` (GO:0055127) leading to impairment of `sensory perception of sound` (GO:0007605).	渐进性感音神经性听力损失	一种进行性下降的（PATO:0001818）感音神经性听力损失（===HP:0000407===）。
HP:0000410	耳部异常	Mixed hearing impairment	An abnormality of `vibrational conductance of sound to the inner ear` (GO:0055127) leading to impairment of `sensory perception of sound` (GO:0007605).	混合性听力损失	由于传导听力损伤和感音神经性听力损伤同时存在导致的听力丧失。
HP:0000411	耳部异常	Protruding ear	Angle formed by the plane of the ear and the mastoid bone greater than the 97th centile for age (objective); or, outer edge of the helix more than 2 cm from the mastoid at the point of maximum distance (objective).	招风耳	耳朵平面与颞骨乳突部的夹角大于第97年龄百分位数（客观），或者耳轮外缘与乳突处的最大距离点之间距离超过2厘米（目标）。
HP:0000413	耳部异常	Atresia of the external auditory canal	Absence or failure to form of the external auditory canal.	外耳道闭锁	外耳道缺陷或未形成。

HP:0000415	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the choanae	Abnormality of the choanae (the posterior nasal apertures).	鼻后孔的异常	鼻后孔（鼻后部的开孔）的异常。

HP:0000420	头部和颈部的异常	Short nasal septum	Reduced superior to inferior length of the nasal septum.	鼻中隔短小	鼻中隔上下缘之间距离缩小。
HP:0000421	头部和颈部的异常,血液和造血组织异常	Epistaxis	Epistaxis, or nosebleed, refers to a `hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) localized in the`nose` (FMA:46472).	鼻衄	鼻出血，指鼻部的流血
HP:0000422	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the nasal bridge	Abnormality of the nasal bridge, which is the saddle-shaped area that includes the nasal root and the lateral aspects of the nose. It lies between the glabella and the inferior boundary of the nasal bone, and extends laterally to the inner canthi.	鼻梁异常	鼻梁的异常。鼻梁即鼻的凹陷区域包括鼻根和鼻侧面。它位于眉间和鼻骨下边界之间并侧伸至内眼角。
HP:0000426	头部和颈部的异常	Prominent nasal bridge	Anterior positioning of the nasal root in comparison to the usual positioning for age.	鼻梁突出	鼻根部向前突出。
HP:0000429	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the nasal alae	An abnormality of the `Ala of nose` (FMA:59519).	鼻翼异常	鼻翼的异常。
HP:0000430	头部和颈部的异常	Underdeveloped nasal alae	Thinned, deficient, or excessively arched `ala nasi` (FMA:59519).	鼻翼发育不全	鼻翼较薄、缺如或过度高拱。
HP:0000431	头部和颈部的异常	Wide nasal bridge	Increased breadth of the nasal bridge (and with it, the nasal root).	宽鼻梁	鼻梁（形成鼻根）的宽度增加。
HP:0000433	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the nasal mucosa	#####	鼻粘膜异常	#####
HP:0000434	心血管系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Nasal mucosa telangiectasia	`Telangiectasia` (MPATH:476) of the nasal mucosa.	鼻粘膜毛细血管扩张	鼻粘膜的毛细血管扩张
HP:0000436	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the nasal tip	An abnormality of the `nasal tip` (FMA:59518).	鼻尖异常	鼻尖的异常。
HP:0000437	头部和颈部的异常	Depressed nasal tip	Decreased distance from the nasal tip to the nasal base.	鼻尖凹陷	鼻尖到鼻基的间距减小。
HP:0000444	头部和颈部的异常	Convex nasal ridge	Nasal ridge curving anteriorly to an imaginary line that connects the nasal root and tip. The nose appears often also prominent, and the columella low.	凸鼻嵴	鼻脊向连接鼻根和鼻尖的假想线之前弯曲。鼻子经常会同时显得突出和鼻小柱低
HP:0000445	头部和颈部的异常	Wide nose	Interalar distance more than two standard deviations above the mean for age, i.e., an apparently increased width of the nasal base and alae.	宽鼻	两侧鼻翼之间的距离大于同年龄平均值超过2个标准偏差，即鼻基宽度和鼻翼之间的宽度显得增加。
HP:0000446	头部和颈部的异常	Narrow nasal bridge	Decreased width of the bony bridge of the nose.	鼻梁狭窄	鼻子的骨桥宽度减小。
HP:0000447	头部和颈部的异常	Pear-shaped nose	#####	梨形鼻	#####
HP:0000448	头部和颈部的异常	Prominent nose	Distance between subnasale and pronasale more than two standard deviations above the mean, or alternatively, an apparently increased anterior protrusion of the nasal tip.	鼻子突出	鼻中隔根部和鼻尖之间的距离大于平均值加两倍标准差，或者，鼻子显得向前突起。
HP:0000451	头部和颈部的异常	Triangular nasal tip	The presence of a `triangular`  form of the ` mouth `	三角鼻尖	鼻尖呈三角形。
HP:0000452	头部和颈部的异常	Choanal stenosis	Abnormal narrowing of the choana (the posterior nasal aperture).	鼻后孔狭窄	鼻后孔（后鼻孔）异常收窄。
HP:0000453	头部和颈部的异常	Choanal atresia	Absence or abnormal closure of the choana (the posterior nasal aperture).	鼻后孔闭锁	鼻后孔（后鼻孔）闭合不存在或异常。
HP:0000454	头部和颈部的异常	Flared nostrils	#####	喇叭状鼻孔	#####
HP:0000455	头部和颈部的异常	Broad nasal tip	Increase in width of the `nasal tip` (FMA:59518).	宽鼻尖	鼻尖宽度增加。
HP:0000456	头部和颈部的异常	Bifid nasal tip	A splitting of the nasal tip. Visually assessable vertical indentation, cleft, or depression of the nasal tip.	双歧鼻尖	鼻尖的分裂。目视可见的有垂直压痕，裂开，或凹陷的鼻尖。
HP:0000457	头部和颈部的异常	Depressed nasal ridge	Lack of prominence of the nose resulting from a posteriorly-placed nasal ridge.	鼻嵴凹陷	由鼻嵴凹陷导致的鼻子不突出。
HP:0000458	神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Anosmia	An inability to perceive odors. This is a general term describing inability to smell arising in any part of the process of smelling from absorption of odorants into the nasal mucous overlying the olfactory epithelium, diffusion to the cilia, binding to olfactory receptor sites, generation of action potentials in olfactory neurons, and perception of a smell.	嗅觉丧失	不能感知气味。这是一个通用术语，描述不能闻到的任何气味，可以是嗅觉过程中任何一部分异常而引起的，这一过程包括把气味物质吸收到覆盖嗅觉上皮的鼻腔粘膜，扩散到纤毛，与嗅觉神经元的受体位点结合，产生神经电冲动，从而感知的气味。
HP:0000460	头部和颈部的异常	Narrow nose	Interalar distance more than 2 SD below the mean for age, or alternatively, an apparently decreased width of the nasal base and alae.	鼻子狭窄	鼻翼间距离低于年龄矫正的平均值超过2个标准偏差，或者鼻基宽度显得减小。
HP:0000463	头部和颈部的异常	Anteverted nares	Anteriorly-facing nostrils viewed with the head in the Frankfurt horizontal and the eyes of the observer level with the eyes of the subject. This gives the appearance of an upturned nose (upturned nasal tip).	鼻孔前翻	观察者与被观察者头部保持法兰克福水平且两人眼睛平齐，在这样的视角下观察到鼻孔朝前。外观表现为朝天鼻（鼻尖上翘）。
HP:0000464	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the neck	An abnormality of the `neck` (FMA:7155).	颈部异常	颈部的异常。
HP:0000465	头部和颈部的异常	Webbed neck	A abnormality skin fold that runs along the sides of the neck down to the shoulders.	颈蹼	从颈侧到肩部的皮肤连成一片皱褶。
HP:0000466	头部和颈部的异常	Limited neck range of motion	#####	颈部运动范围受限	#####
HP:0000467	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Neck muscle weakness	`Decreased strength` (PATO:0001779) of the `neck musculature` (FMA:71290).	颈肌无力	颈部肌肉组织力量减少。
HP:0000468	结缔组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Increased adipose tissue around the neck	An increased amount of subcutaneous fat tissue around the neck.	颈周脂肪组织增多	围绕颈部的皮下脂肪组织增加。
HP:0000470	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Short neck	Diminished length of the `neck` (FMA:7155).	短颈	颈部的长度缩短
HP:0000471	心血管系统异常,消化系统异常	Gastrointestinal angiodysplasia	`Dysplasia` (MPATH:589) affecting the vasculature of the `gastrointestinal tract` (FMA:71132).	胃肠道血管发育不良	累及胃肠道血管的发育异常。
HP:0000472	头部和颈部的异常	Long neck	Increased inferior-superior length of the neck.	长颈	颈部顶-底长度的增加。
HP:0000473	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Torticollis	Involuntary contractions of the `neck musculature` (FMA:71290) resulting in an abnormal posture of or abnormal movements of the head.	斜颈	颈部肌肉不自主收缩导致头部运动异常或位置异常。
HP:0000474	头部和颈部的异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Thickened nuchal skin fold	A thickening of the skin thickness in the posterior aspect of the fetal neck. A nuchal fold measurement is obtained in a transverse section of the fetal head at the level of the cavum septum pellucidum and thalami, angled posteriorly to include the cerebellum. The measurement is taken from the outer edge of the occiput bone to the outer skin limit directly in the midline. A measurement 6 mm or more is considered significant between 18 and 24 weeks and a measurement of 5 mm or more is considered significant at 16 to 18 weeks (pmid:16100637).	颈部皮肤皱褶冗赘	胎儿颈后皮肤厚度增厚。通过胎儿头部横断位位于透明隔腔和丘脑水平，倾斜向后包括小脑处测量皱褶。测量取自胎儿中线处，枕骨中部外侧缘至皮肤最外侧。在18至24周大于或等于6mm，或16至18周大于或等于5毫米可认为测量值显著。
HP:0000475	头部和颈部的异常	Broad neck	Increased side-to-side width of the neck.	宽颈	颈部一侧到另一侧宽度增加。
HP:0000476	头部和颈部的异常	Cystic hygroma	A cystic lymphatic lesion of the `neck` (FMA:7155).	囊状水瘤	颈部囊性淋巴病变。
HP:0000478	眼部异常	Abnormality of the eye	Any abnormality of the `eye` (FMA:54448), including location, spacing, and intraocular abnormalities.	眼部异常	眼部异常，包括眼球的位置、间距和眼内组织的异常（54448 FMA）。
HP:0000479	眼部异常	Abnormality of the retina	An abnormality of the `retina` (FMA:58301).	视网膜的异常	视网膜上的异常（FMA:58301）。
HP:0000480	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Retinal coloboma	A notch or cleft of the retina.	视网膜缺损	视网膜的裂隙或凹槽。
HP:0000481	眼部异常	Abnormality of the cornea	Any abnormality of the `cornea` (FMA:58238), which is the transparent tissue at the front of the eye that covers the iris, pupil, and anterior chamber.	角膜异常	#####
HP:0000482	眼部异常	Microcornea	A congenital abnormality of the `cornea` (FMA:58238) in which the cornea and the anterior segment of the eye are smaller than normal. The horizontal diameter of the cornea does not reach 10 mm even in adulthood.	小角膜	角膜的先天性异常（FMA:58238），其中角膜和眼睛的眼前段都小于正常。角膜的水平直径甚至在成年期没有达到10毫米。
HP:0000483	眼部异常	Astigmatism	Astigmatism describes a refractive error  characterized by a difference in the horizontal and vertical  curvature of the cornea.	散光	散光为角膜的水平和垂直曲率不同导致的屈光不正。
HP:0000484	眼部异常	Hyperopic astigmatism	A form of astigmatism in which one meridian is hyperopic while the one at a right angle to it has no refractive error.	远视散光	散光的一种形式，其中一条子午线是远视，而垂直的另一条线上没有屈光不正。
HP:0000485	眼部异常	Megalocornea	An enlargement of the `cornea` (FMA:58238) with normal clarity and function. Megalocornea is diagnosed with a horizontal corneal diameter of 12 mm or more at birth or 13 mm or more after two years of age.	巨角膜	角膜扩大，但清晰度和功能正常。 巨角膜的诊断标准为出生时角膜水平直径12毫米或更大，或两岁后角膜水平直径达13mm或以上。
HP:0000486	眼部异常	Strabismus	Strabismus (also known as squint) is a condition in which the eyes are not properly aligned with each other.	斜视	斜视（也称为斜视）是指两只眼睛视物方向不平行。
HP:0000487	眼部异常	Congenital strabismus	Congenital strabismus	先天性斜视	出生后即发生的斜视。
HP:0000488	眼部异常	Retinopathy	Any noninflammatory disease of the retina. This nonspecific term is retained here because of its wide use in the literature, but if possible new annotations should indicate the precise type of retinal abnormality.	视网膜病变	视网膜的任何非炎性疾病。保留此非特异性术语​​是因为它在文献中广泛使用，但新的注解应注明精确的视网膜异常类型。
HP:0000490	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Deeply set eye	An `eye` (FMA:54448) that is more deeply recessed into the plane of the face than is typical.	眼睛深陷	眼睛陷入面部平面的深度超过正常状态。
HP:0000491	免疫系统异常,眼部异常	Keratitis	Inflammation of the cornea.	角膜炎	角膜的炎症。
HP:0000492	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the eyelid	An abnormality of the `eyelids` (FMA:75178).	眼睑异常	眼睑的异常。
HP:0000493	眼部异常	Abnormality of the fovea	An abnormality of the `fovea centralis` (FMA:58658), the central area of the macula that mediates central, high resolution vision and contains the largest concentration of cone cells in the retina.	黄斑中心凹异常	黄斑中心凹的异常（FMA:58658），黄斑中心区位于黄斑中央，此部位视锥细胞浓度最高，主导位于中央、高分辨率的视觉。
HP:0000494	头部和颈部的异常	Downslanted palpebral fissures	The palpebral fissure inclination is more than two standard deviations below the mean.	下斜睑裂	睑裂倾角低于均值的两个标准差以上。
HP:0000495	眼部异常	Recurrent corneal erosions	The presence of recurrent corneal epithelial erosions. Although most corneal epithelial defects heal quickly, some may show recurrent ulcerations.	复发性角膜糜烂	存在复发性角膜上皮糜烂。虽然大部分角膜上皮缺损很快愈合，某些患者可能出现反复的溃疡。
HP:0000496	眼部异常	Abnormality of eye movement	An abnormality in voluntary or involuntary eye movements or their control.	眼球运动异常	在自愿或非自愿的眼球运动及控制时出现的异常。
HP:0000497	眼部异常	Globe retraction and deviation on abduction	Globe retraction and deviation on abduction	外展时眼球回缩和偏斜	外展时眼球的回缩和偏斜。
HP:0000498	头部和颈部的异常,免疫系统异常,眼部异常	Blepharitis	Inflammation of the eyelids.	眼睑炎	眼睑的炎症。
HP:0000499	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Abnormality of the eyelashes	An abnormality of the `eyelashes` (FMA:53669).	睫毛异常	睫毛的异常
HP:0000501	眼部异常	Glaucoma	Glaucoma refers loss of retinal ganglion cells in a characteristic pattern of optic neuropathy usually associated with increased intraocular pressure.	青光眼	青光眼是视网膜神经节细胞减少的典型视神经病变，常伴有眼内压升高。
HP:0000502	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the conjunctiva	An abnormality of the `conjunctiva` (FMA:59011).	结膜异常	在结膜上的异常（FMA:59011）。
HP:0000503	心血管系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Tortuosity of conjunctival vessels	The presence of an increased number of twists and turns of the conjunctival blood vessels.	结膜血管迂曲	结膜的血管曲折和转折数量增加。
HP:0000504	眼部异常	Abnormality of vision	Abnormality of eyesight (visual perception).	视力异常	视力的异常。
HP:0000505	眼部异常	Visual impairment	Visual impairment (or vision impairment) is vision loss (of a person) to such a degree as to qualify as an additional support need through a significant limitation of visual capability resulting from either disease, trauma, or congenital or degenerative conditions that cannot be corrected by conventional means, such as refractive correction, medication, or surgery.	视觉障碍	视觉障碍指由于疾病、外伤、先天或退行性因素导致的不同程度的视力丧失，视物能力严重受限，需要额外的辅助。传统方法如屈光矫正、药物、手术等无法恢复丧失的视力。
HP:0000506	头部和颈部的异常	Telecanthus	Distance between the inner canthi more than two standard deviations above the mean (objective); or, apparently increased distance between the inner canthi.	内眦距过宽	内眦距离大于平均值超过两个标准偏差（客观）；或两眼内眦之间的距离显得增加。
HP:0000508	眼部异常	Ptosis	The upper eyelid margin is positioned 3 mm or more lower than usual and covers the superior portion of the iris (objective); or, the upper lid margin obscures at least part of the pupil (subjective).	上睑下垂	上睑缘比正常位置低3毫米或更多，覆盖虹膜的上部分（客观角度）;或者遮蔽一部分进入瞳孔的光线（主观角度）。
HP:0000509	头部和颈部的异常,免疫系统异常,眼部异常	Conjunctivitis	Inflammation of the  `conjunctiva` (FMA:59011).	结膜炎	在结膜上发生的炎症（FMA:59011）。
HP:0000510	眼部异常	Retinitis pigmentosa	Hereditary degeneration and atrophy of the retina.	视网膜色素变性	遗传性视网膜萎缩和变性。
HP:0000511	眼部异常	Vertical supranuclear gaze palsy	A supranuclear gaze palsy is an inability to look in a vertical direction as a result of cerebral impairment. There is a loss of the voluntary aspect of eye movements, but, as the brainstem is still intact, all the reflex conjugate eye movements are normal.	垂直性核上性凝视麻痹	核上性凝视麻痹在垂直方向无法正常视物，是脑损伤的结果。眼球随意运动丧失，但是由于脑干仍然完好，所有的反射共轭眼球运动正常。
HP:0000512	眼部异常	Abnormal electroretinogram	Any abnormality of the electrical responses of various cell types in the retina as measured by electroretinography.	视网膜电流图异常	通过视网膜电流图检测发现的视网膜中各种类型细胞的电反应异常。
HP:0000514	眼部异常	Slow saccadic eye movements	An abnormally slow velocity of the saccadic eye movements.	慢眼动	眼球扫视运动速度减慢。
HP:0000517	眼部异常	Abnormality of the lens	An abnormality of the `lens` (FMA:58241).	晶状体异常	在晶状体上的异常（FMA:58241）。
HP:0000518	眼部异常	Cataract	A cataract is an opacity or clouding that develops in the crystalline `lens` (FMA:58241) of the eye or in its `capsule` (FMA:58881).	白内障	白内障是指晶状体或晶状体囊膜的不透明或混浊。
HP:0000519	眼部异常	Congenital cataract	A congenital `cataract` (HP:0000518).	先天性白内障	出生后即发现的白内障`（HP:0000518）。
HP:0000520	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Proptosis	An eye that is protruding anterior to the plane of the face to a greater extent than is typical.	眼球突出	眼球向前突起于面部平面的程度远大于正常状态。
HP:0000522	眼部异常	Alacrima	Absence of tear secretion.	无泪	缺乏泪液分泌。
HP:0000523	眼部异常	Subcapsular cataract	A cataract that affects the region of the lens directly beneath the `capsule of the lens` (FMA:58881).	囊下白内障	#####
HP:0000524	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常,头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Conjunctival telangiectasia	The presence of small (ca. 0.5-1.0 mm) dilated blood vessels near the surface of the mucous membranes of the conjunctiva.	结膜毛细血管扩张	球结膜的粘膜表面出现扩张的小血管（约0.5〜1.0毫米）。
HP:0000525	眼部异常	Abnormality of the iris	An abnormality of the `iris` (FMA:58235), which is the pigmented muscular tissue between the cornea and the lens, that is perforated by an opening called the pupil.	虹膜异常	在虹膜上（FMA:58235）的异常，虹膜是位于角膜和晶状体之间的色素肌肉组织，虹膜中间的开口称为瞳孔。
HP:0000526	眼部异常	Aniridia	Congenital absence of the `iris` (FMA:58235).	无虹膜	先天性缺少虹膜（FMA:58235）。
HP:0000527	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Long eyelashes	Mid upper eyelash length &gt;10 mm or increased length of the eyelashes (subjective).	长睫毛	中间的上睫毛长度超过10mm或睫毛的长度增加（主观上）。
HP:0000528	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Anophthalmia	Absence of the globe or eyeball.	无眼畸形	没有眼球。
HP:0000529	眼部异常	Progressive visual loss	A reduction of previously attained ability to see.	进行性视力下降	原有视力逐渐下降。
HP:0000531	眼部异常	Corneal crystals	crystals happens on Corneal	角膜结晶	角膜上发生的结晶样沉积。
HP:0000532	眼部异常	Chorioretinal abnormality	An abnormality of the choroid and retina.	脉络膜视网膜异常	脉络膜和视网膜的异常。
HP:0000533	眼部异常	Chorioretinal atrophy	Atrophy of the choroid and retinal layers of the fundus.	脉络膜视网膜萎缩	眼底脉络膜和视网膜层的萎缩。
HP:0000534	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Abnormality of the eyebrow	An abnormality of the `eyebrow` (FMA:54237).	眉毛异常	眉毛的异常
HP:0000535	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Sparse eyebrow	Decreased density/number and/or decreased diameter of eyebrow hairs.	眉毛稀疏	眉毛的密度降低或数量减少和/或眉毛的直径缩小。
HP:0000537	头部和颈部的异常	Epicanthus inversus	A fold of skin starting at or just below the medial aspect of the lower lid and arching upward to cover, extend in front of and lateral to the medial canthus.	下内眦赘皮	始于下眼睑中部之下，并向上弯覆盖至内眼角前面和侧面的皮肤褶皱。
HP:0000538	眼部异常	Pseudopapilledema	Apparent optic disc swelling in the absence of increased intracranial pressure.	假性视乳头水肿	#####
HP:0000539	眼部异常	Abnormality of refraction	An abnormality in the process of focusing of light by the eye in order to produce a sharp image on the retina.	屈光异常	正常情况下，光线经眼球聚焦在视网膜上产生一清晰的影像，这一过程出现异常为屈光异常。
HP:0000540	眼部异常	Hypermetropia	An abnormality of refraction characterized by the ability to see objects in the distance clearly, while objects nearby appear blurry.	远视	屈光的一种，其特征是可以看清远处的物体，而近处的物体出现模糊。
HP:0000541	眼部异常	Retinal detachment	Separation of the inner layers of the retina (neural retina) from the pigment epithelium.	视网膜脱离	视网膜内层（神经视网膜）与色素上皮层分离。
HP:0000542	眼部异常	Impaired ocular adduction	Reduced ability to move the eye in the direction of the nose.	眼内收障碍	眼睛向鼻子方向转动的能力下降。
HP:0000543	眼部异常	Optic disc pallor	A pale yellow discoloration of the optic disk (the area of the optic nerve head in the retina). The optic disc normally has a pinkish hue with a central yellowish depression.	视盘苍白	视盘灰黄色的颜色变浅（视神经乳头在视网膜的部位）。视盘通常呈粉红色，中央凹陷微黄色。
HP:0000544	眼部异常	External ophthalmoplegia	Paralysis of the external ocular muscles.	眼外肌麻痹	眼外侧肌肉麻痹。
HP:0000545	眼部异常	Myopia	An abnormality of refraction characterized by the ability to see objects nearby clearly, while objects in the distance appear blurry.	近视	屈光异常的一种，其特征是看近处物体清楚，而远处的物体模糊。
HP:0000546	眼部异常	Retinal degeneration	A deterioration of the retina. This nonspecific term is retained here because of its wide use in the literature, but if possible new annotations should indicate the precise type of retinal abnormality.	视网膜变性	视网膜的病变。是一种非特异性术语，因为它在文献中广泛使用，所以​​保留。但注解中应标明精确的视网膜病变类型。
HP:0000547	眼部异常	Tapetoretinal degeneration	Tapetoretinal degeneration	毯层状视网膜变性	视网膜变性中的一种。
HP:0000548	眼部异常	Cone-rod dystrophy	Cone-rod dystrophy	锥杆营养不良	视锥和视杆细胞均营养不良。
HP:0000549	眼部异常	Abnormal conjugate eye movement	Any deviation from the normal motor coordination of the eyes that allows for bilateral fixation on a single object.	眼球共轭运动异常	眼球正常的协调运动需要双眼同时注视同一目标，出现偏差即为眼球共轭运动异常。
HP:0000550	眼部异常	Abolished electroretinogram (ERG)	Lack of any response to stimulation upon electroretinography.	视网膜电流图检测不到波形	对视网膜电流图检测的刺激缺乏反馈。
HP:0000551	眼部异常	Abnormality of color vision	An anomaly in the ability to discriminate between or recognize colors.	色觉障碍	区分或识别颜色的能力异常。
HP:0000552	眼部异常	Tritanomaly	Difficulty distinguishing between yellow and blue, possible related to dysfunction of the S photopigment.	蓝色弱	黄色和蓝色区分障碍，可能是由于蓝色感光色素功能障碍所致。
HP:0000553	眼部异常	Abnormality of the uvea	An abnormality of the `uvea` (FMA:58103), the vascular layer of the eyeball.	葡萄膜异常	#####
HP:0000554	免疫系统异常,眼部异常	Uveitis	Inflammation of one or all portions of the uveal tract.	葡萄膜炎	部分或全部葡萄膜的炎症反应。
HP:0000555	眼部异常	Leukocoria	An abnormal white reflection from the pupil rather than the usual black reflection.	白瞳症	#####
HP:0000556	眼部异常	Retinal dystrophy	Retinal dystrophy	视网膜营养不良	视网膜营养不良。
HP:0000557	眼部异常	Buphthalmos	Buphthalmos refers to a congenital open-angle glaucoma of the eye. The term buphthalmos (from Greek &#39;bous&#39; or ox and &#39;ophthalmos&#39; or eye) is descriptive of an enlarged eyeglobe resulting from increased intraocular pressure. The eyeglobe is especially prone to distension in newborns and infants because its collagen filaments are not as rigid as in adults and may easily be stretched.	先天性开角型青光眼	#####
HP:0000558	眼部异常	Rieger anomaly	A congenital malformation of the anterior segment characterized by iridicorneal malformation, glaucoma, iris stroma hypoplasia, posterior embryotoxon, and corneal opacities.	Rieger综合征	遗传性眼前节发育不良的先天性畸形，其特征为虹膜角膜畸形，青光眼，虹膜基质发育不良，角膜后胚胎环和角膜混浊。
HP:0000559	结缔组织异常,眼部异常	Corneal scarring	Corneal scarring	角膜瘢痕	角膜上出现的瘢痕

HP:0000563	眼部异常	Keratoconus	A cone-shaped deformity of the cornea.	圆锥角膜	角膜的圆锥形畸形。
HP:0000564	头部和颈部的异常	Lacrimal duct atresia	A developmental disorder of the lacrimal drainage system that most often affects the lacrimal ostium and resulting in non-opening of the nasolacrimal duct. It usually results from a non-canalization of the nasolacrimal duct.	泪道闭锁	泪液排泄系统的发育障碍，导致鼻泪管不通。
HP:0000565	眼部异常	Esotropia	A form of strabismus with one or both eyes turned inward (&#39;crossed&#39;).	内斜视	斜视的一种，单眼或双眼向内侧转向（“交叉”）。
HP:0000567	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Chorioretinal coloboma	Absence of a region of the retina, retinal pigment epithelium, and choroid.	脉络膜视网膜缺损	视网膜、视网膜色素上皮和脉络膜的区域性缺损。
HP:0000568	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Microphthalmos	A developmental anomaly characterized by abnormal smallness of one or both eyes.	小眼畸形	单眼或双眼异常小的发育异常。
HP:0000570	眼部异常	Abnormality of saccadic eye movements	An `abnormality of eye movement` (HP:0000496) characterized by impairment of fast (saccadic) eye movements.	眼球扫视运动异常	一种异常的眼球运动（HP:0000496），其特征是快速眼球运动（扫视）障碍。
HP:0000571	眼部异常	Hypometric saccades	Saccadic undershoot, i.e., a saccadic eye movement that has less than the magnitude that would be required to gain fixation of the object.	长度异常性扫视	扫视下冲，即扫视眼球运动的幅度小于锁定对象所需的幅度。
HP:0000572	眼部异常	Visual loss	Loss of visual acuity (implying that vision was better at a certain timepoint in live - otherwise the term is impaired vision or a subclass of that).	视力下降	视觉敏锐度的下降（这意味着在生命中某个时间点视力比现在好，与视力受损或视力受损的亚型区分）。
HP:0000573	心血管系统异常,血液和造血组织异常,眼部异常	Retinal hemorrhage	`Hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) occurring within the `retina` (FMA:58301).	视网膜出血	发生于视网膜内的出血。
HP:0000574	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Thick eyebrow	Increased density/number and/or increased diameter of eyebrow hairs.	眉毛浓密	眉毛密度/数量增加或眉毛直径增加。
HP:0000575	眼部异常	Scotoma	Scotoma refers to an area or island of loss or impairment of visual acuity surrounded by a field of normal or relatively well-preserved vision.	盲点	盲点是指一个区域视觉敏锐度受损，这一区域被正常或相对完好的视力范围包饶。
HP:0000576	眼部异常	Centrocecal scotoma	A scotoma (area of diminished vision within the visual field) located between the central point of fixation and the blind spot with a roughly horizontal oval shape.	旁中心暗点	盲点（视觉范围内视力消失的区域）位于中心点与生理盲点之间大致水平的椭圆形区域内。
HP:0000577	眼部异常	Exotropia	A form of strabismus with one or both eyes deviated outward.	外斜视	斜视的一种，单眼或双眼向外偏移。
HP:0000579	头部和颈部的异常	Nasolacrimal duct obstruction	Blockage of the ` lacrimal duct` (FMA:61063).	鼻泪管阻塞	在鼻泪管的淤塞（FMA:61063）。

HP:0000582	头部和颈部的异常	Upslanted palpebral fissure	The palpebral fissure inclination to the up is more than two standard deviations above the mean for age (objective); or, the upper inclination of the palpebral fissure is greater than typical for age.	睑裂上斜	睑裂向上倾斜度大于同龄人平均值加两倍标准差（客观）；或睑裂向上的倾斜度明显增大。
HP:0000584	眼部异常	Punctate corneal epithelial erosions	Punctate corneal epithelial erosions	点状角膜上皮糜烂	点状的角膜上皮糜烂。

HP:0000586	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Shallow orbits	Reduced depth of the orbits associated with prominent-appearing ocular globes.	浅眼眶	眼眶深度减少而表现为眼球相对突出。

HP:0000590	眼部异常	Progressive external ophthalmoplegia	Initial bilateral ptosis followed by limitation of eye movements in all directions and slowing of saccades.	进行性眼外肌麻痹	最初的双眼上睑下垂，随后在各个方向上出现眼球运动限制和扫视变缓。
HP:0000591	眼部异常	Abnormality of the sclera	An abnormality of the `sclera` (FMA:58269).	巩膜异常	巩膜上的异常（FMA:58269）。

HP:0000593	眼部异常	Abnormality of the anterior chamber	Abnormality of the `anterior chamber` (FMA:58078), which is the space in the eye that is behind the cornea and in front of the iris.	前房异常	前房异常（FMA:58078），前房是指角膜后面、虹膜前面的空间。
HP:0000594	眼部异常	Shallow anterior chamber	Reduced depth of the anterior chamber, i.e., the anteroposterior distance between the cornea and the iris is decreased.	浅前房	前房深度降低，角膜和虹膜之间的前后距离减小。
HP:0000597	眼部异常	Ophthalmoparesis	Ophthalmoplegia is a paralysis or weakness of one or more of the muscles that control eye movement.	眼肌瘫痪	眼肌麻痹是指控制眼球运动的一个或多个肌肉瘫痪或肌力降低。

HP:0000602	眼部异常	Ophthalmoplegia	The ability of one or muscles control the eye movement reduced.	眼肌麻痹	一个或多个控制眼球运动的肌肉功能减弱。
HP:0000603	眼部异常	Central scotoma	An area of depressed vision located at the point of fixation and that interferes with central vision.	中心暗点	视物时视野中央部存在暗区并干扰中央视觉。
HP:0000605	眼部异常	Supranuclear gaze palsy	A supranuclear gaze palsy is an inability to look in a particular direction as a result of cerebral impairment. There is a loss of the voluntary aspect of eye movements, but, as the brainstem is still intact, all the reflex conjugate eye movements are normal.	核上性凝视麻痹	核上性凝视麻痹是由于脑损伤，在特定方向上无法视物的疾病。眼球有自主运动丧失，但是由于脑干仍然完好，所有的反射共轭眼球运动正常。
HP:0000606	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the periorbital region	An abnormality of the region situated around the orbit of the eye.	眼眶周围异常	眼眶周围区域的异常。

HP:0000618	眼部异常	Blindness	Blindness is the condition of lacking visual perception due to physiological or neurological factors.	失明	失明是缺乏视觉感知, 可由生理或神经因素引起。
HP:0000619	眼部异常	Impaired convergence	Reduced ability to turn the eyes inward  in order to focus on a nearby object.	辐凑受损	眼睛向内辐凑能力下降，不能看清近处的物体。

HP:0000621	头部和颈部的异常	Entropion	An inward turning (inversion) of the eyelid margin.	眼睑内翻	眼睑边缘向内转动（内翻）。
HP:0000622	眼部异常	Blurred vision	Lack of sharpness of vision resulting in the inability to see fine detail.	视力模糊	视力锐度下降，无法分辨物体的细节。
HP:0000623	眼部异常	Supranuclear ophthalmoplegia	Supranuclear ophthalmoplegia	核上性眼肌麻痹	核上性眼肌的麻痹。

HP:0000631	心血管系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Retinal arterial tortuosity	The presence of an increased number of twists and turns of the retinal artery.	视网膜动脉迂曲	视网膜动脉的曲折和转折数量增加。
