HP:0001423	遗传模式	X-linked dominant inheritance	A mode of inheritance that is observed for dominant traits related to a gene encoded on the X chromosome. In the context of medical genetics, X-linked dominant disorders tend to manifest very severely in affected males. The severity of manifestation in females may depend on the degree of skewed X inactivation.	X-连锁显性遗传	#####
HP:0001425	遗传模式	Heterogeneous	#####	异质性的	#####
HP:0001426	遗传模式	Multifactorial inheritance	A mode of inheritance that depends on a mixture of major and minor genetic determinants possibly together with environmental factors. Diseases inherited in this manner are termed complex diseases.	多因素遗传	#####
HP:0001427	遗传模式	Mitochondrial inheritance	A mode of inheritance that is observed for traits related to a gene encoded on the mitochondrial genome. Because the mitochondrial genome is essentially always maternally inherited, a mitochondrial condition can only be transmitted by females, although the condition can affect both sexes. The proportion of mutant mitochondria can vary (heteroplasmy).	线粒体遗传	#####

Typically, there is ptosis and variable degrees of restriction of horizontal and vertical eye movements.	先天性眼外肌纤维化	先天性非进行性多条眼外肌麻痹。通常情况下，有下垂和不同程度的水平和垂直眼球运动的限制。
HP:0001492	眼部异常	Axenfeld anomaly	Axenfeld&#39;s anomaly is a bilateral disorder characterized by a prominent, anteriorly displaced Schwalbe&#39;s line (posterior embryotoxon) and peripheral iris strands which span the anterior chamber angle to attach to Schwalbe&#39;s line.	Axenfeld 综合征	Axenfeld 综合征主要表现为双眼Schwalbe线及周边虹膜线前移，虹膜线跨越前房角附着到Schwalbe线。
HP:0001493	眼部异常	Falciform retinal fold	An area of the retina that is buckled so that a sector-shaped sheet of retina lies in front of the normal retina. This feature is of congenital onset.	镰状视网膜皱襞	视网膜的局部区域皱褶，使得一个扇形片的视网膜位于正常视网膜的前面。属于先天性疾病。

HP:0001507	生长异常	Growth abnormality	#####	生长异常	#####
HP:0001508	生长异常	Failure to thrive	Failure to thrive (FTT) refers to a child whose physical growth is substantially below the norm.	不能生长发育	不能生长发育（FTT）是指孩子的身体生长明显低于正常。
HP:0001510	生长异常	Growth delay	A deficiency or slowing down of growth pre- and postnatally.	生长延迟	长前和出生后生长缓慢或缺乏。
HP:0001511	生长异常	Intrauterine growth retardation	An abnormal restriction of fetal growth with fetal weight below the tenth percentile for gestational age.	胎儿宫内发育迟缓	胎儿生长异常受限，胎儿体重低于该孕龄体重第十百分位以下。
HP:0001513	生长异常	Obesity	Body weight that is grossly above the acceptable or desirable weight, usually due to accumulation of excess fats in the body. The standards may vary with age, sex, genetic or cultural background. In the body mass index (BMI), a BMI greater than 30.0 kg/m2 is considered obese, and a BMI greater than 40.0 kg/m2 is considered morbidly obese.	肥胖	体重严重高于可接受或期望重量，通常是由于过量的脂肪在体内蓄积。该标准可能随年龄、性别、遗传或文化背景不同而变化。就身体质量指数（BMI）而言，当BMI大于30.0kg/m2被认为是肥胖，BMI大于40.0kg/m2被认为是病态肥胖。
HP:0001518	生长异常	Small for gestational age	Smaller than normal size according to sex and gestational age related norms, defined as a weight below the 10th percentile for the gestational age.	小于胎龄儿	体型小于该性别该孕龄相关标准体型，定义为重量位于该孕龄重量第十百分位以下。
HP:0001519	生长异常	Disproportionate tall stature	A tall and slim body build with increased arm span to height ratio (&gt;1.05) and a reduced upper-to-lower segment ratio (&lt;0.85), i.e., unusually long arms and legs. The extremities as well as the hands and feet are unusually slim.	不成比例的高身材	一个高大苗条的身材，伴随臂展与身高比增加（&gt; 1.05）和上半身与下半身比降低（&lt;0.85），即，超长的胳膊和腿。四肢及手脚都异常苗条。
HP:0001520	生长异常	Large for gestational age	The term large for gestational age applies to babies whose birth weight lies above the 90th percentile for that gestational age.	大于胎龄儿	大于胎龄儿指婴儿出生时体重大于该孕龄体重90百分位以上。

HP:0001530	生长异常	Mild postnatal growth retardation	A mild degree of slow or limited growth after birth, being between two and three standard deviations below age- and sex-related norms.	轻度产后发育迟缓	轻微程度的产后生长迟缓或受限，程度在该年龄和性别平均水平负2标准差到负3标准差之间。

HP:0001533	生长异常	Slender build	Asthenic habitus refers to a slender build with long limbs, an angular profile, and prominent muscles or bones.	修长的身材	瘦长体型指伴有长四肢，消瘦外形和突出的肌肉或骨骼的修长身材。
HP:0001537	结缔组织异常,消化系统异常	Umbilical hernia	Protrusion of abdominal contents through a defect in the abdominal wall musculature around the umbilicus. Skin and subcutaneous tissue overlie the defect.	脐疝	腹腔脏器经由脐周围腹壁肌肉之缺口而突出。皮肤和皮下组织覆盖这一缺口。
HP:0001538	消化系统异常	Protuberant abdomen	A thrusting or bulging out of the abdomen.	腹部隆凸	#####
HP:0001539	结缔组织异常,消化系统异常	Omphalocele	A midline anterior `incomplete closure` (PATO:0000609) of the `abdominal wall` (FMA:259054) in which there is herniation of the abdominal viscera into the base of the abdominal cord.	脐膨出	腹部脏器经由腹壁前部中线的不完全闭合而疝入脐带基部。
HP:0001540	肌肉组织异常,消化系统异常	Diastasis recti	A separation of the rectus abdominis muscle into right and left halves (which are normally joined at the midline at the linea alba).	腹直肌分离	腹直肌分离为左右两部分（它们通常在腹白线中线处连接）。
HP:0001541	消化系统异常	Ascites	Accumulation of fluid in the peritoneal cavity.	腹水	腹腔中的液体积聚。
HP:0001543	消化系统异常	Gastroschisis	A type of congenital ventral `incomplete closure` (PATO:0000609) of the `abdominal wall` (FMA:259054) in which the intestines and sometimes other organs to extend freely into the amniotic fluid space through a small opening in the abdomen, usually to the right of the umbilicus.	腹裂	一种先天性的腹壁不完全闭合，（胎儿的）肠（有时为其他器官）经由腹壁的一个小口（通常在脐部右侧）伸出至羊水中。
HP:0001544	消化系统异常	Prominent umbilicus	Abnormally prominent umbilicus (belly button).	脐突出	#####
HP:0001545	消化系统异常	Anteriorly placed anus	Anterior malposition of the anus.	肛门前置	肛门错误地位于前部。
HP:0001547	骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the rib cage	A morphological anomaly of the `rib cage` (FMA:7480).	胸廓异常	胸廓（肋骨围成的笼子）的形态异常。
HP:0001548	生长异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Overgrowth	Excessive postnatal growth which may comprise increased weight, increased length, and/or increased head circumference.	过度生长	出生后过度生长，可以包括体重的增加，身高的增加，和/或头围的增加。
HP:0001549	消化系统异常	Abnormality of the ileum	#####	回肠异常	#####
HP:0001551	消化系统异常	Abnormality of the umbilicus	Abnormality of the `umbilicus` (FMA:61584).	肚脐异常	肚脐的异常。
HP:0001552	骨骼系统异常	Barrel-shaped chest	Barrel-shaped chest	桶状胸	桶状胸
HP:0001555	骨骼系统异常	Asymmetry of the thorax	Lack of symmetry between the left and right halves of the thorax.	胸廓不对称	缺乏胸廓的左，右两半之间的对称。
HP:0001557	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Prenatal movement abnormality	An abnormality of fetal movement.	产前胎动异常	胎动异常。
HP:0001558	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Decreased fetal movement	An abnormal reduction in quantity or strength of fetal movements.	胎动减少	胎动次数或强度异常减少。
HP:0001560	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Abnormality of the amniotic fluid	Abnormality of the amniotic fluid, which is the fluid contained in the amniotic sac surrounding the developing fetus.	羊水异常	羊水（羊膜囊中围绕在发育中的胎儿周围的流体）的量异常。
HP:0001561	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Polyhydramnios	The presence of excess amniotic fluid surrounding the fetus during pregnancy, the sonographic diagnosis of Polyhydramnios is usually based on an AFI &gt;25cm or on a single deepest pocket of amnionic fluid &gt;8cm,several groups have termed Polyhydramnios as mild if the AFI is 25 to 29.9cm, moderate if 30 to 34.9cm, and severe if 35 cm or more.	羊水过多	在妊娠期间围绕胎儿的羊水量过多， 超声诊断提示羊水指数大于25cm或羊水暗区大于8cm，其中轻度羊水过多羊水指数为25-29.9cm，中度羊水过多羊水指数为30-34.9cm，严重羊水过多羊水指数大于35cm。
HP:0001562	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Oligohydramnios	The insufficient of amniotic fluid surrounding a fetus in pregnancy，the sonographic diagnosis of oligohydramnios is usually based on an AFI &lt;5cm or on a single deepest pocket of amnionic fluid &lt;2cm.	羊水过少	在妊娠期间围绕胎儿的羊水量不足。超声诊断指标是羊水指数在最深的单个区域小于5cm或羊水暗区小于2cm。
HP:0001563	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Fetal polyuria	Abnormally increased production of urine by the fetus resulting in `polyhydramnios` (HP:0001561).	胎儿多尿	胎儿的异常尿液增加，并造成‘羊水过多’（:0001561 HP）。
HP:0001566	头部和颈部的异常	Widely-spaced maxillary central incisors	Increased distance between the `maxillary central permanent incisor tooth` (FMA:55722).	上颌中切牙牙间隙增宽	恒生牙中上颌中切牙之间的距离增宽。
HP:0001571	头部和颈部的异常	Multiple impacted teeth	The presence of `multiple` (PATO:0002118) `impacted teeth` (HP:0011079).	多个阻生齿	有多个阻生齿。
HP:0001572	头部和颈部的异常	Macrodontia	`Increased size` (PATO:0000586) of the `teeth` (FMA:12516), which can be defined as a mesiodistal tooth diameter (width) more than 2 SD above mean for age. Alternatively, an apparently increased maximum width of the tooth.	巨牙	牙齿尺寸增加，它定义为近中远侧的牙齿直径（宽度）大于同年龄平均值以上2个SD（标准偏差）。或者牙齿的宽度显得增大。
HP:0001574	体壁的异常	Abnormality of the integument	An abnormality of the `integument` (FMA:74657), which consists of the skin and the superficial fascia.	体壁的异常	体壁的异常，体壁主要由皮肤和浅筋膜构成。
HP:0001575	神经系统异常	Mood changes	#####	情绪改变	#####
HP:0001578	内分泌系统异常	Hypercortisolism	Overproduction of the hormone of "cortisol" (CHEBI:17650) by the adrenal cortex, resulting in a characteristic combination of clinical symptoms termed Cushing syndrome, with truncal obesity, a round, full face, striae atrophicae and acne, muscle weakness, and other features.	皮质醇增多症	由于肾上腺皮质产生过多的皮质醇，导致一组特征性的临床症状，被称为库欣氏综合征，表现为躯干肥胖，满月脸，皮肤紫纹和痤疮，肌肉乏力和其他特征。
HP:0001579	内分泌系统异常	Primary hypercorticolism	Hypercortisolemia associated with a primary defect of the adrenal gland leading to overproduction of cortisol.	原发性皮质醇增多症	由于原发性的肾上腺缺陷，导致皮质醇过度产生。
HP:0001580	内分泌系统异常	Pigmented micronodular adrenocortical disease	#####	色素性小结节状肾上腺皮质疾病	#####
HP:0001581	体壁的异常,免疫系统异常	Recurrent skin infections	Infections of the skin that happen multiple times.	复发性皮肤感染	指多次发生的皮肤感染。
HP:0001582	体壁的异常	Redundant skin	Loose and sagging skin often associated with loss of skin elasticity.	赘肉	失去弹性而表现出松散下垂的皮肤。
HP:0001583	眼部异常	Rotary nystagmus	A form of nystagmus in which the eyeball makes rotary motions around the axis.	旋转眼球震颤	眼球震颤的一种形式，眼球绕轴旋转。
HP:0001586	泌尿生殖系统异常	Vesicovaginal fistula	The presence of a `fistula` (MPATH:70) connecting the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900) to the `vagina` (FMA:19949).	膀胱阴道瘘	膀胱与阴道之间形成瘘道。
HP:0001587	泌尿生殖系统异常	Primary ovarian failure	Malfunctioning of the ovaries such that a girl never begins menstruation.	原发性卵巢功能衰竭	卵巢功能异常，使女孩从未发生月经来潮。
HP:0001591	骨骼系统异常	Bell-shaped thorax	The rib cage has the shape of a wide mouthed bell. That is, the superior portion of the rib cage is constricted, follwed by a convex region, and the inferior portion of the rib cage expands again to have a large diameter.	钟形胸	该肋骨有一个广口钟的形状。即，肋笼的上部分收缩，接下来是一个凸区域肋笼下部再扩展为大直径。
HP:0001592	头部和颈部的异常	Selective tooth agenesis	`Agenesis` (MPATH:57) specifically affecting one of the classes `incisor` (FMA:12823), `premolar` (FMA:55637), or `molar` (FMA:55638).	选择性牙齿发育不全	只累及中切牙、小臼齿或大臼齿之中某一类的发育不全。
HP:0001593	头部和颈部的异常	Maxillary lateral incisor microdontia	`Decreased size` (PATO:0000587) of the `maxillary permanent incisor` (FMA:55713).	上颌侧切牙小牙畸形	上颌恒切牙的尺寸减少。
HP:0001595	体壁的异常	Abnormality of the hair	An abnormality of the `hair` (FMA:53667).	毛发异常	毛发的异常。
HP:0001596	体壁的异常	Alopecia	Loss of hair from the head or body.	脱发	头部或躯体毛发的脱失。
HP:0001597	体壁的异常	Abnormality of the nail	Abnormality of the `nail` (FMA:54326).	指（趾）甲异常	指（趾）甲的异常。
HP:0001598	体壁的异常	Concave nail	The natural longitudinal (posterodistal) convex arch is not present or is inverted.	反甲	甲先天纵向（后侧末端）凸拱不存在或反转。
HP:0001600	呼吸系统异常	Abnormality of the larynx	An abnormality of the `larynx` (FMA:55097).	喉部异常	喉部（FMA:55097）的异常。
HP:0001601	呼吸系统异常	Laryngomalacia	Laryngomalacia is a congenital abnormality of the laryngeal cartilage in which the cartilage is floppy and prolapses over the larynx during inspiration.	喉软骨软化	喉软骨软化是一种先天发育畸形，表现为吸气时喉软骨松软和塌陷。
HP:0001602	呼吸系统异常	Laryngeal stenosis	Stricture or narrowing of the larynx that may be associated with symptoms of respiratory difficulty depending on the degree of laryngeal narrowing.	喉狭窄	喉部受限或狭窄，可伴有与喉狭窄程度相关呼吸困难。
HP:0001604	呼吸系统异常	Vocal cord paresis	`Decreased strength` (PATO:0001779) of the `vocal folds` (FMA:55457).	声带麻痹	声带运动能力减弱。
HP:0001605	神经系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Vocal cord paralysis	A loss of the ability to move the `vocal folds` (FMA:55457).	声带麻痹	声带运动能力丧失（FMA:55457）。
HP:0001606		Vocal cord paralysis (caused by tumor impingement)	#####	声带麻痹（肿瘤侵犯导致）	#####
HP:0001607	呼吸系统异常	Subglottic stenosis	#####	声门下狭窄	#####
HP:0001608	声音异常	Abnormality of the voice	Any abnormality of the voice.	声音异常	嗓音的任何异常。
HP:0001609	声音异常	Hoarse voice	Hoarseness refers to a change in the pitch or quality of the voice, with the voice sounding weak, very breathy, scratchy, or husky.	声音嘶哑	声音嘶哑是指声音的音调或质量的变化，声音听起来虚弱，带着很重的呼吸声，有摩擦音或沙哑。
HP:0001611	声音异常	Nasal speech	A type of speech characterized by the presence of an abnormally increased nasal airflow during speech, associated with incomplete or weak closure of the velum.	鼻音很重	一种构音特点，讲话时因鼻腔气流异常增加所致，与软腭关闭不全或削弱有关。
HP:0001612	声音异常	Weak cry	#####	哭声微弱	#####
HP:0001613		Hoarse voice (caused by tumor impingement)	#####	声音嘶哑（因肿瘤挤压所致）	#####
HP:0001615	声音异常	Hoarse cry	#####	声音嘶哑的叫喊	#####
HP:0001618	神经系统异常,声音异常	Dysphonia	An impairment in the ability to produce voice sounds.	发音困难	产生声音的能力减弱。
HP:0001620	声音异常	High pitched voice	An abnormal increase in the pitch (frequency) of the voice.	高音调的声音	嗓音音调（频率）的异常升高。
HP:0001621	声音异常	Weak voice	Reduced intensity (volume) of speech.	嗓音微弱	语音的强度（音量）减弱。
HP:0001622	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Premature birth	The birth of a baby of less than 37 weeks of gestational age.	早产	是指妊娠不足37周间分娩者。
HP:0001623	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Breech presentation	A position of the fetus at delivery in which the fetus enters the birth canal with the buttocks or feet first.	臀先露	胎儿进入产道中的先露部位为臀部或足。
HP:0001626	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the cardiovascular system	Any abnormality of the `cardiovascular system` (FMA:7161).	心血管系统异常	心血管系统的异常（FMA:7161）。
HP:0001627	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of cardiac morphology	A morphological abnormality of the `heart` (FMA:7088).	心脏形态异常	心脏形态的异常（FMA:7088）。
HP:0001629	心血管系统异常	Ventricular septal defect	A hole between the two bottom chambers (ventricles) of the heart. The defect is centered around the most superior aspect of the ventricular septum.	室间隔缺损	心脏的两个底部室（心室）之间出现孔洞。缺损一般围绕室间隔上方出现。
HP:0001631	心血管系统异常	Defect in the atrial septum	Atrial septal defect (ASD) is a congenital abnormality of the `interatrial septum` (FMA:7108) that enables blood flow between the left and right atria via the interatrial septum.	房间隔缺陷	房间隔缺损（ASD）是房间隔的先天性畸形，能够导致左心房和右心房之间的血液流通（FMA:7108）。
HP:0001633	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the mitral valve	An abnormality of the `mitral valve` (FMA:7235).	二尖瓣异常	二尖瓣的异常（FMA:7235）。
HP:0001634	心血管系统异常	Mitral valve prolapse	One or both of the leaflets (cusps) of the mitral valve bulges back into the left atrium upon contraction of the left ventricle.	二尖瓣脱垂	左心房收缩时一个或两个二尖瓣小叶（尖）向后隆起到左心室。
HP:0001635	心血管系统异常	Congestive heart failure	The presence of an abnormality of cardiac function that is responsible for the failure of the heart to pump blood at a rate that is commensurate with the needs of the tissues or a state in which abnormally elevated filling pressures are required for the heart to do so. Heart failure is frequently related to a defect in myocardial contraction.	充血性心力衰竭	心脏组织或压力的异常升高迫使心脏泵血的速度不符合组织对血液的需求，导致心脏功能出现异常。心脏衰竭常与心肌收缩缺陷有关。
HP:0001636	心血管系统异常	Tetralogy of Fallot	A congenital cardiac malformation comprising pulmonary stenosis, overriding aorta, ventricular septum defect, and right ventricular hypertrophy. The diagnosis of TOF is made if at least three of the four above mentioned features are present.	法洛四联症	一种先天性心脏畸形疾病，包括肺动脉狭窄，主动脉骑跨，室间隔缺损和右心室肥厚。 至少存在四个上述特征种的三个时可被诊断为法洛四联症。
HP:0001637	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the myocardium	An abnormality of the myocardium.	心肌异常	心肌的异常。
HP:0001638	心血管系统异常	Cardiomyopathy	A myocardial disorder in which the heart muscle is structurally and functionally abnormal, in the absence of coronary artery disease, hypertension, valvular disease and congenital heart disease sufficient to cause the observed myocardial abnormality.	心肌病	心肌结构和功能异常的心肌疾病，在没有冠心病、高血压、心脏瓣膜病以及先天性心脏病的条件下观察到的心肌异常。
HP:0001639	心血管系统异常	Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy	Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM) is defined by the presence of increased ventricular wall thickness or mass in the absence of loading conditions (hypertension, valve disease) sufficient to cause the observed abnormality.	肥厚性心肌病	肥厚性心肌病（HCM）是指在没有继发因素（高血压，瓣膜疾病）的情况下心室壁发生肥厚的一类疾病。
HP:0001640	心血管系统异常	Cardiomegaly	`Increased size`  of the `heart` (FMA:7088).	心脏扩大	心脏（FMA:7088）体积的扩大(PATO:0000586)。
HP:0001641	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the pulmonary valve	An abnormality of the `pulmonary valve` (FMA:7246).	肺动脉瓣异常	肺动脉瓣的异常（FMA:7246）。
HP:0001642	心血管系统异常	Pulmonic stenosis	A narrowing of the right ventricular outflow tract that can occur at the pulmonary valve (valvular stenosis) or just below the pulmonary valve (infundibular stenosis).	肺动脉狭窄	在肺动脉瓣（瓣膜狭窄）或略低于肺动脉瓣的部位（漏斗部狭窄）发生右心室流出道的变窄。
HP:0001643	心血管系统异常	Patent ductus arteriosus	In utero, the ductus arteriosus (DA) serves to divert ventricular output away from the lungs and toward the placenta by connecting the main pulmonary artery to the descending aorta. A patent ductus arteriosus (PDA) in the first 3 days of life is a physiologic shunt in healthy term and preterm newborn infants, and normally is substantially closed within about 24 hours after bith and completely closed after about three weeks. Failure of physiologcal closure is referred to a persistent or patent ductus arteriosus (PDA). Depending on the degree of left-to-right shunting, PDA can have clinical consequences.	动脉导管未闭	在子宫内，动脉导管（DA）通过将主肺动脉连接到降主动脉，使得心室输出的血液从肺分流，向胎盘转移。在出生后的前3天，在健康情况和早产新生儿中，动脉导管（PDA）生理性闭合，通常在出生后约24小时之内基本关闭，约三个星期后完全关闭。生理性关闭失败则为持续性动脉导管未闭（PDA）。根据从左到右分流的程度，动脉导管未闭可能导致临床后果。
HP:0001644	心血管系统异常	Dilated cardiomyopathy	Dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM) is defined by the presence of left ventricular dilatation and left ventricular systolic dysfunction in the absence of abnormal loading conditions (hypertension, valve disease) or coronary artery disease sufficient to cause global systolic impairment. Right ventricular dilation and dysfunction may be present but are not necessary for the diagnosis.	扩张型心肌病	扩张型心肌病（DCM）被定义为，不存在其他异常病态（包括高血压、瓣膜病）或者冠心病的条件下，左心室扩张以及左心室收缩功能异常，造成系统性收缩障碍。可能存在右心室扩张和功能障碍，但不是诊断的必要条件。
HP:0001645	心血管系统异常	Sudden cardiac death	The heart suddenly and unexpectedly stops beating resulting in death within a short time period (generally within 1 h of symptom onset).	心源性猝死	心脏意外地突然停止跳动，很短时间内发生死亡（一般在发病1小时以内）。
HP:0001646	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the aortic valve	Any abnormality of the `aortic valve` (FMA:7236).	主动脉瓣异常	主动脉瓣的异常（FMA:7236）。
HP:0001647	心血管系统异常	Bicuspid aortic valve	The presence of an `aortic valve` (FMA:7236) with two instead of the normal three cusps (flaps).	二叶主动脉瓣	主动脉瓣只有两个瓣膜，而不是正常的三个瓣膜。
HP:0001648	心血管系统异常	Cor pulmonale	Right-sided heart failure resulting from chronic hypertension in the pulmonary arteries and right ventricle.	肺源性心脏病	肺动脉和右心室慢性高血压引起的右心衰竭。
HP:0001649	心血管系统异常	Tachycardia	Excessive rapidity in the action of the heart,usually with a heart rate above 100 beats per minute.	心动过速	心脏搏动速率极快，心率通常在100次每秒以上。
HP:0001650	心血管系统异常	Aortic valve stenosis	The presence of a stenosis (narrowing) of the aortic valve.	主动脉瓣狭窄	主动脉瓣狭窄（缩小）。
HP:0001651	心血管系统异常	Dextrocardia	The heart is located in the right hand sided hemithorax. That is, there is a left-right reversal (or &quot;mirror reflection&quot;) of the anatomical location of the heart in which the heart is locate on the right side instead of the left.	右位心	心脏位于胸腔的右边，也就是说，心脏的解剖位置存在一个左-右反转（或“镜像”），心脏位于右侧，而不是左侧。
HP:0001653	心血管系统异常	Mitral regurgitation	An `abnormality of the mitral valve` (HP:0001633) characterized by insufficiency or incompetence of the mitral valve resulting in retrograde leaking of blood through the mitral valve upon ventricular contraction.	二尖瓣返流	一种“二尖瓣异常”（HP:0001633），其特征是心室收缩过程中由于二尖瓣发育不全或无力，导致血液通过二尖瓣逆流、渗漏。
HP:0001654	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the heart valves	An abnormality of a `Cardiac valve` (FMA:7110).	心脏瓣膜异常	心脏瓣膜的异常（FMA:7110）。
HP:0001655	心血管系统异常	Patent foramen ovale	Failure of the foramen ovale to seal postnatally, leaving a potential conduit between the left and right cardiac atria.	卵圆孔未闭	婴儿出生后卵圆孔未能闭合，导致左、右心房间存在一潜在的导管。
HP:0001657	心血管系统异常	Prolonged QT interval	Increased time between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave as measured by the electrocardiogram (EKG).	QT间期延长	由心电图（EKG）测量的从Q波的起始至T波结束的时间过长。
HP:0001658	心血管系统异常	Myocardial infarction	Necrosis of the myocardium caused by an obstruction of the blood supply to the heart and often associated with chest pain, shortness of breath, palpitations, and anxiety as well as characteristic EKG findings and elevation of serum markers including creatine kinase-MB fraction and troponin.	心肌梗死	心脏血液供应的阻塞导致心肌坏死，并常伴有胸痛，气短，心悸，焦虑以及特征性的心电图结果和血清标志物肌酸激酶MB分数和肌钙蛋白升高。
HP:0001659	心血管系统异常	Aortic regurgitation	An insufficiency of the aortic valve, leading to regurgitation (backward flow) of blood from the aorta into the left ventricle.	主动脉瓣反流	主动脉瓣的功能不全，导致血液从主动脉反流到左心室。
HP:0001660	心血管系统异常	Truncus arteriosus	A single arterial trunk arises from the cardiac mass. The pulmonary arteries, aorta and coronary arteries arise from this single trunk with no evidence of another outflow tract.	动脉干	起源于心脏的单一动脉干。肺动脉，主动脉和冠状动脉均源于这个单一的主干而不是其他流出道。
HP:0001662	心血管系统异常	Bradycardia	A slower than normal heart rate (in adults, slower than 60 beats per minute).	心动过缓	比正常心率慢（成人心率每分钟少于60次）。
HP:0001663	心血管系统异常	Ventricular fibrillation	Uncontrolled contractions of muscles fibers in the left ventricle not producing contraction of the left ventricle. Ventricular fibrillation usually begins with a ventricular premature contraction and a short run of rapid ventricular tachycardia degenerating into uncoordinating ventricular fibrillations.	心室纤维性颤动	不产生左心室收缩的情况下左心室肌肉纤维不受控的收缩。心室颤动通常始于室性早搏和短期的室性心动过速造成的不协调的短期心室纤维性颤动。
HP:0001664	心血管系统异常	Torsade de pointes	A type of ventricular tachycardia characterized by polymorphioc QRS complexes that change in amplitue and cycle length, and thus have the appearance of oscillating around the baseline in the EKG.	尖端扭转型室性心动过速	一种室性心动过速，其特征为多种形态的QRS波群改变了原有振幅和周期长度，因而在心电图中围绕基线出现振荡。
HP:0001667	心血管系统异常	Right ventricular hypertrophy	Enlargement of the right ventricle of the heart. This increase in ventricular mass is often attributed to pulmonary hypertension and is a contributor to cardiovascular morbidity and mortality.	右心室肥大	右心室的扩张。通常是由于肺动脉高压引起心室质量的增加，也导致心血管疾病的发病率和死亡率增加。
HP:0001669	心血管系统异常	Transposition of the great arteries	The most common cyanotic congenital heart lesion that presents in neonates. The hallmark of transposition of the great arteries is ventriculoarterial discordance, in which the aorta arises from the morphologic right ventricle and the pulmonary artery arises from the morphologic left ventricle.	大动脉转位	最常见的新生儿紫绀型先天性心脏疾病。最典型的表现为心室大动脉连接异常，主动脉起自形态学上的右心室而肺动脉起自形态学上的左心室。
HP:0001670	心血管系统异常	Asymmetric septal hypertrophy	Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy with an asymmetrical pattern of hypertrophy, with a predilection for the interventricular septum and myocyte disarray.	非对称性中隔肥厚	以不对称性肥厚为特征的一种心肌病，主要是室间隔肥厚和心肌排列紊乱，干扰了左心室的血液排空。
HP:0001671	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the cardiac septa	An anomaly of the intra-atrial or intraventricular septum.	心中隔异常	左心与右心间隔部分的异常，即心房内或心室内隔膜的异常。
HP:0001673		Tachycardia (with pheochromocytoma)	Excessive rapidity in the action of the heart,usually with a heart rate above 100 beats per minute.	心动过速（伴有嗜铬细胞瘤）	心脏运动速率极快，通常在100次每秒以上（伴有嗜铬细胞瘤）。
HP:0001674	心血管系统异常	Complete atrioventricular canal defect	A congenital heart defect characteizred by a specific combination of heart defects with a common atrioventricular valve, primum atrial septal defect and inlet ventricular septal defect.	完全性房室通道缺损	一种先天性的心脏缺陷，其特征为房间隔缺损，室间隔缺损，房室瓣正常。
HP:0001675		Rhythm disturbances associated with pheochromocytoma	Cardiac arrhythmias associated with pheochromocytoma－caused excessive catecholamine secretion	嗜铬细胞瘤相关性心脏节律紊乱	由嗜铬细胞瘤分泌过量儿茶酚胺所引起的心律失常
HP:0001676		Palpitations (with pheochromocytoma)	Palpitations (with pheochromocytoma)	心悸（伴嗜铬细胞瘤）	心悸（伴嗜铬细胞瘤）
HP:0001677	心血管系统异常	Coronary artery disease	Reduction of the diameter of the coronary arteries as the result of an accumulation of atheromatous plaques within the walls of the coronary arteries, which increases the risk of myocardial ischemia.	冠状动脉疾病	冠状动脉壁内粥样斑块的积聚导致冠状动脉直径减小，增加了心肌缺血的风险。
HP:0001678	心血管系统异常	Atrioventricular block	Delayed or lack of conduction of atrial depolarizations through the atrioventricular node to the ventricles.	房室传导阻滞	房室结介导的心房去极化向心室传导的延迟或阻滞。
HP:0001679	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the aorta	An abnormality of the `aorta` (FMA:3734).	主动脉异常	主动脉的异常（FMA:3734）。
HP:0001680	心血管系统异常	Coarctation of aorta	Coarctation of the aorta is a narrowing or constriction of a segment of the aorta.	主动脉缩窄	主动脉节段性的狭窄或阻塞。
HP:0001681	心血管系统异常	Angina pectoris	Paroxysmal chest pain that occurs with exertion or stress and is related to myocardial ischemia.	心绞痛	用力过度或应激状态引起的突发性胸痛，与心肌缺血有关。
HP:0001682	心血管系统异常	Subaortic stenosis	A fixed form of obstruction to blood flow across the `left-ventricular outflow tract` (FMA:9473) related to stenosis (narrowing) below the level of the aortic valve.	主动脉基部狭窄	血液流经左室流出道时发生梗阻，与主动脉瓣下狭窄有关。
HP:0001683	心血管系统异常	Ectopia cordis	Congenital malformation of the ventral wall with partial or total evisceration of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and through the defect in the ventral wall.	心脏异位	通过腹壁上的裂缝，心脏部分或者全部暴露在胸腔外的先天腹壁畸形。
HP:0001684	心血管系统异常	Secundum atrial septal defect	A kind of `atrial septum defect`（HP:0001631） arising from an enlarged foramen ovale, inadequate growth of the septum secundum, or excessive absorption of the septum primum.	第二房间隔缺损	一种`房间隔缺损`（HP:0001631），由卵圆孔扩大，第二房间隔发育不全，或第一房间隔过度吸收引起。
HP:0001685	心血管系统异常	Myocardial fibrosis	Cardiac fibrosis commonly refers to the proliferation of fibroblasts in the cardiac muscle.	心肌纤维化	心肌纤维化是指心肌组织中成纤维细胞异常增殖。
HP:0001686	声音异常	Loss of voice	#####	失声	#####
HP:0001688	心血管系统异常	Sinus bradycardia	Bradycardia related to a mean resting sinus rate of less than 50 beats per minute.	窦性心动过缓	心动过缓指的是静息状态下平均窦性心率少于每分钟50次。
HP:0001691	心血管系统异常	Muscular subvalvular aortic stenosis	A type of subvalvular aortic stenosis resulting from thickening of the musculature of the interventricular septum, which results in obstruction to blood flow though the left-ventricular outflow tract.	肌性主动脉瓣下狭窄	一类室间隔肌肉增厚引起的主动脉瓣下狭窄，这导致血液流经左心室流出道受阻。
HP:0001692	心血管系统异常	Primary atrial arrhythmia	A type of supraventricular tachycardia in which the atria are the principal site of electrophysiologic disturbance.	原发性房性心律失常	阵发性室上性心搏过速的一种，是原发性的心脏电生理传导紊乱。
HP:0001693	心血管系统异常	Cardiac shunt	Pattern of blood flow in the heart that deviates from the normal circuit of the circulatory system.	心脏分流	偏离正常血液循环的心脏血流模式。
HP:0001694	心血管系统异常	Right-to-left shunt	Pattern of blood flow in the heart that deviates from the normal circuit of the circulatory system from the right side of the heart to the left.	右向左分流	血液在心脏流动的回路发生异常，出现从右向左流动。
HP:0001695	心血管系统异常	Cardiac arrest	Cardiac arrest, also known as cardiopulmonary arrest or circulatory arrest, is a sudden stop in effective blood circulation due to the failure of the heart to contract effectively or at all.	心脏骤停	心脏骤停也称为心肺骤停或循环骤停，由心脏收缩功能部分或完全丧失，导致血液循环突然停止。
HP:0001696	心血管系统异常	Situs inversus totalis	A left-right reversal (or &quot;mirror reflection&quot;) of the anatomical location of the major thoracic and abdominal organs.	全内脏反位	胸腹主要器官的解剖学位置左右反转（或“镜面反射”）。
HP:0001697	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the pericardium	An abnormality of the `pericardium` (FMA:9869), i.e., of the  fluid filled sac that surrounds the heart and the proximal ends of the aorta, vena cava, and the pulmonary artery.	心包异常	心包异常是指包绕在心脏和和大血管根部(如主动脉近端，腔静脉，和肺动脉)外的双层囊性结构发生异常。
HP:0001698	心血管系统异常	Pericardial effusion	Accumulation of fluid within the pericardium.	心包积液	心包内液体积累。
HP:0001699	死亡/衰老	Sudden death	Rapid and unexpected death.	猝死	#####
HP:0001700	心血管系统异常	Myocardial necrosis	Myocardial cells take place necrosis	心肌坏死	心肌坏死。
HP:0001701	心血管系统异常,免疫系统异常	Pericarditis	Inflammation of the sac-like covering around the heart (pericardium).	心包炎	包裹在心脏周围的囊状物（心包）发生的炎症反应。
HP:0001702	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the tricuspid valve	An abnormality of the `tricuspid valve` (FMA:7234).	三尖瓣异常	右房室瓣即三尖瓣的异常（FMA:7234）。
HP:0001704	心血管系统异常	Tricuspid valve prolapse	One or more of the leaflets (cusps) of the tricuspid valve bulges back into the right atrium upon contraction of the right ventricle.	三尖瓣脱垂	右心室收缩时三尖瓣瓣膜的一个或多个瓣叶（尖）的向后凸出进入右心房。
HP:0001705	心血管系统异常	Right ventricular outlet obstruction	One feathers of the tetralogy of fallot, right ventricular outlet get narrowing or obstructing in infundibulum, infundibulum, pulmonary valve ring, main pulmonary artery or branch pulmonary artery.	右心室流出道梗阻	法洛四联症特征之一，右心室流出道狭窄或梗阻可位于漏斗部，肺动脉瓣膜部，肺动脉瓣环，肺动脉主干或肺动脉分支。
HP:0001706	心血管系统异常	Endocardial fibroelastosis	A condition characterized by hypertrophy of the wall of the left ventricle and conversion of the endocardium into a thick fibroelastic coat,with the capacity of the ventricle sometimes reduced,but often increased.	心内膜弹力纤维增生症	一种疾病状态，以左心室壁肥厚、心内膜外包裹一层厚的弹力纤维组织帽为特征，心室功能偶有降低，但通常增强。
HP:0001707	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the right ventricle	An abnormality of the `right ventricle` (FMA:7098) of the heart.	右心室异常	心脏右心室的异常（FMA:7098）。
HP:0001708	心血管系统异常	Right ventricular failure	Reduced ability of the right ventricle to perform its function (to receive blood from the right atrium and to eject blood into the pulmonary artery), often leading top pitting peripheral edema, ascites, and hepatomegaly.	右心衰竭	右心室行使其功能的能力（从肺动脉接收血液和将血液泵入右心房）减弱，经常导致外周性水肿，腹水和肝肿大。
HP:0001709	心血管系统异常	Third degree atrioventricular block	A form of  atrioventricular block  in which atrial impulse propagates to the ventricles.	三度房室传导阻滞	房室传导阻滞的一种，心房的冲动无法传导到心室。
HP:0001710	心血管系统异常	Conotruncal defect	A congenital malformation of the outflow tract of the heart. Conotruncal defects are thought to result from a disturbance of the outflow tract of the embryonic heart, and comprise truncus arteriosus, tetralogy of Fallot, interrupted aortic arch, transposition of the great arteries, and double outlet right ventricle.	圆锥动脉干缺损	先天性心脏流出道畸形。圆锥动脉干畸形被认为是由于胚胎时期心脏流出道畸形造成的，包括动脉干永存，法洛四联症，主动脉弓中断，大动脉转位以及右心室双出口。
HP:0001711	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the left ventricle	An abnormality of the `left ventricle` (FMA:7101) of the heart.	左心室异常	心脏左心室的异常（7101 FMA）。
HP:0001712	心血管系统异常	Left ventricular hypertrophy	Enlargement of the left ventricle of the heart. This increase in ventricular mass is attributed to sustained abnormal pressure or volume loads and is a contributor to cardiovascular morbidity and mortality.	左心室肥大	由于长期压力或容量负荷异常引起的心脏左心室扩张，是由心室质量增大形成的，是心血管病发病和死亡的一个重要原因。
HP:0001713	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of cardiac ventricle	An abnormality of a `cardiac ventricle` (FMA:7100).	心室异常	心脏心室的异常（FMA:7100）。
HP:0001714	心血管系统异常	Ventricular hypertrophy	Enlargement of the cardiac ventricular muscle tissue with increase in the width of the wall of the ventricle and loss of elasticity. Ventricular hypertrophy is clinically differentiated into left and right ventricular hypertrophy.	心室肥厚	心脏心室肌肉组织扩大、心室壁增宽并失去弹性。心室肥厚在临床上分为左，右心室肥厚。
HP:0001716	心血管系统异常	Wolff-Parkinson-White syndrome	A disorder of the cardiac conduction system of the heart characterized by ventricular preexcitation due to the presence of an abnormal accessory atrioventricular electrical conduction pathway.	午-帕-怀三氏综合征	由于房室附加通路产生异常冲动,造成心室提前激动的一种心脏传导系统紊乱疾病。
HP:0001717	心血管系统异常,骨骼系统异常	Coronary artery calcification	`Calcification` (PATO:0001447), that is, pathological  deposition of calcium salts, affecting  the `coronary arteries` (FMA:3800).	冠状动脉钙化	钙化（PATO:0001447），即钙盐的病理性沉积，影响`冠状动脉`（FMA:3800）。
HP:0001718	心血管系统异常	Mitral stenosis	Ab abnormal narrowing of the orifice of the mitral valve.	二尖瓣狭窄	二尖瓣的孔口异常狭窄。
HP:0001719	心血管系统异常	Double outlet right ventricle	Double outlet right ventricle (DORV) is a type of ventriculoarterial connection in which both great vessels arise entirely or predominantly from the right ventricle.	右室双出口	右室双出口（DORV）是一种心室与动脉的异常连接，指两个大血管（主动脉和肺动脉）完全或主要从右心室发出。
HP:0001722	心血管系统异常	High-output congestive heart failure	A form of heart failure characterized by elevated cardiac output. This may be seen in patients with heart failure and hyperthyroidism, anemia, pregnancy, arteriovenous fistulae, and others.	高输出充血性心脏衰竭	心输出量升高的一种心力衰竭形式。这可能发生在患有心脏衰竭和甲状腺功能亢进症，贫血，妊娠，动静脉瘘和其他疾病的患者中。
HP:0001723	心血管系统异常	Restrictive cardiomyopathy	Myocardial disease in which the ventricular walls are excessively rigid,impeding ventricular filling; it is marked by abnormal diastolic function but by normal or nearly normal systolic function.	限制性心肌病	限制性心肌病是一类心室壁过分坚硬，阻碍心室充盈的心肌病，其特征为心脏舒张功能异常，而收缩功能却正常或几乎正常。
HP:0001724	心血管系统异常	Aortic dilatation	Aorta enlarge to greater than normal size.	主动脉扩张	主动脉增大，超过正常大小。
HP:0001726	心血管系统异常	Increased prevalence of valvular disease	Increased prevalence of valvular disease	瓣膜病发病率增加	瓣膜病发病率增加
HP:0001727	血液和造血组织异常	Thromboembolic stroke	A cerebrovascular accident (stroke) that occurs because of thromboembolism.	血栓栓塞性脑卒中	由于血栓栓塞发生脑血管意外（脑卒中/中风）。
HP:0001730	耳部异常	Progressive hearing impairment	An abnormality of the `ear` (FMA:52780).	渐进性听力损失	一种进行性的（PATO:0001818）听力丧失（===HP:0000365===）。
HP:0001732	消化系统异常	Abnormality of the pancreas	An abnormality of the `pancreas` (FMA:7198).	胰腺异常	胰腺的异常。
HP:0001733	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Pancreatitis	The presence of `inflammation` (MPATH:212) in the `pancreas` (FMA:7198).	胰腺炎	存在于胰腺的炎症。
HP:0001734	消化系统异常	Annular pancreas	A congenital anomaly in which the pancreas completely (or sometimes incompletely) encircles the second portion of duodenum and occasionally obstructs the more proximal duodenum.	环状胰	一种胰腺先天异常：胰腺完全（有时候不完全）环绕十二指肠第二段，且偶尔会阻塞更近段的十二指肠。
HP:0001735	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Acute pancreatitis	A `acute` (PATO:0000389) form of `pancreatitis` (HP:0001733).	急性胰腺炎	一种急性形式的胰腺炎。
HP:0001737	消化系统异常	Pancreatic cysts	A cyst of the pancreas that possess a lining of mucous epithelium.	胰腺囊肿	被覆粘膜上皮的胰腺囊肿。
HP:0001738	消化系统异常	Exocrine pancreatic insufficiency	Impaired function of the exocrine pancreas associated with a reduced ability to digest foods because of lack of digestive enzymes.	胰腺外分泌功能不全	#####
HP:0001739	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the nasopharynx	#####	鼻咽部异常	#####
HP:0001741	泌尿生殖系统异常	Phimosis	The male foreskin cannot be fully retracted from the head of the penis.	包茎	男性的包皮不能完全从龟头后缩（让龟头露出来）。
HP:0001742	头部和颈部的异常	Nasal obstruction	Reduced ability to pass air through the nasal cavity often leading to mouth breathing.	鼻塞	降低空气通过鼻腔的能力，常常导致用口呼吸。
HP:0001743	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormality of the spleen	An abnormality of the `spleen` (FMA:7196).	脾脏异常	脾脏的异常。
HP:0001744	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Splenomegaly	Abnormal `increased size` (PATO:0000586) of the `spleen` (FMA:7196).	脾肿大	脾脏尺寸异常增加。
HP:0001746	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Asplenia	Absence (aplasia) of the `spleen` (FMA:7196).	无脾	脾的缺失（不发育）。
HP:0001747	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Accessory spleen	An accessory spleen is a round, iso-echogenic, homogenic and smooth structure and is seen as a normal variant mostly on the medial contour of the spleen, near the hilus or around the lower pole. This has no pathogenic relevance.	副脾	副脾为一个圆形的、等超声波回声的、均质且光滑的结构，是一种正常变异，其多数位于脾的内侧轮廓，邻近门区或在下极周围。无致病相关性。
HP:0001748	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Polysplenia	Polysplenia is a congenital disease manifested by multiple small accessory spleens.	多脾	多脾是一种先天性疾病，表现为多个小的副脾。
HP:0001750	心血管系统异常	Single ventricle	The exist of single ventricle in the heart.	单心室	心脏只有一个心室。
HP:0001751	耳部异常	Vestibular dysfunction	An abnormality of the functioning of the vestibular apparatus.	前庭功能障碍	前庭器官的功能异常。
HP:0001756	耳部异常	Vestibular hypofunction	Reduced functioning of the vestibular apparatus.	前庭功能减退	前庭器官的功能减弱。
HP:0001757	耳部异常	High-frequency sensorineural hearing impairment	Reduced functioning of the vestibular apparatus.	高频感音神经性听力障碍	以损害高频听力为主的“感音神经性听力障碍” （HP: 0008538）的类型。
HP:0001760	肢体异常	Abnormality of the foot	An abnormality of the `skeleton of foot` (FMA:24222).	足部异常	足的骨骼异常。
HP:0001761	肢体异常	Pes cavus	The presence of an unusually high `plantar arch` (FMA:43942). Also called high instep, pes cavus refers to a distinctly hollow form of the sole of the foot when it is bearing weight.	高弓足	足弓（FMA:43942）异常高。也称为高脚背，足弓是指承重时脚底与鞋底间的明显空间。
HP:0001762	肢体异常	Talipes equinovarus	Talipes equinovarus (also called clubfoot) typically has four main components: inversion and adduction of the forefoot; inversion of the heel and hindfoot; equinus (limitation of extension) of the ankle and subtalar joint; and internal rotation of the leg.	马蹄内翻足	马蹄内翻足通常有四个主要组成部分：前足折反内收、脚跟和足后部反转、踝关节和距下关节马蹄形（伸展受限）和腿向内旋转。
HP:0001763	肢体异常	Pes planus	A foot where the `plantar arch` (FMA:43942) is in contact with the ground or floor when the individual is standing; or, in a patient lying supine, a foot where the arch is in contact with the surface of a flat board pressed against the sole of the foot by the examiner with a pressure similar to that expected from weight bearing; or, the height of the arch is reduced.	扁平足	扁平足（FMA:43942）是当人直立时足底与地板或地面可以接触;或者在患者仰卧时，检查者用平板以预期负重的压力压紧脚底时两者表面接触;或者足弓的高度减小。
HP:0001765	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Hammertoe	Hyperextension of the metatarsal-phalangeal joint with hyperflexion of the proximal interphalangeal (PIP) joint.	槌状趾	跖骨过伸伴趾间关节过度屈曲。
HP:0001769	肢体异常	Broad foot	A foot for which the measured width is above the 95th centile for age; or, a foot that appears disproportionately wide for its length.	宽足	足部的测量宽度大于同龄人群的第95百分位数;或者过宽，与足的长度不成比例。
HP:0001770	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Toe syndactyly	Webbing or fusion of the toes, involving soft parts only or including bone structure. Bony fusions are revered to as &quot;bony&quot; Syndactyly if the fusion occurs in a radio-ulnar axis. Fusions of bones of the toes in a proximo-distal axis are refered to as &quot;Symphalangism&quot;.	脚趾并趾畸形	脚趾间存在蹼或融合脚趾，可以仅涉及软组织或包括骨骼结构。发生在胫-腓轴线的骨性融合被称为“骨性并趾畸形”；脚趾在近-远端轴的骨性融合被称为“关节粘连”。
HP:0001771	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Achilles tendon contracture	A contracture of the `Achilles tendon` (FMA:51061).	跟腱挛缩	在跟腱（FMA:51061）位置发生的挛缩。
HP:0001772	肢体异常	Talipes equinovalgus	A deformity of foot and ankle in which the foot is bent down and outwards.	马蹄外翻足	脚和踝关节变形，脚向下向外弯曲。
HP:0001773	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short foot	A measured foot length that is more than 2 SD below the mean for a newborn of 27 - 41 weeks gestation, or foot that is less than the 3rd centile for individuals from birth to 16 years of age (objective). Alternatively, a foot that appears disproportionately short (subjective).	短足	27-41周的胎儿足的长度低于平均值2个标准差以上；出生-16岁的人群，足长度小于人群的第3百分位数（客观）。另外，足的长度与宽度出现不成比例短脚（主观）。
HP:0001775	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Tarsal osteovalgus	#####	跗骨骨外翻	#####
HP:0001776	肢体异常	Bilateral talipes equinovarus	Bilateral clubfoot deformity (see HP:0001762).	双侧马蹄内翻足	双侧马蹄内翻足畸形（请参阅HP:0001762）。
HP:0001780	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of toe	An anomaly of a `toe` (FMA:25046).	脚趾异常	脚趾的异常。
HP:0001782	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bulbous tips of toes	An abnormality of the morphology of the toes, such that the tips of the toes are prominent and bulbous.	球茎状趾尖	脚趾的形态学异常，脚趾尖突出形似球茎。
HP:0001783	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad metatarsal	Increased side-to-side width of a metatarsal bone.	跖骨变宽	跖骨一侧到另一侧的宽度增加。
HP:0001785	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ankle swelling	#####	踝关节肿胀	#####
HP:0001786	肢体异常	Narrow foot	A foot for which the measured width is below the 5th centile for age; or, a foot that appears disproportionately narrow for its length.	窄足	足部宽度低于同龄人群第5百分位数;或者足的宽度与长度出现不成比例的狭窄足。
HP:0001787	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Abnormal delivery	An abnormality of the birth process.	分娩异常	产程中出现异常。
HP:0001788	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Premature rupture of membranes	Premature rupture of membranes (PROM) is a condition which occurs in pregnancy when the amniotic sac ruptures more than an hour before the onset of labor.	胎膜早破	距临产时间超过1小时以上时发生的胎膜破裂。
HP:0001789	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Hydrops fetalis	The abnormal accumulation of fluid in two or more fetal compartments, including ascites, pleural effusion, pericardial effusion, and skin edema.	胎儿水肿	两个或以上的胎儿体内腔隙出现异常液体积聚，包括腹水，胸水，心包积液和皮肤水肿。
HP:0001790	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Nonimmune hydrops fetalis	Nonimmune hydrops fetalis is a serious fetal condition in which abnormal fluid accumulates in at least two different compartments ,and in which ciruulating antibodies against red cell antigens are absent in the mother.	非免疫性胎儿水肿	非免疫性胎儿水肿是指胎儿体内出现两处或以上不同部位的体液异常聚积；但母体循环中没有抗胎儿红细胞抗体
HP:0001791	消化系统异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Fetal ascites	Accumulation of fluid in the peritoneal cavity during the fetal period.	胎儿腹水	胎儿期腹腔内的液体积累。
HP:0001792	体壁的异常	Small nail	A nail that is diminished in length and width, i.e., underdeveloped `nail` (FMA:54326).	微甲	甲的长度和宽度变短或变窄，即未充分发育的甲。
HP:0001795	体壁的异常	Hyperconvex nail	When viewed on end (with the digit tip pointing toward the examiner&#39;s eye) the curve of the nail forms a tighter curve of convexity.	甲异常凸起	当检查者看向指（趾）尖部位时，可观察到甲表面有纵向凸起。
HP:0001798	体壁的异常	Anonychia	`Aplasia` (MPATH:58) of the `nail` (FMA:54326).	无甲症	甲的发育不全。
HP:0001799	体壁的异常	Short nail	Decreased length of nail.	短甲	甲的长度较短。
HP:0001800	体壁的异常	Hypoplastic toenails	Underdevelopment of the `toenail`(FMA:54328).	趾甲发育不良	趾甲未发育完全。
HP:0001802	体壁的异常	Absent toenail	Congenital absence of the `toenail`(FMA:54328).	趾甲缺损	先天性趾甲缺损。
HP:0001803	体壁的异常	Nail pits	Small (typically about 1 mm or less in size) depressions on the dorsal nail surface.	甲凹点	甲背面小的凹点（通常约1毫米或更小）。
HP:0001804	体壁的异常	Hypoplastic fingernail	Underdevelopment of a `fingernail`(FMA:54327).	指甲发育不良	指甲未发育完全。
HP:0001805	体壁的异常	Thick nail	Nail that appears thick when viewed on end.	厚甲	从甲的末端可以观察到甲增厚。
HP:0001806	体壁的异常	Onycholysis	Detachment of the nail from the nail bed.	甲分离	甲板从甲床分离。
HP:0001807	体壁的异常	Ridged nail	Longitudinal, linear prominences in the nail plate.	甲纵嵴	甲板纵向线性突起。
HP:0001808	体壁的异常	Fragile nails	Nails that easily break.	脆甲	甲容易断裂。
HP:0001809	体壁的异常	Split nail	A nail plate that has a longitudinal separation and the two sections of the nail share the same lateral radius of curvature.	甲纵裂	甲板沿纵轴分裂但是沿横轴依然相连。
HP:0001810	体壁的异常	Dystrophic toenail	Toenail changes apart from changes of the color of the toenail (nail dyschromia) that involve partial or complete disruption of the various keratinous layers of the nail plate.	趾甲营养不良	趾甲异常包括颜色的改变（甲变色）和甲板部分或完全性毁损。
HP:0001812	体壁的异常	Hyperconvex fingernails	When viewed on end (with the finger tip pointing toward the examiner&#39;s eye) the curve of the fingernail forms a tighter curve of convexity.	指甲异常凸起	当检查者看向指尖部位时可以观察到甲表面有纵向凸起。
HP:0001814	体壁的异常	Deep-set nails	Deeply placed nails.	嵌甲	甲长到皮肤里。
HP:0001816	体壁的异常	Thin nail	Nail that appears thin when viewed on end.	薄甲	从甲的末端可观察到甲变薄。
HP:0001817	体壁的异常	Absent fingernail	Absence of a `fingernail`(FMA:54327).	指甲缺损	指甲的缺损。
HP:0001818	体壁的异常	Paronychia	The nail disease paronychia is an often-tender bacterial or fungal hand infection or foot infection where the nail and skin meet at the side or the base of a finger or toenail. The infection can start suddenly (acute paronychia) or gradually (chronic paronychia).	甲沟炎	甲沟炎常发生在甲侧缘或基底部，由常见易感细菌或真菌感染引起，感染可急性发生（急性甲沟炎）或慢性发展（慢性甲沟炎）。
HP:0001820	体壁的异常	Leukonychia	White discoloration  of the `nails` (FMA:54326).	白甲	甲褪色呈白色。
HP:0001821	体壁的异常	Broad nail	Increased width of nail.	宽甲	甲的宽度增加。
HP:0001822	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Hallux valgus	Lateral deviation of the great toe (i.e., in the direction of the little toe).	拇趾外翻	拇趾的横向偏差（即小趾方向）。
HP:0001824	生长异常	Weight loss	Reduction inexisting body weight.	体重减轻	体重减少。
HP:0001827	泌尿生殖系统异常	Genital tract atresia	Congenital occlusion of a tube in the genital tract.	生殖道闭锁	生殖道的先天性管道闭塞。
HP:0001829	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Foot polydactyly	A kind of `polydactyly` (HP:0010442) characterized by the presence of a supernumerary toe or toes.	足多趾	一种多趾畸形（HP:0010442），特点是存在额外的脚趾
HP:0001830	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Postaxial foot polydactyly	Polydactyly of the foot most commonly refers to the presence of six toes on one foot. Postaxial polydactyly affects the lateral ray and the duplication may range from a well-formed articulated digit to a rudimentary digit.	轴后趾足	多趾畸形最常见的是单足存在六个脚趾。 轴后多趾形成影响外侧幅肋，此外重复可能形成形态良好的关节和趾，也可能形成非常初级的趾。
HP:0001831	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short toe	A `toe` (FMA:25046) that appears disproportionately short compared to the foot.	短趾	脚趾（FMA:25046）与足部相比出现不成比例的短。
HP:0001832	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the metatarsal bones	Abnormalities of the `metatarsal bones` (FMA:24492) (i.e. of five tubular bones located between the tarsal bones of the hind- and mid-foot and the phalanges of the toes).	跖骨异常	跖骨的异常，跖骨是位于足后部和足中部的跗骨和脚趾的趾骨之间的五个管状骨。
HP:0001833	肢体异常	Long foot	Increased back to front length of the foot.	长足	足跟至前部的长度增加。
HP:0001836	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Camptodactyly of toe	Camptodactyly is a painless flexion contracture of the proximal interphalangeal (PIP) joint that is usually gradually progressive. This term refers to camptodactyly of one or more toes.	脚趾屈曲畸形	近端趾间关节逐步渐进的无痛屈曲挛缩。这个术语是指一个或多个脚趾屈曲畸形。
HP:0001837	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad toe	Visible increase in width of the non-hallux digit without an increase in the dorso-ventral dimension.	宽趾	非拇趾的脚趾宽度明显增加而背腹间高度不增加。
HP:0001838	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Rocker bottom foot	The presence of both a prominent heel and a convex contour of the sole.	摇椅底足	双足跟突出及鞋子可见凸出轮廓。
HP:0001839	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Split foot	A condition in which middle parts of the foot (toes and metatarsals) are missing giving a cleft appearance. The severity is very variable ranging from slightly hypoplastic 3rd toe over absent 2nd or 3rd toes as far as oligo- or monodactyl feet.	脚劈裂	脚的中间部分（脚趾和跖骨）缺如，呈现劈裂外观。严重性变化很大，从第三脚趾轻度发育不良、第二或第三脚趾缺如，到寡趾或单趾脚。
HP:0001840	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Metatarsus adductus	The metatarsals are deviated medially (tibially), that is, the bones in the front half of the foot bend or turn in toward the body.	跖骨异常	跖骨均向内侧偏离（胫侧），即前足部的骨骼向体侧弯曲或转动。
HP:0001841	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Preaxial foot polydactyly	Duplication of all or part of the first ray.	轴前趾足	第一幅肋部分或全部重复。
HP:0001842	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Acroosteolysis (feet)	#####	肢端溶骨（足）	#####
HP:0001844	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the hallux	This term applies for all abnormalities of the big toe, also called hallux.	拇趾异常	本术语适用于大脚趾（也称为脚拇趾）的所有异常。
HP:0001845	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Overlapping toe	Describes a foot digit resting on the dorsal surface of an adjacent digit when the foot is at rest.	重叠趾	描述静息状态时，一个足趾位于邻近的另一个足趾的背侧面上。
HP:0001847	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Long hallux	Increased length of the `big toe` (FMA:25047).	长拇趾	拇趾（FMA:25047）的长度增加。
HP:0001848	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Calcaneovalgus deformity	This is a postural deformity in which the foot is positioned up against the tibia. The heel (calcaneus) is positioned downward (that is, the ankle is flexed upward), and the heel is turned outward (valgus).	足外翻畸形	足相对胫骨的姿势畸形。足跟（跟骨）向下（即踝向上弯曲）和向外翻转（外翻）。
HP:0001849	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Oligodactyly (feet)	A developmental defect resulting in the presence of fewer than the normal number of toes.	少趾畸形	发育缺陷造成脚趾的数量少于正常数量。
HP:0001850	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the tarsal bones	An abnormality of the tarsus are the cluster of seven bones in the foot between the tibia and fibula and the metatarsus, including the calcaneus (heel) bone and the talus (ankle) bone.	跗骨异常	跗骨的异常，跗骨是足部由七个骨头组成的骨头群，位于胫骨、腓骨和跖骨之间，包括跟骨（脚跟骨）和距骨（脚踝）骨。
HP:0001852	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Sandal gap	A widely spaced gap between the first toe (the great toe) and the second toe.	趾间畸形	第一、二趾之间的间距增大。
HP:0001853	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bifid distal phalanx of toe	#####	远节趾骨骨裂	#####
HP:0001854	肢体异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,骨骼系统异常	Gout (feet)	`Gout` (HP:0001997) affecting the `Metatarsophalangeal joint of big toe`.	痛风（足）	痛风（HP:0001997）影响大脚趾的跖趾关节。
HP:0001857	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short distal phalanx of toe	Short distance from the end of the toe to the most distal interphalangeal crease or distal interphalangeal joint flexion point, i.e., abnormally short `distal phalanx of toe` (FMA:75830).	远节趾骨短小	远节趾骨（FMA:75830）从脚趾末端到趾远侧纹或远端趾间关节屈曲点距离异常短，即远节趾骨异常短。
HP:0001859	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Distal symphalangism (feet)	#####	远端趾关节粘连（足）	先天性远端趾关节粘连
HP:0001862	肢体异常,体壁的异常	Acral ulceration and osteomyelitis leading to autoamputation of the digits (feet)	#####	肢端溃疡和骨髓炎导致脚趾自发性离断	#####
HP:0001863	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Toe clinodactyly	Bending or curvature of a `toe` (FMA:25046) in the tibial direction (i.e., towards the big toe).	脚趾屈趾畸形	脚趾向胫侧（即大脚趾侧）弯曲。
HP:0001864	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Fifth toe clinodactyly	Bending or curvature of a `fifth toe` (FMA:25053) in the tibial direction (i.e., towards the big toe).	第五趾屈曲畸形	第五趾（FMA:25053）向胫侧（即大脚趾侧）弯曲
HP:0001868	肢体异常	Autoamputation (feet)	#####	（足）自发性离断	#####
HP:0001869	肢体异常,体壁的异常	Deep plantar creases	The presence of unusually deep creases (ridges/wrinkles) on the `skin of sole of foot` (FMA:37849).	跖部深褶	跖部皮肤出现异常明显的皱褶（呈脊或皱纹）。
HP:0001870	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Acroosteolysis of distal phalanges (feet)	#####	远节趾骨肢端溶骨	#####
HP:0001871	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormality of blood and blood-forming tissues	An abnormality of the `hematopoietic system` (FMA:9667).	血液和造血组织异常	造血系统的异常（FMA:9667）。
HP:0001872	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormality of thrombocytes	An abnormality of `platelets` (CL:0000233).	血小板异常	血小板异常（CL:0000233）。
HP:0001873	血液和造血组织异常	Thrombocytopenia	A reduction in the number of circulating `thrombocytes` (CL:0000762).	血小板减少症	血循环中血小板（:0000762 CL）的数量的减少。
HP:0001874	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormality of neutrophils	A `neutrophil` (CL:0000775) abnormality.	中性粒细胞异常	中性粒细胞（CL:0000775）异常。
HP:0001875	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Neutropenia	An abnormally low number of `neutrophils` (CL:0000775) in the peripheral `blood` (FMA:9670).	中性粒细胞减少症	外周血中性粒细胞数目异常降低。
HP:0001876	血液和造血组织异常	Pancytopenia	An abnormal reduction in numbers of all blood cell types (red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets).	全血细胞减少症	所有血细胞类型的数目的异常降低（红细胞，白细胞，和血小板）。
HP:0001877	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormality of erythrocytes	An abnormality of `erythrocytes` (CL:0000232) (red-blood cells).	红细胞异常	红细胞异常（CL:0000232）（红血细胞）。
HP:0001878	血液和造血组织异常	Hemolytic anemia	A type of anemia caused by premature destruction of red blood cells (hemolysis).	溶血性贫血	一型由红细胞（溶血）过早破坏引起的贫血。
HP:0001879	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormality of eosinophils	An `eosinophil` (CL:0000771) abnormality.	嗜酸性粒细胞异常	嗜酸性粒细胞（CL:0000771）异常。
HP:0001880	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Eosinophilia	Increased count of `eosinophils` (CL:0000771) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	嗜酸性粒细胞增多症	血中（FMA:9670）嗜酸粒细胞（CL:0000771）增加。
HP:0001881	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormality of leukocytes	An abnormality of `leukocytes` (CL:0000738).	白细胞异常	白细胞的异常（CL:0000738）。
HP:0001882	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Leukopenia	An abnormal decreased number of `leukocytes` (CL:0000738) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	白细胞减少症	血液中白细胞（CL:0000738）的数量异常减少。
HP:0001883	肢体异常	Talipes	A deformity of foot and ankle that has different subtypes that are talipes equinovarus, talipes equinovalgus, talipes calcaneovarus and talipes calcaneovalgus.	畸形足	足和踝部的变形，有不同的亚型:马蹄内翻足、马蹄外翻足、仰趾内翻足和仰趾外翻足。
HP:0001884	肢体异常	Talipes calcaneovalgus	Talipes calcaneovalgus is a flexible foot deformity (as opposed to a rigid congenital vertical talus foot deformity) that can either present as a positional or structural foot deformity depending on severity and/or causality. The axis of calcaneovalgus deformity is in the tibiotalar joint, where the foot is positioned in extreme hyperextension. On inspection, the foot has an &quot;up and out&quot; appearance, with the dorsal forefoot practically touching the anterior aspect of the ankle and lower leg.	仰趾外翻足	仰趾外翻足是一种柔软的足畸形（相对于僵硬的先天性垂直型距骨变形足），可以任一形式出现，位置性的或结构性的足变形，取决于其严重性和/或病因。 仰趾外翻足变形的轴线是在胫距关节，足的位置处于极端过伸状态。脚呈现“向上向外”的外观，足背几乎接触到踝关节和小腿下端的前部。
HP:0001885	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short 2nd toe	Underdevelopment (hypoplasia) of the `second toe` (FMA:25048).	短第2趾	&#39;第二趾`不发达（发育不全）（FMA:25048）。
HP:0001886	神经系统异常,肢体异常	Osteomyelitis or necrosis, distal, due to sensory neuropathy (feet)	#####	由于感觉神经病变导致的远节骨髓炎或坏死（足）	#####
HP:0001888	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Lymphopenia	A reduced number of `lymphocytes` (CL:0000542) in the blood.	淋巴细胞减少症	血液中的淋巴细胞（0000542 CL）的数量减少。
HP:0001889	血液和造血组织异常	Megaloblastic anemia	Anemia characterized by the presence of erythroblasts that are larger than normal (megaloblasts).	巨幼细胞性贫血	以比正常细胞体积大的幼红细胞（巨幼红细胞）为特征的贫血。
HP:0001890	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Autoimmune hemolytic anemia	An autoimmune form of `hemolytic anemia` (HP:0001878).	自身免疫性溶血性贫血	一种与自身免疫有关的溶血性贫血（HP:0001878）。
HP:0001891	血液和造血组织异常	Iron deficiency anemia	#####	缺铁性贫血	#####
HP:0001892	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal bleeding	An abnormal susceptibility to bleeding, often referred to as a bleeding diathesis. A bleeding diathesis may be related to vascular, platelet and coagulation defects.	异常出血	异常出血易感性，通常称为出血易感性体质。出血体质可能与血管、血小板和凝血功能障碍相关。
HP:0001894	血液和造血组织异常	Thrombocytosis	Increased numbers of platelets in the peripheral blood.	血小板增多症	外周血血小板的数目增高。
HP:0001895	血液和造血组织异常	Normochromic anemia	#####	正常色素性贫血	#####

HP:0001897	血液和造血组织异常	Normocytic anemia	A kind of anemia in which the volume of the red blood cells is normal.	正常红细胞性贫血	一种贫血，其中红细胞的体积是正常的。
HP:0001898	血液和造血组织异常	Increased red blood cell mass	The presence of an increased mass of red blood cells in the circulation.	红细胞增多症	循环中的的红细胞量增加。
HP:0001899	血液和造血组织异常	Increased hematocrit	An increase in the volume of packed erythrocytes in a blood specimen.	红细胞压积增高	在血液检测样本中红细胞累积体积增加。
HP:0001900	血液和造血组织异常	Increased hemoglobin	#####	血红蛋白增多	#####
HP:0001901	血液和造血组织异常	Polycythemia	Polycythemia is diagnosed if the red blood cell count, the hemoglobin level, and the red blood cell volume all exceed the upper limits of normal.	红细胞增多症	红细胞增多症的诊断原则是红细胞计数、血红蛋白水平和红细胞体积都超过正常值的上限。
HP:0001902	血液和造血组织异常	Giant platelets	Giant platelets are larger than 7 micrometers and usually 10 to 20 micrometers. The term giant platelet is used when the platelet is larger than the size of the average red cell in the field. (Description adapted from College of American Pathologists, Hematology Manual, 1998).	巨血小板	巨血小板大于7微米，并且通常为10至20微米。当血小板比该视野中平均红细胞的大小大时称为巨血小板。 （来自美国病理学院，血液学手册，1998年描述改编）。
HP:0001903	血液和造血组织异常	Anemia	A reduction in `erythrocytes` (CL:0000232) volume or hemoglobin concentration.	贫血	红细胞（CL :0000232）体积或血红蛋白浓度的减少。
HP:0001904	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Autoimmune neutropenia	Autoimmune-induced `neutropenia` (HP:0001875).	自身免疫性中性粒细胞减少症	自体免疫诱导的中性粒细胞减少（HP:0001875）。
HP:0001905	血液和造血组织异常	Congenital thrombocytopenia	Thrombocytopenia with congenital onset.	先天性血小板减少症	先天性发病的血小板减少症。
HP:0001907	血液和造血组织异常	Thromboembolism	The formation of a blood clot inside a blood vessel that subsequently travels through the blood stream from the site where it formed to another location in the body, generally leading to vascular occlusion at the distant site.	血栓栓塞症	血管内血栓形成，随后通过血液从原发处移动至体内另一个部位，通常导致远端部位血管闭塞。
HP:0001908	血液和造血组织异常	Hypoplastic anemia	Anemia with varying degrees of erythrocytic hypoplasia without leukopenia or thrombocytopenia.	再生不良性贫血	伴有不同程度的红细胞发育不全、无白细胞或血小板减少的贫血。
HP:0001909	肿瘤,血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Leukemia	A cancer of the blood and bone marrow characterized by an abnormal proliferation of leukocytes.	白血病	由于白细胞的异常增殖的引起的发生在血液和骨髓的癌症。
HP:0001911	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormality of granulocytes	An abnormality of `granulocytes` (CL:0000094).	粒细胞异常	粒细胞异常（CL:0000094）。

HP:0001915	血液和造血组织异常	aplastic anemia	Aplastic anemia is defined as pancytopenia with a hypocellular marrow.	再生障碍性贫血	再生障碍性贫血指全血细胞减少与骨髓增生低下。
HP:0001917	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Renal amyloidosis	A form of `amyloidosis` (HP:0011034) that affects the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	肾淀粉样病变	`淀粉样病变` (HP:0011034)累及到肾。
HP:0001919	泌尿生殖系统异常	Acute kidney injury	Sudden loss of renal function, as manifested by decreased urine production, and a rise in serum creatinine or blood urea nitrogen concentration (azotemia).	急性肾损伤	突然失却肾功能，表现为尿量减少、血清肌酐和尿素氮浓度上升（氮质血症）。
HP:0001920	泌尿生殖系统异常,心血管系统异常	Renal artery stenosis	The presence of `stenosis` (MPATH:80) of the `renal artery` (FMA:14751).	肾动脉狭窄	肾动脉发生狭窄。
HP:0001922	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Vacuolated lymphocytes	The presence of clear, sharply defined vacuoles in the lymphocyte cytoplasm.	空泡性淋巴细胞	淋巴细胞细胞质中存在明确的、清晰的空泡。
HP:0001923	血液和造血组织异常	Reticulocytosis	An elevation in the number of `reticulocytes` (CL:0000558) (immature erythrocytes) in the peripheral blood circulation.	网状细胞过多	在外周血液循环中网状细胞（CL:0000558 ）（未成熟的红细胞）的数目增加。
HP:0001924	血液和造血组织异常	Sideroblastic anemia	Sideroblastic anemia results from a defect in the incorporation of iron into the heme molecule. A sideroblast is an erythroblast that has stainable deposits of iron in cytoplasm (this can be demonstrated by Prussian blue staining).	铁粒幼细胞性贫血	铁粒幼细胞性贫血是由于铁掺入血红蛋白分子的缺陷。铁粒幼红细胞是有铁质沉淀于细胞质（这可以通过普鲁士蓝染色证明）的红细胞。
HP:0001927	血液和造血组织异常	Acanthocytosis	Acanthocytosis is a type of `poikilocytosis` (HP:0004447) characterized by the presence of spikes on the cell surface. The cells have an irregular shaped resembling many-pointed stars.	棘形红细胞增多症	棘形红细胞增多症是血细胞形态多样性（HP:0004447）的一种类型，其特征在细胞表面出现尖峰样突起。该细胞形状不规则，类似于五角星。
HP:0001928	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormality of coagulation	An abnormality of the process of `blood coagulation` (GO:0007596). That is, altered ability or inability of the blood to clot.	凝血异常	凝血的过程异常（GO:0007596）。也就是说，凝血能力改变或不能凝血。
HP:0001929	血液和造血组织异常	Reduced factor XI activity	Decreased activity of `coagulation factor XI` (PR:000007295). Factor XI, also known as plasma thromboplastin antecedent, is a serine prote¨ªnase that activates factor IX	XI凝血因子活性降低	`凝血因子XI`（PR:000007295）的活性降低。XI因子，也被称为血浆凝血激酶前体，是一种可以激活IX因子的丝氨酸蛋白酶。

HP:0001963	耳部异常	Abnormal speech discrimination	A type of hearing impairment prominently characterized by a difficulty in understanding speech, rather than an inability to hear speech. Poor speech discrimination is a very common symptom of high frequency hearing loss.	言语辨别异常	听力损伤的一种，其显著特征是难以理解语音，而不是不能听到语音。贫乏的言语识别力是高频听力损失的常见症状。

HP:0001974	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Leukocytosis	An abnormal increase in the number of `leukocytes` (CL:0000738) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	白细胞增多症	血液中白细胞（CL:0000738）的数量异常增加。

HP:0001976	血液和造血组织异常	Reduced antithrombin III activity	An `abnormality of coagulation` (HP:0001928) related to a `decreased concentration` (PATO:0001163) of `antithrombin-III` (PR:000003252).	抗凝血酶Ⅲ活性降低	与抗凝血酶III（:000003252 PR）浓度（PATO:0001163）下降相关的凝血异常（HP:0001928）。
HP:0001977	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal thrombosis	Venous or arterial thrombosis (formation of blood clots) of spontaneous nature and which cannot be fully explained by acquired risk (e.g. atherosclerosis).	异常血栓形成	自发性静脉、动脉血栓形成（血凝块），且非获得性风险（例如，动脉粥样硬化）导致。
HP:0001978	血液和造血组织异常	Extramedullary hematopoiesis	The process of hematopoiesis occurring outside of the bone marrow (in the liver, thymus, and spleen) in the postnatal organisms.	骨髓外造血	发生在骨髓以外的部位（在肝脏，胸腺，脾脏）造血。
HP:0001980	血液和造血组织异常	Megaloblastic bone marrow	Abnormal increased number of megaloblasts in the bone marrow.	巨幼细胞性骨髓	在骨髓中巨幼红细胞数目的异常增加。
HP:0001981	血液和造血组织异常	Schistocytosis	The presence of an abnormal number of fragmented red blood cells (schistocytes) in the blood.	裂(红)细胞症	破损的红细胞数目异常。
HP:0001982	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Sea-blue histiocytosis	An abnormality of `macrophages` (CL:0000235), also known as histiocytes, in which the cells take on a sea blue appearance due to abnormally increased lipid content.	海蓝色组织细胞增多症	`巨噬细胞`（CL:0000235）的一种异常，也被称为组织细胞症，细胞由于异常脂质含量增加而呈现海蓝色外观。

HP:0002044	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Zollinger-Ellison syndrome	A condition in which there is increased production of gastrin by a gastrin-secreting tumor (usually located in the pancreas, duodenum, or abdominal lymph nodes) that stimulates the gastric mucosa to maximal activity, with consequent gastrointestinal mucosal ulceration.	Zollinger-Ellison 综合征	分泌胃泌素的肿瘤（通常位于胰腺、十二指肠或腹部淋巴结）合成胃泌素增多，刺激胃粘膜到最大（分泌）活性，随之发生胃肠粘膜溃疡。

HP:0002047	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Malignant hyperthermia	Malignant hyperthermia is characterized by a rapid increase in temperature to 39-42 degrees C in response to inhalational anesthetics such as halothane or to muscle relaxants such as succinylcholine.	恶性高热	由于对呼吸性麻醉剂如氟烷或肌肉松弛剂琥珀酰胆碱的反应,造成以体温快速升高到39-42度为特征的恶性高热。

HP:0002061	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Lower limb spasticity	A motor disorder characterized by a velocity-dependent increase in tonic stretch reflexes with increased muscle tone, exaggerated (hyperexcitable) tendon reflexes in the lower limbs.	下肢痉挛	特点是随着肌张力增高速度依赖的下肢牵张反射增加、腱反射亢进（高兴奋性）的运动障碍。
HP:0002062	神经系统异常	Morphological abnormality of the pyramidal tract	Any structural abnormality of the `pyramidal tract` (FMA:72634), whose chief element, the corticospinal tract, is the only direct connection between the brain and the spinal cord. In addition to the corticospinal tract, the pyramidal system includes the corticobulbar, corticomesencephalic, and corticopontine tracts.	锥体束的形态异常	所有锥体束（FMA:72634）的结构异常，其主要成分，皮质脊髓束，是脑和脊髓之间唯一的直接连接。除了皮质脊髓束，锥体系统包括皮质延髓束，皮质中脑束，皮质脑桥束。
HP:0002063	神经系统异常	Rigidity	Continuous involuntary sustained muscle contraction. When an affected muscle is passively stretched, the degree of resistance remains constant regardless of the rate at which the muscle is stretched. This feature helps to distinguish rigidity from muscle spasticity.	强直	连续持续性不自主的肌肉收缩。当受影响的肌肉被动拉伸，无论肌肉的受牵拉稠度怎样，拮抗的程度保持恒定。此功能有助于区分肌肉痉挛还是强直。
HP:0002064	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Spastic gait	#####	痉挛步态	#####
HP:0002066	神经系统异常	Gait ataxia	A type of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) characterized by the impairment of the ability to coordinate the movements required for normal walking.	步态共济失调	`共济失调`(HP:0001251)的一种类型，表现为正常行走时所需的协同运动能力受损。
HP:0002067	神经系统异常	Bradykinesia	Bradykinesia literally means slow movement, and is used clinically to denote a slowness in the execution of movement (in contrast to hypokinesia, which is used to refer to slowness in the initiation of movement).	运动迟缓	运动迟缓的字面意思是缓慢运动，临床上用于表示运动执行缓慢（相对于运动减少，这是用来指运动的起始缓慢）。
HP:0002068	神经系统异常,消化系统异常	Neuromuscular dysphagia	#####	神经肌肉源性吞咽困难	#####
HP:0002069	神经系统异常	Generalized tonic-clonic seizures	Generalized tonic-clonic seizures are `generalized seizures` (HP:0002197) with bilateral symmetrical tonic contraction then bilateral clonic contractions of somatic muscles usually associated with autonomic phenomena.	全面性强直-阵挛发作	全面性强直-阵挛发作是全面性发作（HP:0002197），躯体肌肉双侧对称性强直收缩，然后阵挛性收缩，通常伴有自主神经症状。
HP:0002070	神经系统异常	Limb ataxia	A kind of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) that affects movements of the extremities.	肢体共济失调	影响肢体运动的一种共济失调（HP:0001251）。
HP:0002071	神经系统异常	Abnormality of extrapyramidal motor function	A neurological condition related to lesions of the basal ganglia leading to typical abnormalities including akinesia (inability to initiate changes in activity and perform volitional movements rapidly and easily), muscular rigidity (continuous contraction of muscles with constant resistance to passive movement), chorea (widespread arrhythmic movements of a forcible, rapid, jerky, and restless nature), athetosis (inability to sustain the muscles of the fingers, toes, or other group of muscles in a fixed position), and akathisia (inability to remain motionless).	锥体外系功能障碍	与基底节病变导致神经状态异常，典型的表现包括运动不能（无法启动动作，或不能迅速和容易地进行随意运动），肌强直（广泛的无节律的肌肉快速持续收缩），舞蹈症（普遍一个强制，快速，干，和不宁性质）的心律失常的动作，手足徐动症（不能维持手指，脚趾，或其他组的肌肉中的固定位置的肌肉），和静坐不能（不能保持不动）。
HP:0002072	神经系统异常	Chorea	Chorea (Greek for &#39;dance&#39;) refers to widespread arrhythmic involuntary movements of a forcible, jerky and restless fashion.	舞蹈样运动	舞蹈样运动（希腊文“跳舞”），指的是广泛无节奏的不自主强行运动，表现为抽动样，坐立不安。
HP:0002073	神经系统异常	Progressive cerebellar ataxia	#####	进行性小脑共济失调	#####
HP:0002074	神经系统异常	Increased neuronal autofluorescent lipopigment	Lipofuscin, a generic term applied to autofluorescent lipopigment, is a mixture of protein and lipid that accumulates in most aging cells, particularly those involved in high lipid turnover (e.g., the adrenal medulla) or phagocytosis of other cell types (e g., the retinal pigment epithelium or RPE; macrophage). This term pertains if there is an increase in the neuronal accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.	神经元自体荧光脂褐素增加	脂褐素，自体荧光脂褐素的专业术语，是积聚在最衰老细胞的蛋白质和脂质混合物，尤其是涉及高脂质转换（例如，肾上腺髓质）或吞噬的其他类型细胞（例如视网膜色素上皮细胞或RPE；巨噬细胞）。此术语适用于神经元脂褐素（也称为自身荧光脂蛋白）的积聚增加是否超过患者预期的年龄。
HP:0002075	神经系统异常	Dysdiadochokinesis	A type of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) characterized by the impairment of the ability to perform rapidly alternating movements, such as rhythmically tapping the fingers on the knee, generally related to a cerebellar lesion.	轮替运动障碍	`共济失调`（HP:0001251）的表现之一，表现为进行快速交替运动的功能受损，比如不能有节奏地用手拍打膝盖，一般为小脑病变所致。
HP:0002076	神经系统异常	Migraine	Migraine is a chronic neurological disorder characterized by episodic attacks of headache and associated symptoms.	偏头痛	偏头痛是一种慢性神经系统疾病，特点是发作性头痛及相关症状。
HP:0002077	神经系统异常	Migraine with aura	A type of `migraine` (HP:0002076) in which there is an aura characterized by focal neurological phenomena that usually proceed, but may accompany or occur in the absence of, the headache. The symptoms of an aura may include fully reversible visual, sensory, and speech symptoms but not motor weakness. Visual symptoms may include flickering lights, spots and lines and/or loss of vision and/or unilateral sensory symptoms such as paresthesias or numbness. At least one of the symptoms of an aura develops gradually over 5 or more minutes and/or different symptoms occur in succession.	有先兆偏头痛	偏头痛（HP:0002076）的一种类型，先兆的特点为局灶性神经现象，通常进行性的，可伴有或不伴有头痛。先兆的症状可以包括完全可逆的视觉，感觉，和言语症状，但没有运动无力。视觉症状可能包括闪光、点、线和/或视觉缺失，和/或单侧感觉症状诸如感觉异常或麻木。至少一个的先兆症状逐渐发展超过5分钟或更长时间，和/或不同的症状连续发生。
HP:0002078	神经系统异常	Truncal ataxia	A kind of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) that affects the proximal musculature, especially that involved in gait stability.	躯干性共济失调	一种影响近端肌肉的共济失调（HP:0001251），尤其是那些参与步态稳定的肌肉。
HP:0002079	神经系统异常	Hypoplasia of the corpus callosum	Underdevelopment of the corpus callosum.	胼胝体发育不良	胼胝体发育不完全。
HP:0002080	神经系统异常	Intention tremor	An oscillatory cerebellar ataxia that tends to be absent when the limbs are inactive and during the first part of voluntary movement but worsening as the movement continues and greater precision is required (e.g., in touching a target such as the patient&#39;s nose or a physician&#39;s finger).	意向性震颤	摆动性小脑性共济失调，肢体静止或刚开始随意运动时消失，持续运动和需要更加精准时加重（例如，触摸目标如患者的鼻子或医生的手指） 。
HP:0002083	神经系统异常	Migraine without aura	Repeated headache attacks lasting 4-72 h fulfilling at least two of the following criteria: 1) unilateral location, 2) pulsating quality, 3) moderate or severe pain intensity, and 4) aggravation by or causing avoidance of routine physical activity such as climbing stairs. Headache attacks are commonly accompanied by nausea, vomiting, photophobia, or phonophobia.	无先兆偏头痛	反复的头痛发作持续4-72小时，符合至少下列两个的标准:1）单侧，2）搏动性，3）中度或重度疼痛，和4）日常体力活动可加重，避免日常活动避免如爬楼梯。头痛发作通常伴有恶心，呕吐，畏光，或畏声。
HP:0002084	神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Encephalocele	A neural tube defect characterized by sac-like protrusions of the brain and the membranes that cover it through openings in the skull.	脑膨出	一种神经管缺陷，其特征为脑的囊样突起，以及颅骨开口处覆盖脑的膜上的囊样突起。
HP:0002085	神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Occipital encephalocele	A type of encephalocele (that is, a a protrusion of part of the cranial contents including brain tissue through a congenital opening in the cranium, typically covered with skin or mucous membrane) in the occipital region of the skull. Occipital encephalocele presents as a midline swelling over the occipital bone. It is usually covered with normal full-thickness scalp.	枕部脑膨出	一种发生在颅骨的枕骨区域的脑膨出（即，颅内容物包括脑组织从通常覆盖有皮肤或粘膜的头盖骨上的先天性开口突出去）。枕叶脑膨出表现为枕骨中线肿胀，通常有正常厚度的头皮覆盖。
HP:0002086	呼吸系统异常	Abnormality of the respiratory system	An abnormality of the `respiratory system` (FMA:7158), which include the airways, lungs, and the respiratory muscles.	呼吸系统异常	呼吸系统（FMA:7158）的异常，包括呼吸道，肺部和呼吸肌。
HP:0002087	呼吸系统异常	Abnormality of the upper respiratory tract	An abnormality of the `upper respiratory tract` (FMA:45661).	上呼吸道异常	`上呼吸道`（FMA:45661）的异常。
HP:0002088	呼吸系统异常	Abnormality of the lung	An abnormality of the `lung` (FMA:7195).	肺部异常	肺部（FMA:7195）的异常。
HP:0002089	呼吸系统异常	Pulmonary hypoplasia	#####	肺发育不良	#####
HP:0002090	呼吸系统异常,免疫系统异常	Pneumonia	Inflammation of any part of the lung parenchyma.	肺炎	肺实质任何部分的炎症。
HP:0002091	呼吸系统异常	Restrictive lung disease	#####	限制性肺疾病	#####
HP:0002092	呼吸系统异常	Pulmonary hypertension	Pulmonary hypertension is defined as a mean pulmonary artery pressure greater than 25 mm Hg during rest (normal level, 10 mm Hg) or greater than 30 mm Hg during exercise (normal level, 15 mm Hg), as determined with right heart catheterization.	肺动脉高压	肺动脉高血压被定义为在休息平均肺动脉压大于25毫米汞柱（正常水平10毫米汞柱），或在锻炼期间大于30毫米汞柱（正常水平15毫米汞柱）。肺动脉压力通过右心脏导管检查来确定。
HP:0002093	呼吸系统异常	Respiratory insufficiency	Failure to adequately provide oxygen to cells of the body and to remove excess carbon dioxide.	呼吸功能不全	不能为机体细胞提供充足的氧气和除去过量的二氧化碳。
HP:0002094	呼吸系统异常	Dyspnea	Difficult or labored breathing.	呼吸困难	呼吸费力或劳力性呼吸困难。
HP:0002097	呼吸系统异常	Emphysema	#####	肺气肿	#####
HP:0002098	呼吸系统异常	Respiratory distress	#####	呼吸窘迫	#####
HP:0002099	呼吸系统异常,免疫系统异常	Asthma	Asthma is characterized by increased responsiveness of the tracheobronchial tree to multiple stimuli, leading to narrowing of the air passages with resultant dyspnea, cough, and wheezing.	哮喘	哮喘患者的气管支气管树因多种应激因素导致气道狭窄，引起呼吸困难、咳嗽、喘息等表现。
HP:0002100	呼吸系统异常,免疫系统异常	Recurrent aspiration pneumonia	Increased susceptibility to aspiration pneumonia, defined as pneumonia due to breathing in foreign material, as manifested by a medical history of repeated episodes of aspiration pneumonia.	反复吸入性肺炎	由吸入性肺炎易感性增加导致。反复吸入性肺炎是由于吸入异物导致的肺炎，表现为吸入性肺炎反复性发作。
HP:0002101	呼吸系统异常	Abnormal lung lobation	Defects in the formation of pulmonary lobules.	肺分叶异常	肺叶形成时的缺陷。

HP:0002103	呼吸系统异常	Abnormality of the pleura	An abnormality of the `pulmonary pleura` (FMA:9734), the thin, transparent membrane which covers the lungs and lines the inside of the chest walls.	胸膜异常	是胸膜的异常。胸膜(FMA:9734)是覆盖在肺与内侧胸壁的薄而透明的膜。
HP:0002104	呼吸系统异常	Apnea	Lack of breathing with no movement of the respiratory muscles and no exchange of air in the lungs. This term refers to a disposition to have recurrent episodes of apnea rather than to a single event.	呼吸暂停	呼吸肌无运动，肺中无气体交换。这个术语指呼吸暂停反复发作，而不是一个单一的事件。
HP:0002105	呼吸系统异常	Hemoptysis	Coughing up (expectoration) of blood or blood-streaked sputum from the larynx, trachea, bronchi, or lungs.	咯血	从喉、气管、支气管或肺部咳出血或血丝痰。
HP:0002107	呼吸系统异常	Pneumothorax	Accumulation of air in the pleural cavity leading to a partially or completely collapsed lung.	气胸	胸腔内气体积聚，导致肺部分或完全萎陷。

HP:0002121	神经系统异常	Absence seizures	Recurrent absence seizures are `generalized seizures` (HP:0002197) and are characterized by a loss of consciousness, thus, are a form of `dialeptic seizures` (HP:0011146).	失神发作	复发性失神发作是种全面性癫痫发作（HP:0002197），其特点是意识丧失，因此，是一种`呆滞性癫痫发作`形式（HP:0011146）。
HP:0002123	神经系统异常	Generalized myoclonic seizures	Seizures with sudden, brief (&lt; 100 msec) involuntary single or multiple contraction(s) of muscles(s) or muscle groups of variable topography (axial, proximal limb, distal).	全身性肌阵挛发作	癫痫发作，突然、短暂的（&lt;100毫秒）的单块肌肉或肌群不自主地单次或多次不规则收缩（轴性，四肢近端，远端）。
HP:0002126	神经系统异常	Polymicrogyria	A congenital abnormality of the cerebral hemisphere characterized by an excessive number of small gyri (convolutions) on the surface of the brain.	多小脑回	大脑半球的特征在于小脑回（卷积）数量过多的大脑的表面上的先天性异常。

HP:0002132	神经系统异常	Porencephaly	A disorder of the brain in which a cyst or cavity filled with cerebrospinal fluid develops in the cerebral hemisphere.	脑穿通畸形	大脑中有充满脑脊液的囊性结构或空腔。
HP:0002133	神经系统异常	Status epilepticus	Seizures lasting for more than 30 minutes or longer or multiple seizures repeated frequently without regaining consciousness between seizures.	癫痫持续状态	发作持续时间超过30分钟或更长时间或多次癫痫频繁重复发作，发作之间未恢复知觉。

HP:0002136	神经系统异常	Broad-based gait	An abnormal gait pattern in which persons stand and walk with their feet spaced widely apart. This is often a component of cerebellar ataxia.	宽基步态	是一种异常的步态模式，站立和行走时双脚距离很宽。这往往是小脑性共济失调的组成部分。

HP:0002143	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the spinal cord	An abnormality of the `spinal cord` (FMA:7647) (myelon).	脊髓异常	在`脊髓`的异常（FMA:7647）。
HP:0002144	神经系统异常	Tethered cord	During normal embryological development, the spinal cord first occupies the entire length of the vertebral column but goes on to assume a position at the level of L1 due to differential growth of the conus medullaris and the vertebral column. The filum terminale is a slender, threadlike structure that remains after the normal regression of the distal embryonic spinal cord and attaches the spinal cord to the coccyx. A tethered cord results if there is a thickened rope-like filum terminale which anchors the cord at the level of L2 or below, potentially causing neurologic signs owing to abnormal tension on the spinal cord.	脊髓栓系	在正常的胚胎发育中，脊髓最初占据整个脊柱的长度，但随着脊髓圆锥和椎体的分化、生长，最终位于L1水平的位置。终丝是远侧胚胎脊髓退缩之后形成的一种细长的线状结构并将脊髓附着在尾骨上。如果有一根粗大的绳子样的终丝将脊髓固定在L2水平或以下就会导致脊髓栓系，并且可能会因为脊髓收到的异常张力而导致神经系统体征。
HP:0002145	神经系统异常	Frontotemporal dementia	A dementia associated with degeneration of the frontotemporal lobe and clinically associated with personality and behavioral changes such as disinhibition, apathy, and lack of insight.	额颞叶痴呆	额颞叶功能退变引起的痴呆类型，临床表现为个性和行为改变，如脱抑制行为，冷漠和自知力缺乏。
HP:0002148	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hypophosphatemia	An abnormally decreased `phosphate` (CHEBI:18367) concentration in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	低磷血症	`血`（FMA:9670）中`磷酸盐 `（CHEBI：18367）的浓度异常降低 。

HP:0002173	神经系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hypoglycemic seizures	Due to a variety of reasons caused by low blood sugar concentration, usually with plasma glucose concentration <2.8mmol / L, which can cause sympathetic excitability , such as agitation, hunger, weakness, sweating, tachycardia, systolic blood pressure, diastolic blood pressure, tremor, disturbance of consciousness, and even coma.	低血糖发作	由多种原因引起的血糖浓度过低所致。一般以血浆血糖浓度<2.8mmol/L，可引起交感神经兴奋症群，如激动不安、饥饿、软弱、出汗、心动过速、收缩压升高、舒张压降低、震颤，一过性黑蒙，意识障碍，甚至昏迷。
HP:0002174	神经系统异常	Postural tremor	A type of tremors that is triggered by holding a limb in a fixed position.	姿势性震颤	当肢体固定在一个姿势时诱发的震颤。

HP:0002179	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Opisthotonus	Ankylosing spasticity of the back muscles that causes the head and lower limbs to bend back and the torso forward into an arcuate state,which can be found in a variety of causes of encephalitis, meningitis.	角弓反张	#####

HP:0002181	神经系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Cerebral edema	Abnormal accumulation of fluid in the brain.	脑水肿	大脑内液体异常蓄积。
HP:0002183	神经系统异常	Phonophobia	An abnormally heightened sensitivity to loud sounds.	声音恐惧	对高分贝声音异常敏感。
HP:0002185	神经系统异常	Neurofibrillary tangles	Pathological protein aggregates formed by hyperphosphorylation of a microtubule-associated protein known as tau, causing it to aggregate in an insoluble form.	神经原纤维缠结	称为tau蛋白的微管相关蛋白过度磷酸化之后形成病理性蛋白，聚合形成不溶性形式
HP:0002186	神经系统异常	Apraxia	A defect in the understanding of complex motor commands and in the execution of certain learned movements, i.e., deficits in the cognitive components of learned movements.	失用	在复杂运动指令的理解和在某些已学习动作的执行方面的缺陷，如在认知已学习运动的成分的缺陷。
HP:0002187	神经系统异常	Intellectual disability, profound	Profound mental retardation is defined as an intelligence quotient (IQ) below 20.	极重度智力残疾	极重度精神发育迟滞定义为智商（IQ）低于20。

HP:0002193	神经系统异常	Pseudobulbar behavioral symptoms	Individuals with `Pseudobulbar signs` (HP:0002200) often also demonstrate abnormal behavioral symptoms such as inappropriate emotional outbursts of uncontrolled laughter or weeping etc.	假性延髓行为症状	有假性球麻痹症状的患者，也常表现出异常行为症状，如不加控制的笑声或哭泣等不适当的情绪爆发

HP:0002200	神经系统异常	Pseudobulbar signs	Pseudobulbar signs result from injury to an upper motor neuron lesion to the corticobulbar pathways in the pyramidal tract. Patients have difficulty chewing, swallowing and demonstrate slurred speech (often initial presentation) as well as abnormal behavioral symptoms such as inappropriate emotional outbursts of uncontrolled laughter or weeping etc.	假性球麻痹症状	假性球麻痹症状是由于锥体束通路上皮层延髓束受损而出现的一种上运动神经元病变。表现为咀嚼、吞咽困难和表达不清（通常为最初表现）。还有不受控制的强哭强笑等症状。

HP:0002248	心血管系统异常,消化系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	Hematemesis	The vomiting of blood.	呕血	呕出血液。
HP:0002249	心血管系统异常,消化系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	Melena	The passage of blackish, tarry feces associated with gastrointestinal hemorrhage. Melena occurs if the blood remains in the colon long enough for it to be broken down by colonic bacteria. One degradation product, hematin, imbues the stool with a blackish color. Thus, melena generally occurs with bleeding from the upper gastrointestinal tract (e.g., sotmach ulcers or duodenal ulcers), since the blood usually remains in the gut for a longer period of time than with lower gastrointestinal bleeding.	黑便	与消化道出血相关的黑色、柏油样粪便的排泄。当血在结肠停留的时间足够长时，结肠细菌可将其降解而产生黑便。血红素是一种降解产物，可将粪便染为黑色。因此，黑便通常伴随上消化道出血（例如，胃溃疡或十二指肠溃疡），因血液在肠道中停留的时间通常较下消化道出血更长。
HP:0002250	消化系统异常	Abnormality of the large intestine	Any abnormality of the `large intestine` (FMA:7201).	大肠异常	大肠的任何异常。
HP:0002251	神经系统异常,消化系统异常	Aganglionic megacolon	An abnormality resulting from a lack of intestinal ganglion cells (i.e., an aganglionic section of bowel) that results in bowel obstruction with enlargement of the colon.	无神经节性巨结肠	由于缺乏肠神经节细胞引起的异常（即肠道的无神经节节段），导致肠梗阻伴结肠扩张。

HP:0002280	神经系统异常	Enlarged cisterna magna	Increase in size of the cisterna magna, one of three principal openings in the subarachnoid space between the arachnoid and pia mater, located between the cerebellum and the dorsal surface of the medulla oblongata.	小脑延髓池扩大	位于小脑和延髓背面之间的小脑延髓池大小增加。
HP:0002281	神经系统异常	Gray matter heterotopias	Gray matter heterotopia is a neurological disorder caused by clumps of grey matter being located in the wrong part of the brain. It is characterized as a type of cortical malformation. The neurons in heterotopia may appear to be normal, except for their mislocation; nuclear studies have shown glucose metabolism equal to that of normally positioned gray matter. The condition causes a variety of symptoms, but usually includes some degree of epilepsy or recurring seizures, and often affects the brain&#39;s ability to function on higher levels. Symptoms range from nonexistent to profound, in which case heterotopia can result in severe seizure disorder, loss of motor skills, and mental retardation.	灰质异位	灰质异位是指因灰质团块位于脑内错误的位置导致的神经功能障碍，是皮质畸形的一种。除了位置，异位的神经元可能是正常的；且葡萄糖代谢水平与正常位置的灰质一致。这种情况可以造成的多种不同症状，但通常包含一定程度的癫痫或反复痫性发作，常会影响大脑更高水平的能力。其表现可以无症状，也可以引起严重症状，比如严重的癫痫，运动能力丧失，智力低下。
HP:0002282	神经系统异常	Heterotopia	#####	异位	#####

HP:0002304	神经系统异常	Akinesia	Inability to initiate changes in activity or movement and to perform ordinary volitional movements rapidly and easily.	运动不能	没有发起自主活动或运动并能快速、轻松地执行日常的自主运动的能力。
HP:0002305	神经系统异常	Athetosis	Athetosis (from the Greek word for &#39;changeable&#39; or &#39;unfixed&#39;) refers to an inability to sustain the muscles of the fingers, toes, tongue, or any other group of muscles in a fixed position. Instead, posture is interrupted by slow, purposeless involuntary movements.	手足徐动症	手足徐动症（来自希腊字为&#39;可变“或”不固定“）是指无法维持手指、脚趾、舌头或任何其他组的肌肉在固定位置。相反，姿势被缓慢、无目的的不自主运动中断。
HP:0002307	神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Drooling	Habitual flow of saliva out of the mouth.	流涎	从嘴里习惯性地流出口水。
HP:0002308	神经系统异常	Arnold-Chiari malformation	Arnold-Chiari malformation consists of a downward displacement of the cerebellar tonsils and the medulla through the foramen magnum, sometimes causing hydrocephalus as a result of obstruction of CSF outflow.	小脑扁桃体下疝畸形	Arnold-Chiari 畸形包括小脑扁桃体向下移位，并且延髓通过枕骨大孔，有时会由于阻塞脑脊液外流造成脑积水。

HP:0002315	神经系统异常	Headache	Cephalgia, or pain sensed in various parts of the head, not confined to the area of distribution of any nerve.	头痛	不局限于任何神经的分布区域，头的不同部位感知的疼痛。
HP:0002317	神经系统异常	Unsteady gait	#####	步态不稳	#####
HP:0002318	神经系统异常	Cervical myelopathy	#####	脊髓型颈椎病	#####
HP:0002321	耳部异常	Vertigo	An abnormal sensation of spinning while the body is actually stationary.	眩晕	身体静止不动却自觉旋转的异常感觉。
HP:0002322	神经系统异常	Resting tremor	A resting tremor occurs when muscles are at rest and becomes less noticeable or disappears when the affected muscles are moved. Resting tremors are often slow and coarse.	静止性震颤	静止性震颤发生在肌肉静息时，当受累肌肉活动时变得很轻或消失，是缓慢的粗大的震颤。
HP:0002323	神经系统异常	Anencephaly	#####	无脑畸形	#####
HP:0002324	神经系统异常	Hydranencephaly	A defect of development of the brain characterized by replacement of greater portions of the cerebral hemispheres and the corpus striatum by cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) and glial tissue.	积水型无脑畸形	脑脊液和胶质组织替代大部分大脑半球和胼胝体为特征的一种脑发育缺陷。
HP:0002326	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Transient ischemic attack	#####	短暂性脑缺血发作	缺血导致的一过性神经系统功能障碍。
