HP:0005920	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Abnormality of one or all of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand. Note that this includes the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal. In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits).	手指骨骨骺异常	一个或所有手指指骨的骨骺异常。注意这包括第一掌骨的骨骺。与第二至五掌骨不同，第一掌骨胚胎学上来源于指骨，相当于食指至小指近端指骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它手指的中间指骨） 。

HP:0006145	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Central Y-shaped metacarpal	A central Y-shaped metacarpal is the result of a partial fusion of two central metacarpals (i.e., metacarpals 2-4) of the hand, with the two arms of the Y pointing in the distal direction. Central Y-shaped metacarpals may be seen as a result of a central polydactyly with partial fusion of the duplicated metacarpal.	中央Y形掌骨	中央Y形掌骨是人手的两个中央掌骨（即，掌骨2-4）部分融合，Y形的两个臂向远方伸展。中央Y形掌骨可以被看作是一个中央多趾合并重复的掌骨部分融合。
HP:0006146	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad metacarpal epiphyses	Increased side-to-side width of the metacarpal epiphyses.	掌骨骨骺变宽	掌骨骨骺一侧到另一侧的宽度增加。
HP:0006147	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Progressive fusion 2nd-5th pip joints	#####	进行性第2-5指间关节融合	#####
HP:0006149	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Increased laxity of fingers	#####	手指过度松弛	#####
HP:0006150	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Swan neck-like deformities of the fingers	A swan neck deformity describes a finger with a hyperextended PIP joint and a flexed DIP joint. The most common cause for a swan neck-like deformity is a disruption of the end of the extensor tendon. Conditions that loosen the PIP joint and allow it to hyperextend, for example conditions that weaken the volar plate, can produce a swan neck deformity of the finger. One example is rheumatoid arthritis. Another cause are conditions that tighten up the small (intrinsic) muscles of the hand and fingers, for example hand trauma or nerve disorders, such as cerebral palsy, Parkinson&#39;s disease, or stroke.	手指的天鹅颈样变形	天鹅颈样变形指手指PIP关节过度伸展和DIP关节弯曲。导致天鹅颈状变形最常见的原因是伸肌肌腱末端的损坏。PIP关节松弛使手指能够过伸，例如削弱掌板力量的因素都能可产生手指的天鹅颈变形。类风湿性关节炎就是一个例子。另一个原因是手和手指的小（内收）肌群挛缩，例如手外伤或神经疾病（如脑性麻痹、帕金森氏病或中风）。
HP:0006152	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Proximal symphalangism (hands)	The term proximal symphalangism refers to a bony fusion of the middle and proximal phalanges of the digits of the hand, in other words the proximal interphalangeal joint (PIJ) is missing which can be seen either on x-rays or as an absence of the proximal interphalangeal finger creases.	近端指间关节粘连	术语近侧指间关节粘连指手指中间和近端指骨的骨融合，即近端指间关节（PIJ）缺失，可以通过X射线检查看到缺乏近端的指间手指折痕。

HP:0006155	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Long phalanx of finger	Increased length of multiple or a single `phalanx of finger` (FMA:23914).	指指骨长	多个或单个`手指指骨 `（FMA:23914）的长度增加。

HP:0006193	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Thimble-shaped middle phalanges of hand	The `middle phalanx of finger` (FMA:75817) resembles a thimble, a small metal cap to protect the finger while sewing that has a broad (proximal) base and narrower top, whereby both base and top are flat.	手指顶中间指骨呈顶针形	手指中节指骨像顶针（缝纫时使用的一种小金属杯状物，它的开口较宽，顶部较窄，套在手指上用来保护手指，将针顶穿所缝制的物件）形状，而正常指骨的两端（底部和顶部）都是平的。

HP:0006554	消化系统异常	Acute hepatic failure	Hepatic failure refers to the inability of the liver to perform its normal synthetic and metabolic functions, which can result in coagulopathy and alteration in the mental status of a previously healthy individual. Hepatic failure is defined as acute if there is onset of encephalopathy within 8 weeks of the onset of symptoms in a patient with a previously healthy liver.	急性肝功能衰竭	肝功能衰竭是指肝脏无法行使其正常的合成和代谢功能，这将导致凝血病和正常个体的精神状态的改变。若原先肝脏为正常的病人在肝功能衰竭症状发生8周内脑病发作，则为急性肝功能衰竭。

HP:0006579	消化系统异常,体壁的异常	Prolonged neonatal jaundice	Neonatal jaundice refers to a yellowing of the skin and other tissues of a newborn infant as a result of increased concentrations of bilirubin in the blood. Neonatal jaundice affects over half of all newborns to some extent in the first week of life. Prolonged neonatal jaundice is said to be present if the jaundice persists for longer than 14 days in term infants and 21 days in preterm infants.	新生儿黄疸期延长	新生儿黄疸是指新生儿由于血液中胆红素浓度升高而在皮肤或其他组织中出现黄染。新生儿黄疸影响超过一半的一周龄新生儿。如果黄疸在足月儿持续超过14天或在早产儿持续超过21天，则为新生儿黄疸期延长。

HP:0006585	骨骼系统异常	Congenital pseudarthrosis of the clavicle	The two portions of the clavicle (corresponding to the two primary ossification centers of the clavicle) are connected by a fibrous bridge that is contiguous with the periosteum, and a synovial membrane develops, resulting in a clavicle with a  bipartite appearance radiographically. Congenital pseudarthrosis of the clavicle generally presents as a painless mass or swelling over the clavicle.	先天性锁骨假关节病	锁骨（对应于锁骨的两个主骨化中心）的两部分都通过一个纤维桥邻接与骨膜相连，和一个滑膜发展，导致与二分外观X线一个锁骨。锁骨先天性假关节一般表现为无痛性肿块或肿胀锁骨。
HP:0006587	骨骼系统异常	Straight clavicles	An abnormally straight configuration of the clavicle, a tubular bone which normally is doubly curved .	锁骨平直	锁骨的异常平直外形，锁骨是管状骨，通常应是双弯曲的。

HP:0006610	乳房异常	Wide intermamillary distance	A larger than usual distance between the left and right nipple.	乳头间距宽	左右乳头之间距离比通常远。
HP:0006611	骨骼系统异常	Decreased number of sternal ossification centers	A less than normal number of sternal ossification centers. The sternum is initially formed from bilateral sternal plates that chondrify and begin to fuse with ribs at 10 weeks gestational age. Ossification starts in the manubrium and upper part of the sternal body at the 6th month, in the middle of the sternal body at the 7th month, in the lower part of the body during the 1st postnatal year and in the xiphoid process between years 5 and 18. The number of ossification centers vary up to six, and it is the ossification centers that are visualized by prenatal ultrasound. This term describes a reduction in the number of ossification centers compared with age-related norms.	胸骨骨化中心数量减少	不到正常数量的胸骨骨化中心。胸骨开始从双边胸骨板软骨化，并在10周胎龄时开始与肋骨融合。骨化第6个月在胸骨柄与胸骨体上部开始，第7个月进行到胸骨体中间，出生一年后到胸骨体下部，5-18年后到见图。骨化中心的数量不等，小于六个，通过超声可见。这一属于描述骨化中心较年龄调整规范的下降。

HP:0006677	心血管系统异常	Prolonged QRS complex	Increased time for the complex comprised of the Q wave, R wave, and S wave as measured by the electrocardiogram (EKG).. In adults, normal values are 0.06 - 0.10 sec.	QRS波群延长	由心电图（EKG）测量所得的由Q波，R波和S波组成的复合波的时间过长，成年人的正常的数值是0.06 - 0.10秒。
HP:0006679	心血管系统异常	Granulomatous coronary arteritis	Inflammation of the coronary arteries involving a granulomatous response, i.e., a non-specific inflammatory response involving granulomas, defined as a compact organized collection of mature mononuclear phagocytes including epithelioid and giant cells.	肉芽肿性冠状动脉炎	涉及肉芽肿反应的冠状动脉炎症，即涉及肉芽肿的非特异性炎症反应，肉芽肿定义为包括上皮状的细胞和巨细胞的成熟单核吞噬细胞紧凑有机聚集。
HP:0006681	心血管系统异常	Absent atrioventricular node	Absence of atrioventricular node，which is a small nodular mass of specialized muscle fibers located in the interatrial septum near the opening of the coronary sinus. It gives rise to the atrioventricular bundle of the conduction system of the heart. a section of nodal tissue that lies on the right side of the partition that divides the atria, near the bottom of the right atrium.	房室结缺失	房室结是一小块结节性特化肌纤维，位于房间隔内，靠近冠状窦开口处，其功能是将心脏传导系统的冲动传给房室束。它的缺失即房室结缺失。
HP:0006682	心血管系统异常	Ventricular extrasystoles	Ventricular extrasystoles or premature ventricular contractions (PVC) are premature contractions of the heart that arise in response to an impulse in the ventricles rather than the normal impulse from the sinoatrial (SA) node.	室性期外收缩	室性期外收缩或室性早搏（PVC）是心脏响应了一个心室脉冲而不是从窦房（SA）结的正常脉冲从而提前收缩。

HP:0006988	神经系统异常	Alobar holoprosencephaly	A type of holoprosencephaly characterized by the presence of a single ventricle and no separation of the cerebral hemisphere. The single midline ventricle is often greatly enlarged.	无脑叶畸形	一种无脑叶畸形，其特征为单个脑室和大脑半球无分离的存在。单一中线脑室往往明显扩大。
HP:0006989	神经系统异常	Dysplastic corpus callosum	Dysplasia and dysgenesis of the corpus callosum are nonspecific descriptions that imply defective development of the corpus callosum. The term dysplasia is applied when the morphology of the corpus callosum is altered as a congenital trait. For instance, the corpus callosum may be hump-shaped, kinked, or a striped corpus callosum that lacks an anatomically distinct genu and splenium.	胼胝体发育不全	胼胝体发育不全是胼胝体发育不良的非特异性描述。胼胝体的形态为先天性因素所致时使用此术语。例如，胼胝体可以是驼峰形的，弯曲的，或有条纹但缺乏解剖学上截然不同的膝部和压部。
HP:0006990	神经系统异常	Myelin-dependent gliosis	A type of gliosis that occurs in the vicinity of injured neurons.	髓鞘相关胶质细胞增生	受损神经元附近的胶质增生。

HP:0007002	神经系统异常	Motor axonal neuropathy	Progressive impairment of function of motor axons with muscle weakness, atrophy, and cramps. The deficits are length-dependent, meaning that muscles innervated by the longest nerves are affected first, so that for instance the arms are affected at a later age than the onset of deficits involving the lower leg.	运动轴索性神经病	进行性运动轴索功能障碍伴有肌无力、肌萎缩和痉挛。这种障碍是长度依赖性的，这意味着由最长的神经支配的肌肉首先受累，比如上肢的受累要晚于下肢。

HP:0007018	神经系统异常	Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder	Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) manifests at age 2-3 years or by first grade at the latest. The main symptoms are distractibility, impulsivity, hyperactivity, and often trouble organizing tasks and projects, difficulty going to sleep, and social problems from being aggressive, loud, or impatient.	注意力缺陷多动障碍	注意缺陷多动障碍（ADHD）临床表现出现在2 - 3岁，最晚出现在一年级。主要症状是注意力涣散、冲动、多动、经常扰乱组织任务和项目、难以入睡，并且由于其进攻性、嘈乱、或耐心不足导致社会问题。

HP:0007024	神经系统异常,消化系统异常,声音异常	Pseudobulbar paralysis	Bilateral impairment of the function of the cranial nerves 9-12, which control musculature involved in eating, swallowing, and speech. Pseudobulbar paralysis is characterized clinically by dysarthria, dysphonia, and dysphagia with bifacial paralysis, and may be accompanied by `Pseudobulbar behavioral symptoms` (HP:0002193) such as enforced crying and laughing.	假性球麻痹	第9-12对颅神经控制与进食、吞咽、讲话相关的肌肉，双侧受损时表现为假性球麻痹。假性球麻痹以构音障碍、发音困难、吞咽困难伴双侧面瘫为临床特征，可能伴有强哭强笑等“假性球麻痹性行为症状”。

HP:0007165	神经系统异常	Periventricular gray matter heterotopia	A form of gray matter heterotopia were the mislocalized gray matter is typically located periventricularly, also sometimes called subependymal heterotopia. Periventricular means beside the ventricles. This is by far the most common location for heterotopia. Subependymal heterotopia present in a wide array of variations. There can be a small single node or a large number of nodes, can exist on either or both sides of the brain at any point along the higher ventricle margins, can be small or large, single or multiple, and can form a small node or a large wavy or curved mass.	脑室周围灰质异位	灰质异位的一种形式是错位的灰质物质通常位于脑室周围，有时也被称为亚底膜异位症。脑室周围是指脑室旁边。这是迄今为止异位症最常见的地方。子宫内膜异位症存在着广泛的变异。可以有一个小的单节点或大量的节点，可以在脑的任一侧或两侧存在于沿着较高脑室边缘的任何点，可以是小的或大的，单个或多个，并且可以形成小节点或一个大的波浪或弯曲的质量。
HP:0007166	神经系统异常	Paroxysmal dyskinesia	Episodic bouts of involuntary movements with dystonic, choreic, ballistic movements, or a combination thereof. There is no loss of consciousness during the attacks.	阵发性运动障碍	不自主运动的发作，表现为肌张力障碍、舞蹈病、芭蕾样动作或以上动作的综合。上述表现是无意识丧失。

HP:0007181	肌肉组织异常	Interosseus muscle atrophy	Atrophy of the interosseus muscles (including the palmar interossei that lie on the anterior aspect of the metacarpals, the dorsal interosseus muscles of the hand, which lie between the intercarpals, the plantar interosseus muscles, which lie underneath the metatarsal bones, and the dorsal interossei, which are located between the metatarsal bones.	骨间肌萎缩	骨间肌肉萎缩（包括位于掌骨前部的掌骨间肌，位于腕骨间的手背部肌束，位于跖骨下方的足底肌间束，和位于跖骨之间的骨间背侧肌）。

This term refers to a localized hyperintensity affecting a particular region of the basal ganglia.	基底节局灶性T2高信号病变	在MRI的T2加权像上，基底节区存在的比通常更亮的信号。这个术语指基底节特定区域的局部高信号。

HP:0007375	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the septum pellucidum	An abnormality of the `septum pellucidum` (FMA:61844), which is a thin, triangular, vertical membrane separating the lateral ventricles of the brain.	透明隔异常	在`透明隔`的异常（FMA:61844），透明隔是个薄的、三角形的、从大脑的侧脑室膜分离出的垂直的膜。
HP:0007376	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the choroid plexus	An abnormality of the `choroid plexus` (FMA:61934), which is the area in the cerebral ventricles in which cerebrospinal fluid is produced by modified ependymal cells.	脉络丛异常	`脉络从`（FMA:61934）的异常。脉络丛是在脑室中产生脑脊液的部分，脑脊液由其中的室管膜细胞产生。
HP:0007377	神经系统异常	Abnormality of somatosensory evoked potentials	An abnormality of somatosensory evoked potentials (SSEP), i.e., of the electrical signals of sensation going from the body to the brain in response to a defined stimulus. Recording electrodes are placed over the scalp, spine, and peripheral nerves proximal to the stimulation site. Clinical studies generally use electrical stimulation of peripheral nerves to elicit potentials. SSEP testing determines whether peripheral sensory nerves are able to transmit sensory information like pain, temperature, and touch to the brain. Abnormal SSEPs can result from dysfunction at the level of the peripheral nerve, plexus, spinal root, spinal cord, brain stem, thalamocortical projections, or primary somatosensory cortex.	体感诱发电位异常	异常的体感诱发电位（SSEP），即躯体对特定刺激产生的传递到脑的电信号。记录电极放置在头皮、脊柱、和外周神经刺激部位的近端。临床研究一般采用外周神经电刺激引出电位波形。SSEP检测可以确定外周感觉神经是否能够向大脑传递感觉信息如疼痛、温度和触觉。SSEPs异常可定位于不同水平，如外周神经、神经丛、神经根、脊髓、脑干、丘脑皮层投射，或初级躯体感觉皮层。

HP:0007475	体壁的异常	Congenital bullous ichthyosiform erythroderma	An ichthyosiform abnormality of the skin that presents at birth or shortly thereafter with generalized, erythema, blistering, erosions, and peeling. In the subsequent months, erythema and blistering improves but patients go on to develop hyperkeratotic scaling that is especially prominent along the joint flexures, neck, hands and feet.	先天性大疱性鱼鳞病样红皮病	一种鱼鳞病样皮肤发育不良，表现为在出生时或出生后不久出现的广泛分布的红斑、水疱、糜烂和脱皮。在随后的几个月，红斑和水泡改善，但同时会出现角化过度性鳞屑，尤其是关节屈曲部位、颈部以及手足部位。

HP:0007479	体壁的异常	Congenital nonbullous ichthyosiform erythroderma	The term collodion baby applies to newborns who appear to have an extra layer of skin (known as a collodion membrane) that has a collodion-like quality. It is a descriptive term, not a specific diagnosis or disorder (as such, it is a syndrome). Affected babies are born in a collodion membrane, a shiny waxy outer layer to the skin. This is shed 10-14 days after birth, revealing the main symptom of the disease, extensive scaling of the skin caused by hyperkeratosis. With increasing age, the scaling tends to be concentrated around joints in areas such as the groin, the armpits, the inside of the elbow and the neck. The scales often tile the skin and may resemble fish scales.	鱼鳞病样红皮病(大疱型)、大疱性鱼鳞病样角化过度症、显性遗传性先天性鱼鳞病、表皮松解性角化过度鱼鳞病	火棉胶样婴儿指新生儿皮肤表层附着类火胶棉样物质（称火胶棉层），这只是一个描述性术语（如综合征），而非特异性的诊断或疾病。患儿出生时皮肤呈光泽蜡质外观，出生后10-14天皮肤表层大面积角化过度并发生脱落，是该病的一个特征。随着生长，皮肤脱屑主要发生在关节周围区域，如腹股沟、腋窝、肘窝、颈部。鳞屑如瓦片状覆盖皮肤，似鱼鳞样外观。

HP:0007570	体壁的异常	Hyperkeratosis lenticularis perstans	Hyperkeratosis lenticularis perstans (HLP), also known as Flegel disease, is a keratinization abnormality characterized by small, asymptomatic erythematous papules that leave characteristic punctate bleeding when they become detached. The lesions generally occur symmetrically along the top of the foot and on the legs, appearing more rarely on the arms, forearms, palms, and soles, and even on the oral mucosa.	持久性豆状角化过度病	持久性豆状角化过度病（HLP），又名Flegel病，是一种角化不良性疾病，主要特征为针头大小的红色丘疹，刮除表面可见点状出血，不伴其他症状。皮疹一般对称性发生在足背和小腿，较罕见于上肢、前肢和掌跖部位，口腔黏膜更少见。

HP:0007802	眼部异常	Granular corneal dystrophy	The presence of central, fine, whitish granular lesions in the stroma of the cornea. This type of corneal dystrophy is usually asymptomatic and begins in childhood and shows a slow progression. Later in the course, the corneal epithelium and Bowman&#39;s layer may be affected. Histologically, the cornea shows a uniform deposition of hyaline material.	颗粒状角膜营养不良	角膜的基质中央出现细小、白浊、粒状病变。这种类型的角膜营养不良通常是无症状的，开始于儿童期，进展缓慢。随着病变进展，角膜上皮和Bowman层可能被累及。组织学上，角膜出现透明质的均匀沉积。

HP:0007863		Retinal lesions	Retinal lesions can occur due to multiple reasons for example as a result of decreased blood supply to the retina, angiomas in case of von Hipple-Lindau disease, disseminated bacterial and candidal infections, astrocytic hamartomas (so called phakomas) and many more.	视网膜病变	视网膜病变，可能会发生由于多种原因，例如，作为降低血供应到视网膜的结果，小柳原田综合征，弥散性细菌和念珠菌感染，星形细胞错构瘤（所谓phakomas）等。

HP:0007873	眼部异常	Abnormally prominent line of Schwalbe	Abnormally prominent line of Schwalbe	Schwalbe异常线	Schwalbe线的异常突出。
HP:0007874	头部和颈部的异常	Almond-shaped palpebral fissure	A shape created by an acute downward arching of the upper eyelid and upward arching of the lower eyelid, toward the medial canthus, which gives the outline of the palpebral fissures the configuration of an almond. Thus, the maximum distance between the fissures is offset from, and medial to, the center point.	杏仁状睑裂	上眼睑呈向下的拱形，下眼睑呈向上的拱形，偏向内侧眼角，这使眼睑的裂开轮廓呈一种杏仁形状。因此，裂缝间的最大距离是从中心点偏移至靠内侧。

The main purpose of the RPE is to insulate and support the overlying neural retina.	视网膜色素上皮细胞的异常	在视网膜色素上皮的异常（FMA:58627）。大多数视网膜病变的色素异常多发生在RPE中（这是着色的），而不是在视网膜（即透明）。视网膜色素上皮的主要目的是为了给神经视网膜提供屏障和营养。

HP:0008321	血液和造血组织异常	Reduced factor X activity	Reduced activity of `coagulation factor X` (PR:000007294). The extrinsic and intrinsic pathways converge at factor X (fX). The extrinsic pathway activates fX by means of d factor VII with its cofactor, tissue factor. The intrinsic pathway activates fX by means of the tenase complex (Ca2+ and factors VIIIa, IXa and X) on the surface of activated platelets. Factor Xa in turn activates prothrombin (factor II) to thrombin (factor IIa).	#####	`凝血因子X`（PR:000007294）的活性下降。外源和内源途径在凝血因子X（FX）会合。外源性途径通过D- VII因子及其辅因子（组织因子）激活X因子。内源途径由活化的血小板的表面上的tenase复合物（Ca 2+和VIIIa，Ⅸa和X因子）的共同作用激活X因子。 Xa因子此后激活凝血酶原（II因子）生成凝血酶（IIa因子）。

HP:0008629	耳部异常	Pulsatile tinnitus	Pulsatile tinnitus is generally classified a kind of objective tinnitus, meaning that it is not only audible to the patient but also to the examiner on auscultation of the auditory canal and/or of surrounding structures with use of an auscultation tube or stethoscope. Usually, pulsatile tinnitus is heard as a lower pitched thumping or booming, a rougher blowing sound which is coincidental with respiration, or as a clicking, higher pitched rhythmic sensation. Pulsatile tinnitus may be associated with vascular abnormalities such as arterioevenous shunts or glomus tumors or the jugular vein, arterial bruits related to a high-riding carotid artery (close to the auditory areas) or carotid stenosis, or venous abnormalities such as a dehiscent jugular bulb or to hypertension. Finally, in some patients, mechanical abnormalities such a spatulous eustachian tubes, palatomyoclonus (small spasms of muscles in the soft palate area), or idiopathic stapedial muscle spasm may represent the underlying cause of pulsatile tinnitus.	搏动性耳鸣	搏动性耳鸣通常被分类为客观性耳鸣，意味着不仅是病人可听及耳鸣声音，检查者应用听诊管或听诊器对耳道和/或其周围结构进行听诊时亦可听及。搏动性耳鸣一般为低的重击声或者隆隆声，粗糙的与呼吸一致的吹风声，或者为较高音调的有节奏感的敲击声。搏动性耳鸣可能与血管异常相关，如动静脉分流、颈静脉球体瘤，高位颈动脉（近听觉区域）相关的动脉杂音或颈动脉狭窄，或静脉异常如颈静脉球开裂或高血压。最后，在一些患者中，机械异常如咽鼓管扩张、腭肌阵挛（软腭区域肌肉小痉挛）或特发性镫骨肌痉挛也可能是搏动性耳鸣的根本原因。

HP:0008846	生长异常	Severe intrauterine growth retardation	Intrauterine growth retardation that is 4 or more standard deviations below average, corrected for sex and gestational age.	严重的胎儿宫内发育迟缓	胎儿宫内发育迟缓程度低于同性别同胎龄平均水平超过4个标准差。
HP:0008848	生长异常	Moderately short stature	A moderate degree of short stature, more than -3 SD but not more than -4 SD from mean corrected for age and sex.	中度身材矮小	中等程度身材矮小，身高位于同年龄同性别平均身高下负3-4标准差之间。
HP:0008850	生长异常	Severe postnatal growth retardation	Severely slow or limited growth after birth, being four standard deviations or more below age- and sex-related norms.	严重的产后生长发育迟缓	严重的产后生长迟缓或受限，位于同年龄同性别标准下超过负4标准差。
HP:0008855	生长异常	Moderate postnatal growth retardation	A moderate degree of slow or limited growth after birth, being between three and four standard deviations below age- and sex-related norms.	中度产后发育迟缓	中等程度的产后生长迟缓或受限，位于同年龄同性别标准下负3-4标准差之间。
HP:0008857	生长异常,骨骼系统异常	Neonatal short-trunk short stature	A type of `disproportionate short stature` (HP:0003498) characterized by a short trunk but a average-sized limbs with congenital onset recognizable at birth.	新生儿短小躯干	一种&#39;不相称的短躯干`（HP:0003498），特点是短躯干，但有中等大小的四肢，出生时可识别的先天性发病。

HP:0008872	消化系统异常	Feeding difficulties in infancy	Impaired feeding performance of an infant as manifested by difficulties such as weak and ineffective sucking, brief bursts of sucking, and falling asleep during sucking. There may be difficulties with chewing or maintaining attention.	婴儿期喂养困难	婴儿喂养行为受损，表现为弱的或无效吮吸、短暂吮吸及吮吸时睡着等。咀嚼或维持注意力上也可能存在困难。
HP:0008873	生长异常	Disproportionate short-limb short stature	A type of "disproportionate short stature" (HP:0003498) characterized by a short trunk but a average-sized limbs with congenital onset recognizable at birth.	不相称的短肢矮小	不成比例的身材矮小（HP:0003498）的一种，特点是四肢短小，但躯干尺寸正常。

HP:0009183	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Joint contracture of the 5th finger	Chronic loss of joint motion in the 5th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The term camptodactyly of the 5th finger is used if the distal and/or proximal interphalangeal joints are affected.	小指关节挛缩	关节运动在第五手指的慢性丧失是由于非骨组织的结构变化。如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响则称为第五手指先天性指屈曲。
HP:0009184	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger	Chronic loss of joint motion of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.	小指的远端指间关节挛缩	由于非骨组织结构变化，第五手指远端指间关节的关节运动的慢性丧失。
HP:0009185	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contracture of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger	Proximal interphalangeal (PIP) flexion deformity of the little finger. That is, the PIP joint of a little finger is bent (flexed) and cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.	小手指的近端指间关节挛缩	小指近端指间（PIP）屈曲畸形。即，小指的PIP关节弯曲（挠曲），不能主动或被动地拉直。因此由于肌肉，肌腱，韧带，或皮肤的结构变化阻遏正常运动，发生关节运动的慢性损失，。

HP:0009249	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	#####	无名指的末节指骨骨骺异常	#####
HP:0009250	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger.	无名指的末节指骨骨骺缺失	无名指的末节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
HP:0009251	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	无名指末节指骨括号型骨骺	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端的异常。
HP:0009252	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the ring finger of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	无名指的末节指骨锥形骨骺	无名指的末节指骨无名指中节指骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端出现明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。
HP:0009253	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Enlarged epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	无名指末节指骨骨骺膨大	相对于年龄依赖性标准，第4手指的末节指骨的近端骨骺异常增大。
HP:0009254	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	Fragmented appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger.	无名指末节指骨骨骺碎裂	无名指的末节指骨骨骺碎片样改变。
HP:0009255	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Irregular epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger.	无名指末节指骨不规则骨骺	无名指的末节指骨骨骺放射图像不透明性不规则。
HP:0009256	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the ring finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	无名指末节指骨乳白色骨骺	无名指的末节指骨骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。
HP:0009257	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	第四手指末节指骨假骨骺	假骨骺是与正常骨骺截然不同的二次骨化中心。

HP:0009275	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger	Chronic loss of joint motion of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.	无名指的远端指间关节挛缩	由于非骨组织结构变化导致第四手指的远端指间关节的关节运动的慢性丧失。
HP:0009276	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contracture of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger	Chronic loss of joint motion of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. That is, the PIP joint of a fourth finger is bent (flexed) and cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.	无名指的近端指间关节挛缩	由于在非骨组织结构变化第四手指的近端指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失。即，第四手指的近端指指关节关节弯曲（屈曲），不能被主动或被动地伸直。由于肌肉，肌腱，韧带，或皮肤的结构变化导致关节运动的慢性损失，阻遏正常运动。
HP:0009277	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contracture of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 4th finger	Chronic loss of joint motion of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.	无名指的掌指关节挛缩	由于非骨组织的结构变化导致第四手指的掌指关节的关节运动的慢性丧失。

HP:0009296	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped middle phalanx of the 4th finger	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . This term is used if the middle phalanx of the 4th finger is affected.	子弹形的无名指中节指骨	子弹形指骨是指指骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。如果第四手指的中间指骨受到影响则称为子弹形的无名指中节指骨。

HP:0009306	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the 4th finger	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the 4th (ring) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	无名指三角形末节指骨	无名指（环指）的末节呈三角形。三角指骨是是支架骨骺累及指骨后的典型结果。

HP:0009308	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Symphalangism of middle phalanx of 4th finger	Fusion of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger with another bone.	无名指中节指关节粘连	无名指中节指骨与其他骨融合。
HP:0009309	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 4th finger	Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 4th (ring) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	无名指三角形中节指骨	无名指的中节指骨呈三角形。三角指骨是是支架骨骺累及指骨后的典型结果。

HP:0009311	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger is affected.	子弹形的无名指近节指骨	子弹形指骨是指指骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。如果第四手指的近节指骨受到影响则称为子弹形的无名指近节指骨。
HP:0009312	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defects of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger.	第四手指的近节指骨的溶骨性缺陷	第四手指的近节指骨骨组织的退化或者溶解。
HP:0009313	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of the proximal phalanx of the fourth finger.	第四手指的近节指骨的斑片状硬化	无名指的近节指骨骨密度不均匀的（不规则）增加。
HP:0009314	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Symphalangism affecting the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger with another bone.	无名指的近节指关节粘连	无名指近端指骨与其他骨融合。
HP:0009315	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 4th (ring) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	无名指三角形近节指骨	无名指的近节指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是是支架骨骺累及指骨后的典型结果。
HP:0009316	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the phalanges of the 3rd finger	Abnormality of the phalanges of the 3rd (middle) finger.	中指指骨异常	中指的指骨异常。
HP:0009317	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Deviation of the 3rd finger	Displacement of the 3rd finger from its normal position.	中指偏离	中指从正常位置偏移。
HP:0009318	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 3rd finger	A small/hypoplastic or absent/aplastic 3rd (middle) finger.	中指不发育或发育低下	中指小/发育不全或缺如/不发育。
HP:0009319	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Joint contracture of the 3rd finger	Chronic loss of joint motion in the 3rd finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The term camptodactyly of the 3rd finger is used if the distal and/or proximal interphalangeal joints are affected.	中指关节挛缩	由于中指非骨性组织结构性的改变导致关节慢性功能丧失。如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响则称为先天性指屈曲用于。
HP:0009320	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger	Abnormality of one or all of the epiphyses of the proximal, middle, and distal phalanges of the 3rd finger.	中指骨骺异常	中指的近端、中间和远端指骨的一个或全部骨骺异常。
HP:0009321	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger.	中指中节指骨骨骺缺失	中指中节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
HP:0009322	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bracket epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	中指中节指骨括号型骨骺	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端的异常。
HP:0009323	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	中指中节指骨的锥形骨骺	中指的中节指骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端出现明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。
HP:0009324	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Enlarged epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	中指中节指骨骨骺膨大	相对于年龄依赖性标准，第3手指的中节指骨的近端骨骺异常增大。
HP:0009325	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger	Fragmented appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger.	中指中节指骨骨骺碎裂	中指中节指骨骨骺碎片样改变。

HP:0009327	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	中指中节指骨乳白色骨骺	中指的末节指骨骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。

HP:0009388	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphyses of the 5th finger	Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the 5th finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	小手指乳白色骨骺	小指骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。
HP:0009389	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphyses of the 5th finger	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	第五手指假骺	假骨骺是与正常骨骺截然不同的二次骨化中心。
HP:0009390	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Small epiphyses of the 5th finger	Abnormally small size of the epiphyses of the 5th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	小手指的小骨骺	小手指的骨骺尺寸相对于年龄异常减小。
HP:0009391	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Stippling of the epiphyses of the 5th finger	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of the 5th finger.	小指骨骺点状钙化	小指骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。

HP:0009393	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent epiphyses of the 4th finger	Absence of one or more epiphyses of the 4th finger.	无名指骨骺缺失	无名指的一个或多个骨骺缺失。
HP:0009394	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bracket epiphyses of the 4th finger	Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.	第四手指括号型骨骺	支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端的异常。
HP:0009395	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphyses of the 4th finger	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphyses of the 4th finger of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	无名指的锥形骨骺	无名指具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。

HP:0009405	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped phalanges of the 4th finger	Bullet-shaped phalanges refers to short and wide phalanges that taper distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	子弹形的无名指指骨	子弹形指骨是指指骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。

HP:0009464	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ulnar deviation of the 2nd finger	Displacement of the 2nd (index) finger towards the ulnar side.	食指向尺侧偏斜	食指向尺侧偏斜。
HP:0009465	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ulnar deviation of finger	Bending or curvature of a finger toward the ulnar side (i.e., away from the thumb). The deviation is at the metacarpal-phalangeal joint, and this finding is distinct from clinodactyly.	手指尺侧偏斜	手指向尺侧偏斜（即远离拇指）。偏离发生在掌-指关节，它与指弯曲不同。
HP:0009466	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Radial deviation of finger	Bending or curvature of a finger toward the radial side (i.e., towards the thumb). The deviation is at the metacarpal-phalangeal joint, and this finding is distinct from clinodactyly.	指桡侧偏斜	手指向桡侧偏斜（即向着拇指）。偏离发生在掌-指关节，它与指弯曲不同。

HP:0009490	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphyses of the 2nd finger	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	食指的锥形骨骺	食指具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。

HP:0009552	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the phalanges of the 2nd finger	#####	食指指骨不发育或发育低下	#####
HP:0009553	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Abnormality of the hairline	The hairline refers to the outline of `hair of the head` (FMA:54241). An abnormality of the hairline can refer to an unusually low or high border between areas of the scalp with and without hair or to abnormal projections of scalp hair.	发际线异常	发际线是指头发的轮廓边界。发际线的异常可以指在有无头发生长区域之间的边界不寻常的低或高，也可指头发异常生长。

HP:0009559	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger is affected.	子弹形的食指末节指骨	子弹形指骨是指指骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。如果第2手指的远端指骨受到影响则称为子弹形的食指末节指骨。

HP:0009588	肿瘤,神经系统异常,耳部异常	Vestibular Schwannoma	A vestibular Schwannoma (also known as acoustic neuroma, acoustic neurinoma, or acoustic neurilemoma) is a benign, usually slow-growing tumor that develops from the VIIIth cranial nerve supplying the inner ear.	前庭神经鞘瘤	前庭神经鞘瘤（也称为听神经瘤，听神经鞘瘤，或听神经鞘瘤）是良性的，通常是生长缓慢的肿瘤，起源于支配内耳的第八对颅神经。

HP:0009592	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Astrocytoma	Astrocytoma is a neoplasm of the central nervous system derived from astrocytes. Astrocytes are a type of glial cell, and thus astrocytoma is a subtype of `glioma` (HP:0009733).	星形细胞瘤	星形细胞瘤是从星形胶质细胞分化的一种中枢神经系统肿瘤。星形胶质细胞是一种类型的神经胶质细胞，因而星形细胞瘤是`胶质瘤`（HP:0009733）的亚型。

HP:0009600	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Flexion contracture of thumb	Chronic loss of joint motion in the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The term camptodactyly is used if the distal and/or proximal interphalangeal joints are affected.	拇指屈曲挛缩	由于非骨性组织的结构改变导致拇指关节功能慢性丧失。如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响则称为先天性指屈曲。

HP:0009603	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Deviation/Displacement of the thumb	Displacement of the thumb from its normal position.	拇指偏离/移位	拇指从正常位置的偏斜。
HP:0009606	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of distal phalanx of the thumb	Complete duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb. On x-ray two separate bones appear side to side.	拇指末节指骨的完全重复	拇指末节指骨完全重复。 X射线显示两个独立的指骨分别出现在两侧。
HP:0009608	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of proximal phalanx of the thumb	Complete duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. On x-ray two separate bones appear side to side. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨的完全重复	拇指近节指骨的完全重复。 X射线显示两个独立的指骨分别出现在两侧。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009609	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of the 1st metacarpal	Partail or complete duplication of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	第一掌骨重复	`第一掌骨`部分或者完全重复（FMA:23899）。
HP:0009611	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bifid distal phalanx of the thumb	Partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx) to a partially fused appearance of the two bones.	拇指末节指骨部分重复	拇指末节指骨部分重复。根据不同的严重程度， X射线上可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合）到两个指骨的部分融合不等。
HP:0009612	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Complete or partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones, or two separate bones appearing side to side.	拇指末节指骨重复	拇指末节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，在X射线可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合），两个指骨的部分融合，或两个单独的骨骼分别出现在两侧。
HP:0009613	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Complete or partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones, or two separate bones appearing side to side. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨重复	拇指近节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，在X射线可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合），两个指骨的部分融合，或两个单独的骨骼分别出现在两侧。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009614	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bifid proximal phalanx of the thumb	This term applies if the proximal phalanx of the thumb is partially duplicated. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx) to a partially fused appearance of the two bones. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨不完全重复	该术语用于拇指近节指骨部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，在X射线可表现为在X射线可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合）到两个指骨的部分融合不等。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009615	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of the first metacarpal	Complete duplication of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	第一掌骨完全重复	`第一掌骨`完全重复（FMA:23899）。
HP:0009616	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bifid first metacarpal	Partial duplication of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	第一掌骨部分重复	`第一掌骨`部分重复（FMA:23899）。
HP:0009617	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Any anomaly of the `distal phalanx of thumb` (FMA:23945).	拇指末节指骨异常	拇趾的末节指骨的任何异常。
HP:0009618	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨畸形	跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009622	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Distally placed thumb	Insertion of thumb at a more distal location than normal.	拇指远置	拇指的发出位置比正常位置更远。
HP:0009623	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Proximal placement of thumb	`Proximal mislocalization` (PATO:0002179) of the `thumb` (FMA:24938).	拇指近置	`拇指`（FMA:24938）的`近端错置`（PATO:0002179）。
HP:0009624	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contractures of the carpometacarpal joint of the thumb	Chronic loss of joint motion of the carpometacarpal joint of the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. This joint is formed by the first metacarpal and the trapezial bone and is also called Articulatio carpometacarpalis pollicis, carpometacarpal articulation of thumb, carpometacarpal joint of thumb or first carpometacarpal articulation. Seldom referred to as thumb saddle joint.	拇指腕掌关节挛缩	由于非骨组织的结构变化导致拇指腕掌关节关节运动的慢性损失。腕掌关节由第一掌骨和大多角骨形成，也被称为Articulatio carpometacarpalis pollicis，拇指的腕掌关节，或第一腕掌关节。少部分情况指拇指鞍状关节。
HP:0009625	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contractures of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the thumb	Chronic loss of joint motion of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. This joint is also called Articulatio metacarpophalangealis pollicis.	拇指掌指关节挛缩	由于非骨组织的结构变化导致拇指腕掌关节关节运动的慢性损失。这关节也被称为Articulatio metacarpophalangealis pollicis。
HP:0009626	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contractures of the interphalangeal joint of the thumb	Chronic loss of joint motion of the interphalangeal joint of the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. This joint is also called Articulatio interphalangealis pollicis.	拇指指间关节挛缩	由于非骨组织的结构变化导致拇指腕掌关节关节运动的慢性损失。这关节也被称为Articulatio metacarpophalangealis pollicis。
HP:0009629	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	This term applies if the proximal phalanx of the thumb is either small/hypoplastic or absent. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨不发育或发育低下	该术语用于拇指近节指骨小/发育不全或缺如。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009630	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad proximal phalanx of the thumb	Increased width of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨变宽	拇指近节指骨宽度增加。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009631	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped proximal phalanx of the thumb	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the proximal phalanx of the thumb is affected.	子弹形的近节拇指指骨	子弹形指骨是指指骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。如果拇指近端指骨受到影响则称为子弹形的近节拇指指骨。
HP:0009632	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved proximal phalanx of the thumb	A deviation from the normal straight shape of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指近节指骨弯曲	拇指近节指骨偏离正常直线形分布。
HP:0009633	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defect of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指近节指骨的溶骨性缺陷	拇指近节指骨骨组织的退化或溶解。
HP:0009634	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	An uneven increase in bone density of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指近节指骨的斑片状硬化	拇指的近端指骨骨密度不均匀增加。
HP:0009635	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Synostosis of thumb phalanx	Fusion of a phalanx of the thumb with another bone.	拇指指骨骨性连合	拇指的指骨与其他骨融合。
HP:0009636	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the thumb	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指三角形近节指骨	拇指近节指骨呈三角形。
HP:0009637	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent proximal phalanx of thumb	Absence of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨缺如	拇指近节指骨缺如。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009638	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short proximal phalanx of thumb	Hypoplastic (short) `proximal phalanx of the thumb` (FMA:23918). In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨缩短	`拇指的近节指骨`发育不全（短）（FMA:23918）。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009640	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Synostosis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with the 1st metatcarpal	Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with the 1st metacarpal.	拇指近节指骨与第一掌骨骨性连合	拇指近端指骨与第一掌骨融合。

HP:0009643	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped distal phalanx of the thumb	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the distal phalanx of the thumb is affected.	子弹形的拇指末节趾骨	子弹形指骨是指指骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。如果第四手指的中间指骨受到影响则称为子弹形的拇指末节趾骨。
HP:0009644	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved distal phalanx of the thumb	A deviation from the normal straight shape of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指末节指骨弯曲	拇指的末节指骨偏离正常直线形分布。
HP:0009645	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defect of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指末节指骨溶骨性缺陷	拇指末节指骨骨组织的退化或者溶解。

HP:0009648	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the thumb	Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the thumb. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	拇指三角形末节指骨	拇指末节指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是支架骨骺累及指骨后的典型结果。
HP:0009649	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Absence of the distal/terminal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指末节指骨不发育	拇指远端/终端指骨缺如。
HP:0009650	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short distal phalanx of the thumb	Hypoplastic (short) `distal phalanx of the thumb` (FMA:23945).	拇指远节指骨缩短	`拇指远节指骨`不发育（短）（FMA:23945）。
HP:0009652	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped thumb phalanx	An abnormal morphology of one or more phalanges of the thumb, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	子弹形的脚拇指趾骨	拇指的一个或多个指骨子弹形状是指短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。
HP:0009653	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved thumb phalanx	A deviation from the normal straight shape of a thumb phalanx.	拇指指骨弯曲	拇指的末节指骨偏离正常直线分布。
HP:0009654	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defect of thumb phalanx	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of one or more phalanges of the thumb.	拇指指骨溶骨性缺陷	拇指的一个或多个指骨骨骼组织的变性或者溶解。
HP:0009655	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of thumb phalanx	An uneven increase in bone density of one or more of the phalanges of the thumb.	拇指指骨斑片状硬化	一个或多个拇指的指骨的骨密度不均匀增加。
HP:0009656	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Symphalangism of the thumb	Congenital fusion (ankylosis) of the interphalangeal joint of the thumb.	拇指指关节粘连	拇指指间关节先天性融合（强直）。
HP:0009657	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped thumb phalanx	Abnormal shape of one or more phalanges of the thumb such that affected phalanges resemble a triangle.	拇指三角形指骨	拇指的一个或多个指骨形状异常，使得受累的指骨类似于一个三角形。
HP:0009658	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the phalanges of the thumb	#####	拇指指骨不发育或发育低下	#####

HP:0009660	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short phalanx of the thumb	Hypoplastic (short) `thumb phalanx` (FMA:35477).	拇指指骨缩短	`拇指`发育不全（短）（FMA:35477）。
HP:0009662	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb. This epiphysis is located on the proximal end of the phalanx.	拇指末节指骨骨骺异常	拇指末节指骨骨骺异常，其骨骺位于指骨的近端。
HP:0009663	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	This term applies if the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb, which is located at the proximal end of the phalanx, does not appear in concordance with gender and age dependant norms as seen on x-rays. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺异常	本术语适用于拇指近节指骨骨骺在X光片上出现与性别和年龄依赖性标准不同的形态异常。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009664	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺缺失	拇指近节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009665	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bracket epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	拇指近节指骨括号型骨骺	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端。
HP:0009666	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the thumb of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨的锥形骨骺	拇指中节指骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009667	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Enlarged epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺膨大	相对于年龄依赖性标准，拇指的近节指骨的近端骨骺异常增大。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009668	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb having multiple bony fragments.	拇指近节指骨骨骺碎裂	拇指近节指骨骨骺具有多个骨碎片。
HP:0009669	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Irregular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨不规则骨骺	拇指近节指骨骨骺放射图像不透明度不规则。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009670	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	拇指近节指骨乳白色骨骺	拇指近节指骨骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。
HP:0009671	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	A pseudoepiphysis (which is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis) of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指近节指骨假骺	拇指近节指骨假骨骺是二次骨化中心，跟正常骨骺不同。
HP:0009672	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Small epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.	拇指近节指骨小骨骺	相对于年龄依赖的骨骺的大小标准，拇指近端指骨的近侧相骨骺异常小。
HP:0009673	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Stippling of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺点状钙化	拇指近节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009674	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨三角形骨骺	拇指近节指骨骨骺的呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，几乎是扁平的。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009675	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指末节指骨骨骺缺失	拇指末节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
HP:0009676	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	拇指末节指骨括号型骨骺	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端。
HP:0009677	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	拇指末节指骨锥形骨骺	拇指末节指骨锥形样骨骺，具有“球-窝&#39;样。这样的骨骺位于指骨的近端，接近扁平。与此相联的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指在指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺结合一个假骨骺。
HP:0009678	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Enlarged epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.	拇指末节指骨骨骺膨大	相对于年龄依赖性标准，拇指近节指骨的近端骨骺异常增大。
HP:0009679	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb having multiple bony fragments.	拇指末节指骨骨骺碎裂	拇指末节指骨骨骺具有多个骨碎片。

HP:0009681	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	拇指末节指骨乳白色骨骺	拇指末节指骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。

HP:0009684	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Stippling of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指末节指骨骨骺点状钙化	拇指末节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。

HP:0009686	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent epiphyses of the thumb	Absence of one or more epiphyses of the thumb.	拇指骨骺缺失	拇指的一个或多个指骨骨骺缺失。
HP:0009687	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bracket epiphyses of the thumb	Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.	拇指括号型骨骺	支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端。
HP:0009688	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the thumb	pearance of the epiphyses of the thumb, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	拇指锥形骨骺	拇指具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。

HP:0009700	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Synostosis involving bones of the fingers	An abnormal union between bones or parts of bones of the fingers. The synonymous term &quot;symphalangism of the hand&quot; may be translated as fusions of bones of varying digree, that involve at least one phalangeal bone of the hand. If bony fusions are revered to as &quot;Symphalangism&quot; the fusion occurs in a proximo-distal axis. Fusions of bones of the fingers in a radio-ulnar axis are refered to as &quot;bony&quot; Syndactyly.	手指骨骼的骨性融合	手指的骨骼或部分骨骼之间的不正常连合。同义词“手关节粘连”可被译为不同程度的骨性融合，至少要累及手的一个指骨。如果将骨性融合称为“关节粘连”，融合应该发生在近-远轴。发生在桡-尺轴的手指骨头融合称为并指。
HP:0009701	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Metacarpal synostosis	Fusion involving two or more metacarpal bones (A synostosis of the first metacarpal and the proximal phalanx of the thumb can also be observed, note that the first metacarpal bone corresponds to a proximal phalanx).	掌骨骨性联合	涉及两个或两个以上掌骨融合（也可以观察到第一掌骨和拇指近节指骨的骨性融合，同时注意到第一掌骨与拇指近节指骨相对应）。
HP:0009702	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Carpal synostosis	Synostosis (bony fusion) involving one or more bones of the carpus (scaphoid, lunate, triquetrum, trapezium, trapezoid, capitate, hamate, pisiform).	腕骨骨性融合	骨性愈合（骨性融合）涉及一个或者多个腕骨（舟骨，月骨，三角骨，大多角骨，小多角骨，钩骨，头状骨，豆状骨）。
HP:0009703	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Synostosis involving the 1st metacarpal	Fusion of the 1st metacarpal with another bone. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2 to 5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	第一掌骨的骨性连合	第一掌骨与其他骨融合。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009704	神经系统异常	Chronic CSF lymphocytosis	Chronic cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) lymphocytosis is defined as the finding, in at least two serial CSF examinations, of more than 5 cells per cubic millimeter.	慢性脑脊液淋巴细胞增多	慢性脑脊髓液（CSF）淋巴细胞增多被定义为在至少两次连续的脑脊液检查中，每立方毫米细胞数多于5个。

HP:0009711	肿瘤,神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常,心血管系统异常	Retinal hemangioblastoma	Retinal hemangioblastoma is a benign vascular tumor of the retina without any neoplastic characteristics. They have been called &quot;retinal angiomas&quot; and &quot;retinal hemangiomas&quot; but hemangioblastoma is the preferred term since they are histologically identical to lesions found in the CNS.	视网膜血管母细胞瘤	视网膜血管母细胞瘤是视网膜良性血管瘤，没有任何瘤形成特性。他们被称为“视网膜血管瘤”和“视网膜血管瘤”，但血管母细胞瘤是首选的术语，因为它们在组织学上相同的病变在中枢神经系统中。

HP:0009716	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Subependymal nodules	Small nodular masses which originate in the subependymal region of the lateral ventricles and protrude into the ventricular cavity. They may represent subependymal hamartomas of tuberous sclerosis or nodular heterotopia of grey matter.	室管膜下结节	小结节性肿物发源于侧脑室室管膜下区并突入脑室腔。它们可能代表结节性硬化症的室管膜下错构瘤或灰质的结节样异位。
HP:0009717	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Cortical tubers	Cortical tubers in the brain are hamartomatous lesions typically located at the gray-white matter interface, commonly in the frontal and parietal lobes. Cortical tubers are composed of abnormal glial and neural cells, and the size, number, and location vary among patients.	皮质结节	大脑皮质结节是错构瘤性病变，典型病灶位于灰白质交界区，通常位于额叶和顶叶。皮质结节由异常的神经胶质和神经细胞组成，不同患者中皮质结节的大小，数量，和位置差异很大。
HP:0009718	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Subependymal giant-cell astrocytoma	A demarcated, largely intraventricular tumor in the region of the foramen of Monro composed of spindle to large plump or ganglion-like cells with eosinophilic to amphophilic cytoplasm and somewhat pleomorphic nuclei with occasional prominent nucleoli. These tumors are almost always associated with tuberous sclerosis.	室管膜下巨细胞星形细胞瘤	界限清楚的、主要位于脑室内Moron孔区的肿瘤，主要由纺锤形、大而饱满或神经节细胞样嗜酸性或嗜两性细胞质并且有少许多形核，偶见显著的核仁。这些肿瘤几乎总是与结节性硬化相关。
HP:0009719	体壁的异常	Hypomelanotic macules	Hypomelanotic macules (&quot;ash leaf spots&quot;) are white or lighter patches of skin that may appear anywhere on the body and are caused by a lack of melanin. White ash leaf-shaped macules are considered to be characteristic of tuberous sclerosis.	色素脱失斑	色素脱失斑（“灰叶斑”）是由皮肤色素减退或脱失造成的白色或浅色的斑片，可发生于全身任何部位。灰白树叶形色素脱失斑是结节性硬化症的皮损特征。
HP:0009720	肿瘤,头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Adenoma sebaceum	The presence of a `sebaceous adenoma` (MPATH:230) with origin in the `sebum secreting cells` (CL:000031) of the `skin` (FMA:7163).	皮脂腺腺瘤	存在起源于皮肤皮脂分泌细胞的皮脂腺瘤
HP:0009721	结缔组织异常,体壁的异常	Shagreen patch	A plaque representing a connective-tissue nevus. Connective tissue naevi are uncommon skin lesions that occur when the deeper layers of the skin do not develop correctly or the components of these layers occur in the wrong proportion. Shagreen patches are oval-shaped and nevoid, skin-colored or occasionally pigmented, smooth or crinkled, The word shagreen refers to a type of roughened untanned leather.	鲨鱼皮样斑	结缔组织痣的特征性斑块。结缔组织痣是一种罕见皮损，由深层皮肤的不正常发育或者皮层构成错误比例所致。鲨鱼皮斑呈椭圆形痣样，可表现为正常肤色或偶见色素沉着，表面光滑或有皱纹，鲨鱼皮一词指一种粗糙未经加工的皮革。
HP:0009722	结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Dental enamel pits	The presence of small depressions in the dental enamel.	牙釉质凹陷	牙釉质内存在小的凹陷。

HP:0009734	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Optic glioma	A `glioma` (HP:0009733) originating in the `optic nerve` (FMA:50863) or `optic chiasm` (FMA:62045).	视神经胶质瘤	一种起源于视神经或视交叉的视神经胶质瘤。
HP:0009735	肿瘤,神经系统异常,体壁的异常	Spinal neurofibromas	Neurofibromas originating in the spine.	脊髓神经纤维瘤	脊髓神经纤维瘤起源于脊柱内背侧脊神经根，呈向心性生长时亦可产生软膜下浸润,首发症状最常见者为神经根痛，其次为感觉异常和运动障碍。
HP:0009736	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Tibial pseudoarthrosis	Pseudarthrosis, or &quot;false joint&quot; of the tibia is the result of a developmental failure in the tibia progressing to spontaneous fracture and subsequent fibrous nonunion. The fracture is rarely present at birth but commonly develops during the first 18 months of life.	胫骨假关节	胫骨的“假关节”是胫骨发育进程不足导致的，自发骨折后发生纤维状骨不连的结果。骨折在出生时很少见，但在出生后18个月内发生。
HP:0009737	肿瘤,头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Lisch nodules	The presence of pigmented, oval and dome-shaped raised hamartomatous nevi of the `iris` (FMA:58235)..	Lisch结节	虹膜上的色素性，椭圆形，圆顶形（FMA:58235）的错构瘤痣..

HP:0009740	头部和颈部的异常	aplasia of the parotid gland	Absence of the parotid gland.	腮腺未发育	没有腮腺。
HP:0009741	泌尿生殖系统异常	Nephrosclerosis	Nephrosclerosis refers to thickening or scarring (&quot;sclerosis&quot;) resulting from damage to the renal arterioles, also referred to as arteriosclerosis of the kidney arteries.	肾硬化	肾硬化指肾动脉受损坏所致的肾动脉壁增厚或瘢痕形成（“硬化”），也被称为肾动脉动脉硬化。
HP:0009742	骨骼系统异常	Stiff shoulders	Shoulder joint stiffness is a perceived sensation of tightness in shoulders when attempting to move them after a period of inactivity.	肩部僵硬	肩关节僵硬是一种在一段时间不活动后试图活动肩部时肩膀发紧的感觉。
HP:0009743	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Distichiasis	Double rows of eyelashes.	双行睫	双行睫毛。
HP:0009744	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the spinal dura mater	An abnormality of the spinal dura mater, which is the outermost of the three layers of the meninges surrounding the spinal cord.	脊髓硬膜异常	脊髓硬脊膜即包绕脊髓的三层膜中最外层膜，因各种原因引起的异常。
HP:0009745	神经系统异常	Spinalarachnoid cyst	Presence of arachnoid cysts of the spinal canal extradurally in the epidural space.	脊髓蛛网膜囊肿	位于硬膜外腔的椎管内蛛网膜囊肿。
HP:0009746	头部和颈部的异常	Thick nasal septum	Abnormally increased thickness of the nasal septum.	鼻中隔增厚	鼻中隔异常增厚。
HP:0009747	体壁的异常	Lumbosacral hirsutism	Abnormally increased hair growth in the lumbosacral region.	腰骶部多毛症	腰骶部毛发异常增多。
HP:0009748	耳部异常	Large earlobe	Increased volume of the earlobe, that is, abnormally prominent `ear lobules` (FMA:60984).	大耳垂	耳垂的体积增加，也就是，异常突出的`耳垂（FMA: 60984）。
HP:0009751	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常	aplasia of the pectoralis major muscle	Absence of the pectoralis major muscle.	胸大肌不发育	胸大肌的缺如。
HP:0009752	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Cleft in skull base	A bony defect in the skull base.	颅底裂	颅底骨性缺陷
HP:0009754	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Fibrous syngnathia	Complete or nearly complete soft tissue fusion of the alveolar ridges.	纤维性连颌畸形	牙槽脊完全或接近完全的软组织融合。
HP:0009755	头部和颈部的异常	Ankyloblepharon	Partial fusion of the upper and lower eyelid margins by single or multiple bands of tissue.	睑缘粘连	上下眼睑边缘部分融合成单个或多个带状组织。
HP:0009756	骨骼系统异常,体壁的异常	Popliteal pterygium	A pterygium (or pterygia) occuring in the popliteal region (the back of the knee).	腘翼状胬肉	翼状胬肉发生腘窝区（膝盖背面）。
HP:0009757	骨骼系统异常,体壁的异常	Intercrural pterygium	A pterygium (or pterygia) in the intercrural (groin) region.	腹股沟翼状胬肉	翼状胬肉发生在腹股沟区域。
HP:0009758	体壁的异常	Pyramidal skinfold extending from the base to the top of the nails	Pyramidal skinfold extending from the base to the top of the nails is a rare and distinctive anomaly seen in popliteal pterygia syndrome.	甲近端向远端锥形分布的皮褶	从甲近端向远端呈锥行分布的皮褶是一种具有特异性的罕见症状，见于腘翼状胬肉综合征。
HP:0009759	骨骼系统异常,体壁的异常	Neck pterygia	Pterygia affecting the neck.	颈部翼状胬肉	翼状胬肉影响到颈部。
HP:0009760	骨骼系统异常,体壁的异常	Antecubital pterygium	Pterygium affecting the elbow. This is a cutaneous web that can lead to severe flexion contracture of the elbow joint. Antecubital pterygium can be unilateral, bilateral, symmetric, or asysmmetric.	肘前翼状胬肉	翼状胬肉影响肘部。这是一种可导致肘关节严重屈曲挛缩的皮肤蹼。肘前胬肉可为单侧，双侧，对称性或非对称性。
HP:0009761	骨骼系统异常	Anterior clefting of vertebral bodies	Anterior schisis (cleft or cleavage) of vertebral bodies.	椎体前缘裂隙	椎体前劈裂（裂或裂解）。
HP:0009762	体壁的异常	Facial wrinkling	Excessive wrinkling of the skin of the face.	面部皱褶	面部皮肤皱褶过多。
HP:0009763	神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常	Limb pain	Chronic pain in the limbs with no clear focal etiology.	肢体疼痛	四肢没有明确病灶的慢性疼痛。
HP:0009765	头部和颈部的异常	Low hanging columella	Columella extending inferior to the level of the nasal base, when viewed from the side.	鼻小柱下垂	从侧面观察时，鼻小柱延伸超过鼻基位置。
HP:0009767	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the phalanges of the hand	Small or missing phalangeal bones of the fingers of the hand.	指骨不发育或发育低下	手指的指骨小或者缺如。
HP:0009768	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad phalanges of the hand	Increased width of the phalanges of the hand.	手的指骨变宽	手指骨宽度增加。
HP:0009769	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped phalanges of the hand	The presence of short and wide phalanges which taper distally (&quot;bullet shaped&quot;).	子弹形的手指骨	子弹形指骨是指指骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细。
HP:0009770	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved phalanges of the hand	#####	手指骨弯曲	#####

HP:0009772	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of finger phalanx	Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more of the phalanges of the hand.	手指指骨斑片状硬化	一个或多个手的指骨的骨密度不均匀的（不规则）增加。
HP:0009773	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Symphalangism affecting the phalanges of the hand	Fusion of two or more phalangeal bones of the hand.	手指的指关节粘连	手指的两个或多个指骨的融合。
HP:0009774	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped phalanges of the hand	#####	手指三角形指骨	#####
HP:0009775	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Amniotic constriction ring	Annular constrictions around the digits, limbs, or trunk, occurring congenitally (sometimes causing intrauterine autoamputation) and also associated with a wide variety of disorders. Constrictive amniotic bands are the result of primary amniotic rupture, which can lead to entanglement of fetal tissue (especially limbs) in fibrous amniotic strands.	羊膜带狭窄环	缩窄的羊膜缠绕胎儿手指/脚趾、四肢或躯干，造成先天性缺陷（如宫内截肢）并与多种疾病相关。羊膜束带由部分羊膜脱落，纤维性羊膜带缠绕胎儿组织（尤其是四肢）造成。
HP:0009776	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Adactyly	The absence of all phalanges of all the digits of a limb and the associated soft tissues.	先天性无指	所有手指指骨和相关的软组织都缺如。
HP:0009777	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent thumb	Absent  `thumb`(FMA:24938), i.e., the absence of both phalanges of a thumb and the associated soft tissues.	拇指缺失	`拇指`缺如（FMA:24938），比如，拇指指骨和相关的软组织都缺如。
HP:0009778	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short thumb	Hypoplasia (congenital reduction in size) of the `thumb` (FMA:24938).	短拇指	`拇指`发育不全（先天性缩小）（FMA:24938）。
HP:0009779	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	3-4 toe syndactyly	3-4 toe syndactyly means the fusion of third and fouth toe.	第三、四脚趾并趾	第三、四脚趾并趾是指第三、四脚趾融合。
HP:0009780	骨骼系统异常	Iliac horns	Horn-like malformations of the iliac crests with symmetrical bilateral central posterior iliac processes. A characteristic finding in the Nail-Patella syndrome. Iliac horns are visible on X-ray and may be palpable, but are asymptomatic.	髂骨角	伴随双侧对称性中央后髂发育的髂嵴喇叭状畸形。在指甲-髌骨综合症中的特殊表现。髂骨角在X线上可见，可能触及，但无症状。
HP:0009781	眼部异常	Lester&#39;s sign	A zone of darker pigmentation around the central part of the `iris` (FMA:58235) with a roughly cloverleaf or flower shape.	Lester的标志	呈三叶草或花朵形状:围绕&#39;虹膜`（58235 FMA）中心部分的暗色色素沉着区域。
HP:0009782	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the biceps	Absence or underdevelopment of the biceps muscle.	肱二头肌不发育或发育低下	肱二头肌的不发育或者缺如。

HP:0009784	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the triceps	Absence or underdevelopment of the triceps muscle.	肱三头肌不发育或发育低下	肱三头肌不发育或者缺如。

HP:0009789	消化系统异常,体壁的异常,免疫系统异常	Perianal abscess	The presence of an abscess located around the anus.	肛周脓肿	位于肛门周围的脓肿。
HP:0009790	骨骼系统异常	Hemisacrum (S2-S5)	A hemisacral defect involving the sacral vertebrae S2 to S5.	半骶骨（S2-S5）	半骶骨缺陷累及骶椎S2到S5。

HP:0009792	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Teratoma	The presence of a `teratoma` (MPATH:322).	畸胎瘤	出现畸胎瘤。
HP:0009793	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常,骨骼系统异常	Presacral teratoma	Presence of a teratoma anterior to the sacrum.	骶前畸胎瘤	骶骨前部形成畸胎瘤。
HP:0009794	头部和颈部的异常	Branchial anomaly	Congenital developmental defect arising from the primitive branchial apparatus.	鳃裂异常	源于原始鳃器的先天性发育缺陷。
HP:0009795	头部和颈部的异常	Branchial fistula	A congenital fistula in the neck resulting from incomplete closure of a branchial cleft.	鳃裂瘘管	由鳃裂闭合不完全引起的颈部先天性瘘管。
HP:0009796	头部和颈部的异常	Branchial cyst	A branchial cyst is a remnant of embryonic development resulting from a failure of obliteration of a branchial cleft and consists of a subcutaneous cystic mass. Cysts are located anterior or posterior to the ear or in the submandibular region.	鳃裂囊肿	鳃裂囊肿是由鳃裂闭合不成导致的胚胎发育残余，包括皮下囊性包块。囊肿位于耳朵或颌下区的前后。
HP:0009797	肿瘤,耳部异常	Cholesteatoma	Cholesteatoma is a benign but potentially destructive growth consisting of keratinizing epithelium located in the middle ear and/or mastoid process. In cholesteatoma, a skin cyst grows into the middle ear and mastoid. The cyst is not cancerous but can erode tissue and cause destruction of the ear.	胆脂瘤	胆脂瘤是一种位于中耳和/或乳突区含有角化上皮的良性但又有潜在破坏性生长的疾病。在胆脂瘤中，皮肤呈囊肿样长入中耳和乳突。囊肿不具有癌性，但能侵蚀组织，引起耳朵的破坏。
HP:0009798	内分泌系统异常	Euthyroid goiter	A "goiter" (HP:0000853) that is not associated with functional thyroid abnormalities.	甲状腺功能正常的甲状腺肿	不伴甲状腺功能异常的甲状腺肿大(HP:0000853)。
HP:0009799	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Supernumerary spleens	The presence of two or more accessory spleens.	多脾	两个或两个以上副脾的存在。
HP:0009800	内分泌系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Maternal diabetes	Maternal diabetes can either be a gestational, mostly type 2 diabetes, or a type 1 diabetes. Essential is the resulting maternal hyperglycemia as a non-specific teratogen, imposing the same risk of congenital malformations to pregnant women with both type 1 and type2 diabetes.	母体糖尿病	母体糖尿病是妊娠期的1型或2型糖尿病，2型最常见。本质是母体高血糖症是一种非特异性的致畸因素，对于孕妇来说不管是1型还是2型糖尿病都产生同样的先天性畸形的风险。
HP:0009802	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia of the phalanges of the hand	Absence of one or more of the phalanges of the hand.	手的指骨不发育	手的一个或多个指骨缺如。
HP:0009803	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short phalanx of finger	Short (hypoplastic) `phalanx of finger` (FMA:23914), affecting one or more phalanges.	手指的短指骨	`手指指骨`短（发育不全）（FMA:23914），累及一个或多个指骨。
HP:0009804	头部和颈部的异常	Reduced number of teeth	The presence of a `reduced number` (PATO:0001997) of `teeth` (FMA:12516) as in `Hypodontia` (HP:0000668) or as in `Anodontia` (HP:0000674).	牙齿数量减少	牙齿数量的减少，如缺齿或无齿。
HP:0009805	心血管系统异常	Low-output congestive heart failure	A form of heart failure characterized by reduced cardiac output. This may be seen in patients with heart failure owing to ischemic heart disease, hypertension, cardiomyopathy, and other causes.	低输出型充血性心力衰竭	一种心输出量减少的心力衰竭。可见于缺血性心脏病，高血压，心肌病以及其他原因所致导心衰患者。
HP:0009806	内分泌系统异常	Nephrogenic diabetes insipidus	A form of diabetes insipidus caused by failure of the kidneys to respond to vasopressin (AVP).	肾性尿崩症	尿崩症的一种，由于肾脏无法对血管加压素（AVP）发生反应导致。
HP:0009808	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Anomaly of the upper limb diaphyses	A structural abnormality of a diaphysis of the arm.	上肢骨干异常	手臂骨干的结构异常。
HP:0009809	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of upper limb metaphysis	An anomaly of one or more metaphyses of the arms.	上肢干骺端异常	手臂一个或多个干骺端异常。
HP:0009810	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the joints of the upper limbs	#####	上肢关节异常	#####
HP:0009811	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the elbow	#####	肘部异常	#####
HP:0009812	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Amelia involving the upper limbs	`Amelia` (HP:0009827) of one or both upper limbs.	上肢缺肢	一个或两个上肢的`缺肢`（HP:0009827）。
HP:0009813	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Upper limb phocomelia	Missing or malformed long bones of the upper limbs with the distal parts (the hands) connected to the variably shortened or even absent upper extremity, leading to a flipper-like appearance, as opposed to other forms of limb malformations were either the whole limb is missing (such as amelia), or the distal part of a limb is absent (peromelia).	上肢短肢畸形（海豹肢症）	上肢的长骨缺失或畸形，上肢远端长度不等甚至缺如，外观似海豹肢体，这与其他形式的肢体畸形不同，其他畸形表现为整个肢体缺如（无肢），或肢远端部分缺如（四肢不全）。
HP:0009814	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Upper limb peromelia	`Peromelia` (HP:0009828) affecting only the upper limbs. That is, the distal parts of the arm are missing leading to stump formation.	上肢不全	肢体发育不全只累及上肢。手臂的远端部分缺失形成残肢。
HP:0009815	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/hypoplasia of the extremities	Absence (due to failure to form) or underdevelopment of the extremities.	四肢不发育或发育低下	四肢不发达或者缺如（由于形成失败）。
HP:0009816	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Lower limb undergrowth	Leg shortening because of underdevelopment of one or more bones of the lower extremity.	下肢发育不全	下肢缩短是因为下肢的一个或多个骨骼发育低下。
HP:0009817	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia involving bones of the lower limbs	#####	下肢骨骼不发育	#####
HP:0009818	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Amelia involving the lower limbs	`Amelia` (HP:0009827) of one or both legs.	下肢缺肢	一个或两个腿`缺肢`（HP:0009827）。
HP:0009819	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Lower limb phocomelia	`Phocomelia` (HP:0009829) affecting only the lower limbs.	下肢短肢畸形	`短肢畸形`（HP:0009829）只影响下肢。
HP:0009820	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Lower limb peromelia	`Peromelia` (HP:0009828) affecting only the lower limbs.  That is, the distal parts of the leg are missing leading to stump formation.	下肢发育不全	`发育不全`（HP:0009828）只影响下肢。也就是说，下肢的远端部分缺失导致残端形成。
HP:0009821	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Forearm undergrowth	Forearm shortening because of underdevelopment of one or more bones of the forearm.	前臂发育不良	由于前臂的一个或多个骨骼不发达而造成前臂缩短。
HP:0009822	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia involving forearm bones	#####	前臂骨不发育	#####
HP:0009823	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia involving bones of the upper limbs	#####	上肢骨骼不发育	#####
HP:0009824	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Upper limb undergrowth	Arm shortening because of underdevelopment of one or more bones of the upper extremity.	上肢发育不全	由于上肢的一个或多个骨骼欠发育导致上肢缩短。
HP:0009825	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia involving bones of the extremities	#####	四肢骨不发育	#####
HP:0009826	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Limb undergrowth	Limb shortening because of underdevelopment of one or more bones of the extremities.	肢体发育不全	由于末端的一个或多个骨骼不发达而导致肢体缩短。
HP:0009827	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Amelia	Congenital absence (aplasia) of one or more limbs.	缺肢	一个或多个肢体的先天性缺如（不发育）。
HP:0009828	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Peromelia	The distal parts of the limbs are missing leading to a stump formation.	四肢不全	四肢的远端部分丢失导致残端形成。
HP:0009829	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Phocomelia	Missing or malformed long bones of the extremities with the distal parts (such as hands and/or feet) connected to the variably shortened or even absent extremity, leading to a flipper-like appearance, as opposed to other forms of limb malformations were either the hole limb is missing (such as amelia), or the distal part of a limb is absent (peromelia).	短肢畸形	肢体的长骨缺失或畸形，肢体远端长度不等甚至缺如，外观似海豹肢体，这与其他形式的肢体畸形不同，其他畸形表现为整个肢体缺失（无肢），或肢体远端部分缺如（四肢不全）。
HP:0009830	神经系统异常	Peripheral neuropathy	Peripheral neuropathy is a general term for any disorder of the `peripheral nervous system` (FMA:9903). The main clinical features used to classify peripheral neuropathy are distribution, type (mainly demyelinating versus mainly axonal), duration, and course.	周围神经病	周围神经病是外周神经系统疾病的总称，主要根据其临床特征包括分布、分型（主要累及髓鞘还是轴索）、持续时间、病程而分类的。
HP:0009831	神经系统异常	Mononeuropathy	A focal lesion of a single peripheral nerve. Damage to a sensory nerve is accompanied by sensory impairment of all modalities in the affected anatomic distribution.	单神经病	单一周围神经的局灶病变。损坏感觉神经则伴随受累解剖分布区域所有形式的感觉障碍。
HP:0009832	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the distal phalanx of finger	Any anomaly of `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).	手指末节指骨异常	手指末节指骨的任何异常。
HP:0009833	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the middle phalanges of the hand	An anomaly of `middle phalanx of finger` (FMA:75817).	手中节指骨异常	中节指骨的异常。
HP:0009834	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the proximal phalanges of the hand	#####	手近节指骨异常	#####

HP:0009836	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad distal phalanx of finger	Abnormally wide (broad) `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).	手指末节指骨变宽	`手指远节指骨`（FMA:75818）宽度（宽）异常。

HP:0009843	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the middle phalanges of the hand	#####	手中间指骨不发育或发育低下	#####
HP:0009844	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad middle phalanx of finger	Increased width of the `middle phalanx of finger` (FMA:75817).	手指中节指骨宽	`手指中节指骨`的宽度增加（FMA:75817）。
HP:0009845	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped middle phalanges of the hand	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	子弹形的手指中节指骨	子弹形指骨是指短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。
HP:0009846	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved middle phalanges of the hand	#####	手中节指骨弯曲	#####
HP:0009847	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defects of the middle phalanges of the hand	#####	手中节指骨溶骨缺陷	#####
HP:0009848	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of middle phalanx of finger	Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand.	手中节指骨斑片状硬化	手的一个或更多中间指骨的骨密度不均匀的（不规则）的增加。
HP:0009849	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Symphalangism of middle phalanx of finger	Fusion of a middle phalanx of a finger with another bone.	手指中节指关节粘连	手指中间指骨与其他骨融合。
HP:0009850	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped middle phalanges of the hand	#####	手指三角形中节指骨	#####

HP:0009853	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped proximal phalanges of the hand	#####	子弹形手近端指骨	#####
