HP:0009857	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Symphalangism affecting the proximal phalanges of the hand	#####	手指的近节指关节粘连	#####
HP:0009858	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped proximal phalanges of the hand	#####	手指三角形近端指骨	#####
HP:0009875	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped distal phalanges of the hand	#####	手三角形末节指骨	#####
HP:0009878	神经系统异常	Cerebellar ataxia associated with quadrupedal gait	The presence of cerebellar signs and symptoms such as lack of balance associated with quadrupedal gait (locomotion on all four extremities with a &#39;bear-like&#39; gait with the legs held straight).	小脑性共济失调与四足步态相关	出现小脑的症状和体征，如缺乏平衡与四足步态相关（所有四肢以“熊样”步态运动，腿部保持笔直）。
HP:0009879	神经系统异常	Cortical gyral simplification	An abnormal reduction of the number and complexity of the pattern of gyrations of the cerebral cortex.	皮质脑回简单化	大脑皮层的脑回数目和复杂性异常减少。
HP:0009880	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad distal phalanges of all fingers	Abnormally wide (broad) `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818) of all fingers.	所有手指远端指骨变宽	所有手指的`手指远端指骨`（FMA:75818）宽度（宽）异常。
HP:0009881	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia of the distal phalanges of the hand	#####	手末节指骨的不发育	#####
HP:0009882	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short distal phalanx of finger	Short distance from the end of the finger to the most distal interphalangeal crease or the distal interphalangeal joint flexion point. That is, hypoplasia of one or more of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).	手指短末节指骨	从手指的末端到最远端指间折痕或远端指间关节屈曲点的距离短。即 `一个或多个手指远节指骨`（FMA:75818）发育不全。
HP:0009883	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of the distal phalanx of hand	This term applies if one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	手末节指骨重复	如果手的一个或多个远端指骨部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或裂成两半的外观。
HP:0009884	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Tapered distal phalanges of finger	A reduction in diameter of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818) towards the distal end.	手指的远端指骨逐渐变小	手指末节指骨的直径向远端逐渐减小。
HP:0009886	体壁的异常	Trichorrhexis nodosa	Trichorrhexis nodosa is the formation of nodes along the hair shaft through which breakage readily occurs. It is thus a focal defect in the hair fiber that is characterized by thickening or weak points (nodes) that cause the hair to break off easily. The result is defective, abnormally fragile hair.	结节性脆发症	结节性脆发症是指沿着发干形成的容易断裂的节点。它是一种局限性毛发纤维性疾病，因某些增厚或者薄弱的结节部位较为容易折断，而表现出发育异常的脆发。
HP:0009887	体壁的异常	Abnormality of hair pigmentation	An abnormality of hair pigmentation (color).	毛发着色异常	毛发色素颜色的异常。
HP:0009888	体壁的异常	Abnormality of secondary sexual hair	Abnormality of the growth of secondary sexual hair, which normally ensues during puberty. In males, secondary sexual hair usually comprises body hair, including underarm, abdominal, chest, and pubic hair. In females, secondary sexual hair usually comprises a lesser degree of body hair, most prominently underarm and pubic hair.	第二性征毛发异常	第二性征毛发的异常生长，通常在青春期出现。男性第二性征毛发通常指体毛，包括腋下、腹部、胸部的体毛和阴毛。而女性，第二性征体毛的异常程度较轻，最显著的是腋下和阴毛。
HP:0009889	体壁的异常	Localized hirsutism	Abnormally increased hair growth with a localized distribution.	局部多毛症	局部毛发异常增多。
HP:0009890	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	High anterior hairline	Distance between the hairline (trichion) and the glabella (the most prominent point on the frontal bone above the root of the nose), in the midline, more than two SD above the mean. Alternatively, an apparently increased distance between the hairline and the glabella.	前发际高	在中线处，发际线和眉间（上额骨上方鼻根的最突出点）之间的距离比平均值高两个标准差。也可以理解为发际线和眉间之间的距离显得较宽。
HP:0009891	头部和颈部的异常	Underdeveloped supraorbital ridges	Flatness of the supraorbital portion of the frontal bones.	眶上脊发育不良	额骨眼眶上部扁平。
HP:0009892	耳部异常	Anotia	Complete absence of any auricular structures.	无耳畸形	耳结构完全缺失。
HP:0009893	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常,耳部异常	Telangiectasia of the ear	The presence of `telangiectasia` (MPATH:476) of the `ear` (FMA:52780).	耳毛细血管扩张	“耳”(FMA:52780)部“毛细血管扩张”(MPATH:476)。
HP:0009894	耳部异常	Thickened ears	#####	大耳	#####
HP:0009895	骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	Abnormality of the crus of the helix	An abnormality of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024), which is the horizontal piece of cartilage located outside the ear canal that divides the upper and lower parts of the ear.	耳轮脚异常	耳轮脚的一种异常，在外耳道水平软骨将耳朵分为上下两部。
HP:0009896	耳部异常	Abnormality of the antitragus	An abnormality of the antitragus, which is a small tubercle opposite to the tragus of the ear. The antitragus and the tragus are separated by the intertragic notch.	对耳屏异常	对耳屏异常，是指耳朵上出现一个小的相反的耳屏结节。对耳屏和耳屏是由耳屏间切迹分隔开的。
HP:0009897	骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	Horizontal crus of helix	An abnormal `horizontal` (PATO:0001855) axis orientation of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, the main axis of the crus of the helix is perpendicular to the medial longitudinal axis of the ear, instead of sloping inferoposteriorly.	耳轮脚横向	“耳轮脚”(FMA:61024)呈异常的“横向位轴”(PATO:0001855)，即耳轮脚的主轴垂直于耳朵纵轴，不是倾斜于后下方。
HP:0009898	骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	Underdeveloped crus of the helix	Developmental hypoplasia of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, flatter and/or shorter crus helix than average.	耳轮脚发育不良	“耳轮脚”(FMA:61024)的发育不全，即，较平均水平而言，耳轮脚变平及/或变短。
HP:0009899	骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	Prominent crus of helix	The presence of an abnormally `prominent` (PATO:0001482) of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, development of the crus helix to the same degree as an average antihelix stem or helix.	耳轮脚突出	耳轮脚（FMA:61024）存在异常突出（PATO:0001482），即耳轮脚的发育与对耳轮干或耳轮的平均程度相当。
HP:0009900	耳部异常	Unilateral deafness	A `unilateral` (PATO:0000634) `absence` (PATO:0000462) of `sensory perception of sound` (GO:0007605).	单侧耳聋	“单侧”（PATO: 0000634）“声音感知”（GO: 0007605）的“缺失”（PATO: 0000462）。
HP:0009901	耳部异常	Crumpled ear	Distortion of the course of the normal folds of the ear and the appearance of supernumerary crura and folds.	皱耳	外耳皱褶走向的异常性扭曲及额外皱褶的出现。
HP:0009902	耳部异常	Cleft helix	A `notched` (PATO:0001495) form of the `helix` (FMA:60992) of the ear. That is, a defect in the continuity of the helix, which may occur at any point along its length.	耳轮裂	具有“切迹”（PATO: 0001495）形态的“耳轮”(FMA:60992)。即耳轮在连续性上有缺失，可发生在耳轮全长中的任何一点上。
HP:0009903	头部和颈部的异常	Conjunctival nodule	Presence of nodules in the  `conjunctiva` (FMA:59011) of the eye.	结膜结节	眼睛结膜上发生的结节样变（FMA:59011）。
HP:0009904	耳部异常	Prominent ear helix	Abnormally prominent ear helix.	耳轮突出	耳轮异常突出。

HP:0009906	耳部异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the earlobes	Absence or underdevelopment of the ear lobes.	耳垂发育缺陷/不全	耳垂的缺如或发育不全。
HP:0009907	耳部异常	Attached earlobe	Attachment of the lobe to the side of the face at the lowest point of the lobe without curving upward.	附耳垂	耳垂的最低点与耳垂颜面交接处未形成向上弯曲。
HP:0009908	耳部异常	Anterior creases of earlobe	Sharply demarcated, typically linear and approximately horizontal, indentations in the outer surface of the ear lobe.	耳垂前襞	在凹口耳垂的外表面边界清晰，典型的直线和近似水平线。
HP:0009909	耳部异常	Uplifted earlobe	An abnormal orientation of the earlobes such that they point out- and upward. That is, the lateral surface of ear lobe faces superiorly.	耳垂方向异常	耳垂走向异常性向外上方，使耳垂平面朝向发生改变。
HP:0009910	耳部异常	aplasia of the middle ear ossicles	Absence of the middle ear ossicles, `malleus` (FMA:52753), `incus` (FMA:52752), and `stapes` (FMA:52751).	中耳听小骨发育缺陷	中耳听小骨缺失，中耳听小骨指锤骨，砧骨，镫骨。，
HP:0009911	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the temporal bone	Abnormality of the temporal bone of the skull, which is situated at the sides and base of the skull roughly underlying the region of the face known as the temple.	颞骨异常	颞骨（位于颅骨两侧并延至颅底称为“颞”的面部部位）的异常。
HP:0009912	耳部异常	Abnormality of the tragus	An abnormality of the `tragus` (FMA:60998).	耳屏异常	在`耳屏`上的异常（FMA: 60998）。

HP:0009914	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Cyclopia	Cyclopia is a congenital abnormality in which there is only one eye. That eye is centrally placed in the area normally occupied by the root of the nose.	独眼	独眼是只有一个眼睛的先天性异常。该眼位于正中通常由鼻根占据的区域。
HP:0009915	眼部异常	Corneal asymmetry	The presence of a size difference between the left and right cornea.	角膜不对称	左侧和右侧角膜大小不一。
HP:0009916	眼部异常	Anisocoria	Anisocoria, or unequal pupil size, may represent a benign physiologic variant or a manifestation of disease.	瞳孔不等	瞳孔不等，或瞳孔大小不等，可以是一种良性的生理异形或是一种疾病的表现。
HP:0009917	眼部异常	Persistent pupillary membrane	The presence of remnants of a fetal membrane that persist as strands of tissue crossing the pupil.	瞳孔膜存留	#####
HP:0009918	眼部异常	Ectopia pupillae	A malposition of the `pupil` (FMA:58252) owing to a developmental defect of the iris.	瞳孔异位	#####
HP:0009919	肿瘤,眼部异常	Retinoblastoma	A tumor of the eye originating from cells of the retina.	视网膜母细胞瘤	眼睛的视网膜细胞起源的肿瘤。
HP:0009920	体壁的异常	Nevus of Ota	A macular lesion on the side of the face, involving the conjunctiva and eyelids, as well as the adjacent facial skin, sclera, oculomotor muscles, and perisoteum. Histological features vary from those of a Mongoloian spot to those of a blue nevus.	上腭部褐青色痣、眼皮肤黑素细胞增生病	呈面部一侧的色素性损害，可累及结膜、眼睑以及邻近的皮肤、巩膜、眼球运动肌和鼻口腔的粘膜，组织学特征表现各异，可同蒙古斑到蓝痣不等。
HP:0009921	眼部异常	Duane anomaly	Duane anomaly is a congenital eye movement impairment with limitation of the ability to adduct or abduct the eye. When affected eyes are adducted (moved inwards towards the nose), the eyeball retracts and the palpebral fissure narrows.	Duane 异常	杜安异常是一种遗传性眼球运动障碍，表现为眼球内收受限。当患者的眼睛内收时（向鼻子方向内移），眼球后缩及睑裂变窄。
HP:0009922	眼部异常	Persistence of the hyaloid artery	Persistence of the hyaloid artery, which is the embryonic artery that runs from the optic disk to the posterior lens capsule may persist; the site of attachment may form an opacity. The hyaloid artery is a branch of the ophthalmic artery, and usually regresses completely before birth.	玻璃体动脉永存症	玻璃体动脉持续存在，这是一个从视盘至晶状体后囊的胚胎期动脉，该动脉是眼动脉的分支，通常在出生前完全消退。出生后若存在该动脉，连接部位可能不透明。
HP:0009924	头部和颈部的异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia involving the nose	Underdevelopment or absence of the nose or parts thereof.	鼻发育不全／未发育	发育不全或不存在的鼻子或其部分。
HP:0009926	眼部异常	Increased lacrimation	Abnormally increased lacrimation, that is, excessive tearing (watering eye).	泪液分泌增加	泪液分泌异常增加，即过度流泪（浇水眼）。
HP:0009927	头部和颈部的异常	aplasia of the nose	Complete absence of all nasal structures.	鼻发育不全	完全没有全部鼻结构。
HP:0009928	头部和颈部的异常	Thick nasal alae	Increase in bulk of the ala nasi.	鼻翼增厚	鼻翼的体积明显增加。
HP:0009929	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the columella	An abnormality of the `columella` (FMA:59725).	鼻小柱异常	鼻小柱的异常。
HP:0009930	头部和颈部的异常	Asymmetry of the nares	Asymmetry or size difference between the left and right nostril.	鼻孔不对称	左和右鼻孔之间不对称或大小不同。
HP:0009931	头部和颈部的异常	Enlarged naris	Increased aperture of the `nostril` (FMA:59645).	鼻孔增大	鼻孔变大。
HP:0009932	头部和颈部的异常	Single naris	The presence of only a single `nostril` (FMA:59645).	单鼻孔	只有一个单一的前鼻孔。
HP:0009933	头部和颈部的异常	Narrow naris	Slender, slit-like aperture of the `nostril` (FMA:59645).	鼻孔狭窄	鼻孔开口细窄，像缝隙。
HP:0009934	头部和颈部的异常	Supernumerary naris	The presence of more than two nostrils.	鼻孔多余畸形	多于两个鼻孔的存在。
HP:0009935	头部和颈部的异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the nasal septum	Absence or underdevelopment of the nasal septum.	鼻中隔发育不全／未发育	没有或发育不全的鼻鼻中隔。
HP:0009936	头部和颈部的异常	Narrow nasal septum	Abnormally narrow nasal septum.	鼻中隔狭窄	异常狭窄的鼻中隔。
HP:0009937	体壁的异常	Facial hirsutism	Excess facial hair.	面部多毛症	面部毛发生长过多，超过正常生理范围。
HP:0009938	头部和颈部的异常	Sunken cheeks	Lack or loss of the soft tissues between the zygomata and mandible.	脸颊凹陷	颧骨和颌骨之间的软组织减少或缺失。
HP:0009939	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Mandibular aplasia	Absence of the mandible.	下颌骨发育不全	没有下颌骨。
HP:0009940	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Asymmetry of the mandible	Lack of symmetry between the left and right `mandible` (FMA:52748).	下颌骨不对称	左右下颌骨之间缺乏对称性。
HP:0009941	头部和颈部的异常	Asymmetry of the mouth	The presence of an `asymmetric` (PATO:0000616) `mouth` (FMA:49184).	嘴不对称	有一个不对称的嘴。
HP:0009942	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of thumb phalanx	Complete or partial duplication of the phalanges of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones (bifid), two separate bones appearing side to side, or completely duplicated phalanges (proximal and distal phalanx of the thumb and/or 1st metacarpal). In contrast to the phalanges of the digits 2-5 (proximal, middle and distal), the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指重复	拇指末节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，在X射线可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合），两个指骨的部分融合，或两个单独的骨骼分别出现在两侧，或者完全重复（近端和远端拇指指骨和/或第1掌骨）。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0009943	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of thumb phalanx	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the thumb. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	拇指指骨完全重复	拇指一个或以上指骨完全重复。相对于有不同融合程度的部分骨重复来说，完全重复指X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
HP:0009944	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of thumb phalanx	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the thumb. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	拇指指骨部分重复	部分重复根据病情轻重，可能导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响拇指的一个或多个指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
HP:0009945	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of phalanx of 2nd finger	This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	食指指骨重复	该术语适用于一个或多个的食指指骨的部分重复或者完全重复，部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观。
HP:0009946	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Polydactyly affecting the 2nd finger	#####	第2指多指	#####
HP:0009947	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Partial or complete duplication of the `second proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23919).	食指近节指骨重复	食指近节指骨`的&#39;部分或完全复制（FMA:23919）。
HP:0009948	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Partial or complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946).	食指末节指骨重复	`食指末节指骨`部分或全部重复(FMA:23946)。
HP:0009949	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	Partial or complete duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933).	食指中节指骨重复	食指中节指骨`的&#39;部分或全部重复(FMA:23933)。
HP:0009950	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946).	食指末节指骨的完全重复	`食指末节指骨`完全重复(FMA:23946)。
HP:0009951	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Partial duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	第2指末节指骨部分重复	`第2指末节指骨`部分重复在X光片上显示为一个广泛和/或双裂指骨。
HP:0009952	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	Complete duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933).	食指中节指骨的完全重复	食指中节指骨的&#39;的完全重复。

HP:0009954	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Complete duplication of the `Second proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23919).	食指近节指骨的完全重复	食指近节指骨的&#39;的完全复制（FMA:23919）。
HP:0009955	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Partial duplication of the `Second proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23919), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	第2手指的近节指骨部分重复	`第2指末节指骨`(FMA:23919)部分重复在X光片上显示为一个广泛和/或双裂指骨。
HP:0009956	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd finger	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	第2手指的指骨部分重复	第2手指的指骨部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双裂外观，影响一个第二手指的指骨或更多。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
HP:0009957	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd finger	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, is a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	食指的指骨完全重复	完全重复影响一个或以上食指的指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。

HP:0009994	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger	Partial duplication of the `distal phalanx of little finger` (FMA:23949), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	第5手指末节指骨部分重复	`第5指末节指骨`部分重复，在X光片上显示为一个广泛和/或双裂指骨(FMA:23949)。
HP:0009995	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger	Partial duplication of the `fifth middle phalanx of hand` (FMA:23936), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	第5手指中节指骨部分重复	`第5指中节指骨`部分重复，在X光片上显示为一个广泛和/或双裂指骨(FMA:23936)。
HP:0009996	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	Partial or complete duplication of the `fifth proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23922), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	第五手指近节指骨部分重复	`第5指近节指骨`部分重复，在X光片上显示为一个广泛和/或双裂指骨(FMA:23922)。
HP:0009997	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of phalanx of hand	This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	指骨重复	如果一个或多个手指骨部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或双裂外观。
HP:0009998	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of phalanx of hand	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, is a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	指骨完全重复	手指指骨完全重复累及一个或以上手指指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
HP:0009999	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the phalanx of hand	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	手指骨部分重复	部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响手的一个或多个指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
HP:0010000	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of the proximal phalanges of the hand	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	手近端指骨完全重复	手近端指骨完全重复影响一个或以上手近端指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
HP:0010001	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of the distal phalanges of the hand	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand.	手末节指骨完全重复	手末节指骨完全重复累及一个或更多手远端指骨。
HP:0010002	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Complete duplication of the middle phalanges of the hand	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accessory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a pseudoepiphysis (see corresponding terms) sometimes also referred to as hyperphalangism.	手中节指骨完全重复	手中节指骨完全重复累及一个或以上手中节指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
HP:0010003	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the proximal phalanges of the hand	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	手近节指骨部分重复	部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响手的一个或多个近端指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
HP:0010004	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the distal phalanges of the hand	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	手末节指骨部分重复	部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响手的一个或多个远端指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
HP:0010005	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial duplication of the middle phalanges of the hand	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	手中节指骨部分重复	部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响手的一个或多个中节指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
HP:0010006	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of the proximal phalanx of hand	This term applies if one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	手近节指骨重复	该术语适用于如果一个或多个手近端指骨部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或双裂外观。
HP:0010008	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of the middle phalanx of hand	This term applies if one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	中节指骨重复	手的一个或多个中间指骨发生部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或双裂外观。
HP:0010009	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the 1st metacarpal	A structural anomaly of the first metacarpal.	第一掌骨异常	第一掌骨的结构异常。
HP:0010010	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the 2nd metacarpal	Any abnormal structure or form of the second metacarpal bone.	第二掌骨异常	第二掌骨的结构或形态异常。
HP:0010011	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the 3rd metacarpal	This term means any abnormal structure or form of the third metacarpal bone.	第三掌骨异常	第三掌骨的任何结构或形态异常。
HP:0010012	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the 4th metacarpal	Any abnormal structure or form of the fourth metacarpal bone.	第四掌骨异常	第四掌骨任何结构或形态异常。
HP:0010013	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the 5th metacarpal	Any abnormal structure or form of the firth metacarpal bone.	第五掌骨异常	第五掌骨的任何结构或形态异常。
HP:0010014	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits). The epiphysis of the first metacarpal is localized at the proximal end (as seen in the proximal phalanges of the other digits), whereas the epiphyses of the other metacarpal bones are located at the distal end. This term applies if the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal is in any way abnormal, referring to age and gender depending norms, as seen on x-rays.	第一掌骨骨骺异常	跟第2-5掌骨相比，第一掌胚胎学上来源于指骨，相当于第2-5手指的近端指骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它手指的中间指骨）。第一掌骨骨骺位于掌骨近端（如同其它手指的近端指骨所见），而其他掌骨的骨骺位于远端。本术语适用于X光片上第一掌骨骨骺的任何形态异常，其形态标准因年龄和性别不同而异。
HP:0010015	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	#####	第一掌骨骨骺缺失	#####
HP:0010016	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bracket epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	An epiphysis that curves around from its transverse orientation to a longitudinal one from proximal to distal along one side of the phalanx, thus resembling the letter &#39;C&#39; and forming a bracket around the diaphysis. This results in a so called delta phalanx characterized by a triangular or trapezoidal shaped bone with a C-shaped epiphyseal plate.	第一掌骨括号型骨骺	骨骺曲线围绕指骨，从横向起始到沿着单侧从近端到远端的纵向围绕，类似字母“C”和形成围绕骨干的支架。形成delta指骨，以三角形或梯形形状的骨骼伴C形骺板为特征。
HP:0010017	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance.	第一掌骨锥形骨骺	第一掌骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。
HP:0010018	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Enlarged epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the 1st metacarpal with respect to age-dependent norms.	第一掌骨骨骺膨大	相对于年龄依赖性标准，第一掌骨骨骺异常增大。
HP:0010019	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	Epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal having multiple bony fragments.	第一掌骨骨骺碎裂	第一掌骨骨骺具有多个骨碎片。
HP:0010020	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Irregular epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	Uneven radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal.	第1掌骨不规则骨骺	第1掌骨骨骺影像学不透明度不均匀。
HP:0010021	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	The epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal are hard and dense like ivory. Such an epiphysis has a uniformly dense appearance on radiographs.	第一掌骨乳白色骨骺	第1掌骨骨骺硬而致密，像象牙一样。这样的骨骺在X光片具有均匀高密度。
HP:0010022	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	The epiphysis of the first metacarpal is localized at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone although an accessory epiphysis may be located at the distal end of the metacarpal.	第一掌骨假骺	第一掌骨骨骺在掌骨的近端，尽管额外骨骺可能位于掌骨的远端。
HP:0010023	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Small epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal with respect to age-dependent norms.	第一掌骨小骨骺	相对于年龄依赖性标准，第一掌骨骨骺尺寸异常小。
HP:0010024	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Epiphyseal stippling of the first metacarpal	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	第一掌骨骨骺点状钙化	第一掌骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
HP:0010025	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	#####	第一掌骨三角形骨骺	#####
HP:0010026	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 1st metacarpal	Aplasia or Hypoplasia affecting the 1st metacarpal. In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits).	第一掌骨不发育或发育低下	第一掌骨发育或发育不全。跟第2-5掌骨相比，第一掌骨胚胎学上来源于指骨，相当于第2-5手指的近端指骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它手指的中间指骨） 。
HP:0010027	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad 1st metacarpal	Increased width of the 1st metacarapal. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	第一掌骨变宽	第一掌骨宽度增加。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0010028	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped 1st metacarpal	The presence of short and wide 1st metacarpal which tapers distally (&quot;bullet shaped&quot;).	子弹形的第一掌骨	第一掌骨短而宽并逐渐向远端变小（“子弹形”）。
HP:0010029	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved 1st metacarpal	A deviation from the normal straight shape of the first metacarpal.	第一掌骨弯曲	第一掌骨偏离正常直线形分布。
HP:0010030	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defects of the 1st metacarpal	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the 1st metacarpal.	第一掌骨溶骨性缺陷	第一掌骨骨组织的退化或者溶解。
HP:0010031	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of the 1st metacarpal	Uneven increase in bone density within the 1st metacarpal.	第一掌骨斑片状硬化	第一掌骨骨密度不均匀增加。
HP:0010033	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped 1st metacarpal	This term applies to a triangular shaped 1st metacarpal.	第一掌骨呈三角形	第一掌骨呈三角形。
HP:0010034	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short 1st metacarpal	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	第1掌骨短	跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0010035	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia of the 1st metacarpal	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	第一掌骨不发育	跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
HP:0010036	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 2nd metacarpal	Aplasia or Hypoplasia affecting the 2nd metacarpal.	第二掌骨不发育或发育低下	第二掌骨不发育或发育低下。

HP:0010042	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 4th metacarpal	Aplasia or Hypoplasia affecting the 4th metacarpal.	第四掌骨不发育或发育低下	第四掌骨不发育或发育不全。

HP:0010048	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia of metacarpal bones	Developmental defect associated with absence of one or more metacarpal bones.	掌骨不发育	一个或多个掌骨发育缺陷。
HP:0010049	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short metacarpal	Diminished length of one or more metacarpal bones in relation to the others of the same hand or to the contralateral metacarpal.	短掌骨	相对于相同手的其他掌骨或对侧手的掌骨，一个或多个掌骨的长度减少。
HP:0010051	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Deviation/Displacement of the hallux	Displacement of the `big toe` (FMA:25047) from its normal position.	脚拇脚偏离/移位	&#39;大拇指`（FMA:25047），偏离正常位置。
HP:0010052	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the hallux	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the big toe is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	脚拇趾近节趾骨畸形	跟第2-5近端趾骨相比，拇趾的近端趾骨在胚胎学上相当于其脚趾的中间趾骨，而第一跖骨在胚胎学上源自于趾骨，相当于其它脚趾的近节趾骨。
HP:0010053	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the distal phalanx of the hallux	#####	脚拇趾末节趾骨异常	#####
HP:0010054	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the first metatarsal	An anomaly of the `first metatarsal bone`(FMA:24502).	第一跖骨异常	第一跖骨的异常。
HP:0010055	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad hallux	Visible increase in width of the hallux without an increase in the dorso-ventral dimension.	脚拇趾变宽	拇趾宽度增加而背底尺寸不增加。
HP:0010056	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphyses of the hallux	#####	脚拇趾骨骺异常	#####
HP:0010057	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the phalanges of the hallux	#####	脚拇趾趾骨异常	#####
HP:0010058	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the phalanges of the hallux	#####	脚拇趾趾骨不发育或发育低下	#####
HP:0010059	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad hallux phalanx	An increase in width in one or more phalanges of the big toe.	脚拇趾趾骨变宽	一个或者多个脚拇趾趾骨宽度增加。
HP:0010060	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped hallux phalanx	An abnormal morphology of one or more phalanges of the big toe, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	子弹形的脚拇趾趾骨	子弹形脚拇趾趾骨是指一个或者多个脚拇趾趾骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细异常形态。子弹形趾骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。
HP:0010061	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved hallux phalanx	A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more phalanges of the big toe.	脚拇趾趾骨弯曲	一个或多个脚拇趾趾骨偏离正常的直线形态。
HP:0010062	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the hallux	#####	脚拇趾骨溶骨性缺陷	#####
HP:0010063	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of hallux phalanx	Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more phalanges of the big toe. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	脚拇趾趾骨斑片状硬化	一个或多个脚拇趾趾骨骨密度片状（不规则）增加。在X光片上根据严重程度和分布的不同可以看到多种形式。

HP:0010125	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 1st metatarsal	In contrast to the metatarsals 2-5, the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, whereas the proximal phalanx of the big toe is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits. This term applies to abnormalities of the epiphysis of the first metatarsal bone.	第一跖骨骨骺异常	跟第2-5跖骨相比，第一跖骨胚胎学上来源于趾骨，相当于第2-5趾指的近端趾骨，而拇趾的近端指骨相当于其它趾指的中间趾骨。本术语适用于第一跖骨的骨骺发育异常。
HP:0010126	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the hallux	In contrast to the metatarsals 2-5, the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, whereas the proximal phalanx of the big toe is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits. This term applies to abnormalities affecting the proximal phalanx of the hallux.	脚拇趾近节趾骨骨骺异常	跟第2-5跖骨相比，第一跖骨胚胎学上来源于趾骨，相当于第2-5趾指的近端趾骨，而拇趾的近端指骨相当于其它趾指的中间趾骨。本术语适用于第一跖骨的骨骺发育异常。

HP:0010152	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Enlarged epiphysis of the 1st metatarsal	#####	第一跖骨骨骺膨大	#####

HP:0010154	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Irregular epiphysis of the 1st metatarsal	#####	第一跖骨不规则骨骺	#####
HP:0010155	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphysis of the 1st metatarsal	The epiphysis of the 1st metatarsal are hard and dense like ivory. Such an epiphysis has a uniformly dense appearance on radiographs.	第一跖骨乳白色骨骺	第1跖骨骨骺硬而致密，像象牙一样。这样的骨骺在X光片具有均匀高密度。
HP:0010156	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphysis of the 1st metatarsal	#####	第一跖骨假骺	#####

HP:0010159	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular epiphysis of the 1st metatarsal	#####	第一跖骨三角形骨骺	#####

HP:0010171	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Epiphyseal stippling of toe phalanges	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of phalanges of the fingers.	脚趾骨骨骺点状钙化	点状异常（有斑点，斑点等）钙化的手指指骨骨骺的存在。

HP:0010174	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad phalanx of the toes	Increased width of `phalanx of toe` (FMA:24493) of one or more toes.	脚趾骨粗大	增加的宽度的`toe`的指骨（FMA:24493）的一个或更多个脚趾。
HP:0010175	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped toe phalanx	An abnormal morphology of one or more phalanges of the toes, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	子弹形脚趾骨	的脚趾的一个或多个趾骨，用短而宽指骨其逐渐变细的远侧形态异常。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。
HP:0010176	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved toe phalanx	A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more toe phalanges.	脚趾趾骨弯曲	从一个或多个脚趾趾骨正常的直线形式的偏差。
HP:0010177	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the toes	#####	脚趾趾骨溶骨性缺陷	#####

HP:0010185	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the distal phalanges of the toes	Absence or underdevelopment of the distal phalanges of the toes.	脚趾末节趾骨发育不全或发育低下	缺如或脚趾的远端指骨的不发达。

HP:0010188	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved distal toe phalanx	A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more distal toe phalanges.	脚趾末节趾骨弯曲	从一个或多个远端指骨趾正常直形式的偏差。
HP:0010189	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defects of the distal phalanges of the toes	#####	脚趾末节趾骨溶骨性缺陷	#####
HP:0010190	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of distal toe phalanx	Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more of the distal phalanges of the toes. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	脚趾末节趾骨斑片状硬化	片状（不规则）增加一个或多个脚趾的远端指骨的骨密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。

This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	中节趾趾骨斑片状硬化	片状（不规则）增加一个或多个脚趾的中间指骨的骨密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。

HP:0010203	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia/hypoplasia of proximal toe phalanx	Absence (agenesis) or underdevelopment of one or more of the proximal phalanges of the toes.	脚趾近节趾骨发育不全或发育低下	不存在（发育不全）或者一个脚趾的近端指骨或更多的不发达。
HP:0010204	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad proximal phalanx of toe	An increase in width of one ore more proximal toe phalanges.	脚趾近节趾骨宽大	增加宽度的一个或多个近端趾骨趾。
HP:0010205	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bullet-shaped proximal toe phalanx	An abnormal morphology of one or more of the proximal phalanges of the toes, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	子弹形近节脚趾趾骨	一个脚趾的近端指骨或更多的异常形态，具有短和宽的指骨渐缩远侧。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。
HP:0010206	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Curved proximal toe phalanx	A deviation from the normal straight shape of a proximal phalanx of one or more toes.	脚趾近节趾骨弯曲	从一个或多个脚趾近节指骨的正常直线形状的偏差。
HP:0010207	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteolytic defect of the proximal toe phalanx	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the proximal toe phalanx.	脚趾近节趾骨溶骨性缺陷	近端指骨脚趾骨组织的退化或溶解。
HP:0010208	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of proximal toe phalanx	Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more of the proximal phalanges of the toes. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	脚趾近节趾骨斑片状硬化	脚趾的一个或多个近节指骨骨密度片状（不规则）增加。这可能根据X射线上其严重性和分布许多形式而呈现多种形式。
HP:0010209	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Symphalangism affecting the proximal phalanges of the toes	#####	脚趾近节趾关节粘连	#####
HP:0010210	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular shaped proximal phalanges of the toes	#####	脚趾三角形近节趾骨	#####
HP:0010211	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Duplication of proximal phalanx of toe	Partial/complete duplication of a `proximal phalanx of toe` (FMA:75828).	脚趾近节趾骨重复	`脚趾`近节指骨部分/完全复制（FMA:75828）。
HP:0010212	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Flexion contracture of the hallux	One or more bent (flexed) joints of the first (big) toe that cannot be straightened actively or passively.	拇趾屈曲挛缩	大脚趾一个或多个关节弯曲，不能被主动或被动地伸直关节。
HP:0010213	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contracture of the tarsometatarsal joint of the hallux	Chronic loss of joint motion in the tarsometatarsal joint of the hallux due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The tarsometatarsal joints of the feet are also called Lisfranc&#39;s joints.	脚拇趾跖跗关节挛缩	拇趾的跖跗关节由于非骨组织结构变化的关节运动慢性损失。脚的跗跖关节也叫Lisfranc关节。
HP:0010214	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contracture of the interphalangeal joint of the hallux	The interphalangeal joint of the big toe cannot be straightened actively or passively.	脚拇趾趾间关节挛缩	大脚趾的趾间关节不能主动或被动伸直。
HP:0010215	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Contractures of the metatarsophalangeal joint of the hallux	The joint between the first metatarsal and the proximal phalanx of the first (big) toe cannot be straightened actively or passively.	脚拇趾跖趾关节挛缩	第一跖骨和第一（大）趾的近端指骨之间的关节不能被主动或被动地伸直。
HP:0010219	肢体异常	Structural foot deformity	A foot deformity resulting due to an abnormality affecting the bones of the foot (as well as muscle and soft tissue). In contrast if only the muscle and soft tissue are affected the term positional foot deformity applies.	足结构性畸形	足部变畸形源自于某种影响了足的骨骼（以及肌肉和软组织）的异常。与此相反，如果仅是受肌肉和软组织影响，则使用足的位置性变形这个术语描述。
HP:0010220	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 2nd metacarpal	Any abnormality of the epiphysis of the second metacarpal bone.	第二掌骨骨骺异常	第二掌骨骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010221	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphysis of the 2nd metacarpal	The normal epiphysis of the second metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.	第二掌骨假骺	第二掌骨的正常骨骺位于掌骨的前端。这一术语用于副骨骺（如果存在）位于掌骨近端时。
HP:0010222	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 3rd metacarpal	Any abnormality of the epiphysis of the third metacarpal bone.	第三掌骨骨骺异常	第三掌骨骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010223	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphysis of the 3rd metacarpal	The normal epiphysis of the third metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.	第三掌骨假骺	第三掌骨的正常骨骺位于掌骨的前端。这一术语用于副骨骺（如果存在）位于掌骨近端时。
HP:0010224	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 4th metacarpal	Any abnormality of the epiphysis of the 4th metacarpal bone.	第四掌骨骨骺异常	第四掌骨骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010225	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphysis of the 4th metacarpal	The normal epiphysis of the fourth metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.	第四掌骨假骺	第四掌骨的正常骨骺位于掌骨的前端。这一术语用于副骨骺（如果存在）位于掌骨近端时。
HP:0010226	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 5th metacarpal	Any abnormality of the epiphysis of the fifth metacarpal bone.	第五掌骨骨骺异常	第五掌骨骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010227	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphysis of the 5th metacarpal	The normal epiphysis of the fifth metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.	第五掌骨假骺	第五掌骨的正常骨骺位于掌骨的前端。这一术语用于副骨骺（如果存在）位于掌骨近端时。
HP:0010228	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Absence of one or more epiphyses of the phalanges fingers.	手指骨骨骺缺失	一个或多个手指骨骺缺失。
HP:0010229	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bracket epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.	手指骨括号型骨骺	括号骨骺指其中骨骺包围指骨，具有括号状形态和一个指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
HP:0010230	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphyses of the fingers of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. The related entity angel-shaped epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	手指骨锥形骨骺	手指骨骺呈锥形外观，产生一个“球窝&#39;的外观。在相关的实体&#39;天使形骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺在指骨的前端结合一个假骨骺。
HP:0010231	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Enlarged epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers with respect to age-dependent norms.	指骨骨骺膨大	手指的指骨骨骺的相对于年龄相关的规范尺寸异常大。
HP:0010232	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Fragmentation of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Fragmented appearance of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers.	指骨骨骺碎裂	手指指骨的骨骺呈零散外观。
HP:0010233	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Irregular epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers.	手指骨骨骺不规则	手指的指骨的骨骺在放射线下呈现不透明性。
HP:0010234	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	指骨乳白色骨骺	手指指骨的骨骺硬化，导致X射线下不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）的程度增加。
HP:0010235	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	手指假骨骺	一个假骨骺是与正常骨骺截然不同的次级骨化中心。
HP:0010236	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Small epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Abnormally small size of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers with respect to age-dependent norms.	手指骨小骨骺	相对于年龄依赖性的标准，手指的指骨的骨骺尺寸异常小。
HP:0010237	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Epiphyseal stippling of finger phalanges	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of phalanges of the fingers.	手指骨骨骺点状钙化	手指指骨骨骺存在点状异常（有斑点，斑点等）钙化。
HP:0010238	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Triangular epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	A triangular appearance of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers of the hand.	手指骨三角形骨骺	手指骨的骨骺呈三角形外观。
HP:0010239	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia of the middle phalanx of the hand	Absence of one or more middle phalanx of a finger.	手中节指骨发育不全	手指的一个或多个中间指骨缺如。

HP:0010281	头部和颈部的异常	Cleft lower lip	A gap in the lower lip.	下唇裂	下唇有间隙。
HP:0010282	头部和颈部的异常	Thin lower lip vermilion	Height of the vermilion of the medial part of the lower lip more than 2 SD below the mean. Alternatively, an apparently reduced height of the vermilion of the lower lip in the frontal view (subjective).	薄下唇	下唇中线唇红的高度小于平均值-2SD（标准差），或者，从正面看（主观），下唇唇红的高度明显变短。

HP:0010286	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the salivary glands	Any abnormality of the salivary glands, the exocrine glands that produce saliva.	唾液腺异常	唾液腺的任何异常。唾液腺是产生唾液的外分泌腺。
HP:0010287	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the submandibular glands	Any abnormality of the submandibular glands, which are the salivary glands that are located beneath the floor of the mouth, superior to the digastric muscles.	颌下腺异常	颌下腺的任何异常。颌下腺是唾液腺，位于口腔底部，二腹肌之上。

HP:0010289	头部和颈部的异常	Alveolar ridge cleft	A gap (cleft) affecting one of the alveolar ridges.	牙槽嵴裂	某一牙槽嵴有间隙（裂）。
HP:0010290	头部和颈部的异常	Short hard palate	Distance between the labial point of the incisive papilla to the midline junction of the hard and soft palate more than 2 SD below the mean (objective) or apparently decreased length of the hard palate (subjective).	短硬腭	切牙至软硬腭相交处的距离缩短，小于平均值超过两个标准偏差（客观）；或硬腭长度显得缩短（主观）。
HP:0010291	头部和颈部的异常	Prominent palatine ridges	Increased size and/or number of soft tissue folds on the palatal side of the maxillary alveolar ridge.	腭嵴突出	上颌骨牙槽嵴两侧的软组织体积和/或数量增加。

HP:0010435	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short middle phalanx of the 2nd toe	Reduced length of the `middle phalanx of second toe` (FMA:32623) as a result of developmental hypoplasia.	第二脚趾中节趾骨短缩	因发育不良导致第二脚趾中节趾骨长度变短。
HP:0010436	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd toe	#####	第二脚趾近节趾骨发育不全	#####
HP:0010437	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short proximal phalanx of the 2nd toe	Reduced length of the proximal phalanx of second toe as a result of developmental hypoplasia.	第二脚趾近节趾骨短缩	因发育不全导致第二脚趾近节趾骨长度减短。
HP:0010438	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the ventricular septum	An abnormality of the `interventricular septum` (FMA:7133).	室间隔异常	心脏室间隔的异常（FMA:7133）。
HP:0010440	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ectopic accesory toe-like appendage	In contrast to forms of polydactyly where the supernumerary digit (this can either be a rudimentary or a completely &#39;normal&#39; digit) is either located postaxial (on the fibular side of the foot, next top the little toe), preaxial (on the tibial side of the foot, next to the big toe) or mesoaxial (somewhere central, between big and little toe), a supernumerary digit may also be placed ectopically, meaning anywhere else except post-,meso- or preaxial. In the literature this is sometimes refered to as Disorganisation-like Syndrome (OMIM223200).	异位性脚趾样附属物	多趾畸形具有多种形态，即多余的趾（可以是正常或者退化的趾）既可以是轴后位（足的腓骨侧，靠近小脚趾的顶端），轴前位（足的胫骨侧，靠近大脚趾）或者轴内位（中间的某处，在大脚趾和小脚趾之间）。与此不同，多余的趾也可以是异位的，即除了轴后、前、内位的其他位置。 在文献中被称为杂乱无章样综合征，即Disorganisation-like Syndrome（OMIM223200）。
HP:0010441	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ectopic accesory finger-like appendage	In contrast to forms of polydactyly where the supernumerary digit (this can either be a rudimentary or a completely &#39;normal&#39; digit) is either located postaxial (on the ulnar side of the hand, next to the little finger), preaxial (on the radial side of the hand, next to the thumb) or mesoaxial (somewhere central, between thumb and little finger), a supernumerary digit may also be placed ectopically, meaning anywhere else except post-,meso- or preaxial. In the literature this is sometimes refered to as Disorganisation-like Syndrome (OMIM223200).	异位性手指样附属物	多指畸形具有多种形态，即多余的指（可以是正常或者退化的指）既可以是轴后位（手的尺侧，靠近小指），轴前位（手的桡侧，靠近大拇指）或者轴内位（中间的某处，在大拇指和小指之间）。与此不同，多余的指也可以是异位的，也就是说除了轴后、前、内位的其他位置。 在文献中被称为杂乱无章样综合征，即Disorganisation-like Syndrome（OMIM223200）。
HP:0010442	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Polydactyly	A congenital anomaly characterized by the presence of supernumerary fingers or toes.	多指（趾）畸形	以存在多余的手指或脚趾为特征的先天性畸形。
HP:0010443	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bifid femur	A bifid or bifurcated appearance of the `femur` (FMA:9611) as seen on x-rays, possible appearing as a more or less severe bowing of the upper leg. Might be associated with hip dysplasia on the affected side.	股骨骨裂	X射线上表现为股骨的骨裂或分叉形态（FMA:9611），可能出现大腿或多或少的严重弯曲，该表现可能与患侧髋关节发育不良有关。
HP:0010444	心血管系统异常	Pulmonary insufficiency	Backflow of blood from the pulmonary artery into the right ventricle,owing to imperfect functioning of the pulmonary valve.	肺动脉瓣关闭不全	由于肺动脉瓣功能不全使得在心脏舒张期间血流逆行通过肺动脉瓣进入右心室。
HP:0010445	心血管系统异常	Primum atrial septal defect	Defects in the septum between the atria of the heart, due to failure of fusion between either the septum secundum or the septum primum and the endocardial cushions embryologic time.	原发孔型房间隔缺损	由于在胚胎发育时期心内膜垫与第一房间隔或第二房间隔融合失败所导致的房室间隔缺损。
HP:0010446	心血管系统异常	Tricuspid stenosis	A narrowing of the orifice of the tricuspid valve of the heart.	三尖瓣狭窄	心脏的三尖瓣口变狭窄。
HP:0010447	消化系统异常	Anal fistula	An abnormal connection between the epithelialised surface of the anal canal and the perianal skin.	肛瘘	肛管上皮表面和肛周皮肤之间的异常连接。
HP:0010448	消化系统异常	Colonic atresia	A developmental defect resulting in complete obliteration of the lumen of the colon. That is, there is an abnormal closure, or `atresia` (PATO:0001819) of the tubular structure of the `colon` (FMA:14543).	结肠闭锁	一种导致结肠腔完全消失的发育缺陷。即，结肠的管状结构有一个异常的闭合，或“闭锁”。
HP:0010450	消化系统异常	Esophageal stenosis	An abnormal narrowing of the lumen of the esophagus.	食管狭窄	食管腔的异常变窄。
HP:0010451	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the spleen	Absence or underdevelopment of the `spleen` (FMA:7196).	脾未发育/发育不全	脾的缺失或发育不全。
HP:0010452	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Ectopia of the spleen	An abnormal (non-anatomic) location of the `spleen` (FMA:7196).	脾异位	脾的一种异常（非解剖）定位。
HP:0010453	骨骼系统异常	Pelvic asymmetry	Pelvic asymmetry refers to asymmetric positioning of landmarks on the two sides of the pelvis and may have a structural or functional etiology.	骨盆不对称	骨盆不对称是指对骨盆的两侧地标定位不对称，可能是结构或功能性的病因。
HP:0010454	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Acetabular spurs	The presence of osteophytes (bone spurs), i.e., of bony projections originating from the acetabulum.	髋臼骨刺	存在骨赘（骨刺），例如，起源于髋臼的骨的突出。
HP:0010455	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Steep acetabular roof	#####	陡峭的髋臼顶	#####
HP:0010456	骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the greater sacrosciatic notch	An abnormality of the sacrosciatic notch, i.e., the deep indentation in the posterior border of the hip bone at the point of union of the ilium and ischium.	坐骨大切迹异常	坐骨的切迹异常，即在髋骨的后缘在髂骨和坐骨的联合点凹陷的异常。
HP:0010457	骨骼系统异常	Widening of the sacrosciatic notch	Abnormally increased width of the greater sacrosciatic notch.	坐骨大切迹增宽	坐骨大切迹宽度异常增大。
HP:0010458	泌尿生殖系统异常	Female pseudohermaphroditism	Hermaphroditism refers to a discrepancy between the morphology of the gonads and that of the external genitalia. In female pseudohermaphroditism, the genotype is female (XX) and the gonads are ovaries, but the external genitalia are virilized.	女性假两性畸形	两性畸形是指性腺和外生殖器之间不吻合。女性假两性畸形指基因型是雌性（XX）和性腺是卵巢，但外生殖器男性化。
HP:0010459	泌尿生殖系统异常	True hermaphroditism	The presence of both ovarian and testicular tissues either in the same or in opposite gonads. Affected persons have ambiguous genitalia and may have 46,XX or 46,XY karyotypes or 46,XX/XY mosaicism.	真两性畸形	在个体的同一侧或对侧性腺里同时存在卵巢和睾丸组织。受累个体外生殖器不能辨别性别，染色体核型可能为46,XX、46,XY或46,XX/XY嵌合体。
HP:0010460	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the female genitalia	Abnormality of the `female genital system` (FMA:45663).	女性生殖器官异常	女性生殖系统的异常。
HP:0010461	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the male genitalia	Abnormality of the `male genital system` (FMA:45664).	男性生殖器异常	男性生殖系统异常。
HP:0010462	泌尿生殖系统异常	Aplasia/hypoplasia of the ovary	`Aplasia` (MPATH:58) or developmental hypoplasia of the `ovary` (FMA:7209).	卵巢发育不全/发育不良	卵巢发育不全或发育不良。
HP:0010463	泌尿生殖系统异常	Aplasia of the ovary	`Aplasia` (MPATH:58), that is failure to develop, of the `ovary` (FMA:7209).	卵巢发育不全	卵巢发育不全是指卵巢未发育。
HP:0010464	泌尿生殖系统异常	Streak ovary	A developmental disorder characterized by the progressive loss of primordial germ cells in the developing ovaries of an embryo, leading to hypoplastic ovaries composed of wavy connective tissue with occasional clumps of granulosa cells, and frequently mesonephric or hilar cells.	条索状卵巢	一种发育缺陷病，其特点是在胚胎期卵巢发育过程中原始生殖细胞逐渐丢失，导致卵巢发育不全，只有断断续续的（wavy）结缔组织，偶尔有颗粒细胞团块，常常见到中肾或卵巢门细胞（间质细胞）。
HP:0010465	内分泌系统异常	Precocious puberty in females	The onset of puberty before the age of 8 years in girls.	女性性早熟	女孩8岁之前开始青春期发育。
HP:0010468	泌尿生殖系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the testes	Absence or underdevelopment of the testes.	睾丸发育不全/发育不良	睾丸发育不全或发育不良。
HP:0010469	泌尿生殖系统异常	aplasia of the testes	Absence of the testes.	睾丸发育不全	无睾丸。
HP:0010470	泌尿生殖系统异常	Supernumerary testes	The presence of more than two testes.	多睾症	两个以上的睾丸。
HP:0010471	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Oligosacchariduria	Increased urinary excretion of `oligosaccharides` (CHEBI:50699) (low molecular weight carbohydrate chains composed of at least three monosaccharide subunits), derived from a partial degradation of glycoproteins.	寡糖尿症	的`oligosaccharides`（CHEBI:50699）增加尿中排泄量（至少三个单糖亚单位组成的低分子量的碳水化合物链），从糖蛋白的部分降解衍生。
HP:0010472	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormality of the heme biosynthetic pathway	An abnormality in the synthesis or catabolism of heme. Heme is composed of ferrous iron and protoporphyrin IX and is an essential molecule as the prosthetic group of hemeproteins such as hemoglobin, myoglobin, mitochondrial and microsomal cytochromes.	血红素生物合成途径异常	血红素的合成或降解的异常。血红素是由亚铁和原卟啉IX组成的,作为血红素蛋白,例如血红蛋白，肌红蛋白，线粒体和微粒体细胞色素的辅基成分,是一个重要的组分分子。
HP:0010473	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Porphyrinuria	Abnormally increased excretion of `porphyrins` (CHEBI:26214) in the urine.	卟啉尿症	尿液中的:异常增加`porphyrins`（26214 CHEBI）的排泄。
HP:0010474	泌尿生殖系统异常	Bladder stones	Buildups of minerals that form in the urinary bladder.	膀胱结石	膀胱内矿物质累积形成结石。
HP:0010475	泌尿生殖系统异常,消化系统异常	Cloacal exstrophy	Cloacal exstrophy is a severe anterior abdominal wall defect in which the two hemibladders are visible and are separated by a midline intestinal plate, an omphalocele, and an imperforate anus.	泄殖腔外翻	泄殖腔外翻是一种严重的前腹壁缺损，可见两个被中线肠板分开的半膀胱，脐膨出和肛门闭锁。
HP:0010476	泌尿生殖系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the bladder	Absence or underdevelopment of the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900).	膀胱发育不全/发育不良	无膀胱或膀胱发育低下。
HP:0010477	泌尿生殖系统异常	aplasia of the bladder	Aplasia (absence) of the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900).	膀胱发育不全	膀胱发育不全（无膀胱）。
HP:0010478	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the urachus	Abnormality of the `urachus` (FMA:70343).	脐尿管异常	脐尿管异常。
HP:0010479	泌尿生殖系统异常	Patent urachus	Persistence of the urachal canal resulting in a canal between the bladder and the umbilicus.	脐尿管未闭	脐膀胱通道持续性遗存，在膀胱和肚脐之间存在一个通道。
HP:0010480	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urethral fistula	The presence of an abnormal connection between the urethra and another organ or the skin.	尿道瘘	尿道与另一个器官或皮肤之间存在的异常通道。
HP:0010481	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urethral valve	The presence of an abnormal membrane obstructing the `urethra` (FMA:19667).	尿道瓣膜	尿道内形成异常膜阻碍尿流。
HP:0010482	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Acromelia of the upper limbs	Shortening of the arms predominantly affecting terminal parts of the arm in relation to the upper and middle limb segments.	上肢肢端短缩	相对上段和中段，肢体的缩短显著地影响了肢体的末端部。
HP:0010483	肢体异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Amniotic constriction rings of arms	Amniotic constriction rings affecting the arms.	臂部的羊膜缩窄环	羊膜收缩环影响的怀抱。

HP:0010485	骨骼系统异常	Hyperextensibility at elbow	The ability of the elbow joint to move beyond its normal range of motion.	肘关节过伸	肘关节的运动能力超越正常范围。
HP:0010486	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常	Abnormality of the hypothenar eminence	An abnormality of the `hypothenar eminence`(FMA:61523), i.e., of the muscles on the ulnar side of the palm of the hand (i.e., on the side of the little finger).	小鱼际隆起异常	小鱼际的异常，即手掌尺侧（在小指一侧）肌肉的异常。
HP:0010487	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常	Small hypothenar eminence	Reduced muscle mass on the ulnar side of the palm, that is, reduction in size of the `hypothenar eminence`(FMA:61523).	小鱼际小	手掌尺侧肌肉量减少，也就是小鱼际小。

HP:0010489	肢体异常,体壁的异常	Absent palmar crease	The absence of the major creases of the palm (distal transverse crease, proximal transverse crease, or thenar crease).	手掌掌纹缺如	手掌的主要掌纹的缺如（远端横向折痕，近端横向折缝，或鱼际折痕）。

HP:0010491	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Digital constriction ring	A narrow segment of significantly reduced circumference of a digit.	指趾缩窄环	羊膜缠绕胎儿手指、足趾，由羊膜带引起的局部缩窄环。
HP:0010492	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osseous finger syndactyly	Webbing or fusion of the fingers, involving soft parts and including fusion of individual finger bones. Bony fusions are revered to as &quot;bony&quot; Syndactyly if the fusion occurs in a radio-ulnar axis. Fusions of bones of the fingers in a proximo-distal axis are refered to as &quot;Symphalangism&quot;.	骨性融合性并指畸形	织带或融合性手指，涉及柔软组织和指骨的融合。如果融合位于桡尺轴线的骨性融合被称为并指畸形，如果融合位于近端到远端轴线上，称为指关节粘连。
HP:0010493	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Long metacarpals	An abnormally increased length of the metacarpal bones.	长掌骨	掌骨长度的异常增加。
HP:0010494	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Acromelia of the lower limbs	Shortening of the legs predominantly affecting terminal parts of the leg in relation to the upper and middle arm segments.	下肢短缩	相对上段和中段，肢体的缩短显著地影响了腿的末端部。
HP:0010495	肢体异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Amniotic constriction rings of legs	Amniotic constriction rings affecting the legs.	腿部的羊膜缩窄环	羊膜收缩环的影响腿部。
HP:0010496	肢体异常	Hypertrophy of the lower limb	Abnormal increase in size of the lower limbs (due to an increase of the size of cells).	下肢肥大	下肢大小（由于细胞大小增加）异常升高。
HP:0010497	肢体异常	Sirenomelia	A developmental defect in which the legs are fused together.	美人鱼综合症（并腿畸形）	一种以腿融合在一起为特征的发育缺陷。
HP:0010498	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Bipartite patella	A developmental defect that occurs if the two halves of the patella fail to fuse in early childhood.	髌骨二深裂	髌骨的两半未能在儿童早期融合导致的一种发育缺陷。
HP:0010499	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patellar subluxation	The kneecap normally is located within the groove termed trochlea on the distal femur and can slide up and down in it. Patellar subluxation refers to an unstable kneecap that does not slide centrally within its groove, i.e., a partial dislocation of the patella.	髌骨半脱位	膝盖骨通常位于股骨远端的滑车沟内，并且可以在其内进行上下滑动。髌骨半脱位是指不能处于沟内正中滑动的不稳定膝盖骨，即髌骨的半脱位。
HP:0010500	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Hyperextensibility of the knee	The ability of the knee joint to move beyond its normal range of motion.	膝关节伸展过度	膝关节的活动能力超过了正常的运动范围。
HP:0010501	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Limitation of knee mobility	An abnormal limitation of knee joint mobility.	膝关节活动受限	膝关节运动异常受限。
HP:0010502	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Fibular bowing	A bending or abnormal curvature of the `fibula` (FMA:24479).	腓骨弯曲	腓骨弯曲或存在异常曲度。
HP:0010503	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Fibular duplication	Duplication of the fibula. This may occur as a part of diplopodia (accessory tarsal or metatarsal bone). Diplopodia with double fibula is an extremely rare condition.	腓骨重复	腓骨重复。这可能是复足畸胎的一部分（多余的跗骨或跖骨）。 有双腓骨的复足畸胎是极为罕见的。
HP:0010504	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Increased length of the tibia	An abnormal increase in the length of the tibia.	胫骨长度增加	胫骨长度的异常增加。
HP:0010505	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Limitation of movement at ankles	An abnormal limitation of the mobility of the ankle joint.	脚踝运动受限制	踝关节的移动性异常受限。
HP:0010506	肢体异常,体壁的异常	Abnormal plantar dermatoglyphics	An abnormality of dermatoglyphs on the toes and soles, i.e., an abnormality of the patterns of ridges of the `skin of sole of foot` (FMA:37849).	跖部异常皮纹	脚趾和跖部的异常皮纹，例如，跖部皮肤的皮脊图案的异常。
HP:0010507	肢体异常	Foot asymmetry	A difference in size or shape between the left and right foot.	脚不对称	在左和右脚之间尺寸或形状的差异。
HP:0010508	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Metatarsus valgus	A condition in which the anterior part of the foot rotates outward away from the midline of the body and the heel remains straight.	跖骨外翻	脚的前段处于外旋状态，且偏离身体的中线，而足跟仍然呈直线状态的一种情况。
HP:0010509	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia of the tarsal bones	Absence of the tarsal bones.	跗骨发育不全	跗骨的缺如。
HP:0010510	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Hypermobility of toe joints	An ability of the toe joints to move beyond their normal range of motion.	趾关节活动过度	趾关节的活动能力超越其正常的运动范围。
HP:0010511	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Long toe	Digits that appear disproportionately long compared to the foot.	趾长	出现与脚不成比例的过长的足趾。
HP:0010512	内分泌系统异常,骨骼系统异常	Adrenal calcification	Calcification within the `adrenal glands` (FMA:9604).	肾上腺钙化	肾上腺内的钙化
HP:0010513	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常,骨骼系统异常	Pituitary calcification	Deposition of calcium salts in the pituitary gland.	垂体钙化	脑垂体的钙盐沉积。
HP:0010514	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Hyperpituitarism	Hypersecretion of one or more pituitary hormones. This can occur in conditions in which deficiency in the target organ leads to decreased hormonal feedback, or as a primary condition most usually in connection with a pituitary adenoma.	垂体功能亢进症	一种或多种垂体激素分泌过多。这可能由于靶器官缺陷导致激素反馈减少，或者是由垂体腺瘤引起的垂体原发性病症。
HP:0010515	内分泌系统异常,免疫系统异常	Aplasia/hypoplasia of the thymus	Absence or underdevelopment of the "thymus" (FMA:9607).	胸腺发育缺陷/不全	胸腺不发育、发育缺陷或不全（FMA:9607）。
HP:0010516	内分泌系统异常,免疫系统异常	Thymus hyperplasia	Enlargement of the "thymus" (FMA:9607).	胸腺增生	胸腺的增生肿大（FMA:9607）。
HP:0010517	内分泌系统异常,免疫系统异常	Ectopic thymus tissue	The presence of ectopic "thymus" (FMA:9607) tissue. Normally, cells of the ventral bud of the third pharyngeal pouch detach and migrate in the eighth gestational week caudally and medially towards the location of the mature thyroid. They migrate further retrosternally into the superior mediastinum. There are two main ways ectopic thymus tissue can develop. Either cells detach along the descensus path and proliferate, thereby forming accessory thymus tissue, or the entire gland fails to descend.	异位胸腺组织	#####
HP:0010518	内分泌系统异常	Thyroglossal cyst	An "abnormality of the thyroid gland" (HP:0000820) owing to the presence of a fibrous "cyst" (MPATH:62) resulting from the persistence of the "thyroglossal duct" (FMA:77274).	甲状舌管囊肿	一种甲状腺（HP:0000820）的异常，由于甲状舌管不闭合导致的囊肿引起的。
HP:0010519	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Increased fetal movement	An abnormal increase in quantity or strength of fetal movements.	胎动增加	胎动次数或强度异常增加。
HP:0010521	神经系统异常	Gait apraxia	Gait apraxia affecting the ability to make walking movements with the legs.	步态失用	步态失用指指挥腿行走的能力受损。
HP:0010522	神经系统异常	Dyslexia	A learning disorder characterized primarily by difficulties in learning to read and spell. Dyslectic children also exhibit a tendency to read words from right to left and to confuse letters such as b and d whose orientation is important for their identification. Children with dyslexia appear to be impaired in phonemic skills (the ability to associate visual symbols with the sounds they represent).	失读症	学习障碍的一种类型，主要表现为阅读和拼写困难。失读症的儿童还存在从右向左阅读单词的倾向，比如b和d的正确识别取决于阅读方向。并且可能存在音位能力受损（将视觉符号和其所代表的声音联系起来的能力）。
HP:0010523	神经系统异常	Alexia	An acquired type of sensory aphasia where damage to the brain leads to the loss of the ability to read.	失读症	获得性的感觉性失语的一种类型，由于大脑的损伤导致了阅读能力的丧失。
HP:0010524	神经系统异常	Agnosia	Inability to recognize objects not because of sensory deficit but because of the inability to combine components of sensory impressions into a complete pattern. Thus, agnosia is a neurological condition which results in an inability to know, to name, to identify, and to extract meaning from visual, auditory, or tactile impressions.	失认	没有认识物体、对象的能力，这种能力缺乏不是由于感觉障碍，而是因为无法把感官印象的组件组合成一个完整的模式。因此，失认是一种神经源性的没有能力理解、命名、识别、以及从视觉、听觉或触觉印象提取其意义的状态。
HP:0010525	神经系统异常	Finger agnosia	An inability or difficulty differentiating among the fingers of either hand as well as the hands of others.	手指失认	对自己或他人的手指辨别不能或困难。
HP:0010526	神经系统异常	Dysgraphia	A writing disability in the absence of motor or sensory deficits of the upper extremities, resulting in an impairment in the ability to write regardless of the ability to read and not due to intellectual impairment.	书写困难	双上肢无运动或感觉障碍时，存在的与阅读能力不匹配的书写困难，且与智力无关。
HP:0010527	神经系统异常	Astereognosia	Inability to recognize the form of objects by touch without visual input. That is, an impairment in the recognition of objects based only on based on the texture, size, weight and three-dimensional form of the object in the absence of any major somatosensory deficit.	实体觉缺失	在没有视觉输入的情况下不能通过触摸识别物体的形式。也就是说，在没有任何主要的体感缺陷情况下，仅基于物体的纹理、尺寸、重量和三维形状对物体的识别能力的损害。
HP:0010528	神经系统异常	Prosopagnosia	Inability to recognize faces of familair persons.	面孔失认症	不能识别家人的面孔。
HP:0010529	神经系统异常	Echolalia	The tendency to repeat vocalizations made by another person.	模仿性言语	有重复他人发声的倾向。
HP:0010530	神经系统异常	Palatal myoclonus	Palatal myoclonus is characterized by myoclonic (rhythmic involuntary jerky) movements of the soft palate.	腭肌阵挛	腭肌阵挛的特点是软腭的肌阵挛（节奏不自主跳动）动作。
HP:0010531	神经系统异常	Spinal myoclonus	Spinal myoclonus is generally due to a tumor, infection, injury, or degenerative process of the spinal cord, and is characterized by involuntary rhythmic muscle contractions, usually at a rate of more than one per second. Myoclonus occurs synchronously in several muscles and can be increased in severity and frequency by fatigue or stress, but is usually unaffected by sensory stimuli. Spinal myoclonus ceases during sleep or anesthesia.	脊髓性肌阵挛	脊肌阵挛通常是由于一个肿瘤，感染，损伤，或脊髓变性过程，其特征是节律不自主的肌肉收缩，通常在一个以上的每秒的速率。同步发生肌阵挛在几个肌肉和所用的严重程度和频率由疲劳或应力增加，但通常是不受感官刺激。睡眠或麻醉期间脊髓性肌阵挛停止。
HP:0010532	耳部异常	Paroxysmal vertigo	Paroxysmal episodes of vertigo.	发作性眩晕	#####
HP:0010533	眼部异常	Spasmus nutans	The combination of pendular nystagmus, head nodding, and torticollis.	点头状痉挛	#####
HP:0010534	神经系统异常	Transient global amnesia	A paroxysmal, transient loss of memory function with preservation of immediate recall and remote memory but with a severe impairment of memory for recent events and ability to retain new information.	短暂性全面性遗忘症	一种阵发性、短暂性记忆功能丧失，即时回忆和远期记忆保存，但是近事记忆和储存新信息的能力严重受损。
HP:0010535	神经系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Sleep apnea	An intermittent cessation of airflow at the mouth and nose during sleep. Apneas of at least 10 seconds are considered important, but persons with sleep apnea may have apneas of 20 seconds to up to 2 or 3 minutes. Patients may have up to 15 events per hour of sleep.	睡眠呼吸暂停	睡眠时口鼻气流间歇性停止。呼吸暂停10秒以上的被认为是重要的，但睡眠呼吸暂停的人呼吸暂停可以有20秒以上甚至达到2或3分钟。患者每小时睡眠可能有高达15次呼吸暂停事件。
HP:0010536	神经系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Central sleep apnea	Sleep apnea resulting from a transient abolition of the central drive to the ventilatory muscles.	中枢性睡眠呼吸暂停	是由于控制呼吸通气肌肉的大脑中枢短暂功能失调导致的睡眠呼吸暂停。
HP:0010537	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Wide cranial sutures	An abnormally increased width of the cranial sutures for age-related norms (generally resulting from delayed closure).	颅缝增宽	颅缝的距离增大，考虑到年龄-相关等因素（通常由颅缝延迟闭合所引起）。
HP:0010538	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Small sella turcica	An abnormally small sella turcica.	小蝶鞍	异常小的蝶鞍。
HP:0010539	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Thin calvarium	The presence of an abnormally thin calvarium.	颅骨过薄	颅骨异常的薄。
HP:0010540	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Advanced pneumatization of cranial sinuses	A degree of pneumatization that is increased compared to age-related norms.	颅窦过度气化	气化程度比同龄正常值增加。
HP:0010541	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Cutis gyrata of scalp	The presence of convoluted folds and furrows formed from thickened skin of the `scalp` (FMA:46494), resembling cerebriform pattern. The scalp has convoluted and elevated folds, 1 to 2 cm in thickness. The convolutions generally cannot be flattened by traction.	头皮回状纹	由于头皮增厚而形成的类似大脑沟回的复杂褶皱和回纹。头皮表现为复杂和升高的折叠，厚度为1〜2厘米。复杂折叠通常不能被牵引拉平。
HP:0010542	神经系统异常,眼部异常	Vestibular nystagmus	Nystagmus due to disturbance of the vestibular system; eye movements are rhythmic, with slow and fast components.	前庭眼球震颤	眼球震颤由于前庭系统的干扰;眼球运动的节奏，用慢速和快速的组件。
HP:0010543	眼部异常	Opsoclonus	Spontaneous, non-rhythmic, multi-directional, chaotic movements of the eyes, giving the appearance of agitation. There may be bursts of conjugate movement of the eyes in varying directions and of varying amplitude.	斜视眼阵挛	自发的，无节奏的，多方位的，混乱的眼神动作，呈现躁动的外观。可能出现不同方向和不同幅度的共轭眼球运动。
HP:0010544	眼部异常	Vertical nystagmus	Vertical nystagmus may present with either up-beating or down-beating eye movements or both. When present in the straight-ahead position of gaze it is referred to as upbeat nystagmus or downbeat nystagmus.	垂直眼球震颤	垂直眼球震颤可出现向上跳动或向下跳动或两者兼有的眼球运动。当出现在凝视的正前方位置它被称为向上震颤或向下眼球震颤。
HP:0010545	眼部异常	Downbeat nystagmus	Downbeat nystagmus is a type of fixation nystagmus with the fast phase beating in a downward direction. It generally increases when looking to the side and down and when lying prone.	下击型眼球震颤	下击型眼球震颤是指向下方的快相跳动的眼球震颤。向侧面看、向下看或躺下时症状加重。
HP:0010546	神经系统异常	Muscle fibrillation	Fine, rapid twitching of individual muscle fibers with little or no movement of the muscle as a whole. If a motor neuron or its axon is destroyed, the muscle fibers it innervates undergo denervation atrophy. This leads to hypersensitivity of individual muscle fibers to acetyl choline so that they may contract spontaneously. Isolated activity of individual muscle fibers is generally so fine it cannot be seen through the intact skin, although it can be recorded as a short-duration spike in the EMG.	肌纤维颤动	不会引起肌肉动作的单个肌纤维精细的、快速的抽动。如果一个运动神经元或轴突被损害，则它支配的肌纤维会出现去神经萎缩。
HP:0010547	肌肉组织异常	Muscle flaccidity	A type of paralysis in which a muscle becomes soft and yields to passive stretching, which results from loss of all or practically all peripheral motor nerves that innervated the muscle. Muscle tone is reduced and the affected muscles undergo extreme atrophy within months of the loss of innervation.	肌肉软弱无力	一种肌肉麻痹，表现为肌肉柔软松弛无法被动伸展，是由于部分或全部的支配肌肉的外周运动神经功能丧失所致。在丧失神经支配的数月内会出现肌张力减退和受累肌肉严重萎缩。
HP:0010548	肌肉组织异常	Percussion myotonia	A localized myotonic contraction in a muscle in reaction to percussion (tapping with the examiner&#39;s finger, a rubber percussion hammer, or a similar object).	敲击性肌强直	敲击肌肉时局限性强直性收缩反应（用检查者的手指、橡胶锤或类似的对象敲击）。
HP:0010549	神经系统异常	Weakness due to upper motor neuron dysfunction	Paralysis of voluntary muscles means loss of contraction due to interruption of one or more motor pathways from the brain to the muscle fibers. Although the word paralysis is often used interchangeably to mean either complete or partial loss of muscle strength, it is preferable to use paralysis or plegia for complete or severe loss of muscle strength, and paresis for partial or slight loss. Paralysis due to lesions of the principle motor tracts is related to a lesion in the corticospinal, corticobulbar or brainstem descending (subcorticospinal) neurons.	上运动神经元功能障碍导致的无力	自主肌肉的麻痹意味着由于从脑到肌肉纤维的一个或多个运动途径的中断而导致的收缩丧失。尽管词语“瘫痪”通常意味着完全或部分丧失肌肉力量，但对于全部或严重丧失肌肉力量的患者，常用“麻痹”描述，对肌肉力量轻微损失的患者，常用“局部麻痹”描述。主要运动区病变引起的麻痹与皮质脊髓，皮质支原体或脑干下降（下皮质脊髓）神经元中的病变有关。
HP:0010550	神经系统异常	Paraplegia	Severe or complete weakness of both lower extremities with sparing of the upper extremities.	截瘫	双下肢严重或完全瘫痪，上肢保留
HP:0010551	神经系统异常	Paraplegia/paraparesis	Weakness of both lower extremities with sparing of the upper extremities. Paraplegia refers to a severe or complete loss of strength, whereas paraparesis refers to a relatively mild loss of strength.	截瘫	上肢保留的双下肢严重或完全瘫痪为截瘫而力量相对保留的为轻瘫。
HP:0010553	神经系统异常	Oculogyric crisis	An acute dystonic reaction with blepharospasm, periorbital twitches, and protracted fixed staring episodes. There may be a maximal upward deviation of the eyes in the sustained fashion. Oculogyric crisis can be triggered by a number of factors including neuroleptic medications.	动眼神经危象	眼睑痉挛，眶周抽搐，和长期固定注视的一种急性肌张力障碍，可能伴有持续的眼球最大向上运动的偏差。动眼神经危象可被很多种因素包括镇静药物所诱发。
HP:0010554	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cutaneous finger syndactyly	A soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that extends distally to at least the level of the proximal interphalangeal joints, or a soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that lies significantly distal to the flexion crease that overlies the metacarpophalangeal joint of the adjacent fingers.	手指皮性并指	在两个手指之间的前后轴线上，软组织的连续性从远端向近端延伸，至少延伸到指间关节水平上；或在两个手指之间的前后轴线上，软组织的连续性从远端向相邻手指的掌指关节的屈褶纹延伸。
HP:0010557	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Overlapping fingers	A finger resting on the dorsal surface of an adjacent digit when the hand is at rest.	指交叠	当手处于静止状态时，一个手指处在相邻位手指的背侧面。
HP:0010558	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the clivus	An abnormality of the clivus, which is the inclined bony region of the posterior cranial fossa located between the sella turcica and the foramen magnum.	斜坡异常	斜坡的异常。斜坡指位于蝶鞍和枕骨大孔的后颅窝的倾斜骨区域。
HP:0010559	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Vertical clivus	An abnormal vertical orientation of the clivus (which normally forms a kind of slope from the sella turcica down to the region of the foramen magnum).	斜坡垂直	斜坡（通常从蝶鞍倾斜至枕骨大孔区）异常垂直。
HP:0010560	骨骼系统异常	Undulate clavicles	An abnormally wavy surface or edge of the clavicles.	波浪状锁骨	锁骨表面或边缘异常起伏。
HP:0010561	骨骼系统异常	Undulate ribs	An abnormally wavy surface or edge of the ribs.	波浪状肋骨	肋骨表面或边缘异常起伏。
HP:0010562	结缔组织异常,体壁的异常	Keloids	Presence of one or more keloids. A keloid is a sharply elevated, irregularly shaped, progressively enlarging scar resulting from formation of excessive amounts of collagen in the dermis during connective tissue repair.	瘢痕疙瘩	瘢痕疙瘩可单发或多发，具有高出皮面、形状不规则、持续增生等特点，是皮肤在结缔组织修复过程中，真皮层胶原蛋白过度合成所致。
HP:0010564	呼吸系统异常	Bifid epiglottis	A midline anterior-posterior cleft of the `epiglottis` (FMA:55130) that involves at least two-thirds of the epiglottic leaf. It is a useful feature for clinical diagnosis because it appears to be very rare in syndromes other than Pallister-Hall-Syndrome and is also rare as an isolated malformation.	会厌分叉	`会厌`（55130 FMA）沿中线前后裂开累及至少前三分之二的会厌叶。这个定义对于临床诊断非常有帮助，因为它似乎在比帕里斯特-霍尔综合征中非常罕见，即使是作为一个孤立的畸形也非常罕见。
HP:0010565	呼吸系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the Epiglottis	This term applies if the Epiglottis is absent or hypoplastic.	会厌的发育缺陷/不全	本术语指会厌缺失或发育不全。
HP:0010566	肿瘤	Hamartoma	A disordered proliferation of mature tissues that is native to the site of origin - eg, exostoses, nevi and soft tissue hamartomas. Although most hamartomas are benign, some histologic subtypes - eg, neuromuscular hamartoma, may proliferate aggressively such as mesenchymal cystic hamartoma, Sclerosing epithelial hamartoma, Sclerosing metanephric hamartoma.	错构瘤	错构瘤是&#39;起源于器官的正常成熟组织的无序增殖，例如，外生骨疣，痣和软组织错构瘤。虽然大多数错构瘤是良性的，但一些组织学亚型的错构瘤，如神经肌肉的错构瘤、间充质囊性错构瘤、硬化性上皮错构瘤、硬化性肾错构瘤，可产生侵袭性增殖。
HP:0010567	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Y-shaped metatarsals	Y-shaped metatarsals are the result of a partial fusion of two metatarsal bones, with the two arms of the Y pointing in the distal direction. Y-shaped metatarsals may be seen in combination with polydactyly.	Y形跖骨	Y形跖骨是两个跖骨近端部分融合的结果，Y的两臂指向远端。 Y形跖骨可以与多趾伴随出现。
HP:0010568	肿瘤,头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Hamartoma of the eye	A hamartoma (disordered proliferation of mature tissues) which can originate from any tissue of the eye.	眼部错构瘤	错构瘤（成熟组织的无序增殖），它可以从眼睛中的任何组织起源。
HP:0010569	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated 7-dehydrocholesterol	Elevated `7-dehydrocholesterol` (CHEBI:17759) levels.	7-脱氢胆固醇水平升高	高架`7 dehydrocholesterol`（CHEBI:17759）的水平。
HP:0010570	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Low maternal serum alpha-fetoprotein	An abnormally low concentration of serum alpha-fetoprotein as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度降低	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度。
HP:0010571	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated levels of phytanic acid	An abnormal elevation of `phytanic acid` (CHEBI:16285).	植烷酸水平升高	的&#39;植烷acid`的异常升高（CHEBI:16285）。
HP:0010574	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the femoral head	Any abnormality of the `proximal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32841).	股骨头骨骺异常	股骨近端骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010575	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Dysplasia of the femoral head	The presence of `developmental dysplasia` (MPATH:64) of the `femoral head` (FMA:32851).	股骨头发育不良	股骨头存在发育不良。
HP:0010576	神经系统异常	Intracranial cystic lesion	A cystic lesion originating within the brain.	颅内囊性病变	起源于脑内的囊性病灶。
HP:0010577	骨骼系统异常	Absent epiphyses	#####	骨骺缺失	#####
HP:0010578	骨骼系统异常	Bracket epiphyses	#####	括号型骨骺	#####
HP:0010579	骨骼系统异常	Cone-shaped epiphysis	Cone-shaped epiphyses (also known as coned epiphyses) are epiphyses that invaginate into cupped metaphyses. That is, the epiphysis has a cone-shaped distal extension resulting from increased growth of the central portion of the epiphysis relative to its periphery.	锥形骨骺	锥形骨骺（也称为锥骨骺）是内陷成杯状的干骺端。即，具有锥形远端延伸的骨骺，是相对于其周边骨骺的中心部分的增生的结果。
HP:0010580	骨骼系统异常	Enlarged epiphyses	Increased size of epiphyses.	骨骺膨大	骨骺尺寸增大。
HP:0010582	骨骼系统异常	Irregular epiphyses	An alteration of the normally smooth contour of the epiphysis leading to an irregular appearance.	不规则骨骺	导致通常轮廓光滑的骨骺的不规则外观的改变。
HP:0010583	骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphyses	Sclerosis of the epiphyses, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	乳白色骨骺	骨骺硬化，导致的X射线不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）的程度增加。
HP:0010584	骨骼系统异常	Pseudoepiphyses	#####	假骨骺	#####
HP:0010585	骨骼系统异常	Small epiphyses	Reduction in the size or volume of epiphyses.	小骨骺	骨骺体积减小。
HP:0010587	骨骼系统异常	Triangular epiphyses	#####	三角形骨骺	#####
HP:0010588	骨骼系统异常	Premature epimetaphyseal fusion	Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at each end of a long bone, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.	干骺端过早融合	长骨两端干骺端的骺板透明软骨板停止生长早于正常年龄，导致相应的骨生长停滞、缩短。
HP:0010590	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the distal femoral epiphysis	Any abnormality of the `distal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32844).	股骨远端骨骺异常	股骨远端骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010591	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the proximal tibial epiphysis	Any abnormality of the proximal epiphysis of the tibia.	胫骨近端骨骺异常	胫骨近端骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010592	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the distal tibial epiphysis	#####	胫骨远端骨骺异常	#####
HP:0010593	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of fibular epiphyses	This term means any abnormal structure or form of the end of fibular bone.	腓骨骨骺异常	腓骨的末端结构或形态的异常。
HP:0010594	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the proximal fibular epiphysis	Any abnormality of the proximal epiphysis of the fibula.	腓骨近端骨骺异常	腓骨近端骨骺任何异常。
HP:0010595	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the distal fibular epiphysis	Any abnormality of the distal epiphysis of the fibula.	腓骨远端骨骺异常	腓骨远端骨骺任何异常。
