HP:0010597	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the distal radial epiphysis	Any abnormality of the distal epiphysis of the radius.	桡骨远端骨骺异常	桡骨远端骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010598	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the proximal humeral epiphysis	Any abnormality of the proximal epiphysis of the humerus.	肱骨近端骨骺异常	肱骨近端骨骺任何异常。
HP:0010599	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the distal humeral epiphysis	Any abnormality of the distal epiphysis of the humerus.	肱骨远端骨骺异常	肱骨远端骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010600	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the distal ulnar epiphysis	Any abnormality of the distal epiphysis of the ulna.	尺骨远端骨骺异常	尺骨远端骨骺任何异常。
HP:0010601	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the proximal ulnar epiphysis	Any abnormality of the proximal epiphysis of the ulna.	尺骨近端的骨骺异常	尺骨近端骨骺的任何异常。
HP:0010602	肌肉组织异常	Type 2 muscle fiber predominance	An abnormal predominance of type II muscle fibers (in general, this feature can only be observed on muscle biopsy).	2型肌纤维占优势	2型肌纤维的异常优势（在一般情况下，该特征只能在肌肉活组织检查观察到）。
HP:0010603	肿瘤,头部和颈部的异常	Keratocystic odontogenic tumor	A benign uni- or multicystic, intraosseous tumor of odontogenic origin, with a characteristic lining of parakeratinized stratified squamous epithelium and potential for aggressive, infiltrative behaviour.	角化囊性牙源肿瘤	良性的单或多囊性的牙源骨内肿瘤，其特征为有类角化的复层鳞状上皮作衬里，且具有攻击性浸润性举动的潜力。
HP:0010604	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Cyst of the eyelid	#####	眼睑囊肿	#####
HP:0010605	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Chalazion	A chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland. A chalazion or meibomian cyst appears as a painless tuberous swelling in the upper lid without loss of eyelashes.	睑板腺囊肿	由睑板腺堵塞发炎引起的慢性睑板腺上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症。 睑板腺囊肿也称霰粒肿，主要表现为上眼睑无痛性肿胀结节伴睫毛不脱落。
HP:0010606	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Hordeolum	An acute purulent infection of the sebaceous glands of Zeis at the base of the eyelashes, of the apocrine sweat glands of Moll or the meibomian sebacious glands often caused by staphylococcus infections. Hordeola can either occur as Hordeola externa affecting the sebaceous glands of Zeis or the apocrine sweat glands of Moll or as Hordeola interna affecting the meibomian sebacious glands. In contrast to chalazia, hordeola are extremely painful and can cause extreme local swelling.	麦粒肿	在睫毛根部的蔡斯氏皮脂腺、莫尔氏大汗腺或睑板皮脂腺的急性化脓性感染，常常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。麦粒肿既可以是影响蔡斯氏皮脂腺或莫尔氏大汗腺的外麦粒肿，也可以是影响睑板皮脂腺的内麦粒肿。相对于霰粒肿而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛且可造成局部极度肿胀。
HP:0010607	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Hordeolum externum	Hordeola externa are acute purulent infections affecting the sebaceous glands of Zeis or the apocrine sweat glands of Moll, often caused by staphylococcus infections. In contrast to chalazia, hordeola are extremely painful and can cause extreme local swelling.	外麦粒肿	外麦粒肿是影响蔡斯氏皮脂腺或莫尔氏大汗腺的急性化脓性感染，常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。相对于霰粒肿而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛且可造成局部极度肿胀。
HP:0010608	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Hordeolum internum	Hordeola interna are acute purulent infections affecting the meibomian sebacious glands, often caused by staphylococcus infections. In contrast to chalazia (chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland), hordeola are extremely painfull and can cause extreme local swelling.	内麦粒肿	内麦粒肿是影响睑板皮脂腺的急性化脓性感染，常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。相对于霰粒肿（引起堵塞睑板腺发炎的睑板腺慢性上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症）而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛且可造成局部极度肿胀。
HP:0010609	体壁的异常	Skin tags	Cutaneous skin tags also known as acrochorda or fibroepithelial polyps are small benign tumours that may either form secondarily over time primarily in areas where the skin forms creases, such as the neck, armpit or groin or may also be present at birth, in which case they usually occur in the periauricular region.	皮赘	皮赘也被称为软垂疣或纤维上皮息肉，是较小的良性肿瘤，可继发于颈部、腋窝或腹股沟等易形成褶皱的部位，也可于出生就存在，通常发生于耳廓周围。
HP:0010610	肢体异常,体壁的异常	Palmar pits	#####	掌点凹	#####
HP:0010612	肢体异常,体壁的异常	Plantar pits	The presence of multiple pits (small, pinpoint-large indentations on the surface of the skin) located on the `skin of sole of foot` (FMA:37849).	跖部凹点	存在于足底皮肤的许多凹点（位于皮肤表面、针尖样大小的凹点）。
HP:0010614	肿瘤	Fibroma	Benign tumors that are composed of fibrous or connective tissue. They can grow in all organs, arising from mesenchyme tissue. The term &quot;fibroblastic&quot; or &quot;fibromatous&quot; is used to describe tumors of the fibrous connective tissue. When the term fibroma is used without modifier, it is usually considered benign, with the term fibrosarcoma reserved for malignant tumors.	纤维瘤	由纤维或结缔组织构成的良性肿瘤。它们是间质组织来源，可发生于机体的任何器官，术语“成纤维细胞”或“纤维瘤”用以描述纤维结缔组织肿瘤。通常 纤维瘤 一词指良性肿瘤，而纤维肉瘤一词是指恶性肿瘤。
HP:0010615	肿瘤	Angiofibromas	Angiofibroma consist of many often dilated vessels.	血管纤维瘤	血管纤维瘤由许多扩张的血管组成。
HP:0010616	肿瘤,呼吸系统异常	Lung fibroma	The presence of a lung fibroma, a benign neoplasm that can present as a mass causing airway obstruction, cough, and hemoptysis, or present without symptoms as a solitary pulmonary nodule.	肺纤维瘤	肺纤维瘤为一种良性的肿瘤，可表现为大块病变引起气道阻塞、咳嗽、咯血或没有症状的孤立性肺结节。
HP:0010617	肿瘤,心血管系统异常	Cardiac fibroma	A `fibroma` (MPATH:407) of the `heart` (FMA:7088).	心脏纤维瘤	心脏中形成的纤维瘤（FMA:7088）。
HP:0010618	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Ovarian fibroma	The presence of a `fibroma` (MPATH:407) of the `ovary` (FMA:7209).	卵巢纤维瘤	卵巢中存在纤维瘤。
HP:0010619	肿瘤,乳房异常	Fibroma of the breast	The presence of a `fibroma` (MPATH:407) of the `breast` (FMA:9601).	乳腺纤维瘤	发生在乳房（FMA:9601）的纤维瘤（MPATH：407）。
HP:0010620	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Malar prominence	Prominence of the malar process of the maxilla and infraorbital area appreciated in profile and from in front of the face.	颧骨突出	上颌骨和眼眶下区形成的颧骨突出，通过侧面和正面可以识别。
HP:0010621	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Cutaneous syndactyly of toes	A soft tissue continuity in the anteroposterior axis between adjacent foot digits that involves at least half of the proximodistal length of one of the two involved digits; or, a soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two digits of the foot that does not meet the prior objective criteria.	皮性脚趾并趾	在两个相邻脚趾之间的前后轴线上，软组织的连续性从远端向近端延伸，至少延伸到指间关节水平上；或者不满足先前客观条件评价标准、存在于两个脚趾之间前后轴线上的软组织连续性。

HP:0010628	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Facial palsy	Facial nerve palsy is a dysfunction of cranial nerve VII (the facial nerve) that results in inability to control facial muscles on the affected side with weakness of the muscles of facial expression and eye closure. This can either be present in unilateral or bilateral form.	面部神经麻痹	面部神经麻痹是第VII颅神经（面神经）的机能障碍，可导致受累侧的面部肌肉无法控制，并伴有面部表情与闭眼肌肉无力。可出现在单侧或双侧。

HP:0010633	神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Partial anosmia	Inability to perceive certain odorants (implies that the sense of smell is maintained for other classes of odorants).	部分嗅觉丧失	无法感知某些气味物质（意味着保持对其他种类气味物质的嗅觉）。
HP:0010634	神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Total hyposmia	Reduced ability to detect any qualitative olfactory sensation.	嗅觉减退	嗅觉定性功能减退。

HP:0010636	神经系统异常	Schizencephaly	The presence of a cleft in the cerebral cortex unilaterally or bilaterally, usually located in the frontal area.	脑裂畸形	一个裂口在大脑皮层中存在单侧或双侧，通常位于额区。单侧或双侧大脑皮层的裂口，多位于额叶

HP:0010638	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated alkaline phosphatase of hepatic origin	An abnormally increased level of liver isoforms of `alkaline phosphatase, tissue-nonspecific isozyme` (PRO:000003968) in the blood.	肝源性碱性磷酸酶升高	（:000003968 PRO）在血液的异常增加`碱性磷酸酶，组织非特异性isozyme`肝同工型的水平。

HP:0010640	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the nasal cavity	Abnormality of the nasal cavity (the cavity includes and starts at the nares and reaches all the way through to the and includes the choanae, the posterior nasal apertures).	鼻腔异常	鼻腔（包括从鼻孔开始到后鼻孔即鼻后部开孔的所有通道）的异常。
HP:0010641	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the midnasal cavity	Abnormality of the midnasal cavity which includes the cavity between the nares and the choanae.	鼻中腔异常	鼻中腔的异常。鼻中腔包括鼻孔和鼻后孔之间的空腔。
HP:0010643	头部和颈部的异常	Midnasal atresia	Absence or abnormal closure of the midnasal cavity.	中鼻腔闭锁	中鼻腔异常关闭或者缺失。

HP:0010647	体壁的异常	Abnormal elasticity of skin	Any abnormal increase or reduction in skin elasticity.	皮肤弹性异常	皮肤弹性的异常增加或降低。
HP:0010648	体壁的异常	Dermal translucency	An abnormally increased ability of the skin to permit light to pass through (translucency) such that subcutaneous structures such as veins display an increased degree of visibility.	半透明状皮肤	皮肤反常性光透性增加（呈半透明状），从而导致皮下结构如静脉的可视性增加。
HP:0010649	头部和颈部的异常	Flat nasal alae	An abnormal degree of flatness of the `Ala of nose` (FMA:59519), which can be defined as a reduced nasal elevation index (lateral depth of the nose from the tip of the nose to the insertion of the nasal ala in the cheek x 100 divided by the side-to-side breadth of the nasal alae).	鼻翼扁平	鼻翼的平坦度异常扁平，可被定义为鼻高指数（鼻子从鼻尖到鼻翼插入脸颊的部位的外侧深度×100再除以由鼻翼一侧到另一侧的的宽度）降低。
HP:0010650	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Premaxillary underdevelopment	Reduction in size of the `Premaxilla` (FMA:76869), which is the embryonic structure that forms the anterior part of the maxilla.	前颌骨发育不良	前颌骨（形成上颌骨前部的胚胎结构）减小

HP:0010652	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the dura mater	An abnormality of the `Dura mater` (FMA:9592).	硬膜异常	在`硬膜`的异常（FMA:9592）。
HP:0010653	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the falx cerebri	An abnormality of the `Falx cerebri` (FMA:83967).	大脑镰异常	在`大脑镰`的异常（FMA:83967）。
HP:0010654	神经系统异常	aplasia of the falx cerebri	A developmental defect characterized by `aplasia` (MPATH:58) of the `Falx cerebri` (FMA:83967).	大脑镰发育缺陷	一种发育缺陷以大脑镰(FMA:83967)的发育缺陷为特征。
HP:0010655	骨骼系统异常	Epiphyseal stippling	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in one or more epiphyses (FMA:24012).	骨骺点状钙化	一个或多个骨骺(FMA:24012)存在异常点状（斑点，圆点状）钙化。
HP:0010656	骨骼系统异常	Abnormal epiphyseal ossification	An abnormal formation and mineralization of an`epiphysis.	骨骺骨化异常	骨骺的形成和矿化异常。
HP:0010657	骨骼系统异常	Patchy reduction of bone mineral density	Patchy (irregular) reduction in bone density. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	骨密度片状降低	骨密度片状（不规则）增加。这可能根据X射线上其严重性和分布许多形式而呈现多种形式。
HP:0010658	骨骼系统异常	Patchy changes of bone mineral density	Patchy (irregular) changes in bone mineral density. These changes can either be patchy reduction or increase of mineral density as seen on x-rays. Depending on the pathomechanism and the underlying disease, these changes can either appear solely as reduction or increase or as a combination of both (patches of bone showing an increased density while others are affected by reduction of mineral density).	骨密度斑块样改变	骨密度片状（不规则）的变化。这些变化可以是X射线下的片状减少或矿物质密度的增加。根据不同的病理机制和潜在的疾病，这些减少或增加的变化可以出现单独出现或合并出现（一些骨表现出密度增加，而其他骨密度降低）。
HP:0010659	骨骼系统异常	Patchy variation in bone mineral density	Patchy (irregular) changes in bone mineral density with patches of bone showing an increased density side to side with patches that are affected by reduction of mineral density. This is sometimes referred to as a moth-eaten appearance on x-rays.	骨密度斑块样改变	骨密度斑块状改变，骨的密度增加，伴有密度下降的片状区域。这有时被称为X射线下的虫蚀样外观。
HP:0010660	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Abnormal hand bone ossification	An abnormal formation and mineralization of any bone of the`skeleton of hand.	手骨骨化异常	手骨的骨形成和矿化异常。

HP:0010685	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Low alkaline phosphatase of renal origin	An abnormally reduced level of kidney isoforms of `alkaline phosphatase, tissue-nonspecific isozyme` (PRO:000003968) in the blood.	肾源性碱性磷酸酶偏低	由于肾功能异常，血液中非组织特异性碱性磷酸酶低于正常水平。

HP:0010689	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Mirror image polydactyly	A hand or foot with more than five digits that has a recognizable A/P axis of symmetry. The axis can lie within a normally formed or partially duplicated digit resembling a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe, or hallux. Alternatively, the axis can be in an interdigital space with a flanking pair of digits that resemble a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe or hallux. The most lateral digits on each side of the hand typically resemble fifth fingers/toes.	镜像多趾	一只手或脚有多于五个的指或趾，在前后轴线上对称。轴线可以位于正常形成或者部分重复的、类似于中指，食指，拇指，脚趾，或者大脚趾的指或趾内。或者轴线位于一对类似于一个中指，食指，拇指，脚趾或大脚趾的指间或趾间内。在手上的每一侧的最外侧的趾通常类似于第五手指/脚趾。
HP:0010690	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Mirror image hand polydactyly	`Mirror image duplication of digits` (HP:0010689) affecting the hands only.	镜像多指	仅累及手的镜像重复多指（HP:0010689）。
HP:0010691	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Mirror image foot polydactyly	`Mirror image duplication of digits` (HP:0010689) affecting the feet.	镜像足多趾	累及脚的镜像多趾（HP:0010689）。

HP:0010693	眼部异常	Pulverulent Cataract	A kind of `congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) that is characterized by a hollow sphere of punctate opacities involving the fetal nucleus and that usually occurs bilaterally.	粉状白内障	先天性白内障（HP:0000519）的一种，其特征为晶状体胎儿核点状混浊，并且通常发生在双侧。
HP:0010694	眼部异常	Lamellar pulverulent cataract	A `Lamellar cataract` (HP:0007971) with a pulverulent (punctate, &quot;dust-like&quot; opacities) appearance.	片状粉末状白内障	白内障的一种（HP:0007971），晶体中有粉状（点状，“粉尘状”浑浊）的浑浊。
HP:0010695	眼部异常	Sutural cataract	A type of `congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) in which the opacity follows the anterior or posterior Y suture.	缝性白内障	先天性白内障的一种（HP:0000519），晶体的浑浊位于前缝或后缝。
HP:0010696	眼部异常	Polar cataract	A type of `Congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) in which the opacities occupy the subcapsular cortex at the anterior or posterior pole of the lens.	极性白内障	先天性白内障`（HP:0000519）的一种，其中混浊主要累及晶状体前极或后极的囊下皮质。
HP:0010697	眼部异常	Anterior pyramidal cataract	A type of `anterior polar cataract` (HP:0001134) which projects as a conical opacity into the anterior chamber.	前锥体白内障	前极性白内障的一种`（HP:0001134），晶体前表面呈圆锥形凸入前房。
HP:0010698	眼部异常	Nuclear pulverulent cataract	A type of `nuclear cataract` (HP:0008024) involving congenital pulverulent disc-like opacity of the embryonal and fetal nucleus.	核性粉尘状白内障	核性白内障的一种，涉及胚胎和胎儿晶状体核的先天性粉尘样圆盘状的混浊。

HP:0010700	眼部异常	Total cataract	A `Congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) characterized by an opacity of all the fibers of a lens.	全白内障	先天性白内障`（HP:0000519）的一种，其特征为晶状体所有纤维的浑浊。

HP:0010717	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osseous syndactyly of toes	Webbing or fusion of the toes, involving soft parts and including fusion of individual bones of the toes. Bony fusions are revered to as &quot;bony&quot; Syndactyly if the fusion occurs in a tibial-fibular axis. Fusions of bones of the toes in a proximo-distal axis are referred to as &quot;Symphalangism&quot;.	脚趾并指	脚趾间的蹼或融合，仅涉及软组织或也包括骨结构。如果融合发生在胫腓骨轴线，骨性融合被称为“骨”性并趾。脚趾在近-远轴的骨头融合称为“关节粘连”。

HP:0010731	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Extension of eyebrows towards upper eyelid	The eyebrows extend towards - or even all the way down to - the margin of the upper eyelid.	眉毛朝上眼睑延伸	眉毛伸向，甚至一直覆盖到上眼睑的边缘。
HP:0010732	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Nodular changes affecting the eyelids	Nodular changes affecting the eyelids may have many different causes such as cystic lesions (chalaziae, hordeolae), lipogranulomas, melanomas, infectious diseases (Molluscum contagiosum) and many more.	眼睑的结节样改变	眼睑的结节样改变可能有很多不同的原因，如囊性病变（霰粒肿，麦粒肿）、脂肪肉芽肿、黑素瘤以及感染性疾病（如传染性软疣）等。
HP:0010733	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	Naevus flammeus of the eyelid	`Naevus flammeus` (HP:0001052) localised in the skin of the eyelid.	眼睑鲜红斑痣	位于眼睑皮上的“鲜红斑痣”（HP:0001052）。
HP:0010734	骨骼系统异常	Fibrous dysplasia of the bones	Tumor-like growths that consist of replacement of the medullary bone with fibrous tissue, causing the expansion and weakening of the areas of bone involved. Especially when involving the skull or facial bones, the lesions can cause externally visible deformities. The skull is often, but not necessarily, affected, and any other bone or bones may be involved. Fibrous dysplasia can either effect isolated bones (Monostotic fibrous dysplasia) or also generalized all bones of the body (Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia).	纤维性骨发育不良	瘤样生长包括更换髓骨纤维组织，造成骨所涉及的领域的扩大和弱化。特别是涉及颅骨或面部骨骼时，病变可引起外部可见的畸形。颅骨通常（但不绝对）受影响的，任何其它的骨也可能设计。纤维异常增殖症可以影响孤立的骨骼（单骨纤维结构发育异常），而且也泛指全身（多骨纤维性发育异常）的所有骨骼。
HP:0010735	骨骼系统异常	Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia	`Fibrous dysplasia of the bones` (HP:0010734) were lesions are localized in many bones throughout of the body. Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia is a cardinal feature of McCune-Albright syndrome.	多骨纤维异常增殖症	病变累及全身多块骨头的`纤维性骨发育不良`（HP:0010734）。多骨纤维异常增殖症是McCune - Albright综合征的一个重要特征。
HP:0010736	骨骼系统异常	Monostotic fibrous dysplasia	`Fibrous dysplasia of the bones` (HP:0010734) were lesions are localized in only one bone.	单骨纤维异常增殖症	病变局限在一块骨`纤维性骨发育不良`（HP:0010734）。
HP:0010739	骨骼系统异常	Osteopoikilosis	Osteopoikilosis is a benign, asymptomatic sclerotic dysplasia of the bones. It affects both male and female and may be seen at any age. Radiographically sclerotic circular or ovoid lesions are usually symmetrically distributed in a periarticular location. Lesions can increase or decrease in size and number in serial radiographs or even disappear and do not have increased bone radiotracer uptake.	骨斑点症	骨斑点症是良性的，无症状的骨硬化发育不良。它影响男性和女性，可见于任何年龄。 放射影响可见硬化圆形或卵圆形病灶，通常对称地分布在关节周围的位置。病变可以在一系列X光片中增加或减少甚至消失，无放射性摄取增加。
HP:0010740	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Osteopathia striata	A lamellar pattern visible on radiographs and mainly localized at the metaphyses of the long tubular bones. Pathologic-anatomical studies revealed that these benign signs on x-rays are the result of a juvenile metaphyseal bone necrosis. Calcifications in the necrotic marrow lead to this lamellar or lattice-like appearance.	纹状骨病	在X光片上可见层状结构，主要位于长管状骨的干骺端。病理解剖研究显示，这些在X射线上的良性征象是青少年干骺端骨坏死导致的。坏死骨髓中的钙化导致这种层状或格子状的外观出现。
HP:0010741	肢体异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Edema of the lower limbs	An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin of the legs.	下肢水肿	腿部皮肤下的液体异常的聚积。
HP:0010742	肢体异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Edema of the upper limbs	An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin of the arms.	上肢水肿	手臂皮肤下液体的异常聚积。
HP:0010743	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Short metatarsal	Diminished length of a `metatarsal bone`(FMA:24492), with resultant proximal displacement of the associated toe.	短跖骨	跖骨长度的减少（FMA:24492），相关脚趾近端取代的结果。
HP:0010744	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent metatarsal bone	A developmental abnormality characterized by the absence (aplasia) of a `metatarsal bone` (FMA:24492).	跖骨缺失	以跖骨缺失（发育不全）为特征的一种发育缺陷（FMA:24492）。
HP:0010745	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	aplasia of the phalanges of the toes	Absence of a digit or of one or more phalanges of a toe.	脚趾趾骨发育不全	脚趾的一个或多个趾的缺如。

HP:0010747	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Medial flaring of the eyebrow	An abnormal distribution of eyebrow hair growth in the medial direction.	眉中部发散扩展	眉毛中部异常生长分布。
HP:0010748	头部和颈部的异常	Ectopic lacrimal punctum	Positioning of a lacrimal punctum other than at the medial margins of the eyelid.	泪点异位	泪点在眼睑的位置发生异常。
HP:0010749	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,头部和颈部的异常	Blepharochalasis	Blepharochalasis is characterized by recurrent, non-painful, nonerythematous episodes of eyelid edema. It has been divided into hypertrophic and atrophic forms. In the hypertrophic form recurrent edema results in orbital fat herniation through a weakened orbital septum. Most patients who have blepharochalasis present in an atrophic condition with atrophy of redundant eyelid skin and superior nasal fat pads.	眼皮松弛	眼皮松弛的特征是复发性、非疼痛、非红肿的眼睑水肿发作。它被分成肥厚型和萎缩型。肥厚型反复水肿导致眼眶脂肪疝压迫穿透弱化的眶隔。大多数萎缩型眼皮松弛患者有萎缩的冗余眼睑皮肤和上鼻脂肪垫。
HP:0010750	头部和颈部的异常	Dermatochalasis	Loss of elasticity of the upper and lower eyelids causing the skin to sag and bulge.	眼皮松弛	上下眼睑缺乏弹性，进而导致皮肤下垂和隆起。
HP:0010751	头部和颈部的异常	Chin dimple	A persistent midline depression of the skin over the fat pad of the `chin` (FMA:46495).	下巴浅凹	长期存在位于下巴中线脂肪垫上皮肤的凹陷。
HP:0010752	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Cleft mandible	Midline deficiency of the mandible and some or all overlying tissues.	下颌骨裂	下颌骨及部分或全部覆盖组织的在中线不足

HP:0010760	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent toe	Aplasia of a `toe` (FMA:25046). That is, absence of all phalanges of a non-hallux digit of the foot and the associated soft tissues.	脚趾缺失	一个脚趾的发育不全（FMA:25046）。也就是说，非大拇趾趾骨及相关软组织的缺如。

HP:0010762	肿瘤,骨骼系统异常	Chordoma	A chordoma is a tumors that arises from embryonic remnants of the `notochord` (FMA:85521) along the length of the neuraxis. Chordomas generally occur in the sacrum, intracranially at the clivus, or along the spinal axis.	脊索瘤	脊索瘤是产生于&#39;脊索`（FMA:85521）的肿瘤，沿神经轴分布。脊索瘤一般发生在骶骨，颅内的斜坡，或沿着脊柱轴线。
HP:0010763	头部和颈部的异常	Low insertion of columella	Insertion of the posterior columella below the nasal base.	鼻小柱插入位置低	鼻小柱后部在鼻基下方插入。

HP:0010767	骨骼系统异常	Sacrococcygeal pilonidal abnormality	The presence of a cyst, fistula, or abscess in the sacrococcygeal region (gluteal crease) characteristically accompanied by hair and skin folds.	骶尾部藏毛异常	骶尾部（臀部皱折）的存在特征伴有头发和皮肤皱褶的囊肿，瘘，脓肿。

HP:0010772	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Anomalous pulmonary venous return	A developmental defect characterized by abnormal connection of or more pulmonary veins to the superior or inferior vena cava, the right atrium, or the coronary sinus, resulting in a left-to-right shunt of oxygenated blood.	肺静脉回流异常	肺静脉与上、下腔静脉、右心房或者冠状窦连接异常，导致氧合血从左到右的分流。

HP:0010774	心血管系统异常	Cor triatriatrum	The presence of an additional membrane in the left or right cardiac atrium which results in the subdivision of the affected atrium (and thus in total three atria, whence the name).	三房心	左心房或右心房形成一个额外的膜，导致受影响心房的一分为二（因此共有三个心房）。
HP:0010775	心血管系统异常	Vascular ring	A developmental defect of the aortic arch system in which the trachea and esophagus are completely encircled by connected segments of the aortic arch and its branches.	血管环	主动脉弓系统发育缺陷，其中气管和食管完全由主动脉弓及其分支连接段包围。
HP:0010776	呼吸系统异常	Tracheobronchmegaly	Marked widening of the trachea and major bronchi that may be predispose to chronic respiratory tract infection.	气管支气管肥大	气管和主支气管显著增宽，可能易患慢性呼吸道感染。

HP:0010797	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Hemangioblastoma	A `hemangioblastoma` (MPATH:238) is a benign vascular neoplasm that arises almost exclusively in the central nervous system. HP:0010813	体壁的异常	Abnormal number of hair whorls	More than two clockwise hair whorls.	发旋数量异常	两个以上呈顺时针分布的发旋。
HP:0010814	体壁的异常	Abnormal position of hair whorl	Hair growth from a single point on the scalp in any location other than lateral to the midline and close to the vertex of the skull.	发旋位置异常	头发从头皮的任意一个部位生长，而不仅仅是从头皮中线和颅骨顶点的附近。
HP:0010815	体壁的异常	Nevus sebaceous	A congenital, hairless plaque consisting of overgrown epidermis, sebaceous glands, hair follicles, apocrine glands and connective tissue. They are a variant of epidermal naevi. Sebaceous naevi most often appear on the scalp, but they may also arise on the face, neck or forehead. At birth, a sevaceous nevus typically appears as a solitary, smooth, yellow-orange hairless patch. Sebaceous naevi become more pronounced around adolescence, often appearing bumpy, warty or scaly.	皮脂腺痣	皮脂腺痣是先天性的表面光滑无毛发的隆起性斑块，由增生的表皮、皮脂腺、毛囊、汗腺腺体和结缔组织构成，是表皮痣的一个变种，常发生在头皮、面、颈部及前额。出生时，多为孤立光滑、无毛发的橙黄色斑点。在青春期，皮损更加明显，呈乳头瘤样、疣状或鳞片状。
HP:0010816	体壁的异常	Epidermal nevus	Epidermal naevi are due to an overgrowth of the epidermis and may be present at birth (50%) or develop during childhood.	表皮痣	表皮痣是因表皮过度增生所致，可在出生时即有（50%）或在幼儿期出现。
HP:0010817	体壁的异常	Linear nevus sebaceous	A type of `nevus sebaceous` (HP:0010815) with a linear form, raised borders and yellowish color.	线状皮脂腺痣	皮脂腺痣的一种，呈线型，外观淡黄色，边缘隆起。
HP:0010818	神经系统异常	Generalized tonic seizures	Generalized seizures with sustained increase in muscle contraction lasting a few seconds to minutes.	全面性强直发作	全身性发作，肌肉收缩持续增强持续几秒钟到几分钟。
HP:0010819	神经系统异常	Atonic seizures	Seizures characterized by a sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone, which may be fragmentary, confined to a segment (limb, jaw, head), or massive, leading to a slumping to the ground .	失张力癫痫发作	一种癫痫发作，其特征在于突然丧失肌肉张力，可以是局部的张力减低，局限在一个节段（肢，颚，头），或块状，导致患者下滑到地面。
HP:0010820	神经系统异常	Dacrystic seizures	A type of `seizure` (HP:0001250) characterized by crying or an outburst of crying as a major feature.	哭泣性癫痫	以哭或哭泣发作为特征的癫痫(HP:0001250)。
HP:0010821	神经系统异常	Gelastic seizures	A type of `seizure` (HP:0001250) characterized by laughing or an outburst of laughing as a major feature.	痴笑发作	癫痫发作（0001250 HP）的一种类型，表现为大笑或主要特点是爆发性大笑。
HP:0010822	眼部异常	Scintillating scotoma	A scintillating scotoma is a common visual aura that can preced a migraine, whereby a spot of flickering light near the center of the visual fields occurs. The spot prevents vision, and is thus termed scotoma. The scotoma can extend into one or more shimmering arcs of white or colored flashing lights.	闪烁的暗点	闪烁的暗点是一种常见的视觉先兆，可以是偏头痛的先兆，其中闪烁的灯光在视野中心点附近出现。盲点可延伸进入白色或有色闪灯的一个或多个波光弧。
HP:0010823	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Ridged cranial sutures	An overlap of the bony plates of the skull in an infant, with or without early closure.	脊颅缝	婴儿颅骨骨板的重叠，伴或不伴早闭。
HP:0010824	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the fifth cranial nerve	An abormality of the `fifth cranial nerve` (FMA:50866).	第五对颅神经异常	在`第五对颅神经`的异常（FMA:50866）。
HP:0010825	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the eleventh cranial nerve	Abnormality of the `eleventh cranial nerve` (FMA:6720).	第十一对颅神经异常	在&#39;十一对颅神经`异常（FMA:6720）。
HP:0010826	神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the twelfth cranial nerve	Abnormality of the `twelfth cranial nerve` (FMA:50871).	第十二对颅神经异常	在&#39;第十二颅神经`异常（FMA:50871）。
HP:0010827	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the seventh cranial nerve	Abnormality of the `seventh cranial nerve` (FMA:50868) sometimes also referred to as the facial nerve.	第七对颅神经异常	在`第七颅神经`异常（FMA:50868），也被称为面神经。
HP:0010828	神经系统异常	Hemifacial spasm	A segmental myoclonus of muscles innervated by the facial nerve.	偏侧面肌痉挛	面神经支配肌肉的节段性肌阵挛。
HP:0010829	神经系统异常	Impaired temperature sensation	A reduced ability to discriminate between different temperatures.	温度觉障碍	辨别不同温度的能力下降。
HP:0010830	神经系统异常	Impaired tactile sensation	A reduced sense of touch (tactile sensation). This is usually tested with a wisp of cotton or a fine camel&#39;s hair brush, by asking patients to say &#39;now&#39; each time they feel the stimulus.	触觉障碍	触摸（触觉）感觉减退。通常使用棉毛或细驼绒毛刷进行测试，要求病人每次感觉到刺激时说“现在”。
HP:0010831	神经系统异常	Impaired proprioception	A loss or impairment of the sensation of the relative position of parts of the body and joint position.	本体感觉障碍	身体相应的位置和关节位置感觉的损害或缺失。
HP:0010832	神经系统异常	Abnormality of pain sensation	Pain is an unpleasant sensation that can range from mild, localized discomfort to agony, whereby the physical part of pain results from nerve stimulation and is often accompanied by an emotional component. This term groups abnormalities in pain sensation presumed to result from abnormalities related to the specific nerve fibers that carry the pain impulses to the brain.	痛觉异常	疼痛是一种不愉快的感觉，其程度从轻微、局部的不适感、到痛苦，由此物理性的疼痛来源于神经刺激，并经常伴随情绪性因素。痛觉异常，推测是由于的向大脑传递痛觉冲动的特定神经纤维异常所导致的。
HP:0010833	神经系统异常	Spontaneous pain sensation	Spontaneous pain is a kind of neuropathic pain which occurs without an identifiable trigger.	自发性疼痛感	自发痛是一种神经性疼痛其发生没有明确的诱发因素。
HP:0010834	神经系统异常	Trophic changes related to pain	Trophic changes is a term used to describe abnormalities in the area of pain that include primarily wasting away of the skin, tissues, or muscle, thinning of the bones, and changes in how the hair or nails grow, including thickening or thinning of hair or brittle nails.	与疼痛相关的营养改变	营养改变是用于描述疼痛区域的异常包括主要消瘦的皮肤、组织或肌肉，变薄的骨头，头发或指甲生长方式的改变，包括增稠或头发稀疏或指甲变脆。
HP:0010835	神经系统异常	Dissociated sensory loss	A pattern of sensory loss with selective loss of touch sensation and proprioception without loss of pain and temperature, or vice-versa.	分离性感觉缺失	一种感觉障碍，特点是选择性的触觉和本体感觉缺失，而痛温觉正常，反之亦然。
HP:0010836	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormality of copper homeostasis	An `abnormal` ( PATO:0000460) `concentration` (PATO:0000033) of `copper` (CHEBI:28694).	铜稳态平衡异常	`异常`（PATO:0000460）的`铜`（CHEBI:28694）`浓度`（0000033 PATO）。
HP:0010837	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased serum ceruloplasmin	A kind of `Abnormality of copper homeostasis` (HP:0010836) related to a `decreased concentration` (PATO:0001163) of `ceruloplasmin` (PR:000005794) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	血清铜蓝蛋白降低	一种&#39;铜homeostasis`异常（HP:0010836）中的`blood`（FMA:9670）:对`ceruloplasmin`（000005794 PR）相关的`下降concentration`（0001163 PATO）。
HP:0010838	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	High nonceruloplasmin-bound serum copper	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of non `ceruloplasmin` (PR:000005794) bound `copper` (CHEBI:28694) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	高浓度非铜蓝蛋白结合型血清铜离子	非`ceruloplasmin`（PR:000005794）的约束`copper`（CHEBI:28694）在`blood`（FMA:9670）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）。
HP:0010839	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased urinary copper concentration	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `copper` (CHEBI:28694) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	尿液铜浓度增高	的`copper`（CHEBI:28694）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）在`urine`（FMA:12274）。
HP:0010841	神经系统异常	Multifocal epileptiform discharges	A abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG) and being identified at multiple locations (foci).	多灶性痫样放电	由脑电图记录到的多灶的大脑异常放电活动。
HP:0010843	神经系统异常	EEG with focal slow activity	Focal (localized) slow activity reflects focal dysfunction, not diffuse dysfunction (i.e., encephalopathy).	脑电图局灶性慢活动	局灶（局部）慢活动反映局灶脑功能障碍，而不是弥散脑功能障碍（即脑病）。
HP:0010844	神经系统异常	EEG with multifocal slow activity	Multifocal slowing of cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，多灶性慢活动	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的多灶性慢的脑电活动。
HP:0010845	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized slow activity	Diffuse slowing of cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，广泛性慢活动	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的弥漫性慢的脑电活动。
HP:0010846	神经系统异常	EEG with persistent abnormal rhythmic activity	The presence of abnormal persistent rhythmic activity in electroencephalogram	脑电图，异常的持续性节律活动	脑电图中出现异常的，持续性节律活动。
HP:0010847	神经系统异常	EEG with spike-wave complexes (&lt;2.5 Hz)	The presence of complexes of slow spikes and slow waves (&lt;2.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，（慢）棘慢复合波（&lt;2.5赫兹）	脑电图存在棘慢复合波（&lt;2.5赫兹）。
HP:0010848	神经系统异常	EEG with spike-wave complexes (2.5-3.5 Hz)	The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (2.5-3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，棘慢复合波（2.5-3.5赫兹）	脑电图存在棘慢复合波（2.5-3.5赫兹）。
HP:0010849	神经系统异常	EEG with spike-wave complexes (&gt;3.5 Hz)	The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (&gt;3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，（快）棘慢复合波（&gt; 3.5赫兹）	脑电图存在棘慢复合波（&gt; 3.5赫兹）。
HP:0010850	神经系统异常	EEG with spike-wave complexes	Complexes of spikes (&lt;70 ms) and sharp waves (70-200 ms), which are sharp transient waves that have a strong association with epilepsy, in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，棘慢复合波	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动:棘波（&lt;70毫秒）和尖波（70-200毫秒）的复合波，这是与癫痫密切相关的短暂尖波。
HP:0010851	神经系统异常	EEG with burst suppression	The burst suppression pattern in electroencephalography refers to a characteristic periodic pattern of low voltage (&lt;10 microvolts) suppressed background and a relatively shorter pattern of higher amplitude slow, sharp, and spiking complexes.	EEG伴爆发抑制	在脑电图中爆发抑制模式指的是低电压（&lt;10微伏）抑制背景和相对较短模式的较高波幅慢波，尖波，和棘波交替反复出现的波形。
HP:0010852	神经系统异常	EEG with photoparoxysmal response	EEG abnormalities (epileptiform discharges) evoked by flashing lights or black and white striped patterns.	脑电图，光阵发性反应	脑电图异常（癫痫样放电）由闪光刺激或黑色和白色条纹的图案诱发。
HP:0010853	神经系统异常	EEG with periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges	Periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges (PLEDs)are periodic, lateralized, and epileptiform. PLEDs show a relatively constant interval between discharges (0.5 to 3 seconds).	脑电图，周期性一侧癫痫样放电	周期性一侧性癫痫样放电（PLEDs）是指癫痫样波在单侧周期性出现 PLEDs显示放电以相对恒定的时间间隔（0.5至3秒）出现。
HP:0010854	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized low amplitude activity	An abnormal generalized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，广泛性低波幅活动	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的脑电活动，波幅普遍异常降低。
HP:0010855	神经系统异常	EEG with localized low amplitude activity	An abnormal localized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，局部低波幅活动	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的局部异常波幅降低脑电活动。
HP:0010856	神经系统异常	EEG with periodic complexes	Periodically occurring generalized periodic complexes.	脑电图，周期复合波	周期性出现的广泛性周期复合波。
HP:0010857	神经系统异常	EEG with periodic abnormalities	Periodically recurring abnormalities in the EEG.	脑电图，周期性异常	周期性重复的脑电图异常。
HP:0010858	神经系统异常	EEG with hyperventilation-induced epileptiform discharges	Epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电。
HP:0010859	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Frank breech presentation	A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which the hips are flexed and the knees are extended.	单臀先露	“臀先露”(HP:0001623)的一种，胎儿双髋关节屈曲,双膝关节直伸。
HP:0010860	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Complete breech presentation	A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which the hips are flexed and the knees are flexed.	完全臀先露	“臀先露”的一种（HP:0001623），胎儿髋关节及膝关节均屈曲。
HP:0010861	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Incomplete breech presentation	A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which one or both hips are extended and one or both of the fetus&#39; feet are pointing down and entering the birth canal.	不完全臀先露	“臀先露”(HP:0001623)的一种，胎儿单侧或双侧髋关节直伸，胎儿一足或双足向下先进入产道。
HP:0010862	神经系统异常	Delayed fine motor development	A type of `motor delay` (HP:0001270) characterized by an delay in acquiring the ability to control the fingers and hands.	精细动作发育迟缓	以习得控制手指和手的能力延迟为特点的运动发育迟缓（HP:0001270）。
HP:0010863	神经系统异常	Receptive language delay	A delay in the acquisition of the ability to understand the speech of others.	接受性语言发育迟缓	理解他人语言能力的发育迟缓
HP:0010864	神经系统异常	Intellectual disability, severe	Severe mental retardation is defined as an intelligence quotient (IQ) in the range of 20-34.	重度智力残疾	重度精神发育迟滞定义为智商（IQ）在20-34的范围内。
HP:0010865	神经系统异常	Oppositional defiant disorder	An enduring pattern of uncooperative, defiant, and hostile behavior toward authority figures that does not involve major antisocial violations, is not accounted for by the child&#39;s developmental stage, and results in significant functional impairment. A certain level of oppositional behavior is common in children and adolescents.	对立违抗性障碍	一种不合作，挑衅和敌对权威人物的持久的模式，但不包括严重的反社会行为。此行为不能被儿童的发育阶段所解释，可导致严重的功能受损。但在儿童和青少年中一定程度的反抗行为是正常。
HP:0010866	消化系统异常	Abdominal wall defect	An `incomplete closure` (PATO:0000609) of the `abdominal wall` (FMA:259054).	腹壁缺损	腹壁的不完全闭合。
HP:0010867	神经系统异常	Dyssynergia	A type of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) characterized by the impairment of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed. With dyssynergia, a voluntary movement appears broken down into its component parts.	协同失调	`共济失调`(HP:0001251)的一种，表现为按照适当的顺序和速度进行的随意运动能力受损。协调失调时，随意运动表现为它的组成部分的分解动作。
HP:0010868	神经系统异常	Ocular dyssynergia	A type of `dyssynergia` (HP:0010867) affecting eye movements and characterized by the inability to smoothly follow a visual target across the visual field.	眼协同失调	一种影响眼球运动的以无法流畅的在视野中追踪物体为特征的眼协同失调
HP:0010869	神经系统异常	Asynergia	A type of `dyssynergy` (HP:0010867) characterized by the lack of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed.	协调不能	一种类型的`协调障碍`（HP:0010867），特点是缺乏以适当的顺序和速度平稳进行随意运动的能力。
HP:0010871	神经系统异常	Sensory ataxia	Incoordination of movement caused by a deficit in the sensory nervous system. Sensory ataxia can be distinguished from cerebellar ataxia by asking the patient to close his or her eyes. Persons with cerebellar ataxia show only a minimal worsening of symptoms, whereas persons with sensory ataxia show a marked worsening of symptoms.	感觉性共济失调	由于感觉神经系统功能障碍导致的运动不协调。可以通过让患者闭眼区分感觉性共济失调和小脑性共济失调。小脑性共济失调的人只显示轻微的症状恶化，而感觉性共济失调的人显示出显著的症状恶化。
HP:0010872	心血管系统异常	EKG: T-wave inversion	An inversion of the T-wave (which is normally positive).	心电图:T波倒置	T波的倒置（通常是正的）。
HP:0010873	神经系统异常	Cervical spinal cord atrophy	Atrophy of the cervical segment of the spinal cord.	颈髓萎缩	脊髓的颈段萎缩。
HP:0010874	骨骼系统异常,体壁的异常	Tendon xanthomatosis	The presence of xanthomas (intra-and extra-cellular accumulations of cholesterol) extensor tendons (typically over knuckles, Achilles tendon, knee, and elbows).	腱黄瘤病	在伸肌腱（通常在指关节、跟腱、膝和肘关节处皮肤）出现黄色瘤（胞内外的胆固醇聚集）。
HP:0010875	神经系统异常	Chaddock reflex	A diagnostic reflex elicited by stimulation of the skin over the surface of the lateral malleolus of the foot. The Chaddock reflex is present if there is extension of one or more or all of the toes with or without fanning of them when the external inframalleolar skin is stimulated. The Chaddock sign, similar to the Babinski sign, is taken to be an indication of disease of the spinocortical (pyramidal) tract.	查多克反射	刺激外踝下方足背外缘的皮肤引出的一种诊断性反射。如果刺激下踝外侧皮肤时出现一个、多个或所有脚趾背伸（伴或不伴扇形展开）为查多克反射阳性。查多克征与巴宾斯基征类似，被视为皮质脊髓（锥体）束受损的体征。
HP:0010876	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormality of circulating protein level	An abnormal level of a circulating `protein` (CHEBI:16541) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	循环系统内的蛋白水平异常	`血液 `（FMA:9670）中循环`蛋白`(CHEBI:16541)的水平异常。
HP:0010877	眼部异常	Unilateral strabismus	A type of strabismus`(HP:0000486) in which only one eye is affected. Unilateral strabismus is to be distinguished from alternating strabismus, in which either of the eyes &#39;squints&#39; at different times.	单侧斜视	单眼斜视的一种，只有一只眼睛受到影响。单侧斜视需要与交替斜视区分开，后者为双眼在不同时间点交替发生“斜视”。
HP:0010878	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,头部和颈部的异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Fetal cystic hygroma	The presence during the prenatal period of a cystic mass with multiple septa with multiple, asymmetric, thin-walled cysts near the posterior aspect of the neck. Fetal cystic hygroma can be defined as nuchal translucency with or without septations measuring greater than 3.0 mm.	胎儿囊状水瘤	产前期间出现，颈部后方附近的囊性包块，由多个隔片及多个不对称的薄壁包囊组成。胎囊状水瘤可以被定义为有或没有分隔的长度大于3毫米的颈部半透明物。
HP:0010879	头部和颈部的异常	Postnatal cystic hygroma	#####	出生后囊状水瘤	#####
HP:0010880	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Increased nuchal translucency	The presence of an abnormally large hypoechoic space in the posterior fetal neck (usually detected on prenatal ultrasound examination).	颈部透明层厚度增加	胎儿颈后皮下组织内的低回声层异常增厚（通常为产前超声检查项目）。
HP:0010881	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Abnormality of the umbilical cord	An abnormality of the `umbilical cord` (FMA:85541), which is the cord connecting the developing embryo or fetus to the placenta.	脐带异常	胚胎或胎儿与胎盘间的纽带的异常。
HP:0010882	心血管系统异常	Pulmonary valve atresia	A congenital disorder of the pulmonary valve in which the orifice of the valve fails to develop.	肺动脉瓣闭锁	肺动脉瓣的先天疾病，其中该瓣膜的节流孔发育不良。
HP:0010883	心血管系统异常	Aortic valve atresia	A congenital disorder of the aortic valve in which the orifice of the valve fails to develop.	主动脉瓣闭锁	主动脉瓣的先天性疾病，瓣膜口发育缺陷。
HP:0010884	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Acromelia	Shortening of the extremities affecting primarily the distal parts of the limbs (hands and feet) in relation to the other segments of the limbs.	肢端短缩	相对于肢体的其他节段，主要影响影响四肢远端部分（手和脚）的肢端短缩。
HP:0010885	骨骼系统异常	Aseptic necrosis	A disease where there is cellular death (necrosis) of bone components due to interruption of the blood supply.	无菌性骨坏死	疾病处有由于血液供应中断引起的骨成分坏死。
HP:0010886	骨骼系统异常	Osteochondrosis dissecans	A joint disorder caused by blood deprivation in the subchondral bone causing the subchondral bone to die in a process called avascular necrosis. The bone is then reabsorbed by the body, leaving the articular cartilage it supported prone to damage. The result is fragmentation (dissection) of both cartilage and bone, and the free movement of these osteochondral fragments within the joint space, causing pain and further damage.	骨软骨炎	由软骨下骨供血不足引起软骨下骨坏死引起的关节疾病，称为股骨头缺血性坏死。骨随后由身体再吸收，而使它支持的关节软骨容易损坏。其结果是软骨和骨碎片化，且这些骨软骨碎片在关节间隙内自由运动，引起疼痛和进一步的损害。
HP:0010888	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Morbus Koehler	Morbus Koehler is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Os naviculare pedis.	克勒病	克勒病是一种青少年型累及舟状骨的无菌坏死（HP:0100323）。
HP:0010889	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Morbus Kienboeck	Morbus Kienboeck is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Os lunatum.	金伯克病	金伯克病是一种青少年型累及月状骨的无菌坏死（HP:0100323）。
HP:0010890	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Morbus Osgood-Schlatter	Morbus Osgood-Schlatter is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Tuberositas tibiae.	奥斯古德 - 施拉特病	奥斯古德 - 施拉特是一种青少年型累及胫骨粗隆的无菌坏死（HP:0100323）。
HP:0010891	骨骼系统异常	Morbus Scheuermann	A developmental growth retardation of the vertebral end plates that may lead to secondary destruction of the vertebral end plates and protrusion of the nucleus pulposus into the vertebral body (so called Schmorl&#39;s nodes as seen on x-rays).	脊椎驼背后凸症	椎骨端板可能导致椎骨端板的二次破坏和髓核到椎体的突起的发育生长迟缓（所以在X射线下称为Schmorl的节点）。

HP:0010920	眼部异常	Zonular cataract	Zonular cataracts are defined to be cataracts that affect specific regions of the lens.	板层状白内障	#####
HP:0010921	眼部异常	Coralliform cataract	A &#39;coral-like&#39; pattern of opacity in the lens of the eye. That is, a cataract with an irregular, stellate form.	珊瑚状白内障	晶状体上“珊瑚状”的浑浊。即，具有不规则、星形浑浊的白内障。
HP:0010922	眼部异常	Membranous cataract	A form of cataract in which the lens substance has shrunk, leaving a collapsed, flattened capsule with little or no cortex or epithelium on the lens.	膜性白内障	一种特殊类型的白内障，晶体物质缩小，压平囊膜，晶体上很少或没有皮质或上皮细胞。

HP:0010924	眼部异常	Posterior cortical cataract	A `cataract` (HP:0000518) that affects the posterior part of the `cortex of the lens` (FMA:58970).	后皮质型白内障	此型白内障主要累及晶体后方的皮质。

HP:0010926	眼部异常	Aculeiform cataract	A kind of nuclear cataract characterized by fiberglasslike or needlelike crystals projecting in different directions, through or close to the axial region of the lens.	Aculeiform 白内障	一种核性白内障，其特征为玻璃纤维状或针状晶体突起呈放射状排列，主要位于或邻近晶体的瞳孔轴向区。

HP:0010942	心血管系统异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Echogenic intracardiac focus	A finding of a focus of increased echogenicity upon prenatal ultrasound examination of the fetus. The foci may be present in one or both ventricles. Echogenic intracardiac focus (EICF) is defined as a focus of echogenicity comparable to bone, in the region of the papillary muscle in either or both ventricles of the fetal heart.	心室强光点	心室强光点是因产前超声检查关注于胎儿超声回声增强而发现的。强光点可出现在一个或两个心室内。心室强光点是指胎儿心室内的、与邻近肋骨回声相似的超声现象，这种回声光点一般出现于一个或两个心室的乳突肌内。
HP:0010943	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Echogenic fetal bowel	Echogenic bowel is defined as fetal bowel with homogenous areas of echogenicity that are equal to or greater than that of surrounding bone.	胎儿肠管回声增强	肠管回声增强是指胎儿肠管回声强度接近或高于其周围骨骼回声的强度。
HP:0010944	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the renal pelvis	An abnormality of the `renal pelvis` (FMA:15575).	肾盂异常	肾盂的异常。
HP:0010945	泌尿生殖系统异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Fetal pyelectasis	Mild pyelectasis is defined as a hypoechoic spherical or elliptical space within the renal pelvis that measures at least 5mm and not more than 10 mm. The measurement is taken on a transverse section through the fetal renal pelvis using the maximum anterior-to-posterior measurement.	胎儿肾盂扩张	轻度肾盂扩张被定义为超声检查时低回声球形或椭圆形的肾盂扩大，起码是5毫米以上但不超过10毫米。测量时取横截面，通过胎儿肾盂，采集最大前后径。
HP:0010946	泌尿生殖系统异常	Dilatation of the renal pelvis	The presence of `dilatation` (MPATH:66) of the `renal pelvis` (FMA:15575).	肾盂扩张	肾盂呈扩张状态。
HP:0010947	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of ductus venosus blood flow	The abnormal velocity or direction of blood flow in the ductus venosus， which can reflect the fetus cardiac function and overall development.	静脉导管血流异常	静脉导管中血流的速度或方向异常，可反映胎儿心功能和胎儿的整体发育状况。
HP:0010948	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the fetal cardiovascular system	An abnormality of the fetal circulation  system or fetal echocardiogram.	胎儿心血管系统异常	胎儿循环系统异常或胎儿超声心动图发现的异常。
HP:0010949	心血管系统异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Abnormality of umbilical vein blood flow	An first-trimester prenatal ultrasound finding of abnormal blood flow in the umbilical vein.	脐静脉血流异常	孕早期产前超声发现的脐静脉血流异常。
HP:0010950	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the fourth ventricle	An abnormality of the `fourth ventricle` (FMA:78469).	第四脑室异常	在`第四脑室`的异常（FMA:78469）。
HP:0010951	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the third ventricle	An abnormality of the `third ventricle` (FMA:78454 ).	第三脑室异常	在`第三脑室`的异常（FMA:78454）。
HP:0010952	神经系统异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Mild fetal ventriculomegaly	A kind of `ventriculomegaly` (HP:0002119) occurring in the fetal period and usually diagnosed by prenatal ultrasound. Cerebral ventriculomegaly is defined by atrial measurements 10 mm or more. Mild ventriculomegaly (MVM) is defined as measurements between 10 and 15 mm. Measurements are obtained from an axial plane at the level of the thalamic nuclei just below the standard image to measure the BPD (pmid:16100637).	轻度胎儿脑室扩大	发生于胎儿期的脑室扩大（HP:0002119）的一种类型，通常利用产前超声诊断。脑室扩大定义为是体径10mm以上。轻度脑室扩大（MVM）定义为10至15毫米之间。从丘脑核团水平的轴位完成测量，刚好低于测量BPD（PMID:16100637）的标准图像。
HP:0010953	神经系统异常	Noncommunicating hydrocephalus	A form of `hydrocephalus` (HP:0000238) in which the flow of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) within the cerebral ventricular system or in the outlets of the CSF to the arachnoid space is obstructed.	非交通性脑积水	引流脑脊液的脑室系统或蛛网膜下腔阻塞后导致的一种脑积水。
HP:0010954	心血管系统异常	Hypoplastic right heart	Underdevelopment of the right-sided structures of the heart.	右心发育不全	心脏的右侧结构发育不全。
HP:0010955	泌尿生殖系统异常	Dilatation of the bladder	The presence of a `dilated` (PATO:0001571) `urinary bladder` .	膀胱扩张	膀胱呈扩张状态。
HP:0010956	泌尿生殖系统异常	Fetal megacystis	Fetal megacystis is an abnormally enlarged bladder identified at any gestational age.	胎儿巨膀胱症	胎儿巨大膀胱指在任何孕周呈现的膀胱异常增大。
HP:0010957	泌尿生殖系统异常	Congenital posterior urethral valve	A developmental defect resulting in an obstructing membrane in the posterior male urethra.	先天性后尿道瓣膜	一种发育异常，导致男性后尿道发生瓣膜状阻塞。
HP:0010958	泌尿生殖系统异常	Bilateral renal agenesis	A `bilateral` (PATO:0000618) form of `agenesis` (MPATH:57) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	双肾缺如	双侧肾缺如。
HP:0010959	呼吸系统异常	Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation of the lung	Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation (CCAM) can be diagnosed prenatally if ultrasound shows a cystic or solid lung tumor. A CCAM does not have systemic arterial blood supply (in contrast to bronchopulmonary sequenstration). It is a cystic area within the lung that originates from abnormal embryogenesis.	先天性肺囊性腺瘤样畸形	先天性囊性腺瘤样畸形（CCAM）可以在产前诊断，超声可显示囊性或实性肺癌。CCAM不具有系统性动脉血液供应（与支气管肺隔离症相反），它是源自胚胎发育畸形的肺内的囊性区域。
HP:0010960	呼吸系统异常	Bronchopulmonary sequestration	The presence of microscopic cystic masses of nonfunctioning pulmonary tissue that lack an obvious communication with the tracheobronchial tree.	支气管肺隔离症	无功能肺组织的囊性肿块（显微镜下改变），与气管支气管树不相通。
HP:0010961	呼吸系统异常	Intralobar sequestration	A kind of `bronchopulmonary sequestration` that is incorporated into the normal surrounding lung.	叶内型肺隔离症	与周围正常肺成为一体的一种支气管肺隔离症。
HP:0010962	呼吸系统异常	Extralobar sequestration	A kind of `bronchopulmonary sequestration` that is completely discrete from the normal lung and is surrounded by separate pleura.	叶外型肺隔离症	支气管肺隔离症一种，它与正常的肺完全不连续，并被独立的胸膜包围。
HP:0010963	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Absence of stomach bubble on fetal sonography	By the 14th week of gestation it is nearly always possible to visualized the fluid-filled fetal stomach bubble on prenatal sonography. This term refers to the absence of a normal fetal stomach bubble on fetal ultrasonography performed at around 16 to 20 weeks&#39; gestation.	胎儿超声下胃泡缺如	孕14周产前超声可见充盈的胎儿胃泡。这个术语指的是孕16~20周超声下胎儿胃泡未显示。

HP:0010982	遗传模式	Polygenic inheritance	A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of many (more than three) gene loci.	多基因遗传	#####
HP:0010983	遗传模式	Oligogenic inheritance	A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of a few gene loci. It is recommended this term be used for traits governed by three loci, although it is noted that usage of this term in the literature is not uniform.	寡基因遗传	#####
HP:0010984	遗传模式	Digenic inheritance	A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of two gene loci.	双基因遗传	#####
HP:0010985	遗传模式	Gonosomal inheritance	A mode of inheritance that is observed for traits related to a gene encoded on the sex chromosomes.	性连锁遗传	#####

HP:0011000	神经系统异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the optic tract	The optic tract refers to a segment between the optic chiasm and the lateral geniculate body. Each side bundle includes cross fibers from the ipsilateral retinal non-crossing fibers and the contralateral nasal retina，due to a variety of congenital or acquired factors caused visual developmental defects or incomplete caused by varying degrees of visual impairment	视束发育缺陷/发育不全	视束指视交叉与外侧膝状体之间的结构。每一侧视束包括来自同侧视网膜不交叉纤维和对侧视网膜鼻侧的交叉纤维,由于各种先天或后天因素引起视束发育缺陷或不全而引起不同程度视力受损。
HP:0011001	骨骼系统异常	Increased bone mineral density	An abnormal increase of bone mineral density, that is, of the amount of matter per cubic centimeter of bones which is often refered to as osteosclerosis. Osteosclerosis can be detected on radiological examination as an increased whiteness (density) of affected bones.	骨密度增加	骨密度（每立方厘米骨头的物质量）异常增加，通常称为骨硬化。骨硬化可以通过放射学检查，表现为受影响骨骼的白度增加（密度）。
HP:0011002	骨骼系统异常	Osteopetrosis	Abnormally increased formation of dense trabecular bone tissue. Despite the increased density of bone tissue, osteopetrotic bones tend to be more fracture-prone than normal.	骨硬化	骨组织形成致密的骨小梁异常增多。尽管骨组织密度增加，骨硬化骨骼比正常谷歌更趋于断裂。

HP:0011092	头部和颈部的异常	Mulberry molar	Mulberry molars are irregular teeth generally affecting the first molars and are characterized by a grossly deformed crown imitating, as the name implies, the surface of a mulberry.	桑葚状大臼齿	桑葚状大臼齿是不规则的牙齿，通常影响第一大臼齿，特征为变形的牙齿冠部，顾名思义状如桑葚表面。

HP:0011098	神经系统异常	Speech apraxia	A type of apraxia that is characterized by difficulty or inability to execute speech movements because of problems with coordination and motor problems, leading to incorrect articulation. An increase of errors with increasing word and phrase length may occur.	失读症	是一种失用的，其特征因为协调和运动问题导致执行语言运动困难或不能，从而导致不正确发音。随着单词和短语的长度的增加发生的错误的可能性也会增加。

HP:0011128	消化系统异常	Acute esophageal necrosis	A condition characterized by necrosis of the mucosal and submucosal layers of the esophagus not related to ingestion of caustic or other injurious agents. Endoscopically, there is a dark lesion (&#39;black esophagus&#39;) distributed in a circumferential manner in the distal one-third of the esophagus with or without exudates. There is involvement of the distal esophagus ending sharply at the gastroesophageal junction.	急性食管坏死	其特征在于食管粘膜或粘膜下层坏死，与腐蚀剂或其他有害物质的摄入无关。内镜下表现为食管远端1/3环绕分布的黑色病灶（“黑食管”），可有渗出。可累及食管远端，止于胃食管交界处。

Chronic furunculosis refers to recurrent episodes of furuncles, often caused by recurrent staphylococcus infection.	慢性疖病	疖（疖子）是一种累及整个毛囊及附近皮肤组织的皮肤感染性疾病。慢性疖病是指疖的反复发作，常由葡萄球菌反复感染引起。

HP:0011135	体壁的异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the sweat glands	Absence or developmental hypoplasia of the `sweat glands` (FMA:59152).	汗腺发育缺陷/不全	汗腺缺失或发育不全。
HP:0011136	体壁的异常	aplasia of the sweat glands	Absence of the `sweat glands` (FMA:59152).	汗腺发育不全	汗腺缺失。
HP:0011137	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	Non-pruritic urticaria	Pale reddish slightly elevated papules and plaques of 0.5-3 cm in diameter and not accompanied by pruritus.	非瘙痒性荨麻疹	淡红色稍隆起的丘疹，直径0.5-3厘米，不伴有瘙痒。
HP:0011138	体壁的异常	Abnormality of skin adnexa	An abnormality of the skin adnexa (skin appendages), which are specialized skin structures located within the dermis and focally within the subcutaneous fatty tissue, comprising three histologically distinct structures: (1) the pilosebaceous unit (hair follicle and sebaceous glands); (2) the eccrine sweat glands; and (3) the apocrine glands.	皮肤附属器的异常	皮肤附属器（皮肤附件），是位于真皮和皮下脂肪组织的特殊皮肤结构，其异常包括三个不同的组织学结构的异常：（1）毛皮脂单位（毛囊和皮脂腺）；（2）小汗腺； （3）大汗腺。
HP:0011139	消化系统异常	Gastric duplication	Gastric duplication is a usually cystic malformation of gastrointestinal tract, usually attached to the greater curvature of the stomach and has no communication with the stomach.	胃重复	胃重复通常是胃肠道的囊状畸形，一般附着于胃的大弯侧，但与胃不相通。
HP:0011140	消化系统异常	Gastrointestinal duplication	A spherical hollow structure with a smooth muscle coat, lined by a mucous membrane, and attached to any part of the gastrointestinal tract, from the base of the tongue to the anus.	胃肠重复	一个具有平滑肌外壳的中空球形结构，通过粘膜连接到胃肠道的任何部位（从舌的基部到肛门）。
HP:0011141	眼部异常	Age-related cataract	A type of cataract (opacification of the lens) that forms during the course of aging.	年龄相关性白内障	白内障的一种，（晶状体的混浊）在老化的过程中形成。
HP:0011142	眼部异常	Age-related nuclear cataract	A type of age-related cataract that primarily affects the nucleus of the lens.	年龄相关的核性白内障	年龄相关性白内障，主要是晶状体核的浑浊。
HP:0011143	眼部异常	Age-related cortical cataract	A type of age-related cataract that primarily affects the cortex of the lens.	年龄相关性皮质白内障	一种年龄相关性白内障，主要影响晶状体的皮质。
HP:0011144	眼部异常	Age-related posterior subcapsular cataract	A type of age-related cataract consisting of granular opacities occurring mainly in the central posterior cortex just under the posterior capsule.	年龄相关后囊下型白内障	一种年龄相关性白内障，主要发生于中央后囊下的皮质颗粒混浊。
HP:0011145	神经系统异常	Symptomatic seizures	A seizure that occurs in the context of a brain insult (systemic, toxic, or metabolic) and may not recur when the underlying cause has been removed or the acute phase has elapsed.	症状性癫痫发作	在脑损伤（全身，有毒，或代谢）的基础上发生的癫痫发作，当去除潜在的病因或急性期过去后可能不会再发。
HP:0011146	神经系统异常	Dialeptic seizures	Seizures characterized by impaired consciousness.	呆滞性癫痫发作	以意识障碍为特征的癫痫发作。
HP:0011147	神经系统异常	Typical absence seizures	Typical absences are brief for seconds generalized epileptic seizures of abrupt onset and abrupt termination with impairment of consciousness.	典型的失神发作	典型的失神是短至数秒的全面性癫痫发作，突发突止并伴意识受损。
HP:0011148	神经系统异常	Absence seizures with special features	Absence seizures that are characterized by additional motor phenomena such as eyelid myoclonias or myoclonic seizure of the upper limbs.	失神发作伴特定特征	伴随额外运动现象的失神发作，如眼睑肌阵挛或上肢肌阵挛发作。
HP:0011149	神经系统异常	Absence seizures with eyelid myoclonia	Absence seizures that are additionally characterized by eyelid myoclonia.	失神发作伴眼睑肌阵挛	失神发作伴随眼睑肌阵挛。
HP:0011150	神经系统异常	Myoclonic absences	Absence seizures that are additionally characterized by rhythmic bilateral myoclonias of the arms and shoulders synchronous with EEG discharges, with additional tonic components of the arms.	肌阵挛性失神	具有双侧手臂和肩膀节律性肌阵挛可在脑电图记录到异常放电的失神发作，同时可伴有手臂强直发作。
HP:0011151	神经系统异常	Obtundation status	Atypical absence lasting for more than 30 minutes.	迟钝状态	不典型失神持续超过30分钟。
HP:0011152	神经系统异常	Early onset absence seizures	Typical absence seizures starting before the age of 4 years.	早发性失神发作	4岁之前开始的典型失神发作。
HP:0011153	神经系统异常	Focal motor seizures	Focal seizures involving musculature in any form.	局灶性运动性癫痫发作	任何形式累及肌肉组织的局灶性癫痫发作。
HP:0011154	神经系统异常	Focal autonomic seizures	Focal seizures with an objectively documented and distinct alteration of autonomic nervous system function involving cardiovascular, pupillary, gastrointestinal, sudomotor, vasomotor and thermoregularity functions.	局灶性自主神经癫痫发作	涉及心脑血管，瞳孔，胃肠道，泌汗，血管舒缩和体温调节功能等自主神经系统功能特定改变的客观可记录到的局灶性发作。
HP:0011155	神经系统异常	Focal autonomic seizures with altered responsiveness	An autonomic seizure with altered responsiveness.	局灶性自主神经癫痫发作伴反应改变	自主神经发作伴反应的改变。
HP:0011156	神经系统异常	Focal autonomic seizures without altered responsiveness	An autonomic seizure without altered responsiveness.	局灶性自主神经癫痫发作不伴反应改变	植物神经发作不伴反应的改变。
HP:0011157	神经系统异常	Auras	Subjective ictal phenomena that, in a given patient, may precede observable seizures; if alone, constitute a if alone, constitute a simple partial seizure.	先兆	主观突发现象，在有些特定患者中，可能出现于可观察到的癫痫发作之前;如果单独出现，构成单纯部分性发作。
HP:0011158	神经系统异常	Auditory auras	Auras with sensations of buzzing, drumming sounds or single tones.	听觉先兆	听到耳朵里有嗡嗡声、击鼓声或单一响声的感觉。
HP:0011159	神经系统异常	Epigastric auras	Auras with abdominal discomfort including nausea, emptiness, tightness, churning, butterflies, malaise, pain, and hunger; sensation may rise to chest or throat. Some phenomena may reflect ictal autonomic dysfunction.	上腹先兆	腹部不适的先兆，包括恶心、空虚、发紧、翻腾、翻动、不舒服、疼痛和饥饿；感觉可能上升到胸部或喉部。可能反应了发作性自主神经功能障碍的一些现象。
HP:0011160	神经系统异常	Gustatory auras	Auras with taste sensations including acidic, bitter, salty , sweet or metallic tastes.	味觉先兆	味觉的先兆，包括酸，苦，咸，甜或金属的味道。
HP:0011161	神经系统异常	Olfactory Auras	Auras with sensation of odor, usually disagreeable.	嗅觉先兆	伴有异常气味的、不愉快的先兆
HP:0011162	神经系统异常	Psychic auras	Auras with affective, mnemonic or composite perceptual phenomena including illusory or composite hallucinatory events.	精神性先兆	与情感，记忆或复合知觉现象，包括虚幻的或复合幻觉事件相关的先兆
HP:0011163	神经系统异常	Somatosensory auras	Auras with sensation of tingling, numbness, electric shock sensations, pain, sense of movement, or desire to move.	躯体感觉先兆	先兆伴随刺痛感，麻木，触电的感觉，疼痛，运动感，或想要活动。
HP:0011164	神经系统异常	Vegetative auras	A sensation consistent with involvement of the autonomic nervous system, including cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, sudomotor, vasomotor and thermoregulatory functions.	植物神经性癫痫	一种与自主神经系统受累相一致的感觉，包括心血管，胃肠，排汗，血管舒缩和体温调节功能。
HP:0011165	神经系统异常	Visual auras	Auras with sensation of flashing or flickering lights, spots, simple patterns, scotomata, or amaurosis.	视觉先兆	先兆伴有与闪烁感或闪烁的灯光、点、单一相、暗点、或黑蒙。
HP:0011166	神经系统异常	Focal myoclonic seizures	Focal myoclonic seizures are a type of seizure. The clinical performance is a sudden contraction of the muscles or muscle caused  face, trunk or limbs suddenly fast twitch.	局灶肌阵挛发作	肌阵挛性发作是癫痫的一个临床发作类型。表现为某个肌肉或肌群的突然收缩，引起面、躯干或肢体突然快速的抽动。
HP:0011167	神经系统异常	Focal tonic seizures	Seizures with sustained increase in muscle contraction in parts of the body lasting a few seconds to minutes.	局灶性强直发作	癫痫发作，身体局部肌肉收缩持续增强，持续几秒钟到几分钟。
HP:0011168	神经系统异常	Eyelid myoclonias	Focal seizure with eyelid myoclonia, not eyelid myoclonias in the context of absence seizures.	眼睑肌阵挛	表现为眼睑肌阵挛的局灶性癫痫发作，不是失神发作情况下的眼睑肌阵挛。
HP:0011169	神经系统异常	Generalized clonic seizures	Seizures with regularly repetitive myoclonus, involving the same muscle groups, at a frequency of about 2-3 c/sec.	全面性阵挛性发作	癫痫发作，表现为累及同一肌群的规律重复的肌阵挛，频率约为2-3次/秒。
HP:0011170	神经系统异常	Myoclonic atonic seizures	Seizures with sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone with a preceding myoclonic or tonic event lasting one to two seconds or more, involving head, trunk, jaw or limb musculature.	肌阵挛失张力发作	癫痫发作突然丢失或肌张力的缩小与前面的肌阵挛或强直性事件一至两秒以上，涉及头部，躯干，下颌或肢体肌肉组织。
HP:0011171	神经系统异常	Simple febrile seizures	Febrile seizures with generalized tonic-clonic semiology, duration less than 15 minutes, and without recurrence within the next 24 hours.	单纯型热性惊厥	热性惊厥表现为全身强直 - 阵挛症状，持续时间不超过15分钟，且接下来的24小时之内无复发。
HP:0011172	神经系统异常	Complex febrile seizures	Febrile seizures with focal semiology, duration of more than 15 minutes, or occurring in a cluster of 2 or more convulsions within 24 hours.	复杂性高热惊厥	有局灶性症状的高热惊厥，持续时间超过15分钟，或在24小时内连续惊厥发作2次以上。
HP:0011173	神经系统异常	Hypokinetic seizures	Seizures with a decrease in amplitude and/or rate or arrest of ongoing motor activity.	少动型癫痫发作	伴随正进行地活动停止和/或幅度减低的癫痫发作。
HP:0011174	神经系统异常	Hyperkinetic seizures	Seizures with increase in rate of ongoing movements or inappropriately rapid performance of a movement involving predominantly proximal limb or axial muscles producing irregular sequential ballistic movements, such as pedaling, pelvic thrashing, rocking movements.	多动性发作	持续的运动或不适当的快速运动加重的一种癫痫发作，主要累及近端肢体或中轴的肌肉产生不规则的序列的投射样运动，如蹬踏，骨盆抖动，摇摆样运动。
HP:0011175	神经系统异常	Versive seizures	Tonic seizures with a sustained, forced conjugate ocular, cephalic and/or truncal rotation or lateral deviation from the midline.	旋转性癫痫	强直性发作伴持续的、强迫性眼部共轭运动，头部和/或躯干旋转或向一侧歪斜。
HP:0011176	神经系统异常	EEG with constitutional variants	An EEG with constitutional variants contains waves that are rare or unusual but not generally pathologic.	脑电图固有变异	脑电图固有变异指包含一些罕见或不寻常的波形，但通常不是病理性的。
HP:0011177	神经系统异常	EEG with 4-5/second background activity	EEG background activity at 4-5/second.	4-5次 /秒的脑电图背景活动	脑电图背景活动为4-5次 /秒。
HP:0011178	神经系统异常	Alpha-EEG	EEG dominated by diffuse alpha-waves (8-13Hz).	α脑电波	弥漫性alpha波（8-13Hz）为主的脑电图。
HP:0011179	神经系统异常	Beta-EEG	EEG dominated by diffuse beta-waves (&gt;13 Hz).	β脑电波	弥漫性β波（＞13Hz）为主导的脑电图。
HP:0011180	神经系统异常	Partial beta-EEG	EEG dominated by diffuse beta waves (&gt;13 Hz) with occipitally localized alpha waves (8-13 Hz).	部分β-脑电波	脑电图主要由弥漫性β波（＞13赫兹）与枕区α波（8-13赫兹）组成。
HP:0011181	神经系统异常	Low voltage EEG	Set definition of ID:0000013 to &quot;EEG with an amplitude less than 30 microvolts without observable occipital alpha rhythm (8-13 Hz).	低波幅脑电图	脑电图波幅低于30微伏且没有明显的枕区阿尔法节律（8-13赫兹）。
HP:0011182	神经系统异常	Epileptiform EEG discharges	Electroencephalographic patterns that resemble epileptogenic abnormalities.	癫痫样放电脑电图	显示癫痫源异常的脑电图模式。
HP:0011183	神经系统异常	EEG with hyperventilation-induced focal epileptiform discharges	Focal epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，过度换气诱发的局灶癫痫样放电	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的局灶癫痫样放电。
HP:0011184	神经系统异常	EEG with hyperventilation-induced generalized epileptiform discharges	Generalized epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，过度换气诱发的全面性癫痫样放电	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的全面性癫痫样放电。
HP:0011185	神经系统异常	EEG with focal epileptiform discharges	EEG discharges recorded in particular areas of the A localized (focal) abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图局灶性癫痫样放电	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的脑电活动中，在一个局部（局灶）特定区域异的EEG放电。
HP:0011186	神经系统异常	Focal epileptiform discharges with limited propagation to contralateral hemisphere	Focal epileptiform discharges with spreading to contralateral hemisphere but without secondary generalization.	局灶性癫痫样放电，有限传播到对侧半球	局灶性癫痫样放电扩散到对侧大脑半球，但没有继发全面化。
HP:0011187	神经系统异常	Focal EEG discharges with propagation to ipsilateral hemisphere	Focal epileptiform discharges with spreading to the hemisphere on the same side of the brain.	脑电图局灶性放电，传播到同侧半球	局灶性癫痫样放电，扩散到同一侧大脑半球。
HP:0011188	神经系统异常	Focal EEG discharges with secondary generalization	Focal EEG discharges that secondarily spread to both hemispheres and can then be recorded over the entire scalp.	局灶性脑放电继发泛化	脑电图局灶性放电，随后扩散至双侧大脑半球，可在整个头皮记录到。
HP:0011189	神经系统异常	Bilateral multifocal epileptiform discharges	Epileptiform discharges being identified at multiple locations in both hemispheres.	双侧多灶性痫样放电	定位于两侧半球多个位置的癫痫样放电。
HP:0011190	神经系统异常	Uni- and bilateral multifocal epileptiform discharges	Epileptiform discharges identified at multiple locations temporarily in both hemispheres and temporarily in one hemisphere.	单侧和双侧多灶性痫样放电	在一侧半球或两侧半球多个位置确定的癫痫样放电。
HP:0011191	神经系统异常	Unilateral multifocal epileptiform discharges	Epileptiform discharges being identified at multiple locations in one hemisphere.	单侧多灶性癫痫样放电	一个半球的多个部位出现癫痫样放电。
HP:0011192	神经系统异常	Polymorphic focal epileptiform discharges	Focal epileptiform discharges of different shapes and frequencies.	多态局灶性癫痫样放电	不同的形状和频率的焦点痫样放电。
HP:0011193	神经系统异常	EEG with focal spikes	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec.	脑电图，局灶性棘波	脑电图持续时间小于80毫秒的短暂局灶尖波。
HP:0011194	神经系统异常	EEG with series of focal spikes	Focal spikes occurring for several seconds.	脑电图，成簇局灶棘波	几秒钟内出现的多个局灶棘波。
HP:0011195	神经系统异常	EEG with focal sharp slow waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，局灶性尖慢波	脑电图时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
HP:0011196	神经系统异常	EEG with focal sharp waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.	脑电图，局灶性尖波	脑电图时限80至200毫秒之间短暂局灶尖波。
HP:0011197	神经系统异常	EEG with focal spike waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，局灶性棘慢波	脑电图持续时间小于80毫秒的短暂局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
HP:0011198	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized epileptiform discharges	EEG discharges recorded on the entire scalp typically seen in persons with epilepsy.	脑电图，伴广泛性癫痫样放电	整个头皮脑电图记录到癫痫样放电，通常见于癫痫病人。
HP:0011199	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized sharp slow waves	EEG with generalized sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，伴广泛性尖慢波	脑电图，广泛性时限80至200毫秒的短暂尖波紧随一个慢波。
HP:0011200	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized polymorphic epileptiform discharges	Generalized epileptiform discharges of different shapes and frequencies.	脑电图，伴广泛性多态癫痫样放电	不同形状和频率的广泛性癫痫样放电。
HP:0011201	神经系统异常	EEG with changes in voltage	EEG with abnormal amplitude.	脑电图，电压变化	脑电图波幅异常。
HP:0011202	神经系统异常	EEG with diffuse acceleration	EEG frequency is abnormally increased.	脑电图弥漫性加快	脑电图频率异常增加。
HP:0011203	神经系统异常	EEG with abnormally slow frequencies	EEG with abnormally slow frequencies.	伴异常缓慢频率的脑电图	脑电图中伴有异常缓慢的频率。
HP:0011204	神经系统异常	EEG with continuous slow activity	EEG showing diffuse slowing without interruption.	脑电图持续慢活动	脑电图显示弥漫性不间断慢活动。
HP:0011205	神经系统异常	EEG with intermittent slow activity	Non-continuous diffuse slowing of electroencephalographic patterns.	脑电图间歇性慢活动	非连续性弥漫性慢波的脑电图模式。
HP:0011206	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized slow activity grade 1	Slowing at frequencies between 7.5 and 8.5 Hz.	脑电图，广泛性慢活动1级	频率在7.5和8.5赫兹之间的慢活动。
HP:0011207	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized slow activity grade 2	Generalized slowing of EEG activity at frequencies between 4-7 Hz.	脑电图，广泛性慢活动2级	脑电活动频率在4-7赫兹之间的广泛性慢活动。
HP:0011208	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized slow activity grade 3	Generalized slowing of EEG activity at frequencies between 0.5-3 Hz.	脑电图，广泛性慢活动3级	脑电活动频率在0.5-3赫兹之间的广泛性慢活动。
HP:0011209	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized slow activity grade 4	EEG without electrical activity.	脑电图，广泛性慢活动4级	脑电图无脑电活动。
HP:0011210	神经系统异常	EEG with occipital slowing	Slowing in occipital areas of the scalp EEG.	脑电图，枕部慢波	头皮脑电图枕区慢波。
HP:0011211	神经系统异常	EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade I	Occurrence of epileptiform discharges in occipital regions during photic stimulation.	脑电图，光阵发性反应I级	闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕部区域。
HP:0011212	神经系统异常	EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade II	Occurence of epileptiform discharges in occipital and central regions during photic stimulation.	脑电图，光阵发性反应 II级	闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕区和中央区。
HP:0011213	神经系统异常	EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade III	Occurrence of epileptiform discharges in occipital, central, temporal and parietal regions during photic stimulation.	脑电图，光阵发性反应III级	闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕区、中央区、颞区和顶区。
HP:0011214	神经系统异常	EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade IV	Occurrence of generalized epileptiform discharges during photic stimulation.	脑电图，光阵发性反应Ⅳ级	闪光刺激过程中出现全面性癫痫样放电。
HP:0011215	神经系统异常	Hemihypsarrhythmia	Hypsarrhythmia occurring in one hemisphere.	偏侧高度失律	发生在一侧半球的高度失律。
HP:0011217	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormal shape of the occiput	An `abnormal` (PATO:0000460) `shape` (PATO:0000052) of `occiput` (FMA:49187).	枕部形态异常	枕部形状异常
HP:0011218	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormal shape of the frontal region	An `abnormal` `shape` of the `frontal part of the head`	前额部形状异常	头的前额部位形状异常
HP:0011219	头部和颈部的异常	Short face	Facial height (length) is more than two standard deviations below the mean (objective); or an apparent decrease in the height (length) of the face (subjective).	短脸	面部高度（长度）低于平均值大于两个标准偏差（客观）；或面部的高度/长度显著减少（主观）。
HP:0011220	头部和颈部的异常	Prominent forehead	Forward prominence of the entire forehead, due to protrusion of the frontal bone.	前额突出	由于额骨凸起导致整个前额的向前突出。
HP:0011221	头部和颈部的异常	Vertical forehead creases	Vertical soft tissue creases in the midline of the forehead, often extending from the hairline to the brow, and seen with facial expression or when the face is at rest.	额头皱纹垂直	额部中线软组织皱褶呈纵行，通常由发际延伸至眉弓，可见于面部表情活动或处于静止状态时。
HP:0011222	头部和颈部的异常	Depressed glabella	Posterior positioning of the `glabella` (FMA:52851), i.e., of the midline forehead between the supraorbital ridges.	印堂凹陷	印堂即眼眶上脊之间的额头中线处下陷。
HP:0011223	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Metopic depression	Linear vertical groove in the midline of the forehead, extending from hairline to glabella.	额头下陷	在额头中线存在线性纵沟，可从发际线伸展到眉间。
HP:0011224	头部和颈部的异常	Ablepharon	Absent `eyelids`	无睑畸形	没有眼皮。

HP:0011226	头部和颈部的异常	aplasia/Hypoplasia affecting the eyelid	Absence or underdevelopment of the eyelid.	眼睑发育不全／未发育	没有或发育不全的眼睑。
HP:0011227	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated C-reactive protein level	An abnormal elevation of the C-reactive protein level in serum.	C-反应蛋白水平升高	在血清中的C反应蛋白水平的异常升高。
HP:0011228	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Horizontal eyebrow	An eyebrow that extends straight across the brow, without curve.	横眉	眉毛沿着眉骨水平伸展，没有弯曲。
HP:0011229	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Broad eyebrow	Regional increase in the width (height) of the eyebrow.	宽眉	眉的宽度（高度）区域性增加。
HP:0011230	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Laterally extended eyebrow	An eyebrow that extends laterally beyond the orbital rim rather than turning gently downward at that location.	横向延伸眉	眉毛横向延伸超出眼眶缘，而不是在该位置稍微向下弯曲。
HP:0011231	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Prominent eyelashes	Eyelashes that draw the attention of the viewer due to increased density and/or length and/or curl without meeting the criteria of trichomegaly.	睫毛突出	由于增加的密度和/或长度和/或卷曲而引人注目的睫毛，但尚不满足多毛症的标准。
HP:0011232	头部和颈部的异常	Infra-orbital fold	Elevated ridge(s) of skin starting well below the medial aspect of the lower lid that curves gradually upward toward and/or across the nasal bridge.	眶下皱襞	皮肤脊的起始高度开始远低于下眼睑的内侧，向上和/或穿过鼻梁逐渐向上弯曲。
HP:0011233	耳部异常	Antihelical shelf	Antihelix protrusion directed more anteriorly than laterally, forming a shelf overlying the posterior concha.	对耳轮畸形	耳轮突起指向比横向更靠前，形成一个隔覆盖后外耳。
HP:0011234	耳部异常	Absent antihelix	No discernible ridge between concha and triangular fossa and helix.	对耳轮缺失	外耳、三角窝、耳轮之间没有明显的棱线。
HP:0011235	耳部异常	Additional crus of antihelix	Supernumerary ridge or crus of the ear arising from the antihelix.	对耳轮脚多余	对轮脚延伸出多余的脊或凸起。
HP:0011236	耳部异常	Angulated antihelix	Antihelical ridge that forms an acute angle between the antitragus and its bifurcation (stem) instead of a gently curving arc.	对耳轮棱型	对耳轮脊在对耳屏及其分叉（干）之间形成锐角，而不是一个平缓弯曲的弧线。
HP:0011237	耳部异常	Broad inferior crus of antihelix	Increased width of the inferred cross-section of the inferior crus.	对耳轮下脚宽	下角横截面宽度增加。
HP:0011238	耳部异常	Prominent inferior crus of antihelix	Increased protrusion of the inferior crus relative to the prominence of the antihelix stem.	对耳轮下脚突出	与对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮下脚的突出增加。
HP:0011239	耳部异常	Underdeveloped inferior crus of antihelix	Decreased protrusion of the inferior crus relative to the prominence of the antihelix stem.	对耳轮下脚发育不良	与对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮下脚的突出减少。
HP:0011240	耳部异常	Prominent stem of antihelix	Increased protrusion of the antihelical ridge, proximal to its bifurcation, relative to the prominence of the helix.	对耳轮干突出	与耳轮的突出相比，接近分叉处的对耳轮脊的突出增加。
HP:0011241	耳部异常	Serpiginous stem of antihelix	Posterior curving of the antihelix from its origin at the antitragus, traveling initially almost perpendicular to the descending helix and obscuring some of the concha.	匐行性对耳轮干	对耳轮后侧弯曲边缘从对耳屏开始延伸，最初几乎垂直于下降的螺旋，遮挡部分外耳结构。
HP:0011242	耳部异常	Underdeveloped stem of antihelix	Decreased protrusion of the antihelical ridge, proximal to its bifurcation, relative to the prominence of a normal helix.	对耳轮干发育不良	与正常耳轮的突出相比，接近分叉处的对耳轮脊的突出减少。
HP:0011243	耳部异常	Abnormality of inferior crus of antihelix	An abnormality of the inferior crus of the antihelix is the lower cartilaginous ridge arising at the bifurcation of the antihelix that ends beneath the fold of the ascending helix, and separates the concha from the triangular fossa.	对耳轮下脚异常	软骨脊在对耳轮脚分叉处产生，分叉在对耳轮脚上升螺旋的皱襞下方结束，至外耳三角窝处分离出对耳轮脚。
HP:0011244	耳部异常	Abnormality of stem of antihelix	An abnormality of the stem of the antihelix, which is the part below the bifurcation of the antihelix into the inferior and superior crura.	对耳轮干异常	对耳轮干的异常，指对耳轮分叉为上、下脚的分叉下方的干部出现异常。
HP:0011245	耳部异常	Abnormality of superior crus of antihelix	An abnormality of the superior crus of the antihelix is the upper cartilaginous ridge arising at the bifurcation of the antihelix that ends beneath the fold of the ascending helix, and separates the concha from the triangular fossa.	对耳轮上脚异常	软骨脊在对耳轮脚分叉处产生，分叉在对耳轮脚上升螺旋的皱襞上方结束，至外耳三角窝处分离出对耳轮脚。
HP:0011246	耳部异常	Underdeveloped superior crus of antihelix	Decreased protrusion of the superior crus relative to the prominence of a normal antihelix stem.	对耳轮上脚发育不良	与正常对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮上脚的突出减少。
HP:0011247	耳部异常	Prominent superior crus of antihelix	Increased protrusion of the superior crus relative to the prominence of a normal antihelix stem.	对耳轮上脚突出	与正常对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮上脚的突出增加。
HP:0011248	耳部异常	Everted antitragus	Positioning of the antitragus at an angle perpendicular to the plane of the ear (oriented away from the plane of the ear).	对耳屏外翻	对耳屏在垂直于耳的平面的角度定位（从耳的平面取向的距离）。对耳屏与耳朵平面垂直成角（方向是远离耳朵平面）
HP:0011249	耳部异常	Absent antitragus	Absence of the anterosuperior prominence of the area between the bottom of the incisura and the inner margin of the antihelix.	耳屏缺失	切迹的底部和对耳轮的内缘之间的区域的向前上方突出的部分缺失。

HP:0011251	耳部异常	Underdeveloped antitragus	Reduction in the anterosuperior prominence of the area between the bottom of the incisura and the inner margin of the antihelix.	对耳屏发育不良	切迹底部和对耳轮内缘之间区域向前上部分突出减少。

HP:0011253	耳部异常	Type I cryptotia	A type of cryptotia associated with reduction in size of the antihelix and superior crus.	Ⅰ型隐耳	与对耳轮和其上脚大小缩小相关的隐耳类型。
HP:0011254	耳部异常	Type II cryptotia	A type of cryptotia associated with reduction in size of the antihelix and inferior crus that are affected.	Ⅱ型隐耳	与对耳轮和其下脚大小缩小相关的隐耳类型。

HP:0011258	骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	Tragal bridge of crus of helix	The anterior origin of the crus encompasses the superior margin of the tragus, the crus overrides the upper portion of the conchal cavum and ends at the antihelix.	耳前切迹	耳轮脚前侧起点位于耳屏的上缘，覆盖耳甲腔的上部并止于对耳轮。
HP:0011259	骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	Expanded terminal portion of crus of helix	Widening, rather than tapering, of the crus at its posterior border near the antihelix.	耳轮脚末端扩大	靠近对耳轮处的耳轮脚后缘渐增宽，而非逐渐变细。

HP:0011296	神经系统异常	EEG with temporal sharp waves	EEG with sharp waves in the temporal region, i.e., sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.	脑电图，颞区尖波	脑电图，在颞区的尖波，5373时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂尖波。

HP:0011298	体壁的异常	Prominent digit pad	A soft tissue prominence of the ventral aspects of the fingertips or toe tips.	指节垫	指（趾）腹的软组织隆起。
HP:0011299	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Partial absence of finger	The absence of a phalangeal segment of a finger.	手指部分缺失	手指单个指骨节段的缺如。
HP:0011300	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad fingertip	Increased width of the distal segment of a finger.	指尖变宽	手指远端增宽。
HP:0011301	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Absent foot	The total absence of the foot, with no bony elements distal to the tibia or fibula.	缺足	足的完全缺如，在胫骨或腓骨的远端没有骨的结构。
HP:0011302	肢体异常	Long palm	For children from birth to 16 years of age the length of the palm is more than the 97th centile; or, the length of the palm appears relatively long compared to the finger length or the limb length.	掌长	对于从出生到16岁的孩子，手掌的长度超过第97百分位数；或者手掌的长度相对手指长度或肢体长度显得相对较长。
HP:0011303	肢体异常,体壁的异常	Convex contour of sole	The contour of the foot in lateral profile has a convex shape.	足底外形凸起	足底侧缘有一处凸起。

HP:0011308	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Slender toe	Digits are disproportionately narrow (reduced girth) for the hand/foot size or build of the individual.	修长趾	相对手/脚或个人体型不成比例的趾变窄（周长减少）。

HP:0011408	生长异常	Moderate intrauterine growth retardation	Intrauterine growth retardation that is at least 3 standard deviations (SD) below average, but not as low as 4 SD, corrected for sex and gestational age.	中度胎儿宫内发育迟缓	宫内发育迟缓程度大于同性别同胎龄至少3个标准偏差，但不到4个标准差。
HP:0011409	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Abnormality of placental membranes	#####	胎盘胎膜异常	#####
