HP:0011412	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Ventouse delivery	Delivery of newborn by means of a ventouse, a vacuum device used to assist the delivery of a baby when the second stage of labour has not progressed adequately.	胎吸分娩	当第二产程进展延长时，应用一个真空设备的吸引装置辅助胎儿分娩。
HP:0011413	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Shoulder dystocia	Shoulder dystocia occurs when the fetal anterior shoulder impacts against the maternal symphysis following delivery of the vertex.	肩难产	胎头娩出后，胎儿前肩被嵌顿在耻骨联合上方，用常规助产方法不能娩出胎儿双肩。
HP:0011414	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Hydropic placenta	An abnormality of the placenta in which there are numerous cystic spaces within the placenta as well as placental enlargement.	胎盘水肿	胎盘异常的一种，胎盘内有众多囊腔合并胎盘增大。
HP:0011415	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Calcified placenta	Calcification placenta refers to the placenta with calcium deposits on .	胎盘钙化	胎盘钙化指胎盘上存在钙质沉积。
HP:0011416	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Placental infarction	Placental infarcts are macroscopically-evident focal parenchymal lesions in which microscopy shows necrosis and approximation of villi. The pathogenesis are that the infarctions are to be attributed to spastic or organic obliteration of the spiral arteries. Placental infarctions are significantly associated with fetal mortality, dysmaturity, and fetal distress.	胎盘梗死	胎盘梗死是肉眼可见的局灶性损伤，显微镜下表现为绒毛膜坏死样病变，病因为绒毛膜螺旋动脉痉挛或物理性梗阻。胎盘梗死与死胎。胎儿窘迫和成熟障碍有明确关系。
HP:0011417	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Long umbilical cord	Increased length of the `umbilical cord` (FMA:85541).	长脐带	脐带长度增加。
HP:0011418	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Abnormal insertion of umbilical cord	#####	脐带插入点异常	#####
HP:0011419	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Placental abruption	Placental abruption is a serious condition in which the separation of the placenta from its site of implatation after 20 weeks of gestain or during the delivery before birth	胎盘早剥	胎盘早剥是指妊娠20周后或分娩期，正常位置的胎盘在胎儿娩出前从子宫壁剥离，是一种妊娠期重症。
HP:0011420	死亡/衰老	Age of death	The age group when the cessation of life happens.	死亡年龄	#####
HP:0011421	死亡/衰老	Death in adolescence	Death during adolescence, the period between childhood and adulthood (roughly between the ages of 10 and 19 years).	青春期死亡	#####
HP:0011422	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormality of chloride homeostasis	An abnormality of `chloride` (CHEBI:17996 homeostasis or concentration in the body.	氯稳态平衡异常	体内`氯`(CHEBI:17996) 平衡稳态或或浓度的异常。
HP:0011423	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hyperchloremia	An abnormally increased `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) concentration in the blood.	高氯血症	异常增加`chloride`（CHEBI:17996）的浓度在血液中。
HP:0011424	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased serum zinc	An increased consentration of zinc in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	血清锌含量增高	锌在`blood`增加consentration（FMA:9670）。
HP:0011425	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Fetal ultrasound soft marker	An finding upon obstetric ultrasound examination performed at around 16 to 20 weeks of gestation that is abnormal but not clearly identifiable as a  fetal anatomic malformation or growth restriction. Such findings are known as soft markers since they are associated with increased risk for fetal aneuploidy or other disorders.	胎儿超声软指标	在大约16〜20周妊娠是不正常的，但不能清楚地标识为胎儿解剖畸形或发育迟缓的表现后，产科超声检查的发现。这些发现被称为软标记物，因为它们是与风险为胎儿非整倍或其他病症的增加有关。
HP:0011426	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Fetal choroid plexus cysts	Fetal choroid plexus cysts (CPCs) are sonographically discrete, small cysts (3 mm or more) found in the choroid plexus within the lateral cerebral ventricles of the developing fetus at 14 to 24 weeks gestation. Imaging of the choroid plexus is performed in the transverse plane of the fetal head at the same level that the lateral cerebral ventricle is evaluated. The choroid plexus should be inspected bilaterally for the presence of cysts. The size of CPCs is not of clinical relevance (pmid:16100637).	胎儿脉络丛囊肿	胎脉络丛囊肿是发育中的胎儿的侧脑室的脉络丛中发现的内超声离散的小囊肿（3mm以上），一般出现于14至24周妊娠。胎儿脉络丛囊肿的成像需要在胎头的横向平面，在检测侧脑室相同的水平。应双边检查脉络丛是否有包囊的存在。胎儿脉络丛囊肿的大小与临床无关（PMID:16100637）。
HP:0011427	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Enlarged fetal cisterna magna	The cisterna magna is measured on a transaxial view of the fetal head angled 15 degrees caudal to the canthomeatal line. The anterior/posterior diameter is taken between the inferior/posterior surface of the vemis of the cerebellum to the inner surface of the cranium. An enlarged cisternal magna is defined by an anterior/posterior diameter of 10 mm or more (pmid:16100637).	胎儿小脑延髓池扩大	小脑延髓池测量胎头角度15度尾椎canthomeatal线的横断视图。的前/后直径取小脑vemis的劣/后表面之间的颅骨的内表面上。的放大脑池蚤是由10mm以上（:16100637 PMID）前/后面直径限定。
HP:0011428	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Short fetal femur length	A short femur length is defined as either a measurement below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or a measurement that is less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The femur should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (pmid:16100637).	胎儿股骨短小	胎儿股骨短小定义为股骨长度测值小于同孕龄第2.5百分位、或小于以双顶径为标准计算孕龄的第10百分位以下。测量时股骨应与超声波束垂直，并可见骨骺软骨，但其不包含在测量范围内。
HP:0011429	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Short fetal humerus length	A short humerus length is defined as a length below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or as a measurement less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The humerus should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (pmid:16100637).	胎儿肱骨短小	胎儿肱骨短小定义为肱骨长度测值小于同孕龄第2.5百分位、或小于以双顶径为标准计算孕龄的第10百分位以下。测量时肱骨应与超声波束垂直，并可见骨骺软骨，但其不包含在测量范围内。
HP:0011430	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Hypoplasia of fetal nasal bone	On prenatal ultrasound, the nasal bone is a thin echogenic line within the bridge of the fetal nose. The fetus is imaged facing the transducer with the fetal face strictly in the midline. The angle of insonation is 90 degrees, with the longitudinal axis of the nasal bone as the reference line. Calibres are placed at each end of the nasal bone. Absence of the nasal bone or measurements below 2.5th percentile are considered significant (pmid:16100637).	胎儿鼻骨发育不良	产前超声，鼻骨是胎儿鼻梁内的薄回声带。胎儿面部面对探头，成像面在颜面部正中矢状切面，超声声束与鼻骨长轴成90°，测量两端鼻骨边界的距离。鼻骨缺失，或其长度小于同孕周正常值的第2.5百分位数是有显著差异的。
HP:0011431	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Fetal fifth finger clinodactyly	Fifth finger clinodactyly is defined by a hypoplastic or absent mid-phalanx of the fifth digit. Ultrasound identification of the fetal hand must first be undertaken and then appropriate magnification accomplished. The evaluation requires stretching of the 5 fingers. The diagnosis is established when the middle phalanx of the fifth finger is markedly smaller than normal or absent, which often causes the finger to be curved inward  (pmid:16100637).	胎儿第五指屈指畸形	第五手指五指由发育不全或不存在中间指骨的第五位的定义。超声波鉴定胎儿的手必须首先进行，然后适当的放大倍率来实现。这种评价需要伸缩5个手指的。 （:16100637 PMID）当第五手指的中间指骨明显高于正常或不存在，这往往使手指被向内弯曲越小诊断确立。
HP:0011432	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	High maternal serum alpha-fetoprotein	An abnormally high concentration of serum alpha-fetoprotein as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度增高	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常升高的母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度。
HP:0011433	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	High maternal serum chorionic gonadotropin	An abnormally high concentration of maternal serum human chorionic gonadotropin as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	母体血清绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度增高	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常升高的母体血清人绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度。
HP:0011434	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Low maternal serum chorionic gonadotropin	An abnormally low concentration of maternal serum human chorionic gonadotropin as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	母体血清绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度降低	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清人绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度。
HP:0011435	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Low maternal serum PAPP-A	An abnormally low concentration of serum PAPP-A (pregnancy associated plasma protein A), as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	母体血清PAPP-A浓度降低	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清PAPP-A浓度（妊娠相关血浆蛋白A）。
HP:0011436	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Abnormal maternal serum screening	An abnormally elevated or decreased level of a maternal serum marker analytes used in screening for aneuploidy.	母血清筛查异常	非整倍体筛查中，母体血清学标记物水平异常增高或降低。
HP:0011437	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Maternal autoimmune disease	Maternal autoimmune diseases are associated with increased rates of fetal wastage.The most common maternal autoimmune diseases are systemic lupus erythematosus(SLE),rheumatoid arthritis,and a host of vasculitis syndromes and so on.	母体自身免疫性疾病	孕妇自身免疫性疾病与胎儿流产及胎死宫内相关。常见的病种包括系统性红斑狼疮，类风湿关节炎，以及血管炎综合征等。
HP:0011438	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Maternal teratogenic exposure	Matenal has been exposured  to  teratogenic substance for example drugs、 chemicals、 source of infection and other physical factors,during pregnancy,which  may cause fetal morphological abnormalities、neurological abnormalities or death.	孕期致畸暴露	孕期母体接触过可能对胎儿发育有影响的药物、化学制剂、感染源、物理因子等,可能会导致胎儿形体和/或神经系统发育异常，甚至死亡。

HP:0011448	神经系统异常,肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ankle clonus	Clonus is an involuntary tendon reflex that causes repeated flexion and extension of the foot. Ankle clonus is tested by rapidly flexing the foot upward.	踝阵挛	踝阵挛是引起足部反复屈伸运动的无意识腱反射。踝阵挛通过快速向上弯曲足部进行检查。
HP:0011449	神经系统异常	Knee clonus	Clonus is an involuntary tendon reflex that causes repeated flexion and extension of the foot. Knee clonus can be tested by rapidly pushing the patella towards the toes.	膝阵挛	阵挛是一种不自主腱反射，导致反复地屈伸脚。膝阵挛可通过朝向足趾快速推髌骨进行检查。

HP:0011474	耳部异常	Childhood onset sensorineural hearing impairment	Aplasia of the `stapes` (FMA:52751).	儿童期发病的感音神经性听觉障碍	`感音神经性听觉障碍`（HP: 0008538），在儿童期起病。
HP:0011475	耳部异常	Persistent stapedial artery	Persistence of the stapedial artery, which normally regresses during embryonic life.	残留性镫骨动脉	镫骨动脉残存，正常情况下在胚胎期退化。
HP:0011476	耳部异常	Profound sensorineural hearing impairment	Complete loss of hearing related to a sensorineural defect.	极重度感音神经性听力损失	与神经性缺陷相关的听力完全丧失。
HP:0011477	眼部异常	Upbeat nystagmus	In primary position the Upbeat nystagmus beats upward. The associated oscillopsias are often very irritating, but the symptoms are usually transient.	上跳性眼球震颤	此型眼球震颤呈眼球跳动上升。震动幻视通常非常严重，但是症状通常是短暂的。
HP:0011478	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	True anophthalmia	Absence of globe, optic nerve, chiasm and optic tracts.  No evidence of ocular tissue on MRI scan or examination.	无眼畸形	眼球、视神经、视交叉及视束缺失。 MRI扫描或体格检查眼部无内容物。
HP:0011479	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the lacrimal punctum	An abnormality of the `lacrimal punctum` (FMA:59365), an opening on the eyelid close to the medial canthus that drains tears from the conjunctival sac into the lacrimal duct in the same eyelid.	泪点异常	在泪点的异常（FMA:59365），泪点在下眼睑靠近内侧眼角部位，主要作用是吸收结膜囊中的泪液，引流到泪道中。
HP:0011480	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Unilateral microphthalmos	A developmental anomaly characterized by abnormal smallness of one eye.	单侧小眼畸形	一种单侧眼睛发育过小的生长畸形。
HP:0011481	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the lacrimal duct	An abnormality of the ` lacrimal duct` (FMA:61063), a duct that drain tears from the conjunctiva, via the lacrimal puncta, into the lacrimal sac.	泪道异常	在`泪道（FMA:61063）的异常，泪道是泪液排出的通道，眼泪从泪小点进入泪囊。
HP:0011482	头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of the lacrimal gland	Abnormality of the `lacrimal gland` (FMA:59101), i.e., of the almond-shaped gland that secretes the aqueous layer of the tear film for each eye.	泪腺异常	在泪腺上的异常（FMA:59101）泪腺是杏核状的腺体，分泌的液体是泪膜的水层。
HP:0011483	眼部异常	Anterior synechiae of the anterior chamber	Adhesions between the iris and the cornea.	前房粘连	虹膜和角膜之间的粘连。
HP:0011484	眼部异常	Posterior synechiae of the anterior chamber	Adhesions between the iris and the lens.	前房后粘连	虹膜和晶状体之间的粘连。
HP:0011485	眼部异常	Corneolenticular adhesion	Developmental abnormality in which the lens and cornea are not separated.	角膜透镜粘连	晶状体和角膜没有分开的发育异常。
HP:0011486	眼部异常	Abnormality of corneal thickness	An abnormal anteroposterior thickness of the cornea.	角膜厚度异常	角膜的前后厚度不正常。
HP:0011487	眼部异常	Increased corneal thickness	A increased anteroposterior thickness of the cornea.	角膜厚度增加	角膜的前后厚度增加。
HP:0011488	眼部异常	Abnormality of corneal endothelium	Abnormality of the `corneal endothelium` (FMA:63882), that is, the single layer of cells on the inner surface of the cornea.	角膜内皮细胞异常	角膜内皮细胞异常（FMA:63882），即，角膜内皮细胞是角膜内表面上的单层细胞。
HP:0011489	眼部异常	Abnormal migration of corneal endothelium	Abnormal migration of corneal endothelium.	角膜内皮细胞异常迁移	角膜内皮细胞的异常迁移。
HP:0011490	眼部异常	Abnormality of Descemet&#39;s membrane	Abnormality of Descemet&#39;s membrane, which is the basement membrane of the corneal endothelium.	角膜后弹力层异常	Descemet膜异常，Descemet膜是角膜内皮的基底膜。
HP:0011491	眼部异常	Reduced number of corneal endothelial cells	A reduction in the number of corneal endothelial cells.	角膜内皮细胞的数目减少	角膜内皮细胞数量的减少。
HP:0011492	眼部异常	Abnormality of corneal stroma	An abnormality of the `stroma of cornea` (FMA:58306), also known as the substantia propria of cornea.	角膜基质异常	角膜基质（FMA:58306）异常，也被称为角膜的固有层异常。
HP:0011493	眼部异常	Central opacification of the cornea	Reduced transparency of the central portion of the corneal stroma.	角膜的中央混浊	角膜基质层中央部位的透明度下降。
HP:0011494	眼部异常	Generalized opacification of the cornea	Generalized reduced transparency of the stroma of the cornea.	角膜混浊	角膜基质的透明度降低。
HP:0011495	眼部异常	Abnormality of corneal epithelium	Abnormality of the `corneal epithelium` (FMA:58263), that is of the epithelial tissue that covers the front of the cornea.	角膜上皮异常	角膜上皮的异常（FMA:58263），角膜上皮是指覆盖在角膜前部的上皮组织。
HP:0011496	眼部异常	Corneal neovascularization	Ingrowth of new blood vessels into the cornea.	角膜新生血管	新生血管向内生长进入角膜。
HP:0011497	心血管系统异常,眼部异常	Iris neovascularization	New growth of vessels on the surface of the iris.	虹膜新生血管	虹膜表面的新生血管。
HP:0011498	眼部异常	Partial aniridia	Sectoral aplasia of the iris.	部分无虹膜	部分虹膜发育不全。
HP:0011499	眼部异常	Mydriasis	Abnormal dilatation of the iris.	瞳孔散大	虹膜的异常扩大。
HP:0011500	眼部异常	Polycoria	Multiple pupils.	多瞳症	多个瞳孔。
HP:0011501	眼部异常	Anterior lenticonus	A conical projection of the anterior surface of the lens, occurring as a developmental anomaly.	前圆锥形晶状体	晶状体前表面的锥形突起异常，是一种发育异常。
HP:0011502	眼部异常	Posterior lenticonus	A conical projection of the posterior surface of the lens, occurring as a developmental anomaly.	后圆锥形晶状体	晶状体后表面的锥形突起，是一个发育异常。
HP:0011503	眼部异常	aplasia of the fovea	Congenital absence of the fovea.	黄斑中心凹的发育缺陷	先天性黄斑中心凹缺失。
HP:0011504	眼部异常	Bull&#39;s eye maculopathy	Progressive maculopathy characterized by concentric regions of hyper- and hypo-pigmentation.	牛眼黄斑病变	渐进性的黄斑病变，其特征为黄斑区高荧光和低荧光呈同心圆形式。
HP:0011505	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,眼部异常	Cystoid macular edema	Cystoid macular edema (CME) is any type of macular edema that involves cyst formation.	囊样黄斑水肿	黄斑囊样水肿（CME）是任何类型的黄斑水肿，涉及囊肿形成。
HP:0011506	眼部异常	Choroidal neovascularization of the macula	Choroidal neovascularization (CNV) is the creation of new blood vessels in the choroid layer of the eye.	黄斑脉络膜新生血管	脉络膜新生血管（CNV）是眼睛脉络膜层的新生血管。
HP:0011507	眼部异常	Macular flecks	Pale often indistinct lesions of the macula.	黄斑斑点	黄斑区的灰色病变，常常没有明确的界限。
HP:0011508	眼部异常	Macular hole	A macular hole is a small break in the macula, located in the center of the retina.	黄斑裂孔	黄斑裂孔是黄斑区的小孔，位于视网膜的中央。
HP:0011509	眼部异常	Macular hyperpigmentation	Increased amount of pigmentation in the `macula lutea` (FMA:58637).	黄斑色素沉着	黄斑中心凹（FMA:58637）的色素沉着增加。
HP:0011510	眼部异常	Drusen	Drusen (singular, &#39;druse&#39;) are tiny yellow or white accumulations of extracellular material (lipofuscin) that build up in Bruch&#39;s membrane of the eye.	玻璃膜疣	玻璃膜疣是细胞外物质（脂褐素）在眼睛Bruch膜上聚集形成的细小黄色或白色物质沉积。
HP:0011511	眼部异常	Macular schisis	Splitting of the retina in the macular region.	黄斑劈裂	黄斑区的视网膜劈裂。
HP:0011512	眼部异常	Hyperpigmentation of the fundus	Increased amount of pigmentation of the retina.	眼底的色素沉着	视网膜的色素沉着量增加。
HP:0011513	心血管系统异常,眼部异常	Retinal cavernous angioma	A benign tumor of the retina that appears as a grouping of blood-filled saccules within the inner retinal layers or on the surface of the optic disc. Retinal cavernous angioma are described as having a &#39;cluster of grapes&#39; appearance.	视网膜海绵状血管瘤	显示为血液填充的视网膜内层内或视盘的表面上的一种视网膜良性肿瘤。视网膜海绵状血管瘤被描述为具有“葡萄串状”外观。
HP:0011514	眼部异常	Abnormality of binocular vision	An abnormality of binocular vision, that is of the ability to synthesize the visual inputs from both eyes to a single image with perception of depth.	双眼单视功能异常	双眼视觉的异常。双眼视觉是指双眼看到的景物合成为一个单一的图像，并有感知深度的能力。
HP:0011515	眼部异常	Abnormal stereopsis	Inability to make fine depth discriminations from parallax provided by the two eyes&#39; different positions on the head.	立体视觉异常	立体视觉异常。立体视觉是指双眼观察景物时能通过双眼视察和头的不同位置，分辨物体远近距离的能力。
HP:0011516	眼部异常	Rod monochromacy	A condition where the retina contains no functional cone cells, so that in addition to the absence of color discrimination, vision in lights of normal intensity is difficult.	全色盲	视网膜包含无功能的视锥细胞，所以，除了没有颜色辨别能力，正常光照下视力很差。
HP:0011517	眼部异常	Cone monochromacy	The condition of having both rods and cones, but only a single kind of cone.  Affected individuals have good pattern vision in daylight, but cannot distinguish between colors.	锥细胞单色视	具有视杆和视锥细胞，但只有单一种类的视锥。患者在明亮的日光下视力好，但无法区分颜色。
HP:0011518	眼部异常	Dichromacy	Individuals affected by dichromacy possess only two types of cones, instead of three.	双色盲	患者只有两种类型的视锥细胞，而不是通常的三种。
HP:0011519	眼部异常	Anomalous trichromacy	Individuals with anomalous trichromacy possess three types of cones, but one of the three types of cones has an abnormal spectral sensitivity compared to normal cones.	三色视异常	三色视异常的患者具有三种类型的视锥细胞，但三种视锥细胞中的一种相对于正常视锥细胞光谱灵敏度异常。
HP:0011520	眼部异常	Deuteranomoly	A type of anomalous trichromacy associated with abnormal M photopigment, such that the absorption spectrum is shifted toward L wavelengths. Affected individuals have difficulties distinguishing between red and green.	绿色弱	异常三色视的一种，M波长感光色素异常，使得吸收光谱移向L波长，患者的红绿色觉异常。
HP:0011521	眼部异常	Deuteranopia	Complete lack of the M photopigment, which is replaced with the L photopigment.  Affected individuals tend to confuse red and green.	绿色盲	完全缺乏M波长感光色素，由L感光色素替代。患者分辨不出红色和绿色。
HP:0011522	眼部异常	Protanopia	Blue and green cones only; no functional red cones.	红色盲	只有蓝色和绿色锥体;无功能性红色视锥细胞。
HP:0011523	眼部异常	Iris cyst	An iris cyst is composed of a single cell layer of epithelium and is filled with fluid.	虹膜囊肿	虹膜囊肿由单层的上皮细胞组成，且其中充满液体。
HP:0011524	肿瘤,眼部异常	Iris melanoma	Malignant tumor of melanocytes affecting the iris.	虹膜黑色素瘤	虹膜黑色素细胞的恶性肿瘤。
HP:0011525	眼部异常	Iris nevus	A benign brown pigmented area over the iris representing proliferation of melanocyte cells in the stromal layer of the iris. An iris nevus can be flat or occasionally slightly elevated.	虹膜痣	虹膜上良性的褐色色素沉着，由虹膜的基质层黑色素细胞增殖形成。虹膜痣可以是扁平的或偶有轻度升高。
HP:0011526	眼部异常	Abnormality of lens shape	An abnormal shape of the `lens` (FMA:58241).	晶状体形状异常	晶状体的形态异常（FMA:58241）。
HP:0011527	眼部异常	Lentiglobus	Exaggerated curvature of the lens of the eye, producing an anterior or posterior spherical bulging.	球形晶状体	晶状体的曲率增大，导致前或后球形膨出。
HP:0011528	眼部异常	Single isolated congenital hypertrophy of retinal pigment epithelium	Sharply demarcated hyperpigmentation which is congenital found in around 3-5% of the population and of no functional significance.	视网膜色素上皮孤立性先天性肥厚	RPE细胞上出现的界限清晰的色素沉着过多，是先天性疾病，在人群中发病率为3-5％，没有功能障碍。
HP:0011529	眼部异常	Multiple bilateral congenital hypertrophy of retinal pigment epithelium	Sharply demarcated hyperpigmentation which is congenital.	视网膜色素上皮多重双边先天性肥厚	界限清晰的先天性色素沉着过多。
HP:0011530	眼部异常	Retinal hole	A small break in the retina.	视网膜裂孔	视网膜内的裂孔。
HP:0011531	眼部异常	Vitreitis	Inflammation of the vitreous body.	玻璃体炎	玻璃体的炎症。
HP:0011532	眼部异常	Subretinal exudate	A type of retinal exudate located in the subretinal space between the sensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium.	视网膜下渗出	位于神经视网膜和视网膜色素上皮细胞之间的视网膜下腔内的视网膜渗出。
HP:0011533	眼部异常	Snowflake retinal degeneration	The appearance of yellow/white crystalline-like (hence the name) spots in the retina and thickening of the peripheral part of the vitreous.	雪花状视网膜变性	玻璃体和视网膜周边部的黄/白色结晶状（因此而得名）斑点的变性。
HP:0011534	心血管系统异常	Abnormal spatial orientation of the cardiac segments	An abnormality of the cardiac segments locations in space.	心脏节段空间排布异常	心脏不同节段在空间位置上的排布异常。
HP:0011535	心血管系统异常	Abnormal atrial arrangement	Abnormality of the spatial relationship of the atria to other components of the heart.	心房排布异常	心房与心脏其它部位间空间关系的异常。
HP:0011536	心血管系统异常	Right atrial isomerism	Right atrial isomerism is characterized by bilateral triangular, morphologically right atrial, appendages, both joining the atrial chamber along a broad front with internal terminal crest.	右心房异构	右心房异构的特征是有双三角瓣，右心房样形态，有附属物，连接心房腔前部和顶部终端。
HP:0011537	心血管系统异常	Left atrial isomerism	In left atrial isomerism there is a bilateral small finger-shaped morphologically left atrial appendage joining the atrial chamber along a narrow front without an internal terminal crest.	左心房异构	两侧心房均为形态学左心房的先天性心脏异常，常伴多脾征，双侧肺均为两叶。
HP:0011538	心血管系统异常	Atrial situs inversus	Mirror image atrial arrangement, with morphologic right atrium on the left hand side and morphologic left atrium on the right hand side.	心房左右转位	形态学右心房在左手边，形态学左心房在右手边的镜像心房排列。
HP:0011539	心血管系统异常	Atrial situs ambiguous	Common atrium without defining morphologic features.	心房不定位	没有固定形态学特征的心房。
HP:0011540	心血管系统异常	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries	The essence of the lesion is the combination of discordant atrioventricular and ventriculo-arterial connections. Thus, the morphologically right atrium is connected to a morphologically left ventricle across the mitral valve, with the left ventricle then connected to the pulmonary trunk. The morphologically left atrium is connected to the morphologically right ventricle across the tricuspid valve, with the morphologically right ventricle connected to the aorta.	先天矫正型大动脉转位	病变的本质为房室以及房室动脉的连接不协调。因此，形态学右心房跨二尖瓣连接到形态左心室，然后左心室连接到肺动脉。形态学左心房跨三尖瓣连接到形态右心室，形态右心室连接到主动脉。
HP:0011541	心血管系统异常	Criss-cross atrioventricular valves	Crossing of the inflow streams of the two ventricles, due to an apparent twisting of the heart about its long axis.	十字形房室瓣	由于心脏长轴的明显扭曲，导致双心室的流入流的交叉。
HP:0011542	心血管系统异常	Criss-cross atrioventricular valves with superior-inferior ventricles	Criss-cross atrioventricular valves occurs with superior-inferior ventricles.	十字形房室瓣伴上下排列心室	伴随上下心室排列的十字型房室瓣。
HP:0011543	心血管系统异常	Superior-inferior ventricles without criss-cross atrioventricular valves	A type of superior-inferior ventricles which presents no criss-cross atrioventricular valves.	无十字房室瓣型上下排列心室	一种心室呈上下排列样疾病，但无十字型房室瓣。
HP:0011544	心血管系统异常	L-looping of the right ventricle	The right ventricle is abnormally positioned on the left side of the left ventricle.	右心室左袢	右心室异常地位于左心室的左侧，即右心室左袢。
HP:0011545	心血管系统异常	Abnormal connection of the cardiac segments	Abnormal connection between the cardiac segments，leading to abnormal  myocardial movement.	心脏节段连接异常	心脏节段间连接异常，导致心肌运动异常。
HP:0011546	心血管系统异常	Abnormal atrioventricular connection	An abnormality of the circulatory connection between atria and ventricles.	房室连接异常	心房与心室之间循环连接的异常。
HP:0011547	心血管系统异常	Absent left sided atrioventricular connection	Absence of left sided atrioventricular connection.	左侧房室接连缺失	左侧房室连接的缺失。
HP:0011548	心血管系统异常	Absent right sided atrioventricular connection	Absence of right sided atrioventricular connection.	右侧房室连接缺失	右侧房室连接的缺失。
HP:0011549	心血管系统异常	Univentricular heart with absent left sided atrioventricular connection	Univentricular heart with absent left sided atrioventricular connection.	左房室连接缺失致单心室心脏	左房室连接缺失导致的单心室心脏。
HP:0011550	心血管系统异常	Biventricular heart with straddling right sided atrioventricular valve and absent left sided atrioventricular connection	A heart with two ventricles while the tension apparatus of its right sided atrioventricular valve is attached to both sides of the ventricular septum, and the left sided atrioventricular valve is absent.	双心室心脏伴右房室瓣骑跨及左房室连接缺失	心脏有双心室但右侧房室瓣膜的张力部位与室间隔的左右两侧均相连，同时左侧房室瓣缺失。
HP:0011551	心血管系统异常	Right sided atrium to left ventricle and absent left sided atrioventricular connection	#####	右房左室连接伴左房室连接缺失。	#####
HP:0011552	心血管系统异常	Ambiguous atrioventricular connection	With left or right cardiac isomerism in a biventricular, the atrioventricular connections are perforce ambiguous, in that one of the connections is concordant (e.g., right-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a morphologic right ventricle) and one of the connections is discordant (e.g., left-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a  morphologic left ventricle).	房室连接不明	心脏异构形成左或右双心室，房室连接呈现分歧，其中一个的连接是一致的（例如，右侧的形态学右心房连接到形态学右心室）及一个的连接是不一致的（例如，左侧的形态学右心房连接到形态左心室）。
HP:0011553	心血管系统异常	Discordant atrioventricular connection	Connection of the right atrium to the left ventricle and of the left atrium to the right ventricle in a biventricular heart.	房室连接不协调	双心室心脏中右心房连接左心室或左心房连接右心室。
HP:0011554	心血管系统异常	Double inlet atrioventricular connection	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve.	双入口型房室连接	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接同一个心室。
HP:0011555	心血管系统异常	Double inlet left ventricle	The condition in which both atria are joined to the left ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually there is a hypoplastic right ventricle, which may be on the opposite side of the heart as usual.	左室双入口	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接左心室，通常心脏另一侧的右心室发育不良。
HP:0011556	心血管系统异常	Double inlet right ventricle	The condition in which both atria are joined to the right ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually, the left ventricle is hypoplastic.	右室双入口	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接右心室，通常心脏另一侧的左心室发育不良。
HP:0011557	心血管系统异常	Double inlet to single ventricle of indeterminate morphology	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. The morphology of this ventricle does not allow one to determine if it corresponds to the left or right ventricle.	#####	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接至同一个心室，该心室形态不足以确定是左心室或右心室。
HP:0011558	心血管系统异常	Double inlet to single ventricle with common atrioventricular orifice	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by common atrioventricular orifice.	单室双入口伴共同房室口	两个心房通过同一个房室口连接至同一个心室。
HP:0011559	心血管系统异常	Double inlet to single ventricle with two atrioventricular valves	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve.	单室双入口伴双房室瓣	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接至同一个心室。
HP:0011560	心血管系统异常	Mitral atresia	A congenital defect with failure to open of the mitral valve orifice.	二尖瓣闭锁	一种先天性缺陷，二尖瓣口不能打开。
HP:0011561	心血管系统异常	Overriding atrioventricular valve	An atrioventricular valve that empties into both ventricles. The valve overrides the interventricular septum above a ventricular septum defect.	房室瓣骑跨	房室瓣汇入到两个心室。瓣膜骑跨于缺损的室间隔上。
HP:0011562	心血管系统异常	Straddling atrioventricular valve	Anomalous insertion of the chordae tendinae or papillary muscles into the contralateral ventricle in the presence of a ventricular septum defect.	跨界房室瓣	腱索和乳头肌异常插入室间隔缺损的对侧心室。
HP:0011563	心血管系统异常	Abnormal ventriculo-arterial connection	Abnormality of the connection of ventriculo and arterial.	脑室动脉连接异常	脑室与动脉之间的连接出现异常
HP:0011564	心血管系统异常	Mitral valve arcade	Anomalous mitral valve arcade is diagnosed b ased on the following features (1) An adequately sized mitral valve orifice; (2) short, thick, and poorly differentiated chordae with direct union of the papillary muscles to the anterior leaflet; (3) narrow or nearly nonexistent spaces between the abnormal chordae; and (4) greater differentiation of the chordae attached to the posterior papillary muscle.	二尖瓣弓形	二尖瓣弓形异常诊断基于以下特点（1）足够大的二尖瓣口; （2）短、厚、低分化腱索与乳头肌的前叶直接结合; （3）异常腱索之间的空间狭窄或几乎不存在的空间（4）较大的分化腱索附连到后乳头肌。
HP:0011565	心血管系统异常	Common atrium	Complete absence of the interatrial septum with common atrioventricular valve and two atrioventricular connections.	共同心房	房间隔缺损，同时房室瓣和两个房室连接正常。
HP:0011566	心血管系统异常	Cor triatriatum dexter	A congenital anomaly with partitioning of the right atrium to form a triatrial heart caused by persistence of the right valve of the sinus venosus. Typically, the right atrial partition is due to exaggerated fetal eustachian and thebesian valves, which together form an incomplete septum across the lower part of the atrium. This septum may range from a reticulum to a substantial sheet of tissue.	右侧三房心	由于静脉窦右阀持续性存在导致右心房先天性被分隔，形成三个心房。通常，畸形的胎儿咽鼓管和冠状窦瓣在心房下部形成一个不完成的隔膜，引起右心房分区。这种隔膜既有网状组织也有实体组织。
HP:0011567	心血管系统异常	Sinus venosus atrial septal defect	An interatrial communication caused by a deficiency of the common wall between the superior vena cava (SVC) and the right-sided pulmonary veins. SVASD is commonly associated with anomalous pulmonary venous connection (APVC) of some or all of the pulmonary veins, which produces additional left-to-right shunting.	静脉窦型房间隔缺损	一个由上腔静脉（SVC）和右肺静脉之间的公共壁的缺陷导致的心房间通讯。静脉窦型房间隔缺损通常与一些全部或部分肺静脉异常连接有关，产生额外的左向右分流。
HP:0011568	心血管系统异常	Double orifice mitral valve	The left atrio-ventricular connection consists of two anatomically distinct orifices separated by accessory fibrous tissue.	双孔二尖瓣	左房室连接的部分主要附属纤维组织分开的两个不同的解剖口。
HP:0011569	心血管系统异常	Cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet	Cleft in the anterior mitral valve leaflet not associated with an atrioventricular canal defect.	二尖瓣前叶裂	二尖瓣前叶裂与房室管缺陷无关。
HP:0011570	心血管系统异常	Congenital mitral stenosis	Mitral stenosis with congenital onset.	先天性二尖瓣狭窄	先天性的二尖瓣狭窄。
HP:0011571	心血管系统异常	Parachute mitral valve	Abnormality of the mitral valve apparatus, whereby chordae attach to a single papillary muscle or hypoplastic papillary muscles.	降落伞型二尖瓣	异常的二尖瓣结构，腱索连接到单一的乳头肌或发育不全的乳头肌上。
HP:0011572	心血管系统异常	Supramitral ring	A congenital stenotic mitral valvular anomaly with a ring of tissue above the mitral valve.	二尖瓣上环	一种二尖瓣先天性狭窄，二尖瓣上部有环状组织。
HP:0011573	心血管系统异常	Hypoplastic tricuspid valve	Congenital defect characterized by underdevelopment of the tricuspid valve.	三尖瓣发育不全	三尖瓣先天性发育不全。
HP:0011574	心血管系统异常	Imperforate atrioventricular valve	An atrioventricular valve that has failed to open (atretic).	房室瓣闭锁	房室瓣无法打开（闭锁）。
HP:0011575	心血管系统异常	Imperforate tricuspid valve	An tricuspid valve that has failed to open (atretic).	三尖瓣闭锁	三尖瓣无法打开（闭锁）。
HP:0011576	心血管系统异常	Intermediate atrioventricular canal defect	A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and inlet ventricular defect. There is one valve annulus and two valve orifices.	中间型房室管缺损	一种心脏缺陷，包括第一房间隔缺损，二尖瓣前叶裂口，心室入口缺损。患者有一个瓣膜环和两个瓣口。
HP:0011577	心血管系统异常	Partial atrioventricular canal defect	A specific combination of heart defects including a primum atrial septal defect and cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet. There is not an inlet ventricular septal defect present. There are two valve annuluses and two valve orifices.	部分房室管缺损	心脏缺陷的特定组合，包括第一房间隔缺损和二尖瓣前叶裂口。不存在心室入口缺损。患者有两个瓣膜环和两个瓣口。
HP:0011578	心血管系统异常	Transitional atrioventricular canal defect	A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and an inlet ventricular septal defect. There are two valve annuli and two valve orifices.	过渡型房室管缺损	一个原发孔房间隔缺损伴随裂二尖瓣前瓣叶和入口室间隔缺损的一种特殊组合的心脏缺陷，有两个瓣膜环和两个瓣膜孔存在。
HP:0011579	心血管系统异常	Unbalanced atrioventricular canal defect	Anatomic features of unbalanced atrioventricular septal defect (AVSD) include varying amounts of ventricular hypoplasia, as well as malalignment of the atrioventricular junction.	不平衡型房室管缺损	不平衡型房室管缺损（AVSD）解剖学特征包括不同等级的的心室发育不全，以及房室结的排列不齐。
HP:0011580	心血管系统异常	Short chordae tendineae of the mitral valve	Abnormally short `chordae tendineae` (FMA:76527) of the mitral valve.	二尖瓣短腱索	二尖瓣腱索的异常短小。
HP:0011581	心血管系统异常	Double outlet left ventricle	A congenital defect of heart development characterized by origin of both pulmonary artery and aorta from the morphological left ventricle.	左室双出口	一种先天性心脏发育缺陷，特点是肺动脉和主动脉均从左心室发出。
HP:0011582	心血管系统异常	Abdominal ectopia cordis	Displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and into the abdomen.	腹型异位心	心脏在胸腔之外，异常地位于腹腔。
HP:0011583	心血管系统异常	Cervical ectopia cordis	A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region and withouta defect of the sternum.	颈部异位心	一种颈部心脏异位，而无胸骨受损。
HP:0011584	心血管系统异常	Thoracocervical ectopia cordis	A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region with a defect of the superior portion of the sternum.	胸颈异位心	一种的心脏异位，心脏部分位于颈部区域，同时胸骨上部异常。
HP:0011585	心血管系统异常	Thoracic ectopia cordis	Congenital malformation of the thoracic wall with partial or total displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity. This feature is associated with sternal cleft or absence of the sternum.	胸廓异位心	胸腔壁的先天畸形，心脏部分或全部置换到胸腔外。患者伴有胸骨裂或胸骨缺失。
HP:0011586	心血管系统异常	Thoracoabdominal ectopia cordis	Congenital malformation of the ventral wall with partial or total evisceration of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and displacement partially into the abdominal cavity.	胸腹异位心	腹壁先天性畸形，心脏的部分或全部胸腔外并部分进入腹腔。
HP:0011587	心血管系统异常	Abnormal branching pattern of the aortic arch	A deviance from the norm of the origin or course of the right brachiocephalic artery, the left common carotid artery, the left subclavian artery or the  proximal vertebral arteries.	主动脉弓分支异常	右头臂动脉，左颈总动脉，左锁骨下动脉或近端椎动脉的起源异常。
HP:0011588	心血管系统异常	Cervical aortic arch	The aortic arch extends into the soft tissues of the neck before turning down into to become the descending aorta.	颈型主动脉弓	主动脉弓延伸到颈部软组织内，再转成降主动脉。
HP:0011589	心血管系统异常	Common origin of the right brachiocephalic artery and left common carotid artery	The left common carotid artery has a common origin with the innominate artery.	右头臂干及左颈总动脉共同起源	左颈总动脉与无名动脉有一个共同的起源。
HP:0011590	心血管系统异常	Double aortic arch	A conenital abnormality of the aortic arch in which the two embryonic aortc arches form a vascular ring that surrounds the trachea or esophagus and then join to form the descending aorta. Double aortic arch can cause symptoms because of compression of the esophagus (dysphagia, cyanosis while eating) or trachea (stridor).	双主动脉弓	一种先天性的主动脉弓异常，双主动脉弓形成血管环围绕气管或食管形成降主动脉。双主动脉弓由于压迫食管和气管会引起相应症状，包括吞咽困难，紫绀，哮喘。
HP:0011591	心血管系统异常	Left aortic arch with cervical origin of the right subclavian artery	The aortic arch crosses the left main bronchus while the right subclavian artery originates abnormally high from the common carotid artery close to the bifurcation of the internal and external carotid arteries.	左位主动脉弓伴颈总动脉源型右锁骨下动脉	主动脉弓跨过左主支气管。右锁骨下动脉异常起源于颈总动脉上靠近颈内和颈外动脉分叉处。
HP:0011592	心血管系统异常	Left aortic arch with isolated subclavian artery	The subclavian artery arises from ductus arteriosus. While the ductus arteriosus is patent its blood supply comes from the ductus, hence from the pulmonary artery. After it closes, the blood supply is retrogradely from the vertebral artery via the circle of Willis.	左位主动脉弓伴孤立型锁骨下动脉	锁骨下动脉起源于动脉导管。当动脉导管未闭，血液来自动脉导管，因此也来自肺动脉。当它关闭后，血供应从椎动脉通过Willis循环逆行。
HP:0011593	心血管系统异常	Left aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell	A patent ductus arteriosus or ductal ligament completes the ring.	左位主动脉弓伴食管后科默雷尔憩室	动脉导管未闭或导管韧带成环。
HP:0011594	心血管系统异常	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell	Aortic arch crosses the right mainstem bronchus. The left carotid artery is the first branch,  right carotid artery the second branch and right subclavian artery as the third branch.	右主动脉弓伴食管后科默雷尔憩室	主动脉弓跨越右主支气管。左侧颈动脉是第一分支，右颈总动脉第二分支和右锁骨下动脉是第三分支。
HP:0011595	心血管系统异常	Left aortic arch with retroesophageal right subclavian artery	Aortic arch crosses the left mainstem bronchus. The first branch is the right carotid artery, the second branch is the left carotid artery, the third branch is the subclavian artery, the fourth branch is the right subclavian artery arising from the posteromedial aspect of the distal aortic arch and continuing posterior to the esophagus to the right hand side of the body.	左位主动脉弓伴食管后右锁骨下动脉	主动脉弓跨左主支气管。第一分支是右颈动脉，第二分支是左侧颈动脉中，第三分支是锁骨下动脉，第四分支是右锁骨下动脉，起于远侧主动脉弓的后中方位接着经食道到达身体的右手侧。
HP:0011596	心血管系统异常	Left aortic arch with right descending aorta and right ductus arteriosus	The aortic arch is positioned on the left side of oesophagus and trachea, and continued behind oesophagus to form the descending aorta. The two parts are connected by the ductal ligament and form a ring, which may cause trachea or oesophagus compression symptoms.	左位主动脉弓伴右位降主动脉及右动脉导管未闭	主动脉弓位于食管和气管的左侧，绕经食管后方向脊柱右侧延续为降主动脉，经动脉导管连接形成血管环，产生对气管、食管的压迫症状。
HP:0011597	心血管系统异常	Right aortic arch with left descending aorta and left ductus arteriosus	Right aortic arch with left descending aorta and left ductus arteriosus	右位主动脉弓伴左位降主动脉及左动脉导管未闭	右位主动脉弓伴左位降主动脉及左动脉导管未闭。
HP:0011598	心血管系统异常	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal left subclavian artery	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal left subclavian artery	右位主动脉弓伴食管后左锁骨下动脉	右位主动脉弓伴食管后左锁骨下动脉。
HP:0011599	心血管系统异常	Mesocardia	Mesocardia is a abnormal location of the heart in which the heart is in a midline position and the longitudinal axis of the heart lies in the mid-sagittal plane.	中位心	中位心是一种心脏位置异常，心脏位于身体中线位置且心脏的纵轴位于正中矢状面。
HP:0011600	心血管系统异常	Abnormal direction of ventricular apex	Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex. Left sided is normal.	心室尖部指向异常	心脏从基部到顶点所指方向的异常。心尖向左是正常的。
HP:0011601	心血管系统异常	Rightward direction of ventricular apex	#####	心室尖向右	#####
HP:0011602	心血管系统异常	Midline direction of ventricular apex	Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex in the midline. Left sided is normal.	心室尖向中	从心脏基底部到尖部的指向异常地朝向中线方向。正常应该朝左。
HP:0011603	心血管系统异常	Congenital malformation of the great arteries	A developmental malformation of the great arteries with congenital onset.	先天性大动脉畸形	先天性发病的大动脉畸形。
HP:0011604	心血管系统异常	Aortopulmonary window	A congenital anomaly with an abnormal connection between the aorta and the main pulmonary artery resulting in an aortopulmonary shunt.	主肺动脉窗	主动脉与主肺动脉之间先天性的异常连接，导致主-肺动脉分流。
HP:0011605	心血管系统异常	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries occurs with ventricular septal defect.	先天矫正型大动脉转位伴室间隔缺损	与室间隔缺损并发的先天性矫正型大动脉转位。
HP:0011606	心血管系统异常	Transposition of the great arteries with intact ventricular septum	Transposition of the great arteries without ventricular septal defects	室间隔完整型大动脉转位	大动脉转位不伴有室间隔缺损。
HP:0011607	心血管系统异常	Transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect	Transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect	室间隔缺损型大动脉转位	室间隔缺损型大动脉转位。
HP:0011608	心血管系统异常	Type II truncus arteriosus	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) with each pulmonary artery arising separate from each other on the posterior or lateral aspect of the truncus.	II型动脉干	II型动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉）两支肺动脉与分别从它的前后侧起源。
HP:0011609	心血管系统异常	Type III truncus arteriosus	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby one of the two pulmonary artery branched does not arise from the common pulmonary trunk, but instead from the ductus arteriosus or directly from the aorta.	III型动脉干	III型永存动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉），其中的一个个肺动脉分支不是从常见的肺动脉主干发出而是是从动脉管或直接从主动脉发出。
HP:0011610	心血管系统异常	Type IV truncus arteriosus	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby the aortic arch is hypoplastic or interrupted, and a large patent ductus arteriosus is present.	IV型动脉干	IV型动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉），由此主动脉弓发育不良或被受阻，出现一个大型动脉导管未闭。
HP:0011611	心血管系统异常	Interrupted aortic arch	Non-continuity of the `arch of aorta`(FMA:3768) with an atretic point or absent segment.	主动脉弓断离	非连续性“动脉弓”（FMA:3768），呈点状或节段性缺失。
HP:0011612	心血管系统异常	Interrupted aortic arch type A	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment at the level of the isthmus.	A型主动脉弓断离	主动脉弓峡部出现的点状或节段性缺失，引起非连续性“动脉弓”。
HP:0011613	心血管系统异常	Interrupted aortic arch type B	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the left carotid and subclavian arteries.	B型主动脉弓断离	左侧颈动脉和锁骨下动脉之间发生主动脉弓点状或节段性缺失，引起的非连续性主动脉弓。
HP:0011614	心血管系统异常	Interrupted aortic arch type C	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the innominate and left carotid arteries.	C型主动脉弓断离	无名动脉和左颈动脉间发生主动脉弓点状或节段性缺失，引起的非连续性主动脉弓。
HP:0011615	呼吸系统异常	Abnormality of pulmonary situs	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, which is defined by characteristics such as the number of lobes per lung and the relationship of the pulmonary arteries to their bronchi.	肺异常	肺异常，例如左右肺的分叶异常，由每侧肺的分叶数量、及肺动脉与其所属支气管的对应关系异常等确定。
HP:0011616	呼吸系统异常	Pulmonary situs inversus	Mirror image arrangement of the mainstem bronchi with the right pulmonary artery posterior to the right upper lobe bronchus and the left pulmonary artery anterior to the left upper lobe bronchus.	肺脏位置逆转	主支气管的位置镜像，右肺动脉位于右上叶支气管后方，左肺动脉位于左侧上叶支气管前方。
HP:0011617	呼吸系统异常	Pulmonary situs ambiguus	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which the morphology of both left and right lungs is the same.	肺脏定位模糊	肺形态定位的异常，如左右肺单侧性形态异常，体现为左侧和右侧肺有着相同的形态。
HP:0011618	呼吸系统异常	Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic right lungs	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a right lungs.	肺脏双侧形态似右肺	肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺单侧性形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态均为右肺。
HP:0011619	呼吸系统异常	Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic left lungs	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a left lung.	肺脏双侧形态似左肺	肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺单侧性形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态均为左肺。
HP:0011620	生长异常,消化系统异常	Abnormality of abdominal situs	An abnormality of the abdominal situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the abdomin and its organs.	腹部位置异常	腹部位置的异常，即，腹部及其脏器的边界异常。
HP:0011621	心血管系统异常	Gerbode ventricular septal defect	A type of ventricular septal defect communicating directly between the left ventricle and right atrium. This is anatomically possible because the normal tricuspid valve is more apically displaced than the mitral valve.	Gerbode室间隔缺损	一类直接连通左心室和右心房之间的室间隔缺损。这在解剖学上可能是因为正常的三尖瓣比二尖瓣顶部移位更多。
HP:0011622	心血管系统异常	Inlet ventricular septal defect	A ventricular septal defect that involves the inlet of the right ventricular septum immediately inferior to the AV valve apparatus.	入口型室间隔缺损	位于房室瓣膜下的右室间隔入口处发生的室间隔缺损。
HP:0011623	心血管系统异常	Muscular ventricular septal defect	The trabecular septum is the largest part of the interventricular septum. It extends from the membranous septum to the apex and superiorly to the infundibular septum. A defect in the trabecular septum is called muscular VSD if the defect is completely rimmed by muscle.	肌部型室间隔缺损	小梁隔膜是室间隔最大的部分。从膜隔到尖部伸展优于到漏斗隔膜。小梁隔的缺陷如果完全由肌肉镶边被称为肌部室间隔缺损。
HP:0011624	心血管系统异常	Apical muscular ventricular septal defect	A muscular ventricular septal defect located at the apex of the heart.	心尖肌部型室间隔缺损	一种位于心脏顶端的肌部室间隔缺损。
HP:0011625	心血管系统异常	Multiple muscular ventricular septal defects	The presence of more than one VSD in the muscular septum, with or without other VSD located in the peri-membranous or outlet septum, with or without associated intra-cardiac or extra-cardiac malformations.	多发肌部型室间隔缺损	室间隔肌部出现多处缺损可伴／不伴有其他部位室间隔缺损或心内／心外畸形。
HP:0011626	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Scimitar anomaly	A rare congenital heart defect characterized by partial anomalous pulmonary venous return from the right lung to the inferior vena cava which leads to the creation of a left-to-right shunt.	弯刀异常	部分血液从右肺动脉异常回流至下腔静脉从而导致左向右分流的一种罕见先天性心脏缺陷。
HP:0011627	心血管系统异常	Aorto-ventricular tunnel	Aorto-ventricular tunnel is a congenital, extracardiac channel which connects the ascending aorta above the sinutubular junction to the cavity of the left, or (less commonly) right ventricle.	主动脉-心室隧道	主动脉-左室隧道是一种先天性的心外通道，将升主动脉与左心室（少量右心室）腔连接。
HP:0011628	心血管系统异常	Congenital defect of the pericardium	A developmental defect of the `pericardium` (FMA:9869) with congenital onset.	先天性心包缺陷	先天性发病的心包发育缺陷。
HP:0011629	心血管系统异常	Total absence of the pericardium	No pericardium around the heart, occurring as a congenital defect, not the result of a surgical pericardectomy.	完全型心包膜缺失	心脏周围没有心包膜，是先天性缺陷的一种，而不是由心包切除术所致。
HP:0011630	心血管系统异常	Complete diaphragmatic absence of pericardium	No pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.	完全型膈面心包缺失	隔面心包完全缺失。它是一种先天性缺陷，而不是心包切除术的结果。心包在心脏的其他部分正常存在。
HP:0011631	心血管系统异常	Complete right sided absence of pericardium	No pericardium is present on the righthand side of the heart. It is a congenital absence of pericardium rather than the result of a pericardectomy.	完全型右侧心包缺失	心脏右侧心包完全缺失，属于先天性无心包而非心包切除术的结果。
HP:0011632	心血管系统异常	Partial right sided absence of pericardium	A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the righthand side of the heart.	部分型右侧心包缺失	右侧心包部分缺失。
HP:0011633	心血管系统异常	Complete left sided absence of pericardium	A congenital anomaly with complete lack of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.	完全型左侧心包缺失	心脏左侧心包的先天性完全缺失。
HP:0011634	心血管系统异常	Partial left sided absence of pericardium	A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.	部分型左侧心包缺失	左侧心包部分缺失。
HP:0011635	心血管系统异常	Partial diaphragmatic absence of pericardium	Lack of a part of the pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.	部分型膈面心包缺失	心脏膈面的部分心包缺失。是一种先天性缺陷，而不是心包切除术的结果。心包存在于心脏的其他部分。
HP:0011636	心血管系统异常	Abnormal origin of the coronary arteries	Isolated abnormalities of the coronary artery origins. This may be in associated with other structural heart malformations but not the patterns of complex structural heart malformations which result in abnormal course of the coronary arteries.	冠状动脉起源异常	单纯的冠状动脉起源异常。这可能与其它心脏结构畸形有关，但并不是复杂的心脏结构畸形导致的冠状动脉走行异常。
HP:0011637	心血管系统异常	Anomalous origin of coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	A coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta.	肺动脉源性冠状动脉起源异常	冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
HP:0011638	心血管系统异常	Anomalous origin of left coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	Left main coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the left cusp of the aortic valve.	肺动脉源性左冠状动脉起源异常	左冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
HP:0011639	心血管系统异常	Anomalous origin of right coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	Right coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the right cusp of the aortic valve.	肺动脉源性右冠状动脉起源异常	右冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
HP:0011640	心血管系统异常	Single coronary artery origin	The presence of a single coronary artery ostium from which both coronary arteries arise.	单一冠状动脉起源	两个冠状动脉发出位置只有单个冠状动脉孔的存在。
HP:0011641	心血管系统异常	Coronary artery fistula	A congenital malformation with abnormal connection between one of the coronary arteries and a heart chamber or another blood vessel.	冠状动脉瘘	冠状动脉与心腔或其他血管之间的先天性连接异常。
HP:0011642	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the coronary sinus	An abnormality of the `coronary sinus` (FMA:4706). The coronary sinus is formed by the union of the great cardiac vein and the left marginal vein and terminates in the right atrium.	冠状窦异常	冠状窦的异常。冠状窦是由心大静脉和左缘静脉汇合而成并终止在右心房的大血管样结构。
HP:0011643	心血管系统异常	Coronary sinus atrial septal defect	An atrial septal defect characterized by a deficiency in the tissue separating the coronary sinus from the left atrium (LA). This results in partial or complete unroofing of the coronary sinus leading to a predominantly left-to-right shunt through the coronary sinus (LA to coronary sinus to right atrium [RA]). The orifice of the ostium is frequently large because of the increased flow. From the RA side, the defect is located at the level of the coronary sinus ostium and may also include some deficiency in atrial tissue around the ostium. From the LA side, the size can be variable depending on the degree of unroofing of the coronary sinus.	冠状静脉窦型房间隔缺损	伴随冠状静脉窦与左心房连接的组织缺损的房间隔缺损。这将导致冠状窦的部分或全部去顶，引起通过冠状窦的左向右分流（左心房流向冠状动脉窦然后到右心房（RA））。由于血流量增大，窦孔逐渐变大。右心房的缺损主要存在于冠状窦口，也包括窦口周围的心房组织缺损。左心房缺损的大小依赖于冠状窦去顶的程度。
HP:0011644	心血管系统异常	Coronary sinus diverticulum	A venous pouch within the left ventricular wall, with a neck opening into the coronary sinus.	冠状窦憩室	左心室壁内的静脉袋，具有一颈口进入冠状静脉窦。
HP:0011645	心血管系统异常	Sinus of Valsalva aneurysm	The dilatation of the aortic wall behind each of the cusps of the aortic valve.	主动脉窦瘤	主动脉瓣尖后的主动脉壁扩张。
HP:0011646	心血管系统异常	Juxtaductal coarctation of the aorta	Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized at the insertion of the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the `juxtaductal region of aortic arch` (FMA:3778).	导管旁主动脉缩窄	位于动脉导管接入处（如主动脉弓管旁区，FMA:3778）的主动脉缩窄。
HP:0011647	心血管系统异常	Postductal coarctation of the aorta	Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized distal to the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the `postductal region of aortic arch` (FMA:3776).	导管后主动脉缩窄	动脉导管远端的主动脉狭窄或缩窄（FMA:3776）。
HP:0011648	心血管系统异常	Patent ductus arteriosus after birth at term	Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus in postnatal life when birth was at 37 completed weeks of gestation or greater.	足月儿动脉导管未闭	足月出生（妊娠37周或更长时间）的婴儿，动脉导管异常地持续开放。
HP:0011649	心血管系统异常	Patent ductus arteriosus after premature birth	Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus when birth was at less than 37 weeks completed gestation.	早产儿动脉导管未闭	婴儿在少于完整的37周妊娠期出生时，动脉导管异常地持续开放。
HP:0011650	心血管系统异常	Bilateral ductus arteriosus	The presence of both a left and a right ductus arteriosus.	双侧动脉导管	含有左、右两个动脉导管。
HP:0011651	心血管系统异常	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。双交通室间隔缺损（double committed ventricular septal defect）:此型缺损在右心室双出口罕见，约占3%～4%。两大动脉多为并列关系。由于此缺损位于室间隔上方和漏斗隔严重发育不全或缺如，所以缺损则位于两大动脉环的下方。两大动脉瓣环为缺损后上缘，缺损的前下缘为隔缘束的上支，后下缘为隔缘束下支。往往无主动脉下圆锥或仅在室间隔缺损和两大动脉瓣环之间有一窄条肌肉束，可伴有主动脉与二尖瓣或肺动脉与三尖瓣纤维连续。心脏传导束离开缺损边缘较远，很少因手术产生心脏传导阻滞。
HP:0011652	心血管系统异常	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
HP:0011653	心血管系统异常	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。非交通型室间隔缺损（noncommitted或remote ventricular septal defect）:此缺损比较少见，在右心室双出口中占5%～8%。两大动脉多呈并列关系，右侧大动脉异位少见。远离两大动脉室间隔缺损合并Rastelli的C型完全性房室隔缺损比较多见，往往有脾脏异常、单心房或内脏异位。不合并完全性房室隔缺损者，两大动脉开口与室间隔缺损之间有3～5个三尖瓣乳头肌及其腱索，缺损位于隔瓣后，属于流入部室间隔缺损，房室结位置正常，希氏束和左束支走行于缺损后上缘室间隔左心室面；缺损位于三尖瓣前瓣和隔瓣之间，属于围膜部缺损，心脏传导束走行于缺损后下缘室间隔左心室面。此型室间隔缺损可有心房反位或合并左心室发育不全。
HP:0011654	心血管系统异常	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
HP:0011655	心血管系统异常	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。
HP:0011656	心血管系统异常	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
HP:0011657	心血管系统异常	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。肺动脉下室间隔缺损（subpulmonary ventricular septal defect）:右心室双出口伴有肺动脉下室间隔缺损又称Taussig-Bing心脏畸形（Taussig-Bing malformation）。右心室双出口中占20%～30%，多为两大动脉并列，占73%。在此心脏畸形中，均有漏斗隔对位异常。室间隔缺损位于室间隔前上方。如有肺动脉下圆锥，圆锥肌肉构成室间隔缺损上缘，其后下缘可延伸至三尖瓣环；如无肺动脉下圆锥，则缺损侧位于肺动脉瓣环下方。根据肺动脉横跨程度，缺损后上缘为肺动脉瓣与二尖瓣或三尖瓣纤维连续或肺动脉瓣环，其后下缘为肌肉室间隔。
HP:0011658	心血管系统异常	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
HP:0011659	心血管系统异常	Tetralogy of Fallot with absent pulmonary valve	Features of tetralogy of Fallot with either rudimentary ridges or the complete absence of pulmonic valve tissue.	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣缺失	以脊部发育不全或完全没有肺动脉瓣组织为特点的法洛四联症。
HP:0011660	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from ascending aorta	Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from the ascending aorta with the contralateral pulmonary artery arising from the right ventricle.	一侧肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉	一侧肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉，而对侧肺动脉起源于右心室。
HP:0011661	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Anomalous origin of left pulmonary artery from ascending aorta	The left pulmonary artery originates from the ascending aorta in the presence of a pulmonary valve and main pulmonary artery.	左肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉	在肺动脉瓣和肺主动脉存在的情况下，左肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉。
HP:0011662	心血管系统异常	Tricuspid atresia	Failure to develop of the tricuspid valve and thus lack of the normal connection between the right atrium and the right ventricle.	三尖瓣闭锁	三尖瓣发育障碍导致右心房和右心室之间无法正常连接。
HP:0011663	心血管系统异常	Right ventricular cardiomyopathy	Right ventricular dysfunction (global or regional) with functional and morphological right ventricular abnormalities, with or without left ventricular disease.	右室心肌病	右心功能不全（全部或部分）与功能和形态右心室发育异常，伴或不伴有左心室疾病。
HP:0011664	心血管系统异常	Left ventricular noncompaction cardiomyopathy	Left ventricular non-compaction (LVNC) is characterized by prominent left ventricular trabeculae and deep inter-trabecular recesses. The myocardial wall is often thickened with a thin, compacted epicardial layer and a thickened endocardial layer. In some patients, LVNC is associated with left ventricular dilatation and systolic dysfunction, which can be transient in neonates.	左室致密化不全心肌病	左室致密化不全性心肌病（LVNC）的特征是有显着的左心室小梁和深间小梁壁凹。心肌壁往往增厚，伴随薄且致密的心外膜层和增厚的心内膜层。在一些患者中，LVNC与左心室扩张和收缩功能障碍有关，在新生儿种可能只是瞬时的现象。
HP:0011665	心血管系统异常	Takotsubo cardiomyopathy	takotsubo cardiomyopathy is characterized by transient regional systolic dysfunction involving the left ventricular apex and/or mid-ventricle in the absence of obstructive coronary disease on coronary angiography. Patients present with an abrupt onset of angina-like chest pain, and have diffuse T-wave inversion, sometimes preceded by ST-segment elevation.	应激性心肌病	应激性心肌病的特征是通过血管造影术并未发现冠脉阻滞症状但却出现了涉及左心室心尖和/或中心室的短暂局部收缩功能障碍。患者表现为突发性的胸绞痛和弥漫性T波倒置，有时会有ST段抬高和轻度心肌酶升高。
HP:0011666	心血管系统异常	Absent right superior vena cava	Absence of the right superior vena cava (RSVC). An absent RSVC is always associated with a persistent left superior vena cava (PLSVC). During normal fetal development, the left-sided anterior venous cardinal system regresses, leaving the coronary sinus (CS) and the ligament of Marshall. Failure of the closure of the left anterior cardinal vein results in PLSVC. In general, PLSVC is associated with the right superior vena cava (RSVC) and drains into the RA via a dilated CS. When developmental arrest occurs at an earlier stage, the CS is absent and the PLSVC drains into the left atrium.	右上腔静脉缺失	右上腔静脉（RSVC）的缺失。右上腔静脉的缺失常与永存左上腔静脉（PLSVC）有关。胎儿正常发育过程中，左侧前静脉离开冠状窦（CS）和Marshall韧带后，系统性退化。左侧前静脉的关闭不全导致右上腔静脉的缺失。在一般情况下，PLSVC与右上腔静脉（RSVC）连接，通过扩张的CS汇入RA。在较早阶段发育停滞时，CS缺失，PLSVC汇入进入左心房。
HP:0011667	心血管系统异常	Bilateral superior vena cava with bridging vein	The presence of bilateral superior vena cava and bridging vein.	双侧上腔静脉伴桥静脉	双侧上腔静脉与桥静脉同时存在。
HP:0011668	心血管系统异常	Bilateral superior vena cava with no bridging vein	The presence of bilateral superior vena cava without bridging vein.	双侧上腔静脉不伴桥静脉	只存在双侧上腔静脉，不含有桥静脉。
HP:0011669	心血管系统异常	Left superior vena cava draining directly to the left atrium	Left superior vena cava draining directly to the left atrium	左上腔静脉接左心房	左上腔静脉直接将血液输送至左心房，正常应该至右心房。
HP:0011670	心血管系统异常	Left superior vena cava draining to coronary sinus	Left superior vena cava draining to coronary sinus	左上腔静脉接冠状窦	左上腔静脉引流至冠状窦，正常应该至右心房。
HP:0011671	心血管系统异常	Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation	Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation is the result of connection failure between the right subcardinal vein and the right vitelline vein. Consequently, venous blood from the caudal part of the body reaches the heart via the azygous vein and superior vena cava.	下腔静脉中断伴奇静脉延续	中断下腔静脉伴奇静脉延续是右下主静脉和右卵黄静脉之间的连接失败的结果。因此，从机体的尾部静脉血液经由奇静脉和上腔静脉到达心脏。
HP:0011672	肿瘤,心血管系统异常	Cardiac myxoma	A myxoma (tumor of primitive connective tissue) of the heart. Cardiac myxomas consist of stellate to plump, cytologically bland mesenchymal cells set in a myxoid stroma. Cardiac myxomas are of endocardial origina and general project from the endocardium into a cardiac chamber.	心脏粘液瘤	心脏的粘液瘤（原生结缔组织肿瘤）。心脏粘液瘤由存在于粘液样基质中的星形、丰满的、表面光滑的细胞构成。心脏粘液瘤是由心内膜起源，由心内膜扩散到心腔。
HP:0011673	肿瘤,心血管系统异常	Cardiac hemangioma	Abnormal proliferation of blood vessels within the cardiac cavities attached to the endocardium.	心脏血管瘤	连接心腔与心内膜血管的异常增生。
HP:0011674	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常,心血管系统异常	Cardiac teratoma	A teratoma within the heart. Most commonly, these tumors are detected in the pericardial cavity attached to the pulmonary artery and aorta. The tumour size within the heart varies from 2 to 9 cm in diameter, and intrapericardial tumors as large as 15 cm have been reported. Intracardiac tumors arise from the atrial or ventricular wall as nodular masses protruding into the cardiac chambers. Cardiac and pericardial teratomas are easily detected in the fetus and neonate by two-dimensional echocardiography as heterogeneous and encapsulated cystic masses. Histologically, cardiac teratomas contain multiple immature elements including epithelium, neuroglial tissue, thyroid, pancreas, smooth and skeletal muscle, cartilage and bone.	心脏畸胎瘤	在心脏内的畸胎瘤，一般，存在于与肺动脉和主动脉相连的心包腔内，直径大约2至9厘米，已报道的最大肿瘤15cm。心内的肿瘤起源于心房或心室壁的结节状肿块，扩散到心腔。由于其异质性以及包裹性囊性肿块，心脏和心包中的畸胎瘤很容易通过胎儿和新生儿的二维超声心动图检测到。组织学上，心脏畸胎瘤包含多个组分，包括上皮细胞、神经胶质组织、甲状腺、胰腺、平滑肌、横纹肌、软骨和骨。
HP:0011675	心血管系统异常	Arrhythmia	Any cardiac rhythm other than the normal sinus rhythm. Such a rhythm may be either of sinus or ectopic origin and either regular or irregular. An arrhythmia may be due to a disturbance in impulse formation or conduction or both.	心律失常	非正常窦性心律的其他心律。这样的心律可能是窦或异位的起源，有的规律有的不规律。心律失常由心脏搏动的起源或传导紊乱引起。
HP:0011676	心血管系统异常	Tetralogy of Fallot with absent subarterial conus	A form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by no subarterial conus.	法洛四联症伴瓣下圆锥缺失	法洛四联症的一种形式，表现为瓣下圆锥的缺失。
HP:0011677	心血管系统异常	Tetralogy of Fallot with atrioventricular canal defect	An form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by defect of atrioventricular canal.	法洛四联症伴房室管缺陷	法洛四联症的一种形式，表现为房室管存在缺陷。
HP:0011678	心血管系统异常	Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia and major aortopulmonary collateral arteries	A type of tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia in which all pulmonary blood flow is derived from major aortopulmonary collateral arteries (MAPCA).	法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁及主肺动脉侧支动脉	法洛四联症合并肺动脉闭锁的一种，患者肺部的血液主要从体肺侧支动脉（MAPCA）流入。
HP:0011679	心血管系统异常	Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary stenosis	The commonest form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by pulmonary stenosis, overriding aorta, ventricular septum defect, and right ventricular hypertrophy, without pulmonary atresia, absent pulmonary valve, atrioventricular canal defect or absent subarterial conus.	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣狭窄	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣狭窄是法洛四联症的一种最常见的形式，主要特征为肺动脉狭窄，主动脉骑跨，室间隔缺损，右心室肥大，无肺动脉闭锁，肺动脉瓣缺如，房室管缺陷或缺失下动脉圆锥。
HP:0011680	心血管系统异常	Single ventricle of indeterminate morphology	A rare congenital heart defect characterized by one ventricle with indeterminate morphology and receiving both tricuspid and mitral valves or a common AV valve with indeterminate morphology.	不定形单心室	一种罕见的先天性心脏畸形，人体只有一个形态不确定的心室，同时具有三尖瓣和二尖瓣，或一个形态不确定的共同房室瓣。
HP:0011681	心血管系统异常	Subarterial ventricular septal defect	A ventricular septal defect that lies beneath the semilunar valve(s) in the conal or outlet septum.	动脉下室间隔缺损	动脉下室间隔缺损是一种在半月瓣之下或隔膜外发生的室间隔缺损。
HP:0011682	心血管系统异常	Perimembranous ventricular septal defect	A ventricular septal defect that is confluent with and involves the membranous septum and is bordered by an atrioventricular valve, not including the type 3 VSDs.	膜周型室间隔缺损	膜周型室间隔缺损是与膜性中隔汇合、涉及膜性中隔、以房室瓣为界、不包括3型房室间隔缺损的一类房室间隔缺损。
HP:0011683	心血管系统异常	Restrictive ventricular septal defect	Ventricular septal defect (VSD) that is small enough to restrict flow across it such that a pressure gradient exists between the two sides of the VSD.	限制型室间隔缺损	室间隔缺损（VSD），是室间隔太小使得两侧之间存在压力梯度，限制了通过的血流量。
HP:0011684	心血管系统异常	Non-restrictive ventricular septal defect	Any ventricular septal defect (VSD) that does not restrict flow across it sufficiently to generate a pressure gradient between the two sides of the VSD.	非限制型室间隔缺损	不限制血流经过，但足以在室间隔两侧产生压力梯度的室间隔缺损。
HP:0011685	心血管系统异常	Infra-aortic superior vena cava	The superior vena cava passes below the aortic arch.	主动脉下上腔静脉	上腔静脉从主动脉弓下方通过。
HP:0011686	心血管系统异常	Abnormal coronary artery course	An abnormal path of a coronary artery.	冠状动脉走行异常	冠状动脉血管走向的异常。
HP:0011687	心血管系统异常	AV nodal tachycardia	A type of supraventricular tachycardia that originates in the atrioventricular node.	房室结型心动过速	一种起源于房室结的室上性心动过速。
HP:0011688	心血管系统异常	Supraventricular tachycardia with an accessory connection mediated pathway	#####	室上性心动过速伴旁路连接	#####
HP:0011689	心血管系统异常	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory connection	#####	室上性心动过速伴隐匿性旁路	#####
HP:0011690	心血管系统异常	Permanent junctional reciprocating tachycardia	It is an abnormal heart rhythm arising from improper electrical activity of the heart that happens reciprocately in the junction of ventricle and atrial.	持续性交界处反复性心动过速	这是一类心脏非正常电活动引起的异常心脏节律，电波在房室交界处往复传递。
HP:0011691	心血管系统异常	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the left free wall	#####	室上性心动过速伴左侧游离壁隐匿性旁路	#####
HP:0011692	心血管系统异常	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the right free wall	#####	室上性心动过速伴右侧游离壁隐匿性旁路	#####
HP:0011693	心血管系统异常	Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the septum	#####	室上性心动过速伴间隔隐匿性旁路	#####
HP:0011694	心血管系统异常	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway	#####	室上性心动过速伴显性旁路	#####
HP:0011695	神经系统异常,血液和造血组织异常,心血管系统异常	Cerebellar hemorrhage	`Hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) into the parenchyma of the cerebellum.	小脑出血	小脑实质内的出血(MPATH:119)。
HP:0011696	心血管系统异常	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the left free wall	#####	室上性心动过速伴左侧游离壁显性旁路	#####
HP:0011697	心血管系统异常	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the right free wall	#####	室上性心动过速伴右侧游离壁显性旁路	#####
HP:0011698	心血管系统异常	Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the septum	#####	室上性心动过速伴间隔显性旁路	#####
HP:0011699	心血管系统异常	Atrial reentry tachycardia	Atrial tachycardia (IART) is a kind of atrial tachycardia caused by reentry mechanism.	心房折返性心动过速	心房折返性心动过速是由于折返机制引起的一种房性心动过速。
HP:0011700	心血管系统异常	Automatic atrial tachycardia	Automatic atrial tachycardia refers to a kind of tachycardia ，because of the automaticity intensity of ectopic pacemaker in atrial increased，speed up the frequency of excited release.	自律性房性心动过速	自律性房性心动过速（AAT）是指心房内异位起搏点自律性强度增高，发放激动的频率加快所引起的房性心动过速。
HP:0011701	心血管系统异常	Multifocal atrial tachycardia	A type of tachycardia,which is resulted from alternating impulse origined from multiple ectopic pacemaker in the atrial.	多灶性房性心动过速	是由于心房内多个异位起搏点交替发放冲动形成的房性心动过速。
HP:0011702	心血管系统异常	Abnormal electrophysiology of sinoatrial node origin	An abnormality of the sinoatrial (SA) node in the right atrium. THe SA node acts as the pacemaker of the heart.	窦房结源性电生理异常	位于右心房的窦房结（SA）的异常。窦房结起着心脏起搏器的作用。
HP:0011703	心血管系统异常	Sinus tachycardia	A simple tachycardia with origin in the sinus node with gradual onset and termination.	窦性心动过速	一种单纯的心动过速，起源于窦房结，启动和终止都比较缓慢。
HP:0011704	心血管系统异常	Sick sinus syndrome	Dysfunction of the sinoatrial node manifested by persistent sinus bradycardia,sinus arrest,sinoatrial exit block,chronic atrial fibrillation and inability of the heart to resume sinus rhythm following cardioversion for atrial fibrillation.	病窦综合征	窦房结功能障碍表现为持续性窦性心律过缓，窦性停搏，窦房输出阻滞，慢性房颤和房颤电复律后心动无力。
HP:0011705	心血管系统异常	First degree atrioventricular block	Delay of conduction through the atrioventricular node, which is manifested as prolongation of the PR interval in the electrocardiogram (EKG). All atrial impulses reach the ventricles.	一度房室传导阻滞	通过房室结点的传导迟滞，这表现为在心电图（EKG）中的PR间隔延长。所有的心房冲动到达心室。
HP:0011706	心血管系统异常	Second degree atrioventricular block	An intermittent  atrioventricular block with failure of some atrial impulses to conduct to the ventricles, i.e., some but not all atrial impulses are conducted through the atrioventricular node and trigger ventricular contraction.	二度房室传导阻滞	一种脉冲不能正常的从心房传导至心室的间歇性房室传导阻滞，也就是说，有一些但不是所有的心房冲动能通过房室结传导进而触发心室收缩。
HP:0011707	心血管系统异常	Mobitz I atrioventricular block	Progressive PR interval prolongation with the subsequent occurrence of a single nonconducted P wave that results in a pause. The pause that follows the nonconducted impulse is less than fully compensatory (less than the sum of two normal sinus intervals).	默比茨I型房室传导阻滞	心电图表现为PR间期逐渐延长直至QRS波群脱落（P波不能下传），RR间期逐渐缩短直至一个P波不能下传，包含受阻P波在内的RR间期小于正常窦性PP间期的两倍。
HP:0011708	心血管系统异常	Mobitz II atrioventricular block	A type of second degree atrioventricular (AV) block characterized by sudden failure to conduct an impulse through the AV node without a preceding change in the PR interval.	默比茨II型房室传导阻滞	心电图表现为PR间期固定，每隔一个或数个心动周期出现一个或数个心室漏搏，下传心动周期的PR间期可正常或延长。
HP:0011709	心血管系统异常	Atrioventricular dissociation	Atrioventricular (AV) dissociation is present if the atria and the ventricles are under the control of two separate pacemakers.  AV dissociation can occur is the absence of a primary AV conduction disturbance.	房室分离	房室（AV）分离是指心房和心室分别由两个单独的起搏器的控制，一般由一级房室传导受阻导致。
HP:0011710	心血管系统异常	Bundle branch block	Block of conduction of electrical impulses along the Bundle of His or along one of its bundle branches.	束支传导阻滞	房室束或其分支的电流传导阻滞。
HP:0011711	心血管系统异常	Left anterior fascicular block	Conduction block in the anterior division of the left bundle branch of the bundle of His.	左前分支传导阻滞	在希氏束左束支的前分支传导阻滞。
HP:0011712	心血管系统异常	Right bundle branch block	A conduction block of the right branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a prolongation of the QRS complex (greater than 0.12 s) with delayed activation of the right ventricle and terminal delay on the EKG.	右束支传导阻滞	希氏束的右支的传导阻滞。这表现为QRS波群（大于0.12s）的延长同时伴有右心室激活延迟和EKG的终端延迟。
HP:0011713	心血管系统异常	Left bundle branch block	A conduction block of the left branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a generalized disturbance of QRS morphology on EKG.	左束支传导阻滞	希氏束左支传导阻滞。这表现为心电图上QRS波形态受到广泛干扰。
HP:0011714	心血管系统异常,免疫系统异常	Libman-Sacks lesions	Libman-Sacks valvular lesions are sterile fibrofibrinous vegetations that favor the left-sided heart valves and usually form on the ventricular surface of the mitral valve.	利布曼－萨克斯病变	利布曼-萨克斯瓣膜病变是非细菌性纤维素赘生物，好发于左侧心脏瓣膜，通常在二尖瓣的心室表面形成。
HP:0011715	心血管系统异常	Trifascicular block	Abnormal conduction in all three divisions of the intraventricular conducting tissue.	三支传导阻滞	心室内传导组织的三个分支全部异常传导。
HP:0011716	心血管系统异常	Junctional ectopic tachycardia	A tachycardia arising in the conduction tissues surrounding the atrioventricular node. It usually occurs during myocardial infarction,after heart surgery,or in digitalis intoxication. The rate may range from 140 to 250 beats per minute.	交界性异位心动过速	起源于房室结附近传导组织的心动过速。通常发生于心脏手术后或洋地黄中度引起的心肌梗死。心率可能在140-250/分。
HP:0011717	心血管系统异常	AV nodal reentry tachycardia	An unusually fast heart rate caused by an extra electrical connection that forms through the AV node	房室结折返性心动过速	房室结处形成的额外电连接，引起异常的心动过速。
HP:0011718	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Abnormality of the pulmonary veins	An abnormality of the `pulmonary veins` (FMA:70827).	肺静脉异常	肺静脉的异常（FMA:70827）。
HP:0011719	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Supracardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection	Type 1 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.	心上型完全性肺静脉连接异常	1型完全性肺静脉异位连接。
HP:0011720	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Cardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection	Type 2 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.	心型完全性肺静脉连接异常	2型完全性肺静脉异常连接。
HP:0011721	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Infracardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection	Type 3 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.	心下型完全性肺静脉连接异常	3型完全性肺静脉异常连接。
HP:0011722	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Mixed total anomalous pulmonary venous connection	Type 4 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.	混合型完全性肺静脉连接异常	4型完全性肺静脉异常连接。
HP:0011723	心血管系统异常	Congenital malformation of the right heart	A developmental malformation of the right heart with congenital onset.	先天性右心畸形	先天性发病的右心畸形。
HP:0011724	心血管系统异常	Uhl&#39;s anomaly	It is a very rare congenital heart disease with a partial or total loss of the myocardial muscle in the right ventricle.	尤尔畸形	是一类罕见的先天性心脏病，表现为右心室心肌的完全缺失。
HP:0011725	心血管系统异常	Chaotic multifocal atrial tachycardia	Chaotic multifocal atrial tachycardia is a kind of rare and unique atrial arrhythmia.	紊乱性多源性房性心动过速	紊乱性房性心动过速是一种少见的独特的房性心律失常。
HP:0011726	心血管系统异常	Persistent fetal circulation	A syndrome of persistent pulmonary hypertension in the newborn infant,without demonstrable cardiac disease. It is characterized by cyanosis and acidosis,severe pulmonary vasoconstriction, hypertrophy of pulmonary arterial muscle,and elevated pulmonary vascular resistance,with resultant right-to-left shunting of blood through a patent ductus arteriosus and at times a patent foramen ovale.	持续性胎儿循环	指出生时动脉导管和卵圆孔未闭,当肺动脉压及肺血管阻力升高,导致右向左分流而引起新生儿青紫。
HP:0011727	肌肉组织异常,肢体异常	Peroneal muscle weakness	Weakness of the peroneal muscles.	腓骨肌无力	无力的腓骨肌。
HP:0011728	神经系统异常	Elbow clonus	Clonus at the elbow joint, i.e., an  exaggerated phasic stretch reflex characterized by repetitive, rhythmic contractions at the elbow, generated by rapid passive stretch at the elbow joint.	肘部阵挛	在肘关节发生的阵挛，例如出现夸张的牵张反射，表现为肘部重复的，有节奏的收缩，通常是快速的被动牵拉肘关节产生的。
HP:0011729	骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of joint mobility	An abnormality in the range and ease of motion of joints across their normal range.	关节活动异常	关节活动范围和灵活度的异常。
HP:0011730	神经系统异常	Abnormality of central sensory function	An abnormality of cortical sensation. Assuming the primary sensory modalities are intact and the patient is alert and cooperative, the presence of an abnormality of sensory function usually indicates a lesion of a parietal cortex or of the thalamocortical projections to the parietal cortex.	中央感觉功能异	皮质性感觉的异常。假设初级感觉形态完好，且患者处于觉醒和协作状态，感觉功能异常的存在通常表明的丘脑突起到顶叶皮质的病变。
HP:0011731	内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of circulating cortisol level	An abnormality of the concentration of "cortisol" (CHEBI:17650) in the blood.	血皮质醇水平异常	血液循环中皮质醇浓度异常。
HP:0011732	内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of adrenal morphology	Any structural anomaly of the "adrenal glands" (FMA:9604).	肾上腺形态异常	肾上腺的任何结构异常。
HP:0011733	内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of adrenal physiology	A functional abnormality of the "adrenal glands" (FMA:9604).	肾上腺生理异常	肾上腺的功能异常（FMA:9604）。
HP:0011734	内分泌系统异常	Central adrenal insufficiency	A form of adrenal insufficiency related to a lack of ACTH, which leads to a decrease in the production of cortisol by the adrenal glands. Aldosterone production is not usually affected.	中枢性肾上腺功能不全	由于促肾上腺皮质激素缺乏, 导致皮质醇产生减少引起的肾上腺功能不全。醛固酮的产生通常不受影响。
HP:0011735	内分泌系统异常	Adrenocorticotropin (ACTH) deficient adrenal insufficiency	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in ACTH production.	促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）缺乏性肾上腺功能不全	促肾上腺皮质激素的产生缺陷导致的肾上腺功能不全。
HP:0011736	内分泌系统异常	Primary hyperaldosteronism	A form of hyperaldosteronism caused by a defect within the adrenal gland.	原发性醛固酮增多症	由于肾上腺缺陷而引起的醛固酮过多症。
HP:0011737	内分泌系统异常	Corticotropin-releasing hormone (CRH) deficient adrenal insufficiency	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in corticotropin-releasing hormone production.	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素（CRH）缺陷引起的肾上腺功能不全	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素产生缺陷引起的继发性肾上腺功能不全。
HP:0011738	内分泌系统异常	Corticotropin-releasing hormone receptor (CRHR) defect	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in the corticotropin-releasing hormone receptor.	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素受体（CRHR）缺陷	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素受体缺陷引起的继发性肾上腺功能不全。
HP:0011739	内分泌系统异常	Dexamethasone-suppresible primary hyperaldosteronism	A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone can be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone.	地塞米松可抑制性原发性醛固酮增多症	原发性醛固酮增多症的一种形式，该病通过使用地塞米松来抑制产生过多的醛固酮。
HP:0011740	内分泌系统异常	Glucocorticoid-insensitive primary hyperaldosteronism	A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone cannot be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone or similar glucocorticoids.	糖皮质激素不敏感的原发性醛固酮增多症	原发性醛固酮增多症的一种形式，其醛固酮的过量产生无法用地塞米松或类似的糖皮质激素抑制。
HP:0011741	内分泌系统异常	Secondary hyperaldosteronism	A form of hyperaldosteronism caused by abnormally increased renin levels.	继发性醛固酮增多症	一种由于肾素异常增加而导致的醛固酮增多症。
HP:0011742	内分泌系统异常	Ectopic adrenal gland	Abnormal anatomical location of the adrenal gland.	异位肾上腺	肾上腺的解剖位置异常。
HP:0011743	内分泌系统异常	Adrenal gland agenesis	Absent development of the adrenal gland.	肾上腺发育缺失	肾上腺未发育。
HP:0011744	内分泌系统异常	Secondary hypercorticolism	Hypercortisolemia associated with a overproduction of ACTH (often from a tumor), leading secondarily to overproduction of cortisol.	继发性皮质醇增多症	由于促肾上腺皮质激素（往往来自肿瘤）产生过量，而导致继发性过度产生皮质醇。
HP:0011745	肿瘤,内分泌系统异常	Non-secretory adrenocortical adenoma	An hormonally inactive adrenocortical adenoma, that is, an adenoma that does not secrete excessive amounts of adrenal hormones.	非分泌性肾上腺皮质腺瘤	一个激素不活跃的肾上腺皮质腺瘤，也就是说，不过量分泌肾上腺激素的腺瘤。
HP:0011746	肿瘤,内分泌系统异常	Secretory adrenocortical adenoma	An hormonally active adrenocortical adenoma, that is, an adenoma that secretes excessive amounts of adrenal hormones.	分泌型肾上腺皮质腺瘤	一种仍具激素分泌活性的肾上腺皮质腺瘤，这种腺瘤分泌过量的肾上腺皮质激素。
HP:0011747	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of the anterior pituitary	An abnormality of the `adenohypophysis` (FMA:74627), which is also known as the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland.	垂体前叶异常	腺垂体,又被称为垂体前叶的异常。
HP:0011748	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Adrenocorticotropic hormone deficiency	A reduced ability to secrete adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), a hormone that stimulates the adrenal cortex to secrete of glucocorticoids such as cortisol.	促肾上腺皮质激素不足	分泌促肾上腺皮质激素(ACTH)的能力下降，ACTH是刺激肾上腺皮质分泌糖皮质激素，如皮质醇的一种激素。
HP:0011749	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Adrenocorticotropic hormone excess	Overproduction of adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), which generally leads secondarily to overproduction of cortisol by the adrenal cortex.	促肾上腺皮质激素过多	促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）产生过多，通常导致继发的肾上腺皮质产生过多皮质醇。
HP:0011750	肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Neoplasm of the anterior pituitary	The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) in the `adenohypophysis` (FMA:74627), which is also known as the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland.	垂体前叶肿瘤	腺垂体，也被称为脑垂体的前叶的肿瘤。
HP:0011751	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of the posterior pituitary	An abnormality of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628), which is also known as the posterior lobe of the hypophysis.	垂体后叶异常	神经垂体的异常，神经垂体又被称为垂体后叶。
HP:0011752	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Neoplasm of the posterior pituitary	The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) in the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628), which is also known as the posterior lobe of the hypophysis.	垂体后叶肿瘤	神经垂体，也被称为垂体后叶的肿瘤。
HP:0011753	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Posterior pituitary dysgenesis	Abnormal development of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628) during embryonic growth and development.	垂体后叶发育异常	胚胎期时垂体后叶的异常发育。
HP:0011754	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Pituicytoma	A solid, low grade, spindle cell, glial neoplasm of adults that originates in the neurohypophysis or infundibulum. Clinical signs and symptoms include visual disturbance, headache and features of hypopituitarism. Pituicytomas are well-circumscribed, solid masses that can measure up to several centimeters. Histologically, they show a compact architecture consisting of elongate, bipolar spindle cells arranged in interlacing fascicles or assuming a storiform pattern.	垂体细胞瘤	成人的一种实体性的，低分级的，梭形细胞神经胶质肿瘤，起源于神经垂体或垂体漏斗部。临床症状包括视力障碍，头痛和垂体功能低下的特点。 垂体细胞瘤是边界清楚的实体性肿块，直径可达数厘米。组织学上表现为拉长的双极梭形细胞以交错束状或席纹状图案排列的紧凑结构。
HP:0011755	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Ectopic posterior pituitary	An abnormal anatomical location of the posterior lobe of the hypophysis, also known as the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628). The posterior pituitary is normally present in the dorsal portion of the sella turcica, but when ectopic is usually near the median eminence. This defect is likely to be due to abnormal migration during embryogenesis.	垂体后叶异位	垂体后叶，即神经垂体的解剖位置异常。垂体后叶通常位于蝶鞍背部，但是发生异位时通常接近正中隆起。这种缺陷可能是由于胚胎发育过程中的异常迁移。
HP:0011756	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Posterior pituitary agenesis	Absence of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628) owing to a developmental defect.	垂体后叶缺失	由于发育缺陷而导致的缺少垂体后叶。
HP:0011757	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Posterior pituitary hypoplasia	Underdevelopment of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628).	垂体后叶发育不全	垂体后叶发育不全。
HP:0011758	肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Pituitary acidophilic stem cell adenoma	#####	垂体嗜酸性干细胞腺瘤	#####

HP:0011760	肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Pituitary growth hormone cell adenoma	A type of pituitary adenoma that produces growth hormone.	垂体生长激素腺瘤	一种产生生长激素的垂体腺瘤。
HP:0011761	肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Pituitary null cell adenoma	A type of pituitary adenoma that is of unknown cellular origin and that lacks immunocytochemical or fine structural markers.  Null cell adenomas are not associated with hormone excess.	垂体无特征细胞腺瘤	一种未知细胞来源和缺乏免疫细胞化学或精细结构标记的垂体腺瘤。这种垂体腺瘤不伴随激素的过多分泌。
HP:0011762	肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Pituitary thyrotropic cell adenoma	A type of pituitary adenoma that produces thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH).	垂体促甲状腺素腺瘤	一种分泌促甲状腺激素（TSH）的垂体腺瘤
HP:0011763	肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Pituitary carcinoma	A pituitary tumor with subarachnoid, brain, or systemic metastasis. The diagnosis of a pituitary carcinoma requires evidence of metastatic disease, either outside the central nervous system (CNS) or as separate noncontiguous foci within the CNS.	垂体腺癌	一种伴蛛网膜下腔，脑或全身转移的垂体肿瘤。垂体腺癌的诊断需要肿瘤转移的证据，或者是转移到中枢神经系统（CNS）之外，或者是中枢神经系统内的单独的非连续的癌症。
HP:0011764	肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Pituitary spindle cell oncocytoma	A spindled-to-epithelioid, oncocytic, nonendocrine neoplasm of the anterior hypophysis that manifests in adults and follows a benign clinical course. Pituitary spindle cell oncocytomas are firm, fibrous, and adherent to surrounding structures and are highly vascular.	垂体梭形细胞嗜酸细胞瘤	垂体前叶的一种梭形至上皮样的嗜酸性非内分泌肿瘤，发生于成人，临床表现良性。 垂体梭形细胞嗜酸细胞瘤质地致密，纤维化，并附着到周围的结构且血管富集。
HP:0011765		Ectopic anterior pituitary	An abnormal anatomical location of the anterior lobe of the hypophysis, also known as the `adenohypophysis` (FMA:74627).	异位垂体前叶	垂体前叶即腺垂体的解剖位置异常

HP:0011770	内分泌系统异常	Tertiary hyperparathyroidism	A type of hyperparathyroidism that occurs following kidney transplantation, which is a treatment for secondary hyperparathyroidism. Although kidney transplantation leads to a normalization of serum calcium and parathyroid hormone in most patients. The state of persistent hypercalcemia and hyperparathyroidism is referred to as tertiary hyperparathyroidism.	三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进症	一种肾脏移植手术后出现的甲状旁腺功能亢进症。肾移植可以缓解继发性甲状旁腺功能亢进，大多数病人的血钙和甲状旁腺激素会趋向正常化，如果仍持续存在高血钙和甲状旁腺功能亢进则称为三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进。
HP:0011771	内分泌系统异常	Autoimmune hypoparathyroidism	A type of hypoparathyroidism with circulating antiparathyroid or anti-calcium sensing receptor antibodies indicative of autoimmunity.	自身免疫性甲状旁腺功能减退症	甲状旁腺功能低下的一种，血液循环中有抗甲状旁腺抗体或抗钙敏感受体抗体，提示自身免疫参与其中。

HP:0011787	内分泌系统异常	Central hypothyroidism	A type of hypothyroidism due to an insufficient stimulation of an otherwise normal thyroid gland. Central hypothyroidism is caused by either pituitary (secondary hypothyroidism) or hypothalamic (tertiary hypothyroidism) defects.	中枢性甲状腺功能减退症	由于中枢的刺激不足，引起原本正常的甲状腺功能减退。中枢性甲减由垂体（继发性甲减）或下丘脑（三发性甲减）的缺陷引起。
HP:0011788	内分泌系统异常	Increased serum free triiodothyronine (fT3)	An elevated concentration of "3,3&#39;,5-triiodo-L-thyronine" (CHEBI:18258) in the blood.	血清游离三碘甲状腺原氨酸（fT3）升高	血液中3,3&#39;，5-三碘左旋甲状腺原氨酸浓度升高。
