HP:0011794	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Embryonal renal neoplasm	The presence of an embryonal neoplasm of the `kidney` (FMA:7203) that primarily affects children.	肾胚胎瘤	主要在儿童期发病的肾脏胚胎肿瘤。
HP:0011795	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Intralobar nephroblastomatosis	Presence of persistent islands of renal blastema in the postnatal kidney, anywhere within a renal lobe (a portion of a kidney consisting of a renal pyramid and the renal cortex above it).	肾小叶内肾母细胞瘤	婴儿肾小叶中存在肾母细胞瘤小岛，可以在肾小叶（肾锥体和肾皮质的一部分）的任何位置。
HP:0011796	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Perilobar nephroblastomatosis	Abnormally persistent foci of embryonal immature blastema located in the superficial cortical region (perilobar).	小叶周围性肾母细胞瘤	在肾浅表皮层区域（小叶周围）异常持续存在的胚胎未成熟胚基灶。
HP:0011797	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Papillary renal cell carcinoma type 1	A type of papillary renal cell carcinoma that is characterized by small cuboidal cells covering thin papillae with a single line of uniform nuclei and small nucleoli.	Ⅰ型乳头状肾细胞癌	一种乳头状肾细胞癌，其特点是以小立方细胞覆盖薄乳头，细胞为单一细胞系，有均一的核和小核仁。
HP:0011798	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal oncocytoma	A renal tumor originating from an oncocyte, which  is an epithelial cell characterized by an excessive amount of mitochondria, resulting in an abundant acidophilic, granular cytoplasm.	肾嗜酸粒细胞瘤	一种肾肿瘤，起源于嗜酸粒细胞，它是一种上皮瘤细胞，其特征为过量的线粒体，产生丰富的嗜酸、粒状的细胞质。

HP:0011807	肌肉组织异常	Type 1 muscle fiber atrophy	Atrophy (wasting) affecting primary type 1 muscle fibers. This feature in general can only be observed on muscle biopsy.	1型肌纤维萎缩	受累的1型肌肉纤维萎缩（消瘦）。一般该特征只能在肌肉活检中观察到。

HP:0011809	肌肉组织异常	Paradoxical myotonia	A type of myotonia that worsens with repeated muscle contractions.	矛盾性肌强直	一种加重型肌强直，伴随肌肉的反复收缩。
HP:0011810	神经系统异常	Impaired two-point discrimination	A reduced ability to distinguish tactile sensations at points that are very close to one another. This can be tested by using special calipers whose points can be set from 2mm to several centimeters apart.	两点辨别觉障碍	区别相互靠近的两点触觉的能力下降。测验使用特殊的卡尺，其两点可设置为2毫米到几厘米。
HP:0011811	神经系统异常	Impaired touch localization	A reduced ability to identify precisely the site of a touch. This test is usually carried out by asking a patient, whose eyes are closed or covered, to touch the same site with a fingertip.	定位障碍	准确地识别触摸部位的能力下降。测试要求病人闭眼或盖住眼睛，用指尖触摸同一部位。
HP:0011812	神经系统异常	Agraphesthesia	Impaired ability to recognize letters or numbers drawn by an examiner&#39;s fingertip on the patient&#39;s skin (the patients eyes are closed or covered throughout this examination).	图写感丧失	辨认病检查者用指尖在病人皮肤上绘制的字母或数字的能力的损坏（检查过程中患者闭眼或视线被阻挡）。
HP:0011813	神经系统异常	Increased cerebral lipofuscin	Lipofuscin (age pigment) is a brown-yellow, electron-dense, autofluorescent material that accumulates progressively over time in lysosomes of postmitotic cells, such as neurons and cardiac myocytes.  This term pertains if there is an increase in the accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.	脑脂褐素增加	脂褐素（老年斑）是一种棕黄色的，电子致密的，自体荧光材料，随着时间推移逐步沉积于有丝分裂后细胞的溶酶体，如神经元和心肌细胞。此术语适用于脂褐素（也称为自身荧光脂蛋白）的积聚增加是否超过患者预期的年龄。
HP:0011814	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased urinary hypoxanthine	An increased level of `hypoxanthine` (CHEBI:17368) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	尿次黄嘌呤增高	在`urine`（FMA:12274）的`hypoxanthine`水平升高（17368 CHEBI）。
HP:0011815	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Cephalocele	A congenital defect in the skull, whereby there is a protrusion of part of the cranial contents through a congenital defect in the cranium, usually covered with skin or mucous membrane. The term encephalocele refers to a subclass of these lesions in which brain tissue protrudes through the defect.	脑膨出	部分颅内容物通过颅骨先天性畸形从颅骨突起的颅骨先天性缺陷，通常有皮肤或粘膜覆盖。该术语指这些病变中脑组织通过缺陷而突出的亚类。
HP:0011816	神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Parietal encephalocele	An encephalocele located between bregma and lambda.	顶叶脑膨出	位于前囟和人字缝与矢状缝交界处之间的脑膨出。
HP:0011817	神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Basal encephalocele	Basal encephalocele is an encephalocele that occurs along the cribriform plate or through the sphenoid bone. The mass may appear in the nasal cavity, nasopharynx, epipharynx, sphenoid sinus, posterior orbit, or pterygopalatine fossa. The important distinction from other types is that no external tumor is visible except in those rare instances of herniations so large that they protrude through the mouth or nares.	基底脑膨出	基底脑膨出是发生沿筛板或通过蝶骨的膨出。膨出物质可能会出现在鼻腔，鼻咽，鼻旁咽，蝶窦，后眼眶，或翼腭窝。与其他类型的重要区别是除了巨大的膨出物压迫至使从嘴巴或鼻孔突出的罕见情况，没有外部肿块可见。
HP:0011818	神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Nasofrontal encephalocele	#####	鼻额脑膨出	#####
HP:0011819	头部和颈部的异常	Submucous cleft soft palate	A cleft of the muscular (soft) portion of the palate that is covered by mucous membrane. Soft-palate submucous clefts are characterized by a midline deficiency or lack of muscle tissue.	软腭裂	软腭肌层及粘膜裂开，由中线结构缺失或肌肉组织缺乏为特征。
HP:0011820	头部和颈部的异常	Membranous choanal atresia	Absence of the normal opening of the choana (the posterior nasal aperture) as a result of an obstructing choanal membrane that may be thin and strandlike or thick and pluglike.	膜状后鼻孔闭锁	后鼻孔（鼻后孔）缺乏正常开口，由细条状或粗塞状的后鼻孔膜阻挡所致。

Chylopericardium is generally caused by obstruction of or trauma to the thoracic duct.	乳糜心包	心包腔内乳糜液（由小肠乳糜管吸收的白色液体，主要由乳状淋巴液和脂肪组成，能够通过胸导管进入静脉）积累。乳糜心包一般由胸导管的阻塞或外伤引起的。

HP:0011873	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal platelet count	Abnormal number of platelets per volume of blood. In a healthy adult, a normal platelet count is between 150,000 and 450,000 per microliter of blood.	血小板计数异常	每升血液中血小板数量异常。健康成年血小板计数为每微升血液15万至45万。
HP:0011874	血液和造血组织异常	Heparin-induced thrombocytopenia	Low platelet count following administration of unfractionated or (less commonly) low-molecular weight heparin.	肝素诱导的血小板减少症	未分级的或（较不常见）的低分子量肝素应用引起的血小板计数降低。
HP:0011875	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal platelet morphology	An anomaly in platelet form, ultrastructure, or intracellular organelles.	血小板形态异常	血小板形态、超微结构或细胞内细胞器异常。
HP:0011876	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal platelet volume	Anomalous size of platelets. Most normal sized platelets are 1.5 to 3 micrometers in diameter. Large platelets are 4 to 7 micrometers. Giant platelets are larger than 7 micrometers and usually 10 to 20 micrometers.	血小板体积异常	血小板大小异常。大多数正常大小的血小板的直径是1.5至3微米。大血小板4至7微米。巨血小板大于7微米，通常为10至20微米。
HP:0011877	血液和造血组织异常	Increased mean platelet volume	Average platelet volume above the upper limit of the normal reference interval.	平均血小板体积增加	平均血小板体积高于正常参考区间的上限。
HP:0011878	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal platelet membrane protein expression	Presence of reduced amount of a membrane protein on the cell membrane of platelets. This feature is typically measured by flow cytometry.	血小板膜蛋白表达异常	血小板细胞膜蛋白量减少。此功能通常通过流式细胞术测量。
HP:0011879	血液和造血组织异常	Decreased platelet glycoprotein Ib-IX-V	Decreased cell membrane concentration of the glycoprotein complex Ib-IX-V.	血小板糖蛋白Ib-IX-V降低	血小板糖细胞膜蛋白复合物Ib-IX-V减少。
HP:0011880	血液和造血组织异常	Acute disseminated intravascular coagulation	An acute form of `disseminated intravascular coagulation` (HP:0005521). Acute DIC can occur following sudden exposure of blood to procoagulants, with the compensatory hemostatic mechanisms becoming overwhelmed.	急性弥散性血管内凝血	弥散性血管内凝血一种急性型（HP:0005521）凝血功能异常综合征。急性DIC可能由于促凝血剂突然增多，使止血机制不堪代偿而发生。

HP:0011884	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal umbilical stump bleeding	Abnormal bleeding of the umbilical stump following separation of the cord at approximately 7-10 days after birth.	异常脐带根部出血	出生后7-10天脐带分离残端异常出血。
HP:0011885	心血管系统异常,血液和造血组织异常,眼部异常	Hemorrhage of the eye	Bleeding from vessels of the various tissues of the eye.	眼出血	从眼睛的各种组织的血管出血。

HP:0011889	血液和造血组织异常	Bleeding with minor or no trauma	Significant bleeding or hemorrhage without significant precipitating factor.	轻微或无创伤出血	没有显著促发因素出血。

HP:0011894	血液和造血组织异常	Impaired thromboxane A2 agonist-induced platelet aggregation	Abnormal response to thromboxane as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of thromboxane A2 receptor agonists.	血栓素A2激动剂诱导的血小板聚集受损	对血栓素异常响应，表现为血小板在加入血栓烷A2受体激动剂后减少或缺乏聚集。
HP:0011895	血液和造血组织异常	Anemia due to reduced life span of red cells	A type of anemia related to a reduction in the average life span of red blood cells in the peripheral circulation, which is normally around 120 days.	红细胞寿命缩短性贫血	一种与外周循环中红血细胞平均寿命（通常约为120天）降低的贫血。
HP:0011896	心血管系统异常,血液和造血组织异常,眼部异常	Subconjunctival hemorrhage	Bleeding beneath the mucous membrane that lines the inner surface of the eyelid.	结膜下出血	出血发生于眼结膜下，眼结膜位于眼睑的内表面。

HP:0011902	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal hemoglobin	Anomaly in the level or the function of hemoglobin, the oxygen-carrying protein of erythrocytes.	血红蛋白异常	红细胞中携氧蛋白——血红蛋白水平或功能异常。
HP:0011903	血液和造血组织异常	Hemoglobin H	Hemoglobin H (HbH) contains four beta-globin chains. It is normally not present at all in blood, but may make up about 1-40 percent of all hemoglobin in HbH disease, a subform of alpha thalassemia.	血红蛋白H	血红蛋白H（血红蛋白H）包含四个β球蛋白链。正常情况下不会出现，但在血红蛋白H病中（α-地中海贫血的一种亚型）可达约1-40％。
HP:0011904	血液和造血组织异常	Persistence of hemoglobin F	Hemoglobin F (HbF) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin gamma chains. It is the main form of hemoglobin in the fetus during the last seven months of intrauterine  development and in the half year of postnatal life. In adults it normally makes up less than one percent of all hemoglobiin. This term refers to an increase in HbF above this limit. In beta thalassemia major, it may represent over 90 percent of all hemoglobin, and in beta thalassemia minor it may make up between 0.5 to 4 percent.	胎儿血红蛋白F持续存在	血红蛋白F（HbF）含有两条α链球蛋白和两条γ链球蛋白。HbF是胎儿血红蛋白的主要形式，存在于子宫内发育的最后七个月至出生后的半年。在成人中，通常它少于总血红蛋白的百分之一。此术语指HbF的增加超过1%的情况。在重型β地中海贫血中，它可能总占血红蛋白的90％以上；在轻型地中海贫血中，HbF通常在0.5%-4％之间。
HP:0011905	血液和造血组织异常	Reduced hemoglobin A	Hemoglobin A (HbA) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin beta chains. HbA is normally the main adult hemoglobin, representing about 96-98 percent of all hemoglobin. This term represents a decreased in the proportion of HbA below this limit, and can be seen in various forms of thalassemia.	血红蛋白A降低	血红蛋白（HbA）包含两条α链珠蛋白和两条β链珠蛋白。HbA通常是成人血红蛋白的主要成分，约占所有血红蛋白的96-98％左右。这个术语表示的HbA的比例低于96%，常见于各种形式地中海贫血。
HP:0011906	血液和造血组织异常	Reduced beta/alpha synthesis ratio	A reduction in the ratio of production of beta globin to that of alpha globin. This is the major abnormality in the various forms of beta thalassemia.	β/α合成比降低	β/α球蛋白合成比例减少。这是在各种形式的β地中海的主要异常。
HP:0011907	血液和造血组织异常	Reduced alpha/beta synthesis ratio	A reduction in the ratio of production of alpha globin to that of beta globin. This is the major abnormality in the various forms of alpha thalassemia.	α/β合成比降低	α球蛋白的产生少于β球蛋白。这是在各种形式的α地中海贫血的主要异常表型。

HP:0011920	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,呼吸系统异常	Transudative pleural effusion	A type of pleural effusion with a transudate (extravascular fluid with low protein content and a low specific gravity). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light&#39;s criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.	漏出性胸腔积液	漏出性胸腔积液（具有低蛋白含量和低比重特点）。根据light标准，可将胸腔积液分为漏出液和渗出液，符合以下一项或多项为渗出液:（1）胸水蛋白与血清蛋白的比率大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）与血清LDH比率大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于三分之二的正常血清LDH的上限。
HP:0011921	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,呼吸系统异常	Exudative pleural effusion	A type of pleural effusion with a exudate (extravascular fluid that has exuded out of a tissue or its capillaries due to injury or inflammation). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light&#39;s criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.	渗出性胸腔积液	一种具有渗出液的胸膜腔积液，渗出液为组织或其毛细血管因损伤或炎症而渗出的血管外液。胸腔积液分类基于Light标准，依据该标准，渗出液应符合以下至少一条:（1）胸水白蛋白/血清白蛋白的比值大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）/血清LDH比值大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于正常血清LDH上的限三分之二。

HP:0011931	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the cerebellar peduncle	An anomaly of the `cerebellar peduncles` (FMA:77791). The superior, middle, and inferior cerebellar peduncles emerge from the cerebellum. The superior cerebellar penduncles connect the cerebellum to the midbrain, the middle cerebellar peduncles connect the cerebellum to the pons, and the inferior cerebellar peduncle connects the medulla spinalis and medulla oblongata with the cerebellum.	小脑脚异常	在`小脑脚`的异常（FMA:77791）。脑干与小脑联系的包括上，中，下小脑脚。上小脑脚连接小脑和中脑；中小脑脚连接小脑和桥脑；下小脑脚连接延髓和小脑。

HP:0011944	心血管系统异常	Small vessel vasculitis	A type of vasculitis (inflammation of blood vessel walls) that affects blood vessels that are smaller than arteries, i.e., arterioles, venules, and capilllaries.	小血管炎	一种血管炎（血管壁炎症），影响到比动脉小的血管，即，小动脉，小静脉，毛细血管。
HP:0011945	呼吸系统异常	Bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia	Bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia (BOOP) is and interstitial lung abnormalitiy characterized  histopathologically by plugs of granulation tissue lying within small airways, alveolar ducts, and alveoli and by chronic inflammatory cell infiltration in alveolar walls. Patients with BOOP generally present with subacute illness, including shortness of breath, fever, malaise, and weight loss.	闭塞性细支气管炎机化性肺炎	闭塞性细支气管炎机化性肺炎（BOOP）是肺间质疾病的一种，组织病理学特征为肉芽组织阻塞小气道、肺泡管、肺泡，同时伴有肺泡壁的慢性炎细胞浸润。BOOP患者一般表现为亚急性起病，包括呼吸急促、发烧、全身乏力、体重减轻等。

HP:0011954	消化系统异常	Nodular regenerative hyperplasia of liver	Diffuse benign transformation of the hepatic parenchyma into small regenerative nodules with minimal or no fibrosis.	肝脏结节性再生性增生	肝实质向小的再生性结节的弥漫性良性转化，伴随细微的纤维化或无纤维化。
HP:0011955	消化系统异常,血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Hepatic granulomatosis	The presence of multiple granulomas in the liver as based on pathological examination. Granulomas are small 0.5 to 2 mm collections of modified macrophages called epithelioid cells usually surrounded by lymphocytes.	肝肉芽肿	基于病理检测的肝脏中多个肉芽肿的存在。肉芽肿大小为0.5-2毫米，上皮样细胞（修饰后的巨噬细胞）聚集形成，周围是淋巴细胞。
HP:0011956	消化系统异常	Intestinal lymphoid nodular  hyperplasia	A lymphoproliferative abnormality of the intestine characterized by numerous visible mucosal nodules measuring up to, and rarely exceeding, 0.5 cm in diameter Histologically, hyperplastic lymphoid follicles with large germinal centres are seen in the lamina propria and superficial submucosa. There is enlargement of the mucosal B cell follicles caused by hyperplasia of the follicle centres; surrounded by a normal appearing mantle zone. Disease may involve the stomach, the entire small intestine, and the large intestine.	肠道淋巴组织样结节性增生	肠淋巴组织异常增生，其特征为大量可见的粘膜结节，直径可达或偶尔超过0.5cm。在组织学上，在固有层和粘膜下层浅层可见增生的淋巴滤泡伴有大的生发中心。滤泡中心增生引起粘膜B细胞滤泡增大，由表观正常的套区围绕。该病可累及胃、整个小肠和大肠。
HP:0011957	肌肉组织异常	Abnormality of the pectoral muscle	An abnormality of the `pectoral muscle` (FMA:37349), comprising the pectoralis major, a thick, fan-shaped muscle of the anterior chest and the pectoralis minor, a thin, triangular muscle situated underneath the pectoralis major.	胸肌异常	胸肌异常，包括胸大肌（前胸部厚且呈扇形的肌肉）和胸小肌（薄且呈三角的肌肉，位于胸大肌的下面）异常。
HP:0011958	眼部异常	Retinal perforation	A small hole through the whole thickness of the retina.	视网膜穿孔	穿过视网膜全层的小孔。
HP:0011959	肌肉组织异常	Unilateral hypoplasia of pectoralis major muscle	Hypoplasia (underdevelopment) of the `pectoralis major` (FMA:13109) on only one side of the chest.	单侧胸大肌发育不全	只有一侧胸大肌发育不全。
HP:0011960	神经系统异常	Substantia nigra gliosis	The presence of `gliosis` (MPATH:182) in the `substantia nigra` (FMA:67947).	黑质神经胶质增生	存在于黑质内的（FMA:67947）神经胶质增生（MPATH:182）。
HP:0011961	泌尿生殖系统异常	Non-obstructive azoospermia	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, resulting from a defect in the production of spermatozoa in the testes. Can be differentiated from obstructive azoospermia on the basis of testicular biopsy.	非梗阻性无精症	由于睾丸生成精子缺陷导致病人精液中没有任何可测水平的精子，睾丸活检可以将之与梗阻性无精症相鉴别。
HP:0011962	泌尿生殖系统异常	Obstructive azoospermia	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, resulting from post-testicular obstruction or retrograde ejaculation. Can be differentiated from non-obstructive azoospermia on the basis of testicular biopsy.	梗阻性无精症	由于睾丸后梗阻或逆行性射精造成病人精液中没有任何可测水平的精子。睾丸活检可将之与非梗阻性无精症相鉴别。
HP:0011963	泌尿生殖系统异常	Pretesticular azoospermia	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, due to a hypothalamic or pituitary abnormality diagnosed with hypo-gonadotropic-hypogonadism. The diagnosis is made on the basis of low LH and FSH levels and low or normal testosterone levels.	睾丸前无精症	由于下丘脑或垂体异常导致的低促性腺-性腺功能减退，使精液中缺乏任何可测水平的精子。根据LH和FSH水平低、睾酮水平低（或正常）即可作出该项诊断。
HP:0011964	神经系统异常	Intermittent painful muscle spasms	History of repeated intermittent involuntary muscle contractions that were painful.	间歇性痛性肌痉挛	反复、间歇性、伴疼痛的、不自主的肌肉收缩的病史。
HP:0011965	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormality of citrulline metabolism	Abnormality of a metabolism or concentration of `citrulline` (CHEBI:18211).	瓜氨酸代谢异常	`瓜氨酸` (CHEBI:18211)的代谢或浓度异常。
HP:0011966	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated plasma citrulline	An increased concentration of `citrulline` (CHEBI:18211) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	血浆瓜氨酸升高	在`blood`:`citrulline`（18211 CHEBI）浓度增加（FMA:9670）。
HP:0011967	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hypocupremia	A reduced concentration of `copper` (CHEBI:28694) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	低铜血症	在`blood`:`copper`（28694 CHEBI）浓度降低（FMA:9670）。
HP:0011968	消化系统异常	Feeding difficulties	Impaired ability to eat related to problems gathering food and getting ready to suck, chew, or swallow it.	喂养困难	进食能力受损，与收集食物和吮吸、咀嚼或吞咽食物的问题相关。
HP:0011969	内分泌系统异常	Elevated luteinizing hormone	An elevated concentration of luteinizing hormone in the blood.	黄体生成素水平升高	血液中黄体生成素浓度升高。
HP:0011970	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Cerebral amyloid angiopathy	Amyloid deposition in the walls of leptomeningeal and cortical arteries, arterioles, and less often capillaries and veins of the central nervous system.	脑淀粉样血管病	淀粉样物质沉积在神经系统的软脑脊膜和皮质动脉、小动脉、较少情况下毛细管的壁上。
HP:0011971	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	Dermatographic urticaria	An exaggerated wealing tendency when the skin is stroked, that is, formation of red, itchy bumps and lines on the skin as a result of pressure on the skin (for instance, stroking the skin with a pen or tongue depressor).	皮肤划痕症	搔抓或用钝器（笔或压舌板）划过皮肤后出现明显的红色条状隆起，伴瘙痒。
HP:0011972	神经系统异常	Hypoglycorrhachia	Abnormally low glucose concentration content in the cerebrospinal fluid.	脑脊液糖减低	脑脊液中葡萄糖浓度异常减低。
HP:0011973	神经系统异常	Paroxysmal lethargy	Repeated episodes of sudden-onset and transient `lethargy` (HP:0001254).	阵发性嗜睡	反复发作的突发性或短暂性嗜睡
HP:0011974	血液和造血组织异常	Myelofibrosis	Replacement of bone marrow by fibrous tissue.	骨髓纤维化	由纤维组织替代骨髓。
HP:0011975	耳部异常	Aminoglycoside-induced hearing loss	Partial or complete loss of hearing following ingestion of aminoglycoside antibiotics.	氨基糖甙类抗生素引起的听力损失	摄入氨基糖苷类抗生素后听力部分或完全丧失。
HP:0011976	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated urinary catecholamines	An increased concentration of `catecholamine` (CHEBI:33567) in the urine.	尿儿茶酚胺升高	尿液中儿茶酚胺浓度增加。
HP:0011977	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated urinary homovanillic acid	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `homovanillic acid` (CHEBI:545959)  in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	尿高香草酸水平升高	`香草acid`（CHEBI:545959）在`urine`:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）（FMA:12274）。
HP:0011978	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated urinary vanillylmandelic acid	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `vanillylmandelic acid` (CHEBI:20106)  in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	尿香草扁桃酸水平升高	`香草acid`（CHEBI:20106）在`urine`（FMA:12274）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）。
HP:0011979	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated urinary dopamine	An increased concentration of `dopamine` (CHEBI:18243) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	尿多巴胺增高	尿液中多巴胺浓度增加。
HP:0011980	消化系统异常	Cholesterol gallstones	Gallstones composed primarily of cholesterol, usually about 2-3 cm in length with an oval form and a yellow or green/brown color.	胆固醇性胆结石	主要成分为胆固醇的胆结石，通常长2-3厘米，椭圆形，黄色或绿色/棕色。
HP:0011981	消化系统异常	Pigment gallstones	Gallstones composed primarily of bilirubin and calcium salts (calcium bilirubinate) with a low cholesterol concentration.	色素性胆结石	主要由胆红素和钙盐（胆红素钙）组成的低胆固醇浓度的胆结石。
HP:0011982	消化系统异常	Black pigment gallstones	A type of pigment gallstone that is hard and black, containing calcium carbonate and calcium phosphates.	黑色素结石	一种有色素的胆结石，坚硬且为黑色，含有碳酸钙和磷酸钙。
HP:0011983	消化系统异常	Brown pigment gallstones	A type of pigment gallstone that is brown, containing calcium fatty acids. These stones are softer than black pigment gallstones.	褐色素胆结石	一种有色素的胆结石，结石为棕色，含有脂肪酸钙。该结石硬度较黑色胆结石软。
HP:0011984	消化系统异常	Atretic gallbladder	Failure of formation of the lumen of the gallbladder, often associated with gallbladder hypoplasia.	胆囊闭锁	胆囊腔未形成，往往与胆囊发育不全有关。
HP:0011985	消化系统异常	Acholic stools	Clay colored stools lacking bile pigment.	无胆色大便	缺乏胆色素的陶土色大便。
HP:0011986	骨骼系统异常	Ectopic ossification	Formation of abnormal, extraskeletal bony tissue, i.e., the presence of bone in soft tissue where bone normally does not exist.	异位性骨化	骨骼外异常形成的骨组织，如软组织中存在通常不应该存在的骨。
HP:0011987	骨骼系统异常	Ectopic ossification in muscle tissue	Formation of abnormal bony tissue within `muscle` (FMA:30316) tissue.	肌肉组织异位性骨化	肌肉（FMA:30316）组织中异常形成的骨组织。
HP:0011988	骨骼系统异常	Ectopic ossification in tendon tissue	Formation of abnormal bony tissue within `tendon` (FMA:9721) tissue.	肌腱组织异位骨化	肌肉（FMA:9721）组织中异常形成的骨组织
HP:0011989	骨骼系统异常	Ectopic ossification in ligament tissue	Formation of abnormal bony tissue within `ligament` (FMA:30319) tissue.	韧带组织异位性骨化	韧带（FMA:30319）组织中异常形成的骨组织。
HP:0011990	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormality of neutrophil physiology	A functional abnormality of neutrophils.	中性粒细胞生理功能异常	中性粒细胞的功能异常。
HP:0011991	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormal neutrophil cell number	A deviation from the normal range of neutrophil cell counts in the circulation.	中性粒细胞的数量异常	中性粒细胞计数异常。
HP:0011992	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormality of neutrophil morphology	An abnormal form or size of neutrophils.	中性粒细胞形态异常	不正常的中性粒细胞的形态或大小。
HP:0011993	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Impaired neutrophil bactericidal activity	A reduction in the ability of neutrophils to kill bacteria.	中性粒细胞杀菌活性降低	中性粒细胞杀死细菌的能力下降。
HP:0011994	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of the atrial septum	An abnormality of the `interatrial septum` (FMA:7108).	房间隔异常	房间隔的异常（FMA:7108）。
HP:0011995	心血管系统异常	Atrial septal aneurysm	A bulging of  the `interatrial septum` (FMA:7108) towards one side. IN adults, atrial septal aneurysm can be defined as a protrusion of the aneurysm of &gt;10 mm beyond the plane of the atrial septum as measured by transesophageal echocardiography.	房间隔动脉瘤	向一侧凸起的房间隔。在成人中，通过食道超声心动图，房间隔动脉瘤可以定义为突出房间隔平面10毫米以上的动脉瘤凸起。
HP:0011996	血液和造血组织异常	Elevated factor V activity	Increased activity of coagulation factor V, Factor V, which is activated to factor Va by means of minute amounts of thrombin (and inactivated by larger amounts of thrombin). Activated factor V (fVa)  is a cofactor in the formation of the prothrombinase complex.	V因子活性升高	凝血因子V活性增加。凝血因子V由微量的凝血酶激活后形成因子Va，（然后由较大量的凝血酶灭活）。活化的V因子（FVA）是凝血酶原酶复合物形成的辅因子。
HP:0011997	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Postprandial hyperlactemia	Abnormally increased level of blood `lactate` (CHEBI:24996) following a meal.	餐后高乳酸血症	异常增高的血`lactate`（CHEBI:24996）水平以下的一顿饭。
HP:0011998	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Postprandial hyperglycemia	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `glucose` (CHEBI:17234) in the `blood` (FMA:9670) following a meal.	餐后高血糖	的`glucose`（CHEBI:17234）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）在`blood`（FMA:9670）继一顿饭。
HP:0011999	神经系统异常	Paranoia	A persecutory delusion of supposed hostility of others.	偏执狂	一种假想的对他人有敌对情绪的被害妄想
HP:0012000	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized spikes	EEG with generalized sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec.	脑电图，广泛性棘波	脑电图，广泛性时限小于80毫秒的短暂尖波。
HP:0012001	神经系统异常	EEG with generalized polyspikes	EEG with repetitive generalized sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec.	脑电图，广泛性多棘波	脑电图，时限小于80毫秒的广泛性短暂尖波重复出现。
HP:0012002	神经系统异常	Experiential auras	Affective, mnemonic or composite perceptual auras with subjective qualities similar to those experienced in life but are recognized by the subject as occurring outside of actual context.	体验先兆	情感，记忆或复合感性的先兆，与曾经经历的生活类似（似曾相识），但主体能认识到发生在现实环境之外的主观感受。
HP:0012003	神经系统异常	Affective auras	Affective auras with subjective qualities similar to those experienced in life but are recognized by the subject as occurring outside of actual context.	情感光环	情感的光环与主观品质相似经历的生活，但被拍摄对象的实际发生的背景之外认可。
HP:0012004	神经系统异常	Mnemonic auras	Auras which reflect ictal dysmnesia such as: feelings as familiarity (d??j??-vu) and unfamiliarity (jamais-vu).	记忆先兆	反映发作性记忆障碍的先兆，如:熟悉感（似曾相识）和不熟悉感（似不相识）。
HP:0012005	神经系统异常	Deja vu	A subjective feeling that an experience which is occurring for the first time has been experienced before.	似曾相识的感觉	这是一个主观感觉，首次发生的体验，好像之前已经经历过。
HP:0012006	神经系统异常	Jamais vu	A subjective feeling that an experience which has occurred before is being experienced for the first time.	似不相识	第一次感受到之前已发生的体验的一种主观感觉。
HP:0012007	神经系统异常	Hallucinatory auras	Auras with creation of composite perceptions without corresponding external stimuli involving visual, auditory, somatosensory, olfactory and/or gustatory phenomena.	幻觉先兆	不具有相应外界刺激的复合感觉先兆，涉及视觉，听觉，体感，嗅觉和/或味觉的现象。
HP:0012008	神经系统异常	Illusory auras	Auras with an alteration of actual percepts involving the visual, auditory, somatosensory, olfactory or gustatory systems.	错觉先兆	伴随真实感觉改变的先兆，涉及视觉，听觉，体感，嗅觉或味觉系统。
HP:0012009	神经系统异常	EEG with central focal spike waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves in the central region, i.e., focal sharp waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，伴中央区局灶棘波	脑电图局灶性尖锐的瞬态波在中部地区，即，持续时间小于80毫秒随后缓慢波焦尖波。
HP:0012010	神经系统异常	EEG with frontal focal spike waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves in the frontal region, i.e., focal sharp waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，伴额叶局灶棘慢波	脑电图额部短暂局灶尖波，即，持续时间小于80毫秒的局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
HP:0012011	神经系统异常	EEG with occipital focal spike waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves in the occipital region, i.e., focal sharp waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，伴枕部局灶棘慢波	脑电图，枕部局灶短暂棘慢波，即，时限小于80毫秒的局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
HP:0012012	神经系统异常	EEG with parietal focal spike waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves in the parietal region, i.e., focal sharp waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，伴顶部局灶棘慢波	脑电图，在顶区的局灶性短暂尖波，即，时限小于80毫秒的局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
HP:0012013	神经系统异常	EEG with temporal focal spike waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves in the temporalregion, i.e., focal sharp waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，伴颞区局灶棘慢波	脑电图在颞区的局灶短暂尖波，即，时限小于80毫秒的局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
HP:0012014	神经系统异常	EEG with central focal spikes	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec in the central region.	脑电图，伴中央区局灶棘波	脑电图，位于中央区的局灶短暂尖峰样波，持续时间小于80毫秒。
HP:0012015	神经系统异常	EEG with frontal focal spikes	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec in the frontal region.	脑电图，伴额部局灶棘波	脑电图额部持续时间小于80毫秒的短暂局灶尖波。
HP:0012016	神经系统异常	EEG with occipital focal spikes	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec in the occipital region.	脑电图，伴枕部局灶棘波。	脑电图，在枕区时限小于80毫秒的局灶短暂尖波。
HP:0012017	神经系统异常	EEG with parietal focal spikes	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec in the parietal region.	脑电图，伴顶部局灶棘波	脑电图，位于顶区的时限小于80毫秒的短暂尖波。
HP:0012018	神经系统异常	EEG with temporal focal spikes	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec in the temporal region.	脑电图，伴颞区局灶棘波	脑电图，在颞区时限小于80毫秒的局灶短暂尖波。
HP:0012019	眼部异常	Lens luxation	Complete dislocation of the lens of the eye.	晶状体脱位	眼睛的晶状体完全脱位。
HP:0012020	心血管系统异常	Right aortic arch	Aorta descends on right instead of on the left.	右位主动脉弓	主动脉下降发生在右侧，正常发生在左侧。
HP:0012021	心血管系统异常	Persistent patent ductus venosus	Persistence of blood flow through the ductus venosus for longer than the normal time after birth.	持续性静脉导管未闭	出生后血流持续通过静脉导管，血流流经时间比正常时间长。
HP:0012022	心血管系统异常	Congenital portosystemic venous shunt	A congenital defect of the vasculature such that there is a shunt (by-pass) of blood directly from the portal vein to the vena cava (i.e., the blood from the portal vein is not filtered through the liver).	先天性静脉门体分流	血管的先天畸形，血液由门静脉直接注入下腔静脉（即门静脉的血液不经肝脏过滤）。
HP:0012023	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Galactosuria	Elevated concentration of `galactose` (CHEBI:28260) in the urine.	半乳糖尿症	在尿常规:高架`galactose`浓度（28260 CHEBI）。
HP:0012024	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hypergalactosemia	Elevated concentration of `galactose` (CHEBI:28260) in the blood.	高半乳糖血症	在血中升高`galactose`浓度（28260 CHEBI）。
HP:0012025	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormality of ornithine metabolism	Abnormality of a metabolism or concentration of `ornithine` (CHEBI:18257).	鸟氨酸代谢异常	`鸟氨酸 `（CHEBI:18257）的代谢或浓度异常。
HP:0012026	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hyperornithinemia	Increased concentration of `ornithine` (CHEBI:18257) in the blood.	高鸟氨酸血症	血液中的:增加`ornithine`（18257 CHEBI）的浓度。
HP:0012027	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,呼吸系统异常	Laryngeal edema	An abnormal accumulation of fluid and swelling in the tissues of the `larynx` (FMA:55097).	喉头水肿	喉部组织的异常液体积聚和肿胀。（FMA:55097）。
HP:0012028	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Hepatocellular adenoma	A benign tumor of the liver of presumably epithelial origin.	肝细胞腺瘤	可能为上皮来源的一种肝脏良性肿瘤。
HP:0012029	内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of urine hormone level	An "abnormal" (PATO:0000460) "concentration" (PATO:0000033) of a "hormone" (CHEBI:24621) in the urine.	尿激素水平异常	尿中激素浓度的异常。
HP:0012030	泌尿生殖系统异常,内分泌系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased urinary cortisol level	Abnormally increased concentration of `cortisol` (CHEBI:17650) in the urine.	尿皮质醇水平增高	尿液中皮质醇浓度异常增加。
HP:0012031	肿瘤,结缔组织异常	Lipomatous tumor	A common group of mesenchymal lesions.	脂肪瘤	一组常见的间充质病变。
HP:0012032	肿瘤,结缔组织异常	Lipoma	Benign neoplasia derived from lipoblasts or lipocytes of white or brown fat. May be angiomatous or hibernomatous.	脂肪瘤	白色或棕色脂肪组织的成脂细胞或脂肪细胞衍生而来的良性肿瘤。可能是血管瘤型或蛰伏脂肪瘤型。
HP:0012033	肿瘤,结缔组织异常	Sacral lipoma	Presence of a lipoma in the region of the sacrum.	骶脂肪瘤	存在于骶骨区的脂肪瘤。
HP:0012034	肿瘤,结缔组织异常	Liposarcoma	Malignant neoplasms which probably originate in primitive mesenchymal stem cell populations differentiating down a lipomatous pathway.	脂肪肉瘤	一种恶性肿瘤，可能发生于于原始间充质干细胞群分化为脂肪瘤的过程中。
HP:0012035	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Steatocystoma multiplex	Multiple, localized or widespread, asymptomatic or inflammatory dermal cysts involving the pilosebaceous units. Lesions can appear anywhere on the body, but steatocystoma multiplex is more commonly involved with those areas of the skin with a high density of developed pilosebaceous units (e.g., the axilla, groin, neck, and proximal extremities).	多发性皮脂腺囊瘤	发生于毛囊皮脂腺的多发性、无症状或炎症性皮肤囊肿，局部或广泛分布。皮损可出现在身体的任何部位，但在毛囊皮脂腺分布密集的部位（如腋窝，腹股沟，颈部和四肢近端）更为常见。
HP:0012036	肌肉组织异常	Sternocleidomastoid amyotrophy	Wasting of the `sternocleidomastoid muscle` (FMA:13407), the muscle in the anterior part of the neck that acts to flex and rotate the head.	胸锁乳突肌肌萎缩	胸锁乳突肌失用，该颈前肌可控制头部活动旋转。
HP:0012037	肌肉组织异常	Pectoralis amyotrophy	Wasting of the pectoral muscles, i.e., of the pectoralis major and pectoralis minor.	胸肌萎缩	胸肌的萎缩，如胸大肌和胸小肌。
HP:0012038	眼部异常	Corneal guttata	Corneal guttata are droplet-like accumulations of non-banded collagen on the posterior surface of Descemet&#39;s membrane. The presence of focal thickenings of Descemet&#39;s membrane histologically named guttae. Cornea guttata can be easily diagnosed in vivo and ex vivo by means of specular microscopy as it gives dark areas where no endothelial cells are visible.	角膜点状变性	角膜Descemet膜后表面出现的非带状胶原的微滴状沉积。后弹力膜局灶性增厚，组织学上称为角膜点状变性。角膜点状变性很容易通过体内和离体显微镜装置诊断，因为它的出现使局部内皮细胞缺失呈现暗区。
HP:0012039	眼部异常	Descemet Membrane Folds	Presence of folds in the Descement membrane, which is the basement membrane of the endothelial (inner) cell layer of the cornea. Descement membrane folds are generally a manifestation of inflammation or edema of the cornea.	后弹力膜皱褶	Descement膜出现皱褶。Descement膜是角膜内皮的基底膜， Descement膜褶皱一般是角膜炎症或水肿的表现。
HP:0012040	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,眼部异常	Corneal stromal edema	Abnormal accumulation of fluid and swelling of the `stroma of cornea` (FMA:58306).	角膜基质水肿	角膜基质层出现的非正常的液体积聚和肿胀（FMA:58306）。
HP:0012041	泌尿生殖系统异常	Decreased fertility in males	#####	男性生育能力下降	#####
HP:0012042	呼吸系统异常,免疫系统异常	Aspirin-induced asthma	A type of asthma in which aspirin and other nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) that inhibit cyclooxygen-ase 1 (COX-1) exacerbate bronchoconstriction.	阿司匹林诱发的哮喘	哮喘的一种类型。阿司匹林和其他非类固醇抗炎药（NSAID）抑制了环氧化酶-1（COX-1），从而加剧了支气管收缩。
HP:0012043	眼部异常	Pendular nystagmus	Rhythmic, involuntary sinusoidal oscillations of one or both eyes. The waveform of pendular nystagmus may occur in any direction.	钟摆样眼球震颤	一个或两个眼睛有节奏的，不自主的正弦振荡。摆动性眼球震颤的波形可能发生在任何方向。
HP:0012044	眼部异常	Seesaw nystagmus	Seesaw nystagmus is a type of pendular nystagmus where a half cycle consists of the elevation and intorsion of one eye, concurrently with the depression and extortion of the fellow eye. In the other half cycle, there is an inversion of the ocular movements.	跷跷板眼球震颤	跷跷板眼球震颤是一种摆动眼球震颤，其中一半周期表现为一只眼睛的升高和内旋，同时另一只眼睛下降和外展。在另一半周期中，眼运动反转。
HP:0012045	眼部异常	Retinal flecks	Presence of multiple yellowish-white lesions of various size and configuration on the retina not related to vascular lesions.	视网膜斑点	视网膜上存在多种尺寸和构象的多个黄白色病变，与血管病变无关。
HP:0012046	神经系统异常,肢体异常	Areflexia of upper limbs	Inability to elicit tendon reflexes in the upper limbs.	上肢反射消失	无法刺激产生上肢腱反射。
HP:0012047	眼部异常	Hemeralopia	A visual defect characterized by the inability to see as clearly in bright light as in dim light. The word hemeralopia literally means day blindness.	昼盲	视觉缺陷的特点是在光线明亮的地方视力下降，而夜间视力不受到影响，昼盲的字面意思是白天盲。
HP:0012048	神经系统异常	Oromandibular dystonia	A kind of focal dystonia characterized by forceful contractions of the face, jaw, and/or tongue causing difficulty in opening and closing the mouth and often affecting chewing and speech.	口下颌肌张力障碍	一种局限性肌张力障碍，表现为脸，下颌，和/或舌的有力的收缩导致难以打开和关闭嘴部和经常影响咀嚼和讲话。
HP:0012049	神经系统异常,声音异常	Laryngeal dystonia	A form of focal dystonia that affects the vocal cords, associated with involuntary contractions of the vocal cords causing interruptions of speech and affecting the voice quality and often leading to patterned, repeated breaks in speech.	喉肌张力障碍	一种影响声带的局灶肌张力障碍类型，声带不自主的收缩导致言语中断，影响声音质量，常常导致模式化的反复言语中断。
HP:0012050	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Anasarca	An extreme form of generalized edema with widespread and massive edema due to effusion of fluid into the extracellular space.	全身水肿	由于体液渗出进入细胞外间隙，导致极端性的全身广泛大量的水肿。
HP:0012051	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Reactive hypoglycemia	Hypoglycermia following a meal (or more generally, after intake of glucose).	反应性低血糖	Hypoglycermia以下一餐（或更一般地，摄取葡萄糖后）。
HP:0012052	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Low serum calcitriol (1,25-dihydroxycholecalciferol)	A reduced concentration of `calcitriol` (CHEBI:17823) in the blood. Calcitriol is also known as 1,25-dihydroxycholecalciferol or 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D3.	低血清骨化三醇（1,25-二羟基胆钙化醇）	血液中的:`calcitriol`（17823 CHEBI）浓度降低。骨化三醇也被称为1,25-二羟或1,25-二羟基维生素D3。
HP:0012053	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Low serum calcifediol (25-hydroxycholecalciferol)	A reduced concentration of `calcidiol` (CHEBI:17933) in the blood. Calcidiol is also known as 25-hydroxycholecalciferol or 25-Hydroxyvitamin D3.	低血清骨化二醇（25-羟基胆钙化醇）	血液中的:`calcidiol`（17933 CHEBI）浓度降低。骨化二醇也被称为25-羟基胆钙化醇或25-羟基维生素D3。
HP:0012054	肿瘤,眼部异常	Choroidal melanoma	Malignant tumor of melanocytes of the choroid. The classic appearance of choroidal melanoma is a pigmented dome-shaped or collar button-shaped tumor with an associated exudative retinal detachment. Choroidal melanoma is usually pigmented, but can be variably pigmented and even amelanotic (non-pigmented).	脉络膜黑色素瘤	脉络膜黑素细胞的恶性肿瘤。脉络膜黑色素瘤经典的外观是一种着色的圆顶形或套环，按钮形状的肿瘤与相应的渗出性视网膜脱离。脉络膜黑色素瘤通常是着色的，但也可以是其他色素着色和甚至无黑色素着色（无色素沉着）。
HP:0012055	肿瘤,眼部异常	Ciliary body melanoma	Malignant tumor of melanocytes of the ciliary body.	睫状体黑色素瘤	睫状体黑色素细胞的恶性肿瘤。
HP:0012056	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Cutaneous melanoma	The presence of a `melanoma` (MPATH:359) of the `skin` (FMA:7163).	皮肤黑色素瘤	皮肤来源的黑色素瘤。
HP:0012057	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Superficial spreading melanoma	A type of melanoma that is flat and irregular in shape and color, with different shades of black and brown.	浅表扩散性黑素瘤	黑素瘤的一种，主要表现为黑棕色深浅不一的不规则扁平状肿物。
HP:0012058	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Nodular melanoma	A type of melanoma that starts as a raised area that is usually dark blackish-blue or bluish-red but may not have any color.	结节性黑素瘤	黑素瘤的一种，初起为淡黑蓝或淡蓝红色的隆起皮损，一般无其他颜色。
HP:0012059	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Lentigo maligna melanoma	A subtype of melanoma in situ that typically develops on sun-damaged skin. The lesion is typically a large, irregularly pigmented macule that has developed from an ordinary lentigo (a small pigmented spot on the skin with a clearly-defined edge). Change to a malignant lentigo typically takes place over 20 years or more, and many patients accept the change as a consequence of aging.	恶性雀斑样黑色素瘤	是黑色素瘤的一种亚型，常发生于日晒后受损的皮肤，开始表现为普通的雀斑（边界清楚的小色素斑 ），之后渐渐发展为较大不规则色素斑。发展成恶性常需20年以上，多数患者以为是皮肤衰老的表现。
HP:0012060	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Acral lentiginous melanoma	A type of cutaneous melanoma localized to the palm, sole, or beneath the nail (subungual melanoma). Acral lentiginous melanoma starts as a slowly-enlarging flat patch of discoloured skin and usually displays a size above 6 mm and often several centimetres or more in diameter upon diagnosis and variable pigmentation with a mixture of colors including brown, and blue-grey, black and red. The surface of the lesion is initially smooth but later in the course may become thicker and irregular, and may ulcerate or bleed.	肢端雀斑样黑色素瘤	一种位于掌跖或甲下（甲下黑色素瘤）的皮肤黑色素瘤。肢端雀斑样黑色素瘤往往初起为一褪色扁平斑点，之后缓慢扩大至直径超过6毫米甚至数厘米，此外，包括棕色、蓝灰色、黑色和红色的混合性色素沉着也是特征之一。皮损起初表面光滑，之后慢慢变得粗糙且不规则，甚至可能出现溃疡和出血。
HP:0012061	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Urinary excretion of sialylated oligosaccharides	Excretion of `oligosaccharides` (CHEBI:50699) conjugated to `sialic acid` (CHEBI:26667) in the urine.	唾液酸化寡聚糖的尿排泄	的`oligosaccharides`排泄（CHEBI:50699）共轭`唾液酸acid`（CHEBI:26667）在尿液中。
HP:0012062	骨骼系统异常	Bone cyst	A fluid filled cavity that develops with a bone.	骨囊肿	骨骼内发展成的一个充满液体的腔体。
HP:0012063	骨骼系统异常	Aneurysmal bone cyst	Radiographic features include a dilated, radiolucent lesion typically located eccentrically within the metaphyseal portion of the bone, with fluid levels visible on magnetic resonance imaging.	动脉瘤样骨囊肿	放射学特征包括干骺端可见一个偏心的、扩张的、射线可透过的病灶，磁共振成像上信号相当于液体水平。
HP:0012064	骨骼系统异常	Unicameral bone cyst	A benign fluid filled simple cyst of bone filled with serous fluid.	单房性骨囊肿	骨骼的良性囊肿，充满浆液性液体。
HP:0012065	骨骼系统异常	Multiple bony cystic lesions	Presence of multiple cystic changes in multiple ares or multiple bones.	多重骨囊性病变	存在多个或多块骨骼的多重囊性改变。
HP:0012066	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased urinary disaccharide excretion	Increased concentration of `disaccharide` (CHEBI:36233) in the urine.	尿液双糖排泄增加	尿液中:增加`disaccharide`（36233 CHEBI）的浓度。
HP:0012067	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Glycopeptiduria	Increased excretion of `glycopeptides` (CHEBI:24396) in the urine. Glycopeptides are peptides with carbohydrate moieties covalently attached to the side chains of the amino acid residues.	糖肽尿症	尿液中:增加`glycopeptides`（24396 CHEBI）的排泄。糖肽的肽与碳水化合物部分共价连接到氨基酸残基的侧链。

HP:0012069	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Keratan sulfate excretion in urine	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `keratan sulfate` (CHEBI:60924)  in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	尿中排泄硫酸角质素	硫酸角质素在尿中排出。

HP:0012073	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal urinary acylglycine profile	An abnormal distribution of `N-acylglycines (CHEBI:16180) in the urine. HP:0012074	眼部异常	Tonic pupil	An abnormality of the pupillary light reaction characterized by a marked slowing of the light reaction of usually just one pupil. The pupil tends to be relatively dilated, and there is reduced accommodation.	瞳孔强直	瞳孔对光反应异常，特点是一个瞳孔对光反应的显著变慢。瞳孔趋向于相对扩张，并伴有辐凑降低。
HP:0012075	神经系统异常	Personality disorder	An abnormality of mental functioning affecting the personality and behavioural tendencies of an individual and characterized by a rigid and unhealthy pattern of thinking and behavior. The definition of a personal disorder implies that the abnormality is not the result of damage or insult to the brain or from another psychiatric disorder.	人格障碍	影响个体人格和行为异常的精神类疾病，主要表现为思考和行为方式不正常。人格疾病的定义主要为异常的原因不是大脑损害导致的。
HP:0012076	神经系统异常	Borderline personality disorder	A personality disorder characterized by impulsive behavior and unpredictable and capricious mood. Affected individuals show a liability to outbursts of emotion and an incapacity to control the behavioural explosions.	边缘性人格障碍	主要以冲动行为、不可预测和反复无常的情绪为特征的人格障碍。患者表现为易于情绪爆发并且不能控制行为爆发。
HP:0012077	神经系统异常	Histrionic personality disorder	A personality disorder characterized by shallow and labile affectivity, self-dramatization, theatricality, exaggerated expression of emotions, suggestibility, egocentricity, self-indulgence, lack of consideration for others, easily hurt feelings, and continuous seeking for appreciation, excitement and attention.	表演型人格障碍	是一种以情感肤浅易变，戏剧化的自我表现，夸张，过度表达情绪，易受暗示，自我中心，任性，不考虑他人，感情易受伤害，持续追求欣赏、兴奋和关注为特点的人格障碍。
HP:0012078	神经系统异常	Motor conduction block	Blockade of impulses at a focal site along the course of a motor axon.	运动传导阻滞	冲动沿着运动轴索在某一部位阻断。
HP:0012079	神经系统异常	Abnormality of central motor conduction	Any anomaly of the conduction of motor nerve impulses in the central nervous system.	中枢运动传导异常	在中枢神经系统中运动神经冲动传导的任何异常。

HP:0012096	神经系统异常	Intracranial epidermoid cyst	A congenital inclusion cysts that arises from ectodermal cells that normally form skin cells being left behind in the nervous system during development.	颅内表皮样囊肿	先天性包涵囊肿，起源于正常情况下形成皮肤细胞的外胚层细胞，在发育过程中遗留在神经系统。
HP:0012097	神经系统异常	Intracranial dermoid cyst	A congenital inclusion cysts that arises from the inclusion of ectodermally committed cells at the time of neural tube closure (3rd-5th week of embryogenesis). The capsule of dermoid cysts consists of simple epithelium supported by collagen. In thicker parts, the lining is supplemented with dermis containing hair follicles, sebaceous glands, and apocrine glands.	颅内皮样囊肿	先天性包涵囊肿，源于神经管闭合时（胚胎发育的第3-5周）外胚层干细胞的封入。皮样囊肿的囊是由胶原支撑的单层上皮细胞组成。在较厚的部分，内壁辅以含有毛囊，皮脂腺，汗腺的真皮。

HP:0012113	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormality of creatine metabolism	An anomaly of the concentration or homeostasis of `creatine`  (CHEBI:16919). Creatine is a derivative of glycine having methyl and amidino groups attached to the nitrogen. Creatine is naturally produced from amino acids, primarily in liver and kidney, and acts as an energy source for cells, primarly for muscle cells.	肌酸代谢异常	`肌酸 `（CHEBI:16919）的浓度或体内平衡的异常。肌酸为具有甲基和脒基的甘氨酸连接到氮上的衍生物。肌酸主要是在肝脏和肾脏自然产生的，为肌肉细胞的主要能量来源。

HP:0012119	血液和造血组织异常	Methemoglobinemia	Abnormally increased levels of Methemoglobinemia in the blood. In this form of hemoglobin, there is an oxidized ferric iron (Fe +3) rather than the reduced ferrous form (Fe 2+) that is normally found in hemoglobin. Methemoglobin has a reduced affinity for oxygen, resulting in a reduced ability to release oxygen to tissues.	高铁血红蛋白血症	高铁血红蛋白在血液中异常增高的。这种形式的血红蛋白，含有三价铁（Fe 3），而不是在正常血红蛋白中存在的亚铁形式（Fe 2+）。高铁血红蛋白对氧亲和力低，导致释放氧气到组织的能力降低。

Microscopically, glioblastoma multiforme is characterized by regions of pseudopalisading necrosis, pleomorphic nuclei and cells, and microvascular proliferation.	多形性胶质母细胞瘤	起源于中枢神经系统胶质细胞的肿瘤，伴有肉眼可见的坏死和出血。显微镜下，多形性胶质母细胞瘤的特点是假性栅栏样坏死，多形核和细胞以及微血管增生。

A plasma is termed &#39;APC resistant&#39; when the addition of exogenous APC fails to prolong its clotting time in an activated partial thromboplastin time assay.	活化蛋白C抵抗	对活化C蛋白的抗凝效果反应不佳。&#39;当在活化部分凝血酶时间测定法中加入外源性的APC未能延长凝血时间的血浆，被称为“APC耐受”血浆。

HP:0012196	呼吸系统异常	Cheyne-Stokes respiration	An abnormal pattern of respiration characterized by cycles of respiration that are increasingly deeper then shallower with possible periods of apnea. Affected patients may display a 10 to 20 second episode of hypoventilation or apnea, followed by respiration of increased depth and frequency over the course of about one minute. The cycle repeats every 45 seconds to 3 minutes.	潮式呼吸	呼吸运动的一种异常模式，其特点是呼吸越来越深而后逐渐变浅，并可能有间停。患者在1分钟左右的时间内可能有10到20秒低通气或窒息发作，继而出现呼吸深度与频率的增加。这种循环每45秒至3分钟重复1次。

HP:0012246	神经系统异常,眼部异常	Oculomotor nerve palsy	Reduced ability to control the movement of the eye associated with damage to the third cranial nerve (the oculomotor nerve).	动眼神经麻痹	第三脑神经（动眼神经）受损所致的眼睛运动能力下降。

HP:0012248	心血管系统异常	Prolonged PR interval	Increased time for the  PR interval (beginning of the P wave to the beginning of the QRS complex).	PR间期延长	PR间期延长（P波起始到QRS波群起始）。
HP:0012249	心血管系统异常	Abnormal ST segment	An electrocardiographic anomaly of the ST segment, which is the segment that connects the QRS complex and the T wave. The ST segment normally has a duration of 80 to 120 ms, is flat and at the same level (isoelectric) as the PR and TP segment.	ST段异常	心电图ST段异常， ST段是指连接QRS复合波和T波的一段。 ST段通常持续80至120毫秒平坦且与PR和TP段在同一等电水平。
HP:0012250	心血管系统异常	ST segment depression	An electrocardiographic anomaly in which the ST segment is observed to be located inferior to the isoelectric line.	ST段压低	心电图异常，其中观察到ST段低于等电位线位置。
HP:0012251	心血管系统异常	ST segment elevation	An electrocardiographic anomaly in which the ST segment is observed to be located superior to the isoelectric line.	ST段抬高	心电图异常，其中观察到ST段高于等电位线位置。

HP:0012255	呼吸系统异常	Dynein arm defect of motile cilia	An anomaly of the dynein arms of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.	能动纤毛动力蛋白臂缺陷	可动纤毛的动力蛋白臂异常，该特征常用电子显微镜评估。

This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.	外动力蛋白臂缺失	呼吸运动纤毛的外动力蛋白臂通常位于动纤毛的周边微管外，其缺失常通过电子显微镜发现。
HP:0012257	呼吸系统异常	Absent inner dynein arms	Absence of the outer dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, which normally are situated within the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.	内在动力蛋白臂缺失	呼吸运动纤毛的外动力蛋白臂通常位于动纤毛的周边微管外，其缺失常通过电子显微镜发现。
HP:0012258	呼吸系统异常	Abnormal axonemal organization of motile cilia	Abnormal arrangement of the structures of the axoneme, which is the cytoskeletal structure that forms the inner core of the motile cilium and displays a canonical 9 + 2 microtubular pattern of motile cilia studded with dynein arms.	运动纤毛轴丝异常排列	轴丝结构的异常排列。所谓轴丝指形成运动纤毛内芯的细胞骨架结构，呈现为镶有动力蛋白臂的、典型的9 + 2运动纤毛微管图案。
HP:0012259	呼吸系统异常	Absent inner and outer dynein arms	Complete absence of the dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, that is, absence of the inner and the outer dynein arms, which normally are situated inside and outside of the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.	内、外动力蛋白臂缺如	呼吸运动纤毛的动力蛋白臂完全缺失，即内、外动力蛋白臂（通常是位于内部和运动纤毛的外周微管外）缺失。这一特点常通过电子显微镜发现。

HP:0012262	呼吸系统异常	Abnormal ciliary motility	Any anomaly of the normal motility of motile cilia. Evaluation of ciliary beat frequency and ciliary beat pattern requires high-speed videomicroscopy of freshly obtained ciliary biopsies that are maintained in culture media under controlled conditions.	纤毛运动障碍	正常运动纤毛的任何异常运动。评价纤毛运动频率和纤毛摆动模式，需活检获得新鲜运动纤毛，使用要高速电视显微镜在特定培养条件下进行观察。

HP:0012399	体壁的异常	Pressure ulcer	A type of ulcer that is caused when an area of skin is subject to pressure over a prolonged period of time, ranging in range in severity from patches of discolored skin to open wounds that expose the underlying bone or muscle. The most common sites are the sacrum, coccyx, heels and the hips.	褥疮、压疮	一类溃疡，常由长时间受压迫引起，可仅表现为红斑，严重时可形成深达肌肉或骨骼的开放性创面。最常见的发病部位是骶骨、尾骨、脚踝和臀部。
HP:0012400	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal aldolase level	An abnormal concentration of aldolase in the serum. Aldolase is an enzyme responsible for converting fructose 1,6-bisphosphate into the triose phosphates dihydroxyacetone phosphate and glyceraldehyde 3-phosphate.	醛缩酶水平异常	血清中醛缩酶的浓度异常。醛缩酶是负责将果糖-1,6-双磷酸入转化为丙糖磷酸酯二羟丙酮磷酸和甘油醛-3-磷酸的酶。

HP:0012402	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased urine alpha-ketoglutarate concentration	A greater than normal concentration of  `2-oxoglutaric acid` (CHEBI:30915) in the urine.	尿α-酮戊二酸浓度增高	尿液中α-酮戊二酸浓度高于正常范围。
HP:0012403	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased urine alpha-ketoglutarate concentration	A lower than normal concentration of  `2-oxoglutaric acid` (CHEBI:30915) in the urine.	尿α-酮戊二酸盐浓度降低	尿液中α-酮戊二酸盐浓度低于正常。
HP:0012404	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal urine citrate concentration	A deviation from normal of the concentration of  `citrate(3-)` (CHEBI:16947) in the urine.	尿柠檬酸盐浓度异常	尿液中三价柠檬酸根(3-)浓度异常。
HP:0012405	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hypocitraturia	A lower than normal concentration of `citrate(3-)` (CHEBI:16947) in the urine.	低枸橼酸尿	尿液中柠檬酸盐的浓度低于正常。
HP:0012406	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hypercitraturia	A greater than normal concentration of `citrate(3-)` (CHEBI:16947) in the urine.	高枸橼酸尿	尿液中柠檬酸浓度超出正常范围。
HP:0012407	神经系统异常	Scissor gait	A form of gait abnormality characterized by hypertonia and flexion in the legs, hips and pelvis accompanied by extreme adduction leading to the knees and thighs hitting, or sometimes even crossing, in a scissors-like movement. The opposing muscles (abductors) become comparatively weak from lack of use.	剪刀步态	步态异常的一种形式，以腿，臀部和骨盆肌张力增高和屈曲伴极度收导致双侧膝盖和大腿互相碰撞，或有时甚至互相交叉，形成剪刀样运动。拮抗肌肉（外展肌）由于废用而变得相对无力。
HP:0012408	泌尿生殖系统异常	Medullary nephrocalcinosis	The deposition of calcium salts in the parenchyma of the renal medulla (innermost part of the kidney).	肾髓质钙化症	在肾髓质（肾脏的最内部分）的实质细胞发生钙盐沉积。
HP:0012409	泌尿生殖系统异常	Cortical nephrocalcinosis	The deposition of calcium salts in the parenchyma of the renal cortex (the outer portion of the kidney between the renal capsule and the renal medulla).	肾皮质钙化	钙盐在肾皮质内沉积（肾包膜和肾髓质之间肾脏的外层部分）。
HP:0012410	血液和造血组织异常	Pure red cell aplasia	A type of anemia resuting from suppression of erythropoiesis with little or no abnormality of leukocyte or platelet production. Erythroblasts are virtually absent in bone marrow; however, leukocyte and platelet production show little or no reduction.	纯红细胞发育不全	一型因红细胞生成受抑制白细胞或血小板数目正常或少量减少而发生的贫血。在骨髓中红细胞几乎不存在， 但白细胞和血小板生成略微或没有减少。
HP:0012411	内分泌系统异常	Premature pubarche	The onset of growth of pubic hair at an earlier age than normal.	阴毛早现	阴毛在正常年龄之前开始生长。

HP:0012420	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Meconium stained amniotic fluid	It’s an abnormal kind of amniotic fluid that contains fetal meconium, and that always associates with fetal distress or meconium aspiration syndrome	羊水污染、羊水混浊	羊水胎粪污染是一种异常羊水状态，羊水中混有胎儿粪便，常引发胎儿窘迫或新生儿胎粪吸入综合征

HP:0012426	眼部异常	Optic disc drusen	Optic disc drusen are acellular, calcified deposits within the optic nerve head. Optic disc drusen are congenital and developmental anomalies of the optic nerve head, representing hyaline-containing bodies that, over time, appear as elevated, lumpy irregularities on the anterior portion of the optic nerve.	视盘玻璃膜疣	视盘玻璃膜疣是视神经乳头内无细胞，存在钙化沉积导致的疾病。视盘玻璃膜疣是视神经乳头先天性的发育异常，随着时间的推移，在视神经前部出现隆起、形状不规则的包含透明素的小体。
HP:0012427	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Excessive femoral anteversion	An increased degree of  femoral version, which is defined as the angular difference between axis of femoral neck and transcondylar axis of the knee. Thus, femoral anteversion is an inward twisting of the femur that causes the knees and feet to turn inward.	股骨过度前倾	股骨前倾角度增加，股骨前倾角度为股骨颈和膝关节经髁轴的轴线之间的角度差。因此，股骨前倾导致膝盖和脚内旋的一种股骨的向内扭曲。

HP:0012466	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Chronic respiratory acidosis	Longstanding impairment in ventilation such that the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2) is elevated above the upper limit of the reference range (more than 45 mm Hg), with a normal or near-normal pH secondary to renal compensation and an elevated serum bicarbonate levels (more than30 mEq/L).	慢性呼吸性酸中毒	长期的通气损害，使二氧化碳的分压（PaCO2）升高超过参考范围（大于45毫米汞柱）的正常上限，继发于肾补偿和血清碳酸氢盐水平（高于30毫当量/升），pH值正常或接近正常。
HP:0012467	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Acute respiratory acidosis	Sudden onset of impairment in ventilation such that the removal of carbon dioxide by the respiratory system is less than the production of carbon dioxide in the tissues, leading to an elevation of the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2) above the normal limits (more than 45 mm Hg) with an accompanying acidemia (pH less than 7.35).	急性呼吸性酸中毒	突然发作的通气障碍，使呼吸系统移除的二氧化碳少于组织中产生的二氧化碳在，导致二氧化碳（PaCO2的）分压高于正常值范围（超过45毫米汞柱），并伴发血症（pH值小于7.35）。
HP:0012468	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Chronic acidosis	Longstanding abnormal acid accumulation or depletion of base.	慢性酸中毒	长期不正常的酸堆积或碱消耗。
HP:0012469	神经系统异常	Infantile spasms	Infantile spasms represent a subset of &quot;epileptic spasms&quot;. Infantile Spasms are epileptic spasms starting in the first year of life (infancy).	婴儿痉挛	婴儿痉挛代表“癫痫性痉挛”的一个子集。婴儿痉挛是一岁以内（婴儿）起病的癫痫性痉挛。
HP:0012470	眼部异常	Setting-sun eye phenomenon	An ophthalmologic sign in young children resulting from upward-gaze paresis. In this condition, the eyes appear driven downward, the sclera may be seen between the upper eyelid and the iris, and part of the lower pupil may be covered by the lower eyelid.	夕阳眼现象	儿童向上凝视麻痹所致的眼现象。在这种情况下，眼睛向下方移动，上眼睑和虹膜间可见巩膜，下部瞳孔可能被下眼睑覆盖。

HP:0012477	神经系统异常	Vocal tremor	A wavering, unsteady voice that reflects involuntary and approximately sinusoidal oscillation of motor unit firings of laryngeal muscles. Vocal tremor results in low frequency modulations of voice frequency or amplitude and intermittent voice instability.	声音震颤	一个摇摆不定、不稳定的声音，反映喉肌的运动单位不自主的正弦振荡。声音震颤导致声音频率或幅度的低频调制和间歇性的声音不稳定。
HP:0012478	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Temporomandibular joint ankylosis	Fusion of the mandibular condyle to the base of the skull, resulting in limitation of jaw opening.	颞下颌关节强直	下颌骨髁突与颅底融合，造成张口受限。
HP:0012479	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Temporomandibular joint crepitus	Noises from the temporomandibular joint during mandibular movement (e.g., chewing). Temporomandibular joint crepitus is often described as a clicking,  popping, grating sound.	颞下颌关节弹响	颞下颌关节在下颌运动（如:咀嚼）所发出的响声。颞下颌关节弹响常常被描述为“卡嗒声”、“砰地一声”或“吱吱声”。
HP:0012480	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Abnormality of cerebral veins	An anomaly of `cerebral veins` (FMA:70861).	脑静脉畸形	`脑静脉`异常（FMA:70861）。
HP:0012481	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Cerebral venous angioma	A congenital malformation of veins which drain normal brain characterized by a caput medusae or an umbrellalike convergence of multiple venules on a single, or occasionally multiple, enlarged parenchymal or medullary vein, like the trunk of a tree or the shank of an umbrella. This dilated terminal vein penetrates the cortex to drain either (a) superficially to cortical veins or sinuses, (b) deeply to subependymal veins of the lateral ventricle and then into the galenic system, (c) to the fourth ventricle and then to the pontomesencephalic vein, or (d) to the precentral cerebellar vein and into the galenic system.	脑静脉血管瘤	先天性畸形的静脉为正常的脑组织提供静脉引流的特征是“水母头”、多个小静脉伞样汇聚成一个静脉或偶见多发髓静脉实质部分扩张，就像树干或伞柄一样。这种扩张的终末静脉穿透皮层引流至（a）浅表型至皮质静脉或窦，（b）深部型至侧脑室室管膜下静脉，然后进入galen’s静脉系统，（c）至第四脑室，然后到脑桥中脑静脉，或（d）到小脑中央前静脉并进入galen’s静脉系统。
HP:0012482	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Frontal venous angioma	A venous angioma of the frontal lobe of the brain.	额部静脉血管瘤	大脑额叶的静脉血管瘤。
HP:0012483	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal alpha granules	Defective structure, size or content of alpha granules, platelet organelles that contain several growth factors destined for release during platelet activation at sites of vessel wall injury.	α颗粒异常	#####
HP:0012484	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal dense granules	Defective structure, size or content of dense granules, platelet organelles that  contain granules proaggregatory factors such as adenosine diphosphate (ADP), adenosine triphosphate (ATP), ionized calcium , histamine and serotonin.	致密颗粒异常	致密颗粒结构、尺寸或内容物的异常。。指血小板细胞器含有的血小板聚集因子（如二磷酸腺苷（ADP），三磷酸腺苷（ATP），离子钙，组胺和血清素）的异常。
HP:0012485	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal surface-connected open canalicular system	An anomaly of the invaginations of the surface membrane that form the open canalicular system (OCS). The OCS serve as the pathway for transport of substances into the cells and as conduits for the discharge of alpha granule products secreted during the platelet release reaction.	表面连接开放管道系统异常	指细胞膜表面开放管道系统（OCS）的功能异常。OCS是血小板活化时α - 颗粒释放和其他物质进出细胞的途径。
HP:0012486	神经系统异常,免疫系统异常	Myelitis	Inflammation of the `spinal cord` (FMA:7647).	脊髓炎	脊髓炎症。
HP:0012487	神经系统异常	Cerebellopontine angle arachnoid cyst	An arachnoid cyst located at the margin of the cerebellum and pons.	桥小脑角蛛网膜囊肿	一个位于小脑桥脑边缘的蛛网膜囊肿。
HP:0012488	神经系统异常	Intraventricular arachnoid cyst	An arachnoid cyst located within the ventricular system.	脑室内蛛网膜囊肿	位于脑室系统内的蛛网膜囊肿。
HP:0012489	神经系统异常	Suprasellar arachnoid cyst	An arachnoid cyst that progressively enlarges from an abnormality in the membrane of Liliequist or in the interpeduncular cistern, and typically, expands from the prepontine space, displacing the floor of the third ventricle upwards, the pituitary stalk and optic chiasm upwards and forwards, and the mammillary bodies upwards and backwards.	鞍上蛛网膜囊肿	一种由Liliequist膜或脚间池内的异常进行性扩大而形成的蛛网膜囊肿，通常由，脑桥前区扩大，导致第三脑室的底板向上移位，垂体柄和视交叉向上和向前移位，乳头体向上和向后移位。
HP:0012490	结缔组织异常,免疫系统异常	Panniculitis	Inflammation of `adipose tissue` (FMA:20110).	脂膜炎	脂肪组织炎症。
HP:0012491	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal dense tubular system	An anomaly of the intracellular membrane complexes known as the dense tubular system.	致密管道系统异常	被称为致密管系统细胞内的膜复合体的异常。
HP:0012492	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Cerebral artery stenosis	Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of a cerebral artery.	脑动脉狭窄	脑动脉内壁（内腔）变窄或缩窄。
HP:0012493	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Middle cerebral artery stenosis	Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the `middle cerebral artery` (FMA:50079).	大脑中动脉狭窄	大脑中动脉（FMA:50079）内壁（内腔）收缩或狭窄。
HP:0012494	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Anterior cerebral artery stenosis	Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the `anterior cerebral artery` (FMA:50028).	大脑前动脉狭窄	大脑前动脉（FMA:50028）内层的狭窄或阻塞。
HP:0012495	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Posterior cerebral artery stenosis	Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the `posterior cerebral artery` (FMA:50583).	大脑后动脉狭窄	大脑后动脉内径狭窄。
HP:0012496	肌肉组织异常,呼吸系统异常	Reduced maximal inspiratory pressure	A decrease in the maximum amount of negative pressure a person can generate during an inhalation.	最大吸气压降低	一个人吸气时所能产生的最大负压降低。
HP:0012497	肌肉组织异常,呼吸系统异常	Reduced maximal expiratory pressure	A decrease in the maximum amount of pressure of expired air achieved by a person after a full inspiration.	最大呼气压降低	一个人在完全吸气后最大能力呼出气体的压力降低。
HP:0012498	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Nuchal cord	Nuchal cord is a complication during pregnancy  in which the umbilical cord wraps around the fetal neck once or multiple times.it is the most common type of cord entanglement which can be detected by ultrasound scan in the second or third trimester.	脐带绕颈	脐带绕颈是孕期的一种并发症，是最常见的脐带缠绕类型，指脐带缠绕胎儿颈部一圈或多圈，可通过妊娠中期或晚期超声检查发现。
HP:0012499	心血管系统异常	Descending aortic dissection	A separation of the layers within the wall of the `descending aorta` (FMA:3784). Tears in the intimal layer result in the propagation of dissection (proximally or distally) secondary to blood entering the intima-media space.	降主动脉夹层	降主动脉壁内膜层的分离（FMA:3784）。内膜层撕裂，血液进入内膜腔导致夹层的传播（近端或远端）。
HP:0012500	体壁的异常	Verrucous papule	A wartlike (with multiple small elevated projections) papule.	疣状丘疹	类似于疣状（伴有多个小的隆起）的丘疹。
HP:0012501	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the brainstem white matter	An anomaly of the `white matter of brainstem` (FMA:282112).	脑干白质异常	脑干的白质的异常（FMA:282112）。
HP:0012502	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the internal capsule	An anomaly of the `internal capsule` (FMA:61950), which is an area of white matter in the brain that separates the caudate nucleus and the thalamus from the putamen and the globus pallidus.	内囊异常	`内囊`（61950 FMA）的异常。内囊是白质在分隔尾状核和丘脑，与壳核和苍白球的区域。
HP:0012503	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of the pituitary gland	An anomaly of the `pituitary gland` (FMA:13889).	垂体异常	垂体的异常。

HP:0012507	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Weakness of orbicularis oculi muscle	Reduced strength of the `orbicularis oculi` (FMA:46779), the circumorbital muscle in the face that closes the eyelid.	眼轮匝肌无力	眼轮匝肌（闭合眼睑）的收缩力度降低。
HP:0012508	眼部异常	Metamorphopsia	A visual anomaly in which images appear distorted. A grid of straight lines appears wavy and parts of the grid may appear blank.	视物变形	图像出现扭曲的视觉异常。直线网格出现波浪状，部分可能出现空白。
HP:0012509	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Reduced thyroxin-binding globulin	An abnormally decreased amount of thyroxin-binding globulin (TBG) in blood. TBG is responsible for carrying the thyroid hormones thyroxine (T4) and 3,5,3&#39;-triiodothyronine (T3) in the bloodstream.	甲状腺素结合球蛋白降低	一个异常降低的数额甲状腺素结合球蛋白（TBG）的血液。 TBG负责执行甲状腺激素甲状腺素（T4）和3,5,3&#39;碘甲状腺原氨酸（T3）在血流中。
HP:0012510	神经系统异常	Extra-axial cerebrospinal fluid accumulation	An increased amount of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) in the subarachnoid space.	轴外脑积水	蛛网膜下腔内脑脊液（CSF）量增加。
HP:0012511	眼部异常	Temporal optic disc pallor	A pale yellow discoloration of the temporal (lateral) portion of the optic disc.	颞侧视盘苍白	视盘的颞侧（外侧）部分出现浅黄色的变色。

HP:0012517	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Reduced catalase activity	An abnormally decreased amount of `catalase activity` (GO:0004096).	过氧化氢酶活性降低	一个异常降低的数额`过氧化氢酶activity`的（GO:0004096）。
HP:0012518	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Abnormality of circle of Willis	An anomaly of the `circle of Willis` (FMA:50454), also known as the cerebral arterial circle.	Willis环异常	Willis 环（FMA:50454）的异常，也被称为脑动脉环。
HP:0012519	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Hypoplastic posterior communicating artery	Underdeveloped `posterior communicating artery` (FMA:50084).	后交通动脉发育不全	后交通动脉发育不完全（FMA:50084）。
HP:0012520	神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	Perivascular spaces	Increased dimensions of the Virchow-Robin spaces (also known as perivascular spaces), which surround the walls of vessels as they course from the subarachnoid space through the brain parenchyma. Perivascular spaces are commonly microscopic, and not visible on conventional neuroimaging. This term refers to an increase of size of these spaces such that they are visible on neuroimaging (usually magnetic resonance imaging). The dilatations are regular cavities that always contain a patent artery.	血管周围间隙	Virchow-Robin spaces（又称为血管周围间隙）是指小血管从蛛网膜下腔发起时从脑实质穿过时在血管壁周围形成的腔隙。血管周围间隙多为显微镜下的，一般不能通过传统的神经影像学发现。这条术语是指这些腔隙变大可以从神经影像学上观察到（多为核磁共振），多为包含一条动脉的规则的空腔。
HP:0012521	眼部异常	Optic nerve aplasia	Congenital absence of the `optic nerve` (FMA:50863).	视神经发育缺陷	先天性的视神经（FMA:50863）缺乏。
HP:0012522	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	Spider hemangioma	A form of telangiectasis characterized by a central elevated red dot the size of a pinhead, representing an arteriole, with numerous small blood vessels that radiate out thereby resembling the legs of a spider. Characteristically, compression of the central arteriole causes the entire lesion to blanch, and the lesion quickly refills once the compression is released.	蜘蛛痣	毛细血管扩张的一种类型，以针尖样隆起的红点为中心，，周围辐射性分布较多小动脉，形似蜘蛛腿。典型的特征为按压中央动脉导致整个病变区域发白且松开后又迅速恢复。
HP:0012523	神经系统异常	Oral aversion	Reluctance or refusal of a child to be breastfed or eat, manifested as gagging, vomiting, turning head away from food, or avoidance of sensation in or around the mouth (i.e. toothbrushing or face-washing).	口服厌恶	儿童拒绝或不情愿被哺乳或者进食，表现为恶心、呕吐、转头远离食物，或口腔或口周任何感觉的触碰（如刷牙或洗脸）。
HP:0012524	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal platelet shape	A deviation from the normal discoid platelet shape.	血小板形状异常	区别于正常的盘状血小板形状的异常。
HP:0012525	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal alpha granule distribution	An anomalous location and arrangement of platelet alpha granules.	α颗粒分布异常	血小板α颗粒位置和分布异常。
HP:0012526	血液和造血组织异常	Absence of alpha granules	A lack of platelet alpha granules.	α颗粒缺失	缺乏血小板的α颗粒。
HP:0012527	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal alpha granule content	A deviation from the normal contents of the platelet alpha granules, which normally contain hemostatic proteins such as fibrinogen, von Willebrand factor, and growth factors such as platelet-derived growth factor.	α颗粒内容物异常	血小板α颗粒通常含有凝血因子如纤维蛋白原、von Willebrand因子和生长因子 (如血小板衍生的生长因子)。此处指这些成分的异常。
HP:0012528	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal number of alpha granules	A deviation from the normal count of alpha granules per thrombocyte.	α颗粒的数量异常	血小板α颗粒数量异常。
HP:0012529	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal dense granule content	A deviation from the normal contents of the platelet alpha granules, which normally contain adenosine triphosphate (ATP), adenosine diphosphate (ADP), serotonin, calcium, and pyrophosphate, which are secreted when platelets are activated.	致密颗粒含量异常	正常的血小板α颗粒包括三磷酸腺苷（ATP），腺苷二磷酸（ADP），血清素，钙和焦磷酸盐，血小板被激活后分泌这些成分。
HP:0012530	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal number of dense granules	A deviation from the normal count of dense granules per thrombocyte.	致密颗粒数量异常	血小板致密颗粒的数量异常。
HP:0012531	神经系统异常	Pain	An unpleasant sensory and emotional experience associated with actual or potential tissue damage, or described in terms of such damage.	疼痛	与实际或潜在的组织损伤相伴随的一种的不愉快的感觉和情绪体验。
HP:0012532	神经系统异常	Chronic pain	Persistent pain, usually defined as pain that has laster longer than 3 to 6 months.	慢性疼痛	持续性疼痛，通常定义为持续3至6个月以上的疼痛。
HP:0012533	神经系统异常	Allodynia	Pain due to a stimulus that does not normally provoke pain.	痛觉过敏	由通常情况下不能引发疼痛的刺激导致的疼痛。
HP:0012534	神经系统异常	Dysesthesia	Abnormal sensations with no apparent physical cause that are painful or unpleasant.	感觉异常	没有明显物理原因而存在异常的疼痛或不愉快的感觉。
HP:0012535	神经系统异常	Abnormal synaptic transmission	An anomaly in the communication from a neuron to a target across a synapse. This is a four step process, comprising (i) synthesis and storage of neurotransmitters; (ii) neurotransmitter release; (iii) activation of postsynaptic receptors by the neurotransmitter; and (iv) inactivation of the neurotransmitter. Thus, this term is defined as an anomaly of `neurotransmitter metabolic process` (GO:0042133).	突触传递异常	从神经元跨突触到目标靶点联络异常。在这个四步骤的过程中包括:（i）合成和储存神经递质; （ⅱ）神经递质释放; （ⅲ）通过神经递质激活突触后受体;和（iv）神经递质的失活。因此，该术语被定义为&#39;神经递质代谢过程`（GO:0042133）的异常。
HP:0012536	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Maternal anticardiolipin antibody positive	Anticardiolipin antibody positive is common find in SLE and other autoimmune diseases. The antibody closely related to thrombosis, thrombocytopenia, spontaneous abortion or intrauterine fetal death.	母体抗心磷脂抗体阳性	抗心磷脂抗体阳性常见于SLE及其他自身免疫性疾病。该抗体与血栓形成、血小板减少、自然流产或宫内死胎关系密切。
HP:0012537	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Food intolerance	A detrimental reaction to a food, beverage, food additive, or compound found in foods that produces symptoms in one or more body organs and systems that is not mediated by an immune reaction.	食物不耐受	甲有害反应到食品，饮料，食品添加剂，或化合物中产生的症状中，而并非由免疫反应介导的一个或多个身体器官和系统食品中发现。
HP:0012538	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Gluten intolerance	A detrimental reaction to the presence of gluten in food, which may include abdominal pain, fatigue, headaches and paresthesia, or celiac disease.	麸质不耐受	甲不利反应，以面筋的食物中存在，其可以包括腹部疼痛，疲劳，头痛和感觉异常，或腹腔疾病。
HP:0012539	肿瘤,血液和造血组织异常	Non-Hodgkin lymphoma	A typer of lymphoma characterized microscopically by the absence of multinucleated Reed-Sternberg cells.	非霍奇金淋巴瘤	缺乏多核R-S细胞的淋巴瘤。
HP:0012540	体壁的异常	Axillary epidermoid cyst	An epidermoid cyst in the armpit.	腋窝表皮样囊肿	位于腋下的表皮样囊肿。
HP:0012541	血液和造血组织异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Cephalohematoma	Hemorrhage between the skull and periosteum of a newborn resulting from rupture of blood vessels that cross the periosteum.	胎头血肿	新生儿骨膜下血管破裂出血，引起颅骨及骨膜下血肿而形成头颅血肿。
HP:0012542	体壁的异常	Onychauxis	Thickened nails without deformity.	甲肥厚	甲增厚不伴畸形。
HP:0012543	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hemosiderinuria	The presence of hemosiderin in the urine.	含铁血黄素尿症	尿液中存在含铁血黄素。
HP:0012544	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated aldolase level	An increased concentration of  fructose 1,6-bisphosphate aldolase in the serum.	醛缩酶水平升高	的血清中果糖-1,6-双磷酸醛缩酶的浓度增加。
HP:0012545	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Reduced aldolase level	An decreased concentration of  fructose 1,6-bisphosphate aldolase in the serum.	醛缩酶水平降低	一个降低浓度的血清中果糖-1,6-双磷酸醛缩酶。
HP:0012546	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Skewed maternal X inactivation	A deviation from equal (50%) inactivation of each parental X chromosome in maternal cells.	母亲X染色体偏向性失活	女性细胞中两条X染色体的其中之一失去活性的现象。
HP:0012547	眼部异常	Abnormal involuntary eye movements	Anomalous movements of the eyes that occur without the subject wanting them to happen.	不自主眼球运动异常	眼球不自主的异常运动。
HP:0012548	肌肉组织异常	Skeletal muscle fatty infiltration	Deposition of fat within muscles.	骨骼肌脂肪浸润	肌肉内脂肪沉积。
HP:0012549	头部和颈部的异常	Conjunctival lipoma	A lipoma (a benign tumor composed of adipose tissue) located in the conjunctiva.	结膜脂肪瘤	位于结膜上的脂肪瘤（良性肿瘤脂肪组织组成）。
HP:0012550	消化系统异常	Colonic varices	The presence of varices (enlarged and convoluted blood vessels) in the colon.	结肠静脉曲张	结肠中存在静脉曲张（扩大的和盘旋的血管）。
HP:0012551	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Absent neutrophil specific granules	Lack of specific granules in neutrophils.	中性粒细胞特殊颗粒缺乏	缺乏特定的中性粒细胞颗粒。
HP:0012552	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Increased neutrophil nuclear projections	Presence of an elevanted number of projections from nuclei of neutrophils. Ths projections can have the shape of hooks, tags, or clubs.	中性粒细胞核突起增加	中性粒细胞的细胞核存在多个突起。 这种突起可以有钩状，标签状，或高尔夫球杆头部的形状。
HP:0012553	体壁的异常	Hypoplastic thumbnail	A thumbnail that is diminished in length and width, i.e., underdeveloped `thumb nail` (FMA:54329).	拇指甲发育不全	拇指甲发育不全，长度和宽度较正常变短或变窄。
HP:0012554	体壁的异常	Absent thumbnail	Absence of `thumb nail` (FMA:54329).	拇指甲缺失	拇指甲的缺失。
HP:0012555	体壁的异常	Absent nail of hallux	Absent `nail of big toe` (FMA:54344).	拇趾甲缺失	拇趾甲的缺失。
HP:0012556	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hyperbetaalaninemia	Increased concentration of `beta-alanine` (CHEBI:16958) in the blood.	高β丙氨酸血症	血液中的:增加`的β-alanine`（16958 CHEBI）的浓度。
HP:0012557	神经系统异常	EEG with centrotemporal focal spike waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves in the centrotemporal region of the brain (also known as the central sulcus), i.e., focal sharp waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图伴中央颞区棘波	脑电图局灶短暂尖波位于大脑中央颞区（也称为中央沟），即，持续时间小于80毫秒的尖波（随后紧随慢波）。
HP:0012558	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal T3/T4 ratio	A ratio of serum triiodothyronine (T3) to thyroxine (T4) in the blood that deviates from normal.	T3/T4比值异常	血清三碘甲状腺原氨酸（T3）和甲状腺素（T4）的比值偏离正常值。
HP:0012559	内分泌系统异常	Increased T3/T4 ratio	A ratio of serum triiodothyronine (T3) to thyroxine (T4) in the blood that is higher than normal.	T3/T4比值升高	血液中血清三碘甲状腺原氨酸（T3）和甲状腺素（T4）的比值高于正常值。
HP:0012560	内分泌系统异常	Decreased T3/T4 ratio	A ratio of serum triiodothyronine (T3) to thyroxine (T4) in the blood that is lower than normal.	T3/T4比值降低	血液中血清三碘甲状腺原氨酸（T3）和甲状腺素(T4)的比值低于正常值。
HP:0012561	心血管系统异常	Unicuspid aortic valve	The presence of an `aortic valve` (FMA:7236) with one instead of the normal three cusps (flaps).	单瓣主动脉瓣	只有一个主动脉瓣，而不是正常的3个。
HP:0012562	骨骼系统异常	Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in hand	Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the hand, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.	手干骺端过早融合	手一块或多块长骨干骺端骺板的透明软骨板较正常年龄更早的停止生长，导致生长停滞和所涉及的骨的缩短。
HP:0012563	骨骼系统异常	Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in foot	Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the foot, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.	足干骺端过早融合	足一块或多块长骨干骺端骺板的透明软骨生长停比正常年龄早，导致生长停滞和所涉及的骨的缩短。
HP:0012564	骨骼系统异常	Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in tibia	Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the tibia, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.	胫骨干骺端过早融合	胫骨一块或多块长骨干骺端骺板的透明软骨生长停比正常年龄早，导致生长停滞和所涉及的骨的缩短。。
HP:0012565	骨骼系统异常	Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in fibula	Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the fibula, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.	腓骨干骺端过早融合	腓骨一块或多块长骨干骺端骺板的透明软骨生长停比正常年龄早，导致生长停滞和所涉及的骨的缩短。。
HP:0012566	骨骼系统异常	Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in radius	Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the radius, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.	桡骨干骺端过早融合	桡骨一块或多块长骨干骺端骺板的透明软骨生长停比正常年龄早，导致生长停滞和所涉及的骨的缩短。
HP:0012567	骨骼系统异常	Premature epimetaphyseal fusion in ulna	Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the ulna, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.	尺骨干骺端过早融合	尺骨一块或多块长骨干骺端骺板的透明软骨生长停比正常年龄早，导致生长停滞和所涉及的骨的缩短。。

HP:0012569	泌尿生殖系统异常,内分泌系统异常,生长异常	Delayed menarche	First period after the age of 15 years.	月经初潮延迟	15岁后才开始第一个月经周期。
HP:0012570	肿瘤	Synovial sarcoma	A type of mesenchymal tissue cell tumor that exhibits epithelial differentiation, which most frequently arises in the extremities.	滑膜肉瘤	一类间质细胞肿瘤，表现为上皮细胞分化，多出现在四肢。
HP:0012571	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ureter fissus	A partial duplication of the ureter such that the duplicated ureters fuse to a single ureter before their insertion into the bladder.	输尿管分叉	输尿管部分节段发生重复，进入膀胱前分开的输尿管又融合为单个输尿管。
HP:0012572	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ureter duplex	A complete duplication of the ureter such that the duplicated ureters with separate insertions into the bladder.	双重输尿管	输尿管完全是双份，具有独立通道进入膀胱。
HP:0012573	泌尿生殖系统异常	Global proximal tubulopathy	A type of proximal renal tubulopathy characterized by resorption defects leading to glycosuria, aminoaciduria, tubular proteinuria, renal hypophosphatemia, and urate tubular hyporeabsorption with bicarbonate loss and resulting acidosis.	全近端肾小管病	一种近端肾小管病，特点是重吸收缺陷，导致糖尿、氨基酸尿、肾小管性蛋白尿、肾性低磷血症、肾小管尿酸盐重吸收降低，致碳酸氢盐丢失和酸中毒。
HP:0012574	泌尿生殖系统异常	Mesangial proliferation	Increased numbers of mesangial cells per glomerulus.	肾小球系膜增生	每个肾小球的系膜细胞数量增加。
HP:0012575	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormality of the nephron	A structural anomaly of the `nephron` (FMA:17640).	肾单位异常	肾单位的结构异常。

HP:0012577	泌尿生殖系统异常	Thin glomerular basement membrane	Reduction in thickness of the basal lamina of the glomerulus of the kidney.	肾小球基底膜变薄	肾脏肾小球基底膜的厚度减少。
HP:0012578	泌尿生殖系统异常,免疫系统异常	Membranous nephropathy	A type of glomerulonephropathy characterized by thickening of the basement membrane and deposition of immune complexes in the subepithelial space.	膜性肾病	一种肾小球肾炎，特点是基底膜增厚和上皮下间隙免疫复合物沉积。
HP:0012579	泌尿生殖系统异常,免疫系统异常	Minimal change glomerulonephritis	The presence of minimal changes visible by light microscopy but flattened and fused podocyte foot processes on electron microscopy in a person with nephrotic range proteinuria.	微小病变性肾小球肾炎	在肾病性蛋白尿病人，光镜下可见微小改变，电子显微镜可见扁平状且融合的足细胞足突。
HP:0012580	泌尿生殖系统异常	Calcium phosphate nephrolithiasis	The presence of calcium- and phosphate-containing calculi (stones) in the kidneys.	磷酸钙肾结石	肾脏内存在含钙磷酸盐的结石。

HP:0012584	泌尿生殖系统异常	Bilateral renal hypoplasia	Two sided `hypoplasia` (MPATH:133) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	双侧肾发育不良	肾的双侧发育不良。
HP:0012585	泌尿生殖系统异常	Renal atrophy	`Atrophy` (MPATH:127) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	肾萎缩	肾的萎缩。

HP:0012588	泌尿生殖系统异常	Steroid-resistant nephrotic syndrome	A form of nephrotic syndrome that does not respond to treatment with steroid medication.	激素耐受性肾病综合征	一种肾病综合征，类固醇药物治疗无效。
