HP:0012615	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Cylindruria	The presence of renal casts (cylindrical structures produced by the kidney in certain disease states) in the urine.	管型尿	尿中存在管型（在某些疾病状态由肾脏产生的圆柱结构）。
HP:0012616	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Leukocyte cylindruria	Presence of leukocyte casts (cylindrical structures produced by the kidney in certain disease states) in the urine.	白细胞管型尿	尿液中存在白细胞管型（在某些肾脏疾病中产生的圆柱形结构）。
HP:0012617	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Erythrocyte cylindruria	Presence of erythrocyte casts (cylindrical structures produced by the kidney in certain disease states) in the urine.	红细胞管型尿	尿中存在红细胞管型（在某些肾脏疾病尿中所见的管形结构）。
HP:0012618	泌尿生殖系统异常	Urachal cyst	A cyst located along the allantois canal.	脐尿管囊肿	尿囊管部位发生的囊肿。
HP:0012619	泌尿生殖系统异常	Multiple bladder diverticula	Presence of a many `diverticula`  (sac or pouch) in the `wall of the urinary bladder` (FMA:15902).	多发性膀胱憩室症	膀胱壁存在多个憩室（囊或袋）。
HP:0012620	泌尿生殖系统异常,消化系统异常	Cloacal abnormality	A developmental anomaly associated with the failure of rectum, vagina, and bladder to separate.	泄殖腔畸形	一种发育异常，直肠、阴道和膀胱未能分离。
HP:0012621	泌尿生殖系统异常,消化系统异常	Persistent cloaca	Developmental anomaly in which the vagina, bladder, and rectum fuse resulting in a common channel.	泄殖腔遗存	一种发育异常，阴道、膀胱和直肠融合形成公共通道。
HP:0012622	泌尿生殖系统异常	Chronic kidney disease	Functional anomaly of the kidney persisting for at least three months.	慢性肾病	肾脏功能异常持续至少三个月。
HP:0012623	泌尿生殖系统异常	Stage 1 chronic kidney disease	A type of chronic kidney disease with normal or increased glomerular filtration rate (GFR at least 90 mL/min/1.73 m2).	慢性肾病1期	一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率（GFR）正常或增加（GFR至少达到90毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
HP:0012624	泌尿生殖系统异常	Stage 2 chronic kidney disease	A type of chronic kidney disease with mildly reduced glomerular filtration rate (GFR 60-89 mL/min/1.73 m2).	慢性肾病2期	一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率轻度减少（GFR降到 60-89毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
HP:0012625	泌尿生殖系统异常	Stage 3 chronic kidney disease	A type of chronic kidney disease with moderately reduced glomerular filtration rate (GFR 30-59 mL/min/1.73 m2).	慢性肾病3期	一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率中度减少（GFR降到 30-59毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
HP:0012626	泌尿生殖系统异常	Stage 4 chronic kidney disease	A type of chronic kidney disease with severely reduced glomerular filtration rate (GFR 15-29 mL/min/1.73 m2).	慢性肾病4期	一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率重度减少（GFR降到 15-29毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
HP:0012627	眼部异常	Pseudoexfoliation	Deposition of fibrillar material that can be found on all anterior segment structures bathed by aqueous humor.	假性剥脱	纤维状物质在任何浸泡在前房房水中的结构上发生沉积。
HP:0012628	眼部异常	Abnormality of the suspensory ligament of lens	An anomaly of the `suspensory ligament of lens` (FMA:58838), also known as the ciliary zonule. These ligaments represent a series of fibers connecting the ciliary body and lens of the eye, holding the lens in place.	晶状体悬韧带异常	晶状体悬韧带的异常（FMA:58838），晶状体悬韧带也被称为睫状小带。这些韧带是连接睫状体和晶状体的纤维，使晶状体维持在适当位置。
HP:0012629	眼部异常	Phacodonesis	Tremulousness (trembling) of the lens of the eye.	晶体摇动	眼睛晶状体的震颤（颤抖）。
HP:0012630	眼部异常	Abnormality of the trabecular meshwork	An anomaly of the trabecular meshwork, which is the porelike structure surrounding the entire circumference of the anterior chamber at the base of the cornea and near the ciliary body. The trabecular mesh work is responsible for draining the aqueous humor into the canal of Schlemm.	小梁网异常	小梁网异常。小梁网是前房周边部的角膜和睫状体间的网眼状结构，负责将房水排入Schlemm管。
HP:0012631	眼部异常	Pigment deposition in the trabecular meshwork	Accumulation of abnormal amounts of pigment within the trabecular meshwork.	小梁网色素沉积	小梁网内发生的异常色素沉积。
HP:0012632	眼部异常	Abnormal intraocular pressure	An anomaly in the amount of force per unit area exerted by the intraocular fluid within the eye.	眼内压异常	眼内压的异常。眼内压是指眼内流体向单位面积施加的力的大小。
HP:0012633	眼部异常	Asymmetry of intraocular pressure	A difference in the amount of intraocular pressure in the right and left eye.	眼压不对称	右眼和左眼的眼内压不同。
HP:0012634	眼部异常	Iris pigment dispersion	Shedding of the pigment granules that normally adhere to the back of the iris into the aqueous humor.	虹膜色素播散	正常情况下粘附在虹膜后侧的色素颗粒脱落进入房水。
HP:0012635	心血管系统异常,眼部异常	Iris hypoperfusion	Reduction in the amount of blood flow to the iris.	虹膜灌注不足	减少虹膜的血流量。
HP:0012636	心血管系统异常,眼部异常	Retinal vein occlusion	Blockage of the retinal vein.	视网膜静脉阻塞	阻塞的视网膜静脉。
HP:0012637	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Renal calcium wasting	High urine calcium in the presence of hypocalcemia.	肾源性钙流失	尿液钙浓度高，发生低钙血症。
HP:0012638	神经系统异常	Abnormality of nervous system physiology	A functional anomaly of the `nervous system` (FMA:7157).	神经系统生理功能异常	在`神经系统`的功能异常（FMA:7157）。
HP:0012639	神经系统异常	Abnormality of nervous system morphology	A structural anomaly of the `nervous system` (FMA:7157).	神经系统形态异常	在`神经系统`（FMA:7157）的结构异常。
HP:0012640	神经系统异常	Abnormality of intracranial pressure	A deviation from the norm of the intracranial pressure.	颅内压异常	从颅内压偏离正常颅内压范围。
HP:0012641	神经系统异常	Decreased intracranial pressure	A reduction of the pressure inside the cranium (skull) and thereby in the brain tissue and cerebrospinal fluid.	颅内压降低	颅骨（头盖骨）内的压力下降，并由此，脑组织和脑脊髓液的压力减少。
HP:0012642	神经系统异常	Cerebellar agenesis	Lack of development of the cerebellum.	小脑发育不全	小脑发育不成熟。
HP:0012643	眼部异常	Foveal hypopigmentation	Decreased amount of pigmentation in the `fovea centralis` (FMA:58658).	黄斑色素减退	黄斑中心凹（FMA:58658）的色素减少。
HP:0012644	神经系统异常	Increased caudate lactate level	An elevated concentration of lactate in the caudate nucleus. This finding can be elicited by magnetic resonance spectroscopy imaging.	尾状核乳酸水平升高	尾状核乳酸的浓度升高。可通过磁共振波谱成像发现这一点。
HP:0012645	神经系统异常	Enlarged peripheral nerve	Increase in size of a peripheral nerve. This finding can be appreciated by palpation along the axis of the nerve.	周围神经增粗	周围神经大小增加。可以沿神经轴线触诊发现。
HP:0012646	泌尿生殖系统异常	Retractile testis	A testis that is located at the upper scrotum or lower inguinal canal and that can be made to descend completely into the scrotum without resistance by manual reduction but returns to its original position by the cremasteric reflex.	睾丸回缩	睾丸位于阴囊上部或腹股沟管下部，通过手法可以无阻力地将其完全回纳入阴囊内，但通过提睾反射又返回到原来位置。
HP:0012647	免疫系统异常	Abnormal inflammatory response	Any anomaly of the `inflammatory response` (GO:0006954), a response to injury or infection characterized by local vasodilation, extravasation of plasma into intercellular spaces and accumulation of white blood cells and macrophages.	异常炎性反应	任何`炎症反应`（GO:0006954）的异常。炎症反应指损伤或感染后引起局部血管扩张，血浆外渗进入细胞间隙，以及白血细胞和巨噬细胞积聚的反应。
HP:0012648	免疫系统异常	Decreased inflammatory response	An abnormal reduction in the `inflammatory response` (GO:0006954) to injury or infection.	炎症反应减弱	损伤或感染引起的`炎症反应异常减少（GO:0006954）。
HP:0012649	免疫系统异常	Increased inflammatory response	A abnormal increase in the `inflammatory response` (GO:0006954) to injury or infection.	炎症反应增强	损伤或感染后`炎症反应`异常升高（GO:0006954）。
HP:0012650	神经系统异常	Perisylvian polymicrogyria	An excessive number of small gyri (convolutions) on the surface of the brain in the region surrounding the sylvian fissures.	外侧裂周区多小脑回	大脑外侧裂附近的皮层出现过多数量小脑回。
HP:0012651	神经系统异常	Abasia	A severe form of gait ataxia such that an affected person cannot walk at all.	行走不稳	明显的步态共济失调，导致受累者无法行走。
HP:0012652	呼吸系统异常,免疫系统异常	Exercise-induced asthma	Asthma attacks following exercise.	运动诱发的哮喘	运动后的哮喘发作。
HP:0012653	呼吸系统异常,免疫系统异常	Status Asthmaticus	Severe asthma unresponsive to repeated courses of beta-agonist therapy such as inhaled albuterol, levalbuterol, or subcutaneous epinephrine.	哮喘持续状态	严重的哮喘，对反复β-受体激动剂治疗，如吸入沙丁胺醇，左旋沙丁胺醇，或皮下注射肾上腺素无反应。
HP:0012654	神经系统异常	Abnormal CSF dopamine level	Abnormal concentration of `dopamine` (CHEBI:18243) in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).	脑脊液多巴胺水平异常	脑脊液（CSF）中`多巴胺`（CHEBI:18243）浓度异常。
HP:0012655	神经系统异常	Elevated CSF dopamine level	Increased concentration of `dopamine` (CHEBI:18243) in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).	脑脊液多巴胺水平增加	脑脊液（CSF）中的`多巴胺`（CHEBI:18243）浓度增加。
HP:0012656	神经系统异常	Reduced CSF dopamine level	Decreased concentration of `dopamine` (CHEBI:18243) in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).	脑脊液多巴胺水平降低	脑脊液中多巴胺浓度的下降。
HP:0012657	神经系统异常	Abnormal brain positron emission tomography	A functional brain anomaly detectable by positron emission tomography (PET). PET scanning is a method for functional brain imaging, and its measurements reflect the amount of brain activity in the various regions of the brain.	脑部正电子发射断层扫描异常	通过正电子发射断层扫描（PET）检测的脑功能性异常。 PET扫描为脑功能成像的方法，其测量结果反映在大脑的不同区域的大脑活跃程度。
HP:0012658	神经系统异常	Abnormal brain FDG positron emission tomography	An anomaly detectable in [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose (FDG) positron emission tomography (PET) brain scans. Glucose uptake measured with FDG-PET is a marker of neuronal metabolic activity.	脑FDG正电子发射断层扫描异常	[18F]氟脱氧葡萄糖正电子发射断层（PET）脑部扫描。通过检测葡萄糖摄取反映神经代谢活性。
HP:0012659	神经系统异常	Prefrontal hypometabolism in FDG PET	Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the prefrontal cortex as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.	FDG PET前额叶代谢减少	如通过正电子发射断层扫描（PET）脑部扫描测定减少[18 F] –脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）在前额皮质的摄取。
HP:0012660	神经系统异常	Thalamic hypometabolism in FDG PET	Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the thalamus as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.	FDG PET丘脑代谢减退	正电子发射断层扫描（PET）脑部扫描中丘脑[18 F]--脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）摄取减低。
HP:0012661	神经系统异常	Hypothalamic hypometabolism in FDG PET	Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the hypothalamus as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.	FDG PET下丘脑代谢减退	氟18标记脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）的正电子发射断层扫描（PET）显示下丘脑的摄取减低。
HP:0012662	神经系统异常	Parietal hypometabolism in FDG PET	Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the parietal cortex as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.	FDG PET顶叶代谢减退	如通过正电子发射断层扫描（PET）脑部扫描测定减少[18 F] -脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）在顶叶皮质摄取。
HP:0012663	心血管系统异常	Mildly reduced ejection fraction	A small reduction in the fraction of blood pumped from the left ventricle with each cardiac cycle. The normal range in adults is at least 55 percent, and a mild reduction is defined as 45-54 percent.	射血分数轻度降低	每个心动周期血液从左心室泵送分数轻微的降低。正常成人范围至少55％，轻微减少在45-54％左右。
HP:0012664	心血管系统异常	Reduced ejection fraction	A diminution of the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of the ventricle with each cardiac cycle.	射血分数降低	心室在每个心动周期内的射血体积分数的缩减。
HP:0012665	心血管系统异常	Moderately reduced ejection fraction	A medium reduction in the fraction of blood pumped from the left ventricle with each cardiac cycle. The normal range in adults is at least 55 percent, and a moderate reduction is defined as 30-44 percent.	射血分数中度降低	每个心动周期从左心室泵送的血液分数中度降低。正常成人范围为至少55％，中度减少定义为30-44％左右。
HP:0012666	心血管系统异常	Severely reduced ejection fraction	A large reduction in the fraction of blood pumped from the left ventricle with each cardiac cycle. The normal range in adults is at least 55 percent, and a moderate reduction is defined as less than 30 percent.	射血分数严重降低	在每个心动周期从左心室泵送的血液的分数大大减少。正常范围的成人为至少55％，射血分数减少被定义为不到30％。
HP:0012667	心血管系统异常	Regional left ventricular wall motion abnormality	An abnormal motion of a segment of the left ventricle during the cardiac cycle.	区域性左室壁运动异常	部分左心室在心动周期中的异常运动。
HP:0012668	心血管系统异常	Vasovagal syncope	Loss of consciousness due to a reduction in blood pressure that is associated with an increase in vagal tone and peripheral vasodilation.	血管迷走神经性晕厥	由于血压降低伴随的迷走神经张力和周围血管扩张增加从而导致的意识丧失。
HP:0012669	心血管系统异常	Carotid sinus syncope	An exaggerated response to carotid sinus baroreceptor stimulation resulting in syncope from transient diminished cerebral perfusion.	颈动脉窦性晕厥	对颈动脉窦压力感受器的过度反应，导致脑灌注暂时减少，引起晕厥。
HP:0012670	心血管系统异常	Orthostatic syncope	Syncope following a quick change in position from lying down to standing.	直立性晕厥	从躺着到站起，突然的体位变化引起的晕厥。
HP:0012671	神经系统异常	Abulia	Poverty of behavior and speech output, lack of initiative, loss of emotional responses, psychomotor slowing, and prolonged speech latency.	意志力丧失	行为和语音输出贫乏，缺乏主动性，情绪反应减退，精神运动迟缓，和语言反应延迟。
HP:0012672	神经系统异常	Akinetic mutism	Akinetic mutism is essentially characterized by a total absence of spontaneous behavior and speech occurring in the presence of preserved visual tracking.	运动不能缄默症	运动不能性缄默症本质特点是在保存视觉跟踪能力的情况下完全缺乏自发的行为和言论。
HP:0012673	泌尿生殖系统异常	aplasia of the upper vagina	A failure to develop of the upper vagina.	阴道上段发育不全	阴道上段未能发育。
HP:0012674	泌尿生殖系统异常	aplasia of the lower vagina	A failure to develop of the lower part of the vagina.	阴道下段发育不全	阴道的下部未能发育。
HP:0012675	神经系统异常	Iron accumulation in brain	An abnormal build up of iron (Fe) in brain tissue.	脑内铁累积	脑组织铁（Fe）的异常聚积。
HP:0012676	神经系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Copper accumulation in brain	An anomalous build up of copper (Cu) in the `brain` (FMA:50801).	大脑铜积聚	大脑（FMA:50801）内铜（Cu）的异常积聚。
HP:0012677	神经系统异常	Iron accumulation in globus pallidus	An abnormal build up of iron (Fe) in the `globus pallidus` (FMA:61835).	苍白球铁累积	苍白球（FMA:61835）的铁异常聚积。
HP:0012678	神经系统异常	Iron accumulation in substantia nigra	An anomalous build up of iron (Fe) in the `substantia nigra` (FMA:67947).	黑质铁累积	黑质（FMA:67947）的铁异常聚积。
HP:0012679	骨骼系统异常	Widened interpedicular distance	An increase in the distance between vertebral pedicles, which are the two short, thick processes, which project backward, one on either side, from the upper part of the vertebral body, at the junction of its posterior and lateral surfaces.	椎弓根间距扩大	椎弓根之间距离增大，椎弓根是椎体上部从两边向后的两个短而厚的突起，在后侧面联合。
HP:0012680	内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of the pineal gland	An anomaly of the "pineal gland" (FMA:62033),a small endocrine gland in the brain that produces melatonin.	松果体异常	松果体异常, 松果体是大脑中产生褪黑素的一个小的内分泌腺。
HP:0012681	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of pineal morphology	A structural abnormality of the `pineal gland` (FMA:62033).	松果体形态异常	松果体结构异常。
HP:0012682	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Pineal gland calcification	Accumulation of calcium salts in the `pineal gland` (FMA:62033).	松果体钙化	松果体中钙盐积累
HP:0012683	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Pineal cyst	A glial uniloculated or multiloculated fluid-filled sac that either reside within or completely replace the pineal gland.	松果体囊肿	胶质的单一隔室或多个隔室的充满液体的囊肿，位于松果体内，或完全替换了松果体。
HP:0012684	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Abnormal pineal volume	An abnormal increase or decrease in the quantity of three-dimensional space taken up by the pineal gland.	松果体体积异常	松果体占据的三维空间的异常增加或减少。
HP:0012685	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Decreased pineal volume	An abnormal reduction in the quantity of three-dimensional space taken up by the pineal gland.	松果体体积减小	松果体占用的三维空间异常减少
HP:0012686	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Increased pineal volume	An abnormal elevation in the quantity of three-dimensional space taken up by the pineal gland.	松果体体积增加	松果体所占据的三维空间出现异常增加。
HP:0012687	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Agenesis of pineal gland	Failure to develop of the pineal gland, defined clinically as the absence of the pineal gland with no indication of the pineal gland even having been present.	松果体发育缺失	松果体发育缺失，临床上定义为没有松果体, 没有迹象显示曾经有过松果体。
HP:0012688	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of pineal physiology	A functional abnormality of the `pineal gland` (FMA:62033).	松果体生理异常	松果体功能异常。
HP:0012689	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Abnormal pineal melatonin secretion	An anomaly in the amount or timing of melatonin secretion by the pineal gland. Note that melatonin is also synthesized by multiple tissues outside of the pineal gland.	松果体褪黑素分泌异常	松果体分泌的褪黑素的数量或时机的异常。注意，褪黑素也由除松果体外的多个组织合成。
HP:0012690	神经系统异常	T2 hypointense thalamus	A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a diffuse hypointensity affecting the entire thalamus.	T2低信号丘脑	丘脑在磁共振成像（MRI）上T2信号比预期暗。这个术语是指一个影响整个丘脑的漫低信号。
HP:0012691	神经系统异常	Focal T2 hypointense thalamic lesion	A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a localized hypointensity affecting a particular region of the thalamus.	丘脑局灶性T2低信号病变	在MRI T2加权像上，丘脑存在的比通常更低的信号。这个术语指丘脑特定区域的局部低信号。
HP:0012692	神经系统异常	Focal T2 hyperintense thalamic lesion	A lighter than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a localized hyperintensity affecting a particular region of the thalamus.	丘脑局灶性T2高信号病变	在MRI T2加权像上，丘脑存在的比通常更亮的信号。这个术语指丘脑特定区域的局部高信号。
HP:0012693	神经系统异常	Abnormal thalamic size	Deviation from the normal range of size of the `thalamus` (FMA:62007).	丘脑大小异常	`丘脑`（FMA:62007）的大小的偏离正常范围内。
HP:0012694	神经系统异常	Enlarged thalamic volume	An increase in the quantity of space occupied by the `thalamus` (FMA:62007).	丘脑体积增大	`丘脑` (FMA:62007)体积增大。
HP:0012695	神经系统异常	Decreased thalamic volume	A reduction in the quantity of space occupied by the `thalamus` (FMA:62007).	丘脑体积减少	丘脑（FMA:62007）占据的空间体积的减少。
HP:0012696	神经系统异常	Abnormal thalamic MRI signal intensity	A deviation from normal signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus.	丘脑核磁共振信号强度异常	磁共振成像（MRI）上丘脑的信号偏离正常值。
HP:0012697	神经系统异常	Small basal ganglia	Decreased size of the `basal ganglia` (FMA:84013).	小基底神经节	基底神经节体积减小（FMA:84013）。

HP:0012783	泌尿生殖系统异常	Intralobar nephrogenic rest	A type of nephrogenic rest usually representing single lesions within the renal lobe, renal sinus, or calyceal walls.	肾小叶内型肾残余	一种肾源性肾残余类型，通常属于肾叶、肾窦或肾盏壁内的单发病灶。

HP:0012796	眼部异常	Increased cup-to-disc ratio	An elevation in the ratio of the diameter of the cup of the optic disc to the total diameter of the disc. The optic disc has an orange-pink rim with a pale centre (the cup) that does not contain neuroretinal tissue. An increase in this ratio therefoy may indicate a decrease in the quantity of healthy neuroretinal cells.	杯盘比大	杯盘比升高。视盘具有橙粉色轮缘与浅中心（杯）不包含视神经视网膜组织。在这个比率增加表明健康的神经节细胞数量的减少。

HP:0012798	肿瘤,心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常,免疫系统异常	Pulmonary lymphangiomyomatosis	Infiltration of smooth muscle-like cells in lymph vessels as well as the lung (pleura, alveolar septa, bronchi, pulmonary vessels and lymphatics as well as lymph nodes, especially in posterior mediastinum and retroperitoneum). Focal emphysema can develop because of airway narrowing, and the thoracic duct may be obliterated.	肺淋巴管肌瘤病	平滑肌细胞样细胞在淋巴管以及肺部（胸膜，肺泡隔，支气管，肺血管和淋巴管，以及淋巴结，特别是在后纵隔和腹腔后膜）浸润。局灶性肺气肿可能由于气道狭窄而不断增生，甚至胸导管可能会被擦掉。

HP:0012801	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Narrow jaw	Bigonial distance (lower facial width) more than 2 standard deviations below the mean (objective); or an apparently decreased width of the lower jaw (mandible) when viewed from the front (subjective).	下颌狭窄	下颌角间距离（脸下部宽度）低于平均值超过2个标准差（客观）;或下颌的宽度从正面看显的小（主观）。

HP:0012823	临床调节因素	Clinical modifier	This subontology is designed to provide terms to characterize and specify the phenotypic abnormalities defined in the Phenotypic abnormality subontology, with respect to severity, laterality, age of onset, and other aspects.	临床调节因素	#####
HP:0012824	临床调节因素	Severity	The intensity or degree of a manifestation.	严重程度	#####
HP:0012825	临床调节因素	Mild	Having a relatively minor degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between two and three standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	轻度	#####
HP:0012826	临床调节因素	Moderate	Having a medium degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between three and four standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	中度	#####
HP:0012827	临床调节因素	Borderline	Having a minor degree of severity that is considered to be on the boundary between the normal and the abnormal ranges. For quantitative traits, a deviation of that is less than two standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	正常范围分界限	#####
HP:0012828	临床调节因素	Severe	Having a high degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between four and five standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	重度	#####
HP:0012829	临床调节因素	Profound	Having an extremely high degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of more than five standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	非常严重	#####
HP:0012830	临床调节因素	Position	The anatomical localization of the specified phenotypic abnormality.	位置	#####
HP:0012831	临床调节因素	Laterality	The localization with respect to the side of the body of the specified phenotypic abnormality.	偏侧性	#####
HP:0012832	临床调节因素	Bilateral	Being present on both sides of the body.	双侧	#####
HP:0012833	临床调节因素	Unilateral	Being present on only the left or only the right side of the body.	单侧	#####
HP:0012834	临床调节因素	Right	Being located on the right side of the body.	右侧	#####
HP:0012835	临床调节因素	Left	Being located on the left side of the body.	左侧	#####
HP:0012836	临床调节因素	Spatial pattern	The pattern by which a phenotype affects one or more regions of the body.	疾病表现的肢体分部	#####
HP:0012837	临床调节因素	Generalized	Affecting all regions without specificity of distribution.	全身性	#####
HP:0012838	临床调节因素	Localized	Being confined or restricted to a particular location.	局部性	#####
HP:0012839	临床调节因素	Distal	Localized away from the central point of the body.	远端	#####
HP:0012840	临床调节因素	Proximal	Localized close to the central point of the body.	近端	#####

HP:0012848	消化系统异常	Small intestinal stenosis	The narrowing or partial blockage of a portion of the small intestine.	小肠狭窄	小肠的一部分变窄或部分堵塞。

HP:0012869	泌尿生殖系统异常	Acephalic spermatozoa	Spermatozoa with very small cranial ends devoid of any nuclear material, that is, lacking a typical sperm head.	无头精子	精子缺乏典型的头部结构，只有非常小的头部、没有任何核酸物质。
HP:0012870	泌尿生殖系统异常	Vanishing testis	A condition which is considered to be due to the subsequent atrophy and disappearance in fetal life of an initially normal testis. In the presence of spermatic cord structures is evidence of the presence of the testis in early intrauterine life. When associated with a blind-ending spermatic cord, this entity is named as his absence of a testis in an otherwise normal 46,XY male is usually unilateral and is assumed to be a consequence of intrauterine or perinatal torsion or infarction.	睾丸消失	胎儿期起初正常的睾丸而在期发生萎缩而消失的一种病况。存在精索结构是胎儿早期睾丸存在的证据。当存在盲端精索时，表明这个46,XY男性发生了睾丸缺失，而其他方面都正常。睾丸消失一般为单侧，估计是宫内或围产期发生了扭转或梗塞的结果。
HP:0012871	泌尿生殖系统异常	Varicocele	A varicocele is a widening of the veins along the spermatic cord, leading to enlarged, twisted veins in the scrotum, and manifested clinically by a painless testicle lump, scrotal swelling, or bulge in the scrotum.	精索静脉曲张	精索静脉曲张是沿精索发生静脉扩张，导致阴囊内静脉增大、扭曲，临床表现为睾丸无痛性肿块、阴囊肿胀或阴囊内有凸出物。
HP:0012872	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormal vas deferens morphology	A structural anomaly of the secretory duct of the testicle that carries spermatozoa from the epididymis to the prostatic urethra where it terminates to form ejaculatory duct.	输精管形态异常	睾丸分泌导管的结构异常，输精管将精子从附睾运送到储精囊，储精囊是输精管在前列腺尿道处形成的射精管道。
HP:0012873	泌尿生殖系统异常	Absent vas deferens	Aplasia (congenital absence) of the vas deferens.	输精管缺如	输精管发育不全（先天性缺如）。

MEPs are measured following single-pulse or repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation and can be used for the assessment of the excitability of the motor cortex and the integrity of conduction along the central and peripheral motor pathways.	运动诱发电位异常	一种由运动诱发电位（MEPs）发现的的异常。 MEP通过单脉冲或经颅重复磁刺激进行检测，可用于评估运动皮层的兴奋性，以及中枢和外周运动传导通路的完整性。

HP:0020038	心血管系统异常	Vertebrobasilar dolichoectasia	Elongation, dilatation, and/or tortuosity of the vertebrobasilar segment. The definition of VBD includes: (i) diameter of basilar or vertebral artery over 4.5 mm; or (ii) deviation of any portion more than 10 mm from the shortest expected course; and (iii) length of basilar artery over 29.5 mm or length of intracranial vertebral artery over 23.5 mm.	椎基底动脉扩张延长症	基底动脉的异常迂曲、扩张和延长：VBD的定义包括：（1）基底动脉直径≥4.5 mm；（2）椎动脉任意一支偏离超过椎动脉颅内入口到基底动脉起始点之间连线 超过10 mm； （3）基底动脉长度＞29.5 mm，椎动脉颅内段长度＞23.5 mm。

HP:0025020	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated prostate-specific antigen level	An increased concentration of prostate specific antigen (PSA) in the circulation.	前列腺特异抗原水平升高	#####
HP:0025021	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal erythrocyte sedimentation rate	A deviation from normal range of the erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR), a test that measures the distance that erythrocytes have fallen after one hour in a vertical column of anticoagulated blood under the influence of gravity. The ESR is a nonspecific finding. An elevation may indicate inflammation or may be caused by any condition that elevates fibrinogen. A decreased ESR may be seen in polycythemia or in certain blood diseases in which red blood cells have an irregular or smaller shape that causes slower settling.	红细胞沉降率异常	#####
HP:0025022	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased erythrocyte sedimentation rate	A reduced erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR). The ESR is a test that measures the distance that erythrocytes have fallen after one hour in a vertical column of anticoagulated blood under the influence of gravity. The ESR is a nonspecific finding. A decreased ESR may be seen in polycythemia or in certain blood diseases in which red blood cells have an irregular or smaller shape that causes slower settling.	红细胞沉降率下降	#####
HP:0025023	消化系统异常	Rectal atresia	A developmental defect resulting in complete obliteration of the lumen of the rectum. That is, there is an abnormal closure, or atresia of the tubular structure of the rectum.	直肠闭锁	导致直肠腔完全闭塞的发育缺陷。即，直肠管状结构存在异常闭合，或闭锁。

HP:0025026	泌尿生殖系统异常,消化系统异常	H-type rectovestibular fistula	Rectovestibular fistula with a normal anus is known as H-type fistula or double termination of the alimentary tract.	H型直肠前庭瘘	直肠前庭瘘伴正常肛门，被称为H型瘘管或消化道双重末端。
HP:0025027	体壁的异常	Osteoma cutis	The term osteoma refers to the anomalous presence of ossification (bone formation) in the interior of the dermis or epidermis. The dermal or subcutaneous bone formation presents as stony hard nodules. The osteomata appear as irregular, hardened small nodules that are well circumscribed and generally of the same color as the skin.	皮肤骨瘤	皮肤骨瘤是指在表皮和真皮内部异常出现的骨化(骨形成)，真皮或皮下骨形成主要表现为石样硬结 。骨瘤是不规则的硬化小结节，通常界限较清，与皮肤颜色一致。
HP:0025028	神经系统异常,消化系统异常	Abnormality of enteric nervous system morphology	A structural anomaly of nerves of the enteric nervous system.	肠神经系统形态异常	肠神经系统形态的异常。
HP:0025029	神经系统异常,消化系统异常	Abnormality of enteric neuron morphology	#####	肠神经元形态异常	#####
HP:0025030	神经系统异常,消化系统异常	Enteric neuronal degeneration	Deterioration of enteric neurons with impairment of enteric neuronal structure. Typical neuropathological findings include qualitative (e.g., neuronal swelling, intranuclear inclusions, axonal degeneration) and quantitative (e.g., reduction in the number of neurons) abnormalities of the enteric neurons.	肠神经元变性	肠神经元退变伴肠神经元结构异常。典型的神经病理所见包括肠神经元的质（如神经元水肿、细胞核内包涵体、轴突退变）和量（如神经元数量减少）的异常。

HP:0025033	消化系统异常	Abnormality of digestive system morphology	#####	消化系统形态异常	#####

HP:0025035	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal proerythroblast morphology	Anomalous form of the proerythroblast, i.e., the immature, nucleated erythrocyte occupying the stage of erythropoeisis that follows formation of erythroid progenitor cells. This cell is CD71-positive, has both a nucleus and a nucleolus, and lacks hematopoeitic lineage markers.	原红细胞形态异常	成红细胞的异常形式，即在红细胞形成过程中在红系祖细胞形成之后的不成熟、有核的红细胞。该细胞是CD71阳性的，具有核和核仁，并且缺乏造血谱系标记。

HP:0025038	泌尿生殖系统异常	Intratesticular abscess	A collection of pus within a testicle. Ultrasonographic features include shaggy, irregular walls, intratesticular location, low-level internal echoes, and occasionally, hypervascular margins.	睾丸内脓肿	睾丸内的脓肿。超声特征表现为位于睾丸内的低回声影，脓肿外壁呈粗糙的、不规则状，脓肿边缘偶尔可见的丰富血管影像。

HP:0025070	心血管系统异常	Abnormal U wave	An anomaly of the U wave of the electrocardiogram (EKG). The U wave is a small (0.5 mm) deflection immediately following the T wave, usually in the same direction as the T wave. It is best seen in leads V2 and V3.	异常U波	心电图中出现的异常的U波，U波是紧跟在T波之后的一个小的峰（0.5mm），通常与T波方向相同。在V2和V3导联中较为明显
HP:0025071	心血管系统异常	U wave inversion	['Direction of the U wave opposite to the T wave (i.e., below baseline) in leads with upright T waves.']	U 波倒置	当U波与直立T波方向相反时，称U波倒置，多见于Ⅰ、Ⅱ、aVL和V4～V6导联

HP:0025075	心血管系统异常	Increased QRS voltage	['Elevation of the voltage (height) of the QRS complex. HP:0025081	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	Darier's sign	A skin change elicited by briskly rubbing the skin lesion in urticaria pigmentosa (UP), whereby the area begins to itch and becomes raised and surrounded by erythema. Unlike other forms of dermatographism, Darier's sign refers to urtication that is limited to the UP involved areas and, as in this case, spares the skin unaffected by UP.	Darier征	快速摩擦色素性荨麻疹（UP）皮肤导致局部瘙痒及红肿，不同于皮肤划痕症，Darier征的刺痒局限于色素性荨麻疹皮肤区域。
HP:0025082	体壁的异常	Abnormal cutaneous elastic fiber morphology	Any structural anomaly of the elastic fibers of the skin. Elastic fibers are the essential extracellular matrix macromolecules comprising an elastin core surrounded by a mantle of fibrillin-rich microfibrils.	皮肤弹性纤维形态异常	包含任何皮肤弹性纤维的结构异常。 弹性纤维是包含弹性蛋白的基本细胞外基质大分子，外面包围着纤丝蛋白微原纤维。

HP:0025103	体壁的异常	Umbilicated nodule	A type of skin nodule that has a small depression that resembles a navel (i.e., is umbilicated).	脐状结界	一种有一个小形的凹陷类似于肚脐的皮肤结节。
HP:0025104	体壁的异常	Capillary malformation	A capillary malformation is a flat, sharply defined vascular stain of the skin. It may cover a large surface area or it may be scattered and appear as little islands of color. In a cpillary maformation, the predominant vessels are small, slow-flow vessels (i.e., arterioles and postcapillary venules).	毛细血管畸形	毛细血管畸形局部扁平，由于血管性着色，边界清晰。可能覆盖大的表面区域，也可能分散成着色的小岛状。毛细血管畸形中，小而流速缓慢的血管（即小动脉和毛细血管后微静脉）是优势血管。
HP:0025105	体壁的异常	Nevus anemicus	A congenital skin lesion characterized by irregular hypopigmented macules that coalesce to form plaques and occur particularly on the chest. It is generally present at birth or develops in the first days of life. It is more common in females. Diagnosis is confirmed by applying gentle friction to the lesion and the surrounding skin and checking that the erythema produced in the healthy skin does not appear in the hypopigmented lesion. This pale macule becomes more conspicuous when the lesion and its surroundings are rubbed. The margin of the naevus is ill-defined and consists of an archipelago of small anaemic spots/	贫血痣	先天性皮肤病变，以不规则色素减退性斑块为特征，聚集形成斑块，好发于胸部。 它通常在出生后或不久发生，女性更常见。 该病的诊断是通过对病变部位和周围皮肤施加轻微摩擦并检查健康皮肤中产生的红斑不出现在色素减退病变中来证实。 当在病变及其周围部位磨擦时，苍白的斑点变得更加明显。 痣的边缘不清晰，由小型贫血斑点群组成
HP:0025106	体壁的异常	Nevus roseus	A variant of port-wine stain characterized by a pale red or even pink tone, in contrast to the darker hue of the port-wine stain. By analogy with the term port-wine stain, this variant rose-wine stain, or nevus roseus. Nevus roseus, however, cannot be definitely diagnosed until adulthood as port-wine stains are sometimes pink in children. While the natural history of port-wine stains includes hypertrophy, darkening, and nodularity, nevus roseus remains unchanged for life.	玫瑰痣	与葡萄酒色斑的深色色相对比，以淡红色或甚至粉红色为特征的葡萄酒色斑的变体。 通过类似术语葡萄酒色斑，这种变体玫瑰酒色斑或玫瑰痣。 然而玫瑰痣直到成年后才能确诊，因为葡萄酒色斑在儿童时期有时会变成粉红色。 虽然葡萄酒色斑的自然进程包括肥厚，变黑和结节，但玫瑰痣始终保持不变。
HP:0025107	体壁的异常	Cutis marmorata telangiectatica congenita	A congenital vascular malformation that presents as localized or generalized erythematous-telangiectatic lesions with a reticular pattern; the lesions are almost always present at birth or develop in the first days of life. Cutis marmorata telangiectatica congenita (CMTC) appears as marble-like pattern (mottling) on the surface of the skin. In contrast to cutis marmorata, the marbling is more severe and always visible.	先天性毛细血管扩张性大理石样皮肤	先天性血管畸形，表现为局限性或全身性红斑 - 毛细血管扩张性病变伴网状模式; 这些病变几乎总是在出生时出现，或者在出生后第一天发生。 先天性毛细血管扩张性大理石样皮肤（CMTC）在皮肤表面上表现为大理石状图案（斑点）。 与大理石样皮肤相比，大理石纹更加严重并且始终可见。
HP:0025108	体壁的异常	Angioma serpentinum	Angioma serpiginosum consists of punctate, tightly packed telangiectatic lesions. Characteristic histopathological features are dilated and tortuous capillaries involving the uppermost part of the dermis.	蛇纹石血管瘤	蛇纹石血管瘤由点状，紧密堆积的毛细血管扩张性病变组成。 特征性组织病理学特征是包含真皮最上部分的扩张和弯曲的毛细血管。
HP:0025109	血液和造血组织异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Reduced red cell pyruvate kinase activity	Decrease in the activity of pyruvate kinase (PK) within erythrocytes. PK catalyzes the reaction: ATP + pyruvate = ADP + phosphoenolpyruvate.	红细胞丙酮酸激酶活性降低	红细胞丙酮酸激酶（PK）活性降低。丙酮酸激酶参与下列催化反应：ATP + 丙酮酸 = ADP + 磷酸烯醇式丙酮酸。
HP:0025110	眼部异常	Placoid macular lesion	['Yellow/white, sharply delineated lesion, typically of inflammatory nature, involving the macula.']	鳞状黄斑病变	通常是涉及黄斑区的炎性病变，病变区呈黄色或白色，界限明显。
HP:0025112	神经系统异常	Sound sensitivity	['Decreased tolerance to sound.']	声敏感	对声音的容受度降低
HP:0025113	神经系统异常	Misophonia	['An adverse response (dislike) to sound no matter what volume the sound is, characterized by a strong negative reaction to soft sounds that can sometimes be further triggered by seeing the source of the offending sound.']	恐音症	对无论任何音量的声音感到厌恶。表现为对于轻微声音的强烈负面反应，有时因看到声音来源而进一步触发。
HP:0025114	体壁的异常	Hypergranulosis	['Hypergranulosis is an increased thickness of the stratum granulosum.']	颗粒层增厚	颗粒层增厚是表皮的颗粒细胞层增厚
HP:0025115	体壁的异常	Civatte bodies	Eosinophilic hyaline ovoid bodies which are often found in the subepidermal papillary regions or sometimes in the epidermis. Civatte bodies (CBs) are seen as rounded, homogenous, eosinophilic masses on routine H and E staining lying in the deeper parts of epidermis/epithelium and more frequently in dermis/connective tissue. They are known as CBs (in epithelium/epidermis), colloid bodies, or hyaline bodies (in connective tissue). They are 10-25 micrometers in diameter and situated mostly within or above the inflammatory cell infiltrate. In lichen planus, the number of necrotic keratinocytes may be so large that they are seen lying in clusters in the uppermost dermis. These bodies show a positive periodic acid Schiff reaction and are diastase resistant	胶样小体	嗜酸性透明的卵形体通常位于表皮下乳头区域或表皮中。 在常规H和E染色中，Civatte小体（CB）呈圆形，均匀状，嗜酸性的团块，位于表皮/上皮的较深部分，更常见于真皮/结缔组织。 它们被称为CBs（上皮/表皮中），胶体或透明体（结缔组织中）。 其直径为10-25微米，并且主要位于炎性细胞浸润物之内或之上。 在扁平苔藓中，坏死性角质形成细胞非常多，呈簇状排列于真皮层上。 这些小体过碘酸席夫反应及抗淀粉酶的呈阳性。
HP:0025116	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Fetal distress	['An intrauterine state characterized by suboptimal values in the fetal heart rate, oxygenation of fetal blood, or other parameters indicative of compromise of the fetus. Signs of fetal distress include repetitive variable decelerations, fetal tachycardia or bradycardia, late decelerations, or low biophysical profile.']	胎儿窘迫	以胎儿心率、血液氧合或其他胎儿指标性参数未达最优值为特征的一种胎儿宫内状态。胎儿窘迫的表现包括胎儿反复可变性心率减慢，胎儿心动过速或心动过缓，晚期减速或胎儿生物物理评分低。
HP:0025117	体壁的异常	Rete ridge flattening	Ret pegs (or ridges) are the epithelial extensions that project into the underlying connective tissue in both skin and mucous membranes. Rete ridge flattening refers to the loss of these projections so that the skin epithelium acquires a relatively flat appearance.	网脊扁平化	钉（或脊）是伸入皮肤和粘膜下面结缔组织的上皮延伸部分，网脊扁平化是由于这些钉或脊的缺如使得表皮外观上呈现出相对平坦的外观。
HP:0025118	头部和颈部的异常	Lip discoloration	['Lightening or darkening of the lips from their usual coloring.']	嘴唇变色	['与嘴唇通常的颜色不一样，变浅或变暗']
HP:0025119	头部和颈部的异常	Violet lip discoloration	An alteration of the color of the lip to take on a violet color. This term does not include cyanosis.	嘴唇发紫	嘴唇呈现紫色，但不是紫绀
HP:0025121	神经系统异常	Simple partial occipital seizures	A type of focal seizure (i.e., affecting initially only one hemisphere of the brain) that is simple (not resulting in alteration of consciousness) that originates in the occipital lobe. Visual hallucinations are the hallmark of occipital seizures, but are not invariably present. Hallucinations typically commence in the visual field contralateral to the affected visual cortex and then spread to involve the entire visual field. Elementary visual seizures are characterized by fleeting visual manifestations which may be either positive (flashes, phosphenes) or, less commonly, negative (scotoma, hemianopia, amaurosis). Positive phenomena are usually flashes of colour or light, which are simple in shape and may be static or mobile.	单纯性部分性枕部癫痫发作	起源于枕叶的一种典型的单纯性（不导致意识的改变）、局灶性发作（即最初只影响一侧大脑半球）。幻视是枕部癫痫发作的特征，但并非总是存在。幻视通常在受影响的视皮层的对侧视野开始，然后蔓延到整个视野。常见发作特征是短暂的视觉表象，可能是亮光（闪光，光幻视），或偶尔为暗视（盲点、偏盲、黑蒙）。常见亮光幻视通常是颜色或光的闪光，形状简单，可以是静态或移动的。
HP:0025122	体壁的异常	Sawtooth acanthosis	A type of epidermal acanthosis characterized by a jagged (sawtooth) appearance of the rete ridges of the epidermis.	锯齿棘皮症	一种表皮棘皮病，其特征在于表皮前缘的锯齿状（锯齿状）外观

HP:0025124	头部和颈部的异常	Fragile teeth	['A tendency of teeth to fracture as manifested by a history of repeated fracture of the dental enamel without adequate trauma.']	牙齿发脆	[' '一种牙齿脆裂的趋势，表现为没有足够外时就发生的牙釉质反复脆裂。']
HP:0025125	头部和颈部的异常	White lesion of the oral mucosa	['White lesions of the oral mucosa are generally caused by a condition that increases the thickness of the epithelium. This increases the distance to the vascular bed and thereby tends to change the usual reddish color of the oral mucosa to white. Common causes include hyperkeratosis (thickening of the keratin layer), acanthosis (thickening of the spinous cell layer), increased edema in the epithelium (leukoedema), and reduced vascularity of the underlying lamina propria. Additionally, fibrin caps of surface ulcerations and collapsed bullae can appear white.']	口腔黏膜白色病变。	(口腔黏膜的白色病变通常是由上皮增厚引起导致与血管床距离的增加，从而使口腔黏膜由通常的红色变为白色。常见的原因包括角化过度(角蛋白层增厚)、棘层增厚(棘细胞层增厚)、上皮水肿(白斑水肿)增加、固有层血管减少。此外，表面溃疡的纤维蛋白帽和塌陷的大泡也会出现白色。
HP:0025126	头部和颈部的异常	Oral hairy leukoplakia	['A corrugated white lesion of the oral mucosa that usually occurs on the lateral or ventral surfaces of the tongue and may have a shaggy or frayed appearance.']	口腔毛状白斑	['口腔黏膜的一种白色波纹样病变，通常发生在舌的外侧或腹侧表面，可能有粗糙或磨损样外观。']
HP:0025127	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Actinic keratosis	['A scaly, crusty lesion caused by damage from the ultraviolet radiation of the sun, with typical location on sun-exposed areas of the skin. Actinic keratosis lesions are often elevated, rough, and wartlike, and may be red, or occasionally tan, pink, or flesh-toned in color.']	光化性角化病	由于太阳紫外线照射或电离辐射引起的表皮过度鳞状化、硬皮病变，多见于皮肤暴露区域。 光化性角化病的病变通常可略高出皮肤形成隆起，表面粗糙、呈疣状，颜色可呈红色、棕褐色、粉红色或肉色。
HP:0025128	结缔组织异常	Reduced intraabdominal adipose tissue	['An abnormally reduced amount of adipose tissue in the abdominal cavity.']	腹部脂肪组织减少	[腹腔内脂肪组织异常减少]
HP:0025129	消化系统异常	Abnormal small intestinal mucosa morphology	['A structural anomaly of the mucous lining of the small intestine.']	小肠粘膜形态异常	小肠粘膜的结构异常
HP:0025130	消化系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased small intestinal mucosa lactase activity	['Lactase is produced in the small intestine in humans, Lactase is a member of the beta-galactosidase family of enzymes, and hydrolyzes D-lactose to form D-galactose and D-glucose, which can be absorbed by the small intestine. There are many ways of assessing lactase activity. In one test, an endoscopic biopsy from the postbulbar duodenum is incubated with lactose on a test plate, and a color reaction develops within 20 min as a result of hydrolyzed lactose (a positive result) in patients with normolactasia, whereas no reaction (a negative result) develops in patients with severe hypolactasia. Other, less direct, tests include the hydrogen breath test, and blood tests following lactose challenges.']	小肠粘膜乳糖酶活性降低	乳糖酶存在于人体小肠粘膜，是β-半乳糖苷酶家族成员之一，可水解D -乳糖生成D-半乳糖和D-葡萄糖，从而被小肠吸收。乳糖酶活性的检测方法很多，其中一种方法小肠粘膜活检法，通过在内镜下取十二指肠球部粘膜组织，然后将其与乳糖在培养皿中共孵育，若20min内呈现颜色变化则认为发生了乳糖分解反应（阳性结果），即该患者的乳糖分解正常；若无颜色变化（阴性结果）则表明该患者为严重的乳糖不耐受患者。另外，还有一些间接的检测方法，如：氢呼气试验和乳糖耐受试验。

HP:0025160	神经系统异常	Abnormal temper tantrums	['A temper tantrum is an emotional outburst usually triggered by a sense of frustration and manifested as whining and crying, screaming, kicking, hitting, and breath holding. Temper tantrums are normal in toddlers and young children and usually happen between the ages of one to three years. Temper tantrums may be considered abnormal if they occur at an unusually high frequency, are of unusual severity, or occur at an old age than usual.']	异常发脾气	发脾气通常是由挫折感引起的情绪爆发反应，表现为抱怨和哭泣、尖叫、踢、打、屏气。发脾气是婴幼儿正常行为特征，通常发生在一至三岁之间；如果发生频率过高、过度严重，或者在非常规年龄出现可认为是异常的。

For instance, a temper tantrum might be considered to be severe if a child loses control so completely that the child cannot control the tantrum on its own, continuing until it becomes exhausted or a parent intervenes.']	脾气爆发	较通常情况更严重的脾气爆发。例如，一个孩子完全失去控制，脾气不能自控，直至筋疲力尽或父母介入。

HP:0025164	体壁的异常	Increased number of elastic fibers in the dermis	An elevated number of elastic fibers, that is of bundles of proteins and glycoproteins in the extracellular matrix in the reticular dermis. Elastic fibers can stretch and recoil back to their original length. This feature can be appreciated on histology with hematoxylin and eosin or other staining methods.	真皮弹性纤维增多	弹性纤维数量增多。网状真皮层的细胞外基质中由蛋白质和糖蛋白束构成的弹性纤维数量增多。弹性纤维可以拉伸并收缩到其原本的长度。这一特性可通过苏木精和伊红染色或其他染色等组织学方法进行评估。

HP:0025170	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Neuronal/glioneuronal neoplasm of the central nervous system	['A central nervous system neoplasm with neuronal and, less consistently, glial differentiation.']	中枢神经系统神经元/神经胶质细胞瘤 	一种中枢神经系统肿瘤，包括神经元和分化程度不同的胶质细胞。
HP:0025171	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Rosette-forming glioneuronal tumor	A tumor of the central nervous system that has components of both neurocytic and glial areas, whereby usually the glial component of the tumour predominates. Rossette-forming glioneuronal tumors (RGNT) have biphasic cytoarchitecture with two elements; neurocytic rosettes resembling Homer-Wright rosettes, and astrocytic component resembling a pilocytic astrocytoma. RGNTs are low-grade tumors that lack histopathological signs of malignancy.	玫瑰花形神经胶质瘤	中枢神经系统的一种肿瘤，包含神经细胞和神经胶质区域的组成部分，通常是肿瘤的胶质成分占主导地位。玫瑰花形的神经胶质细胞瘤(RGNT)具有两相细胞结构：类似于Homer-Wright玫瑰花的神经细胞和类似于纤维状细胞的星形胶质细胞。RGNTs是低级别肿瘤，缺乏恶性肿瘤的组织病理学特征。
HP:0025172	呼吸系统异常	Smooth septal thickening on pulmonary HRCT	['Thickening of the interlobular septa of the lungs as seen on a high-resolution computed tomography scan with a smooth appearance of the interlobular septa.']	HRCT可见肺部间隔光滑性增厚	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描上可见肺小叶间隔增厚，小叶间隔光滑。
HP:0025173	呼吸系统异常	Nodular septal thickening on pulmonary HRCT	['Thickening of the interlobular septa of the lungs as seen on a high-resolution computed tomography scan with a nodular or beaded appearance of the interlobular septa.']	HRCT可见肺部间隔结节性增厚 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描上可见肺小叶间隔增厚，小叶间隔呈结节状或串珠状结构。
HP:0025174	呼吸系统异常	Irregular septal thickening on pulmonary HRCT	['Thickening of the interlobular septa of the lungs as seen on a high-resolution computed tomography scan with an irregular appearance of the interlobular septa. THis feature is often associated with distortion of lung architecture.']	HRCT可见肺部间隔不规则性增厚 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描上可见肺小叶间隔增厚，小叶间隔不规则性出现，常由于肺结构扭曲导致。
HP:0025175	呼吸系统异常	Honeycomb lung	['Extensive interstitial fibrosis with alveolar disruption and bronchiolectasis.']	蜂窝状肺 	肺脏可见广泛间质纤维化伴肺泡破裂及细支气管扩张。
HP:0025176	呼吸系统异常	Intralobular interstitial thickening	['A fine reticular pattern on high-resolution computeed tomography, with the visible lines separated by a few millimeters. Regions of the lung with intralobular interstitial thickening characteristically show a fine lacelike or netlike appearance.']	小叶间质增厚	在高分辨率计算机断层扫描影像上呈精细网状图像，可见线间隔几毫米。肺小叶间质增厚区域特征表现为细腻的花边状或网状图像。
HP:0025177	呼吸系统异常	Peribronchovascular interstitial thickening	['Thickening of the peribronchovascular interstitium, a connective tissue sheath that surrounds the central bronchi and pulmonary arteries. The peribronchovascular interstitium extends from the level of the pulmonary hila into the peripheral lung. This feature may be ascertained on high-resolution computer tomography.']	支气管周围血管间质增厚	围绕中央支气管和肺动脉的结缔组织鞘增厚，即支气管周围血管间质增厚。支气管周围血管间质从肺门水平延伸至肺脏末梢。这一特征可以经高分辨率计算机断层扫描确定。
HP:0025178	呼吸系统异常	Subpleural interstitial thickening	['Increase in thickness of the subpleural interstitium.']	胸膜下间质增厚 	胸膜下间质厚度增加。
HP:0025179	呼吸系统异常	Ground-glass opacification on pulmonary HRCT	A descriptive term that is applied to computer tomography imaging and that refers to a hazy area of increased attenuation in the lung with preserved bronchial and vascular markings.	HRCT可见肺部毛玻璃样结构	计算机断层扫描成像技术中的一种描述性术语，指的是肺中保留支气管和血管标记的信号衰减增加的模糊区域。
HP:0025180	呼吸系统异常	Centrilobular ground-glass opacification on pulmonary HRCT	['A hazy area of increased attenuation in centrilobular areas of the lung with preserved bronchial and vascular markings seen on a computer tomography scan. Centrilobular refers to a location that is central within secondary pulmonary lobules.']	HRCT可见肺小叶中心毛玻璃样结构	在计算机断层扫描中肺小叶中心可见模糊的区域，该区域保留支气管和血管标记。小叶中心是指位于次级肺小叶中心的位置。
HP:0025181	消化系统异常	Abdominal aseptic abscess	An abscess-like lesion located within the abdomen. The lesions are localized in the spleen, liver, abdominal lymph nodes. The lesions represent visceral sterile collections of mature neutrophils that do not respond to antibiotics but regress quickly when treated with corticosteroids, but relapses occur frequently.	腹腔无菌性脓肿	腹腔内脓肿样病变，可以位于脾脏、肝脏、腹腔淋巴结。病变表现为内脏组织无菌性成熟中性粒细胞聚集，对抗生素不敏感，皮质激素使用后迅速消退，但通常迅速复发
HP:0025182	体壁的异常	Localized area of pendulous skin	['A confined region of lax skin that hangs below the level of the surrounding skin. Histopatholigically, there is a loss of elastic fibers in the dermis of the affected region.']	局限性皮肤松弛	局部的皮肤相较于周围更为松弛，组织病理显示病损区域皮肤真皮层弹性纤维缺如。
HP:0025186	眼部异常	Marcus Gunn jaw winking synkinesis	Unilateral ptosis with associated upper eyelid contraction and contraction of either the external or the internal pterygoid muscle. It is thought to occur because of congenital miswiring of a branch of the fifth cranial nerve into the branch of the third cranial nerve supplying the levator muscle. In Marcus Gunn jaw winking synkinesis, elevation and even retraction of the affected eyelid is triggered by chewing, suction, lateral mandible movement, smiling, sternocleidomastoid contraction, protruding tongue, Valsalva manoeuvre and even by breathing.	Marcus-Gunn下颌眼睑联动综合征	单侧上睑下垂，伴有上睑收缩和翼状胬肉内肌的收缩，是由于第五脑神经的一个分支进入支配上睑提肌的第三脑神经的分支所致。对于Marcus-Gunn下颌眼睑联动综合征患者而言，咀嚼、吸气、下颌侧移、微笑、胸锁乳突收缩、伸舌、Valsalva动作甚至呼吸都会触发受影响眼睑的抬高甚至收缩。
HP:0025188	眼部异常,心血管系统异常	Retinal vasculitis	['Inflammation of retinal blood vessels as manifested by perivascular sheathing or cuffing, vascular leakage and/or occlusion.']	视网膜血管炎	视网膜血管的炎症性疾病，表现为血管周围的鞘或套，血管渗漏或闭塞。
HP:0025190	神经系统异常	Generalized tonic-clonic seizures without focal onset	['A type of generalized tonic-clonic seizure that occurs in and rapidly engages bilaterally distributed networks.']	无局灶发作的全面性强直-阵挛发作	一种广泛的强直阵挛发作，发生后迅速经双侧神经网络分布

HP:0025193	结缔组织异常,肌肉组织异常	Posterolateral diaphragmatic hernia	['A posterolateral defect in the diaphragm, commonly referred to as a Bochdalek hernia, which is often accompanied by herniation of the stomach, intestines, liver, and/or spleen into the chest cavity.']	后外侧膈疝	横膈后外侧缺损，常伴有胃、肠、肝和/或脾脏的疝入胸腔，通常被称为BodDalk疝

HP:0025195	结缔组织异常,肌肉组织异常	Central diaphragmatic hernia	['A congenital diaphragm defect involving the central tendinous (e.g., amuscular) portion of the diaphragm, whereby the entire rim of diaphragmatic musculature is present.']	中央膈疝	一种先天性的累及中央腱索（例如，肌肉）部分的横膈缺损，可在整个膈肌组织的边缘出现
HP:0025196	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased total iron binding capacity	An elevation in the total-iron binding capacity, which measures how much serum iron is bound if an excess of radioactive iron is added. A high TIBC corresponds to a high transferrin concentration. The latent (or free) iron binding capacity is the difference between the TIBC and the measured serum iron, corresponding to the transferrin not bound to iron, i.e., free iron binding capacity.	总铁结合力增高	总铁结合力增高。可通过加入过量的放射性铁后，检测血清中结合铁的含量。总铁结合力增高表明转铁蛋白水平增高。未饱和（自由）铁结合力不同于总铁结合力和血清铁，指的是未与铁结合的转铁蛋白，也就是自由铁结合力。
HP:0025197	肿瘤	Inclusion body fibromatosis	A benign tumor made up of mostly myofibroblasts that appears almost exclusively on the digits of the hands and feet, rarely involving the thumb or big toe. The lesion displays a proliferation of bland intradermal spindle cells arranged in whorls, fascicles, or a storiform pattern in a collagenous background of varying degrees. Also usually present are perpendicular tumor cell fascicles that extend to the epidermis. The small intracytoplasmic inclusions are said to appear similar to red blood cells. The inclusion bodies have been shown to be made up of densely packed vimentin and actin filaments. The tumor often causes a dome-shaped elevation of the overlying structures, forming a protuberant or polypoid nodule. The overlying epidermis can display a host of changes, including acanthosis, hyperkeratosis, parakeratosis, rete ridge flattening, entrapment of adnexal structures, and, rarely, ulceration.	包涵体纤维瘤病	一种良性肿瘤，主要由肌成纤维细胞组成，几乎只出现在手指和脚趾上，但很少累及拇指或大脚趾。病损显示在不同程度的胶原生成的背景下，皮内梭形细胞的增生，排列成轮状、束状或席纹状。通常也有垂直的肿瘤细胞束延伸到表皮。小的胞浆内包含体据说与红血球相似。包涵体由密集的波形蛋白和肌动蛋白丝组成。肿瘤常引起覆盖结构的穹状隆起，形成突起或息肉样结节。覆盖的表皮可显示许多变化，包括棘皮、角化、角化、脊状变平、附件结构的残留，以及很少的溃疡。
HP:0025198	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Inflammatory cap polyp	['A non-malignant sessile or pedunculated polyp in the colon and rectum that displays a cap of inflammatory granulation tissue with fibrinopurulent exudate that covers the polyp.']	炎性帽状息肉	一种位于直肠和结肠的非恶性的无蒂或带蒂息肉，息肉上面覆盖含纤维素性即脓性渗出物的炎性肉芽组织
HP:0025200	肌肉组织异常	Muscle fiber actin filament accumulation		肌纤维肌动蛋白丝堆积	
HP:0025201	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal apolipoprotein level	['A deviation from the normal concentration in blood of an apolipoprotin, i.e., of a protein that binds lipids to form lipoprotein and is thereby responsible for the transport of lipids in the blood and lymph circulation.']	载脂蛋白水平异常	血液某种载脂蛋白的浓度不在正常范围内。载脂蛋白与脂质结合形成脂蛋白，负责血液和淋巴循环中脂类的运输。
HP:0025202	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated apolipoprotein A-IV level	['An increased concentration in blood of apolipoprotein A-IV, a major component of HDL and chylomicrons that has a role in VLDL secretion and catabolism and is required for efficient activation of lipoprotein lipase by ApoC-II.']	载脂蛋白A-IV水平增高	血液中载脂蛋白A-IV浓度增高。载脂蛋白A-IV是HDL和乳糜微粒的重要组成成分，参与VLDL的分泌和分解代谢过程，同时促使Apo CII激活脂蛋白脂肪酶。
HP:0025203	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	Caput medusae	Distended and engorged umbilical veins which are seen radiating from the umbilicus across the abdomen to join systemic veins.	脐周静脉曲张	脐静脉膨胀充盈，脐静脉由脐带穿过腹部与体静脉相连
HP:0025204	临床调节因素	Triggered by	['A trigger is defined as an external factor that leads to the manifestation of a sign or symptom in a person with a susceptibility to developing that manifestation.']	因……而引发的	触发因素为一个外部因素，导致一种特定的症状或体征，对其易感的个体出现表现。

HP:0025233	神经系统异常	Sleep paralysis	An inability to move the body at sleep onset or upon awakening from sleep lasting seconds to a few minutes.	睡眠瘫痪	睡眠起始阶段或觉醒过程中,意识清楚但是身体不能自主活动，可持续数秒或者几分钟时间。
HP:0025234	神经系统异常	Parasomnia	An undesirable physical event or experience that occur during entry into sleep, during sleep, or during arousal from sleep.	异态睡眠	在睡眠、睡眠或觉醒期间发生的异常表现或经历
HP:0025235	神经系统异常	Non-rapid eye movement parasomnia	A parasomnia that occurs in non-rapid eye movement (NREM) sleep. This refers to a disorder of arousal that occurs during during slow-wave sleep (ie, NREM stage 3 sleep).	非快动眼异态睡眠	非快动眼睡眠阶段发生的异态睡眠。指在慢波睡眠期（NREM睡眠3期）发生的异常觉醒行为。
HP:0025236	神经系统异常	Somnambulism	Ambulation or other complex motor behaviors after getting out of bed in a sleep-like state. During sleepwalking episodes, the sonambulating individual appears confused or dazed, the eyes are usually open, and he or she might mumble or give inappropriate answers to questions, or occasionally appear agitated.	梦游症	睡眠状态下发生的离床或者离床后复杂活动。在梦游过程中显示出困惑或茫然，眼睛通常是睁开的，他/她可能会咕哝或不恰当地回答问题，偶尔出现焦虑表现。
HP:0025237	神经系统异常	Confusional arousal	A nocturnal episode characterized by disorientation, grogginess, and, at times, substantial agitation upon awakening from slow-wave sleep or following forced awakenings. These characteristics might present as agitation, crying or moaning, disorientation, and particularly slow mentation on arousal from sleep (i.e., sleep inertia). The duration of episodes is typically 5 to 15 min but they might last up to several hours.	觉醒障碍	一种夜间发作，其特征是方向迷失、昏昏沉沉；在缓慢波睡眠期觉醒或强迫觉醒后有时出现强烈的兴奋反应。其特征可能表现为激动、哭泣或呻吟、迷失方向、特别缓慢的睡眠觉醒过程（即睡眠惯性）。发作持续时间一般为5至15分钟，但也可能持续数小时。
HP:0025239	眼部异常	Subhyaloid hemorrhage	A localized detachment of the vitreous from the retina due to the accumulation of blood. When localized in the macular area, it results in sudden profound loss of vision. Subhyaloid premacular hemorrhage is typically characterized by a circumscribed, round or dumb-bell shaped, bright red mound of blood beneath the internal limiting membrane (ILM) or between the ILM and hyaloid face, in or near to the central macular area.	玻璃体下出血	部分性后玻璃体脱离可导致积血。当脱离发生于黄斑区，会引起视力突然丧失。黄斑部视网膜前眼底出血典型特征是，在内界膜下方或在内界膜与玻璃体表面之间或者在靠近黄斑中心区有血液局部性聚积，呈圆形或哑铃状鲜红色小丘。
HP:0025240	眼部异常	Preretinal hemorrhage	An accumulation of blood between the neurosensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium (RPE) arising from the choroidal or retinal circulation.	视网膜前出血	起始于脉络膜或视网膜循环出血，血液聚积在视网膜神经感觉层和视网膜色素上皮层之间。
HP:0025241	心血管系统异常,眼部异常,血液和造血组织异常	Flame-shaped retinal hemorrhage	['A type of retinal hemorrhage that is located within the nerve fiber layer (NFL) of the retina and that exhibits a characteristic flame shape which results from constraints by the structure of the NFL (axons of the ganglion cells).']	火焰状视网膜出血	一种视网膜神经纤维层的出血，出血以呈火焰状为特点，是由神经纤维层结构（神经节细胞轴突）限制造成的
HP:0025242	心血管系统异常,眼部异常,血液和造血组织异常	Dot-and-blot retinal hemorrhage	["Accumulation of blood located in the retina's inner nuclear and outer plexiform layers, and having a dot-like or blot-like shape. THe shape results from intraretinal compression, restricting the hemorrhages within a specific location."]	斑点状视网膜出血	位于视网膜内核细胞层和外丛状层的血液积累，呈点状或斑点状。这种出血是由视网膜内的挤压造成的，使出血限定在了特定的位置。
HP:0025243	心血管系统异常,眼部异常,血液和造血组织异常	Subretinal hemorrhage	['Accumulation of blood located beneath the neurosensory retina in the space between the neurosensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium.']	视网膜下出血	血液聚积在视网膜神经感觉层下，处于视网膜神经感觉层与视网膜上皮细胞层之间。
HP:0025244	心血管系统异常,眼部异常,血液和造血组织异常	Subretinal pigment epithelium hemorrhage	["An accumulation of blood located between the retinal pigment epithelium (RPE) and Bruch's membrane."]	视网膜色素上皮下出血	血液聚积在视网膜色素上皮和 Bruch膜之间。
HP:0025245	体壁的异常	Cutaneous cyst	['A hollow mass located in the skin that is surrounded by an epithelium-lined wall and is well demarcated from the adjacent tissue. Cysts are often said to be sac-like and may contain serous liquid or semisolid material.']	皮肤囊肿	位于皮肤中内衬上皮壁的中空病变，其与相邻组织分界清楚。囊肿常描述为囊样改变，内含液体或半固体。
HP:0025246	体壁的异常	Trichilemmal cyst	['Nontender, round and firm, but slightly compressible, intradermal or subcutaneous cyst measuring 0.5-5 cm in diameter. Trichilemmal cysts are acquired rather than congenital, and tend to appear on the scalp rather than the face, and to be intradermal rather than subcutaneous.']	毛鞘囊肿	无痛，圆形且坚硬，但可轻微压缩，皮内或皮下囊肿直径测量0.5-5厘米。毛鞘囊肿是获得性的而不是先天性的，并且倾向于出现在头皮而不是脸上，倾向于出现在皮内而不是皮下。
HP:0025247	体壁的异常	Dermoid cyst	['A congenital subcutaneous cyst that arises from entrapment of skin along the lines of embryonic fusion. In contrast to epidermal cysts, dermoid cysts tend to contain various adnexal structures such as hair, sebaceous, eccrine or apocrine glands. Dermoid cysts are present at birth, and are indolent, firm, deep, subcutaneous nodules. They are often located on the head and neck, and rarely in the anogenital area. Dermoid cysts are\nslowly progressive and can grow to a size of 1 to 4 cm.']	皮样囊肿	先天性皮下囊肿，由沿着胚胎融合线包裹皮肤而产生。 与表皮囊肿相比，皮样囊肿倾向于包含各种附件结构，例如头发，皮脂腺，外分泌腺或顶分泌腺。 出生时皮样囊肿存在，并且是无痛的，坚实的，深的皮下结节。 它们通常位于头部和颈部，很少位于肛门生殖器区域。 皮样囊肿是渐进性的，可以长到1至4厘米的大小。
HP:0025248	体壁的异常	Eruptive vellus hair cyst	['A cutaneous cyst that is small (one or two millimeters in diameter) and painless, presenting as a follicular papule that usually is skin colored but may have a reddish or\nbrownish tinge.']	发疹性毛发囊肿	小的皮肤囊肿（直径1毫米或2毫米），无痛，表现为滤泡丘疹，通常为皮肤色，但可能有红色或黑色。
HP:0025249	体壁的异常	Comedo	['A clogged cutaneous sebaceous follicle, which is a cutaneous gland that secretes sebum (usually into a hair follicle).']	粉刺	毛囊内分泌皮脂的腺体阻塞，形成粉刺。
HP:0025250	体壁的异常	Closed comedo	['A comedo in which the top of the pore is not stretched open and thus does not expose the clogged portion (which would appear black), hence the name whitehead.']	闭合性粉刺	粉刺的一种；该种粉刺位于毛孔顶层。一般不会暴露出粉刺的内容物，呈白色。
HP:0025251	体壁的异常	Open comedo	['A comedo in which the part of the pore at the surface of the skin is stretched and open, exposing the contents of the comedo, which appear black.']	开放性粉刺	粉刺的一种；该种粉刺位于皮肤表面的部分毛孔被拉伸或打开，暴露出粉刺的内容物，呈黑色。
HP:0025252	头部和颈部的异常	Geographic tongue	['An anomaly of the tongue characterized by loss (atrophy) of filiform papillae of the tongue, leaving areas of erythema (redness), surrounded by a serpiginous, white, hyperkeratotic border. The name geographic tongue refers to an appearance that is said to be similar to a map.']	地图舌	['一种舌的异常，其特征是舌的丝状乳头丧失(萎缩)，留下红斑(发红)的区域，周围有锯齿状、白色、角化过度的边缘。“地图舌”指的就是它的外观与地图一样。
HP:0025253	神经系统异常	Claustrophobia	['An abnormal fear of being in a closed or narrow space with no escape.']	幽闭恐惧症	在无法逃脱的密闭或者狭小空间内时出现的异常恐惧感
HP:0025254	临床调节因素	Ameliorated by	['An ameliorating factor is defined as an external factor that leads to the manifestation of a sign or symptom in a person improving or becoming more bearable.']	因……而改善的	改善因素是指外在因素，使一个人的体征或症状得到改善或变得可以忍受。
HP:0025255	临床调节因素	Ameliorated by pregnancy	['Applies to a sign or symptom that is improved or made more bearable by pregnancy in a female.']	因妊娠而改善	一种体征或症状，在女性怀孕后可以改善或更能忍受。
HP:0025256	临床调节因素	Ameliorated by heat	['Applies to a sign or symptom that is improved or made more bearable by heat (including fever).']	因热而改善	一种体征或症状，会因发热(包括发烧)而获得改善或使其更能忍受。
HP:0025257	临床调节因素	Ameliorated by carbohydrate ingestion	['Applies to a sign or symptom that is improved or made more bearable by eating or drinking carbohydrates including glucose (sugar).']	因食用碳水化合物而改善	一种体征或症状，通过食用或饮用包括葡萄糖(蔗糖)在内的碳水化合物而获得改善或使其更易承受。
HP:0025258	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Stiff neck	['A sensation of tightness in the neck when attempting to move it, especially after a period of inactivity. Neck stiffness often involves soreness and difficulty moving the neck, especially when trying to turn the head to the side.']	颈部僵硬	试图活动颈部时有紧绷感，尤以静止一段时间后活动时更为明显。颈部僵硬通常包括疼痛和颈部活动困难，尤其是当头部转向一侧时。
HP:0025259	骨骼系统异常	Stiff elbow	['A sensation of tightness in the elbow joint when attempting to move it, especially after a period of inactivity.']	肘部僵硬	试图活动肘关节时有紧绷感，尤以静止一段时间后活动时更为明显。

HP:0025266	骨骼系统异常	Cervical osteoarthritis	['Degeneration (wear and tear) of the articular cartilage of the neck joints.']	颈椎骨关节炎	颈部关节软骨退化（磨损）。
HP:0025267	神经系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Snoring	['Deep, noisy breathing during sleep accompanied by hoarse or harsh sounds caused by the vibration of respiratory structures (especially the soft palate) resulting in sound due to obstructed air movement during breathing while sleeping.']	打鼾 	睡眠时呼吸深大，伴随着呼吸结构（尤其是软腭）振动，发出的嘶哑或刺耳的声音，因睡眠呼吸时空气暂时流通障碍而导致发出声响。” 
HP:0025268	神经系统异常	Stuttering	['Disruptions in the production of speech sounds, with involuntary repetitions of words or parts of words, prolongations of speech sounds, or complete blockage of speech production for several seconds.']	口吃	在语音产生过程中不自觉地重复单词或词组、延长语音、或完全言语中断数秒。
HP:0025269	神经系统异常	Panic attack	['A sudden episode of intense fear in a situation in which there is no danger or apparent cause. The panic attack is accompanied by symptoms such as palpitations, sweating and chills or hot flushes. There may be a sensation of dyspnea (being out of breath), chest pain, or abdominal distress. Some indiviudals with panic attacks may experience depersonalization, a fear of going crazy, or a fear of dying.']	惊恐发作（急性焦虑发作）	在没有危险或明显原因的情况下突然出现强烈的恐惧感。惊恐发作伴有心悸、出汗、寒战或潮热等症状。可能有呼吸困难（气喘）、胸痛或腹痛的感觉。一些恐慌症的发作伴发人格解体、发疯感或者濒死感。

HP:0025275	临床调节因素	Lateral	['Applies to an abnormality that is located farther from the median plane or midline of the body or of the referenced structure.']	侧面	发生在远离身体的中央面、中线或参照结构的异常。
HP:0025276	体壁的异常	Abnormality of skin adnexa physiology	['Any functional anomaly of the skin adnexa (skin appendages), which are specialized skin structures located within the dermis and focally within the subcutaneous fatty tissue, comprising three histologically distinct structures: (1) the pilosebaceous unit (hair follicle and sebaceous glands); (2) the eccrine sweat glands; and (3) the apocrine glands.']	皮肤附属器异常	位于真皮和皮下脂肪组织内的局部皮肤附属器的任何功能异常，包括三种不同组织结构：（1）毛囊皮脂腺单位（毛囊和皮脂腺）; （2）外泌汗腺（小汗腺）;（3）顶泌汗腺（大汗腺）。

HP:0025278	体壁的异常	Cold-induced sweating	['Sweating provoked by cold temperature rather than by heat.']	寒冷刺激出汗	低温导致出汗，非受热所致

HP:0025281	临床调节因素	Sharp	['Applied to pain that is described as sharp, i.e., sudden and severe.']	尖锐	用于描述尖锐的疼痛，即突然发生和严重。
HP:0025282	临床调节因素	Dull	['Applied to pain that is dull, i.e., not severe but that continues over a long period of time.']	钝性	钝性的疼痛，即这种疼痛不严重，但会持续很长时间。

HP:0025286	临床调节因素	Aggravated by activity	['Applied to a sign or symptom that is aggravated by activity, exertion, or exercise.']	因活动加剧	['用于因活动、用力或运动而使症状加重']
HP:0025287	临床调节因素	Axial	['Applies to an abnormality that is situated in the central part of the body, in the head and trunk as distinguished from the limbs.']	轴向	好发于身体中央、头部和躯干的异常，与四肢不一样。

HP:0025319	心血管系统异常,眼部异常	Rubeosis iridis	Formation of new blood vessels on the iris. The new vessels do not display the typical radially symmertic growth pattern of normal iris blood vessels, but rather appear disorganized. Rubeosis usually starts from the pupillary border with tiny tufts of dilated capillaries or red spots that can only be appreciated with high magnification.	虹膜新生血管	即虹膜上新的血管的形成。新血管不显示正常虹膜血管典型的放射状生长模式，而是表现为无组织。红斑通常从瞳孔边缘开始，有小簇的扩张毛细血管或只有高倍放大才能观察到的红斑。

After conclusion of bone growth, the growth plates ossify (harden into solid bone).']	生长板形态异常	生长板（骺板）形态结构异常。生长板位于长骨干末端附近的软骨区域、骨干的干骺端（骨的加宽部分）和骨骺（骨头的末端）之间，在骨生长过程中不断生长。骨生长结束后，生长板骨化（硬化成骨质）。

HP:0025373	神经系统异常	Interictal EEG abnormality	Interictal refers to a period of time between epileptic seizures. Electroencephalographic (EEG) patterns are important in the differential diagnosis of epilepsy, and the EEG is almost always abnormal during a seizure. Some persons with seizures may show EEG abnormalities between seizures, while others do not. In some cases, multiple interictal EEGs must be recorded before an abnormality is observed. In most cases the electrographic pattern of seizure onset is completely different from the activity recorded during interictal discharge.	发作间期脑电图异常	发作间期指癫痫发作之间的一段时间。脑电图(EEG)模式在癫痫鉴别诊断中具有重要意义，癫痫发作时EEG几乎总是异常的。部分患者会出现两次癫痫发作之间的EEG异常。在某些情况下，记录多个发作间期EEGs可观察到一次异常放电。但大多数情况下，癫痫发作期的EEG模式完全不同于发作间期的放电活动。

Os odontoideum is defined as an ossicle that consists of smooth and separate caudal portions of the odontoid process.With dystopic os odontoideum, the ossicle is located near the basion or is fused with the clivus.']	正位游离齿状突(齿状突小骨)	游离齿状突(齿状突小骨)分为两种解剖类型（正位和反位）。游离齿状突由齿状突光滑而游离的小骨组成。在错位的游离齿状突中，小骨位于基部附近或与Clivus斜坡融合。

HP:0025388	内分泌系统异常	Thyroid nodule	['A nodular lesion that develops in the thyroid gland. The term "thyroid nodule" refers to any abnormal growth that forms a lump in the thyroid gland.']	甲状腺结节	甲状腺的结节样病变，是指甲状腺内异常生长的肿块
HP:0025389	呼吸系统异常	Pulmonary interstitial high-resolution computed tomography abnormality	High-resolution computed tomography (HRCT) can distinguish findings that characterize characterise interstitial lung diseases in a way not possible with other modalities.	肺间质高分辨率计算机断层扫描异常 	高分辨率计算机断层扫描（HRCT）可以发现其他方式不能发现的特征性间质性肺部病征。 
HP:0025390	呼吸系统异常	Reticular pattern on pulmonary HRCT	On pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography, reticular pattern is characterised by innumerable interlacing shadows suggesting a mesh.	HRCT可见肺部网状结构	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中，网状结构特征表现为无数交错的阴影组成的网格。
HP:0025391	呼吸系统异常	Crazy paving pattern on pulmonary HRCT	The so-called crazy paving pattern is characterised on HRCT by the presence of thickened interlobular septae and intralobular lines superimposed on a background of ground-glass opacity, resembling irregularly shaped paving stones.	HRCT可见肺部铺石路状结构 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中，铺石路状结构特征表现为肺小叶和小叶间隔增厚，排列于毛玻璃样模糊背景上，类似不规则形状的铺路石。 
HP:0025392	呼吸系统异常	Nodular pattern on pulmonary HRCT	A nodular pattern is characterised on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography by the presence of numerous rounded opacities that range from 2 mm to 1 cm in diameter, with micronodules defined as smaller than 3 mm in diameter.	HRCT可见肺部结节状结构	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中，结节状结构特征表现为存在许多直径为2毫米至1厘米之间的圆形阴影，若直径小于3毫米则称为微结节。
HP:0025393	呼吸系统异常	Reticulonodular pattern on pulmonary HRCT	Co-occurrence of reticular and micronodular patterns on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography.	HRCT可见肺部网状结节状结构	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中网状和微结节结构图像共存。 
HP:0025394	呼吸系统异常	Cystic pattern on pulmonary HRCT	On pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography, the cystic pattern is composed by well-defined, round and circumscribed air-containing parenchymal spaces with a well-defined wall and interface with normal lung. The wall of the cysts may be uniform or varied in thickness, but usually is thin (less than 2 mm) and occurs without associated emphysema.	HRCT可见肺部囊状结构 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中，囊状结构由含空气的实质空间组成，有明显的外壁，一般呈圆形，与正常的肺组织有清晰的边界。囊状结构的壁厚度可均匀或不均匀，但通常小于2毫米，且不伴肺气肿。 
HP:0025395	呼吸系统异常	Combined cystic and ground-glass pattern on pulmonary HRCT	Co-occurrence of the cystic pattern and the ground-glass pattern on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography,	HRCT可见肺部囊状与毛玻璃样结构	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中囊状和毛玻璃样结构图像共存。 
HP:0025396	呼吸系统异常	Decreased attenuation pattern on pulmonary HRCT	Areas of low density corresponding to parenchymal destruction and reduced perfusion, and attenuation of the pulmonary vasculature, as visualized on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography.	HRCT可见肺部信号衰减减弱	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中可见低密度区，代表肺实质破坏和灌注减少，以及肺脉管系统稀疏。 
HP:0025397	呼吸系统异常	Mosaic attenuation pattern on pulmonary HRCT	A patchwork of intermingled areas of increased and decreased attenuation visualized on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography.	HRCT可见肺部镶嵌衰减模式 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中可见信号衰减增加及减弱相混杂的区域。 
HP:0025398	呼吸系统异常	Nodular-perilymphatic pattern on pulmonary HRCT	A nodular pattern on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography that has a perilymphatic distribution.	HRCT可见肺部淋巴管周围结节状结构 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中可见结节状结构分布于淋巴管周围。
HP:0025399	呼吸系统异常	Nodular-centrilobular with tree-in-bud pattern on pulmonary HRCT	A nodular pattern on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography that displays a tree-in-bud pattern, representing centrilobular branching structures that resemble a budding tree.	HRCT可见肺部结节状小叶中心树芽状结构 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中可见结节状小叶中心呈树芽状结构，即由小叶中心向周围延伸，类似于发芽的树枝。
HP:0025400	呼吸系统异常	Nodular-random pattern on pulmonary HRCT	A nodular pattern on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography that has an apparently random pattern.	HRCT可见肺部随机结节状结构	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中可见随机出现的结节状结构。
HP:0025401	眼部异常	Staring gaze	An abnormality in which the eyes are held permanently wide open.	凝视	持久性的眼球异常睁大。
HP:0025402	眼部异常	Square-wave jerks	Square wave jerks are saccadic eye movements which, when recorded with open eyes are considered to be a pathological sign, caused by fixation instability, and pointing to a central neurological lesion.	方波急跳	方波急跳是眼球扫视运动，当睁眼记录时，可出现病理征象，可能是由于注视不稳定和中央神经损伤引起的。

HP:0025420	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	Diffuse alveolar hemorrhage	A type of of pulmonary hemorrhage that originates from the pulmonary microcirculation, including the alveolar capillaries, arterioles, and venules. It presents with hemoptysis, anemia, diffuse lung infiltration, and acute respiratory failure. The diagnosis is confirmed by the observation of the accumulation of red blood cells, fibrin, or hemosiderin-laden macrophage in the alveolar space on pathologic biopsy. Hemosiderin, a product of hemoglobin degradation, appears at least 48-72 hours after bleeding and is helpful in distinguishing diffuse alveolar hemorrhage from surgical trauma. Mild interstitial thickening, organizing pneumonia, or diffuse alveolar damage can also be seen.	弥漫性肺泡出血	是一种源于肺微循环的肺出血，包括肺泡毛细血管、小动脉和小静脉。它表现为咯血、贫血、肺弥漫性浸润和急性呼吸衰竭等症状。可通过病理活检观察肺泡腔内红细胞、纤维蛋白或含血铁蛋白巨噬细胞的积累来确诊。血铁血黄素是血红蛋白降解的产物，在出血后至少48-72小时出现，有助于区分弥漫性肺泡出血和手术创伤。同时也可能出现轻度间质增厚、组织性肺炎或弥漫性肺泡损害等症状

HP:0025451	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Testicular adrenal rest tumor	Testicular adrenal rest tumor (TART) isa abenign tumor of the testis. TART generally occurs multiply and bilaterally within the rete testis. Histologically, TART resemble adrenocortical tissue, which led to the name. The tumous are not encapsulated and consist of sheets or confluent cords of large polygonal cells with abundant eosinophilic cytoplasm.	睾丸肾上腺残余肿瘤	睾丸肾上腺残余肿瘤(TART) 是一种睾丸的良性肿瘤。睾丸肿瘤好发于睾丸网，病灶形态多样且多呈双侧发病。组织学检查显示睾丸肿瘤类似于肾上腺皮质，因此而得名。肿瘤与周围组织分界清楚，睾丸组织呈片状或条索状分布，由大的多角形细胞组成，瘤细胞胞质丰富红染。
HP:0025452	体壁的异常	Pyoderma gangrenosum	A deep skin ulcer with a well defined border, which is usually violet or blue. The ulcer edge is often undermined (worn and damaged) and the surrounding skin is erythematous and indurated. The ulcer often starts as a small papule or collection of papules, which break down to form small ulcers with a so called cat's paw appearance. These coalesce and the central area then undergoes necrosis to form a single ulcer.	坏疽性脓皮病	有明确的边界的深层皮肤溃疡，通常为紫色或蓝色。溃疡边缘经常被破坏（磨损和损坏），周围的皮肤是红斑性和硬化性的。溃疡通常以小丘疹或丘疹的集合开始，这些丘疹会分解成小溃疡，并被称为猫爪的外观。这些合并和中心区域然后发生坏死形成一个单一的溃疡。
HP:0025453	内分泌系统异常,生长异常	Delayed adrenarche	Occurence of adrenarche at a later than normal age. Adrenarche normally occurs between six and eight years of age with increased adrenal androgen secretion; its exact biologic role is not well understood. It is accompanied by changes in pilosebaceous units, a transient growth spurt and the appearance of axillary and pubic hair in some children, but no sexual development.	肾上腺始动延迟	肾上腺始动的发生较正常年龄晚。肾上腺性动通常发生在6-8岁之间;它在生物学上的确切作用尚不清楚。伴有毛囊皮脂腺单元的变化，一些男童出现短暂的生长突增、出现腋毛和阴毛，但没有性发育。

HP:0025540	免疫系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal T cell subset distribution	['Any abnormality in the proportion T cells subsets relative to the total number of T cells.']	T细胞亚群分布异常	在总的T细胞中，T细胞亚群的比例异常。
HP:0025541	免疫系统异常	Decreased activity of complement receptor	A reduction of the activity of any component or product of the complement cascade and transmitting the signal from one side of the membrane to the other to initiate a change in cell activity.	补体受体活性减弱	补体级联反应和启动细胞活动改变的跨膜信号传递途径的组成成分或产物活性降低。
HP:0025546	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal mean corpuscular hemoglobin	['A deviation from the normal range of the average amount of hemoglobin per red blood cell (27 to 31 picograms/cell). A reduced mean corpuscular hemoglobin (MCH) may indicate a hypochromic anemia, but the MCH may be normal if both the total hemoglobin and the red blood cell count are reduced.']	红细胞平均血红蛋白量异常	每个红细胞的平均血红蛋白量降低（正常范围27-31pg/个）。平均血红蛋白量的降低提示低色素性贫血，但是如果总血红蛋白量及红细胞计数都降低，平均血红蛋白量也可表现为正常，
HP:0025547	血液和造血组织异常	Decreased mean corpuscular hemoglobin	['A reduction from the normal range of the average amount of hemoglobin per red blood cell (27 to 31 picograms/cell). A reduced mean corpuscular hemoglobin (MCH) may indicate a hypochromic anemia, but the MCH may be normal if both the total hemoglobin and the red blood cell count are reduced.']	红细胞平均血红蛋白量降低	每个红细胞的平均血红蛋白量降低（正常范围27-31pg/个）。平均血红蛋白量的降低提示低色素性贫血，但是如果总血红蛋白量及红细胞计数都降低，平均血红蛋白量也可表现为正常。
HP:0025548	血液和造血组织异常	Increased mean corpuscular hemoglobin	['An eklevation over the normal range of the average amount of hemoglobin per red blood cell (27 to 31 picograms/cell).']	红细胞平均血红蛋白量增加	每个红细胞的平均血红蛋白量较正常范围增加（正常范围27-31pg/个）。
HP:0025549	眼部异常	Eccentric visual fixation	A uniocular condition in which there is fixation of an object by a point other than the fovea. This point adopts the principal visual direction. The degree of the eccentric fixation is defined by its distance from the fovea in degrees.	偏心注视	一种单眼状态，物体被中央凹以外的一点所成像。注视点由主视觉眼别决定。偏心注视的程度由其与中央凹的距离(以度数表示)决定。
HP:0025550	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated circulating ribitol concentration	['An increase above the normal concentration of ribitol in the blood.']	核糖醇浓度增高	血液中核糖醇浓度高于正常水平。
HP:0025551	眼部异常	Optic nerve misrouting	['Abnormal decussation of the visual pathways, typically identified using visual evoked potentials (VEP) (asymmetrical distribution of the VEP over the posterior scalp).']	视神经错路	视觉通路的异常交叉，通常用视觉诱发电位（VEP）来确认（VEP在枕区头皮部不均匀分布）。
HP:0025552	头部和颈部的异常	Periorbital purpura	['Multiple red/purple spots on the skin that surrounds the eyes that do not blanch (whiten) upon pressure. Purpura is caused by subcutaneous bleeding.']	眶周紫癜	眼周皮肤上多个红色/紫色斑点，压迫后不会变白。紫癜是由皮下出血引起的。
HP:0025553	头部和颈部的异常	Periorbital ecchymosis with tarsal plate sparing	Subcutaneous bleeding with a diamter greater than 1 cm (ecchymosis). The bleeding does not extend into the tarsal plate (the comparatively thick, elongated plates of dense connective tissue within the eyelid) due to an anatomic structure called the orbital septum, which limits extravasation of blood beyond the tarsal plate.	不累及睑板的眶周瘀斑	皮下出血，直径大于1厘米(瘀斑)。出血不会延伸到睑板(眼睑内相对较厚、细长的致密结缔组织板)，原因是一种称为眶隔的解剖结构，它限制了睑板以外的血液渗出。
HP:0025554	体壁的异常	Yellow nodule	A type of skin nodule (a lesions that is greater than either 10mm in both width and depth, and most frequently centered in the dermis or subcutaneous fat) with a yellowish coloration (that reflects a high lipid content of the lesion).	黄色结节	一种皮肤结节（宽度和深度任一大于10毫米的病变，常集中在真皮或皮下脂肪），呈黄色（反映了病灶处的高脂质含量）。
HP:0025555	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	Periungual teleangiectasia	['Telangiectasia (small dilated blood vessels) located near to the fingernails or toenails.']	甲周毛细血管扩张	指甲或脚趾甲附近的毛细血管扩张（小型扩张血管）
HP:0025558	眼部异常	Lamellar cataract with riders	Lamellar cataracts with associated linear lens opacities radially extending towards the periphery of the lens.	板层白内障（绕核白内障）	板层白内障伴有线性形晶状体混浊，并呈放射状向晶状体周边延伸。
HP:0025559	眼部异常	Coronary cataract	A type of cataract characterised by club-shaped and dot opacities distributed radially in the deep cortex. These lens opacities surround the nucleus in an appearance that is though to resemble a crown.	冠状白内障	一种白内障类型，特征表现为晶状体深层皮质出现棒状或点状呈放射状分布的混浊。 这些晶状体混浊物包绕着核，形似花冠。
HP:0025560	眼部异常	Anterior chamber cells	Tiny deposits corresponding to cells floating in the anterior chamber of the eye. This appearance is typically associated with intraocular inflammation leading to breakdown of the blood-aqueous barrier and resulting in an increase in the number of cells and in the aqueous humor. Grading (SUN Working Group) is performed by estimating the number of cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞	漂浮在眼前房中类似于细胞的微小沉积物。这种现象通常与眼内炎症有关，血-房水屏障被破坏并导致房水中细胞数量的增加。运用裂隙灯显微镜，采用适当的光强度和放大倍率，通过估计1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中的细胞数目来进行分级（葡萄膜炎的国际标准命名）。
HP:0025561	眼部异常	Anterior chamber cells grade 1+	Anterior chamber cells with 6-15 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级1+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到6-15个前房细胞。
HP:0025562	眼部异常	Anterior chamber cells grade 0.5+	Anterior chamber cells with 1-5 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级0.5+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到1-5个前房细胞。
HP:0025563	眼部异常	Anterior chamber cells grade 0	Anterior chamber cells with less than one cell in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级0	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中没有观察到前房细胞。
HP:0025564	眼部异常	Anterior chamber cells grade 2+	Anterior chamber cells with 16-25 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级2+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到16-25个前房细胞。
HP:0025565	眼部异常	Anterior chamber cells grade 3+	['Anterior chamber cells with 26-50 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.']	前房细胞等级3+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到26-50个前房细胞。
HP:0025566	眼部异常	Anterior chamber cells grade 4+	Anterior chamber cells with more than 50 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级4+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到超过50个前房细胞。
HP:0025567	眼部异常	Central serous chorioretinopathy	An anomaly of the retina with serous detachment of the neurosensory retina secondary to one or more focal lesions of the retinal pigment epithelium (RPE), and associated with blurred vision, usually in one eye only and perceived typically by the patient as a dark spot in the centre of the visual field with associated micropsia and metamorphopsia. Normal vision often recurs spontaneously within a few months.	中心性浆液性脉络膜视网膜病变	视网膜异常，即继发于视网膜色素上皮细胞（RPE）的一个或多个局灶性病变的视网膜感觉层严重脱离，与视力模糊有关，通常单眼受累，典型患者在视野中央感到与视物显小症和视物变形症有关的黑斑。正常视力往往在几个月内自行恢复。
HP:0025568	眼部异常	Abnormal morphology of the choroidal vasculature		脉络膜血管形态异常	
HP:0025569	眼部异常	Polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy	The presence of aneurysmal polypoidal lesions in the choroidal vasculature. The aneurysmal dilatations, also known as polyps, may be found at subfoveal, juxtafoveal, extrafoveal, peripapillary or even peripheral regions. These polypoidal dilatations may be visible as reddish-orange subretinal nodules during ophthalmoscopic examination. The polypoidal lesions are best detected on indocyanine green angiography (ICGA) and might be associated with a branching vascular network (BVN) of neovascularization.	息肉样脉络膜血管病变	脉络膜血管系统中存在动脉瘤样息肉样变。 动脉瘤样扩张的血管亦称为息肉，可见于黄斑中央凹、旁中央、中央凹外、视乳头甚至周边区域。 这些息肉样病变可在检眼镜下以视网膜下橘红色结节的形式出现。 息肉样脉络膜血管病变的检测金标准是吲哚菁绿血管造影（ICGA），其成因可能与分支血管网（BVN）的新血管形成有关。
HP:0025570	眼部异常	Choroidal vascular hyperpermeability	Increased tendency of choiroidal blood vessels to allow fluids to leak characterized by multifocal choroidal hyperfluorescence on indocyanine green angiography (ICGA).	脉络膜血管高通透状态	脉络膜血管易渗漏，以在吲哚菁绿血管造影术（ICGA）中呈现广泛脉络膜强荧光为特征。
HP:0025571	眼部异常	Christman tree cataract	A type of cataract that shows a spectacular display of multiple colours that glitters with the change of incident light like an illuminated Christmas tree.	圣诞树样白内障	一种白内障类型，可表现出多种颜色，并可随着入射光的变化而闪烁，就像一棵发光的圣诞树。
HP:0025572	头部和颈部的异常	Punctal stenosis	Punctal stenosis is a condition in which the external opening of the lacrimal canaliculus is narrowed or occluded.	泪小点膜性闭塞	泪小点狭窄是指泪小管外部开口变窄或闭塞的情况。

HP:0025578	心血管系统异常	Aortic valve prolapse	Aortic valve prolapse can be diagnosed when either or both of the right or non-coronary aortic valve cusps (seen in the cross sectional echocardiographic long axis view) show backward bowing towards the left ventricle beyond a line joining the points of attachment of the aortic valve leaflets to the annulus.	主动脉瓣脱垂	主动脉瓣脱垂可以通过右主动脉瓣和（或）非冠状主动脉瓣尖（横截面超声心动图长轴图中可见）呈向左心室向后弯曲，超过连接主动脉瓣叶附着点的线到环进行诊断。
