HP:0025582	心血管系统异常,眼部异常,血液和造血组织异常	Submacular hemorrhage	Bleeding between the neurosensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium (RPE) arising from the choroidal or retinal circulation.	黄斑下出血	视网膜神经感觉层和视网膜色素上皮（RPE）之间的出血，由脉络膜或视网膜循环引起。
HP:0025583	眼部异常	Tapetal-like fundal reflex	["Golden, scintillating, particulate reflection noted on fundus examination (typically in the macula and sparing the fovea). The term tapetal is used to describe this 'metallic' sheen appearance as it is thought to be similar to the 'tapetal' reflex seen in the eyes of certain animals."]	绒毡层样眼底反射	"眼底检查中观察到的金色的、闪烁的微粒反射（典型的是在黄斑而中心凹少见）。术语绒毡层样是用于描述这种'金属'光泽外观，与某些动物的眼中的明毯反光类似 。
"
HP:0025584	眼部异常	Hypotropia	A form of manifest strabismus (heterotropia) in which one eye is deviated downwards when both eyes are open.	下斜视	一种显性斜视（显斜），在两眼睁开时，一眼偏移向下看。
HP:0025585	眼部异常	Hyperphoria	Tendency for the visual ais of one eye to be higher than that of the other.	上隐斜	一眼视轴相比于另一眼高。
HP:0025586	眼部异常	Hypertropia	A type of strabismus characterized by permanent upward deviation of the visual axis of one eye.	上斜视	一种以一眼恒定性向上视轴分离为特征的斜视。
HP:0025587	眼部异常	Hyperdeviation	A type of strabismus in which the visual axis of one eye is higher than that of the other.	上斜视	斜视眼视轴高于另一眼的一类斜视。
HP:0025588	眼部异常	Hypodeviation	A type of strabismus in which the visual axis of one eye is higher than that of the other.	下斜视	斜视眼视轴低于另一眼的一类斜视。
HP:0025589	眼部异常	Cyclodeviation	Cyclodeviation is defined as the rotation of an eyeball along the anteroposterior axis and cyclotropia as a misalignment of cyclodeviation between the two eyes.	旋转隐斜	旋转斜视是一眼围绕其前后轴旋转倾斜，使双眼视线不平行。
HP:0025590	眼部异常	Abnormal extraocular muscle physiology	['A functional anomaly of the muscles of the eye.']	异常眼外肌生理	眼部肌肉功能异常。
HP:0025591	眼部异常	Abnormal superior oblique muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the superior oblique muscle, a fusiform muscle that originates in the upper, medial side of the orbit. The superior oblique muscle abducts, depresses and internally rotates the eye, and is the only extraocular muscle innervated by the fourth cranial nerve.	上斜肌生理异常	上斜肌的功能性异常，上斜肌是起源于眼眶上内侧的梭形肌，可外转、下转和内旋眼球，是第四颅神经支配的唯一眼外肌。
HP:0025592	眼部异常	Superior oblique muscle weakness	['Decreased strength of the superior oblique muscle.']	上斜肌无力	上斜肌肌力下降。
HP:0025593	眼部异常	Superior oblique muscle restriction	Mechanical limitation of the range of movement of the superior oblique muscle.	上斜肌受限	上斜肌运动范围的机械性限制。
HP:0025594	眼部异常	Superior oblique muscle overaction	An ocular motility abnormality characterized by an overacting superior oblique muscle resulting to vertical incomitance of the eyes in lateral gaze. On examination, this is commonly seen as a downshoot of the adducting eye occuring when gaze is directed into the field of action of the inferior oblique muscle, producing a greater downward excursion of the adducted eye than of the abducted eye.	上斜肌过伸	一种眼球运动异常，其特征是由上斜肌过度活动而导致侧向凝视时双眼垂直方向不协调。在检查中，当眼球运动在上斜肌作用范围内，常可见内旋眼球向下偏移，且比外展的眼球偏移量更大。
HP:0025595	眼部异常	Superior oblique muscle underaction	Reduced ocular movement of the superior oblique muscle which improves on testing ductions, typically associated with neurogenic palsy.	上斜肌功能不全	上斜肌的运动减少可提高测试结果，通常与神经源性麻痹有关。
HP:0025596	眼部异常	Abnormal inferior oblique muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the inferior oblique muscle, an extraocular muscle that has its origin on the maxillary bone just posterior to the inferior medial orbital rim and lateral to the nasolacrimal canal and that is innervated by the inferior branch of the oculomotor nerve.	下斜肌生理异常	下斜肌的功能性异常，下斜肌起源于上颌骨下方内侧眶缘和鼻泪管外侧，是由动眼神经分支支配的眼外肌。
HP:0025597	眼部异常	Inferior oblique muscle restriction	Mechanical limitation of the range of movement of the inferior oblique muscle.	下斜肌受限	下斜肌运动范围的机械限制。
HP:0025598	眼部异常	Inferior oblique muscle weakness	Decreased strength of the inferior oblique muscle.	下斜肌无力	下斜肌力量下降。
HP:0025599	眼部异常	Inferior oblique muscle overaction	A common ocular motility disorder characterized by vertical incomitance of the eyes in lateral gaze. In primary inferior oblique muscle overaction, an upshoot of the adducting eye occurs when gaze is directed into the field of action of the inferior oblique muscle, producing a greater upward excursion of the adducted eye than of the abducted eye.	下斜肌过伸	一种常见的眼部运动障碍，其特征是在侧向凝视时双眼垂直方向不协调。 在原发性下斜肌功能亢进时，当眼球运动在下斜肌作用范围时，内收的眼别会向上偏移，且上移量比外展眼别的更大。
HP:0025600	眼部异常	Abnormal inferior rectus muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the inferior rectus muscle, which is innervated by the inferior division of oculomotor nerve and functions in the depression, adduction, and lateral rotation (extortion) of the eye.	下直肌生理异常	下直肌的功能性异常，下直肌由动眼神经下支支配，并起下转、内转和内旋的作用。
HP:0025601	眼部异常	Inferior rectus muscle weakness	Decreased strength of the inferior rectus muscle.	下直肌无力	下直肌强度下降。
HP:0025602	眼部异常	Inferior rectus muscle restriction	Mechanical limitation of the range of movement of the inferior rectus muscle.	下直肌受限	下直肌运动范围的机械限制。
HP:0025603	眼部异常	Abnormal superior rectus muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the superior rectus muscle, an extraocular muscle that is innervated by the superior division of the oculomotor nerve, and whose primary function is the elevation of the globe.	上直肌生理异常	上直肌的功能性异常，上直肌由动眼神经上分支支配，其主要功能是使眼球的上转。
HP:0025604	肿瘤,眼部异常	Orbital schwannoma	['A schwannoma (benign, usually encapsulated slow growing tumor composed of Schwann cells) located in the orbit.']	眼眶神经鞘瘤	眼眶内的一种神经鞘瘤(通常是由Schwann细胞组成的缓慢生长的良性肿瘤。
HP:0025605	眼部异常	Lid lag on downgaze	Delayed descent of the upper eyelid on downgaze. Also described by some authors as von Graefe sign.	上睑闭合延迟	上睑闭合时上睑下降延迟。 也被部分人认为是von Graefe标志。
HP:0025606	眼部异常	Abnormal medial rectus muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the medial rectus muscle, an extraocular muscle that is innervated by the inferior division of the oculomotor nerve and whose sole action is the adduction of the eyeball.	内直肌生理异常	内直肌的功能性异常，内直肌由动眼神经下支支配，其唯一作用是使眼球内收。
HP:0025607	头部和颈部的异常	Upper eyelid entropion	An inward turning (inversion) of the margin of the upper eyelid.	上眼睑内翻	上眼睑边缘向内翻(倒转)。
HP:0025608	头部和颈部的异常	Cicatricial ectropion	An outward turning (eversion) or rotation of the eyelid margin (i.e., ectropion) caused by shortening or contraction of the anterior or middle lamellae related to scarring.	瘢痕性睑外翻	眼睑边缘向外翻转(外翻)或旋转(即眼睑外翻)，由于瘢痕导致前板或中板的缩短或收缩引起。
HP:0025609	眼部异常,免疫系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Anterior blepharitis	A type of blepharitis that affects the eyelid skin, base of the eyelashes, and the eyelash follicles.	前部睑缘炎	发生在眼睑皮肤、睫毛根部和睫毛毛囊的一种睑缘炎。
HP:0025610	眼部异常,免疫系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Posterior blepharitis	A type of blepharitis that affects the meibomian glands and meobomian gland orifices. This abnormality can be associated with a spectrum of appearances ranging from meibomian seborrhoea (foaming meibomian gland secretions) and meibomianitis (inflamed meibomian glands), to chalazia.	后部睑缘炎	发生在睑板腺及其腺孔的一种睑缘炎。 这种异常可表现为睑板腺皮脂溢（泡沫状睑板腺分泌物）、睑板腺炎（睑板腺炎症）以及睑板腺囊肿。
HP:0025611	头部和颈部的异常	Epicanthus superciliaris	A type of epicanthus in which more extensive epicanthal folds with their origins in the eyebrow cover, pass in front of and lateral to the medial canthus (middle corner of the eye).	眉弓内眦赘皮	一种内眦赘皮，皮褶较宽，起源于眉弓，从眼角的前方和侧面延伸到眼角的中间。
HP:0025612	眼部异常	Corneal astigmatism	A type of refractive error related abnormal curvatures on the anterior or posterior surface of the cornea.	角膜性散光	与角膜前表面或后表面异常曲率有关的一种屈光不正类型。
HP:0030000	肌肉组织异常	EMG: Repetitive nerve stimulation abnormality	Abnormality observed upon electromyography when nerve studied is electrically stimulated six to ten times at 2 or 3 Hertz.	肌电图: 重复性神经电刺激异常	在2或3赫兹下电刺激6至10次，肌电图显示异常。
HP:0030001	头部和颈部的异常	Lagopthalmos	A condition in which the eyelids do not close to cover the eye completely.	睑裂闭合不全	指眼睑不能完全遮住眼睛的情况。
HP:0030002	头部和颈部的异常	Nocturnal lagophthalmos	The inability to close the eyelids during sleep.	夜间睑裂闭合不全	夜间睡眠时眼睑不能闭合。

HP:0030004	头部和颈部的异常	Cicatricial lagophthalmos	A type of lagophthalmos that occurs following trauma or surgery.	瘢痕性睑裂闭合不全	创伤或手术后发生的一类眼刺激。
HP:0030005	心血管系统异常	Capillary leak	An acute phenomenon characterized by hypotension and anasarca due to the loss of plasma volume into peripheral tissues, with evidence of decreased plasma volume (hemoconcentration) and protein loss from the intravascular space (hypoalbuminemia) during acute episodes.	毛细血管渗漏	由低血压和全身水肿特征引起的急性现象，由血浆流出到外周组织导致，伴有急性发作期间血管内空间（低白蛋白血症）的血浆体积（血液浓缩）和蛋白质损失减少。
HP:0030006	肌肉组织异常	Single fiber EMG abnormality	Abnormality in single fiber EMG recording, a technique that allows identification of action potentials (APs) from individual muscle fibers.	单纤维肌电图异常	单纤维肌电图异常，一种允许从个别肌肉纤维鉴别动作电位（APs）的技术。
HP:0030007	肌肉组织异常	EMG: Positive sharp waves	These are spontaneous firing action potentials stimulated by needle movement of an injured muscle fiber. There is propagation to, but not past, the needle tip. This inhibits the display of the negative deflection of the waveform.	肌电图: 正锐波	由针极刺激受伤的肌纤维引起的自发性放电。针极正向传播，这抑制了波形的负偏转显示。

HP:0030089	肌肉组织异常	Abnormal muscle fiber protein expression	An anomalous amount of protein present in or on the surface of muscle fibers. This feature may be appreciate upon immunohistochemical investigation of muscle biopsy tissue.	肌纤维蛋白表达异常	肌纤维内部或表面的蛋白表达量异常，这种特征可能会在肌肉活检组织的免疫组化检查中出现。
HP:0030090	肌肉组织异常	Abnormal muscle fiber merosin expression	An anomalous amount of merosin in muscle fibers. Merosin is a basement membrane-associated protein found in placenta, striated muscle, and peripheral nerve.	肌纤维层粘连蛋白α2表达异常	肌纤维中的分层蛋白表达量异常。分层蛋白是一种基础的膜结合蛋白，主要分布于胎盘中、横纹肌和末梢神经中。
HP:0030091	肌肉组织异常	Absent muscle fiber merosin	Lack of merosin protein in the muscle biopsy.	肌纤维层粘连蛋白α2缺失	肌肉活检组织中分层蛋白缺失。
HP:0030092	肌肉组织异常	Reduced muscle fiber merosin	A reduced amount of merosin in muscle fibers. This feature is usually assessed by immunohistochemical examination of muscle biopsy tissue.	肌纤维层粘连蛋白α2减少	肌纤维中分层蛋白表达量减少。这种特征经常出现于肌肉活检组织的免疫组化检查中。
HP:0030093	肌肉组织异常	Abnormal muscle fiber laminin beta 1	A deviation from normal of the amount of laminin beta 1 in muscle fiber tissue. Laminin 2 is a major component of the basal lamina of skeletal muscle cells. It is a heterotrimer composed of 3 chains: merosin (laminin alpha 2 chain), beta 1, and gamma 1.	肌纤维层粘连蛋白β1异常	肌纤维组织中层粘连蛋白β1表达量偏差。层粘连蛋白2是一种骨骼肌细胞基膜中主要的组成成分。它是一个异三聚体，由分层蛋白（层粘连蛋白α2链），β1和γ1组成。
HP:0030094	肌肉组织异常	Reduced muscle fiber laminin beta 1	A reduced amount of laminin beta 1 in muscle fiber tissue. Laminin 2 is a major component of the basal lamina of skeletal muscle cells. It is a heterotrimer composed of 3 chains: merosin (laminin alpha 2 chain), beta 1, and gamma 1.	肌纤维层粘连蛋白β1减少	肌纤维组织中层粘连蛋白β1表达量减少。层粘连蛋白2是一种骨骼肌细胞基膜中主要的组成成分。它是一个异三聚体，由分层蛋白（层粘连蛋白α2链），β1和γ1组成。

HP:0030096	肌肉组织异常	Abnormal muscle fiber dystrophin expression	A deviation from normal in the amount of dystrophin in muscle fiber tissue. HP:0030097	肌肉组织异常	Absent muscle dystrophin expression	Lack of dystrophin in muscle tissue. Immunohistochemistry reveals absent dystrophin protein in the muscle biopsy.	抗肌萎缩蛋白表达缺失	肌肉组织中肌营养不良蛋白表达减少。免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中肌营养不良蛋白缺乏。
HP:0030098	肌肉组织异常	Reduced muscle dystrophin expression	A decreased amount of dystrophin in muscle fiber tissue.	抗肌萎缩蛋白表达减少	肌纤维组织中肌营养不良蛋白表达减少。
HP:0030099	肌肉组织异常	Reduced muscle fiber alpha dystroglycan	Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced alpha dystroglycan protein in the muscle biopsy. Alpha-dystroglycan is a heavily glycosylated peripheral-membrane component of the dystrophin-associated glycoprotein complex (DAPC), which, in addition to laminin alpha2, binds perlecan and agrin in the extracellular matrix, whereas beta-dystroglycan, derived from the same gene, is a transmembrane protein that links to dystrophin intracellularly.	肌纤维α-肌营养不良蛋白聚糖减少	免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中α-肌营养不良蛋白减少。α-肌营养不良蛋白是一个重要的外周膜组成成分，由肌营养不良蛋白-糖蛋白的复合体组成，它与β-肌营养不良聚糖来自相同基因，在细胞内与肌营养不良蛋白结合成跨膜蛋白。除了层粘连蛋白α2、基底膜聚糖和细胞外基质中的聚集蛋白。
HP:0030100	肌肉组织异常	Abnormal muscle fiber alpha sarcoglycan	Deviation from normal in the amount of alpha sarcoglycan in muscle. The alpha, beta, gamma, and delta sarcoglycans are components of the dystrophin-complex. They are all N-glycosylated transmembrane proteins with a short intra-cellular domain, a single transmembrane region and a large extra-cellular domain containing a cluster of conserved cysteines.	肌纤维α-肌聚糖异常	肌肉中α肌糖聚糖表达量与正常值有偏差。 α，β，γ和δ聚糖都是肌营养不良蛋白复合物的组分成分。N-糖基化跨膜蛋白包含一个短的细胞内结构域、一个单个跨膜区和一个大的细胞外结构域含有保守半胱氨酸簇。

HP:0030112	肌肉组织异常	Abnormal muscle fiber alpha dystroglycan	A deviation from normal of muscle alpha-dystroglcan expression. HP:0030119	肌肉组织异常	Abnormal muscle fiber calpain-3	A deviation from normal in the amount of calpain-3 in muscle tissue. Calpains are intracellular nonlysosomal cysteine proteases modulated by calcium ions. A typical calpain is a heterodimer composed of two distinct subunits, one large (over 80 kDa) and the other small (30 kDa). While only one gene encoding the small subunit has been demonstrated, there are many genes for the large one. CAPN3 is similar to ubiquitous Calpain 1 and 2 (m-calpain and micro-calpain), but contains specific insertion sequences (NS, IS1 and IS2). Calpains cleave target proteins to modify their properties, rather than breaking down the substrates.	肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3异常	肌肉组织中钙蛋白酶-3表达量异常。钙蛋白酶是由钙离子调节的细胞内非溶酶体半胱氨酸蛋白酶。 典型的钙蛋白酶是由两个不同亚基组成的异源二聚体，一个大的（超过80kDa）和另一个小的（30kDa）。 虽然只有一个编码小亚基的基因已经被证实，但是大亚基有许多基因。 钙蛋白酶-3类似于普遍存在的钙蛋白酶1和2（m-钙蛋白酶和微钙蛋白酶），但包含特定的插入序列（NS，IS1和IS2）。 钙蛋白酶切割靶蛋白以修饰其性质，而不是分解底物。
HP:0030120	肌肉组织异常	Absent muscle fiber calpain-3	Western blot shows complete lack of calpain-3 protein in the muscle biopsy tissue.	肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3缺失	肌肉活检组织的蛋白质印迹显示钙蛋白酶-3缺失。
HP:0030121	肌肉组织异常	Reduced muscle fiber calpain-3	Western blot reveals reduced calpain-3 protein in the muscle biopsy tissue.	肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3减少	肌肉活检组织的蛋白质印迹显示钙蛋白酶-3减少。
HP:0030122	肌肉组织异常	Reduced muscle fiber perlecan	Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced perlecan protein in the muscle biopsy. Perlecan is a basement membrane-specific heparan sulfate proteoglycan core protein (HSPG) also known as heparan sulfate proteoglycan 2 (HSPG2).	肌肉纤维perlecan聚糖减少	免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中串珠蛋白聚糖减少。基底膜聚糖是基底膜特异性硫酸乙酰肝素蛋白聚糖的核心蛋白（HSPG），也称为硫酸乙酰肝素蛋白聚糖2（HSPG2）。
HP:0030123	肌肉组织异常	Abnormal muscle fiber lamin A/C	A deviation from the normal amount of lamin A/C in muscle tissue. The LMNA gene gives rise to at least three splicing isoforms including the two main isoforms, lamin A and lamin C. These are constitutive components of the fibrous nuclear lamina and have different roles, ranging from mechanical nuclear membrane maintenance to gene regulation.	肌肉纤维核纤层蛋白 A/C 异常	肌肉组织中核纤层蛋白 A/C表达量异常。LMNA基因调控产生至少3个剪接连接酶，包括2个主要的核纤层蛋白A和C。它们是纤维性核层的重要组成成分且具有不同的功能，从机械核膜修护到基因调控。
HP:0030124	肌肉组织异常	Reduced muscle fiber lamin A/C	A decreased amount of lamin A/C in muscle tissue. This feature can be shown by immunohistochemistry of Western blotting of muscle tissue.	肌肉纤维核纤层蛋白 A/C 减少	肌肉组织中核纤层蛋白 A/C表达量减少。肌肉组织的蛋白质印迹法免疫组化检查中可显示这种特征。

HP:0030129	血液和造血组织异常	Impaired ristocetin cofactor assay activity	Abnormal response to ristocetin as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of ristocetin to platelet-poor plasma.	瑞斯托辅因子测定活性降低	对瑞斯托菌素的异常反应，表现为向血小板缺乏的血浆中瑞斯托辅因子后，血小板聚集降低或缺乏。
HP:0030130	血液和造血组织异常	Impaired von Willibrand factor collagen binding activity	Reduced ability of von Willibrand factor (vWF) to bind collagen. Abnormal response to collagen as manifested by reduced or lacking ability of plasma von WIllebrand Factor to bind collagen. An ELISA-based assay is typically used; the test is sensitive to loss of von Willebrand Factor high molecular weight multimers.	血管性血友病因子胶原结合活性降低	 von Willibrand因子（vWF）结合胶原蛋白的能力降低。 对胶原蛋白的异常反应表现为血浆von WIlelerand因子结合胶原蛋白的能力降低或缺乏。 通常使用基于ELISA的测定法; 该测试对von Willebrand因子高分子量多聚体的损失敏感。
HP:0030131	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal von Willebrand Factor multimer distribution	Deviation from the normal von Willebrand Factor multimer pattern.	血管性血友病因子多聚体分布异常	偏离正常von Willebrand因子多聚体模式。
HP:0030132	血液和造血组织异常	Absence of large von Willibrand factor multimers	Absence of large von Willebrand Factor multimers on gel electrophoresis.	大型血管性血友病因子多聚体缺失	凝胶电泳上缺少大型von Willebrand因子多聚体
HP:0030133	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal presence of ultra-large von Willebrand Factor multimers	Detection of abnormal ultra-large von Willebrand factor multimers.	超大型血管性血友病因子多聚体异常存在	检测到异常的超大型von Willebrand因子多聚体。
HP:0030134	血液和造血组织异常	Total absence von Willebrand Factor multimers	Complete bsence of all von Willebrand factor multimers.	血管性血友病因子多聚体完全缺失	所有血管性血友病因子多聚体完全缺失
HP:0030135	血液和造血组织异常	Absence of intermediate von Willibrand factor multimers	Lack of intermediate von Willebrand Factor multimers on gel electrophoresis.	中型血管性血友病因子多聚体缺失	凝胶电泳上缺乏中间体von Willebrand因子多聚体
HP:0030136	血液和造血组织异常	Enhanced ristocetin cofactor assay activity	Abnormal response to ristocetin as manifested by increased aggregation of platelets upon addition of low-dose ristocetin to platelet-rich plasma.	瑞斯托辅因子测定活性增加	瑞斯托菌素的反应异常，表现为向血小板丰富的血浆中加入瑞斯托菌素，血小板聚集增加。
HP:0030137	血液和造血组织异常	Prolonged bleeding following circumcision	Bleeding that persists for a longer than usual time following circumcision.	包皮环切术后出血时间延长	包皮环切术后出血时间比平时延长
HP:0030138	血液和造血组织异常	Excessive bleeding from superficial cuts	An abnormally increased degree of bleeding following a superfical injury to the surface of the skin.	表皮割伤出血过多	皮肤表面浅层受伤后出血程度异常增加
HP:0030139	血液和造血组织异常	Excessive bleeding after a venipuncture	An abnormal high amount of bleeding following the procedure of taking a blood sample.	静脉穿刺后出血过多	取血操作后出血量异常高
HP:0030140	头部和颈部的异常,血液和造血组织异常	Oral cavity bleeding	Recurrent or excessive bleeding from the mouth.	口腔出血	口腔反复过量出血
HP:0030141	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Abnormality of the posterior hairline	An anomaly in the placement or shape of the hairline (trichion) on the back of the head (neck), that is, the border between skin on the back of the head that has head hair and that does not.	后发际异常	头（颈）后发际线形状或位置的异常，发际线即头颈后有发和无发区域之间的分界线。
HP:0030142	消化系统异常	Abnormal bowel sounds	An anomaly of the amount or nature of abdominal sounds. Abdominal sounds (bowel sounds) are made by the movement of the intestines as they promote passage of abdominal contents by peristalsis.	肠鸣音异常	肠鸣音的数量和性质的异常。肠鸣音（肠鸣音）因肠道蠕动使内容物通过而产生。
HP:0030143	消化系统异常	Hyperactive bowel sounds	An increased amount of bowel sounds.	肠鸣音亢进	肠鸣音数量增加。
HP:0030144	消化系统异常	Hypoactive bowel sounds	An decreased amount of bowel sounds.	肠鸣音减弱	#####
HP:0030145	消化系统异常	Lack of bowel sounds	Complete lack of abdominal sounds as assayed by examination of the abdomen with a stethoscope.	肠鸣音消失	听诊评估腹部发现肠鸣音完全消失。
HP:0030146	消化系统异常	Abnormal liver parenchyma morphology	#####	肝实质形态异常	#####
HP:0030147	神经系统异常	Truncal titubation	Tremor of the trunk in an anterior-posterior plane at 3-4 Hz.	躯干蹒跚	躯干在前-后平面以3-4 Hz的频率震颤。
HP:0030148	心血管系统异常	Heart murmur	An extra or unusual sound heard during a heartbeat caused vibrations resulting from the flow of blood through the heart.	心脏杂音	在心跳期间听到的额外或不寻常的声音，由血液通过心脏流动的振动引起。
HP:0030149	心血管系统异常	Cardiogenic shock	Severely decreased cardiac output with evidence of inadequate end-organ perfusion (i.e., tissue hypoxia) in the presence of adequate intravascular volume.	心源性休克	在血管内体足够的情况下，严重降低心输出量，伴器官内灌注不足（如组织缺氧）的现象。
HP:0030150	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Plasmacytosis	An abnormally increased number of plasma cells in tissues, exudates, or blood	浆细胞增多症	组织、渗出物或血液中浆细胞数目异常增加
HP:0030151	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Cholangitis	Inflammation of the biliary ductal system, affecting the intrahepatic or extrahepatic portions, or both.	胆管炎	胆管系统的炎症，累及肝内或肝外部分，或两者均受累。
HP:0030153	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Cholangiocarcinoma	Cholangiocarcinoma is a primary cancer originating in the biliary epithelium i.e., the cholangiocytes, of the extrahepatic and intrahepatic biliary ducts. It is extremely invasive, develops rapidly, often metastasizes, and has a very poor prognosis. They are slow growing tumors which spread longitudinally along the bile ducts with neural, perineural and subepithelial extension.	胆管癌	胆管癌是起源于肝外或肝内胆管的胆管上皮（即胆管细胞）的原发癌。通常生长缓慢，延胆管纵向扩展，伴有神经、神经周围及上皮下扩散。
HP:0030154	消化系统异常	Gallbladder perforation	Rupture of the wall of the gallbladder.	胆囊穿孔	胆囊壁破裂。
HP:0030155	泌尿生殖系统异常,神经系统异常	Scrotal pain	An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the scrotum.	阴囊疼痛	位于阴囊的身体不适（例如刺痛、悸动或疼痛）的令人不愉快的感觉。
HP:0030156	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Bence Jones Proteinuria	The presence of free monoclonal immunoglobulin light chains in the urine.	本氏蛋白尿	#####

HP:0030158	泌尿生殖系统异常	Cervical ectropion	Eversion of the endocervix with protrusion of the central (endocervical) columnar epithelium through the external os of the cervix into the vaginal milieu.	宫颈外翻	子宫颈内膜和中央(子宫)柱状上皮通过子宫颈外口翻转突入阴道中。
HP:0030159	泌尿生殖系统异常	Cervical polyp	Abnormal growth of tissue projecting from a mucous membrane of the endocervix.	宫颈息肉	从子宫颈内膜的粘膜凸出来的异常生长的组织。
HP:0030160	泌尿生殖系统异常	Cervicitis	Inflammation of the uterine cervix.	宫颈炎	子宫颈炎症。

HP:0030164	心血管系统异常	Jaw claudication	Pain in the jaw or ear induced by chewing or otherwise moving the jaw.	颌跛行	通过咀嚼或以其他方式移动颌骨引起的下颚或耳朵疼痛。
HP:0030165	心血管系统异常	Temporal artery tortuosity	The presence of an increased number of twists and turns of the retinal artery.	颞动脉迂曲	视网膜动脉数量、曲折增多。
HP:0030166	体壁的异常	Night sweats	Occurence of excessive sweating during sleep.	盗汗	睡眠期间出汗过度。
HP:0030167	免疫系统异常	Antimitochondrial antibody positivity	The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against mitochondria.	线粒体抗体阳性	血清中存在抗线粒体的自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）
HP:0030168	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	Dilated superficial abdominal veins	Increase in diameter of the veins located underneath the skin of the abdomen.	腹壁浅静脉扩张	腹部皮肤下方静脉直径增加。
HP:0030169	消化系统异常	Gastric varix	Extreme dilation of the submucusoal veins in the stomach.	胃静脉曲张	胃部粘膜下静脉的极度扩张。
HP:0030170	消化系统异常	Cystic artery pseudoaneurysm	Presence of a pseudoaneurysm in the artery that supplies the gallbladder and cystic duct with blood. A pseudoaneurysm, also known as a false aneurysm, forms when blood leaks through a breach of the arterial wall but is contained by the adventitia or surrounding perivascular soft tissue.	胆囊假性动脉瘤	供应胆囊及胆囊管血供的动脉存在假性动脉瘤。假性动脉瘤是在血液自动脉壁破口溢出但被外膜或血管周围软组织所局限时形成。
HP:0030171	泌尿生殖系统异常	Perirenal hematoma	A collection of clotted blood surrounding the kidney.	肾周血肿	肾脏周围凝结的血液。
HP:0030172	神经系统异常	Peripheral amyelination	Congenital absence of the myelin sheath on a nerve.	周围神经无髓鞘	先天性神经髓鞘缺失。

HP:0030174	神经系统异常	Increased peripheral myelin thickness	Elevated thickness of the myelin sheath of peripheral nerves, in a regular and concentric fashion.	周围神经髓鞘厚度增加	以规则和同心的方式提升周围神经髓鞘的厚度。
HP:0030175	神经系统异常	Myelin tomacula	The presence of multiple sausage-shaped swellings of the myelin sheath (The Latin tomaculum means sausage).	腊肠状髓鞘	存在髓鞘的多种香肠形状的肿胀（拉丁语tomaculum是指香肠）。
HP:0030176	神经系统异常	Asymmetric peripheral demyelination	Loss of myelin from peripheral nerves in a pattern that differs between right and left.	不对称性周围神经脱髓鞘	外周神经失去髓鞘，且左右不对称。
HP:0030177	神经系统异常	Abnormality of peripheral nervous system electrophysiology	An abnormality of the function of the electrical signals with which peripheral nerve cells communicate with each other or with muscles.	周围神经系统电生理异常	周围神经细胞与其相互连通或与肌肉连通的电信号的功能异常。
HP:0030178	神经系统异常	Abnormality of central nervous system electrophysiology	#####	中枢神经系统电生理异常	#####
HP:0030179	神经系统异常	Abnormal peripheral action potential amplitude	An anomaly in the magnitude of the action potential along a peripheral nerve, that is, of the rapid rise and fall of the electrical membrane potential of the nerve.	周围神经动作电位波幅异常	沿着周围神经的动作电位的大小的异常，即神经的电膜电位的急剧上升和下降。
HP:0030180	神经系统异常	Oppenheim reflex	Dorsiflexion of the big toe, sometimes accompanied by fanning of the other toes, elicited by stroking along the medial side of the tibia (the normal response would be no movement of the big toe).	奥本海姆反射	由沿着胫骨内侧抚摸而引起的大脚趾的背屈，有时伴随着其他脚趾的颤动（正常的反应将不会是大脚趾的运动）。
HP:0030181	神经系统异常	Gordon reflex	Dorsal extension of the big toe, sometimes accompanied by fanning of the other toes, elicited by compressing the calf muscles (a normal response is no movement of the big toe).	戈登反射	#####
HP:0030182	神经系统异常	Tetraplegia/tetraparesis	Loss of strength in all four limbs. Tetraplegia refers to a complete loss of strength, whereas Tetraparesis refers to an incomplete loss of strength.	四肢瘫痪/四肢轻瘫	四肢丧失力量。四肢瘫痪指完全丧失力量，而四肢轻瘫指的是不完全的力量丧失。
HP:0030183	耳部异常	Impaired visually enhanced vestibulo-ocular reflex	The vestibulo-ocular reflex is responsible for the stabilization of the retinal image during movement. The visual vestibular ocular reflex (VVOR) or visual enhanced VOR, maintains ocular stability during head motion by generating compensatory eye movement opposite to head movement, and is a major component of visual vestibularninteraction. This feature is an impairment of this reflex, manifested as the combined impairment of the three compensatory eye movement reflexes, namely the vestibulo-ocular reflex (VOR), smooth pursuit (SP) and optokinetic reflex (OKR).	受损的视觉增强的前庭眼反射	运动过程中视网膜图像的稳定依靠前庭眼反射。视觉VOR或视觉增强VOR是视觉和前庭相互作用的主要组成部分，通过与头部运动相反的代偿性的眼运动来维持眼部的稳定性。疾病特点为该反射受损，表现为三种代偿性的眼运动反射受损，分别是前庭-眼反射（VOR），平稳追踪（SP)和视动反射（OKR）。
HP:0030185	神经系统异常	Isometric tremor	An isometric tremor occurs with muscle contraction against a rigid stationary object (e.g., when making a fist).	等轴性震颤	对于刚性静止物体（如拳头），肌肉收缩时发生等轴震颤。
HP:0030186	神经系统异常	Kinetic tremor	Tremor that occurs during any voluntary movement. It may include visually or non-visually guided movements. Tremor during target directed movement is called intention tremor.	活动性震颤	在任何随意运动中发生的震颤。它可以包括视觉或非视觉指导的运动。随意运动期间的震颤称为意图震颤。
HP:0030187	神经系统异常	Titubation	Nodding movement of the head or body.	蹒跚	头或身体点头样动作。
HP:0030188	神经系统异常	Tremor by anatomical site	Tremor classified by the affected body part.	按解剖部位分类的震颤	按解剖部位分类的震颤。
HP:0030190	肌肉组织异常	Oral motor hypotonia	Reduced muscle tone of oral musculature. In infants, this feature may be associated with difficulties in breast feeding, and may affetc the latch, jaw motions, tongue placement, lip seal, suck/swallow/breathe pattern and overall feeding behavior.	口腔运动肌张力减退	口腔肌肉的肌张力减小。 在婴儿期，该特征可能与母乳喂养困难相关，并且可能影响闩锁、颌运动、舌放置、闭唇、吸吮/吞咽/呼吸模式和总体喂养行为。
HP:0030191	神经系统异常	Abnormal peripheral nervous system synaptic transmission	An anomaly in the communication from a neuron to a target across a synapse in the peripheral nervous system.	周围神经系统突触传递异常	在神经元到外周神经系统突触间的通讯异常。
HP:0030192	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Fatigable weakness of bulbar muscles	A type of weakness of the bulbar muscles (muscles of the mouth and throat responsible for speech and swallowing) that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	口咽部肌肉疲劳性无力	一种肌群活动之后发生的延髓肌无力（负责言语和吞咽的口腔和喉部肌肉），休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
HP:0030193	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Fatigable weakness of chewing muscles	A type of weakness of the muscles involved in chewing that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	咀嚼肌疲劳性无力	一种发生在肌群运动后影响咀嚼的肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
HP:0030194	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Fatigable weakness of speech muscles	A type of weakness of the muscles involved in speech that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	发音肌肉疲劳性无力	一种发生在肌群运动后影响发音的肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
HP:0030195	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Fatigable weakness of swallowing muscles	A type of weakness of the muscles involved in swallowing that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	吞咽肌肉疲劳性无力	一种发生在肌群运动后影响吞咽的肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
HP:0030196	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Fatigable weakness of respiratory muscles	A type of weakness of the muscles involved in breathing (respiration) that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	呼吸肌疲劳性无力	一种发生在肌群运动后影响呼吸的肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
HP:0030197	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Fatigable weakness of skeletal muscles	A type of weakness of skeletal muscle that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	骨骼肌疲劳性无力	一种发生在肌群运动后的骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
HP:0030198	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Fatigable weakness of distal limb muscles	A type of weakness of a skeletal muscle of distal part of a limb that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	远端肢体肌肉疲劳性无力	一种发生在肌群运动后的远端肢体骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
HP:0030199	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Fatigable weakness of neck muscles	A type of weakness of a skeletal muscle in the neck that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	颈部肌肉疲劳性无力	一种通常发生在肌群运动后的颈部骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
HP:0030200	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	Fatiguable weakness of proximal limb muscles	A type of weakness of a skeletal muscle of proximal part of a limb that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	近端肢体肌肉疲劳性无力	一种通常发生在肌群运动后的近端肢体骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
HP:0030201	神经系统异常	Response to drugs acting on neuromuscular transmission	Specific drugs interfere selectively with the different cellular mechanisms involved in neuromuscular transmission (synthesis, storage, release, action and inactivation of transmitter). The response of a patient to a specific drug can therefore be useful information for the differential diagnosis.	对作用于神经肌肉传递过程的药物的反应	特定药物选择性地干扰神经肌肉传播（神经递质的合成，储存，释放，作用和失活）中涉及的不同细胞机制。因此，患者对特定药物反应的信息可用于鉴别诊断。
HP:0030202	神经系统异常	Favorable response of weakness to acetylcholine esterase inhibitors	Improvement of muscle strength in response to administration of an acetylcholine esterase inhibitor.	肌无力对乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂的反应好	乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂的使用能提升肌肉力量。
HP:0030203	神经系统异常	Unfavorable response of muscle weakness to acetylcholine esterase inhibitors	Lack of improvement of muscle strength in response to administration of an acetylcholine esterase inhibitor.	肌无力对乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂的反应不佳	使用乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂无法有效提升肌肉力量。
HP:0030205	肌肉组织异常	Increased jitter at single fibre EMG	The variation in the time interval between the two action potentials of the same motor unit is called jitter. This term therefore applies to increased variability in the interval between successive action potentials of the same motor unit, which is measured by electromyography (EMG).	单纤维肌电图时抖动增加	同一运动单位的两个动作电位之间的时间间隔变化被称为抖动。因此，该术语适用于通过肌电图（EMG）测量的相同运动单位的连续动作电位之间的时间间隔的变异增加时。
HP:0030206	肌肉组织异常	EMG: incremental response of compound muscle action potential to repetitive nerve stimulation	A compound muscle action potential (CMAP) is a type of electromyography (EMG). CMAP refers to a group of almost simultaneous action potentials from several muscle fibers in the same area evoked by stimulation of the supplying motor nerve and are recorded as one multipeaked summated action potential. This abnormality refers to an abnormal increase in the amplitude during the course of the investigation.	肌电图: 复合肌肉动作电位对于重复神经刺激的反应递增	复合肌肉动作电位（CMAP）是肌电图（EMG）的一种。 CMAP是指一组来自同一区域的几种肌肉纤维，由运动神经刺激诱发的几乎同时发生的动作电位，并且记录为一个多重加和的总动作电位。这种异常是指在研究过程中振幅的异常增加。
HP:0030207	呼吸系统异常	Paradoxical respiration	Breathing movements in which the chest wall moves in on inspiration and out on expiration, in reverse of the normal movements. It may be seen in children with respiratory distress of any cause, which leads to indrawing of the intercostal spaces during inspiration. Patients with chronic airways obstruction also show indrawing of the lower ribs during inspiration, due to the distorted action of a depressed and flattened diaphragm. Crush injuries of the chest, with fractured ribs and sternum, can lead to a severe degree of paradoxical breathing.	反常呼吸运动	呼吸运动时胸壁在正常的吸气和呼气运动中反向移动。该现象可在任何原因导致的呼吸困难的儿童中出现，从而导致在启发过程中排空肋间。慢性气道阻塞的患者由于受压和扁平隔膜的扭曲作用，在吸气期间也显示出下肋骨的牵引力。粉碎胸部受伤，肋骨骨折和胸骨骨折，可导致严重程度的反常呼吸运动。
HP:0030208	免疫系统异常	Acetylcholine receptor antibody positivity	The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against the acetylcholine receptor.	乙酰胆碱受体抗体阳性	血清中存在对抗乙酰胆碱受体自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）
HP:0030209	免疫系统异常	Calcium channel antibody positivity	The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against voltage-gated calcium channels.	钙通道抗体阳性	血清中存在对抗电压门控钙通道的自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）
HP:0030210	免疫系统异常	Muscle specific kinase antibody positivity	The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against muscle specific kinase (anti-MuSK Ab).	肌肉特异性激酶抗体阳性	血清中存在对抗肌肉特异性激酶的自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）

HP:0030217	神经系统异常	Limb apraxia	Difficulty in performing the correct execution of limbs movements in absence of motor impairment.	肢体失用症	在没有运动障碍的情况下难以正确进行四肢运动。
HP:0030218	神经系统异常	Punding	Punding is a stereotypical motor behavior characterized by an intense fascination with repetitive, excessive and non-goal oriented handling, and examining of objects.	刻板行为	是一种刻板的运动行为，其特征是对重复、过度和非目标导向的处理、对对象检查的强烈迷恋。
HP:0030219	神经系统异常	Semantic dementia	A progressive loss of the ability to remember the meaning of words, faces and objects.	语义性痴呆	记忆词、面和物的意义的能力逐渐丧失。
HP:0030220	神经系统异常	Socially inappropriate behavior	Behavior that is not in line with social norms.	社交不当行为	社交行为异常。
HP:0030221	神经系统异常	Sweet craving	Excessive desire to eat sweet foods.	嗜甜食	食用甜食的欲望过于强烈。
HP:0030222	神经系统异常	Visual agnosia	Difficulty in recognizing objects by visual input in absence of sensorial visual impairment.	视觉失认症	在没有感觉视觉障碍的情况下，不能通过视觉输入识别对象。
HP:0030223	神经系统异常	Perseveration	Perseveration can be defined as the contextually inappropriate and unintentional repetition of a response or behavioral unit. In other words, the observed repetitiveness does not meet the demands of the situation, is not the product of deliberation, and may even unfold despite counterintention. Perseveration can therefore be differentiated from goal-directed and intentional forms of repetition, such as linguistic redundancies designed to enhance communicative or poetic impact.	持续症现象	持续症现象可以被定义为反应或行为单位的上下文不适当和无意的重复。换句话说，观察到的行为重复性不适用于当时情况，不是思维或意识的产物。因此，持续症现象可以区别于目标导向和故意的重复，如旨在增强表达或增加诗意而产生的语言冗余。
HP:0030224	肌肉组织异常	Abnormal muscle fiber desmin	A deviation from normal in the expression of desmin in muscle tissue. Desmin is an 53-KDa protein.	肌肉纤维结蛋白异常	肌肉组织中结蛋白表达量异常。结蛋白是一个53-KDa的蛋白质。

HP:0030230	肌肉组织异常	Central core regions in muscle fibers	The presence of disorganized areas called cores in the center of muscle fibers. There is a typical appearance of the biopsy on light microscopy, where the muscle cells have cores that are devoid of mitochondria and specific enzymes. Cores are typically well demarcated and centrally located, but may occasionally be multiple and of eccentric.	肌肉纤维中央轴空	存在的分裂区域也称为轴空区在肌肉纤维中心。在光学显微镜下存在活检的典型外观，其中肌肉细胞具有缺乏线粒体和特异性酶的核心。轴空区通常被良好地划定并且位于中心，但偶尔也是多重的和偏中心的。

HP:0030357	肿瘤,呼吸系统异常	Small cell lung carcinoma	Small cell lung cancer (SCLC) is a type of highly malignant lung cancer that is composed of small ovoid cells. In the past, SCLC was called oat cell carcinoma because the microscopic appearance of the cells was felt to resemble oats. SLCLC usually originates near the bronchi and in many cases may grow and metastasize quickly.	小细胞肺癌	小细胞肺癌（SCLC）是一种高度恶性的肺癌，由小卵圆形细胞组成。在过去，SCLC被称为燕麦细胞癌，因为细胞的微观外观被认为类似于燕麦。 SCLC通常起源于支气管附近，并且在许多情况下可能快速生长和转移。
HP:0030358	肿瘤,呼吸系统异常	Non-small cell lung carcinoma	#####	非小细胞肺癌	#####

HP:0030360	肿瘤,呼吸系统异常	Large cell lung carcinoma	A type of non-small cell lung carcinoma that is derived from undifferentiated malignant neoplasms originating from transformed epithelial cells in the lung, and which is differentiate from small-cell lung carcinoma by the larger size of the anaplastic cells, a higher cytoplasmic-to-nuclear size ratio, and a lack of salt-and-pepper appearance of the chromatin.	大细胞肺癌	是一种非小细胞肺癌，是来源于肺中转化上皮细胞的未分化恶性肿瘤，其分化程度较高，细胞质量较大，浆核比较大，染色质缺乏盐和胡椒的外观。

These are signaling molecules derived from oxidation of 20-carbon fatty acids. Most are produced from arachidonic acid, a 20-carbon polyunsaturated fatty acid (5,8,11,14-eicosatetraenoic acid).	类花生酸代谢异常	#####

HP:0030367	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Finger hyperphalangy	Hyperphalangy is a digit morphology in which increased numbers of phalanges are arranged linearly within a digit. That is, there is an accessory phalanx that is arranged linearly with the other phalanges.	多指	多指是线性排列的指骨数量增加，即存在与正常指骨线性排列的附加指骨。
HP:0030368	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Hyperphalangy of the 2nd finger	An accessory phalanx of the index (second) finger that is arranged linearly with the other phalanges. Hyperphalangy of the index finger results from an accessory ossification center at the metacarpophalangeal joint, resulting in radial deviation of the index finger. Note that this term refers only to this type of hyperphalangy.	食指多指	存在与其他指骨线性排列的食指附加指骨。附加指骨是由掌指关节额外骨化中心形成的，位于正常食指指骨的桡侧。注意，该术语仅特指这种类型的多指。
HP:0030369	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Induced vaginal delivery	Vaginal delivery following induction of labor, a procedure used to stimulate uterine contractions during pregnancy before labor begins on its own.	催产阴道分娩	#####
HP:0030370	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormal naive B cell count	A deviation from normal of the count of naive B cells (CD19+/CD27-/IgD+/IgM+). Naive B cells represent one of the subtypes of B cells in the peripheral blood, and are B cells that have not been exposed to antigen.	初始B 细胞计数异常	原始B细胞（CD19 + / CD27- / IgD + / IgM +）的计数偏离正常值。 原始B细胞代表外周血中B细胞亚型之一，也就是未暴露于抗原的B细胞。

HP:0030372	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Decreased naive B cell count	A reduction below normal of the count of naive B cells (CD19+/CD27-/IgD+/IgM+). Naive B cells represent one of the subtypes of B cells in the peripheral blood, and are B cells that have not been exposed to antigen.	初始B 细胞计数降低	原始B细胞（CD19 + / CD27- / IgD + / IgM +）的计数比正常值降低。 原始B细胞代表外周血中B细胞亚型之一，也就是未暴露于抗原的B细胞。
HP:0030373	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormal memory B cell count	A deviation from the normal count in the circulation of memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+). Memory B cells develop from naive B cells. Upon antigen rechallenge, memory B cells rapidly expand and differentiate into plasma cells under the cognate control of memory Th cells (Phase IV).	记忆 B 细胞计数异常	循环记忆性B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 +）比正常计数有偏差。 记忆B细胞从幼稚B细胞发育而来。 在抗原再激活时，记忆B细胞在记忆Th细胞（IV期）的同源控制下迅速扩张并分化成浆细胞。
HP:0030374	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Decreased memory B cell count	A reduction from the normal count in the circulation of memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+). Memory B cells develop from naive B cells. Upon antigen rechallenge, memory B cells rapidly expand and differentiate into plasma cells under the cognate control of memory Th cells (Phase IV).	记忆 B 细胞计数降低	循环记忆性B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 +）数量下降。 记忆B细胞从幼稚B细胞发育而来。 在抗原再激活时，记忆B细胞在记忆Th细胞（IV期）的同源控制下迅速扩张并分化成浆细胞。

Upon antigen rechallenge, memory B cells rapidly expand and differentiate into plasma cells under the cognate control of memory Th cells (Phase IV).	记忆 B 细胞计数增加	循环记忆性B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 +）比正常计数增加。 记忆B细胞从幼稚B细胞发育而来。 在抗原再激活时，记忆B细胞在记忆Th细胞（IV期）的同源控制下迅速扩张并分化成浆细胞。
HP:0030376	血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	Abnormal immature B cell count	A deviation from normal of the count in the ciculation of immature B cells (CD19+/ CD21low). Immature B cells (IgM+) are still in final stages of development within the bone marrow. Naive B cells are those which have left the bone marrow, before they bind to the antigen for which they&#39;re specific (IgM+/IgD+).	不成熟 B 细胞计数异常	未成熟B细胞的细胞计数（CD19 + / CD21low）的计数偏离正常值。 未成熟B细胞（IgM +）仍处于骨髓内发育的最后阶段。 初始B细胞是在结合到其特异性抗原（IgM + / IgD +）之前离开骨髓的细胞。

HP:0030391	神经系统异常	Spoken Word Recognition Deficit	Reduced ability of lexical discrimination, which refers to the process of distinguishing a stimulus word from other phonologically similar words. Lexical discrimination can be defined as the process of correctly identifying words in the mental lexicon to match the phonological input of a stimulus.	口语词汇识别能力降低	词义辨析的能力降低，指的是将刺激词与其他语音相似的词区分开来。词义辨析可以定义为正确识别精神词汇中的单词以匹配刺激的语音输入的过程。
HP:0030392	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Choroid plexus carcinoma	Intraventricular papillary neoplasm derived from choroid plexus epithelium. Plexus tumors are most common in the lateral and fourth ventricles; while 80% of lateral ventricle tumors present in children, fourth ventricle tumors are evenly distributed in all age groups. Clinically, choroid plexus tumors tend to cause hydrocephalus and increased intracranial pressure. Histologically, choroid plexus papillomas correspond to WHO grade I, choroid plexus carcinomas to WHO grade III.	脉络丛癌	脑室内乳头状肿瘤，源自脉络丛上皮。丛状肿瘤最常见于外侧和第四脑室；而80％的侧脑室肿瘤存在于儿童中，第四脑室肿瘤均匀分布于所有年龄组。临床上，脉络丛肿瘤倾向于引起脑积水和颅内压升高。组织学上，脉络丛乳头状瘤为WHO I级，脉络丛癌为WHO III级。
HP:0030393	肿瘤,耳部异常	Endolymphatic sac tumor	A low-grade papillary epithelial neoplasm (adenocarcinoma) with a slow growth pattern. The endolymphatic duct emerges from the posterior wall of the saccule (of the inner ear) and ends in a blind pouch, the endolymphatic sac. Endolymphatic sac tumors (ELSTs) are known under different names in the literature (Heffner tumor, aggressive papillary middle ear tumor, and low-grade adenocarcinoma of endolymphatic sac origin).	内淋巴囊肿瘤	具有缓慢生长模式的低级别乳头状上皮肿瘤（腺癌）。内淋巴管从囊内（内耳）的后壁出现，并以盲囊（即内淋巴囊）结束。内淋巴囊肿瘤（ELST）也可被称为Heffner肿瘤、侵袭性乳头状中耳肿瘤、内淋巴囊起源的低度腺癌。

HP:0030396	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal platelet granule secretion	Platelets are replete with secretory granules, which are critical to normal platelet function. Among the three types of platelet secretory granules - alpha-granules, dense granules, and lysosomes - the alpha-granule is the most abundant. Granule contents must be released from their intracellular repository in order to achieve their physiologic function, and this term refers to a functional defect in granule secretion.	血小板颗粒分泌异常	血小板充满分泌颗粒，对正常血小板功能至关重要。 在三种类型的血小板分泌颗粒--α-颗粒，致密颗粒和溶酶体中，α-颗粒是最丰富的。 颗粒内容物必须从其细胞内储存库中释放，以达到其生理功能，而该术语是指颗粒分泌的功能缺陷。

HP:0030434	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Pilomatrixoma	Pilomatricoma is an asymptomatic slowly growing benign cutaneous tumor, differentiating towards the hair matrix of the hair follicle. It is covered by normal or hyperemic skin, and usually varies in size from 0.5 to 3 cm.	毛母质瘤	毛母质瘤是无症状缓慢生长的良性皮肤肿瘤，分化为毛囊的毛发基质。它被正常或充血的皮肤覆盖，大小通常在0.5至3厘米之间变化
HP:0030436	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Fibrofolliculoma	Fibrofolliculoma is a clinically asymptomatic, 2-4 mm, skin-colored, dome-shaped smooth papule. It usually arises in the form of multiple lesions in adults in different areas such as the scalp, forehead, face, and neck. According to histology, the lesion is a fibrotic hamartoma characterized by infundibular epithelial proliferation and perifollicular fibrous proliferation.	纤维毛囊瘤	纤维肉芽肿是一种临床上无症状的2-4毫米大小、皮肤色、圆顶形的平滑丘疹。它通常以不同区域的成人多灶病变的形式出现，如头皮，前额，面部和颈部。根据组织学，病变是一种纤维性错构瘤，其特征在于漏斗状上皮细胞增生和纤维周围纤维增生。

HP:0030447	肿瘤,内分泌系统异常,体壁的异常	Merkel cell skin cancer	A malignant cutaneous tumor of the elderly that is characterized by an aggressive course with regional nodal involvement, distant metastases and a high rate of recurrence. Most patients present with rapidly growing, painless, firm, non-tender, dome-shaped red, occasionally ulcerated skin nodules, which have a red or bluish color, measuring up to several centimeters, on predominantly sun-exposed areas of the body. The overlying skin is smooth and shiny, sometimes exhibiting ulcerative, acneiform or telangiectatic features.	默克尔细胞皮肤癌	发生于老年人的恶性皮肤肿瘤，以具有区域淋巴结转移和远端转移的复发性侵袭性过程为特征。大多数患者呈现快速生长、无痛、坚固、不嫩、红色圆顶状，偶尔溃疡的皮肤结节，在身体的主要阳光下暴露的区域，其红色或蓝色的颜色可达数厘米。上覆皮肤光滑光亮，有时表现为溃疡性，粉刺型或毛细血管扩张性。

HP:0030664	肌肉组织异常,消化系统异常	Beevor&#39;s sign	Weakness of the inferior portion of the rectus abdominal muscle, which is ascertained clinically as follows. When a patient sits up or raises the head from a recumbent position, the umbilicus is displaced toward the head. This is the result of paralysis of the inferior portion of the rectus abdominal muscle, so that the upper fibres predominate pulling upwards the umbilicus.	比佛氏征	腹直肌下段的无力，临床上按如下方式确认：当病人自卧位坐起或抬头时，脐部向头侧移动。这是腹直肌下部麻痹的结果，使得上部肌纤维占主导地位、向上牵引脐部。
HP:0030665	神经系统异常	Rubral tremor	Rubral tremor is characterized by a slow coarse tremor at rest that is exacerbated by postural adjustments and by guided voluntary movements.	红核震颤	红核震颤的特征是休息时缓慢的粗糙震颤，姿势调整和自主运动会导致震颤加剧。
HP:0030666	心血管系统异常,眼部异常	Retinal neovascularization	In wound repair, neovascularization (NV) involves the sprouting of new vessels from pre-existent vessels to repair or replace damaged vessels. In the retina, NV is a response to ischemia. The NV adheres to the inner surface of the retina and outer surface of the vitreous. NV are deficient in tight junctions and hence leak plasma into surrounding tissue including the vitreous. Plasma causes the vitreous gel to degenerate, contract, and eventually collapse which pulls on the retina. Since retinal NV is adherent to both retina and vitreous, as the vitreous contracts the NV may be sheared resulting in vitreous hemorrhage or the NV may remain intact and pull the retina with the vitreous resulting in retinal elevation referred to as traction retinal detachment.	视网膜新生血管形成	在伤口修复中，新血管形成（NV）包括从先前存在的血管发出新血管，以修复或替换损坏的血管。在视网膜中，NV是对局部缺血的反应。NV附着在视网膜的内表面和玻璃体的外表面上。NV缺乏紧密连接，因此将血浆泄漏到包括玻璃体的周围组织中。血浆导致玻璃体凝胶退化，收缩，并最终崩溃，拉动视网膜。由于视网膜NV附着在视网膜和玻璃体上，因为玻璃体收缩，NV可能被剪切，导致玻璃体出血，或NV可能保持完整，并且通过玻璃体拉动视网膜，导致视网膜抬高，称为牵引性视网膜脱离。
HP:0030667	心血管系统异常,眼部异常	Peripheral retinal neovascularization	A type of retinal neovascularization that affects the periphery of the retina.	周边视网膜新生血管形成	一种视网膜新生血管形成，影响视网膜外周。

HP:0030709	神经系统异常	Myelocystocele	Myelocystocele is characterized by a large, ependyma-lined, cystic dilation of the caudal end of the central canal of the spinal cord; it projects dorsally through a lamina defect, with overlying varying amounts of lipomatous subcutaneous tissue. Myelocystoceles are associated with a tethered cord and meningocele, which communicates with the spinal subarachnoid space, but not with the central canal cyst.	脊髓囊状突出	骨髓囊肿的特征在于脊髓中央管的尾端大的内膜囊性扩张；它通过椎板缺损进行背侧运动，覆盖不同量的脂肪膜皮下组织。骨髓间充质干细胞与脊髓蛛网膜下腔连通，但与中枢管囊肿无关。

Intact skin covers the defect. Neurologic findings first appear during the second year of life.	脂性脑膜膨出	一种闭合的神经管缺损，其中脊髓组织位于具有脊髓和脂肪瘤之间的连接处的脊髓内。完整的皮肤覆盖缺陷。这种现象常出现在生命的第二年。

HP:0030722	消化系统异常	Ectopic liver	Ectopic liver is a rare developmental anomaly in which liver tissue is situated outside the liver. Thus, ectopic liver refers to autonomous islands of normal liver parenchyma located outside the liver. The term ectopic liver is also used, to include liver appendices attached to the native liver by a thin stalk although being fully separated from the latter.	异位肝	异位肝是一种罕见的发育异常，肝组织位于肝脏之外。因此，异位肝指位于肝脏之外的独立岛状的正常肝实质。异位肝亦包括与肝脏完全分离但仍以细蒂附着于正常肝脏的“阑尾肝”。

HP:0030725	神经系统异常	Neurenteric cyst	The neurenteric cyst is a rare lesion composed of heterotopic endodermal tissue. During the third week of human embryogenesis, the neurenteric canal unites the yolk sac and the amniotic cavity as it traverses the primitive notochordal plate. Persistence of the normally transient neurenteric canal prevents appropriate separation of endoderm and notochord. This results in a variable degree of communication between neural and enteric epithelium.	神经管原肠囊肿	神经性囊肿是由异位内胚层组织组成的罕见病变。在人类胚胎发生的第三个星期，当神经肠管穿过原始脊髓板时，神经肠管和羊膜腔结合。持续存在正常的神经管可防止内胚层和脊索的适当分离。这导致神经和肠上皮之间的可变程度的交流。
HP:0030726	神经系统异常	Spinal neurenteric cyst	A neurenteric cyst located in the spine.	脊柱神经管原肠囊肿	位于脊柱的神经管原肠囊肿。

HP:0030728	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Meromelia	Partial absence of a free limb (excluding girdle). It can refer to the proximal, middle or distal segment of the upper or lower limb. The deficiency may be transverse or longitudinal. Thus, meromelia is a lack of a part, but not all, of one or more limbs with the presence of a hand or foot.	残肢畸形	自由肢(不含肢带骨)的部分缺如。它可以指上下肢近端、中间或远端部分。缺如可以是横向或纵向。因此，残肢畸形是缺少单个或多个肢体的一部分，但不是全部，因此仍然具有手脚。

HP:0030730	神经系统异常	Parietal meningocele	A herniation of meninges through a congenital bone defect in the skull in the parietal region.	顶脑膜膨出	通过先天性发生在颅骨顶部的骨缺损而形成的脑疝。
HP:0030731	肿瘤	Carcinoma	A malignant tumor arising from epithelial cells. Carcinomas that arise from glandular epithelium are called adenocarcinomas, those that arise from squamous epithelium are called squamous cell carcinomas, and those that arise from transitional epithelium are called transitional cell carcinomas (NCI Thesaurus).	癌	由上皮细胞发展而来的恶性肿瘤。由腺体上皮引起的癌称为腺癌，由鳞状上皮引起的癌称为鳞状细胞癌，而由过渡性上皮引起的癌称为过渡性细胞癌（NCI词典）。
HP:0030732	心血管系统异常	Dysplastic tricuspid valve	A congenital malformation of the tricuspid valve characterized by leaflet deformation.	三尖瓣发育不良	三尖瓣先天性畸形，其特征在于小叶变形。
HP:0030733	泌尿生殖系统异常	Vesicoallantoic abdominal wall defect	An abdominal wall defected related to a developmental anomaly of the allantois, which is an embryonic structure that develops as a diverticulum off the yolk sac at about 16 days post fertilization. During further development, the allantois becomes incorporated into the body of the embryo, connecting the ventral aspect of the urogenital sinus (which will develop into the upper pole of the urinary bladder) to the external portion of the umbilicus. Upon further development, the lumen of the allantois becomes obliterated and forms a thick fibrous cord called the urachus, which connects the apex of the bladder to the umbilicus. In adults, the urachus is known as the median umbilical ligament. Failure of the allantoic cavity to obliterate can result of one of four conditions: 1) congenital patent urachus (a completely open connection between bladder and umbilicus); 2) vesicourachal diverticulum (a diverticulum off the bladder but not communicating with the umbilicus); umbilical cyst and sinus (not communicating with the bladder); and 4) alternating urachal sinus. An abdominal wall defect can be associated with a urachal cyst.	膀胱尿囊腹壁缺损	腹壁的缺损，与尿囊的发育异常有关，尿囊是一个胚胎结构，大约受精后16天由卵黄囊发展成的一个憩室。在进一步发育过程中，尿囊与胚胎合并形成一体，连接着腹侧的泌尿生殖窦(发展成膀胱的上部)与脐的外部。进一步发展后，尿囊腔闭塞形成一个粗大的纤维索即脐尿管，连接的膀胱顶点和脐。到成年，脐尿管被称为脐正中韧带。尿囊腔若不能消退，导致四个后果之一：1)先天性脐尿管开放(膀胱与脐之间的一个完全开放的通道)；2)膀胱脐尿管憩室(膀胱的一个憩室，但不与脐相通)；3)脐带囊肿和窦(与膀胱不相通)；4)脐尿管窦。腹壁缺陷可以伴脐尿管囊肿。
HP:0030735	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ureterovesical junction obstruction	Blockage at the level of the bladder and the ureter caused by stenosis of the ureteral valves or failure of a narrow juxtavesical ureteral segment to dilate due to segmented fibrosis or localized absence of muscle.	膀胱输尿管交界处梗阻	于膀胱和输尿管水平发生的堵塞，由以下两种因素引起：输尿管瓣膜的狭窄或由于节段性纤维化或局部缺乏肌肉导致的接近膀胱的输尿管段不能舒张。

HP:0030739	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常,骨骼系统异常	Altman type III sacrococcygeal teratoma	A type of sacrococcygeal teratoma that is predominantly intrapelvic with a small external, buttock mass.	奥特曼 III 型骶尾部畸胎瘤	骶尾部畸胎瘤的一种类型，主要为盆腔内肿物，伴小型的外臀部肿物。
HP:0030740	心血管系统异常	Anomalous muscle bundle of the right ventricle	An accessory (not normally present) muscle bundle in the right ventricle which obstructs the right ventricular outflow tract.	右心室肌束异常	右心室中的辅助（通常不存在）肌束阻塞右心室流出道。
HP:0030741	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Mediastinal teratoma	A teratoma located with the mediastinum (the cavity between the pleural sacs that contains the heart and all of the thoracic viscera except the lungs).	纵隔畸胎瘤	一个位于纵隔的畸胎瘤（纵膈包含心脏的胸膜和除肺外的所有胸部内脏之间的腔）。
HP:0030742	眼部异常	Glial remnants posterior to lens	This anomaly, also known as Mittendorf dot, is a benign, nonprogressive recognizable lesion that does not cause visual impairment. However, it can resemble a pathological congenital or acquired cataract lesion which may enlarge and cause visual impairment. The dot appears as a black speck that ranges in size from the dot made by a sharp pencil point to the size of a poppy seed. It is usually well defined, although occasionally there may be irregular, fine lines radiating outward from the dot.	晶状体后方胶质残余	这种异常又称Mittendorf点，是一种良性、非进展性、可识别的病变，不引起视力损伤。但它类似一种先天性病理性或获得性的白内障病变，导致视力损伤出现和加重。点呈现黑色斑点状，大小从尖锐的铅笔点到罂粟籽不等。通常界限清晰，偶有不规则的放射状线条从点向外辐射。
HP:0030743	眼部异常	Glial remnants anterior to the optic disc	Persistanced of a posterior remnant of the hyaloid artery located at the optic disc.	视神经盘前方胶质残余	视盘前方原始玻璃体的血管残留。

HP:0030754	泌尿生殖系统异常	Allantoic cyst	A swelling formed at the base of umbilicus associated with a patent urachus which results from an allantoic remnant. The urachus is a fibrous remnant of the allantois which communicates from the apex of the urinary bladder to the umbilicus. Failed obliteration of the urachus can lead to various abnormalities: urachal cyst, urachal diverticulum, sinus or patent urachus - the most common type. Allantoic cysts in infants with patent urachus can be formed due to the drainage of urine into the umbilical cord, or in uncommon situations, after leakage of hypo-osmotic urine into the Wharton&#39;s jelly.	尿囊囊肿	尿囊囊肿是脐[此条以下进行了修改，但没有存入。以上还有需要修改的。待开放之后再说。]的底部的肿胀和开放性脐尿管（它缘于尿囊遗迹）。脐尿管是尿囊的纤维状残余，尿囊沟通膀胱的顶点与脐。脐尿管闭合失败可导致许多种异常:脐尿管囊肿、脐尿管憩室、窦或开放性脐尿管，后者是最常见的类型。由于将尿液引入脐带，或在罕见情况下,将低渗的尿液泄漏到华通氏胶，婴儿会形成尿囊囊肿伴开放性脐尿管。

HP:0030762	泌尿生殖系统异常	Mesangiolysis	Dissolution or attenuation of mesangial matrix and degeneration of mesangial cells. In essence, mesangiolysis is an injurious process which affects the glomerular mesangium without causing obvious damage to the capillary basement membranes. The matrix swells, loosens, and eventually dissolves; the mesangial cells may show only edema and vacuolization, or may undergo severe degeneration and necrosis.	系膜溶解	肾小球系膜基质分解或衰减及系膜细胞的退化。从本质上讲,肾小球系膜的溶解是一个有害的过程，影响了肾小球系膜，但没有造成明显的毛细血管基底膜损害。基质膨胀、松懈,最终溶解,系膜细胞可能只显示出水肿和液泡化,也可能经历严重的变性和坏死。

HP:0030764	体壁的异常	Ochronosis	Brown or blue-gray discoloration of the skin that can present on the axillary and inguinal areas, face, palms or soles. In addition, blue-black discoloration can be apparent on skin overlying cartilage in which the pigment is deposited, such as the ears. This is a characteristic manifestation of alkaptonuria, which is an autosomal recessively inherited deficiency of homogentisic acid oxidase that results in accumulation of homogentisic acid in collagenous structures. The sclerae are also typically involved.	褐黄病	发生在腋窝、腹股沟、面部以及掌跖部位的皮肤褐色或灰色样变。此外，在软骨区域，如耳朵，可出现皮肤深蓝色样变。这是黑尿酸尿症的特征表现，这是一种常染色体隐性遗传缺陷导致的尿黑酸氧化酶的尿黑酸胶原结构的沉积。巩膜也可累及。

HP:0030773	眼部异常	Internuclear ophthalmoplegia	An abnormality of conjugate lateral gaze in which the affected eye shows impairment of adduction. HP:0030774	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Mitochondrial swelling	The mitochondrial matrix refers to the substance occupying the space enclosed by the inner membrane of a mitochondrion, which contains enzymes, DNA, granules, and inclusions of protein crystals, glycogen, and lipid. Mitochondrial swelling refers to an increase in size of the mitochondrial matrix. This phenomenon is thought to be related to a permeabilized inner membrane that originates a large swelling in the mitochondrial matrix. Mitochondrial swelling may distend the outer membrane until it ruptures.	线粒体肿胀	#####
HP:0030775	骨骼系统异常	Modic type vertebral endplate changes	An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate according to a widely used classification published by Dr. Michael Modic.	Modic 类型椎体终板改变	由Michael Modic博士提出的以磁共振成像对椎体终板进行分类的方式。
HP:0030776	骨骼系统异常	Modic type I vertebral endplate changes	An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate with a low signal on T1-weighted sequences and high signal on T2-weighted sequences. Modic type I changes are thought to represent bone marrow edema and inflammation.	Modic I 型椎体终板改变	椎体终板的磁共振断层成像信号异常，其具有T1加权序列上的低信号和T2加权序列上的高信号。Modic I型改变被认为代表骨髓水肿和炎症。
HP:0030777	骨骼系统异常	Modic type II vertebral endplate changes	An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate with a high signal on T1-weighted sequences and high- or isointense signal on T2 sequences. Modic type II signals are thought to indicate fatty replacement in the bone marrow.	Modic II 型椎体终板改变	椎体终板的磁共振断层成像信号异常，其具有T1加权序列上的高信号和T2加权序列上的高或中等信号。Modic II型改变被认为代表脂肪组织取代骨髓。
HP:0030778	骨骼系统异常	Modic type III vertebral endplate changes	An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate with a low signal on T1 and T2-weighted sequences. Modif type III signals are thought to correspond to subchondral sclerosis seen on plain radiographs.	Modic III 型椎体终板改变	椎体终板的磁共振断层成像信号异常，其具有T1加权序列和T2加权序列上的低信号。Modic III型改变被认为是对软骨下硬化的反应。
HP:0030779	神经系统异常	Ethmocephaly	Ethmocephaly is the rarest form of holoprosencephaly, which occurs due to an incomplete cleavage of the forebrain. Clinically, the disease presents with a proboscis, hypotelorism, microphthalmos and malformed ears.	猿头畸形	猿头畸形是脑缺血发育的罕见形式，由于前脑不完全分裂而发生。临床上，这种疾病呈现长鼻，偏倚，小眼睛和畸形的耳朵。
HP:0030780	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormality of the protein C anticoagulant pathway	An anomaly of the protein C anticoagulant pathway, which serves as a major system for controlling thrombosis, limiting inflammatory responses, and potentially decreasing endothelial cell apoptosis in response to inflammatory cytokines and ischemia. A natural anticoagulant system denoted the protein C pathway exerts its anticoagulant effect by regulating the activity of FVIIIa and FVa. The vitamin K-dependent protein C is the key component of the pathway. Activated protein C (APC) cleaves and inhibits coagulation cofactors FVIIIa and FVa, which result in downregulation of the activity of the coagulation system. The endothelial protein C receptor stimulates the T-TM-mediated activation of protein C on the endothelial cell surface. The two cofactors, protein S and the intact form of FV, enhance the anticoagulant activity of APC.	蛋白 C 抗凝途径异常	蛋白C抗凝血途径的异常，其作为控制血栓形成的主要系统，限制炎症反应，以及潜在地减少内皮细胞凋亡以响应炎性细胞因子和缺血。 表示蛋白C途径的天然抗凝剂体系通过调节FVIIIa和FVa的活性来发挥其抗凝血作用。 维生素K依赖蛋白C是途径的关键组成部分。 活化蛋白C（APC）切割并抑制凝血辅助因子FVIIIa和FVa，这导致凝血系统活性的下调。 内皮蛋白C受体刺激T-TM介导的蛋白C在内皮细胞表面的活化。 两种辅因子蛋白S和完整形式的FV增强了APC的抗凝血活性。
HP:0030781	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased circulating free fatty acid level	A higher than normal levels of the fatty acids which can occur in plasma as a result of lipolysis in adipose tissue or when plasma triacyglycerols are taken into tissues.	循环系统内游离脂肪酸水平增高	#####

HP:0030783	免疫系统异常	Increased serum interleukin-6	An increased concentration of interleukin-6 in the circulation.	血清白介素-6 增加	循环中白细胞介素-6浓度增加。
HP:0030784	神经系统异常	Anomia	An inability to name people and objects that are correctly perceived. The individual is able to describe the object in question, but cannot provide the name.	命名性失语症	无法命名正确感知的人物和物体。个人能够描述有问题的对象，但不能提供名称。
HP:0030785	肿瘤,免疫系统异常	Mediastinal cystic lymphangioma	A lymphangioma (congenital malformation consisting of focal proliferations of well-differentiated lymphatic tissue in multi cystic or sponge like structures) located within the mediastinum, i.e., the central compartment of the thoracic cavity that is surrounded by loose connective tissue. Mediastinal lymphangioma is a slow growing mass with benign features, and accounts for 1% of all mediastinal tumors.	纵隔囊性淋巴管瘤	淋巴管瘤（先天性畸形，由多囊性或海绵状结构中的分化良好的淋巴组织的局限性增生组成）位于纵隔内，即由松散结缔组织包围的胸腔的中央隔室。纵隔淋巴管瘤是一种缓慢生长的肿块，具有良性特征，占纵隔肿瘤的1％。
HP:0030786	眼部异常	Photopsia	Perceived flashes of light.	闪光感	感觉闪光存在。
HP:0030787	耳部异常	Cerumen abnormality	Any anomaly of the cerumen (ear wax), the yellowish waxy substance secreted in the ear canal.	耵聍异常	耵聍（耳垢）的任何异常，耵聍是耳道分泌的黄色腊样物质。
HP:0030788	耳部异常	Impacted cerumen	Blockage of the external auditory canal by a buildup of earwax.	耵聍栓塞	外耳道由于耵聍堆积发生堵塞。
HP:0030789	耳部异常	Excessive cerumen	An increased quantity of earwax.	耵聍过多	耵聍数量增多。
HP:0030790	耳部异常	Abnormal cerumen color	An anomolous earwax color. Earwax (cerumen) is usually light to dark brown or orange in color.	耵聍颜色异常	耳垢颜色异常。耳垢（耵聍）通常为浅棕色到深棕色，或为橘黄色。
HP:0030791	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormal jaw morphology	A structural anomaly of the jaw, the bony structure of the mouth that consists of the mandible and the maxilla.	颌部形态异常	颌部结构异常，其骨性结构包括上颌骨和下颌骨。
HP:0030792	肿瘤,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Jaw neoplasm	A tumor originating in the jaw (mandible or maxilla).	颌部肿瘤	颌部（上颌或下颌）来源的肿瘤。
HP:0030793	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Jaw swelling	Abnormal enlargement in the upper jaw (maxilla) or in the lower jaw (mandible).	颌部肿胀	上颌或下颌异常肿大。
HP:0030794	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal C-peptide level	An anomolous circulating concentration of the connecting (C) peptide, which links the insulin A and B chains in proinsulin, providing thereby a means to promote their efficient folding and assembly in the endoplasmic reticulum during insulin biosynthesis. After cleavage of proinsulin, C-peptide is stored with insulin in the soluble phase of the secretory granules and is subsequently released in equimolar amounts with insulin, providing a useful independent indicator of insulin secretion.	C-肽水平异常	#####
HP:0030795	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Reduced C-peptide level	A decreased concentration of C-peptide in the circulation. Since C-peptide is secreted in equimolar amounts to insulin, this feature correlates with reduced insulin secretion.	C-肽水平降低	#####
HP:0030796	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased C-peptide level	An elevated concentration of C-peptide in the circulation. Since C-peptide is secreted in equimolar amounts to insulin, this feature correlates with increased insulin secretion.	C-肽水平增高	#####
HP:0030797	神经系统异常	Reduced volume of central subdivision of bed nucleus of stria terminalis	A diminished volume of the central part of the bed nucleus of the stria terminalis.	终纹床核中央区体积减少	终纹床核中央区体积的减少。
HP:0030798	神经系统异常	Abnormality of the bed nucleus of stria terminalis	The stria terminalis is a slender, compact fiber bundle that connects the amygdala (amygdaloid body) with the hypothalamus and other basal forebrain regions. The bed nucleus of the stria terminalis is a limbic forebrain structure that receives heavy projections from, among other areas, the basolateral amygdala, and projects in turn to hypothalamic and brainstem target areas that mediate many of the autonomic and behavioral responses to aversive or threatening stimuli. This term refers to an anomaly of the bed nucleus.	终纹床核异常	终纹是细长的，紧密的纤维束，将杏仁核（杏仁体）与下丘脑和其他基底前脑区域连接起来。终纹的床核是一种边缘前脑结构，从其他区域接受基底外侧杏仁核的重度突出，并依次向下丘脑和脑干目标区域进行调节，这些区域介导了对厌恶或威胁性刺激的许多自主和行为反应。这个术语是指床核的异常。
HP:0030799	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Scaphocephaly	Scaphocephaly is a subtype of dolichocephaly where the anterior and posterior aspects of the cranial vault are pointed (boat-shaped). Scaphocephaly is caused by a precocious fusion of sagittal suture without other associated synostosis.	舟状头	舟状头是头颅的一个亚型，其颅顶的前部和后部是尖的（船形）。 舟状头是由矢状缝合的过早融合而其他颅缝未闭合引起的。
HP:0030800	眼部异常	Abnormal visual accommodation	An anomaly in the process of visual accommodation, which is the process of adjustment of the eye to enable sharp vision of objects at different distances. Accommodation is mediated by contraction of the ciliary muscles, which alter the convexity of the lens and, consequently, its refractive power.	视觉调节异常	视觉调节功能异常，调节功能使人们看不同距离的物体均有清晰的图像。调节通过睫状肌的收缩进行调控，从而改变晶状体的凸度和折射能力。
HP:0030801	眼部异常	Reduced visual accommodation	A decreased ability of the eye to adjust and thereby enable sharp vision of objects at different distances.	视觉调节能力下降	视觉调节能力下降

HP:0030805	体壁的异常	Absent lunula	Lack of the lunula at the base of a nail. The lunula is the crescent-shaped whitish area of the bed of a fingernail or toenail.	甲半月缺失	甲底部的半月痕缺失。甲半月是指（趾）甲床的半月形白色区域。

HP:0030808	体壁的异常	Ragged cuticle	The cuticle (properly known as the eponychium, or the medial nail fold or the proximal nail fold), is the thickened layer of skin surrounding fingernails and toenails. Its function is to protect the area between the nail and epidermis from exposure to bacteria. This term refers to the presence of and irregular edge or outline of the cuticle.	粗糙的甲上皮	甲表皮(称为甲上皮或内侧甲襞或近端甲襞),是指（趾）甲周围的厚层皮肤。它的功能是保护甲和表皮之间区域，避免接触细菌。这个术语是指甲表皮的不规则的边缘或轮廓。

HP:0030824	眼部异常	Mizuo phenomenon	Change in the color of the fundus from red in the dark-adapted state to golden immediately or shortly after the onset of the light. The color of the fundus reflex in the light adapted state has also been described as golden-yellow, gray-white, and yellow-white. This reflex can appear either homogeneous or in streaks in the fundus. The retinal vessels appear to be protruding in contrast to the radiant background. Dark adaptation leads to disappearance of the unusual fundus coloration [Digital Journal of Ophthalmology 2008; Volume 14, Number 14].	水尾现象	指眼底颜色的变化，黑暗中为红色，光照后迅速变为金黄色。光照后的眼底颜色被描述为金黄色，灰白色和黄白色。这一反射可以在眼底中均匀出现或者成条排列。相较于辐射状的背景，视网膜血管相对突出。暗适应使得异常的眼底颜色消失。
HP:0030825	眼部异常	Absent foveal reflex	Lack of the foveal reflex, which normally occurs as a result of the reflection of light from the ophthalmoscope in the foveal pit upon examination. The foveal reflex is a bright pinpoint of light that is observed to move sideways or up and down in response to movement of the opthalmoscope.	黄斑中心凹反射缺失	黄斑中心凹反光缺失，这一反射通常是检眼镜对中心凹进行检查中出现。中心凹反射是一个明亮的光点，可以根据检眼镜的移动向侧边或者上下移动。

HP:0030843	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Cardiac amyloidosis	Extracellular deposition in cardiac tissue of a proteinaceous material that, when stained with Congo red, demonstrates apple-green birefringence under polarized light and that has a distinct color when stained with sulfated Alcian blue. Viewed with electron microscopy, the amyloid deposits are seen to be composed of a beta-sheet fibrillar material. These nonbranching fibrils have a diameter of 7.5 to 10 nm and are the result of protein misfolding.	心脏淀粉样变性	#####
HP:0030844	眼部异常	Undetectable pattern electroretinogram	Absent response to a pattern electroretinogram (PERG).	图形视网膜电图检测不到波形	图形视网膜电图（RFG)检测不到波形。
HP:0030845	头部和颈部的异常	Heliotrope rash of eyelid	Heliotrope rash is a violaceous discoloration of the eyelids associated with periorbital edema.	眼睑向阳性皮疹	向阳性皮疹是与眶周水肿相关的眼睑的一种紫色变色。
HP:0030846	心血管系统异常	Abnormality of venous physiology	An anomaly of venous function.	静脉生理异常	静脉生理异常。
HP:0030847	心血管系统异常	Abnormal jugular venous pressure	An anomaly of the jugular venous pressure. The internal jugular veins, being continuous with the superior vena cava, provide a visible measure of the degree to which the systemic venous reservoir is filled. The vertical height above the right atrium to which they are distended and above which they are in a collapsed state provides an imperfect reflection of the right atrial pressure.	颈静脉压异常	颈静脉压力异常。与上腔静脉连续的颈内静脉提供了系统性静脉血管充填程度的测量方法。在右心房扩张并且高于被测折叠部位的垂直高度，提供了右心房压力的不完全反映。
HP:0030848	心血管系统异常	Elevated jugular venous pressure	Increased jugular venous pressure.	颈静脉压升高	颈静脉压升高。
HP:0030849	心血管系统异常	Hepatojugular reflux	The examiner applies firm but persistent pressure over the liver for 10 seconds while observing the mean jugular venous pressure. Normally there is either no rise or only a transient (i.e., 2 to 3 sec) rise in mean jugular venous pressure. A sustained increase in the mean venous pressure until abdominal compression is released is abnormal and indicates impaired right heart function. This abnormal response is called hepatojugular reflux.	肝颈静脉返流	检查者在观察平均颈静脉压力的同时对肝脏施加坚固但持续的压力10秒。通常情况下，平均静脉压平均值不会上升或仅有暂时性（即2〜3秒）升高。直到腹部压迫释放的平均静脉压持续增加是异常，表明右心功能受损。这种异常反应称为肝炎回流。
HP:0030850	心血管系统异常	Abnormal pulse pressure	An anomaly of the pulse pressure, which is defined as the systolic pressured minus the diastolic pressure.	脉压异常	脉压的异常。脉压被定义为收缩压减去舒张压。
HP:0030851	心血管系统异常	Low pulse pressure	Reduced amplitude of the pulse pressure (systolic blood pressure minus diastolic blood pressure).	脉压低	脉压（收缩压减去舒张压）降低。
HP:0030852	心血管系统异常	High pulse pressure	Increased amplitude of the pulse pressure (systolic blood pressure minus diastolic blood pressure).	脉压高	脉压（收缩压减去舒张压）升高。
HP:0030853	生长异常	Heterotaxy	An abnormality in which the internal thoraco-abdominal organs demonstrate abnormal arrangement across the left-right axis of the body.	内脏异位	胸腹部内脏器官的左右位置异常。
HP:0030854	眼部异常	Scleral staphyloma	A staphyloma is a localized defect in the eye wall with protrusion of uveal tissue due to alterations in scleral thickness and structure.	巩膜葡萄肿	巩膜葡萄肿是由于巩膜厚度或结构的改变导致葡萄膜组织向眼球外突出的局灶性病变。
HP:0030855	眼部异常	Anterior staphyloma	A localized defect in the anterior eye wall with protrusion of uveal tissue due to alterations in scleral thickness and structure.	前巩膜葡萄肿	#####
HP:0030856	眼部异常	Posterior staphyloma	A localized defect in the posterior eye wall with protrusion of uveal tissue due to alterations in scleral thickness and structure.	后巩膜葡萄肿	后巩膜葡萄肿是由于后巩膜厚度或结构的改变导致葡萄膜组织向眼球后壁外突出的局灶性病变。
HP:0030857	神经系统异常,眼部异常	Eye movement-induced pain	An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the eye that is worse in certain directions of gaze and during prolonged gaze holding.	眼动诱发疼痛	一种令人不愉快的感觉，其特征在于局限于眼睛的某些方向的凝视和长时间注视持续期间的身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）。
HP:0030858	神经系统异常	Addictive behavior	A recurrent pattern of behavior that is characeterized by the failure to resist an impulse, drive, or temptation to perform an act that is harmful to the person or to others. The repetitive engagement in these behaviors ultimately interferes with functioning in other domains.	成瘾行为	一种反复的行为模式，由于没有抵制冲动、驱动或诱惑来执行对人或其他人有害的行为。这些行为的重复参与最终会干扰其他领域的运作。
HP:0030859	免疫系统异常	Topoisomerase I antibody positivity	The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against topoisomerase I.	拓扑异构酶I抗体阳性	血清中存在抗拓扑异构酶I的自身抗体
HP:0030860	神经系统异常	Abnormal CSF amyloid level	Abnormal concentration of amyloid in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).	脑脊液淀粉样蛋白水平异常	脑脊液淀粉样蛋白的浓度异常。
HP:0030861	神经系统异常	Decreased CSF amyloid level	Reduced concentration of amyloid in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).	脑脊液淀粉样蛋白水平降低	脑脊液淀粉样蛋白的浓度降低。
HP:0030862	神经系统异常	Elevated CSF amyloid level	Increased concentration of amyloid in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).	脑脊液淀粉样蛋白水平升高	脑脊液淀粉样蛋白的浓度升高。
HP:0030863	呼吸系统异常	Nasal flaring	Widening of the nostrils upon inhalation as a manifestation of respiratory distress.	鼻翼煽动	吸气时鼻孔扩大，是呼吸窘迫的表现。
HP:0030864	呼吸系统异常	Intercostal retractions	A pulling inward of the soft tissues between the ribs upon inhalation. This is a sign of increased use of the chest muscles for breathing and is a manifestation of respiratory distress.	肋间隙回缩	吸气时在肋骨之间向内拉动软组织。 这是增加胸部肌肉用于呼的迹象，并且是呼吸窘迫的表现。

HP:0030866	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Large knee	Abnormally increased size of the knee joint.	膝关节偏大	膝关节异常增大
HP:0030867	头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	Vertical orbital dystopia	The orbits do not lie on the same horizontal plane, that is, one eye is lower than the other.	垂直眼窝易位	两只眼球不在同一水平面上，即一只眼球高，一只眼球低。

HP:0030871	骨骼系统异常	Facet joint arthrosis	Osteoarthritis of facet joints in the spine. Degeneration of cartilage in the facet joints results in bone rubbing on bone and reactive new bone formation visible on X-ray.	小关节炎	脊柱小关节的炎症。在X线上表现为小关节间的软骨退行性改变导致骨摩擦增加和反应性新骨形成。

HP:0030874	呼吸系统异常	Oxygen desaturation on exertion	Oxygen saturation less than 95% on exertion or arterial partial pressure of oxygen falling by more than 1kPa.呼吸系统异常	用力时血氧饱和度下降	氧气饱和度小于95％，运动或氧气的动脉分压下降超过1kPa。
HP:0030875	呼吸系统异常	Abnormality of pulmonary circulation	A functional anomaly of that portion of the cardiosvascular system that carries deoxygenated blood from the heart to the lungs and rturns oxygenated blood back to the heart.	肺循环异常	心脏血管系统部分的功能异常。该部分心血管系统指将脱氧血液从心脏携带到肺部，并将氧合血液回送到心脏。
HP:0030876	呼吸系统异常	Increased pulmonary capillary wedge pressure	Pulmonary capillary wedge pressure (PCWP) above 15mmHg.	肺毛细血管楔压升高	肺毛细血管楔压（PCWP）高于15mmHg。
HP:0030877	呼吸系统异常	Obstructive deficit on pulmonary function testing	FEV1/FVC less than 0.7 (FEV1 - forced expiratory volume in 1 second; FVC forced vital capacity).	肺功能检测中呈阻塞性病变	FEV1 / FVC小于0.7（FEV1-1秒内用力呼气量；FVC-强制肺活量）。
HP:0030878	呼吸系统异常	Abnormality on pulmonary function testing	Any anomaly measure by pulmonary function testing, which includes spirometry, measures of diffusing capacity, and plethysmography.	肺功能检测结果异常	肺功能检查的任何异常测量，包括肺量计、扩散能力测量和体积描记法。
HP:0030879	呼吸系统异常	Interlobular septal thickening	Presence of thickening of the interlobular septa of the lungs as seen on a CT scan.	小叶间隔增厚	在CT扫描中看到肺部小叶间隔的增厚。

HP:0030881	骨骼系统异常	Shoulder impingement	Trapping and compression of the rotator cuff tendons during shoulder movements.	肩袖综合征	在肩运动时压迫肩肌腱袖。
HP:0030882	心血管系统异常	Coronary artery dilation	#####	冠状动脉扩张	#####
HP:0030883	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Femoroacetabular Impingement	Femoroacetabular impingement (FAI) results from one or more bony abnormalities that lead to abnormal contact between the acetabulum and the femoral head or neck. The femoral abnormality is proposed to cause compression and shear stresses in the region between the labrum and cartilage, anterosuperiorly. These stresses cause a separation between the labrum and cartilage as the labrum is pushed outwards and the cartilage is pushed centrally. This eventually leads to articular degeneration and eventually global hip osteoarthritis.	股骨髋臼撞击症	股骨髋臼撞击症由于一个或多个骨异常，导致髋臼和股骨头或股骨颈之间的异常联系所致。股骨的异常可能会导致在上唇和软骨之间产生前上的压缩和剪切力。这些压力导致与上唇唇状组织和软骨外推分离，软骨被挤压一起。这导致关节退化,最终导致全髋关节的骨关节炎。
HP:0030884	消化系统异常	Gastrojejunal tube feeding in infancy	Feeding problem necessitating gastrojejunal tube feeding.	婴儿胃空肠管饲	（婴儿期）喂养问题所需的胃空肠管饲。

HP:0030891	神经系统异常	Periventricular white matter hyperdensities	Areas of brighter than expected signal on magnetic resonance imaging emanating from the cerebral white matter that surrounds the cerebral ventricles.	脑室旁白质高信号	比围绕脑室的脑白质发出的磁共振成像亮度高于预期的区域。

HP:0030893	呼吸系统异常	Abnormal response to short acting pulmonary vasodilator	Pulmonary vasodilator testing is performed during right-heart catheterization and involves a short-acting vasoactive agent such as adenosine, epoprostenol, or inhaled nitric oxide. The current definition of a normal (positive) response is a drop in mean pulmonary artery pressure of at least 10 mm Hg (or 20 percent) to below 40 mm Hg.	对短效肺血管扩张剂反应异常	肺血管扩张剂测试在右心导管术期间进行，并且涉及短效血管活性剂如腺苷，依前列醇或吸入的一氧化氮。 正常（正）反应的当前定义是平均肺动脉压至少出现10 mm Hg（或20％）至绝对值小于40 mm Hg的下降。
HP:0030894	呼吸系统异常	Insufficient response to short acting pulmonary vasodilator	No fall in mean pulmonary arterial pressure (mPAP) falls by at least 10 mmHg to an absolute value less than 40 mmHg without a degradation in cardiac output (CO) in response to a short-acting vasoactive agent such as adenosine, epoprostenol, or inhaled nitric oxide.	对短效肺血管扩张剂反应不足	平均肺动脉压（mPAP）的下降至少为10mmHg至绝对值小于40mmHg，而对于短效血管活性剂（如腺苷，依前列醇或吸入一氧化氮），心输出量（CO）没有降低。
HP:0030895	消化系统异常	Abnormal gastrointestinal motility	An anomaly of the muscular contractions that propel food though the gastrointestinal tract.	胃肠蠕动异常	推动食物通过胃肠道的肌肉收缩的异常。

HP:0030898	体壁的异常	Pruritis on abdomen	Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the abdomen.	腹部瘙痒	瘙痒是一种让人忍不住想要去搔抓的主观感觉。该术语指的是腹部皮肤瘙痒感的异常增加。
HP:0030899	体壁的异常	Pruritis on hand	Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the hand.	手部瘙痒	瘙痒是一种让人忍不住想要去搔抓的主观感觉。该术语指的是手部皮肤瘙痒感的异常增加。
HP:0030900	体壁的异常	Pruritus on foot	Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the foot.	足部瘙痒	瘙痒是一种让人忍不住想要去搔抓的主观感觉。该术语指的是足部皮肤瘙痒感的异常增加。
HP:0030901	体壁的异常	Pruritis on breast	Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the breast.	乳房瘙痒	瘙痒是一种让人忍不住想要去搔抓的主观感觉。该术语指的是乳房皮肤瘙痒感的异常增加。
HP:0030902	神经系统异常	Palmomental reflex	A type of primitive reflex characterized by an involuntary contraction of the mentalis muscle of the chin caused by stimulation of the thenar eminence of the palm.	掌颌反射	一种原始反射，其特征在于通过刺激手掌的尖锐隆隆而引起的下巴的精神肌肉的不自主收缩。
HP:0030903	神经系统异常	Grasp reflex	A type of primitive reflex that can be elicated when the hand of the examiner is gently inserted into the palm of the patient&#39;s hand. The palmar surface is stroked or simply touched. The flexor surfaces of the fingers may be stimulated also by the examiner&#39;s fingers. The stimulus should be in a distal direction. With a positive response, the patient grasps the examiner&#39;s hand with variable strength and continues to grasp as the examiner&#39;s hand is moved. Ability to release the grip voluntarily depends on the activity of the reflex; some patients can do so readily, while others can even be lifted off the bed, since the grasp has such power [NCBI Books:NBK395].	抓握反射/握持反射	当检查者的手轻轻插入患者手掌时，可以引发一种原始反射。手掌表面被抚摸或简单地触动。手指的屈肌表面也可以由检查者的手指刺激。刺激应在远端方向。有了积极的回应，患者抓住检查员手中的力量不变，并随着检查者的手移动而继续掌握。自主释放的能力取决于反射的活动；有些患者可以这样做，而有些甚至可以从床上抬起，因为抓握有这样的力量[NCBI Books：NBK395]。
HP:0030904	神经系统异常	Glabellar reflex	A type of primitive reflex that is elicited by repetitive tapping on the forehead. Normal subjects usually blink in response to the first several taps, but if blinking persists, the response is abnormal and considered to be a sign of frontal release. Persistent blinking is also known as Myerson&#39;s sign.	眉心反射	通过重复敲击前额引起的一种原始反射。正常情况下通常会在前几次敲击中眨眼，但如果持续眨眼，则是异常的标志。持续眨眼也被称为Myerson&#39;s标志。
HP:0030905	神经系统异常	Snout reflex	A type of primitive reflex that is elicited by tapping the upper lip lightly. The contraction of the muscles causes the mouth to resemble a snout [NCBI Books:NBK395].	撅嘴反射	通过轻轻敲击上唇引起的一种原始反射。肌肉收缩导致噘嘴反射[NCBI Books：NBK395]。
HP:0030906	神经系统异常	Suck reflex	A type of primitive reflex that is elicited by lightly touching or tapping on the lips with an object such as a tongue blade, reflex hammer, or the examiner&#39;s finger. At times the reflex is obtained merely by approaching the lips with an object. A positive suck reflex consists of sucking movements by the lips when they are stroked or touched [NCBI Books:NBK395].	吸吮反射	一种原始反射，通过用诸如压舌板，反射锤或检查者的手指的物体轻轻地触摸或敲击嘴唇而引起。有时只能通过用物体接近嘴唇来获得反射。阳性吸反射包括嘴唇吸吮或抚摸时的动作[NCBI Books：NBK395]。
HP:0030907	神经系统异常	Thunderclap headache	Severe head pain with sudden onset, reaching its maximum intensity in less than one minute and lasting from one hour to ten days.	霹雳性头痛	严重头痛突然发作，在不到一分钟内达到最大强度，持续1小时至10天。
HP:0030908	免疫系统异常	Liver kidney microsome type 1 antibody positivity	The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against P450 2D6, a cytochrome P450 mono-oxygenase. Anti-LKM-1 antibodies are considered to be a diagnostic marker of autoimmune hepatitis type 2 (AIH2).	肝肾微粒体1型抗体阳性	在与P450 2D6（细胞色素P450单加氧酶）反应的血清中存在自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）。 抗LKM-1抗体被认为是自身免疫性肝炎2型（AIH2）的诊断标志物。

HP:0030946	头部和颈部的异常	Conjunctival papillae	['Raised tissue masses located on the palpebral conjunctiva with a central vessel. Papillae are created by a focal infiltration of inflammatory cells.']	结膜乳头状突起	['位于睑结膜上的隆起组织团，中央有血管。乳头状凸起是由炎症细胞的局灶性浸润造成的。
HP:0030947	头部和颈部的异常	Conjunctival follicles	['Small, dome-shaped nodules without a prominent central vessel located on the conjunctiva. The lymphoid follicles are located in the subendothelial region of the conjunctiva. They consist of a germinal center that contains immature, proliferating lymphocytes, as well as a corona that contains mature lymphocytes and plasma cells.']	结膜囊	['结膜上的突出的中心有血管的小圆顶状结节。淋巴滤泡位于结膜的下内皮区。它们包括一个有含未成熟的、正在增殖的淋巴细胞的萌发中心，以及一个包含成熟淋巴细胞和浆细胞的冠。
HP:0030948	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated gamma-glutamyltransferase activity	['Increased activity of the enzyme gamma-glutamyltransferase (GGT). GGT is mainly present in kidney, liver, and pancreatic cells, but small amounts are present in other tissues.']	γ-谷氨酰转移酶活性增高	γ-谷氨酰转移酶（GGT）活性增高。GGT主要存在于肝脏、肾脏和胰腺细胞，也有少量存在于其他组织。

HP:0030951	肌肉组织异常	Skeletal muscle fibrosis	Excessive formation of fibrous bands of scar tissue in between muscle fibers.	骨骼肌纤维化	肌肉纤维之间疤痕组织纤维带过度增生
HP:0030952	眼部异常	Birdshot choroidal lesions	['Multiple cream-yellow colored hypopigmented choroidal anomalies whose size is approximately one quarter to one half of that of the optic disc, and whose location tends to cluster around the optic nerve radiating towards the periphery. The pattern of the lesions is said to be similar to gunshot spatter from birdshot.']	鸟枪弹样脉络膜病变	多发、奶油样的脱色素病灶，其大小约为视盘的四分之一至二分之一，多见于视神经附近并向周围辐射。 因病变的形状与鸟枪扫射后相似而得名。
HP:0030953	眼部异常,心血管系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Conjunctival hyperemia	['Dilatation of the blood vessels of the conjunctiva leading to a red appearance of the sclera.']	结膜充血	由于结膜上的血管扩张导致巩膜呈现红色。
HP:0030955	神经系统异常	Alcoholism	['An addictive behavior defined as drinking excessive amounts of alcohol over a long period of time, having difficulty reducing the amount of alcohol consumed, strongly desiring alcohol and experiencing withdrawal symoptoms when not drinking alcohol.']	酗酒	一种成瘾行为。定义为长时间饮酒过量，难以减少饮酒量，强烈渴望饮酒，并在不饮酒的时存在戒断症状。
