HP:0030957	心血管系统异常	Ventricular septal aneurysm	['A bowing (bulding to one side) of the interventricular septum of more than 15 mm on either side in adults and 5 mm in children during normal cardiac motion.']	室间隔动脉瘤	正常心脏运动过程中，成人任意一侧室间隔存在超过15mm的弓形或者儿童中超过5mm
HP:0030958	心血管系统异常	Membranous ventricular septal aneurysm	Bowing (bulging out) of the membranous part of the interventricular septum of more than 10-15 mm into the cavity of an adjacent ventricle (usually into the right ventricle).	膜性室间隔动脉瘤	室间隔膜状部分朝相邻心室（通常为右心室）凸起弓形部分超过10-15mm
HP:0030959	心血管系统异常	Muscular ventricular septal aneurysm	Bowing (bulging out) of the muscular part of the interventricular septum of more than 10-15 mm into the cavity of an adjacent ventricle (usually into the right ventricle).	肌室间隔动脉瘤	室间隔肌肉部分朝相邻心室（通常为右心室）凸起弓形部分超过10-15mm
HP:0030961	眼部异常	Microspherophakia	['Lens of the eye is smaller than normal and spherically shaped.']	小球形晶状体	眼睛的晶状体比正常小并且是球形的。
HP:0030962	心血管系统异常	Abnormal morphology of the great vessels	['A structural anomaly affecting a blood vessel involved in the circulation of the heart, i.e., the superior or inferior vena cava, the pulmonary arteries, the pulmonary veins, and the aorta.']	大血管畸形	即上、下腔静脉、肺动脉、肺静脉和主动脉等可以影响心脏循环的大的血管的结构异常
HP:0030964	心血管系统异常	Abnormal aortic physiology		主动脉异常生理学	
HP:0030965	心血管系统异常	Aortic stiffness	The elastic properties of the aorta allow the aorta to store half of the cardiac ejected blood volume per beat, whereby aortic recoil during diastole pushes the remaining stored volume forward into the peripheral circulation, a phenomenon known as the Windkessel function. Aortic stiffness occurs as the elastic fibers within the arterial wall become disrupted due to mechanical stress (with age or due to other factors). Aortic stiffness refers to a reduction in the elasticity of the aorta, which is associated with an elevated pulse pressure, increased wave reflection, and often hypertension.	主动脉僵硬	"主动脉的弹性特性允许主动脉存储每搏输出的一半心脏射血量，由此主动脉在心脏舒张期间的反冲将剩余的储存体积向前推入外周循环，这种现象称为Windkessel功能。 当动脉壁内的弹性纤维由于机械应力（随着年龄或由于其他因素）而被破坏时发生主动脉僵硬。 主动脉僵硬是指主动脉弹性降低，这与脉压升高，波反射增加和高血压有关。
"
HP:0030966	心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	Abnormal pulmonary artery morphology	['An abnormality of the structure of the pulmonary artery.']	肺动脉畸形	肺动脉的结构异常

HP:0030970	心血管系统异常	Abnormal vena cava physiology	['An abnormality of the function of the veins that return deoxygenated blood from the body into the heart, i.e., the superior vena cava and the inferior vena cava.']	异常腔静脉生理学	是指脱氧血液从体内返回心脏的静脉功能异常，即上腔静脉和下腔静脉
HP:0030972	心血管系统异常	Abnormal systemic blood pressure	['A chronic deviation from normal pressure in the systemic arterial system.']	异常体循环高血压	全身动脉系统中的常压的长期偏离
HP:0030974	泌尿生殖系统异常	Cryptozoospermia	A type of low sperm count where ejaculated semen contains less than 100,000 spermatozoa per ml. With cryptozoospermia, the sperm count may fluctuate and a zero sperm count in the ejaculate may be initially measured. If sperm are observed in a second semen sample following centrifugation, the diagnosis of cryptozoospermia can be made (and azoospermia can be ruled out).	隐匿精子症	少精是指精液中每毫升精液中含有精子数量少于10万个。隐匿精子症指精子数量可出现波动，在初次射精时精子数量为0，在第二次精液复查中若离心后可发现精子，隐匿精子症即可诊断（无精症除外）。
HP:0030975	神经系统异常	Pontine tegmental cap	An abnormal curved or vaulted (capped) structure covering the middle third of the dorsal pontine tegmentum and projecting into the fourth ventricle.	脑桥被盖“帽状”发育不良	一种不规则的弧形或拱顶（盖）结构，覆盖脑桥背侧中段第三脑室并突入第四脑室。
HP:0030976	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal factor VIII activity	['A deviation from the normal activity of coagulation factor VIII. Factor VIII (fVIII) is a cofactor in the intrinsic clotting cascade that is activated to fVIIIa in the presence of minute quantities of thrombin. fVIIIa acts as a receptor, for factors IXa and X.']	VIII因子活性异常	凝血因子VIII活性异常，FVIII是内源性凝血途径的辅助因子，在极少量凝血酶存在的情况下可被激活为FVIIIa，FVIIIa作为FIXa 和FX的受体。
HP:0030977	血液和造血组织异常	Increased factor VIII activity	Increased activity of the coagulation factor VIII. Factor VIII (fVIII) is a cofactor in the intrinsic clotting cascade that is activated to fVIIIa in the presence of minute quantities of thrombin. fVIIIa acts as a receptor, for factors IXa and X.	VIII因子活性增强	凝血因子VIII活性增强，FVIII是内源性凝血途径的辅助因子，在极少量凝血酶存在的情况下可被激活为FVIIIa，FVIIIa作为FIXa 和FX的受体。
HP:0030978	神经系统异常	Decreased CSF/serum albumin ratio	A reduction below normal limits of the ratio of the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) albumin concentration to serum albumin concentration.	脑脊液中白蛋白与血清中白蛋白的比值下降	脑脊液（CSF）白蛋白浓度与血清白蛋白浓度之比低于正常限度

HP:0030980	神经系统异常	Reduced brain glutamine level by MRS	An decrease in the level of glutamine in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).	MRS分析大脑谷氨酰胺水平偏低	磁共振波谱（MRS）分析显示大脑谷氨酰胺水平偏低
HP:0030981	神经系统异常	Abnormal CSF/serum albumin ratio	A deviation from the normal range of the ratio of the albumin concentration in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) to the concentration in serum (which may be defined as 3.2-9.0). This is an index of blood-brain barrier (BBB) integrity, adjusted for the serum albumin concentration, and an increased ratio is taken as a sign of a loss of integretiy of the BBB with leakage of albumin into the CSF.	异常脑脊液/血清白蛋白比率	脑脊液白蛋白浓度与血清白蛋白浓度之比偏离正常范围（正常范围在3.2-9.0）。这是血脑屏障完整性的指标，调整血清白蛋白浓度，白蛋白渗漏进入脑脊液会导致脑脊液白蛋白浓度与血清白蛋白浓度之比增高，提示血脑屏障丧失完整性。
HP:0030983	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Ovarian thecoma	A sex cord-stromal tumor of the ovary. Thecomas range from small tumors to large solid or solid-cystic masses of up to 15 cm. They are unilateral in over 90 percent of cases and are rarely malignant. Thecomas are stromal tumors made up of cells that resemble theca cells, lutein cells and fibroblasts. They are traditionally classified within the sex cord-stromal tumor category of ovarian tumor types.	卵泡膜细胞瘤	一种卵巢性索间质细胞肿瘤。卵泡膜细胞瘤范围从可小肿瘤到大的实性或囊实性的肿瘤，最大可达15cm。近90%的肿瘤多为单侧发病且多为良性肿瘤。卵泡膜细胞瘤由是类似膜细胞、黄体细胞、成纤维细胞组成的由间质瘤。属于卵巢肿瘤传统意义分类的性索间质肿瘤。
HP:0030984	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal serum bile acid concentration	['A deviation from the normal concentration of serum bile acid concentration.']	血清胆汁酸浓度异常	血清胆汁酸浓度不在正常范围内
HP:0030985	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased serum bile concentration	['A reduction in the concentration of bile acid in the blood.']	血清胆汁酸浓度降低	血清胆汁酸浓度降低
HP:0030986	消化系统异常	Biliary epithelial hyperplasia	Hyperplasia of lining epithelia of the septal and large bile ducts manifesting as micropapillary projections or as a stratification of the epithelium with or without dilatation of the duct lumen.	胆管上皮增生	胆管内上皮增生，表现为微乳头状突出，或上皮细胞分层伴或不伴管腔扩张
HP:0030987	免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	Suppurative cholangitis	Cholangitis characterized by the presence of numerous polymorphonuclear cells around and within the wall as well as within the lumen of the ducts. This may involve ducts of any size and is occasionally associated with abscess formation (cholangitic abscess).	化脓性胆管炎	以管壁周、管壁内以及管腔内存在大量的多形核细胞为特征的胆管炎类型。累及任何尺寸的导管，偶尔伴有脓肿形成（胆管炎脓肿）。
HP:0030988	免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	Granulomatous cholangitis	Cholangitis characterized by the accumulation of granulomas. Granulomas are aggregates of modified macrophages (epithelioid cells) and other inflammatory cells that accumulate after chronic exposure to antigens. The underlying trigger may be exposure to noxious agents that cannot be biochemically degraded or to immune dysfunction. The ultimate result is a release of a variety cytokines that stimulate mononuclear cells that fuse to form multinucleated giant cells with a surrounding rim of lymphocytes and fibroblasts.	肉芽肿性胆管炎	以肉芽肿积聚为特征的胆管炎。肉芽肿是修饰的巨噬细胞（上皮样细胞）和抗原长期暴露累积的炎症细胞的聚集物。难以生化降解的有害药物或免疫功能缺陷可能是其触发因素。最终结果是释放多种细胞因子，刺激单个核细胞融合形成多核巨细胞，并围以淋巴细胞和成纤维细胞。
HP:0030989	免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	Lymphoid cholangitis	Cholangitis characterized by a close association between duct branches, usually interlobular bile ducts, and lymphocytic aggregates, which may show a follicular arrangement.	淋巴性胆管炎	以分支胆管（通常为小叶间胆管）和淋巴细胞的聚集存在密切联系的胆管炎，呈滤泡样排列。
HP:0030990	免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	Pleomorphic cholangitis	['Cholangitis associated with mixed inflammatory infiltrates and the presence of fibrosis or sclerosis of the biliary tree.']	多形性胆管炎	胆管炎合并混合性炎症浸润且存在胆管树纤维化或硬化。
HP:0030991	免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	Sclerosing cholangitis	['Cholangitis associated with evident ductal fibrosis that develops as a consequence of long-standing bile duct inflammatory, obstruction, or ischemic injury; it can be obliterative or nonobliterative.']	硬化性胆管炎	胆道长期受炎症、梗阻、缺血性损伤等病理因素导致的胆道纤维化性炎症，胆道可闭锁或不闭锁 
HP:0030992	消化系统异常	Abnormal pancreatic duct morphology	Any structural anomaly of the pancreatic duct, which is the tubular structure that collects exocrine pancreatic secretions and and transports them to the duodenum.	胰管形态学异常	指的是任何的胰管形态学异常。胰管是收集胰腺分泌物并将其运送到十二指肠的管状结构。
HP:0030993	消化系统异常	Duplication of pancreatic duct	['A congenital anomaly characterized by the presence of two separate pancreatic ducts.']	重复胰管	存在两套独立的胰管造成的先天性结构异常
HP:0030994	消化系统异常	Pancreas divisum	A congenital anomaly of the pancreas that results from failed fusion of the dorsal and ventral ducts during embyological development. Three variants have been described: type 1 or classical divisum in which there is total failure of fusion; type 2 in which dorsal drainage is dominant in the absence of the duct of Wirsung; and type 3 or incomplete divisum where a small communicating branch is present.	胰腺分裂	在胚胎发育过程中，由于主胰管和副胰管融合异常导致的胰腺先天发育异常，包括：I型或经典型为完全未融合型；II型主胰管无法引流，以副胰管引流为主；III型或不完全型分裂是指主副胰管有细小的交通支但无法充分引流。

HP:0030998	神经系统异常	Cerebrospinal fluid rhinorrhoea	Drainage of cerebrospinal fluid through the nose. This can occur when there is a fistula between the dura and the skull base and discharge of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) from the nose.	脑脊液鼻漏	指脑脊液从鼻孔中渗漏流出。当硬脑膜与颅底之间存在瘘管时，脑脊液可能会从鼻孔流出。

HP:0031001	神经系统异常	Minifascicle formation	['A nerve fascicle or fasciculus is a small bundle of axons, enclosed by the perineurium. A minifascule refers to a group of thinly myelinated and unmyelinated axons surrounded by a delicate perineurium, and with a smaller diamter than a normal nerve fascicle.']	微神经束结构	神经束或纤维束是由束膜包绕的小轴突束。微神经束是指一组被纤细的神经束膜包绕的有髓鞘和无髓鞘的轴突，比正常神经束的直径更小。

HP:0031006	神经系统异常	Acroparesthesia	['A type of paresthesia (tingling, pins-and-needles, burning or numbness or stiffness) that occurs in the hands and feet and particularly in the fingers and toes.']	肢端感觉障碍	一种手和脚特别是手指和脚趾出现的感觉异常（感觉刺痛、蚁走感、烧灼或麻木或僵硬）。

HP:0031010	骨骼系统异常,肢体异常	Hyperphalangy of the 3rd finger	['An accessory phalanx of the third (middle) finger that is arranged linearly with the other phalanges. HP:0031011	心血管系统异常	Fatty streak	Yellow-colored streaks, patches, or spots on the intimal surface of arteries. Fatty streaks stain red with Sudan III or Sudan IV.	脂纹	动脉内膜表面的黄色条纹、斑块或斑点。脂纹可被苏丹红Ⅲ或苏丹红Ⅳ染色成红色
HP:0031012	心血管系统异常	Thin-cap fibroatheroma	Thin-cap fibroatheroma is characterized by a relatively large necrotic core with an overlying thin fibrous cap measuring <65 ¦Ìm typically containing numerous macrophages, and is considered to be the precursor lesion of plaque rupture which is the most common cause of coronary thrombosis	薄纤维帽粥样瘤	薄纤维帽粥样瘤的特征是一个相对较大的坏死区域覆盖的纤维帽厚度<65μm，通常含有大量巨噬细胞，被认为是斑块破裂的前病变，是冠状动脉血栓形成的最常见病因
HP:0031013	骨骼系统异常	Ankylosis	['A reduction of joint mobility resulting from changes involving the articular surfaces.']	关节僵硬	由于关节面变化等导致关节活动范围受限。
HP:0031014	心血管系统异常	Arteria lusoria	Usually, three large arteries arise from the arch of the aorta: the brachiocephalic trunk (divided into the right common carotid artery and the right subclavian artery), the left common carotid artery, and the left subclavian artery. However, when aberrant right subclavian artery variant is present, the brachiocephalic trunk is absent and four large arteries arise from the arch of the aorta: the right common carotid artery, the left common carotid artery, the left subclavian artery, and the final one with the most distal left sided origin, the right subclavian artery, also called the arteria lusoria.	压迫性动脉	"通常，主动脉弓有三条大动脉：头臂干(分为右侧颈总动脉和右侧锁骨下动脉)、左颈总动脉、左锁骨下动脉， 然而，当右锁骨下动脉异常时，头臂干不存在，主动脉弓出现四条大动脉：右颈总动脉，左颈总动脉，左锁骨下动脉和最后一条最远端的左侧起源，右锁骨下动脉，也称为压迫性动脉。
"

HP:0031018	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Eccrine syringofibroadenoma	Eccrine syringofibroadenoma (ESFA) is a benign adnexal tumor arising most often on the extremities of elderly individuals characterized by anastomosing cords of cuboidal epithelial cells surrounded by a fibrovascular stroma containing plasma cells and ductal structures. ESFA stains positively with epithelial membrane antigen (EMA) and carcinoembryonic antigen (CEA).	小汗腺汗管纤维腺瘤	小汗腺汗管纤维腺瘤（ESFA）是一种皮肤附件良性肿瘤，常发生在老年人的四肢部位，其特征在于由包含浆细胞和导管结构的纤维血管基质围绕的立方形上皮细胞。 ESFA与上皮膜抗原（EMA）和癌胚抗原（CEA）呈阳性染色。

HP:0031028	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Lactescent serum	Serum sample with a grossly white (milk-like, i.e., lactescent) appearance. This feature is indicative of an extremely elevated serum triglyceride level.	乳状血清	血清样本外观呈乳白色（牛奶样或乳汁状），表明血清甘油三酯水平显著增高。
HP:0031029	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated carcinoembryonic antigen level	An increased blood concentration of the carcinoembryonic antigen (CEA). CEA is a member of the immunoglobulin supergene family. The human CEA gene family is clustered on chromosome 19q and comprises 29 genes. CEA is highly expressed in embryonic tissue and in some cancers, and is a widely used tumor marker.	癌胚抗原水平增高	血液中癌胚抗原（CEA)浓度增高。CEA是免疫球蛋白超基因家族成员之一。人类CEA基因家族定位于染色体19q，包含29个基因。CEA在胚胎组织和某些肿瘤中呈现高表达，因此被广泛用作肿瘤标志物。
HP:0031030	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated carcinoma antigen 125 level	An increased blood concentration of carcinoma antigen 125 (CA-125). CA-125, also known as mucin 16, can exhibit increased blood levels in certain types of cancer.	癌抗原CA125水平增高	血液中癌抗原125(CA125）浓度增高。CA125也称为黏蛋白16，在某些类型的肿瘤患者血液中表现为CA125水平增高。
HP:0031031	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal retinol-binding protein level	A deviation from normal blood concentration of retinol-binding protein (RBP). The most commonly used indicator of vitamin A status is the serum retinol concentration (retinol is one of the several compounds known as vitamin A). The serum RBP concentration is used as a surrogate measure for serum retinol.	视黄醇结合蛋白水平异常	血液中视黄醇结合蛋白（RBP）浓度不在正常范围内。血清视黄醇浓度通常用于预测体内维生素A的状态（视黄醇是维生素A的一种化合物）。血清RBP浓度测定可作为血清视黄醇的替代检测方法。
HP:0031032	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased retinol-binding protein level	A reduced blood concentration of retinol-binding protein. This finding predicts vitamin A deficiency with high sensitivity and specificity.	视黄醇结合蛋白水平降低	血液中视黄醇结合蛋白浓度降低，这一指标对于预测维生素A缺乏具有较高的灵敏度和特异度。
HP:0031033	泌尿生殖系统异常	Impaired urinary acidification	The kidney contributes towards acid-base homeostasis by excreting H+ ions and retaining bicarbonate. This process is known as acidification of the urine. The pH of urine ranges normally from 4.5 to 8. The inability to reduce the pH of the urine in a situation where it would be otherwise expected is known as an acidification defect.	尿酸化受损	肾脏通过排出H+离子和维持碳酸氢盐来促进酸碱平衡，这个过程被称为尿液的酸化。尿液PH的范围从4.5-8.0。在某种情况下，尿液的PH值无法降低，被称为尿液的酸化缺陷。
HP:0031034	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal insulin like growth factor binding protein acid labile subunit level	A deviation from the normal blood concentration of the insulin like growth factor binding protein acid labile subunit (IGFALS; Entrez Gene ID 3483). The acid-labile subunit (IGFALS) acts in the insulin-like growth (IGF) system by binding circulating IGF1 in a ternary complex with binding protein (IGFBP)-3 to prevent IGF1 from crossing the endothelial barrier.	胰岛素样生长因子结合蛋白酸不稳定亚单位的水平异常	血液中胰岛素样生长因子结合蛋白酸不稳定亚单位(IGFALS; Entrez Gene ID 3483)浓度不在正常范围内。在胰岛素样生长因子系统中，酸不稳定亚单位（IGFALS）与IGF1和IGFBP-3形成三元复合物，阻止IGF1通过内皮屏障。

HP:0031038	泌尿生殖系统异常	Spermatogenesis maturation arrest	Maturation arrest (MA) is defined as germ cells that fail to complete maturation. Uniform MA is characterized by spermatogenic arrest at the same stage of spermatogenesis throughout the seminiferous tubules. MA is subcategorized into early MA, in which only spermatogonia or spermatocytes are found, and late MA, in which spermatids are detected without spermatozoa.	生精成熟阻滞	生殖细胞成熟障碍是指受精卵不能完全成熟。均一性生殖细胞成熟障碍以生精小管在精子形成时期精子形成阻滞为特点。生殖细胞成熟障碍可分为生精过程常阻滞于精母细胞或精原细胞阶段的早期生精阻滞以及生精过程常阻滞于精子细胞阶段而非精子的晚期生精阻滞。
HP:0031039	泌尿生殖系统异常	Early spermatogenesis maturation arrest	A type of maturation arrest in which only spermatogonia or spermatocytes are found.	早期生精阻滞	生精过程常阻滞于精母细胞或精原细胞阶段时期。
HP:0031040	泌尿生殖系统异常	Late spermatogenesis maturation arrest	A type of maturation arrest in which spermatids are detected without spermatozoa.	晚期生精阻滞	生精过程常阻滞于精子细胞阶段而非精子形成。
HP:0031041	心血管系统异常	Obstruction of the superior vena cava	['Blockage of blood flow through the superior vena cava (SVC). Because the venous drainage from the upper extremities, upper thorax and head is obstructed, SVC obstruction presents with symptoms related to engorgement of these areas. Both the degree of SVC compromise and the extent of collateral veins determine the varied clinical presentation, which can be as mild as slight facial and upper extremity edema or as dire as intracranial swelling, seizures, hemodynamic instability and tracheal obstruction.']	上腔静脉梗阻	阻塞血流通过上腔静脉（SVC)。来自上肢、上胸和头部的静脉引流受阻，SVC梗阻可表现出这些区域充血的相关症状。SVC的梗阻程度和侧支静脉大小的不同可导致多种不同的临床表现，轻型主要表现为轻度的面部和上肢水肿，严重者可引发颅内压升高、癫痫发作、血流动力学不稳定和气道阻塞等。

Femoral anteversion averages between 30-40 degress at birth, and between 8-14 degrees in adults. This term applies if the amount of femoral torsion exceeds this range.']	股骨扭转增加	股骨扭转，也称为股骨旋转，是指股骨在横平面上的近端和远端部分之间的扭转。新生儿股骨前倾角平均为30-40度，成人为8～14度。该术语用于描述股骨的扭转角度超出该范围。

HP:0031073	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal response to endocrine stimulation test	['An anomalous response to a test that is designed to probe the function of the endocrine system.']	内分泌刺激试验反应异常	对旨在探测内分泌系统功能的测试的异常反应
HP:0031074	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal response to ACTH stimulation test	['An anomolous response to stimulation by adminstration of the adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH). ACTH stimulation normally stimulates the adrenal glands to release cortisol and adrenaline.']	ACTH刺激试验反应异常	促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）给药刺激后出现的异常反应。ACTH刺激给药通常刺激肾上腺释放皮质醇和肾上腺素。
HP:0031075	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal response to insulin tolerance test	['An anomalous response to the insulin tolerance test (ITT), in which insulin is administered intravenously and blood glucose and potentially other compounds are measred at intervals. Insulin administration is intended to induce extreme hypoglycemia (bloodgluoce below 40 mg/dl), which in turn induces release of adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH) and growth hormone (GH). ACTH induces the adrenal gland to release cortisol, which together with GH opposes the action of insulin on the blood glucose level.']	胰岛素耐量试验反应异常	对胰岛素耐量试验（ITT）的异常反应。胰岛素静脉给药后，间隔测量血糖和潜在的其他化合物。胰岛素给药旨在诱导极低血糖（血糖低于40mg / dl），从而诱导促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）和生长激素（GH）的释放。 ACTH诱导肾上腺释放皮质醇，皮质醇可与GH一起拮抗胰岛素对血糖水平的影响。
HP:0031076	内分泌系统异常	Impaired cortisol response to insulin stimulation test	['Failure of cortisol levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the insulin tolerance test (ITT).']	皮质醇对胰岛素刺激试验的反应受损	皮质醇水平未能对胰岛素耐量试验（ITT）作出充分响应（增加）
HP:0031077	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal response to corticotropin releasing hormone stimulation test	['An anomalous response to the corticotropin releasing hormone (CRH) stimulation test. Normally,CRH is released by the hypothalamus to induce adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH) release by the anterior pituitary. In the stimulation test, CRH is administered intravenously and ACTH and cortisol are measured at intervals.']	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素刺激试验反应异常	对促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素（CRH）刺激试验的异常反应。正常情况下，CRH由下丘脑释放以诱导垂体前叶释放促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）。在刺激试验中，静脉注射CRH后，间隔测量ACTH和皮质醇。
HP:0031078	内分泌系统异常	Impaired cortisol response to corticotropin releasing hormone stimulation test	['Failure of cortisol levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the corticotropin releasing hormone stimulation test.']	皮质醇对促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素刺激试验的反应受损	皮质醇水平未能对促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素刺激试验作出充分响应（增加）
HP:0031079	内分泌系统异常	Impaired growth-hormone response to insulin stimulation test	['Failure of growth hormone levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the insulin tolerance test (ITT).']	生长激素对胰岛素刺激试验的反应受损	生长激素水平未能对胰岛素耐量试验（ITT）作出充分响应（增加）
HP:0031080	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal response to glucagon stimulation test	['An anomalous response to the glucagon stimulation test, which like the insulin tolerance test (ITT) stimulates the release of both adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH) and growth hormone (GH).']	胰高血糖素刺激试验反应异常	对胰高血糖素刺激试验产生异常反应，如胰岛素耐量试验（ITT）刺激促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）和生长激素（GH）的释放。
HP:0031081	内分泌系统异常	Impaired cortisol response to glucagon stimulation test	['Failure of cortisol levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the glucagon stimulation test.']	皮质醇对胰高血糖素刺激试验的反应受损	皮质醇水平未能对胰高血糖素刺激试验作出充分响应（增加）
HP:0031082	内分泌系统异常	Impaired growth-hormone response to glucagon stimulation test	['Failure of growth hormone levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the glucagon stimulation test.']	生长激素对胰高血糖素刺激试验的反应受损	生长激素水平未能对胰高血糖素刺激试验作出充分响应（增加）
HP:0031083	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal response to human chorionic gonadotrophin stimulation test	['An anomalous response to intravenous stimulation by human chorionic gonadotrophin. Stimulation with hCG stimulates testicular Leydig cells to secrete androgens via the Leydig hormone receptors.']	人绒毛膜促性腺激素刺激试验反应异常	对人绒毛膜促性腺激素静脉刺激产生异常反应。用hCG刺激睾丸Leydig细胞，通过Leydig激素受体分泌雄激素。
HP:0031084	内分泌系统异常	Excessive insulin response to glucagon test	An abnormally high increase in insulin levels following a glucagon stimulation test.	胰岛素对胰高血糖素试验反应过度	胰高血糖素刺激试验后胰岛素水平异常升高
HP:0031085	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased prealbumin level	A reduced concentration of prealbumin in the blood. Prealbumin, also known as transthyretin, has a half-life in plasma of about 2 days, much shorter than that of albumin. Prealbumin is therefore more sensitive to changes in protein-energy status than albumin, and its concentration closely reflects recent dietary intake rather than overall nutritional status.	前白蛋白水平降低	血液中前白蛋白浓度降低。前白蛋白也称为转甲状腺素蛋白。其在血浆中的半衰期约为2天，远远短于白蛋白，因此前白蛋白比白蛋白更能敏感地体现蛋白质能量状态的改变。其浓度反映当前的饮食摄入量，而不是整体的营养状况。
HP:0031086	泌尿生殖系统异常	Ectopic ovary	Undescended or ectopic ovaries are characterized by the attachment of the upper pole of the ovary to an area above the level of the common iliac vessels.	卵巢异位	未下降或异位卵巢的特征是卵巢的上极附着在髂总血管以上的区域。
HP:0031087	生长异常	Absent pubertal growth spurt	['The abrupt and transient increase in the annual growth rate normally observed in adolescent individuals does not occur.']	没有青春期的成长	[通常在青少年个体中观察到的年增长率的突然和短暂的增加并没有发生。]
HP:0031088	泌尿生殖系统异常	Vaginal dryness	Persistent vaginal dryness.	阴道干涩	阴道持续干燥。

HP:0031091	骨骼系统异常,肢体异常	Toe dactylitis	['Toes appear swollen and plump owing to inflammation of the complete toe.']	趾炎	整个脚趾因发炎而肿胀。

HP:0031096	骨骼系统异常	Delayed vertebral ossification	['A decrease in the amount of mineralized bone in one or more vertebrae compared with that expected for a given developmental age.']	椎骨骨化延迟	与发育年龄的正常值相比，一块或多块椎骨矿物质沉积量减少。
HP:0031097	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Abnormal thyroid-stimulating hormone level	['Any deviation from the normal amount of the thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH), which is produced by the anterior pituitary gland and stimulates the function of the thyroid gland.']	促甲状腺激素水平异常	促甲状腺激素水平偏离正常范围。TSH由腺垂体前叶产生，该激素对甲状腺功能具有刺激作用
HP:0031098	神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Decreased thyroid-stimulating hormone level	['Reduced amount of the thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH), which is produced by the anterior pituitary gland and stimulates the function of the thyroid gland.']	促甲状腺激素水平降低	促甲状腺激素（TSH）水平降低。TSH由腺垂体前叶产生，该激素对甲状腺功能具有刺激作用
HP:0031099	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal circulating inhibin level	Any deviation from the normal concentration of iInhibins, which are heterodimeric protein hormones secreted by granulosa cells of the ovary in females and Sertoli cells of the testis in males. Inhibins suppress the secretion of pituitary follicle-stimulating hormone.	循环抑制素水平异常	抑制素水平超出正常范围。抑制素是由女性卵巢颗粒细胞和男性睾丸支持细胞分泌的异二聚体蛋白激素。抑制素抑制垂体促卵泡激素的分泌。
HP:0031100	内分泌系统异常	Decreased inhibin B level	A reduced concentration of inhibin B in the blood.	抑制素B水平降低	血抑制素B浓度下降
HP:0031101	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal antimullerian hormone level	Any deviation from the normal range of the antimullerian hormone, a peptide produced by the granulosa cells of follicles. Anti-Mullerian hormone (AMH), also known as Mullerian inhibiting substance, is produced by the granulosa cells of small antral follicles of the ovary. AMH has an inhibiting role in the ovary, contributing to follicular arrest. AMH levels in women are low until the age of 8, rise rapidly until puberty and decline steadily from the age of 25 until menopause, when AMH production ceases.	抗苗勒氏管激素水平异常	抗苗勒氏管激素（AMH）水平偏离正常参考范围。抗苗勒氏管激素是由卵泡颗粒细胞分泌的激素。又称为苗勒抑制物质，由小窦卵泡的颗粒细胞分泌。AMH对卵巢有抑制作用，可导致卵泡发育的骤停。女性8岁前AMH水平较低，青春期后迅速升高，25岁后逐步下降，直至绝经期停止AMH的生成。
HP:0031102	内分泌系统异常	Increased antimullerian hormone level	['An elevation above the normal range of the antimullerian hormone in the circulation.']	抗苗勒氏管激素水平升高	循环中抗苗勒氏管激素高于正常范围
HP:0031103	内分泌系统异常	Decreased antimullerian hormone level	['A reduction below the normal range of the antimullerian hormone in the circulation.']	抗苗勒氏管激素水平降低	循环中抗苗勒氏管激素低于正常范围
HP:0031104	免疫系统异常	Insulin receptor antibody positivity	The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against the insulin receptor.	胰岛素受体抗体阳性 	血清中存在抗胰岛素受体的自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）
HP:0031105	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormal uterus morphology	['Any anomaly of the structure of the uterus']	子宫形态异常	任何的子宫结构异常。
HP:0031106	泌尿生殖系统异常	T-shaped uterus	An abnormality of the uterus characterized by a normal uterine outline but with an abnormal T-shaped uterine cavity with narrowing cavity due to thickened lateral walls with a correlation 2/3 uterine corpus and 1/3 cervix. The abnormlaity is said to resemble the letter T in hysterosalpingographic imaging.	T-形子宫	一种子宫畸形，其特点是子宫轮廓正常，但有一个异常的“T型”子宫腔，是与2/3的子宫体与1/3的子宫颈相关的子宫侧壁增厚所致。这种异常在子宫输卵管造影上与字母“T”类似。
HP:0031107	骨骼系统异常,肢体异常	Decreased fibular diameter	['Reduced width of the cross sectional diameter of the fibula.']	腓骨直径减小	腓骨横截面直径减小。
HP:0031108	肢体异常,肌肉组织异常	Triceps weakness	['A lack of strength in the triceps muscle, which normally is responsible for extending (straightening) the elbow and mediating certain shoulder movements.']	肱三头肌无力	肱三头肌力量缺乏，肱三头肌通常负责伸展肘并调解某些肩关节运动。
HP:0031109	乳房异常	Agalactia	['Failure of secretion of milk following childbirth associated with an inability to breastfeed an infant.']	无泌乳	“分娩后的乳汁分泌不足，无法母乳喂养婴儿。”
HP:0031110	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Twin-to-twin transfusion	As a result of sharing a single placenta, the blood supplies of monochorionic twin fetuses can become connected, so that they share blood circulation: although each fetus uses its own portion of the placenta, the connecting blood vessels within the placenta allow blood to pass from one twin to the other.Depending on the number, type and direction of the interconnecting blood vessels (anastomoses), blood can be transferred disproportionately from one twin (the donor) to the other (the recipient). This state of transfusion causes the donor twin to have decreased blood volume, retarding the donor's development and growth. The blood volume of the recipient twin is increased, which can strain the fetus's heart and eventually lead to heart failure.	双胎输血	由于共享同一个胎盘，单绒毛膜双胎血液供应可发生连接，形成血液循环共享：尽管每个胎儿使用自己的胎盘份额，但胎盘内血管连接可使双胎发生血液交流。取决于血管交通支（吻合）的数量、类型和方向，双胎之间可能发生非平衡的血液转运，使得血液从一个胎儿（供血儿）向另一个胎儿（受血儿）转运。双胎输血可导致供血儿血容量减少，使其生长发育受阻，而受血儿由于血容量增加，使其心脏负荷加重，甚至发生心力衰竭。
HP:0031111	肿瘤	Cutaneous hamartoma	['A hamartoma (tissue malformation consisting of an abnormal mixture of constitutive components) originating in the skin.']	皮肤的错构瘤	['一种错构瘤(是组织畸形，由结构成分的异常混合物构成)，源自于皮肤。']
HP:0031117	心血管系统异常	Purely bicuspid aortic valve	A type of bicuspid aortic valve (BAV) characterized by two equal-sized cusps, with no raphe and only two commissures. There is a lateral arrangement of the free edge of the cusps. Note that this differs from some other forms of BAV in which there are three commissures and two of the three cusps are joined by a raphe forming two functional leaflets. This type of BAV often is associated with aortic stenosis.	完全二尖瓣主动脉瓣	一种二尖瓣主动脉瓣（BAV），其特征为两个相同大小的尖瓣，有两个连合处无中锋。 瓣叶的边缘有一个横向排列。这与其他形式的BAV不同，无三个连合并且三个尖中的两个通过形成两个功能小叶的中缝连接等特征。 这种类型的BAV形成通常与主动脉瓣狭窄有关。
HP:0031118	心血管系统异常	Single raphe bicuspid aortic valve	A type of bicuspid aortic valvue (BAV) characterized by the presence of a single raphe that extends from the commissure to the free edge of the two underdeveloped, conjoint cusps, resulting in two leaflets of unequal size.	单缝二尖瓣主动脉瓣	一种二尖瓣主动脉瓣（BAV），其特征在于存在单个中缝，该中缝从连合处延伸至两个未发育的联合瓣膜的自由边缘，从而导致两个小叶尺寸不同。
HP:0031119	心血管系统异常	Bicuspid aortic valve with right-left cusp fusion	A type of bicuspid aortic valve (BAV) characterized by a single raphe between the right and left cusps (RL fusion pattern). This results in two leaflefts with an anterior-posterior leaflet orientation (also called the typical pattern). There is thus one completely developed noncoronary cusp, two completely developed commissures, and one raphe between the underdeveloped left and right coronary cusps extending to the corresponding malformed commissure.	左右尖瓣融合的二尖瓣主动脉瓣	一种二尖瓣主动脉瓣（BAV）的类型，其特征在于右和左尖瓣之间的单个中缝（RL融合形式）。 这导致了具有前后小叶取向的两个叶片（也称为典型形式）。 因此有一个完全发育的非冠状尖，两个完全发育的合缝，和在发育不全的左右冠状动脉尖之间的中缝延伸至相应的畸形合缝。
HP:0031120	心血管系统异常	Bicuspid aortic valve with right-noncoronary cusp fusion	['A type of bicuspid aortic valve (BAV) characterized by a single raphe between the right and noncoronary cusps (RN fusion pattern). This results in two leaflets with right-left leaflet orientation (also called the atypical pattern). There is thus one completely developed left cusp, two completely developed commissures, and one raphe between the underdeveloped right and noncoronary coronary cusps extending to the corresponding malformed commissure.']	二叶式主动脉瓣，伴随右冠状瓣与无冠状瓣融合	二叶式主动脉瓣的一种，其特征为右冠状瓣与无冠状瓣之间存在一条缝隙（RN融合模式），导致两个瓣叶均为叶右向叶左方向（也被称为非典型模式）。因此，存在一个发育完全的左冠状瓣，两个发育完全的交界，以及未发育完全的右冠状瓣和无冠状瓣之间有一条延伸至对应畸形交界处的单缝
HP:0031121	心血管系统异常	Bicuspid aortic valve with left-noncoronary cusp fusion	['A type of bicuspid aortic valve (BAV) characterized by a single raphe between the left and noncoronary cusps (LN fusion pattern). There is thus one completely developed right cusp, two completely developed commissures, and one raphe between the underdeveloped left and noncoronary coronary cusps extending to the corresponding malformed commissure.']	二叶式主动脉瓣，伴随左冠状瓣与无冠状瓣融合	二叶式主动脉瓣的一种，其特征为左冠状瓣与无冠状瓣之间存在一条缝隙（LN融合模式）。因此，存在一个发育完全的右冠状瓣，两个发育完全的交界，以及未发育完全的左冠状瓣和无冠状瓣之间有一条延伸至对应畸形交界处的单缝
HP:0031122	心血管系统异常	Two-raphe bicuspid aortic valve	A type of bicuspid aortic valvue (BAV) characterized by the presence of two raphes that each extend from the commissure to the free edge of the two underdeveloped, conjoint cusps. This type of BAV has developmental anlagen of three cusps, commissures, and sinuses, but two commissures are more or less malformed and obliterated, giving rise to a raphe, a fibrous ridge, which extends from the commissure to the free edge of the two underdeveloped, conjoint cusps. This type of BAV is typically associated with a high degree of aortic stenosis.	双缝二尖瓣主动脉瓣	一种二尖瓣主动脉瓣（BAV）的类型，其特征是存在两个各自从连合处延伸至两个不发育的联合瓣膜的自由边缘的缝。 这种类型的BAV具有发展性间叶原基的三尖瓣、合缝和窦，但是两种合缝或多或少会畸形并消失，从而产生中缝，纤维脊，其从连合处延伸到两个未发育的自由边缘 及联合尖端。 这种类型的BAV通常伴有高度的主动脉瓣狭窄。
HP:0031123	免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	Recurrent gastroenteritis	['Increased susceptibility to gastroenteritis, an infectious inflammationof the stomach and small intestines manifested by signs and symptoms such as diarheas and abdominal pain, as manifested by recurrent episodes of gastroenteritis.']	复发性肠胃炎 	肠胃炎易患性增加，常表现为胃肠炎反复发作。胃和小肠感染性炎症常见症状为腹泻和腹痛。
HP:0031124	血液和造血组织异常	Decreased platelet thromboxane A2 receptor	['Decreased cell membrane concentration of thromboxane A2 receptor that is stimulated by thromboxane A2 (TBXA2).']	血小板血栓塞A2受体减少	血栓素A2(TBXA2)刺激下细胞膜表面血栓素A2受体的浓度降低。
HP:0031125	血液和造血组织异常	Decreased platelet alpha-2A-adrenergic receptor	['Decreased cell membrane concentration of alpha-2A adrenergic receptor that is stimulated by epinephrine.']	血小板肾上腺素ɑ2a受体减少	肾上腺素刺激下细胞膜表面肾上腺素ɑ2a受体的浓度降低。
HP:0031126	血液和造血组织异常	Impaired clot retraction	['Platelets contain contractile proteins (actin and myosin) that induce clot retraction. As the platelets contract, they pull on the surrounding fibrin strands, squeezing serum form the mass, compacting the clot and drawing the ruptured edges of the blood vessel more closely together. Clot retraction is directly proportional to the platelet count and inversely proportional to the fibrinogen concentration.']	血凝块回缩受损	血小板内含收缩蛋白（肌动蛋白和肌凝蛋白），从而可引发凝块收缩。当血小板收缩时，可拉动周围的纤维蛋白，挤压血清蛋白形成肿块，压住凝块并将血管破裂的边缘更紧密地联系在一起。凝块收缩与血小板计数成正比，与纤维蛋白原浓度成反比。
HP:0031127	血液和造血组织异常	Impaired convulxin-induced platelet aggregation	['Abnormal response to convulxin as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of convulxin.']	convulxin诱导的血小板聚集受损	血小板对convulxin的反应下降，增加convulxin的浓度，血小板的聚集降低或无血小板的聚集。
HP:0031128	血液和造血组织异常	Impaired collagen-related peptide-induced platelet aggregation	['Abnormal response to collagen-related peptide (CRP) as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of CRP.']	胶原相关肽诱导的血小板聚集受损	血小板对胶原相关肽的反应下降，增加胶原相关肽的浓度，血小板的聚集降低或无血小板的聚集。
HP:0031129	血液和造血组织异常	Impaired phorbol myristate acetate-induced platelet aggregation	['Abnormal response to phorbol myristate acetate (PMA) as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of PMA.']	PMA诱导的血小板聚集受损	血小板对PMA的反应下降，增加PMA的浓度，血小板的聚集降低或无血小板的聚集。
HP:0031130	血液和造血组织异常	Impaired calcium ionophore-induced platelet aggregation	['Abnormal response to calcium Ionophore (such as A23187) as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of the ionophore.']	钙离子通道剂诱导的血小板聚集受损	血小板对钙离子通道剂(比如A23187)的反应下降，增加钙离子通道剂的浓度，血小板的聚集降低或无血小板的聚集。
HP:0031131	血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal plaleletphosphatidyl serine exposure	An abnormality of phosphatidylserine (PS) on activated platelets. PS is normally located on the cytoplasmic face of the resting platelet membrane but appears on the plasma-oriented surface of discrete membrane vesicles that derive from activated platelets. Thrombin, the central molecule of coagulation, is produced from prothrombin by a complex (prothrombinase) between factor Xa and its protein cofactor (factor V(a)) that forms on platelet-derived membranes. This complex enhances the rate of activation of prothrombin to thrombin by roughly 150,000 fold relative to factor X(a) in solution. The negatively charged surface of PS-containing platelet-derived membranes is at least partly responsible for this rate enhancement.	血小板磷脂酰丝氨酸暴露异常	活化血小板的磷脂酰丝氨酸（PS）异常。磷脂酰丝氨酸通常位于未活化血小板的表面，但也可来源于血浆中与活化血小板膜表面分离的囊泡。凝血酶是血液凝固的中心分子，可被凝血酶原激活，通过一个复合体（凝血酶原酶）即FXa和其蛋白辅因子（FVa）形成于血小板细胞膜的表面。与血液中溶解的FX(a)相比，这复合体可使凝血酶原转化为凝血酶的速率提高约150,000。带负电荷的血小板表面的PS在这个过程中起了很大部分的作用。
HP:0031132	血液和造血组织异常	Impaired annexin V binding to platelet phosphatidylserine	['Reduced binding of annexin V to platelet membrane, which is mediated by exposed phosphatidylserine. This can be measured by flow cytometry.']	磷脂结合蛋白V与血小板磷脂酰丝氨酸结合受损	由磷脂酰丝氨酸介导的磷脂结合蛋白V与血小板结合减少，可通过流式细胞学来检测。
HP:0031133	血液和造血组织异常	Increased annexin V binding to platelet phosphatidylserine	['Elevated binding of annexin V to platelet membrane, which is mediated by exposed phosphatidylserine. This can be measured by flow cytometry.']	磷脂结合蛋白V与血小板磷脂酰丝氨酸结合增加	由磷脂酰丝氨酸介导的磷脂结合蛋白V与血小板结合增加，可通过流式细胞学来检测。
HP:0031134	心血管系统异常	Cor triatrium sinister	A developmental anomaly of the heart characterizedby the presence of three atria because the left atrium is divided by an abnormal septum.	左侧三房心	心脏发育异常，由于左心房被异常隔断出现三个心房
HP:0031135	临床调节因素	Triggered by physical trauma	['Applies to a sign or symptom that is provoked or brought about by exposure to a trauma (injury to tissue).']	由物理创伤引发的	因创伤(组织损伤)而引发或引起的体征或症状。
HP:0031136	泌尿生殖系统异常	Decreased acrosin in sperm head	['A reduced amount of the enzyme acrosin in the sperm head acrosome. The acrosome is an organelle in the anterior half of the head of spermatozoa, and acrosin is a protease that contributes to the digestation of the zona pellucida in the fertilization process.']	精子头顶体酶降低	精子头部顶体的顶体酶减少，顶体是精子头部前半部分的细胞器，顶体酶是一种蛋白酶，在受精过程中有助于透明带的消化。
HP:0031137	消化系统异常	Storage in hepatocytes	['Hepatocytes (liver parenchymal cells) exhibit a bloated appearance because of expansion of the cytoplasm by accumulated material.']	肝细胞储积	由于肝细胞内（肝实质细胞）物质蓄积导致细胞质增多，最终肝细胞呈现肿胀表现。
HP:0031138	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal B-type natriuretic peptide level	A deviation from the normal circulating concentration of B-type natriuretic peptide (BNP).	B型钠尿肽水平异常	血液中B型钠尿肽（BNP）浓度不在正常范围内。
HP:0031139	肌肉组织异常	Frog-leg posture	['A type of rest posture in an infant that indicated a generalized reduction in muscle tone. The hips are flexed and the legs are abducted to an extent that causes the lateral thigh to rest upon the supporting surface. This posture is said to resemble the legs of a frog.']	蛙足姿势	婴儿的一种休息姿势，表现为臀部弯曲、腿部外展至一定程度，导致大腿外侧靠在支撑面，提示肌张力的全面降低。得名于这种姿势与青蛙腿相像。
HP:0031140	消化系统异常	Abnormal liver sonography	['An abnormal appearance of the liver or any of its components on sonography (ultrasound).']	肝脏超声异常	肝脏及组成结构的异常超声表现
HP:0031141	消化系统异常	Increased hepatic echogenicity	Increased echogenicity of liver tissue on sonography, manifested as an increased amount of white on the screen of the sonography device.	肝回声增强	是指在超声上肝脏组织回声增强，表现为超声屏幕上呈现增多的白色。
HP:0031142	消化系统异常	Abnormal hepatic echogenicity	Any deviation from the normal degree of echogenicity of the liver on sonography. Echogenicity refers to the ability of a tissue to reflect or transmit ultrasound waves in the context of surrounding tissues. Whenever there is an interface of structures with different echogenicities, a visible difference in contrast will be apparent on the screen. Based on echogenicity, a structure can be characterized as hyperechoic (white on the screen), hypoechoic (gray on the screen) and anechoic (black on the screen).	肝脏回声异常	是指任何偏离正常肝脏回声的超声表现，回声和组织反射或传送超声波的能力相关，不同组织界面，回声不同，在屏幕上存在明显差异。根据回声强弱，一个结构可描述为高回声（屏幕上呈白色），低回声（屏幕上呈灰色），和无回声（屏幕上呈黑色）
HP:0031143	消化系统异常	Decreased hepatic echogenicity	Reduced echogenicity of liver tissue on sonography, manifested as an increased amount of black on the screen of the sonography device.	肝回声降低	是指在超声上肝脏组织回声减弱，表现为超声屏幕上呈现增多的黑色。
HP:0031144	消化系统异常	Coarsened hepatic echotexture	['The appearance of the liver in sonographic images is normally uniform. This term applies when there is an irregular or non-uniform appearancde of the liver parenchyma in liver sonography.']	肝实质回声增粗	是指超声上肝实质回声不规则、不均一。
HP:0031145	消化系统异常	Starry sky appearance on hepatic sonography	An abnormal echotexture visible in liver ultrasound manifesting as a diffuse hyperechoic liver echotexture with multiple, small hypoechoic lesions. The appearance is said to resemble a starry sky (multiple white spots on a dark background).	肝脏满天星样改变	是一种异常的肝脏超声表现，表现为弥漫性高回声肝内伴有多个、小低回声病变，形似满天星样改变。
HP:0031146	神经系统异常,消化系统异常	Impaired oral bolus formation	An abnormality of swallowing characterized by reduced tongue coordination to form bolus after chewing. Food material spreads over the oral cavity instead of being concentrated into a bolus that is easily swallowed.	口腔内食物成团状能力受损	吞咽不正常的特点是咀嚼后舌头协调功能降低，从而不能使食物形成丸状。食物材料在口腔中弥散开而不是被浓缩成容易吞咽的丸剂
HP:0031150	眼部异常	Vitreomacular adhesion	Perifoveal vitreous separation with remaining vitreomacular attachment and unperturbed foveal morphologic features. It is an OCT finding that is almost always the result of normal vitreous aging, which may lead to pathologic conditions.	玻璃体黄斑粘连	玻璃体与黄斑部粘连，在中心凹周围分离，不影响中心凹形态特征。OCT结果显示，这是正常玻璃体老化的结果，可能导致病理性改变。
HP:0031151	眼部异常	Vitreomacular traction	Vitreomacular traction is characterized by anomalous posterior vitreous detachment accompanied by anatomic distortion of the fovea, which may include pseudocysts, macular schisis, cystoid macular edema, and subretinal fluid. Vitreomacular traction can be subclassified by the diameter of vitreous attachment to the macular surface as measured by OCT, with attachment of 1500 micrometers or less defined as focal and attachment of more than 1500 micrometers as broad.	玻璃体黄斑牵拉	玻璃体黄斑牵拉的特点是玻璃体后脱离异常，伴有中心凹解剖变形，可能包括假性囊肿、黄斑裂孔、黄斑囊样水肿和视网膜下积液。由OCT测量，根据玻璃体与黄斑表面粘连的直径分类，粘连直径≤1500μm 定义为局灶性病变，粘连直径＞1500μm 定义为广泛性病变。
HP:0031152	眼部异常	Full-thickness macular hole	Full-thickness macular hole (FTMH) is defined as a foveal lesion with interruption of all retinal layers from the internal limiting membrane to the retinal pigment epithelium. Full-thickness macular hole is primary if caused by vitreous traction or secondary if directly the result of pathologic characteristics other than vitreomacular traction. Full-thickness macular hole is subclassified by size of the hole as determined by OCT and the presence or absence of vitreomacular traction.	黄斑全层裂孔	黄斑全层裂孔是一种中心凹病变，从内界膜至视网膜上皮细胞层的视网膜全层发生断裂。黄斑全层裂孔主要由玻璃体牵拉引起，或继发于玻璃体黄斑牵拉以外的病理学改变。黄斑全层裂孔依据OCT测定的裂孔大小和玻璃体黄斑牵拉是否存在进行亚分类。
HP:0031153	眼部异常	Membranous vitreous appearance	Vitreous humor of the eye displaying consisting of a vestigial gel in the retrolental space bounded by a convoluted membrane.	玻璃体膜外观	眼球中的玻璃体由晶状体后面的残余凝胶构成，以错综复杂的膜为界。
HP:0031154	眼部异常	Beaded vitreous appearance	Vitreous humor of the eye displaying beaded bundles of irregular diameters.	玻璃体珠状外观	眼球中的玻璃体显现不规则直径的串珠束。

Nuchal rigidity has been used as a bedside test for meningism, although its sensitivity for this purpose has been debated.	项背刚度	颈部伸肌肌肉痉挛阻碍颈部伸肌向前弯曲(即颈部屈曲受损）。项背刚度不是固定的刚性。虽然其对脑膜病的敏感性有争议，但项背刚度已被用作脑膜病的床边试验。

HP:0031192	心血管系统异常	Abnormal morphology of left ventricular trabeculae	['Any structural anomaly of the muscular columns which project from the inner surface of the left ventricle of the heart (cardiac trabeculae, trabeculae carneae).']	左心室小梁形态异常	由左心室内壁延伸出的肌肉柱的结构异常状况
HP:0031193	心血管系统异常	Abnormal morphology of right ventricular trabeculae	['Any structural anomaly of the muscular columns which project from the inner surface of the right ventricle of the heart (cardiac trabeculae, trabeculae carneae).']	右心室小梁形态异常	由右心室内壁延伸出的肌肉柱的结构异常状况
HP:0031194	心血管系统异常	Increased density of left ventricular trabeculae	['An increased denisty (number and tightness) of the muscular columns which project from the inner surface of the left ventricles of the heart (cardiac trabeculae, trabeculae carneae).']	左心室小梁密度增加	由左心室内壁延伸出的肌肉柱的密度增加（数量和密度）
HP:0031195	心血管系统异常	Apical hypertrabeculation of the left ventricle	['An increased number and denisty of the trabeculae in the apex (tip) of the left ventricle.']	左心室的顶端超小梁	左心室顶端小梁的数量和密度增加
HP:0031196	心血管系统异常	Thin myocardium compact layer	['Reduced thickness of the outer, dense layer of the myocardium.']	心肌致密层变薄	心肌外层致密层的厚度减小
HP:0031197	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Cellular urinary casts	['A type of urinary cast composed of cells incorporated in a protein matrx. The cells can be those found in the urinary sediment (erythrocytes, leuklocytes, renal tubular epithelial cells).']	细胞管型	一种由于细胞结合于蛋白质基质形成的尿液管型，可通过尿沉渣镜检发现（包括红细胞管型，白细胞管型，肾小管上皮细胞管型）
HP:0031198	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Renal tubular epithelial cell casts	['A type of cellular urinary cast componsed of renal tubular epithelial cells.']	肾小管上皮细胞管型	由肾小管上皮细胞组成的细胞管型。
HP:0031199	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Acellular urinary casts	['A type of urinary cast composed of a proteinaceous matrix without a substantial number of cells.']	非细胞管型	一种仅由基质蛋白而非实质细胞组成的管型。
HP:0031200	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Hyaline casts	A type of acellular urinary cast that are composed only of Tamm-Horsfall glycoprotein, a fact which explains their low refractive index. Hyaline casts may display a spectrum of morphologies, which includes fluffy, compact, convoluted or wrinkled casts. Hyaline casts have a smooth texture and usually have parallel sides with clear margins and blunted ends.	透明管型	一种仅由Tamm-Horsfall糖蛋白组成非细胞管型，这种管型折光指数低。透明管型可呈现不同的形态，包括蓬松的、紧凑的、复杂的、皱褶的管型。透明管型质地平滑，两边相互平行，边界清楚，末端圆钝。
HP:0031201	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Granular casts	A type of acelluar casts that have a surface composed of granules, which can vary in size. The granules can be rather heterogeneous, ranging from fine (finely granular cast) up to coarse (coarsely granular cast), dark, clear, and pigmented.	颗粒管型	一种表面具有颗粒状的非细胞管型，大小各异。颗粒管型呈多样化，从细颗粒（细小颗粒管型）到粗颗粒（粗颗粒管型），深色颗粒，清澈颗粒及着色颗粒。
HP:0031202	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Waxy casts	A type of acellular urinary casts that display a melted wax (waxy) appearance, which gives them a high refractive index. They are frequently dark, with blunt extremities, indented and cracked edges and a large size, which is often several times that of other types of casts.	蜡样管型	一种呈现融化的蜡的表现的非细胞管型，折光指数高。颜色通常较深，末端圆钝，边缘呈锯齿状及崩裂状，属宽大管型，比普通管型大数倍。
HP:0031203	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Fatty casts	A type of acellular urinary casts that contain lipid droplets, oval fat bodies or cholesterol crystals, and are often associated with the free forms of these elements. Their identification may require the use of polarised light microscopy, under which fatty particles embedded into the cast matrix appear as Maltese crosses.	脂肪管型	一种含有脂滴、椭圆脂肪体或胆固醇晶体的非细胞性管型，并通常与这些因素相关。如果其中包含脂肪颗粒，通过偏振光显微镜可被识别，而呈现“马尔他十字”表现。
HP:0031204	泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Bacterial cell casts	A type of urinary cast that contain bacteria. Bacterial casts can be difficult to identify and can be distinguished from other types of casts using phase contrast microscopy. Bacterial casts are diagnostic of acute pyelonephritis or intrinsic renal infection.	细菌细胞管型	管型中含有细菌的一类管型。细菌管型很难被识别出但可以通过相差显微镜与其他管型鉴别。出现细菌管型可诊断为急性肾炎肾炎或肾实质感染。
HP:0031205	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Reduced lysosomal acid lipase activity	Reduction in the activity of lysosomal acid lipase (LAL) in the blood. Lysosomal lipase activity is measured. LAL hydrolyzes cholesteryl esters derived from cell internalization of plasma lipoproteins.	溶酶体酸性脂肪酶活性降低	血液中溶酶体酸性脂肪酶（LAL）活性降低。溶酶体脂肪酶活性可以被检测。LAL可水解来源于细胞内血浆脂蛋白的胆固醇脂。
HP:0031206	神经系统异常	Striatal T2 hyperintensity	Abnormally bright T2 signal from the striatum on brain magnetic resonance imaging.	纹状体T2高信号	脑磁共振成像中异常的纹状体T2高信号
HP:0031207	肿瘤,消化系统异常,心血管系统异常	Hepatic hemangioma	A congenital vascular malformation in the liver composed of masses of blood vessels that are atypical or irregular in arrangement and size.	肝血管瘤	是肝脏内一种先天性血管畸形，由大量排列及大小不规则或不典型的血管组成。
HP:0031208	内分泌系统异常	Increased pituitary glycoprotein alpha subunit level	['An increased concentration of circulating alpha polypeptide of glycoprotein hormones (Entrez Gene 1081). This alpha subunit is common to luteinizing hormone (LH) , follicle stimulating hormone (FSH) , thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH) and human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG), which are glycoprotein hormones composed of an identical alpha subunit together with a beta subunit that confers biological specificity. The alpha subunit is used as a marker for tumors that produce these hormones.']	垂体α-糖蛋白水平升高	循环中垂体α-糖蛋白激素浓度升高。α亚基与黄体生成素（LH），卵泡刺激激素（FSH），促甲状腺激素（TSH）以及绒毛膜促性腺激素（hCG）相同，这类激素均由α亚基和β亚基组成。α亚基作为这些激素的肿瘤标记物。
HP:0031209	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased lipoprotein lipase activity	Reduction in the activity of lipoprotein lipase in the blood.	脂蛋白脂肪酶活性降低	血液中脂蛋白脂肪酶活性降低

HP:0031211	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated cholesterol ester level	['An elevated concentration of circulating cholesterol esters, which are fatty acid esters of cholesterol and make up about two-thirds of total plasma cholesterol.']	胆固醇酯水平增高	循环胆固醇酯浓度增高，循环胆固醇酯是脂肪酸与胆固醇作用生成的酯，占血浆总胆固醇的2/3

HP:0031228	耳部异常	Abnormal incisura morphology	An abnormal shape of the incisura, defined as the narrowed downward continuation of the conchal space bounded anteriorly by the borders of the tragus, posteriorly by the antitragus, and along its lower lateral margins and inferior boundary by the connection between the first two. The upper boundary is a somewhat arbitrary line crossing from the apices of the antitragus and the tragus.		
HP:0031229	耳部异常	Increased incisura length	The length of the incisura from the upper to lower border is greater than that observed in the average population.		
HP:0031230	耳部异常	Decreased incisura length	The length of the incisura from the upper to lower border is less than that observed in the average population.		
HP:0031231	耳部异常	Narrow incisura width	Width of the incisura from the anterior to posterior border less than that observed in the average population.		
HP:0031232	耳部异常	Increased incisura width	Breadth of the incisura from the anterior to posterior border greater than that observed in the average population.

HP:0031238	肌肉组织异常	Necklace skeletal muscle fibers	A histological alteration of muscle fibers that resembles a necklace (necklace fibers). A substantial proportion of fibers (4-20% in PMID:19084976) show internalized nuclei aligned in a basophilic ring (necklace) at 3 micrometers beneath the sarcolemma. Ultrastructurally, such necklaces consist of myofibrils of smaller diameter, in oblique orientation, surrounded by mitochondria, sarcoplasmic reticulum and glycogen granules.	项链骨骼肌纤维	属于肌纤维的组织学改变，表现类似于项链（项链纤维）。 大部分纤维（PMID中4-20％：19084976）显示在肌膜下3微米处的嗜碱环（项链）中排列的内化核。 在超微结构上，这样的项链由直径较小的肌原纤维组成，倾斜取向，被线粒体，肌质网和糖原颗粒包围

HP:0031254	神经系统异常	Thalamic arteriovenous malformation	An arteriovenous malformation is a disruption of the normal vascular pattern in which arteries or arterioles connect directly to the venous collection system, bypassing any capillary bed. This term refers to an arteriovenous malformation located in the thalamus.	丘脑动静脉畸形 	动静脉畸形是指正常循环模式的破坏，一般是动脉或小动脉绕过毛细血管床直接连接到静脉收集系统。该术语是指位于丘脑的动静脉畸形。 
HP:0031255	神经系统异常	Hypothalamic arteriovenous malformation	An arteriovenous malformation is a disruption of the normal vascular pattern in which arteries or arterioles connect directly to the venous collection system, bypassing any capillary bed. This term refers to an arteriovenous malformation located in the hypothalamus.	下丘脑动静脉畸形	动静脉畸形是指正常血运模式的破坏：动脉或小动脉绕过任何毛细血管床，直接连接到静脉收集系统。该术语是指位于下丘脑的动静脉畸形。
HP:0031256	眼部异常	Optic nerve arteriovenous malformation	An arteriovenous malformation is a disruption of the normal vascular pattern in which arteries or arterioles connect directly to the venous collection system, bypassing any capillary bed. This term refers to an arteriovenous malformation located in the optic nerve.	视神经动静脉畸形	动静脉畸形是指破坏了动脉或小动脉经毛细血管床与静脉收集系统连接的正常血管模式。此术语指位于视神经的动静脉畸形。
HP:0031257	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Arteriovenous malformation of the maxilla	An arteriovenous malformation is a disruption of the normal vascular pattern in which arteries or arterioles connect directly to the venous collection system, bypassing any capillary bed. This term refers to an arteriovenous malformation located in the maxilla.	上颌动静脉畸形	动静脉畸形是指正常血管形态的破坏，其中动脉或小动脉直接连接到静脉收集系统，绕过任何毛细血管床。这个术语指位于上颌的动静脉畸形。
HP:0031258	神经系统异常	Delirium	['A state of sudden and severe confusion.']	谵妄	突发的严重意识混乱
HP:0031259	泌尿生殖系统异常	Oophoritis	['An inflammation of the ovary or ovaries.']	 卵巢炎	单侧或双侧卵巢炎症。
HP:0031260	骨骼系统异常,肢体异常	Triangular tibia	['A short, dysplastic tibia with a triangular shape. Instead of the normal shaft configuration of the tibia, the tibia forms a triangle with the longest side corresponding to the proximal-distal dimension, and the apex of the triangle diected laterally (See Figure 2 of PMID:18616733).']	三角状胫骨 	胫骨短小，发育不全，呈三角形。与正常胫骨的结构不同，该异常胫骨呈三角形，最长边与肢体方向相平行，对应的顶点位于侧面（参见PMID 18616733图2）。 
HP:0031261	泌尿生殖系统异常	Bladder polyp	['An abnormal growth that projects from the mucous membrane of the urinary bladder.']	膀胱息肉	膀胱粘膜表面的异常增生。
HP:0031263	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormal renal corpuscle morphology	['Any anomolous structure of the renal corpuscle, which is the initial component of the nephron that filters blood. The renal corpuscle consists of a knot of capillaries (glomerulus) that is surrounded by a double-walled capsule (Bowman capsule) that opens into a renal tubule.']	肾小体形态异常	肾小体的结构不规则。肾小体是肾单位首先进行过滤工作的单位，是一个由双壁囊（鲍曼囊）包围的毛细血管团（肾小球）组成，并通向肾小管。
HP:0031264	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormal morphology of Bowman capsule	['A structural anomaly of the double-walled capsule (Bowman capsule) that opens into a renal tubule.']	鲍曼囊形态异常	双壁囊（鲍曼囊）的结构异常，它通向肾小管。
HP:0031265	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormal podocyte morphology	Any structural anomaly of the podocyte, which is a highly specialized cell of the Bowman capsule and which forms multiple interdigitating foot processes. Podocytes are interconnected by slit diaphragms and cover the exterior basement membrane surface of the glomerular capillary.	足突细胞形态异常	足突细胞的结构异常，它是鲍曼囊高度分化的细胞，形成了多重交错的肾小球上皮细胞足突细胞。足细胞通过裂孔隔膜相互连接，覆盖在肾小球毛细血管的外部基底膜表面。
HP:0031266	泌尿生殖系统异常	Podocyte foot process effacement	An anomaly of podocyte morphology characterized by the loss of the interdigitating foot process pattern (generally called foot process effacement; FPE). The term FPE designates the loss of the usual interdigitating pattern of foot processes of neighboring podocytes, leading to relatively broad expanses of podocyte processes covering the glomerular basement membrane (GBM). It is widely viewed as a pathological derangement that is associated with leakage of macromolecules such as albumin through the glomerular filtration barrier.	足细胞足突消失	足突细胞形态学异常以肾小球上皮足突细胞的足部交错模式消失为特点（通常称为足细胞足突消失，FPE）。FPE这个术语指的是邻近的足突细胞的足部交错模式丢失，从而导致了覆盖肾小球基底膜（GBM）的足突细胞范围相对增加。它被广泛认为是一种病理上的异常，与肾小球可滤过白蛋白等大分子的肾小球滤过屏障有关。
HP:0031267	免疫系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal CD69 upregulation upon TCR activation	Any abnormality in the upregulation of CD69 on T cells after activation via the T cell receptor (TCR). Upregulation of CD69 is one of the earliest and most sensitive measures of antigen recognition in the periphery, and transient expression of CD69 is associated with positive selection in the thymus.	TCR激活CD69上调异常	T细胞受体（TCR）激活后的T细胞上的CD69表达上调异常。CD69表达上调是外周抗原识别最早和最敏感的方式之一，CD69瞬时表达与胸腺的阳性选择有关。 
HP:0031268	免疫系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased CD69 upregulation upon TCR activation	Reduced or impaired upregulation of CD69 on T cells after activation via the T cell receptor (TCR).	TCR激活CD69上调减弱	T细胞受体（TCR）激活后的T细胞上的CD69上调表达减弱或损伤。 
HP:0031269	免疫系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal CD25 upregulation upon TCR activation	Any abnormality in the upregulation of CD25 on T cells after activation via the T cell receptor (TCR). CD25 is the alpha chain of the IL2 receptor. Ligation of the T cell antigen receptor leads to the induction of CD25 expression.	TCR激活CD25上调异常	T细胞受体（TCR）激活后的T细胞上的CD25表达上调异常。CD25是IL2受体α链。T细胞抗原受体连接诱导CD25表达。 
HP:0031270	免疫系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased CD25 upregulation upon TCR activation	Decreased or impaired upregulation of CD25 on T cells after activation via the T cell receptor (TCR).	TCR激活CD25上调减弱	经T细胞受体（TCR）激活的T细胞上的CD25上调减弱或损伤。

HP:0031275	心血管系统异常	Distributive shock	A hyperdynamic process resulting from excessive vasodilatation. Impaired blood flow causes inadequate tissue perfusion, which can lead to end-organ damage	分布性休克	血管收缩舒张功能异常导致组织灌注不足，从而导致末端器官的损伤
HP:0031276	心血管系统异常	Obstructive shock	A type of shock characterized by inadequate cardiac preload due to obstructed venous return (e.g. pericardial tamponade, tension pneumothorax, abdominal compartment) or obstruction of arterial blood flow (e.g. pulmonary embolism).	梗阻性休克	一种因静脉回流受阻(如心包填塞、张力性气胸、腹腔室)或动脉血流阻塞(如肺栓塞)而造成心脏负荷不足的休克。

HP:0031297	心血管系统异常	Unroofed coronary sinus	Unroofed coronary sinus (CS) is a rare congenital cardiac anomaly in which there is partial (either focal or fenestrated) or complete absence of the roof of the CS, which results in a communication between the CS and the LA. Unroofed CS is the rarest type of atrial septal defect. It is often associated with persistent left superior vena cava (LSVC) and other forms of complex congenital heart disease, usually heterotaxia syndromes. The morphological types have been classified into 4 groups: Type I, completely unroofed with persistent LSVC; type II, completely unroofed without persistent LSVC; type III, partially unroofed mid portion; and type IV, partially unroofed terminal portion.	无顶冠状静脉窦	无顶冠状静脉窦是一种罕见静脉窦上部分（焦点或窗状）或全部顶冠缺失的心脏畸形，导致静脉窦和左心房之间交流。无顶冠状静脉窦是房间隔缺失中最罕见的一种类型，通常伴随永存左上腔静脉和其他形式的复杂先天性心脏病。根据形态学可以分为4组：类型一，完全无顶冠并伴随永存左上腔静脉；类型二，完全无顶冠，无永存左上腔静脉；类型三，中间部分无顶冠；类型四，终端部分无顶冠

HP:0031322	心血管系统异常	Myocardial lymphocytic infiltration	['An increase in the number of lymphocytes in myocardial tissue.']	心肌淋巴细胞浸润	心肌组织中淋巴细胞数量增加
HP:0031323	心血管系统异常	Myocardial eosinophilic infiltration	['An increase in the number of eosinophils in myocardial tissue.']	心肌嗜酸性粒细胞浸润	心肌组织中嗜酸性粒细胞数量增加
HP:0031324	心血管系统异常	Myocardial multinucleated giant cells	The presence of extremely large cells with multiple nuclei. The so-called giant cells are thought to be of macrophage origin.	心肌多核巨细胞	具有多个核的极大细胞存在。 所谓的巨细胞来源于巨噬细胞
HP:0031325	心血管系统异常	Myocardial granulomatous infiltrates	['The presence of multiple granulomata (small nodular inflammatory lesions containing grouped mononuclear phagocytes) in the myocardium.']	心肌肉芽肿浸润	心肌中存在多种肉芽肿（小结节性炎症病灶包含分组的单核吞噬细胞）
HP:0031326	心血管系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Monoclonal light chain cardiac amyloidosis	A type of cardiac amyloidosis related to deposition of an immunoglobulin light chain. The current gold standard of amyloid typing is to determine the precursor protein using laser microdissection mass spectrometry.	单克隆轻链心脏淀粉样变性	一种与免疫球蛋白轻链沉积有关的心脏淀粉样变性病。 目前的淀粉样蛋白分型的金标准是使用激光显微切割质谱确定前体蛋白质
HP:0031327	心血管系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis	A type of cardiac amyloidosis related to deposition of transthyretin (TTR), which is indentified by immunohistochemical staining.	甲状腺素转运蛋白心脏淀粉样变性	与通过免疫组织化学染色鉴定的甲状腺素转运蛋白（TTR）沉积相关的一类心脏淀粉样变性
HP:0031328	心血管系统异常	Perivascular cardiac fibrosis	A type of myocardial fibrosis characterized by excessive diffuse collagen accumulation concentrated in perivascular spaces.	血管周心脏纤维化	一种心肌纤维化类型，其特征在于过度弥散的胶原积聚在血管周围间隙中。
HP:0031329	心血管系统异常	Interstitial cardiac fibrosis	A type of myocardial fibrosis characterized by excessive diffuse collagen accumulation concentrated in interstitial spaces.	间质性心脏纤维化	一种心肌纤维化特征是弥漫性胶原积聚过度集中于间质间隙中
HP:0031330	心血管系统异常	Perivascular myocardial immune cell infiltration	['An increase in the number of immune cells in myocardial tissue concentrated in the spaces surrounding blood vessels.']	血管周心肌免疫细胞浸润	血管周围聚集的心肌组织免疫细胞数量增加
HP:0031331	心血管系统异常	Abnormal cardiomyocyte morphology	['Any structural anomaly of cardiomyocytes, whichare terminally differentiated muscle cells inthe heart that are interconnected end to end by gap junctions, which allows coordinated contraction of heart tissue.']	心肌细胞形态异常	心肌细胞的任何结构异常状况，心肌细胞是心脏中终末分化的肌肉细胞，通过间隙连接端对端连接，作用为协调心脏组织收缩'。
HP:0031332	心血管系统异常	Cardiomyocyte degeneration	['Deterioration of cardiomyocyte charyacterized by abnormal features sich as loss of myotilaments, occurrence of cellular sequestration, decreased mitochondrial sizes and cellular debris.']	心肌细胞退化	心肌细胞退化，出现异常特征，包括肌丝丢失，细胞隔离的发生，线粒体大小减小以及细胞碎片减少
HP:0031333	心血管系统异常	Myocardial sarcomeric disarray	A disruption of the structure of the sarcomeres of cardiomyocytes. The sarcomere is the repeating unit between two Z lines comprised largely of myosin and action that mediates contractility, and normally sarcomeres are aligned with the long axis of cells, with the Z bands being in register throughout the length of the cardiac myocytes.	心脏肌节混乱	心脏肌节结构破裂。肌节是两条Z线之间的重复单元，主要由肌球蛋白组成，介导收缩作用。正常情况下，肌节沿着细胞长轴对齐，Z带则沿着心脏肌节对齐
HP:0031334	心血管系统异常	Cardiomyocyte inclusion bodies	['Nuclear or cytoplasmic aggregates of stainable substances within cardiomyocytes.']	心肌细胞包涵体	心肌细胞内可被染色的物质的核或胞质聚合体
HP:0031335	心血管系统异常	Abnormal cardiomyocyte mitochondrial morphology	['An anomaly of the structure of mitochondria within cardiomyocytes.']	心肌细胞线粒体形态异常	心肌细胞内线粒体结构异常
HP:0031336	心血管系统异常	Intranuclear cardiomyocyte mitochondria	Abnormal localization of mitochondria within the nuclei of cardiomyocytes.	心肌细胞核内染色体	线粒体异常定位于心肌细胞核内
HP:0031337	心血管系统异常	Abnormal cardiomyocyte connexin43 staining	Anomalous staining of Connexin43 in cardiomyocytes. Connexin43 (Cx43) is the primary gap junction protein in the working myocardium. Cx43 exhibits increased localization at the lateral membranes of cardiomyocytes in a variety of heart diseases.	心肌细胞connexin43着色异常	心肌细胞Connexin43着色异常。Connexin43（Cx43）是工作中的心肌之间最主要的间隔连接蛋白。在许多心脏疾病中，心肌细胞侧膜上Cx43定位数增加
HP:0031338	心血管系统异常	Abnormal cardiomyocyte plakoglobin staining	Anomalous staining of plakoglobin in cardiomyocytes. Plakoglobin is a component of desmosomes in cardiomyocytes.	心肌细胞斑珠蛋白着色异常	心肌细胞中斑珠蛋白着色异常。斑珠蛋白是心肌细胞中细胞桥粒的组成成分
HP:0031339	心血管系统异常	Abnormal cadiomyocyte dystrophin staining	Anomalous staining of dystrophin in cardiomyocytes.	心肌细胞营养不良蛋白着色异常	心肌细胞内肌营养蛋白着色异常

HP:0031359	体壁的异常	Cutaneous sclerotic plaque	['A solid, raised, plateau-like (flat-topped) lesion greater than 1 cm in diameter that is characterized by hardening (sclerosis) of the affected skin area (related to collagen thickening).']	皮肤硬化斑	一种结实的，凸起的，扁平的（平顶）的病变，直径大于1厘米的斑块，其特征是受影响的皮肤区域硬化（硬化）。（与胶原蛋白增厚有关）

HP:0031362	遗传模式	Sex-limited autosomal recessive inheritance	['A mode of inheritance that is observed for traits related to a gene encoded on one of the autosomes (i.e., the human chromosomes 1-22) in which a trait manifests in homozygotes in a sex-specific manner (i.e. only in males or only in females).']	限性常染色体隐性遗传	一种特别的遗传模式，编码可观察到的性状的相关基因位于常染色体上（即人类染色体1-22)，在纯合子时这种性状的显现取决与个体是什么性别（即，特异性的方式，仅在男性中或仅在女性中)。

HP:0031405	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Poroma	A benign, well circumscribed sweat gland neoplasm with eccrine or apocrine differentiation. It usually presents as a solitary, dome-shaped papule, nodule, or plaque on acral sites. It is characterized by a proliferation of uniform basaloid cells in the dermis and it is associated with the presence of focal ductal and cystic structures [NCIT:C27273].	汗孔瘤	一种良性皮肤汗腺肿瘤，伴外泌或顶泌细胞分化。 通常表现为孤立的圆顶状丘疹、结节或肢体部位的斑块。 其特征是在真皮中均匀分布的基底细胞增生，并且与导管、囊状结构的病灶相关[NCIT：C27273]。

HP:0031420	眼部异常	Small yellow foveal lesion with surrounding grey zone	A lesion that is observed following light damage to the macula. Damage to the retinal by exposure to intense visible light, usually the sun. Intense light exposure such as staring at the sun causes fine structural anomalies in the outer segments of the photoreceptors and the retinal pigment epithelium (RPE) cells of the macula. Symptoms usually develop within 1 to 4 h after exposure and include decreased vision, metamorphopsia, micropsia, and central or paracentral scotomas. Fundus examination typically shows a small yellow spot with a surrounding gray zone in the foveolar or parafoveolar area. Spontaneous evolution leads to the improvement of visual acuity.	中心凹小黄点伴色素晕病变	在黄斑区光损伤后观察到的病变。暴露于强烈可见光，通常是太阳光，对视网膜造成的损伤。强光下暴露，如盯着太阳，会导致黄斑区光感受器外段和视网膜色素上皮细胞的精细结构异常。症状通常在暴露后1~4h内发展，包括视力下降、视物变形、视物变小、中央或旁中央暗点。眼底检查典型地表现为在中心凹或旁中心凹区可见黄色小点，被灰色带围绕。自然进化导致视敏度的提高。

HP:0031461	肿瘤	Intramuscular Myxoma	A benign tumor that is usually solitary, painless, palpable mass that is firm in consistency and slightly movable and often fluctuant. It can occur in any location, but tends to involve the muscles of the thighs, buttocks, and shoulders. On microscopic examination, there is abundant mucoid material and relative hypo cellularity and loose reticulin fibers. Vascular structures are sparse. The cells have a stellate shape with small hyper chromatic pyknotic nuclei and scanty cytoplasm. Some myxomas may show focal areas of hyper cellularity. However absence of nuclear atypia, mitotic figures or necrosis helps to rule out malignancy.	肌内粘液瘤	一种良性肿瘤，通常是孤独的、无痛的、可触知的肿块，它是稳定的、可轻微的活动，经常波动。它可以发生在任何部位，但往往好发于大腿、臀部和肩膀的肌肉。在显微镜检查中，有丰富的黏液物质和相对的低细胞结构和疏松的网状纤维。血管结构较少。细胞呈星状，有小的深染的致密的核和稀疏的细胞质。一些粘液瘤可能表现出高度细胞性的灶性区域。然而，没有核异型性、有丝分裂相或坏死有助于排除恶性肿瘤。
HP:0031462	结缔组织异常	Musculotendinous retraction	['Abnormal reduction in length of a tendon which tends to pull (retract) the attached muscle tissue with shortening of the muscle fibers often accompanied by atrophy and fatty degeneration of the affected muscle tissue.']	肌肉腱回缩	['肌腱长度的异常减少，牵拉(收缩)附着的肌肉组织，导致肌肉纤维缩短，并伴有受累肌肉组织的萎缩和脂肪变性。']
HP:0031463	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Esophageal squamous papilloma	A rare benign epithelial tumor that is usually asymptomatic but can present with pyrosis and epigastric discomfort with or without dysphagia. Histopathologically, esophageal squamous papilloma has fingerlike projections lined with acanthotic stratified squamous epithelium with conservation of normal cellular with or without cellular atypia.	食管鳞状上皮乳头状瘤	一种罕见的良性上皮肿瘤，通常无症状，但可伴有胃灼热和上腹部不适，伴或不伴吞咽困难。病理组织学上，食管鳞状上皮乳头状瘤有指状突起，内衬有棘突层状鳞状上皮，可观察到有异型性的和无异型性的正常细胞。

HP:0031514	免疫系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	Increased proportion of exhausted T cells	An abnormally elevated proportion of exhausted T cells (Tex) among circulating T cells. T cell exhaustion is a distinct differentiation state that can be distinguished from naive, effector, and memory T cells. Compared to effector (TE) and memory (TMEM) T cells, exhausted T cells (TEX) display impaired effector functions (e.g., rapid production of effector cytokines, cytotoxicity). TEX have limited proliferative potential, especially compared to some subsets of TMEM and naive T cells.	衰竭T细胞比例增加	T细胞循环中的衰竭性T细胞比例增加。衰竭性T细胞是一种特殊的分化状态，能与幼稚性T细胞、效应性T细胞、记忆性T细胞区分开来。与效应性T细胞和记忆性T细胞相比，衰竭性T细胞可使效应器的功能受损（例如，效应器细胞因子、细胞毒性的快速产生）。衰竭性T细胞与记忆性T细胞和幼稚性T细胞的亚群相比其增殖潜能受限。
HP:0031515	泌尿生殖系统异常	Abnormal meiosis	['Any anomaly of meiosis, a type of cell division that reduces the number of chromosomes in the parent cell by half and produces four gamete cells.']	减数分裂异常	一种异常的减数分裂，亲代细胞每分裂一次，染色体数目减半并产生四个配子。
HP:0031516	泌尿生殖系统异常	Oocyte arrest at metaphase I	Failure of oocytes to proceed through the stages of meiosis with stoppage at the first metaphase stage.	卵母细胞第一次减数分裂中期停滞	卵母细胞减数停滞在第一次减数分裂中期。
HP:0031517	体壁的异常	Verruciform xanthoma	A papillary or cauliflower-like growth characterized by the presence of foamy histiocytes within the elongated dermal papillae forms.	疣状黄瘤	乳头状或花椰菜状生长，其特征是在细长真皮乳头形式内存在泡沫状组织细胞。
HP:0031518	神经系统异常	Absent posterior alpha rhythm	Lack of normal alpha rhythm in the EEG. Alpha rhythm has been defined as a rhythm at 8-13 Hz occurring during wakefulness over the posterior regions of the head, generally with higher voltage over the occipital areas. Amplitude is variable but is mostly below 50 microvolt in adults. It is best seen with eyes closed and under conditions of physical relaxation and relative mental inactivity. It is blocked or attenuated by attention, especially visual and mental effort. One should here note the difference between the terms alpha rhythm and alpha activity: Alpha activity refers to activity in the range of 8-13 Hz and alpha rhythm is the activity of 8-13 Hz with specific characteristics as defined above.	α节律缺乏	脑电图缺乏正常的α节律。α节律被定义为在清醒时颅后部发生的8～13Hz的放电节律，通常在枕部区域具有较高的电压。α节律振幅是可变的，但在成人中大多低于50微伏。α节律检测最好是闭眼、身体放松和精神相对不活跃的情况下进行；集中注意力，尤其是视觉和精神活动能够阻止或者减弱这种放电。这里应该注意α节律和α活动之间的差异：α活动是指在8～13Hz范围内的活动，α节律是具有特定特征的8～13Hz的活动。
HP:0031519	体壁的异常	Cauliflower deformity of dermal collagen fibrils	An anomaly of collagen fibers of the skin that is said to resemble a cauliflower and can be appreciated by electorn microscopy.	真皮胶原纤维花椰菜畸形	皮肤胶原纤维异常形态，似花椰菜状，可用电子显微镜观察

HP:0031523	肿瘤,头部和颈部的异常	Salivary gland oncocytoma	A benign epithelial neoplasm composed of layers of oncocytes (small round nucleus, micro-granular, eosinophilic cytoplasm with numerous tightly-packed mitochondria.	唾腺嗜酸性瘤	一种良性的上皮性肿瘤，由一层一层的肿瘤细胞组成(小圆核，微颗粒，嗜酸性胞质，有大量致密堆积的线粒体)。

HP:0031525	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Keratoacanthoma	Keratoacanthoma (KA) is a common benign epithelial tumour that originates from the pilosebaceous glands. In most cases, it is characterized by rapid evolution, followed by spontaneous resolution over 4 to 6 months. KA usually presents as a solitary flesh-coloured nodule with a central keratin plug on the sun-exposed skin of elderly individuals.	角化棘皮瘤	角化棘皮瘤（KA）是一种常见的良性上皮肿瘤，起源于毛囊皮脂腺。 在大多数情况下，皮损发展快，病程短，4至6个月内自发消退。 KA通常好发于老年人的皮肤暴露部位，皮损呈肉色孤立性结节，中央充满角质栓。
