HP:0031534	骨骼系统异常,肢体异常	Passive dorsiflexion of the 5th finger more than 90 degrees	An abnormally increased ability to bend (dorsiflex) one's fifth finger. To assess this feature, the examiner requests to proband to extend the elbows,to bend the wrist back so that it forms a ninety degree angle to the forearm, and to extend the fingers. Then, the proband is requested to bend the fifth finger back as far as is possible without discomfort. If the angle of the fifth finger exceeds 90 degrees, this is considered to be abnormal.	第五指被动背屈大于90度 	第五指背屈能力异常增加。为测试该特征，要求先证者伸肘，手腕弯曲与前臂成九十度角，然后在不至于让受检者不适的情况下，尽可能将第五指向后弯曲。如果如果第五指弯曲角度超过90度，则认为异常。
HP:0031535	神经系统异常	Increased theta frequency activity in EEG	['Increased frequency of thetat wave activity in the electroencephalogram. Theta waves have a frequency of 3.5-7.5 Hertz, and are present in very small amounts in healthy waking adult EEGs. Theta activity is normal in small very amounts in the healthy waking adult EEG in a symmetrical distribution.']	脑电图θ节律增多	θ波具有3.5-7.5赫兹的频率，在健康清醒的成人脑电图中极少量对称存在。
HP:0031536	心血管系统异常	Separate origin of the left anterior descending and left circumflex artery	Anomalous coronary origin whereby the left anterior descending (LAD) and the left circumflex artery (LCX) arise separately. Normally, these arteries arise from a common stem, the left main coronary artery (LMCA).	左前降支和左回旋支起源分离	冠状动脉起源异常，左前降支（LAD）和冠状动脉左回旋支（LCX）的起源分离。正常情况下，这两个动脉都起源于左主冠状动脉（LMCA）
HP:0031537	心血管系统异常	Anomalous origin of the left circumflex artery from the right coronary artery	An abnormal origin of the left circumflex artery (LCX) from the right coronary artery. Normally, the left anterior descending (LAD) and the LCX arise from a common stem, the left main coronary artery (LMCA).	冠状动脉左回旋支异常起源于右冠状动脉	冠状动脉左回旋支（LCX）在右冠状动脉的异常起源。正常情况下，冠状动脉左回旋支和左前降支（LAD）都起源于左主冠状动脉（LMCA）
HP:0031538	体壁的异常	Abnormal dermoepidermal junction morphology	['Any anomaly of the structure of the acellular zone that is between the dermis and the epidermis and which functions to bind the epidermis to the dermis and to serve as a selective barrier allowing the control of molecular and cellular exchanges between the two compartments.']	皮肤表皮连接处形态异常	包含真皮与表皮之间的无细胞区任何结构异常，其功能是将表皮与真皮结合，并作为选择性屏障，控制表皮与真皮之间的分子和细胞交换。
HP:0031539	体壁的异常	Linear IgA deposits along the epidermal basement membrane zone	Presence of IgA antibodies in the dermoepidermal junction that are dsitributed in a linear pattern. This feature can be appreciated by immunofluorescence microscopy.	表皮基底膜带的线性lgA沉积	真皮表皮连接处lgA抗体呈线性分布，可用免疫荧光显微镜观察
HP:0031540	体壁的异常	Linear IgG deposits along the epidermal basement membrane zone	Presence of IgG antibodies in the dermoepidermal junction that are dsitributed in a linear pattern. This feature can be appreciated by immunofluorescence microscopy.	表皮基底膜带的线性lgG沉积	真皮表皮连接处lgG抗体呈线性分布，可用免疫荧光显微镜观察
HP:0031541	体壁的异常	Linear C3 deposits along the epidermal basement membrane zone	Presence of complement C3 in the dermoepidermal junction that are dsitributed in a linear pattern. This feature can be appreciated by immunofluorescence microscopy.	表皮基底膜带的线性C3沉积	真皮表皮连接处C3复合物呈线性分布，可用免疫荧光显微镜观察
HP:0031542	肌肉组织异常	Myelin-like whorls in vacuolated fibers	Muscle fibers contain one or more vacuoles (membrane-bound cavity) associated with collections of membranes arranged in a whorl-like (spiral or circular) manner.	空泡化纤维中的髓鞘样螺旋	肌纤维含有一个或多个空泡（膜结合腔），其与以螺旋状（螺旋或圆形）方式排列的膜集合相关联
HP:0031544	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated propionylcarnitine level	['An elevated level of propionylcarnitine in the circulation. Propionylcarnitine is present in high abundance in the urine of patients with Methylmalonyl-CoA mutase (MUT) deficiency.']	丙酰基肉碱水平增高	循环丙酰基肉碱水平升高。甲基丙二酰CoA变位酶（MUT）缺乏的患者尿液中可检出大量丙酰基肉碱。
HP:0031545	免疫系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	Abnormally low T cell receptor excision circle level	Reduced level of T cell receptor excision circle (TRECs) as measured by the TREC assay. Late in maturation, 70% of thymocytes that will ultimately express alpha/beta-T cell receptors form a circular DNA TREC from the excised TCRdelta gene that lies within the TCRalpha genetic locus. The circles are stable but do not increase following cell division and, therefore, become diluted as T cells proliferate. A quantitative polymerase chain reaction (PCR) reaction across the joint of the circular DNA provides the TREC copy number, a marker of newly-formed, antigenically-na?ve thymic emigrant T cells.	T细胞受体重排删除环含量降低	通过TREC检测方法检测到T细胞受体重排删除环含量降低。在成熟后期，70%的最终表达α/β受体的胸腺细胞可形成环状的DNA的T细胞受体重排删除环，它来自于位于TCRα基因座上的TCR δ基因。该环较稳固但不随细胞的分裂而增加，因此，随着T细胞的增殖减少。实时定量PCR反应可通过环状DNA的节点而检测TREC的拷贝数，是一种新形成的，先天抗原性的迁入胸腺的T细胞的标记。
HP:0031546	心血管系统异常	Cardiac conduction abnormality	['Any anomaly of the progression of electrical impulses through the heart.']	心脏传导异常	电脉冲在心脏传导中发生的任意异常
HP:0031547	心血管系统异常	Abnormal QT interval	['Any anomaly of the time interval between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave as measured by the electrocardiogram (EKG).']	QT间期异常	心电图(EKG)Q波起始端到T波结束端之间的时间间隔发生的的任何异常
HP:0031548	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Follicular infundibulum tumor	A cutaneous adnexal neoplasm with variable clinical presentation. It tends to be located in the head and neck and the presentation is papulonodular, scaly, asymptomatic, measuring up to 1-2cm, simulating a basal cell carcinoma.	毛囊漏斗肿瘤	是一种具有临床表现多样性的皮肤附属器肿瘤。好发于头部和颈部，并呈现单丘疹结节，鳞状，无症状，测量长达1-2cm，类似基底细胞癌。
HP:0031549	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Lymphocytoma cutis	Lymphocytoma cutis, or Spiegler-Fendt sarcoid, is classed as one of the pseudolymphonas, referring to inflammatory disorders in which the accumulation of lymphocytes on the skin resemble, clinically and histopathologically, cutaneous lymphomas. Careful clinical evaluation, histopathological and immunohistochemical exams may be needed to make the correct diagnosis.	皮肤淋巴细胞瘤	皮肤淋巴细胞瘤(或Spiegler-Fendt肉样瘤)被归类为一种假淋巴瘤，这是指一类炎症性疾病，皮肤中淋巴细胞聚集，在临床上和组织病理学上，皮肤淋巴瘤。仔细的临床评估、组织病理学和免疫组织化学检查，可以做出正确的诊断。
HP:0031560	心血管系统异常	Coronary cameral fistula	An abnormal communication between coronary artery and a cardiac chamber.	冠状动脉腔瘘	冠状动脉和心腔之间的异常通道。
HP:0031561	心血管系统异常	Coronary cameral fistula to right ventricle	An abnormal communication between the terminus of a coronary artery, bypassing the myocardial capillary bed and entering the right ventricle.	连接到右心室的冠状动脉腔瘘	冠状动脉末端与绕过心肌毛细血管床并进入右心室的异常通道。
HP:0031562	心血管系统异常	Balanced double aortic arch	A type of double aortic arch in which the two branches are of equal size. In most cases of double aortic arch, the right aortic arch is larger and located higher than the left aortic arch.	平衡性双主动脉弓	双主动脉弓的一种，其左右两个分支大小相同。一般情况下有主动脉弓比左主动脉弓更大，并且位于比左主动脉弓高的位置
HP:0031563	心血管系统异常	Coronary arteriovenous fistula	An abnormal communication between the terminus of a coronary artery, bypassing the myocardial capillary bed and entering any segment of the systemic or pulmonary circulation.	冠状动静脉瘘	冠状动脉末端与任一绕过心肌毛细血管床和进入全身或肺循环的之间存在的异常通道。
HP:0031564	生长异常	Bronchial isomerism	An anomalous mirror-imaged arrangement of some bronchial structures. Right isomerism is defined as a subset of heterotaxy where some paired structures on opposite sides of the left-right axis of the body are symmetrical mirror images of each other, and have the morphology of the normal right-sided structures (vice versa for left isomerism).	支气管异构	支气管结构的一种不规则的镜像排列。右异构被定义为异构体的一个子集，在身体的左-右轴的相对两侧的一些成对结构呈彼此对称的镜像，并且具有正常的右侧结构的形态(反之亦然，为左异构)。
HP:0031565	消化系统异常,生长异常	Abdominal situs ambiguus	An abnormality in which the abdominal organs are positioned in such a way with respect to each other and the left-right axis as to be not clearly lateralised and thus have neither the usual, or normal (situs solitus), nor the mirror-imaged (situs inversus) arrangements.	内脏位置异常	腹部器官位置异常，失去正常清晰的左右侧关系，位于非正常、非镜像反位的位置。
HP:0031566	心血管系统异常	Abnormal pulmonary valve cusp morphology	Any structural anomaly of the pulmonary valve leaflets.	肺动脉瓣尖瓣形态异常	肺动脉瓣小叶结构异常
HP:0031567	心血管系统异常	Abnormal aortic valve cusp morphology	Any structural anomaly of the aortic valve leaflets.	主动脉瓣尖瓣形态异常	主动脉瓣叶结构异常
HP:0031568	心血管系统异常	Thickened aortic valve cusp	An abnormally increased thickness of a leaflet of the aortic valve.	主动脉瓣尖增厚	主动脉瓣小叶异常增厚
HP:0031569	心血管系统异常	Absent aortic valve cusps	A developmental defect characterized by the lack of aortic valve cusps (leaflets). There may be remnants of the aortic valve in form of a nonobstructive fibrous ridge or rudimentary leaflets or sinuses of Valsalva.	主动脉瓣尖缺失	以缺乏主动脉瓣尖（小叶）为特征的发育缺陷。 主动脉瓣可能出现非阻塞性纤维脊或Valsalva的基本小叶或窦的形式。
HP:0031570	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 0 facial cleft	A Number 0 Tessier cleft is a true median cleft lip with a broad columella and bifid nasal tip. The alveolar cleft is between the central incisors. The nasal septum may be thickened, duplicated, or absent. The nasal bridge is usually broad with associated orbital hypertelorism. The midline soft tissue anomaly may range from a mild broadening of the philtrum or there may be a true median cleft lip. The columella and nasal tip are typically bifid and broadened with a midline depression. The alae nasi are intact but laterally displaced. The nose appears shortened in the vertical dimension.	泰西耶（Tessier）0型面裂	Tessier 0型面裂是一个真正的中线唇裂，鼻柱宽和两裂的鼻尖。牙槽裂口位于门牙中间。鼻中隔可能增厚、重复或缺失。鼻梁通常较宽，伴有眼眶过远。中线软组织异常的范围可以是人中轻微增宽，也可以是真正的嘴唇中位裂。鼻小柱和鼻尖通常是双裂和增宽，中线凹陷。鼻翼完好无损，但侧移。鼻子在垂直尺寸上显得短。
HP:0031571	头部和颈部的异常	Paramedian facial cleft	['A type of facial cleftlocated near to but not directly on the midline of the face.']	近中线面裂	['一种位于面部中线附近但又不直接位于中线的面裂']。
HP:0031572	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 1 facial cleft	As seen in a typical cleft lip, a cleft of the lip is found in the region of the cupid's bow. The nostril is cleft through the alar dome and extends above onto the nasal dorsum. It passes medial to a normal, but dys- topic, medial canthus. There is an alveolar cleft between the central and lateral incisors that extends above through the pyriform margin lateral to the anterior nasal spine; the nasal septum is not involved. The bony cleft extends through the nasal bone or between the junction of the nasal bone and frontal process of the maxilla. Above the cleft lip, the clefting of the alar dome is associated with deviation to the opposite side of the shortened and broadened columella and nasal tip. Extension of the soft tissue cleft onto the nasal dorsum can be manifest as a series of vertical soft tissue furrows and ridges. Vertical inner canthal dysto- pia and severe telecanthus mark the superior aspect of the Number 1 facial cleft. A cranial soft tissue extension characterized by a tongue-like projection of the frontal hairline delineates the number 13 cleft. Skeletal clefting of the maxilla may extend posteriorly to form a complete cleft of the hard and soft palate. The maxilla is hypoplastic in all three dimensions. There is a keel-shaped alveolus and anterior open bite. Normal septation is preserved between the nasal cavity and the hypoplastic maxillary antrum on the affected side. Distortion of the nasal skeleton produces gross flattening of the nasal dorsum. There is asymmetry of the pterygoid plates, of the greater and lesser wings of the sphenoid, and of the floor of the anterior cranial fossa. The distortion of the cranial base may result in a mild plagiocephaly.	泰西耶（Tessier）1型面裂	一如典型的唇裂中，此型面裂在丘比特之弓的区域发现了唇裂。鼻孔穿过鼻翼穹隆并向上延伸到鼻背。它从内侧穿过一个正常但赘皮的内侧眼角。中心门齿和侧门齿之间有一个牙槽裂，通过梨状缘向上延伸至鼻前棘外侧；鼻中隔未受累。骨裂通过鼻骨或鼻骨与上颌额突交界处之间延伸。在唇裂上方，鼻翼穹隆的裂口伴对侧变短、变宽的鼻小柱和鼻尖。延伸至鼻背的软组织裂表现为一系列垂直的软组织沟和脊。垂直的内眦赘皮和严重的内眦远距系1型面裂的显著特征。颅骨软组织的延伸以额发际线的舌状突起描绘了13型面裂的特征。上颌骨的骨裂可以向后延伸形成完全性软硬腭骨裂。上颌在所有三个维度都发育不全。有龙骨状齿槽和前开咬。在鼻腔和患侧发育不全下颌窦之间保存了正常的鼻中隔。鼻骨的变形导致鼻背的整体扁平。翼状板不对称，蝶骨的大翼和小翼不对称，颅前窝底不对称。颅底变形可能导致轻度斜头畸形。
HP:0031573	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 2 facial cleft	As is typically seen in isolated cleft cases, a cleft of the lip is present. There is hypoplasia, but not true notching of the ala nasi with flattening of the lateral part of the nose. The nasal root is broadened, with lateral displacement of the inner canthus. The palpebral fissure and lacrimal drainage system are not disturbed. The alveolar cleft is through the lateral incisor area and extends to the pyriform aperture. There is normal septation between the nasal cavity and maxillary sinus. Notching at the junction between the nasal bone is present, as is a broad, flat frontal process of the maxilla. Transverse ethmoid enlargement produces orbital hypertelorism. Above the cleft of the lip and palate is a true broad cleft of the nostril that is medial to the intact, but laterally displaced, tail of the alar cartilage. A shallow soft tissue groove extends superiorly to the asymmetrically widened nasal root. The lacrimal system, palpebral fissures, and eyebrows remain intact. The alveolar cleft extends posteriorly as a complete unilateral cleft of the hard and soft palate. The nasal septum is intact but deviated to the opposite side. The nasal cavity remains separated from the normally pneumatized, although hypoplastic, maxilla on the cleft side. Above the nasomaxillary notching, the ethmoid sinus is less well developed, and there is no pneumatization of the frontal sinus on this side. Anterior rotation of the greater and lesser wings of the sphenoid occurs on the cleft side in relation to the narrower orbit and smaller ethmoid sinus. There is mild asymmetry of the anterior cranial fossa, which is narrower on the cleft side. The cranium is brachycephalic with marked occipital flattening.	Tessier 2型面部裂	在单纯唇裂病例中，通常可见唇裂。有发育不全、在鼻侧部有扁平的鼻翼，但没有真正的开口。鼻根变宽，向内眦外侧移位。睑裂和泪道引流系统未受干扰。牙槽裂隙穿过侧切牙区并延伸至梨状孔。鼻腔和上颌窦间有正常的间隔。在鼻骨之间的交界处有凹痕，以及上颌骨的宽平的额突。筛窦横向扩大引起眼眶距过远。在唇腭裂口上方是一个真正的宽阔的鼻孔裂口，位于完整但向侧面移位的鼻翼软骨的尾部内侧。浅表的软组织沟槽向上延伸至增宽的不对称鼻根。泪腺系统、睑裂和眉毛保持完整。牙槽裂隙向后侧延伸，成为完全单侧软硬腭的裂隙。鼻中隔完整，但向另一侧倾斜。鼻腔仍然与位于裂侧的上颌骨分离，虽然发育不全但正常气化。在牙槽裂缝切口上方，筛窦发育不全，该侧额窦未见气化。蝶骨大翼和小翼的前旋转发生在裂侧，与狭窄的眼眶和较小的筛窦有关。颅前窝有轻微的不对称，在裂侧较窄。颅骨显示短头，枕骨明显扁平。
HP:0031574	头部和颈部的异常	Orbital cleft	A facial cleft characterized by involvment of the orbit.	眼窝裂	一种面裂，其特征是累及眼框。
HP:0031575	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 3 facial cleft	As in the Number 1 and Number 2 clefts, this cleft extends through the lip in the region of the typical cleft lip; however, it does not extend through the base. The cleft continues superiorly to involve the inner canthus and lower eyelid medial to the inferior lacrimal punctum, thereby disrupting the nasolacrimal system. Microphthalmia may be present. The alveolar cleft is between the lateral incisor and the canine. Absent septation between the nasal cavity and maxillary antrum, together with the distortion of the frontal process of the maxilla and lacrimal fossa, produces direct communication between the orbit, maxillary sinus, and nose. There is hypoplasia of the soft tissue margins of the cleft in the vertical dimension. This produces extreme soft tissue deficiency between the alar base and the cleft of the medial aspect of the lower eyelid. The inferior lacrimal punctum is evident at the lateral margin of the lower eyelid cleft. The lacrimal drainage system ends as an opening directly onto the cheek without communication into the nasal cavity. The globe is normal in size, but it is displaced inferiorly and laterally. The nasal septum shows the characteristic distortion seen in typical cleft lip and palate. There is absence of septation between the nasal cavity on the cleft side and the maxilla. The maxilla is hypoplastic in three dimensions, with a marked reduction in pneumatization. Superior extension of the skeletal clefting into the medial portion of the orbital floor and into the inferior orbital rim in the region of the frontal process of the maxilla allows direct communication between the orbit above and the nasomaxillary region below. There is mild narrowing of the ethmoid sinus and of the body of the sphenoid on the cleft side. The pterygoid process appears anatomically normal, but less displaced from the midline compared with that of the noncleft side. Both the orbit and the floor of the anterior cranial fossa are inferiorly displaced.	泰西耶（Tessier）3型面裂	与1型和2型面裂一样，这型面裂延伸到典型的唇裂区域；然而，它不通穿过基地。此型面裂继续累及内眦及下眼睑内侧泪小点，从而破坏鼻泪管系统。可能会有小眼球。牙槽裂位于侧切牙和犬齿之间。鼻腔与上颌窦间缺失隔，加上上颌骨和泪窝的额前突的扭曲，使得眼眶、上颌窦、鼻腔之间产生了直接的沟通。裂隙软组织边缘垂直方向发育不全，这导致了鼻翼底部和下眼睑内侧裂之间的软组织极度缺乏。下泪点位于下睑缘裂处，泪腺引流系统的末端是一个直接通向脸颊的开口，而不与鼻腔相通。眼球的大小是正常的，但它向下和侧面移位了。鼻中隔表现出典型的唇裂和腭裂的特征性畸变。裂侧鼻腔与上颌骨之间无隔。上颌骨三维结构发育不全，气腔明显减少。骨质裂的外上延伸进入眶底内侧部分，进入上颌骨额突区域的下眶缘，使上面的眼眶与下面的鼻上颌骨区域直接连通。面裂侧筛窦和蝶窦体有轻度变窄。翼状突在解剖学上是正常的，但与非裂侧相比，从中线移位较少。前颅窝的眶底和底均发生向下移位。 
HP:0031576	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 4 facial cleft	The cleft lip is midway between the philtral ridge and the commissure of the mouth. The cleft is lateral to the normally shaped and placed nasal ala and passes onto the cheek. The cleft extends through the lower eyelid lateral to the punctum. The lacrimal system and inner canthus are normal. Microphthalmia may be present. The alveolar cleft passes between the lateral incisor and canine, as in the Number 3 cleft. The cleft passes around the pyriform aperture and continues through the portion of the maxillary sinus medial to the infraorbital foramen. The cleft terminates at the medial end of the inferior orbital rim. There is severe vertical soft tissue deficiency in a Number 4 cleft, with the medial margins of the cleft lip extending directly into the medially placed cleft of the lower eyelid. Within the medial segment of the right-sided cleft lip, muscle elements are apparently absent. Muscle bunching is noted in the ipsilateral lateral lip segment, as is seen in a typical unilateral cleft lip. The anatomically normal nasal ala is superiorly displaced in association with a severe deficiency in the overall nasal length. Marked dystopia of the right globe results in its inferior displacement into the medially deficient orbital floor and inferior rim. Both globes are otherwise normal. The complete palatal cleft passes through the maxilla medial to the infraorbital foramen and extends to the medial portion of the inferior orbital rim without evidence of an intact maxillary sinus. Bony septation persists medially, thereby separating the nasal cavity from the orbit, maxillary sinus, and mouth, which are contiguous. Marked midfacial hypoplasia is present. The cleft is manifest as asymmetry of the body of the sphenoid; it is smaller on the right, with asymmetric placement of the pterygoid plates relative to the midline. The orbital floor cleft has no communication with the inferior orbital fissure. The cleft does not extend to the skull base, but there is marked facial asymmetry associated with plagiocephaly.	泰西耶（Tessier）4型面裂	唇裂位于人中脊和嘴连合处的中间。裂口位于正常形状和位置的鼻翼外侧，并延伸至脸颊。裂口从下眼睑外侧延伸至泪小点。泪腺系统及内眼角正常。眼可能会小。齿槽裂位于侧切牙和犬齿之间，如同在3型面裂。裂口绕过梨状孔，继续穿过位于眶下孔内侧的上颌窦部分。裂口终止于眶下缘的内侧端。在4型面唇裂有垂直软组织严重的缺损，唇裂的内侧缘直接延伸至下眼睑内侧。 在右侧唇裂的内侧部分，明显没有肌肉成分。同侧侧唇段可见肌肉束状，如同在典型的单侧唇裂可见。解剖上正常的鼻翼上移，整体鼻长严重不足。 右眼球明显的异位导致其向下位移至中度缺陷的眶底和下缘。两个眼球都很正常。完整的腭裂穿过上颌骨内侧眶下孔，延伸到眶下缘内侧，没有上颌窦完整的证据。骨间隔存在，从而将鼻腔与眶部、上颌窦和嘴部分隔开来，而这三者是相邻的。有明显的面中部发育不全。这种面裂表现为蝶骨体的不对称;右侧较小，翼状板相对于中线的位置不对称。眶底裂与眶下裂不连通。裂隙未延伸至颅底，但有明显的面部不对称和斜头畸形。
HP:0031577	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 5 facial cleft	The cleft of the lip is just medial to the oral commissure and extends across the cheek as a furrow. It ends as a cleft at the junction of the middle and lateral third of the lower eyelid. Microphthalmia is frequently present. The alveolar cleft is through the premolar region and extends superiorly through the orbit at the inferolateral part of the rim and floor. There is a vertical soft tissue deficiency between the lateral portion of the lip and the lower eyelid cleft. The left side of the nose shows vertical shortening, and the left alar base is displaced superiorly. Facial asymmetry secondary to the skeletal abnormality is reflected by a vertical orbital dystopia. However, bothglobes are normal, and there is no abnormality of the upper eyelids, eyebrow, forehead, or frontal hairline. The skeletal clefts vary, ranging from a narrow skeletal furrow that traverses the anterior maxillary wall as on the rightto a broad cleft of the maxilla lateral to the infraorbital foramen and maxillary sinus. This latter cleft enters the inferolateral orbital rim and floor without posterior communication with the inferior orbital fissure on the left side. Medial collapse of the lateral maxillary segments is present bilaterally, with reduction in the transverse dimensions of the maxillary arch. Manifestations of the skeletal disturbance in the sphenoid include a shortening and thickening of the lateral orbital walls in the region of the greater wing and mild asymmetric placement of the pterygoid plates relative to the midline. The right-sided pterygoid plates are smaller and closer to the midline. There is minimal asymmetry of the cranial base and calvarium.	泰西耶（Tessier） 5型面裂	唇裂位于口腔接合处的内侧，并延伸到脸颊上形成一个沟。它结束于下眼睑的中、外侧三分之一的结合处。常见小眼。牙槽裂穿过前磨牙区，向上延伸至眶下外侧的边缘和底部。嘴唇外侧和下眼睑之间存在垂直的软组织缺损。鼻左侧呈垂直缩短，左侧鼻翼基底部向上移位。由骨骼异常引起的面部不对称由垂直眼眶异常所反映。然而，两个眼球都是正常的，上眼睑、眉毛、前额或额发际线都没有异常。骨裂的情况变化较大，从穿过上颌骨前壁的狭窄的骨沟(如右侧)到上颌骨外眶下孔至上颌窦的宽阔上颌骨裂。后一种面裂进入眶下外侧缘和眶底，没有与左侧眶下裂后侧连通。上颌侧段的内侧塌陷表现为双侧，上颌弓横向尺寸减小。蝶骨紊乱的表现为大翼区域外侧眼窝壁变短变厚和翼样板相对于中线的轻度不对称。右侧翼形板较小，更靠近中线。颅底和颅骨只有轻微不对称。
HP:0031578	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 6 facial cleft	A facial cleft extending from the zygomatic arch to the eye. This zygomaticomaxillary cleft is similar to that typically found in Treacher Collins syndrome. The overlying tissue shows a vertical sclerodermic furrow radiating from the labial commissure or the angle of the mandible across the cheek to a coloboma of the lower eyelid between the middle and lateral one-third. Microphthalmia is not observed. The skeletal cleft is between the maxilla and zygoma; it passes through the inferolateral orbital rim to enter the inferior orbital fissure. No alveolar cleft is present. The zygomatic arch is intact. The soft tissue furrow, which is more apparent on the right, radiates from the oral commissure toward the lateral two-thirds of the lower eyelid. The antimongoloid obliquity of the palpebral fissures is associated with laterally placed lower eyelid clefts and some ectropion. Aleft-sided anophthalmia is accompanied by adjacent soft tissue hypoplasia and is reflected in a short palpebral fissure, enophthalmos, and minor ptosis of the eyebrow. No abnormality is present in the alveolar arch except for some tilting of the occlusal plane secondary to hypoplasia of the left side of the maxilla. There is a vertical bony groove in the region of the zygomaticomaxillary suture that ends in the inferolateral portion of a small bony orbit. More laterally, the remainder of the zygomatic body and arch is normal in both shape and dimension. The lateral orbital floor is downslanting but intact, and it lacks direct communication with the temporal or infratemporal fossae. The hypoplasia of the left side of the maxilla and orbit is associated with a reduction in the transverse and anteroposterior dimensions of the anterior cranial fossa; mild asymmetry of the middle cranial fossa and calvarium is present. No significant asymmetry of size, shape, or position is present in the sphenoid.	泰西耶（Tessier） 6型面裂	"是一种从颧骨到眼睛的面部裂口。这个颧部裂隙与典型的特雷彻柯林斯综合征相似。表面的组织显示了一个垂直的硬皮皱纹，从嘴唇沟或下颌骨角，穿过面颊到下眼睑的中间与外侧三分之一处的一个缺损。未观察到小眼畸形。骨裂位于上颌骨和颧骨之间；它通过下侧眶缘进入下眶裂隙。没有牙槽裂。颧弓完好无损。右方可见软组织沟，从口合部向下眼睑外三分之二处辐射。睑裂下斜伴下睑裂侧向和外翻。单侧无眼症伴有邻近软组织发育不全，表现为眼睑裂隙短、眼球内陷及轻度上睑下垂。除了左上颌下颌发育不全后的咬合平面发生了一些倾斜，牙槽弓无异常。颧骨上颌缝合处有一个垂直的骨槽，该骨槽终止于一个小骨眶的下外侧部分。
再侧面，颧体和弓的其余部分在形状和尺寸上都是正常的。眶侧底板向下倾斜，但完好无损，与颞下或颞下窝缺乏直接沟通。上颌左侧和眶下发育不全伴颅前窝横向和前后尺寸的缩小、中颅窝和颅骨轻度不对称。蝶骨的大小、形状或位置没有明显不对称。"
HP:0031579	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 7 facial cleft	The temporozygomatic Number 7 cleft is found in both Treacher Collins syndrome and hemifacial microsomia. Soft tissue manifestations include macrostomia, malformations of the external and middle ear, temporalis muscle, variable involvement of the seventh cranial nerve (in hemifacial microsomia), and abnormalities of the preauricular hair in Treacher Collins syndrome. The skeletal cleft is through the pterygomaxillary junction, and vertical maxillary hypoplasia is present. In addition, abnormality of the mandibular ramus, coronoid, and condyle and absence of the zygomatic arch are typically present. A soft tissue furrow extends from the macrostomia laterally and superiorly across the cheek toward the preauricular hairline. The lower eyelids are intact. The anatomy of the external ear is normal, and there are no preauricular tags. Bony clefting is through the pterygomaxillary junction with hypoplasia of the alveolar process in the molar region, thereby producing a posterior open bite. The maxilla is hypoplastic, although the maxillary sinuses are symmetrically pneumatized. The hypoplastic zygomatic body arches upward, but then it takes a downward course and is severely malformed and displaced. The zygoma is continuous posteriorly with an apparently normal zygomatic process of the temporal bone. The mandibular condyle and coronoid process are hypoplastic and asymmetric. There is no antegonial notching of the mandible. Marked cranial base asymmetry, with tilting and asymmetric positioning of the temporomandibular articulations, is present. The anatomy of the sphenoid is abnormal, especially on the right where there is no recognizable medial or lateral pterygoid plate.	泰西耶（Tessier）7型面裂	颞下颌关节7型裂隙同时存在于特雷彻·柯林斯（Treacher Collins）综合征和单侧面部萎缩。软组织的表现为大口畸形、外耳和中耳畸形、颞肌、第七脑神经不同程度的受累(见于单侧面部萎缩)，在特雷彻·柯林斯综合征，还有耳前毛发异常。骨裂累及翼上颌连接，以及垂直的上颌骨发育不全。此外，下颌支、冠状和髁状突的异常和颧骨弓的缺失是典型的表现。软组织沟从大口向两侧向上延伸，越过脸颊，向耳前发际线延伸。下眼睑完好无损。外耳解剖学结构正常，无耳前肉赘。骨裂直达翼上颌连接，在磨牙区牙槽突发育不全，从而产生后开咬。上颌骨发育不全，虽然上颌窦是对称充气的。发育不全的颧体向上拱起，然后向下走，严重畸形和移位。颧骨在后面是连续的，颞部的颧骨外观正常。下颌骨髁突和冠状突是发育不全和不对称的。下颌骨没有前牙槽。颅底明显不对称，颞下颌关节倾斜和不对称。蝶骨解剖异常，尤其是右侧，无可识别的内侧或外侧翼状板。
HP:0031580	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 8 facial cleft	The frontozygomatic or Number 8 cleft is found in both Treacher Collins syndrome and the Goldenhar variant of hemifacial microsomia. Skeletal defects are more prominent in Treacher Collins syndrome, whereas the soft tissue clefting is more typical in cases of ''Goldenhar syndrome''. Soft tissue clefting presents as a dermatocele, a true lateral eyelid coloboma with absence of the outer canthus, and anomalies of the globe itself, especially epibulbar cysts in patients with Goldenhar syndrome. The frontozygomatic bony cleft produces absence of the lateral orbital rim; this border now is formed by the hypoplastic greater wing of the sphenoid. The absence of bony support for the outer canthus produces lateral canthal dystopia and the characteristic antimongoloid slant of the palpebral fissures. Secondary to the bony deficiency in the lateral orbital wall and floor, there is soft tissue continuity between the orbit, temporal fossa, and infratemporal region. Preauricular hairline indicators delineate the Number 8 cleft as the first of the northbound clefts. Complete absence of the bony lateral orbital wall and rim constitute the skeletal element of the Number 8 cleft. The lateral border of the orbit is formed by the greater wing of the sphenoid from which small spicules of bone, which represent the rudimentary zygoma, may be found in Treacher Collins syndrome. The symmetry of the facial anomalies is reflected in the apparently normal symmetric anterior and middle cranial fossae.	泰西耶（Tessier）8型面裂	额颧骨或8型面在Treacher Collins综合征和半侧面部萎缩Goldenhar变异中都看见到。骨缺损在Treacher Collins综合征中更为突出，而软组织裂在“Goldenhar综合征”中更为典型。软组织裂表现为一种皮肤松垂，它是真正的外眼睑缺损，没有外眼角，以及眼球本身的异常，尤其是在Goldenhar综合征患者有表皮囊肿。额颧骨裂导致外侧眶缘缺失，这个边缘现在是由发育不全的蝶骨大翅形成。外眦没有骨支撑就会产生外眦异常，并形成睑裂向下倾斜的特征。继发于外侧眶壁和底板骨缺损的是眶部、颞窝和颞下区之间的软组织连接。耳前发际线指标描绘了8型面裂为第一个northbound裂。完全没有骨外侧眶壁和边缘构成了8型面裂骨骼元素。眼眶的外侧缘是由蝶窦的大翅形成的小针状骨，它代表基本颧骨的基本部分，在Treacher Collins综合征中可以见到。面部异常的对称性表现在前颅和中颅窝明显对称。
HP:0031581	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 9 facial cleft	This is an upper lateral orbital cleft. The soft tissue deformity is in the lateral one-third of the upper eyelid, and the bony cleft is through the superolateral orbital angle. Microphthalmia is present. The superolateral bony deficiency of the orbits allows a lateral displacement of the globes. The lateral one-third of the upper eyelid and the outer canthus are distorted, thus preventing apposition to the globe. The upper eyelid does not have a true cleft. A soft tissue furrow radiates superiorly and posterisphenoid is symmetric and normal. Mild cranial base asymmetry is reflected in the pterygoid plates. The left pair is more laterally displaced from the midline. Skull vault plagiocephaly is evident with an apparent reduction in the anteroposterior dimension of the anterior cranial fossa.	泰西耶（Tessier）9型面裂	"这是一种上外侧眶裂。软组织畸形位于上眼睑的外三分之一，骨裂通过上睑外侧角。可见小眼。眼眶外侧骨缺损使得眼球的侧向移位。上眼睑的外三分之一和外眼角被扭曲，因此无法与眼球重合。上眼睑没有真正的裂口。软组织沟向上辐射，后楔状体对称并正常。翼状体板块反映轻度颅底不对称。左边的这一对从中线更加偏出。前颅窝前后尺寸明显缩小，表明颅骨穹窿斜头畸形。
斜头颅骨穹窿明显，前颅窝前后尺寸明显减少。
"
HP:0031582	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 10 facial cleft	In a Number 10 Tessier cleft there is an upper central orbital cleft with a cleft of the middle one-third of the upper eyelid, which often results in total ablepharia. The eyebrow is disrupted, being virtually absent medially, whereas the lateral portion angles upward toward the frontal hairline. There may be ocular anomalies, including colobomata of the iris. The skeletal cleft is through the midportion of the supraorbital rim, the adjacent frontal bone, and the orbital roof lateral to the supraorbital nerve. A frontal encephalocele frequently occupies the frontal bony cleft. The palpebral fissure is grossly elongated with an amblyopic eye displaced inferiorly and laterally. There is also a divergent squint of the right eye. The eyebrow is deficient medially and becomes thinned out laterally , where it is contiguous with a broad downward and forward projection of the frontotemporal hairline (this may be seen in both the Number 9 and 10 clefts.) A broad frontal encephalocele bulges forward from the middle one-third of the right forehead, supraorbital ridge, and orbital roof. The bony cleft, through which the frontal encephalocele presents, involves the anterior half of the orbital roof, the supraorbital rim, and two-thirds of the vertical height of the frontal bone lateral to the supraorbital nerve. The bony orbit is inferiorly displaced and widened with the lateral orbital wall shortened and laterally deviated. Similar distortion of the anterior cranial fossa is evident, being broader and more flattened on the affected side. The calvarium above the level of the cleft and the cranial base below is symmetric.	泰西耶（Tessier） 10型面裂	在10型Tessier面裂中，上眼窝中央裂隙，裂口位于上眼睑中三分之一处，这通常导致完全的睑裂。眉毛被破坏了，中间几乎没有，而侧面的部分向上翘向额发际线。可能有眼睛异常，包括虹膜的colobomata。骨裂穿过眶上边缘的中部、邻近的额骨及外侧的眶顶至眶上神经。额部脑膨出常占据额部骨裂处。睑裂明显拉长，弱视眼向下和侧面移位。右眼也有不同程度的斜视。眉骨内侧缺失，向外侧变薄，与额颞发际发际线的向下和向前延伸相连(这在9型和10型中都可以看到)。很宽的额脑膨出从右前额、眶上脊和眶顶的中间三分之一向前突出。额脑室膨出所在的骨裂包括眶顶的前半部、眶上缘和额骨垂直高度的三分之二处向外侧至眶上神经部位。骨性眶下移位并增宽，眶外侧壁缩短，侧向偏移。颅前窝也有明显的类似变形，受累侧更宽更平。裂隙上方的颅骨和裂隙下方的颅底是对称。
HP:0031583	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 11 facial cleft	An upper medial orbital cleft produces a cleft of the medial one-third of the upper eyelid that extends through the eyebrow into the frontal hairline. The skeletal element of the cleft in the region of the frontal process of the maxilla may either pass lateral to the ethmoid, through the supraorbital rim, or it may pass through the ethmoidal labyrinth to produce orbital hypertelorism. This cleft usually accompanies the Number 3 cleft. The soft tissue features include a cleft of the medial portion of the upper eyelid, an irregularity in hair orientation at the medial end of the eyebrow, and a long tongue-like projection of the frontal hairline onto the forehead. There is a mild flattening of the frontal process of the maxilla and extensive pneumatization of both the ethmoidal and frontal sinuses, both of which are more prominent on the cleft side. No bony clefting of the supraorbital rim or frontal bone is evident. The cranial base and sphenoid architecture, including the pterygoid processes, are symmetric and normal.	泰西耶（Tessier） 11型面裂	上眼眶内侧裂口产生上眼睑内三分之一处裂口，从眉毛延伸到额部发际线。上颌骨额突区裂口的骨骼元素可以通过眶上边缘横向到筛骨，也可以通过筛骨迷路导致眼眶距增加。这个裂口通常伴随3型面裂。软组织特征包括上眼睑内侧的裂口，眉部内侧的头发排列方向不规则，额部发际线在前额呈长舌状伸向额头。上颌骨额突轻度扁平，筛状窦和额窦广泛充气，二者在裂口一侧更为明显。眶上缘或额骨没有明显的骨裂。颅底和蝶骨结构，包括翼状突，是对称和正常的。
HP:0031584	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 12 facial cleft	There is a soft tissue cleft medial to the inner canthus with a cleft of the root of the eyebrow. The frontal process of the maxilla is flat and broadened, and the ethmoid labyrinth is increased in tranverse dimension, thereby producing orbital hypertelorism. The cribriform plate is of normal width. The frontal sinus is enlarged. Even though the frontal bone is flattened, bony clefts with encephalocele have not been observed. There is a lateral displacement of the inner canthus with a mild thinning, aplasia, or irregularity of the medial end of the eyebrow. There are no eyelid clefts. The soft tissue contour of the forehead is normal, with only a short downward prolongation of the paramedian frontal hairline to mark the superior extent of the soft tissue cleft. Flattening of the frontal process of the maxilla, an increase in the transverse dimension of the ethmoid sinus, and a laterally convex bowing of the medial orbital wall produce orbital hypertelorism. Superiorly there is a minor flattening of the frontal bone medially, and the nasofrontal angle is somewhat obtuse. The extensive pneumatization of the sinuses on the cleft side extends backward through the frontal and ethmoid sinuses and into the sphenoid sinus. The anatomy of the sphenoid, including the pterygoid processes, is otherwise normal. The anterior and middle cranial fossae floors are both broadened on the cleft side with minor widening of the cribriform plate.	泰西耶（Tessier）12型面裂	 内眦内侧有软组织裂口，眉根有裂口。上颌骨的前缘突是平的变宽，筛窦迷路在横径增加，从而产生眶距过远。筛状板宽度正常。额窦增大。尽管额骨是扁平的，但未见伴有脑膨出的骨裂。内眦有侧向移位，眉内侧端有轻度变薄、发育不全或不规则。没有眼睑裂。前额软组织轮廓正常，只前缘发际线向下有短延伸，标志出软组织裂隙的上部。上颌骨额突变平，筛窦横径增加，眶内壁侧向凸起，引起眶距过远。上方正中有一小部分额骨扁平，鼻额角稍钝。裂侧鼻窦广泛的气化，向后延伸到额窦和筛窦，进入蝶窦。蝶骨的解剖，包括翼突，是正常的。裂侧颅底前、中窝底均加宽，筛状板轻度加宽。
HP:0031585	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 13 facial cleft	There is a paramedian frontal encephalocele and a soft tissue cleft that passes medial to an intact eyebrow. The frontal bone shows a paramedian bony cleft with an associated encephalocele. The olfactory groove, cribriform plate, and ethmoid sinus are all increased in transverse diameter, resulting in hypertelorism. The cleft extends medially to the undisturbed eyebrow to end in a short paramedian frontal widow's peak. The bony cleft begins in the region of the nasal bone and extends superiorly through the full height of the frontal bone. Posteriorly, the cleft extends through the cribriform plate and ethmoid sinus as far as the lesser wing and body of the sphenoid. The pterygoid processes are anatomically normal, but they are displaced laterally from the midline on the cleft side. There is orbital hypertelorism below and asymmetry of the floor of the anterior cranial fossa above.	泰西耶（Tessier）13型面裂	 前脑膨出和软组织裂隙穿过完整的眉内侧。额骨显示一副缘骨裂并伴有脑膨出。嗅槽、筛孔板、筛窦均呈横径增大，导致眼距过宽。 裂口向内侧延伸至未受干扰的眉毛，最终抵达一个短的前缘寡妇角。 骨裂开始于鼻骨区域，向上延伸至额骨最高处。向后，骨裂穿过筛孔板和筛窦延伸至蝶骨的小翼和蝶骨体。翼状突在解剖学上是正常的，但它们向裂隙一侧的中线外侧移位的。其下面眶距过远，而其上是颅前窝底部不对称。 
HP:0031586	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 14 facial cleft	This midline cranial cleft usually occurs with a midline facial cleft that completes a median craniofacial dysraphia. A broad nasal root and bifid nose are associated with orbital hypertelorism and a median frontal encephalocele. The frontal bone abnormality varies from a minor flattening to a large midline defect. There is an increased distance between the olfactory grooves. The crista galli is widened, duplicated, or in some cases absent. Marked inferior prolapse of the enlarged ethmoid bone occurs with orbital hypertelorism. The severe orbital hypertelorism is associated with a broad flattening of the glabella and extreme lateral displacement of the inner canthi. The periorbita, including the eyelids and eyebrows, are otherwise normal. A long midline projection of the frontal hairline marks the superior extent of the soft tissue features of this midline cranial cleft. The median frontal defect delineates the region through which the frontal encephalocele herniates. The lateral segments of the frontal bone sweep upward from the region of the intact glabella and are flattened laterally. No pneumatization of the frontal sinus is evident. The crista galli and the perpendicular plate of the ethmoid are bifid. Just as the ethmoid, including the cribriform plate, is widened and caudally displaced, the sphenoid sinus is broadened and extensively, but symmetrically pneumatized. The lateral rotation of the greater and lesser wings of the sphenoid results in a relative shortening of the anteroposterior dimension of the middle cranial fossa. The floor of the anterior cranial fossa is upslanting from its medial aspect to its lateral aspect, with a harlequin appearance on the coronal scan.	泰西耶（Tessier）14型面裂	中线的颅裂通常发生在中线面裂，它完成了颅面部中位dysraphia。宽鼻根和鼻分叉，伴眼眶距过远和额中间脑膨出。额骨异常从轻度扁平到较大的中线缺损不等。嗅觉槽之间的距离增加了。加利嵴加宽、重复，或在某些情况下不存在。发生明显的筛状骨下脱垂使眼眶距过远。严重的眼眶距过远使得眉间扁平和内眦的极度外移。包括眼睑和眉毛在内眶周是正常的。前额发际线的长中线投影标志着中线颅裂软组织特征的上限。中额部缺损描绘了额脑膨出的区域。额骨外侧段从完整的眉间带向上掠起，并向侧面扁平。没有明显的额窦气化。筛孔的裂隙和垂直的筛板是两裂的。如同筛窦，包括筛孔板，被增宽并向尾部移位，蝶窦增宽并高度而对称地充气。蝶骨大翼和小翼的侧向旋转导致中颅窝前后尺寸的相对缩短。颅前窝底部从内侧向外侧上斜，使冠状面显示丑角样外观。
HP:0031587	头部和颈部的异常	Tessier number 30 facial cleft	A lower midline facial cleft, also known as the median mandibular cleft. It is a rare anomaly, which may be limited to a defect in the soft tissue of the lower lip. However, in the more severe form, it may extend into the bony mandibular symphysis.	泰西耶（Tessier） 30型面裂	下颌面裂，也称为下颌中裂。这是一种罕见的异常，可能局限于下嘴唇软组织的缺陷。然而，在更严重的形式，它可能延伸到下颌骨骨性联合。
HP:0031588	神经系统异常	Unhappy demeanor	['A conspicuously unhappy disposition characterized by negative assumptions, self-defeating talk, fear of failure, and negative ruminations about past events.']	悲观态度	一种明显的不愉快的性格，其特征是消极思想、自我挫败感、恐惧失败和对过去事件的消极看法。
HP:0031589	神经系统异常	Suicidal ideation	['Frequent thinking about or preoccupation with killing onself.']	自杀意念	经常思考或专注于自杀
HP:0031590	眼部异常	Asthenopia	["Eye strain, i.e., a feeling of fatigue or discomfort of the eyes related to 'overuse' of the eyes in activities such as reading or working at the computer and often accompanied by lacrimation or headache."]	视疲劳	视疲劳，即眼睛疲劳或不适的感觉，这种感觉与眼睛在电脑阅读或工作中“过度使用”有关，常伴有流泪或头痛。
HP:0031591	心血管系统异常	Enlarged Eustachian valve	An abnormally large Eustachian valve (postnatally). The Eustachian valve is also known as the valve of the inferior vena cava, and is an embryologic remnant of the valve of the inferior vena cava.	下腔静脉瓣瓣扩张	异常扩张的下腔静脉瓣（出生后）。欧式瓣又被称为下腔静脉瓣，是下腔静脉里胚胎期残留下来的薄的半月形瓣膜
HP:0031592	心血管系统异常	Situs inversus with levocardia	Situs inversus of thoracic and abdominal viscera with the heart remaining normally situated on the left; usually associated with congenital cardiac abnormalities such as transposition of the great vessels and/or spleen defects including asplenia or polysplenia.	内脏逆位，伴随左位心	胸部和腹部内脏逆位，但心脏仍位于左侧；通常与先天性心脏异常如大血管转位及/或脾脏缺陷如无脾或多脾相关
HP:0031593	心血管系统异常	Abnormal PR interval	['An anomaly of the PR interval, which is the portion of the ECG from the end of the P wave to the beginning of the QRS complex. A normal PR interval in adults is from 0.12-0.2 seconds.']	PR间期异常	PR间期的异常，即从心电图的P波末尾到QRS波群开始的一部分。成年人的正常PR间期为0.12-0.2秒。
HP:0031594	心血管系统异常	PR segment depression	['A reduction in voltage of the PR segment below baseline.']	P-R 段压低	PR段的电压降低到基线以下
HP:0031595	心血管系统异常	Abnormal P wave	['Any anomaly of the P wave of the EKG, which results from atrial depolarization. The P wave occurs when the sinoatrial node creates an action potential that depolarizes the atria.']	异常P波	心电图P波的任何异常，由心房去极化引起。P波于窦房结产生一种使心房去极化的动作电位时产生
HP:0031596	心血管系统异常	Abnormal PR segment	['An anomaly of the PR segment, which begins at the endpoint of the P wave and ends at the onset of the QRS complex. The PR segment is normally flat and isoelectric.']	PR段异常	PR段的异常，开始于P波的端点，结束于QRS波群的开始。PR段通常是平的、等电的
HP:0031597	心血管系统异常	PR segment elevation	['An increase in voltage of the PR segment below baseline.']	P-R 段抬高	低于基线的PR段电压的增加
HP:0031598	心血管系统异常	Notched P wave	['V-shaped cut (notch) in the middle of the P wave.']	P波切迹	在P波中间出现的V形切割（凹槽）
HP:0031599	心血管系统异常	P mitrale	['A broad (120 ms or longer in duration) and bifid P-wave in EKG lead II.']	二尖瓣型P波	一种宽的(持续时间为120毫秒或更长)和双峰状的P波
HP:0031600	心血管系统异常	P wave inversion	['P wave below insteadof above the baseline. P-wave inversion in the inferior leads may indicate a non-sinus origin of the P waves.']	P波倒置	P波低于基线而不是高于基线。在低引线上的P波反演可以表示P波的非正弦源。
HP:0031601	心血管系统异常	P pulmonale	['The presence of tall, peaked P waves in EKG lead II.']	肺型P波	在心电导联二段出现高尖状P波
HP:0031602	呼吸系统异常	Abnormal mucociliary clearance	['An anomaly in the system of mucociliary transport, which functions to transport the mucous layer lining the respiratory epithelium by ciliary \nbeating.']	纤毛清除功能异常	纤毛运输系统异常，纤毛运输系统的作用是通过纤毛运动作用输送呼吸道上皮的黏液。
HP:0031603	呼吸系统异常	Impaired nasal mucociliary clearance	['An abnormally increased amount of time required to clear mucus (and substances contained in the mucus) from the nasal mucosa. The nasal mucociliary clearance (NMC) system functions to transport the mucous layer lining the nasal epithelium towards the naso pharynx by ciliary beating in a metachronous fashion at a frequency of 7-16 Hz. NMC depends upon two principal components: physicochemical qualities and quantities of mucus and the properties of cilia that propel it. NMC is considered to be representative of pulmonary clearance. normal NMC time is determined to be up to 20 minutes. Duration of 30 minutes is considered as the cutoff point that discriminates normal subjects from subjects with impaired NMC. NMC can be measured by determination of the transport time of markers that are placed on the nasal mucosa including saccharine, radioactive markers, and dyes.']	鼻黏膜纤毛清除功能异常	清除鼻黏膜中黏液（和黏液中的物质）所需的时间异常增加。鼻黏膜纤毛清除（nasal mucociliary clearance ，NMC）系统以7~16Hz的频率通过异时纤毛运动将鼻腔内上皮的黏液运输到鼻咽部。NMC取决于两个主要组成部分：黏液的数量以及物理化学性质，和运输黏液的纤毛的性质。NMC代表肺廓清的能力，正常NMC时间一般不超过20分钟，而划分正常与受损NMC的cut off值为30分钟。NMC可以通过测定置于鼻黏膜上的标记物的清除时间来测量，这些标记物包括糖精、放射性标记物以及染料。 
HP:0031604	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Agenesis of the carotid canal	A developmental defect characterized by the lack of formation of the carotid canal, which normally is a circular aperture in the temporal bone of the skull through which the internal carotid artery and the carotid plexus of nerves traverse.	颈动脉管发育不全	一种发育缺陷，其特征是没有形成颈动脉管，颈动脉管通常是颞骨上的一个圆形孔，颈内动脉和颈神经丛从此处穿过。
HP:0031605	眼部异常	Abnormality of fundus pigmentation	['Any anomaly of the pigmentation of the fundus, the posterior part of the eye including the retina and optic nerve.']	眼底色素沉着异常	任何眼底色素沉着部位异常，眼后部包括视网膜和视神经。
HP:0031606	眼部异常	Retinal cotton wool spot	Fluffy white patch on the retina, representing localized areas of dense white swelling of the retinal nerve fibre layer. They often have a zigzag internal structure, a feathered edge but an otherwise well-delineated form and an approximately 1 mm dimension; they project slightly into the vitreous and sometimes deflect retinal vessels.	视网膜棉絮斑	视网膜上绒毛状白斑，表示视网膜神经纤维层密集的白色肿胀局部区域。它们常有锯齿状内部结构和羽状边缘，却轮廓分明，尺寸约1mm；轻微侵入玻璃体，有时使视网膜血管变形。

HP:0031609	眼部异常	Geographic atrophy	Sharply demarcated area of partial or complete depigmentation of the fundus reflecting atrophy of the retinal pigment epithelium with associated retinal photoreceptor loss. The margins of the de-pigmented area are usually scalloped and the large choroidal vessels are visible through the atrophic retinal pigment epithelium.	地图样萎缩	眼底局部或完全色素脱失的病灶边界清楚，视网膜色素上皮细胞萎缩与相关光感受器丢失。无色素区的边缘呈扇贝状，大的脉络膜血管通过萎缩的色素上皮可见。

Brown异常	一种眼球运动缺陷，受损眼内转位上转受限，但下转正常。病因可以是先天的，也可以是后天外伤获得，或者上斜肌腱或滑车缺损。且牵拉试验结果阳性

HP:0031653	心血管系统异常	Abnormal heart valve physiology	['Any functional abnormality of a cardiac valve.']	心脏瓣膜生理异常	心脏瓣膜功能的任何异常
HP:0031654	心血管系统异常	Abnormal pulmonary valve physiology	['Any functional anomaly of the pumonary valve.']	肺动脉瓣生理异常	肺动脉瓣的任何功能性缺陷
HP:0031655	心血管系统异常	Quadricuspid aortic valve	The presence of an aortic valve with four instead of the normal three cusps (flaps).	四尖瓣主动脉瓣	有四个主动脉瓣而不是正常的三尖瓣（襟翼）
HP:0031656	心血管系统异常	Sytolic anterior motion of the mitral valve	Systolic anterior motion of the mitral valve (SAM) is a paradoxical motion of the anterior, and occasionally posterior, mitral valve leaflet towards the left ventricular outflow tract (LVOT) during systole.	二尖瓣收缩期前向运动	二尖瓣的收缩前向运动(SAM)是指二尖瓣的一个或两个瓣叶在心脏收缩期朝向室间隔中部的矛盾运动
HP:0031657	心血管系统异常	Abnormal heart sound	['Any abnormal noise generated by the beating heart.']	心音异常	心跳产生的任何异常噪音
HP:0031658	心血管系统异常	Third heart sound	['The third heart sound (S3) is related to rapid filling in diastole. S3 can be a normal finding in children and adolescents but suggests heart failure in older patients.']	第三心音	第三心音（S3）与心脏舒张快速填充相关。在儿童和青少年中属正常现象，但出现在老年患者身上可提示心力衰竭现象发生。
HP:0031659	心血管系统异常	Fourth heart sound		第四心音	
HP:0031660	心血管系统异常	Loud first heart sound	['Abnormally increased volume of the first heart sound.']	第一心音响亮	第一心音音量增加异常
HP:0031661	心血管系统异常	Abnormal second heart sound	['Any anomaly of the second heart sound (S2), which is produced by aortic (A2) and pulmonic (P2) valve closure. The A2-P2 interval normally increases with inspiration and narrows with expiration.']	第二心音异常	由主动脉（A2）和肺（P2）瓣膜闭合产生的第二心音（S2）的任何异常。 A2-P2间隔通常随吸气而增加，随呼气而缩短。
HP:0031662	心血管系统异常	Fixed splitting of the second heart sound	['Lack of variation in the splitting between the two components of the second heart sound with respiration. Normally, the aortic valve closure (A2) is followed by the pulmonic valve closure (P2) but the A2-P2 interval increases with inspiration and decreases with expiration.']	第二心音定期分裂	呼吸间第二心音两组成之间的分裂缺乏变化。 通常情况下，主动脉瓣关闭（A2）之后是肺动脉瓣关闭（P2），但A2-P2间隔随着吸气而增加并随着呼气而减少。
HP:0031663	心血管系统异常	Paradoxical splitting of the second heart sound	['Normally, the aortic valve closure (A2) is followed by the pulmonic valve closure (P2) but the A2-P2 interval increases with inspiration and decreases with expiration. With paradoxical splitting, there is a delay in the closure of the aortic valve, so that A2 can follow P2; the individual components can be appreciated at the end of expiration and the interval narrows with inspiration (which is the oposite of the normal pattern).']	第二心音的悖论分裂	通常情况下，主动脉瓣关闭（A2）之后是肺动脉瓣关闭（P2），但A2-P2间隔随着吸气增加并随着呼气而减小。 在悖论分裂的情况下，主动脉瓣关闭延迟，使得A2可以跟随P2; 在呼气结束时可以鉴别各组分，并间隔随着吸气而变窄（这与正常模式相反）。
HP:0031664	心血管系统异常	Systolic heart murmur	['A heart murmur limited to systole, i.e., between the first and second heart sounds S1 and S2.']	收缩性心杂音	一种心缩期心杂音，如发生于第一心音S1和第二心音S2之间。
HP:0031665	心血管系统异常	Midsystolic murmur	['A systolic murmur that begins after S1 and ends before S2, typically with a crescendo-decrescendo pattern.']	心脏收缩中期杂音	一种收缩期杂音，开始于S1后，结束于S2前，通常伴有典型的音量递增递减模式
HP:0031666	心血管系统异常	Late sytolic murmur	['A murmur that occurs in the latter phase of systole.']	心脏收缩晚期杂音	一种发生在心缩期晚期的心杂音
HP:0031667	心血管系统异常	Holosystolic murmur	['A heart murmur that occurs during the entire systolic phase from S1 to S2.']	心脏收缩整期杂音	一种发生于由S1到S2整个心缩期的心杂音
HP:0031668	心血管系统异常	Diastolic heart murmur	['A heart murmur that occurs during diastole, i.e., in the time between S2 and the subsequent S1.']	舒张性新杂音	一种发生于心舒期的心杂音，如在S2及随后的S1之间。
HP:0031669	心血管系统异常	Middiastolic murmur	['A murmur that occurs in the middle of the diastolic phase.']	心脏舒张中期杂音	一种发生于心脏舒张期中期的杂音
HP:0031670	心血管系统异常	Continuous heart murmur	['A murmur that occurs in both systole and diastole.']	持续性心杂音	在心缩期和心舒期之间发生的杂音。
HP:0031671	心血管系统异常	Typical atrial flutter	Typical atrial flutter is an organised atrial tachycardia. It can also be defined as a macroreentrant tachycardia confined to the right atrium. This arrhythmia has a 200-260 ms cycle length, although it may fluctuate depending on patient's previous treatment or ablation, congenital heart disease, etc. Ventricular rate response will be limited by the atrioventricular node conductions, usually presenting a 2:1 or 3:1 response, during atrial flutter. Typical (counter clockwise) flutter is associated with the common flutter pattern: a regular continuous undulation with dominant negative deflections in inferior leads II, III and aVF, often described also as a saw tooth pattern, and flat atrial deflections in leads I and aVL. Atrial deflections in V1 can be positive, biphasic or negative.	典型心房扑动	典型的心房扑动是规则的心动过速。它也可以被定义为局限于右心房的心动过速。这种心律失常的周期长度为200-260毫秒，但可能会因患者以前的治疗或消融、先天性心脏病等而波动。在心房扑动期间，心室率的反应将受到房室结传导的限制，通常为2:1或3:1。典型的(逆时针方向)颤振是与常见的颤振模式相关联的:在次级导联II、III和aVF中，一般表现为锯齿状的连续的连续波动，常被描述为锯齿状，在导联I和aVL中有平坦的心房偏转。在V1中的心房弯曲可以是正的、双相的或负的。
HP:0031672	心血管系统异常	Reverse typical atrial flutter	A type of atrial flutter associated with rounded or bimodal positive deflections in inferior leads II, III and aVF, and a very characteristic bimodal negative wave in the shape of a W is seen in lead V1.	逆转型心房扑动	一种与下导联II、III和aVF的圆形或双模正偏有关，在V1导联中可以看到一个非常典型的W型波的心房扑动。
HP:0031673	心血管系统异常	Orthodromic atrioventricular reentrant tachycardia	A type of atrioventricular reentrant tachycardia (AVRT) where the are the atrioventricular node is used for anterograde conduction and the accessory pathway for retrograde conduction.	顺向房室折返性心动过速	房室收缩性心动过速(AVRT)的一种类型，以房室结为起点，用于顺行传导，副路用于逆行传导
HP:0031674	心血管系统异常	Antidromic atrioventricular reentrant tachycardia	['A type of atrioventricular reentrant tachycardia (AVRT) where the are the accessory pathway is used for anterograde conduction and the atrioventricular node for retrograde conduction.']	逆向房室折返性心动过速	一种房室折返性心动过速(AVRT)，其副通路用于顺行传导，房室结用于逆行传导
HP:0031675	心血管系统异常	Fascicular left ventricular tachycardia	A ventricular tachycardia (VT) characterized by right bundle branch block (RBBB) and left axis deviation (LAD) on electrocardiogram (ECG).	分支型室性心动过速	在心电图(ECG)上表现为一种以右束支阻滞(RBBB)和左轴偏移(LAD)为特征的室性心动过速(VT)
HP:0031676	心血管系统异常	Monomorphic ventricular tachycardia	['A type of ventricular tachycardia that is characterized by uniform QRS complexes within each lead (i.e., each QRS is identical or nearly so).']	单形性室性心动过速	一种室性心动过速的特征，其特征是在每个引线内都有统一的QRS复合体。，每个QRS几乎相同)
HP:0031677	心血管系统异常	Polymorphic ventricular tachycardia	['A type of ventricular tachycardia that is characterized by variable QRS complexes within each lead (i.e., QRS complexes may be different from beat to beat).']	多形性室性心动过速	指在任何心电图记录导联显示室性心动过速伴连续变化的QRS波群，节律不规则（QRS波群可能节律不同）
HP:0031678	心血管系统异常	Atherosclerotic lesion	A lesion associated with atherosclerosis, a multifactorial and multipart progressive disease manifested by the focal development within the arterial wall of lesions, that ranges from teh development of a fatty streak, plaque progression, and plaque disruption. Atherosclerotic lesions demonstrate consistent morphological characteristics, which indicate that each type may stabilize temporarily or permanently and that progression to the next type may require an additional stimulus.	动脉粥样硬化病变	一种与动脉粥样硬化相关的病变，一种多因素多部位的进展性疾病，表现为血管壁的局灶性损伤，其进展过程为脂纹、进展期斑块和斑块破裂，动脉粥样硬化病变表现出稳定的形态特征，这表明该病进展过程的每一阶段都可表现为暂时或永久的稳定并且发展到下一阶段可能需要额外的刺激。
HP:0031679	心血管系统异常	Type I atherosclerotic lesion	['Type I lesions represent the very initial changes and are recognized as an increase in the number of intimal macrophages and the appearance of macrophages filled with lipid droplets (foam cells).']	Ⅰ型动脉粥样硬化病变	Ⅰ型代表动脉粥样硬化病变非常早期的变化，可以观察到血管内膜巨噬细胞增加并且表现为充满脂质滴的泡沫细胞
HP:0031680	心血管系统异常	Type II atherosclerotic lesion	Type II atherosclerotic lesions include the fatty streak lesion, the first grossly visible lesion, and are characterized by layers of macrophage foam cells and lipid droplets within intimal smooth muscle cells and minimal coarse-grained particles and heterogeneous droplets of extracellular lipid.	Ⅱ型动脉粥样硬化病变	Ⅱ型动脉粥样硬化病变包括脂纹的出现，可被肉眼明显观察到的病征，其特征在于分层的泡沫细胞、含有脂滴的内膜平滑肌细胞和细小粗糙的胞外脂滴
HP:0031681	心血管系统异常	Type III atherosclerotic lesion	Type III (intermediate) atherosclerotic lesions are the morphological and chemical bridge between type II and advanced lesions. Type III lesions appear in some adaptive intimal thickenings (progression-prone locations) in young adults and are characterized by pools of extracellular lipid in addition to all the components of type II lesions.	Ⅲ型动脉粥样硬化病变	Ⅲ型动脉粥样硬化病变（中间型）是Ⅱ型和晚期病变之间病理和理化性质的过渡型。Ⅲ型在一些青年中表现为适应性内膜增厚（易发部位），其特征是除了包括Ⅱ型的所有病变之外还有胞外脂质池
HP:0031682	心血管系统异常	Type V atherosclerotic lesion	['Type V lesions are defined as lesions in which prominent new fibrous connective tissue has formed. When the new tissue is part of a lesion with a lipid core (type IV), this type of morphology may be referred to as fibroatheroma or type Va lesion. A type V lesion in which the lipid core and other parts of the lesion are calcified may be referred to as type Vb. A type V lesion in which a lipid core is absent and lipid in general is minimal may be referred to as type Vc. With these lesions, arteries are variously narrowed, generally more than with type IV. Importantly, as with type IV lesions, type V lesions may develop fissures, hematoma, and/or thrombus (type VI lesion), and for this reason too they are clinically relevant.']	Ⅴ型动脉粥样硬化病变	具有突出的新生纤维结缔组织被定义为Ⅴ型。当新生结缔组织的一部分为脂质内核（Ⅳ型）时，这种病理类型我们称之为纤维粥样瘤或Va型病变。当脂质内核和其他病变部分发生了钙化时，可称之为Vb型。当病变内不存在脂质内核，并且脂质含量很低时，可称之为Vc型。在这些病变中，病变狭窄的程度一般要大于Ⅳ型。重要的是，与Ⅳ型一样，Ⅴ型也可以发展为斑块破裂、血肿和/血栓（Ⅵ型），因此也与临床明确相关
HP:0031683	心血管系统异常	Type VI atherosclerotic lesion	Type VI atherosclerotic lesions generally have the underlying morphology of type IV or V lesions, surface disruptions, hematoma, and thrombosis may be (although less often) superimposed on any other type of lesion and even on intima without an apparent lesion. Complicating features may arise because of individual differences in risk factors and tissue reactions. These may include differences in composition of the blood, the relative quantities and distributions in the components of the underlying lesion or intima, as well as modifications of shear and tensile forces to which the lesion or intima is exposed. Clinical imaging of lesions may be expected to contribute greatly to the understanding of type VI lesions and the associated clinical syndromes.	Ⅵ型动脉粥样硬化病变	Ⅵ型动脉粥样硬化病变通常具有Ⅳ型和Ⅴ型的病理改变，斑块破裂、血肿和血栓形成（尽管不太常见）可以在其他任何类型病变的基础上发生，甚至会发生在没有明显损坏的内膜上。由于在危险因素和组织反应性方面存在个体化差异，可能会表现出复杂的症状。这些个体化差异包括：血液成分的差异、潜在的病变或内膜组分的相对数量和分布差异、以及病变或内膜处切力和拉伸力的改变。病变部位的临床影像学检查可以帮助我们认识Ⅵ型病变和相关的临床症状。
HP:0031684	泌尿生殖系统异常,心血管系统异常	Renal artery atherosclerosis	['An atherosclerotic lesion located in the renal artery.']	肾动脉粥样硬化	肾动脉粥样硬化病变。
HP:0031685	消化系统异常	Abnormal stool composition		粪便成分异常	
HP:0031686	消化系统异常	Increased stool alpha1-antitrypsin concentration	['An abnormally elevated amount of alpha1-antitrypsin in the feces.']	大便α1抗胰蛋白酶浓度升高	粪便中α1抗胰蛋白酶的异常升高
HP:0031687	心血管系统异常	Abnormally loud pulmonic component of the second heart sound		第二心音的异常响亮肺闭塞音	
HP:0031688	血液和造血组织异常	Erythroid dysplasia	Dysplasia in the erythroid lineage, which presents with a variety of morphological changes in the bone marrow, including nuclear budding or irregular nuclear contour in erythroblasts. In peripheral blood.	红细胞发育不良	红细胞系的发育不良在骨髓化中表现出多种形态变化，表现为在外周血的红细胞中出现核芽和不规则核。
HP:0031689	血液和造血组织异常	Megakaryocyte dysplasia	The presence of micro-megakaryocytes, hypo-lobed, or non-lobed nuclei in megakaryocytes of all sizes and multiple, widely-separated nuclei.	巨核细胞发育不良	巨核细胞的胞核呈不同大小、多核、广泛分布，这种巨核细胞内还可存在小巨核细胞、核分叶状过少或者未分叶的核
HP:0031690	免疫系统异常	Opportunistic infection	An infection that is caused by a pathogen that would generally not be able to cause an infection in a host with a normal immune system. Such pathogens take advantage of the opportunity, so to speak, that is provided by a weakened immune system.	机会性感染 	机会性感染是指某些病原菌在宿主免疫系统正常时通常并不引起感染，但在某些情况下，譬如免疫系统减弱时会导致宿主感染。
HP:0031691	免疫系统异常	Severe viral infection	An unusually severe viral infection.	重症病毒感染	非常严重的病毒感染
HP:0031692	免疫系统异常	Severe cytomegalovirus infection	An unusually severe infection by cytomegalovirus.	重症巨细胞病毒感染	不寻常的严重的巨细胞病毒感染
HP:0031693	免疫系统异常	Severe Epstein Barr virus infection	['An unusually severe Epstein Barr virus (EBV) infection.']	重症EB病毒感染	不寻常的严重的EB病毒感染
HP:0031694	免疫系统异常	Severe adenovirus infection	An unusually severe adenovirus infection.	重症腺病毒感染	不寻常的严重的腺病毒感染
HP:0031695	免疫系统异常	Severe parainfluenza infection	['An unusually severe infection by a parainfluenza virus.']	重症副流感病毒感染	不寻常的严重的副流感病毒感染
HP:0031696	免疫系统异常	Disseminated viral infection	A viral infection that fails to be contained by the immune sytem and spreads throughout the body.	播散性病毒感染	不能被免疫系统限制而全身扩散的病毒感染
HP:0031697	免疫系统异常	Disseminated infection with live vaccine virus	A dissemination viral infection caused by a live attenuated vaccine virus.	活疫苗病毒播散性感染	由减毒活疫苗病毒引起的病毒感染散播。
HP:0031698	免疫系统异常	Disseminated Bacillus Calmette-Guerin infection	['Failure to contain the Bacillus Calmette-Guerin (BCG) following vaccination leading to spread of BCG to many sites in the body. The tuberculosis vaccine BCG contains live attenuated Mycobacterium bovis.']	播散性卡介菌感染	接种的卡介菌（BCG）因不受限制，导致其扩散至身体许多部位。结核疫苗BCG含有减毒牛型结核菌。
HP:0031699	免疫系统异常	Disseminated cryptosporidium infection	['Failure to contain infection by a protozoan of the genus Cryptosporidium, leading to spread to many parts of the body.']	播散性隐孢子虫感染	隐孢子虫属感染得不到遏制，导致扩散到身体的许多部位。
HP:0031700	免疫系统异常	Invasive parasitic infection	['A poarasitic infection whereby the parasite invades (migrates through) tissues of the infected host.']	侵袭性寄生虫感染	寄生虫侵入感染宿主的组织
HP:0031701	眼部异常	Anterior chamber inflammatory cells	['The presence of inflammatory cells in the aqueous humor of the anterior chamber of the eye.']	前房炎性细胞	眼前房房水中存在炎性细胞。
HP:0031702	眼部异常	Anterior chamber red blood cells	['The presence of erythrocyte in the aqueous humor of the anterior chamber of the eye.']	前房红细胞	眼前房房水中存在红细胞。
HP:0031703	耳部异常	Abnormal ear morphology	['Any structural anomaly of the ear.']		
HP:0031704	耳部异常	Abnormal ear physiology	['Any functional anomaly of the ear.']		
HP:0031705	眼部异常	Compensatory head posture	['A compensatory head posture occurs when the head is deviated out of the normal primary straight head position in order to compensate for an ocular problem.']	代偿头位	代偿头位,通过偏离正常头位,来达到补偿眼部疾病的目的。
HP:0031706	眼部异常	Compensatory chin depression	['A tendency to hold the chin depressed (lowered) to compensate for a limitation of eye movement.']	代偿性下巴下移	倾向于将下巴压低，以补偿眼球运动的局限性。
HP:0031707	眼部异常	Compensatory face turn to the right	['A tendency to turn the face to the right to compensate for a limitation of eye movement.']	代偿性脸右偏	倾向于将脸部向右转，以补偿眼球运动的局限性。
HP:0031708	眼部异常	Compensatory face turn to the left	['A tendency to turn the face to the left to compensate for a limitation of eye movement.']	代偿性脸左偏	倾向于将脸部向左转，以补偿眼球运动的局限性。
HP:0031709	眼部异常	Compensatory head tilt to the right shoulder	['A tendency to tilt the head towards the right shoulder to compensate for a limitation of eye movement.']	代偿性头部向右肩倾斜	倾向于将头部向右肩倾斜，以补偿眼球运动的局限。
HP:0031710	眼部异常	Compensatory head tilt to the left shoulder	['A tendency to tilt the head towards the left shoulder to compensate for a limitation of eye movement.']	代偿性头部向左肩倾斜	倾向于将头部向左肩倾斜，以补偿眼球运动的局限性。
HP:0031711	心血管系统异常	Asymmetric abdominal aortic aneurysm	An abdominal aortic aneurysm that is not symmetric around its axis (not axisymmetric).	非对称性腹主动脉瘤	非轴对称性的腹主动脉瘤
HP:0031713	眼部异常	Constant exotropia	A form of divergent strabismus (exotropia) in which the eye turns outward at all distances and at all times.	恒定性外斜视	任何时间、任何视物距离都存在的发散型斜视（外斜视）。
HP:0031714	眼部异常	Distance exotropia	A type of divergent strabismus (exotropia) in which an eye tends to turn outwards (i.e., the eye squints) mainly when looking at distant objects. The eyes tend to remain straight when they look at near objects. Distance exotropia may be constant or intermittant.	视远时外斜视	一种发散型斜视(外斜视)，可能是恒定的，也可能是间歇性的；即视远时一只眼睛倾向于向外看(即斜视)，视近时眼睛倾向于保持直视。
HP:0031715	眼部异常	Near exotropia	An intermittent exotropia where there is binocular single vision on distance fixation and exotropia at near (intermittent or constant).	视近时外斜视	一种间歇性外斜视，即视远可双眼单视，视近时外斜。
HP:0031716	眼部异常	Cyclic exotropia	A type of exotropia (divergent strabismus) in which binocular single vision alternates with large angle exotropia in rhythmic cycle.	周期性外斜视	正常双眼单视和大斜视角的外斜视交替出现的一种发散型斜视。
HP:0031717	眼部异常	Alternating exotropia	A type of exotropia in which either eye may be used for fixation.	交替性外斜视	一种左右眼交替注视的斜视。
HP:0031718	眼部异常	Consecutive exotropia	Exotropia in an individual who has previously had esotropia or esophoria.	继发性外斜视	原为内斜视或者内隐斜过矫导致的外斜视。
HP:0031719	眼部异常	True distance exotropia	Exotropia (intermittent or constant) on distance fixation with binocular single vision on near fixation under all testing conditions. The accommodative convergence/accommodation (AC:A) ratio is within normal limits.	真性视远时外斜视	（持续性或者间歇性）外斜视，视远时存在双眼单视，视近时可出现各种测试状态。AC/A在正常范围内。
HP:0031720	眼部异常	Simulated distance exotropia	['Exotropia (intermittent or constant) worse for distance fixation in which the near angle of deviation increases (or near exophoria becomes exotropia) with: (1) prolonged disruption of fusion and/or (2) elimination of accommodation.']	假性视远时外斜视	（持续性或者间歇性）外斜视，视远视力差，视近时斜视角增大，原因可能为：（1）融像时间延长；（2）调节作用消失。
HP:0031721	眼部异常	Sensory exotropia		感觉性外斜视	
HP:0031722	眼部异常	Near esotropia	An intermittent esotropia where there is binocular single vision on distance fixation and esotropia at near even when the accommodation is relieved.	视近时内斜视	间歇性内斜视，视远时双眼单视正常，视近时即使调节放松仍表现出内斜视。
HP:0031723	眼部异常	Secondary esotropia	Convergent squint which follows loss or impairment of vision.	继发性内斜视 	继发于视力丧失或损害的内斜视。
HP:0031724	眼部异常	Microtropia	A small angle heterotropia (usually of 10 diopters or less) in which a form of binocular single vision occurs.	微小度数斜视	微小度数斜视形成双眼单视的斜视角小于10△。
HP:0031725	眼部异常	Hypophoria	A form of latent strabismus (heterophoria) in which, on dissociation, the occluded eye deviates downwards.	下隐斜	一种潜在的斜视（隐斜），在遮盖实验中，遮盖眼向下偏移。
HP:0031726	眼部异常	Incyclotropia	A type of cyclotropia (torsion of one or both eye about the visual axis of the eyes) in which the upper poles of the globes are rotated inward (medially) to each other.	内旋转斜视	旋转斜视的一种类型（一只或两只眼睛围绕眼睛视轴旋转），眼球上极向内（内侧）相互旋转。
HP:0031727	眼部异常	Excyclotropia	A type of cyclotropia (torsion of one or both eye about the visual axis of the eyes) in which the upper poles of the globes are rotated outward (laterally) to each other.	外旋转斜视	旋转斜视的一种类型（一只或两只眼睛围绕眼睛视轴旋转），眼球上极彼此向外（横向）旋转。
HP:0031728	眼部异常	Mild hypermetropia	A form of hypermetropia with not more that +2.00 diopters.	轻度远视	远视的一种形式，不超过+2.00度。
HP:0031729	眼部异常	Moderate hypermetropia	A form of hypermetropia with more than +2.00 diopters but not more than +5.00 diopters.	中度远视	屈光度超过+2.00，但不超过+5.00的远视眼。
HP:0031730	眼部异常	Axial myopia	A form of myopia related to an axial length above the norm and too long for the refractive power of the whole optical system of the eye.	轴性近视	近视的一种形式，眼轴长度超过正常，且其长度超过眼球的屈光系统的调节范围。
HP:0031731	眼部异常	Increased tear production	Increased lacrimation owing to overproduction of tears.	泪液产量增加	由于眼泪过度产生而增加流泪。
HP:0031732	眼部异常	Increased basal tear production	A form of watery eye associated with overproduction of tears due to an increased parasympathetic drive to the secretory component of the lacrimal system (lacrimal gland); this could be due to pro-secretory drug use (e.g. pilocarpine) or autonomic disturbance.	基础泪液量增加	"由于泪液分泌增加而导致泪液分泌过度而产生的泪溢，泪腺系统（泪腺）的分泌成分增加，可能是由于分泌性药物的使用（例如匹罗卡品）或自主神经紊乱引起的。
"
HP:0031733	眼部异常	Reflex tearing	A form of watery eye associated with overproduction of tears due to reflex tearing in response to a local irritant (e.g. trichiasis or foreign body), chronic ocular surface disease (e.g. blepharitis) or systemic disease (e.g. thyroid eye disease).	反射性流泪	由于对局部刺激物（例如倒睫或异物）、慢性眼表疾病（例如睑缘炎）或全身性疾病（例如甲状腺眼病）的反射流泪而产生泪水过量。
HP:0031734	眼部异常	Lacrimal pump failure	A form of watery eye associated with abnormal lid tone and/or lid position. The former is due to lid laxity (common involutional change in the elderly) or a weak orbicularis muscle (e.g. due to VII cranial nerve palsy). The latter is typically associated with ectropion causing punctal eversion.	泪泵衰竭	与异常的眼睑张力和/或眼睑位置相关的一种水分过多的眼睛。 前者是由于睑松弛（老年人常见的退化改变）或弱的眼轮匝肌（例如由于Ⅶ颅神经麻痹引起）。 后者通常与引起泪点外翻的睑外翻相关。
HP:0031736	头部和颈部的异常	Involutional entropion	An abnormal inversion of the eyelid towards the globe resulting from inferior retractor muscle dysfunction with tissue laxity and, possibly, overriding of the preseptal orbicularis muscle over the pretarsal orbicularis muscle.	更年期睑内翻	眼睑向眼球的异常倒转，因眼睑牵张肌功能障碍和组织松弛所致，并且有可能中隔眼轮匝肌覆盖于眼睑眼轮匝肌之上。
HP:0031737	头部和颈部的异常	Cicatricial entropion	Abnormal inversion (turning inward) of the eyelid towards the globe associated with scarring that vertically shortens the posterior lamella of the eyelid.	瘢痕性睑内翻	眼睑的异常反转(转向内)，由瘢痕引起眼睑后层的垂直缩短。
HP:0031738	头部和颈部的异常	Mechanical entropion	A type of entropion (abnormal inversion of the eyelid towards the globe) that is related to a mass effect of a lesion (e.g., a tumor) that pulls the eyelid margin away from the globe.	机械性睑内翻	一种睑内翻(眼睑朝向眼球的异常倒转)，与某种损伤(如肿瘤)的体积效应有关，它将眼睑边缘拉离地眼。
HP:0031739	眼部异常	Abnormal oblique muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the inferior or superior oblique muscle.	斜肌生理异常	下斜肌或上斜肌的功能异常。
HP:0031740	眼部异常	Abnormal horizontal rectus muscle physiology	['A functional anomaly of the medial rectus muscle or lateral rectus muscle.']	水平肌生理异常	内直肌或外直肌功能异常
HP:0031741	眼部异常	Inferior oblique muscle underaction	Reduced ocular movement by the inferior oblique muscle which improves on testing ductions, typically associated with neurogenic palsy.	下斜肌功能不全	下斜肌的运动减少，但可在管道测试中改善，通常与神经源性麻痹有关。
HP:0031742	眼部异常	Inferior rectus muscle underaction	Reduced movement by the inferior rectus muscle which improves on testing ductions, typically associated with neurogenic palsy.	下直肌缺陷	下直肌减少运动，可在管道测试中改善，通常与神经源性麻痹有关。
HP:0031743	眼部异常	Inferior rectus muscle overaction	Excessive action of the inferior rectus muscle caused by increased innervation typically as a consequence of palsy or limitation to the ipsilateral antagonist or contralateral synergist.	下直肌过伸	通常由于麻痹或限制同侧拮抗肌或对侧协同肌导致神经支配增加引起的下直肌亢进。
HP:0031744	眼部异常	Superior rectus muscle weakness	['Decreased strength of the superior rectus muscle.']	上直肌无力	上直肌强度下降。
HP:0031745	眼部异常	Superior rectus muscle overaction	Excessive action of the superior rectus muscle caused by increased innervation typically as a consequence of palsy or limitation to the ipsilateral antagonist or contralateral synergist.	上直肌过伸	通常由于麻痹或限制同侧拮抗剂或对侧协同肌而导致的神经支配增加引起的上直肌过度作用。
HP:0031746	眼部异常	Superior rectus muscle rescriction	Mechanical limitation of the range of movement of the superior rectus muscle.	上直肌受限	上直肌运动范围的机械限制。
HP:0031747	眼部异常	Superior rectus muscle underaction	Reduced movement of the superior rectus muscle which improves on testing ductions, typically associated with neurogenic palsy.	上直肌功能不全	上直肌的运动减少，可在管道测试中改善，通常与神经源性麻痹有关。
HP:0031748	眼部异常	Abnormal vertical rectus muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the superior or inferior rectus muscle.	垂直肌生理异常	上直肌或下直肌的功能异常。
HP:0031749	眼部异常	Abnormal lateral rectus muscle physiology	['A functional anomaly of the lateral rectus muscle.']	外直肌生理异常	外直肌功能性异常。
HP:0031750	眼部异常	Lateral rectus muscle weakness	Decreased strength (ability to move) of the lateral rectus muscle.	外直肌无力	外直肌的力量（眼球移动能力）减弱。
HP:0031751	眼部异常	Lateral rectus muscle underaction	Reduced movement of the lateral rectus muscle which improves on testing ductions, typically associated with neurogenic palsy.	外直肌功能不全	外直肌的运动减少，但可在管道测试中改善，通常与神经源性麻痹有关。
HP:0031752	眼部异常	Lateral rectus muscle overaction	['Excessive action of the lateral rectus muscle caused by increased innervation typically as a consequence of palsy or limitation to the ipsilateral antagonist or contralateral synergist.']	外直肌过伸	由于麻痹或对同侧拮抗肌或对侧协同肌的限制导致的神经支配增加使外直肌亢进。
HP:0031753	眼部异常	Medial rectus muscle weakness	Decreased strength of the medial rectus muscle.	内直肌无力	内直肌的力量减弱。
HP:0031754	眼部异常	Medial rectus muscle overaction	['Excessive action of the medial rectus muscle caused by increased innervation typically as a consequence of palsy or limitation to the ipsilateral antagonist or contralateral synergist.']	内直肌过伸	由于麻痹或限制同侧拮抗肌或对侧协同肌导致的神经支配增加而引起内直肌亢进。
HP:0031755	眼部异常	Abnormal rectus muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of a vertical or horizontal rectus muscle.	直肌生理异常	垂直或水平直肌的功能异常。
HP:0031756	眼部异常	Medial rectus muscle underaction	Reduced movement of the medial rectus muscle which improves on testing ductions, typically associated with neurogenic palsy.	内直肌功能不全	内直肌的运动减少，但可在管道测试中改善，通常与神经源性麻痹有关。
HP:0031757	眼部异常	Medial rectus muscle restriction	Mechanical limitation of the range of movement of the medial rectus muscle.	内直肌受限	内直肌运动范围的机械限制。
HP:0031758	眼部异常	Lateral rectus muscle restriction	['Mechanical limitation of the range of movement of the lateral rectus muscle.']	外直肌受限	外直肌运动范围的机械限制。
HP:0031759	眼部异常	Basic (constant) esotropia	A form of convergent strabismus (esotropia) in which the deviation is present under all conditions (ie at all distances and at all times).	基本型（恒定性）内斜视	在任何情况下（任何时间以及任何视物距离下）均可出现的会聚型斜视。
HP:0031760	眼部异常	Non-accomodative esotropia	A form of esotropia in which the angle of deviation is not affected by accommodative effort.	非调节性内斜视	一种与调节反应无关的内斜视。
HP:0031761	眼部异常	Infantile (constant) esotropia		婴儿型（恒定性）内斜视	
HP:0031762	眼部异常	Distance esotropia	['An intermittent esotropia where binocular single vision is present on near fixation and an esotropia on distance fixation. Often associated with myopia and aging.']	视远时内斜视	间歇性内斜视，表现为视近正常，视远内斜；常与年龄和近视相关。
HP:0031763	眼部异常	Cyclic esotropia	Convergent strabismus in which normal binocular single vision is alternating with large angle esotropia in rhythmic cycle.	周期性内斜视	正常双眼单视和大斜视角的内斜视交替出现的一种会聚型斜视。
HP:0031764	眼部异常	Fully accomodative esotropia	Esotropia in which normal binocular single vision is present for all distances when the hypermetropic refractive error is corrected. Esotropia is present for near and distance on accommodation without correction.	完全调节性内斜视	此种内斜视在矫正远视后，各距离内均存在正常的双眼单视，而在近距离调节时出现内斜视，故不需要特意矫正。
HP:0031765	眼部异常	Partially accomodative esotropia	A form of constant esotropia in which the angle of deviation is partially affected by accommodative effort. Typically there is esotropia at near and distance with hypermetropic correction and the angle of deviation increases without glasses.	部分调节性内斜视	恒定内斜视的一种形式，偏斜角部分地受调节力的影响。通常在远近距离的远视均矫正后内斜视仍存在，若不戴镜则斜视角会增加。
HP:0031766	眼部异常	Convergence excess esotropia	An intermittent esotropia with binocular single vision present at distance fixation but esotropia on accommodation for near fixation. Usually associated with hypermetropia but patients can be emmetropic and rarely myopic. Associated with a high accommodative convergence/accommodation (AC/A) ratio.	集合过强型内斜视	间歇性内斜视，表现为视远正常，视近内斜；通常患者伴有可以通过自身调节矫正的远视。此内斜视常伴有高AC/A。
HP:0031767	眼部异常	Consecutive esotropia	Esotropia in a patient who has previously had exotropia or exophoria; may be constant or intermittent. and usually follows surgical overcorrection.	继发性内斜视	原本是恒定性或者间歇性外斜视的患者，因手术过矫而变成内斜视。
HP:0031768	眼部异常	Parafoveal fixation	Fixation of an object in the area adjacent to the fovea.	旁中心注视	由中心凹周围的区域成像。
HP:0031769	眼部异常	Peripheral fixation	Fixation of an object in a peripheral area of the retina.	周边注视	由视网膜周边区域成像。
HP:0031770	头部和颈部的异常	Epicanthus palpebralis	A type of epicanthus in which a medial vertical fold is present between upper and lower lids.	眼睑内眦赘皮	一种内垂褶皱，位于上眼睑和下眼睑之间的一种内垂褶皱。
HP:0031771	头部和颈部的异常	Epicanthus tarsalis	A type of epicanthus in which a primarily upper lid fold is present.	睑板内眦赘皮	一种内眦赘皮，主要是上眼睑的褶皱。
HP:0031772	心血管系统异常,神经系统异常	Abnormal posterior circulating artery morphology	['Any structural anomaly of the posterior circulating artery (PCOM).']	后循环动脉形态异常	后循环动脉的任何结构异常 
HP:0031773	心血管系统异常,神经系统异常	Posterior communicating artery aneurysm	['A widening (ballooning) localized in the wall of the posterior communicating artery.']	后交通动脉瘤	位于后交通动脉上的隆起（气球状）
HP:0031774	心血管系统异常,神经系统异常	Posterior communicating artery infundibulum	A funnel-shaped symmetrical enlargement of the origin of the posterior communicating artery at its junction with the internal carotid artery.	后交通动脉漏斗状改变	交通动脉与颈内动脉起源连接处的漏斗状对称性均匀扩大
HP:0031775	眼部异常	Neurogenic strabismus	An ocular deviation caused by a palsy to one or more of the extraocular muscles or nerves supplying them.	神经源性斜视	由一种或多种眼外肌或者其支配神经麻痹引起的眼球偏斜。
HP:0031776	眼部异常	Cyclotropia	A form of manifest strabismus (heterotropia) in which the one eye is wheel rotated so that the upper end of its vertical axis is nasal (incyclotropia) or temporal (excyclotropia).	旋转斜视	一种显性斜视（显斜），一眼车轮状旋转，其眼轴的上端是鼻侧（内旋转斜视）或者颞侧（外旋转斜视）。
HP:0031777	眼部异常	Cyclophoria	A form of latent strabismus (heterophoria) in which the occluded eye wheel-rotates on dissociation.	旋转隐斜	一种隐匿性斜视（隐斜视），被遮盖的眼球在去遮盖时旋转。
HP:0031778	眼部异常	Incyclophoria	A type of cyclophoria (latent strabismus in which the occluded eye wheel-rotates on dissociation.) in which the upper poles of the globes are rotated inward (medially) to each other.	内旋转隐斜视	旋转斜视的一种类型（一只或两只眼睛围绕眼睛视轴旋转），眼球的上极彼此向内（中间）旋转。
HP:0031779	眼部异常	Excyclophoria	['A type of cyclophoria (latent strabismus in which the occluded eye wheel-rotates on dissociation.) in which the upper poles of the globes are rotated outward (laterally) to each other.']	外旋转隐斜视	旋转隐斜视的一种类型（潜伏性斜视，其中被遮盖的眼球在去遮盖时旋转），眼球的上极彼此向外（横向）旋转
HP:0031780	消化系统异常	Eosinophilic ascites	A type of ascites in which there are large numbers of eosinophils in the ascitis fluid.	嗜酸性粒细胞性腹水	是一种含有大量嗜酸性粒细胞的腹水
HP:0031781	眼部异常	Microtropia with identity	A type of microtropia with no manifest movement on cover test, the eccentric fixation point coinciding with the angle of ARC.	同一性微小斜视	一种微小斜视，在遮盖实验中无明显移位，偏心注视点与圆弧角一致。
HP:0031782	眼部异常	Microtropia without identity	A type of microtropia in which the manifest movement is demonstrated on the cover-uncover test.	非同一性微小斜视	微小斜视中的一种类型，在遮盖-去遮盖实验中表现出明显位移。
HP:0031783	心血管系统异常	Absent coronary sinus	A developmental defect in which the coronary sinus fails to form.	冠状静脉窦缺失	发育缺陷，未形成冠状静脉窦
HP:0031784	心血管系统异常	Abnormal ascending aorta morphology	Any structural anomaly of the portion of the aorta that arises from the base of the left ventricle and extends upward to the aortic arch and from which the coronary arteries arise.	升主动脉畸形	主动脉起源于左心室底部并向上延伸到主动脉弓的部分称为升主动脉，也是冠状动脉的起源。升主动脉任何部分的结构异常称为升主动脉畸形
HP:0031785	眼部异常	Abnormal eyelid movement	['An abnormality in voluntary or involuntary eyelid movements or their control.']	眼睑异常运动 	主动或者被动眼睑运动异常。
HP:0031786	眼部异常	Cogan lid twitch	Transient eyelid retraction during refixation from down to straight ahead.	cogan眼睑抽搐	在眼球从下转为直视时出现的暂时性眼退缩。
HP:0031787	眼部异常	Oblique astigmatism	Astigmatism in which the refractive power of the vertical meridian is the greatest.	斜轴散光	垂直径线的屈光力最大的散光。
HP:0031788	眼部异常	With the rule astigmatism	Refractive error in which the vertical meridian is relatively hypermetropic and the horizontal meridian is relatively myopic (or ocular astigmatism in which the refractive power of the horizontal meridian is the greatest).	顺规散光	垂直径线相对远视，水平径线相对近视的（或水平经线的屈光力最大的眼散光）的一种屈光不正。
HP:0031789	眼部异常	Against the rule astigmatism	['Astigmatism with more plus power on the horizontal meridian.']	逆规散光	水平径线为最大屈光力子午线的散光。
HP:0031790	眼部异常	Mixed astigmatism	A type of astigmatism in which an unequal curvature of the cornea and some cases additionally of the lens causes one meridian of the eye to be hyperopic (farsighted) and a second meridian that is perpendicular to the first to be myopic (nearsighted).	混合散光	一种散光类型，角膜的曲率不等以及晶状体影响同时存在，导致眼睛的一条子午线是远视，垂直于该子午线的另一条子午线是近视。
HP:0031791	眼部异常	Lenticular astigmatism	['A type of astigmatism related to an irregular shape of the lens.']	晶状体性散光	与晶状体形状不规则相关的一种散光
HP:0031792	眼部异常	Irregular astigmatism	['A type of astigmatism in which the principle meridians are not 90 degrees apart and which is associated with loss of vision.']	不规则散光	两条主子午线夹角不等于90度的一种散光，与视力丧失有关。
HP:0031793	内分泌系统异常	Increased serum leptin	An increased concentration of leptin in the blood.	血清瘦素增加	血液中瘦素浓度的增加
HP:0031794	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Decreased circulating glycerol level	['A decrease below the normal concentration of glycerol in the blood.']	循环甘油水平降低	血液中甘油浓度低于正常水平
HP:0031795	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Abnormal circulating glycerol level	['Any deviation from the normal concentration of glycerol in the blood.']	循环甘油水平异常	血液中甘油浓度不在正常范围内。
HP:0031798	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Elevated apolipoprotein B level	Increased circulating level of apolipoprotein B, which is the main apolipoprotein of chylomicrons and low density lipoproteins. Defects in this gene are associated with HDL deficiencies, including Tangier disease.	载脂蛋白AI水平降低	载脂蛋白AI水平降低。载脂蛋白AI是血浆中高密度脂蛋白（HDL）的主要蛋白成分 。载脂蛋白AI基因缺陷可造成HDL缺乏，包括Tangier病。

The mutation promotes the polymerization of the HbS under conditions of low oxygen concentration. HbS can be identified by multiple methodologies including hemoglobin electrophoresis and high-performance liquid chromatography.	血红蛋白HbS	存在异常类型的血红蛋白，其特征在于通过缬氨酸（镰状细胞病的突变致病）在起始甲硫氨酸残基之后第7位置换谷氨酸残基。 该突变在低氧浓度的条件下促进HbS的聚合。 HbS可以通过多种方法鉴定，包括血红蛋白电泳和高效液相色谱。
