HP:0100001	肿瘤	Malignant mesothelioma	Malignant mesothelioma is a form of cancer that originates from the cells of the mesothelium, a thin tissue layer surrounding the body&#39;s internal organs. Malignant mesothelioma is almost exclusively caused by asbestos exposure, pleural mesothelioma being the most common form, affecting the lining of the lungs called the pleura. Other forms such as perioneal-, percardial- or testicular- mesothelioma are much rarer.	恶性间皮瘤	恶性间皮瘤起源于间皮细胞，即一层包绕人体内脏的薄层组织。恶性间皮瘤的发生几乎都与石棉的暴露接触有关，胸膜间皮瘤是最常见的形式，发生于胸膜组织。其他还有发生于腹膜、心包以及睾丸的间皮瘤，后者更为少见。
HP:0100002	肿瘤,呼吸系统异常	Pleural mesothelioma	A `Malignant mesothelioma` (HP:0100001) originating from cells of the pleura (the thin layer of mesothelium lining the lungs). Pleural mesothelioma is the most common form of mesothelioma.	胸膜间皮瘤	起源于胸膜细胞的恶性间皮瘤（胸膜是衬于肺外围的薄层间皮）。胸膜间皮瘤是间皮瘤的最常见形式。
HP:0100003	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Peritoneal mesothelioma	A `Malignant mesothelioma` (HP:0100001) originating from cells of the peritoneum (the thin layer of mesothelium lining the abdomen). Peritoneal mesothelioma is the second most common form of mesothelioma after pleural mesothelioma.	腹膜间皮瘤	一种起源于腹膜细胞（腹部的薄层间皮）的恶性间皮瘤。是仅次于胸膜间皮瘤的第二常见的间皮瘤形式。
HP:0100004	肿瘤,心血管系统异常	Pericardial mesothelioma	A `Malignant mesothelioma` (HP:0100001) originating from cells of the pericardium (the thin layer of mesothelium lining the heart).	心包间皮瘤	源于心包细胞（间皮薄层衬的心脏）的“恶性间皮瘤”（HP:0100001）。
HP:0100005	肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	Testicular mesothelioma	A `Malignant mesothelioma` (HP:0100001) of the `testis` (FMA:7210).	睾丸间皮瘤	睾丸形成恶性间皮瘤。
HP:0100006	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Neoplasm of the central nervous system	A `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `central nervous system` (FMA:55675).	中枢神经系统的肿瘤	中枢神经系统（FMA:55675）的肿瘤（MPATH:218)。
HP:0100007	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Neoplasm of the peripheral nervous system	A benign or malignant `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) of the `peripheral nervous system` (FMA:9903).	周围神经系统的肿瘤	在周围神经系统（FMA:9903）的良性或恶性肿瘤（MPATH:218）。
HP:0100008	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Schwannoma	A benign nerve sheath tumor composed of Schwann cells.	神经鞘瘤	由雪旺细胞形成的良性神经鞘瘤。
HP:0100009	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Intracranial meningioma	#####	颅内脑膜瘤	#####
HP:0100010	肿瘤,神经系统异常	Spinal meningioma	#####	脊膜瘤	#####
HP:0100011	肿瘤,神经系统异常,眼部异常	Scleral schwannoma	schwannoma on the Scleral	巩膜神经鞘瘤	巩膜上发生的神经鞘瘤
HP:0100012	肿瘤,眼部异常	Neoplasm of the eye	The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the eye.	眼肿瘤	眼睛的一个异常新生物（MPATH:218）。
HP:0100013	肿瘤,乳房异常	Neoplasm of the breast	A `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `breast` (FMA:9601).	乳腺肿瘤	在乳房（FMA:9601）发生的肿瘤（MPATH：218）。
HP:0100014	眼部异常	Epiretinal membrane	An epiretinal membrane is a thin sheet of fibrous tissue that can develop on the surface of the macular area of the retina and cause a disturbance in vision. An epiretinal membrane area can develop on the thin macular area of the retin. An epiretinal membrane is also sometimes called a macular pucker, premacular fibrosis, surface wrinkling retinopathy or cellophane maculopathy.	视网膜前膜	视网膜前膜是一种薄片状的纤维组织，可以发生在视网膜黄斑部表面，并引起视力下降。视网膜前膜可发生于黄斑区小范围内。前膜有时也被称为黄斑皱褶，黄斑前纤维化，表面起皱性视网膜病或黄斑病玻璃纸。
HP:0100015	耳部异常	Stahl ear	The presence of a `supernumerary` (PATO:0002002), i.e. third, `crus of the helix (FMA:61024) in the `helix` (FMA:60992), arising at or above the normal bifurcation of the antihelix.	猿耳畸形施塔尔耳	出现“额外”(PATO:0002002)的耳轮脚(FMA:61024，即第三个耳轮脚，位于对耳轮正常分岔处或分岔处上方。
HP:0100016	消化系统异常	Abnormality of the mesentery	Folds of membranous tissue (peritoneum, mesothelium) attached to the wall of the abdomen and enclosing viscera. Examples include the mesentery for the small intestine; the transverse mesocolon, which attaches the transverse portion of the colon to the back wall of the abdomen; and the mesosigmoid, which enfolds the sigmoid portion of the colon. Cells of the same embryologic origin also surround the other organs of the body such as the lungs (pleura) or the heart (pericardium).	肠系膜异常	附着于腹壁及其包裹的内脏之间的膜状组织（腹膜，间皮）的反折。包括小肠肠系膜、连接横结肠和腹后壁的结肠系膜、包裹结肠乙状弯曲部分的乙状结肠系膜。相同胚胎起源的细胞也环绕身体的其他器官，如肺（胸膜）或心脏（心包膜）。
HP:0100017	眼部异常	Capsular cataract	A cataract that affects the `capsule of the lens` (FMA:58881).	囊膜型白内障	白内障的一种，主要影响晶状体的（FMA:58881）囊膜。
HP:0100018	眼部异常	Nuclear cataract	A nuclear cataract is an opacity or clouding that develops in the `lens nucleus` (FMA:58971). That is, a nuclear cataract is one that is located in the center of the lens. The nucleus tends to darken changing from clear to yellow and sometimes brown.	核性白内障	核性白内障是指晶状体核的混浊。也就是说，核性白内障发生于晶状体的中心。细胞核变暗，由清晰变为黄色，有时变为棕褐色。
HP:0100019	眼部异常	Cortical cataract	A cataract which affects the layer of the lens surrounding the nucleus, i.e., the `lens cortex` (FMA:58970). It is identified by its unique wedge or spoke appearance.	皮质性白内障	白内障的一种，主要影响晶状体核周围的核皮质（FMA:58970）。通常形成独特的楔形或辐条的外观。
HP:0100020	眼部异常	Posterior capsular cataract	A cataract which is found in the back outer layer of the lens. This type often develops more rapidly.	后囊型白内障	在晶状体后囊部发生的一种白内障。这种类型病程进展更快。
HP:0100021	神经系统异常	Cerebral palsy	Cerebral palsy describes a group of permanent disorders of the development of movement and posture, causing activity limitation, that are attributed to nonprogressive disturbances that occurred in the developing fetal or infant brain. The motor disorders of cerebral palsy are often accompanied by disturbances of sensation, perception, cognition, communication, and behaviour, by epilepsy, and by secondary musculoskeletal problems.	脑瘫	脑瘫是指一组持久的运动和姿势发育障碍,造成活动受限,被认为是胎儿或婴儿的大脑发育尚未成熟阶段遭受非进行性脑损伤所致。脑瘫的运动障碍常伴有感觉、知觉、认知、交流和行为障碍，癫痫及继发性骨骼肌系统的问题。
HP:0100022	神经系统异常	Abnormality of movement	An abnormality of movement with a neurological basis characterized by changes in coordination and speed of voluntary movements.	运动异常	有神经疾病基础的运动异常，以随意运动的协调和速度的改变为特征。
HP:0100023	神经系统异常	Recurrent hand flapping	A type of stereotypic behavior in which the affected individual repeatedly waves the hands up and down.	反复用手拍打	一种刻板的行为表现为受累个体重复双手不停的上和下。
HP:0100024	神经系统异常	Conspicuously happy disposition	An unusually happy aspect over time which can also may be observed during inappropriate situations that should be causing for example distress, fear or anger.	显着快乐的性格	异常快乐的面貌，久而久之，甚至在不恰当的情况下（例如悲痛，恐惧或愤怒）仍然可以观察到异常快乐的表情。
HP:0100025	神经系统异常	Overfriendliness	A form of hypersociability that presents as mostly inappropriate people-orientation and friendliness towards others on an inadequate level which might go as far as being dangerous considering for example young children following strangers without restriction.	过度友善	过度友善是表现为不恰当的、不合时宜的对他人过度友善，这有可能导致危险的行为，如幼儿可能会不受任何约束的与陌生人离开
HP:0100026	心血管系统异常	Arteriovenous malformation	An anomalous configuration of blood vessels that shunts arterial blood directly into veins without passing through the capillaries.	动静脉畸形	血管结构异常造成动脉血不经毛细血管直接进入静脉。
HP:0100027	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Recurrent pancreatitis	A `recurrent` (PATO:0000427) form of `pancreatitis` (HP:0001733).	复发性胰腺炎	复发形式的胰腺炎。
HP:0100028	内分泌系统异常	Ectopic thyroid	"Mislocalised" (PATO:0000628) "thyroid gland" (FMA:9603).	异位甲状腺	甲状腺位置异常。
HP:0100029	内分泌系统异常	Lingual thyroid	An aberrant thyroid gland or "Ectopic thyroid" (HP:0100028) located at the base of the tongue (FMA:54645), just posterior to the foramen cecum as a result of a failure of the thyroid to descend.	舌部甲状腺	异位的甲状腺(HP:0100028)，位于舌根，在舌盲孔的后面，是由于发育过程中甲状腺未能下降导致。
HP:0100030	内分泌系统异常	Accessory ectopic thyroid tissue	Accessory ectopic thyroid tissue arising from remnants of the thyroglossal duct anywhere along the path of the thyroglossal duct tract.	异位的副甲状腺组织	异位的副甲状腺组织可来自于沿甲状舌管路径的任何地方的甲状舌管残余。
HP:0100031	肿瘤,内分泌系统异常	Neoplasm of the thyroid gland	The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `thyroid gland` (FMA:9603).	甲状腺肿瘤	甲状腺肿瘤
HP:0100033	神经系统异常	Tics	A tic is a sudden, repetitive, nonrhythmic, stereotyped motor movement or vocalization involving discrete muscle groups.	抽动症	抽搐是突然的，重复的，非节律性，刻板的运动或发声，常累及不同的肌群。
HP:0100034	神经系统异常	Motor tics	Movement-based tics affecting discrete muscle groups.	运动抽动	影响个别肌群的运动抽动。
HP:0100035	神经系统异常	Phonic tics	Involuntary sounds produced by moving air through the nose, mouth, or throat. The vocal cords are not involved in all tics that produce sound.	声音抽搐	产经鼻腔，口腔或咽喉空气流动时的非自主的声音。声带不参与的发声抽动。
HP:0100036	骨骼系统异常	Pseudo-fractures	A band of bone material of decreased density forming alongside the surface of the cortical bone with thickening of the periosteum. Callus formation in the affected area is common and gives the appearance of a false fracture.	假骨折	骨上一条密度降低的带，沿着表面骨膜增厚的皮质骨形成。受影响的区域是常形成胼胝（老茧），并表现出假骨折的外观。
HP:0100037	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Abnormality of the scalp hair	An abnormality of the `hair of head` (FMA:54241).	头皮毛发异常	头皮的毛发异常。
HP:0100038	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Slow-growing scalp hair	Scalp hair whose growth is slower than normal.	头发生长缓慢	头皮毛发的生长比正常情况下慢。
HP:0100039	骨骼系统异常	Thickened cortex of bones	An `Abnormality of cortical bone` (HP:0003103) leading to an abnormal thickness of the cortex of affected bones.	骨皮质增厚	骨皮质异常，导致受累的骨皮质的异常增厚。
HP:0100040	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad 2nd toe	A broad appearance of the second toe.	第二趾变宽	第二趾变宽的表现。
HP:0100041	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad 3rd toe	A broad appearance of the `third toe`(FMA:25051).	第三趾变宽	第三趾变宽的表现（FMA:25051）。
HP:0100042	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad 4th toe	A broad appearance of the fourth toe.	第四趾变宽	第四趾变宽的表现。
HP:0100043	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Broad 5th toe	A broad appearance of the fifth toe.	第五趾变宽	第五趾变宽的表现。

HP:0100050	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ivory epiphyses of the 2nd toe	Epiphyses of the 2nd toe are hard and dense like ivory. Such an epiphysis has a uniformly dense appearance on radiographs.	第二趾乳白色骨骺	第二趾骨骺硬而致密，像象牙一样。这样的骨骺在X光片具有均匀高密度。

HP:0100238	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Synostosis involving bones of the upper limbs	An abnormal union between bones or parts of bones of the upper limbs.	累及上肢骨骼的骨性连合	上肢骨骼或骨骼的一部分之间的不正常连合。
HP:0100240	骨骼系统异常	Synostosis of joints	The abnormal fusion of neighboring bones across a joint.	关节骨性联接	关节间相邻骨骼的异常融合。
HP:0100241	肢体异常,呼吸系统异常	Ectopic respiratory mucosa	Ectopic respiratory epithelium presenting as a superficial lesion in the skin usually localised unilateral in the skin of the forearm and associated with ipsilateral hand malformations.	呼吸道黏膜异位	呼吸道上皮异位表现为皮肤上的浅层病变，通常位于单侧前臂的皮肤，与同侧手畸形相关。
HP:0100242	肿瘤	Sarcoma	The presence of a `sarcoma` (MPATH:551).	肉瘤	一个`肉瘤`（MPATH:551）。
HP:0100243	肿瘤	Leiomyosarcoma	A smooth muscle connective tissue tumor, which is rare type of cancer that is a malignant neoplasm of smooth muscle. When such a neoplasm is benign, it is called a leiomyoma.	平滑肌肉瘤	平滑肌结缔组织肿瘤，是一种少见的发生于平滑肌的恶性肿瘤，当这种肿瘤为良性时则称为平滑肌瘤。
HP:0100244	肿瘤	Fibrosarcoma	A fibroblastic sarcoma is a malignant tumor derived from fibrous connective tissue and characterized by immature proliferating fibroblasts or undifferentiated anaplastic spindle cells.	纤维肉瘤	纤维母细胞肉瘤是起源于纤维结缔组织增生的恶性肿瘤，以未成熟或未分化的梭形细胞增生的成纤维细胞为特征。
HP:0100245	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Desmoid tumors	Benign, slow-growing tumors without any metastatic potential. Despite their benign nature, they can damage nearby structures causing organ dysfunction. Histologically they resemble low-grade fibrosarcomas, but they are very locally aggressive and tend to recur even after complete resection. There is a tendency for recurrence in the setting of prior surgery and the most common localisation of these tumors is intraabdominal from smooth muscle cells of the instestine.	硬性纤维瘤	良性的，生长缓慢的肿瘤，没有任何转移潜能。尽管具有良性属性，它们能损害周围结构从而引起器官功能障碍。组织学上，它们与低度恶性纤维肉瘤类似，但它们仅限于原位侵袭且即使是完全切除后也易于复发。这些肿瘤在经过手术的情况下亦有复发的趋势，最常见于腹内肠道平滑肌细胞。
HP:0100246	肿瘤,骨骼系统异常	Osteoma	Osteomas are bony growths found most commonly on the skull and mandible; however, they may occur in any bone of the body. Osteomas do not usually cause clinical problems and do not become malignant.	骨瘤	骨瘤是最常见于头骨和下颌骨的骨生长;然而，它们可能发生在身体的任何骨。骨瘤通常不会引起临床问题，不要变成恶性的。
HP:0100247	呼吸系统异常	Recurrent singultus	A contraction of the diaphragm that repeats several times per minute. In humans, the abrupt rush of air into the lungs causes the epiglottis to close, creating a hic sound. Also known as synchronous diaphragmatic flutter (SDF), or singultus, from the Latin singult, the act of catching one&#39;s breath while sobbing. The hiccup is an involuntary action involving a reflex arc.	反复性嗝逆	每分钟重复几次的横膈膜挛缩。在人类，空气突然冲入肺中引起会厌关闭，发出打嗝的声音。也称为同步膈膜颤振，或呃逆，来自拉丁语singult（抽泣时喘气的行为）。打嗝是反射弧参与的不自主动作。
HP:0100248	神经系统异常	Hemiballismus	Hemiballismus is a rare movement disorder that is caused primarily by damage to various areas in the `basal ganglia` (FMA:84013). Hemiballismus is usually characterized by involuntary flinging motions of the extremities. The movements are often violent and have wide amplitudes of motion. They are continuous and random and can involve proximal and/or distal muscles on one side of the body, while some cases even include the facial muscles. The more a patient is active, the more the movements increase. With relaxation comes a decrease in movements.	偏侧投掷	偏身投掷是主一种基底节不同区域损害（FMA:84013）造成的罕见的运动障碍。 偏身投掷的特点通常是肢体不自主的投掷样运动。这些运动往往是大幅度的、剧烈的。它们可以是连续的，随机的，累及一侧身体的近端和/或远端，某些情况下甚至累及面部肌肉。患者越是活动，运动越是明显；随着放松，运动减弱。
HP:0100249	肌肉组织异常,骨骼系统异常	Calcification of muscles	Deposition of calcium salts in muscle tissue.	肌肉钙化	钙盐肌肉组织中沉积。
HP:0100250	神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常	Meningeal calcification	`Calcium deposition` (MPATH:36) affecting the `Meninges` (FMA:231572).	脑膜钙化	累及脑膜（FMA:231572）的钙沉积(MPATH:36)。
HP:0100251	肿瘤,神经系统异常,结缔组织异常	Lipomas of the central neryous system	#####	中枢神经系统脂肪瘤	#####
HP:0100252	骨骼系统异常	Diaphyseal dysplasia	#####	骨干发育不良	#####
HP:0100253	骨骼系统异常	Abnormality of the medullary cavity of the long bones	An abnormality of the medullary cavity (medulla, innermost part), which is the central cavity of bone shafts where red bone marrow and/or yellow bone marrow (adipose tissue) is stored.	长骨髓腔异常	髓腔（髓质，最内部分）异常，髓腔是骨轴的中央腔，其中充满红骨髓和/或黄色的骨髓（脂肪组织）。
HP:0100254	骨骼系统异常	Stenosis of the medullary cavity of the long bones	#####	长骨髓腔狭窄	#####
HP:0100255	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Metaphyseal dysplasia	The presence of dysplastic regions in metaphyseal bones.	干骺端发育不良	干骺端骨存在发育不良的区域。
HP:0100256	神经系统异常	Senile plaques	Senile plaques are extracellular deposits of amyloid in the gray matter of the brain.	老年斑	老年斑是大脑灰质内的细胞外类淀粉样蛋白沉积。
HP:0100257	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Ectrodactyly	A condition in which middle parts of the hands and/or feet (digits and meta-carpals and -tarsals) are missing giving a cleft appearance. The severity is very variable ranging from slightly hypoplastic 3rd toe/fingers over absent 2nd or 3rd toes/fingers as far as oligo- or monodactyl hands and/or feet.	缺趾/指畸形	一种手和/或脚（指/趾、掌骨和跗骨）之间部分缺失裂开的表现。其严重程度具有可变性，从第三趾/指轻微发育不全，到第二或第三趾/指缺如，甚至寡爪或单爪的手和/或脚。
HP:0100258	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Preaxial polydactyly	A form of polydactyly in which the extra digit or digits are localized on the side of the thumb or great toe.	轴前多指（趾）畸形	多指（趾）的一种形式，其中额外的指（趾）位于拇指或大脚趾的一侧。
HP:0100259	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Postaxial polydactyly	A form of polydactyly in which the extra digit or digits are localized on the side of the fifth finger or fifth toe.	轴后多指（趾）畸形	多指（趾）的一种形式，其中额外的指（趾）位于第五指/趾的一侧。
HP:0100260	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Mesoaxial polydactyly	The presence of a supernumerary finger or toe (not a thumb or hallux) involving the third or fourth metacarpal/tarsal with associated osseous syndactyly.	轴间多指（趾）畸形	一个额外手指或脚趾（非拇指或拇趾），累及相关骨性并指的第三或第四掌骨。
HP:0100261	骨骼系统异常	Abnormal tendon morphology	An abnormal structure or form of any tendon.	肌腱形态异常	肌腱结构或形式的异常。
HP:0100262	骨骼系统异常	Synostosis involving digits	#####	累及指/趾的骨性联接	#####
HP:0100263	骨骼系统异常	Distal symphalangism	#####	远端指关节粘连	#####
HP:0100264	骨骼系统异常	Proximal symphalangism	#####	近端指关节粘连	#####
HP:0100265	骨骼系统异常	Synostosis of metacarpals/metatarsals	#####	掌骨（跖骨）的骨性联接	#####
HP:0100266	骨骼系统异常	Synostosis of carpals/tarsals	The carpus consists of the scaphoid, lunate, triquetal, pisiform, captitate, hamate, trapezoid, and trapezium bones. The tarsus consists of the talus, calcaneus, navicular, cuboid, cuneiform, and navicular bones. This term applies if there is any fusion among the bones of the carpus or tarsus.	腕骨（跗骨）的骨性联接	腕骨由舟状骨、月骨、三角骨、豆状骨、头状骨、钩骨、小多角骨和大多角骨构成。跗骨包括距骨、跟骨、舟状骨、骰骨、楔状骨和舟形骨。如果腕骨和跗骨间发生任何骨融合的，应用此术语。
HP:0100267	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Lip pit	A depression located on a lip.	唇点凹	嘴唇上的小凹陷。
HP:0100268	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Upper lip pit	Depression located on the vermilion of the upper lip, usually paramedian.	上唇点凹	上唇唇红中线处两旁形成的凹陷。
HP:0100269	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Paramedian lip pit	Depression located paramedially on the vermilion of a lip.	正中旁唇点凹	上嘴唇的唇红正中旁的凹陷。
HP:0100270	肢体异常	Abnormality of dorsoventral patterning of the limbs	An abnormality resulting from a defect or disruption of dorsoventral patterning that normally happens during early development of the limbs. A disruption of the normal development of the dorsoventral axis may lead to a variable spectrum of different phenotypic abnormalities that may affect the nails and or palmar and dorsal side of the hands and/or feet, ultimately changing the normal dorsoventral appearance of the affected limbs.	四肢背腹模式异常	因四肢早期发育过程中形成背腹模式发生缺陷或破坏造成的异常。背腹轴的正常发展的破坏可能导致不同表型异常，可能影响指甲和/或手掌、手和/或脚的背侧，最终导致受累肢体正常背腹侧外观的改变。
HP:0100271	声音异常	Hyponasal speech	Hyponasal speech is when there is an abnormally reduced nasal airflow during speech often in a setting of nasal obstruction or congestion.	鼻音低	讲话时通过鼻腔的气流减弱，这种异常发音通常是由于各种原因所致的鼻腔梗塞，气流受阻。
HP:0100272	头部和颈部的异常	Branchial sinus	A congenital branchial sinus is a remnant of the embryonic branchial arches and their intervening clefts and pouches that has failed to regress completely. Sinuses typically have their external orifice inferior to the ramus of the mandible. They may traverse the parotid gland, and run in close vicinity to the facial nerve in the external auditory canal.	鳃窦	先天性腮窦是胚胎鳃弓及其中间开裂和口袋未能完全消退的残余。窦外口一般有低于下颌骨升支。他们可能会穿遍腮腺，并在外耳道里紧挨面神经并行。
HP:0100273	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Neoplasm of the colon	#####	结肠新生物	#####
HP:0100274	神经系统异常,眼部异常	Gustatory lacrimation	Gustatory lacrimation results from an aberrant innervation of fibres from the seventh cranial nerve to the pterygopalatine ganglion which are destined originally for the submandibular ganglion. This aberrant innervation leads to uncontrollable tearing while eating or in anticipation of a meal.	味觉流泪	味觉流泪源于第七对脑神经原先支配颌下神经节的纤维异位支配翼腭神经节。这种异常的神经支配导致吃饭时或想到美餐时无法控制的流泪。
HP:0100275	神经系统异常	Diffuse cerebellar atrophy	Diffuse unlocalised atrophy affecting the cerebellum.	弥漫性小脑萎缩	小脑弥漫非局灶性萎缩。
HP:0100276	体壁的异常	Skin pits	#####	皮肤凹点	#####
HP:0100277	头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Periauricular skin pits	Benign congenital lesions of the periauricular soft tissue consisting of a blind-ending narrow tube or pit.	耳周皮肤点凹	耳周软组织的良性先天性病变，包括狭窄的盲管或凹陷。
HP:0100279	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Ulcerative colitis	A chronic inflammatory bowel disease that includes characteristic ulcers, or open sores, in the colon. The main symptom of active disease is usually constant diarrhea mixed with blood, of gradual onset and intermittent periods of exacerbated symptoms contrasting with periods that are relatively symptom-free. In contrast to Crohn&#39;s disease this special form of colitis begins in the distal parts of the rectum, spreads continually upwards and affects only mucose and submucose tissue of the colon.	溃疡性结肠炎	一种慢性炎性肠病，包括结肠部位特征性的溃疡或破损。活动性疾病的主要症状通常包括带血的腹泻，与无症状期相比症状渐进性发作，周期性加重。与克罗恩病相比，这种特殊形式的结肠炎始于直肠的远端，连续向上扩展，且只累及结肠的粘膜层和粘膜下层组织。
HP:0100280	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Crohn&#39;s disease	A chronic granulomatous inflammatory disease of the intestines that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms. It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea which may be bloody, vomiting, or weight loss, but may also cause complications outside of the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes, arthritis, inflammation of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration. Crohn&#39;s disease is thought to be an autoimmune disease, in which the body&#39;s immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract, causing inflammation.	Crohn&#39;s 病	肠道的一种慢性肉芽肿炎症疾病，可能累及从口到肛门的消化道的任何部分，引起多种症状。该病主要引起腹痛、腹泻（可能是血性）、呕吐或体重减轻，但也可能引起肠道外的并发症，如皮疹、关节炎、眼部炎症、疲倦、注意力不集中。克罗恩病被认为是一种自身免疫性疾病，由身体的免疫系统攻击胃肠道而引起炎症。
HP:0100281	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Chronic colitis	A chronic inflammatory disease of the large intestine (colon, cecum and rectum).	慢性结肠炎	大肠（结肠、盲肠和直肠）的一种慢性炎症性疾病。
HP:0100282	消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	Acute colitis	An acute and self-limited inflammatory disease of the large intestine (colon, cecum and rectum).	急性结肠炎	大肠（包括结肠，盲肠和直肠）的一种急性和自限性的炎症性疾病。
HP:0100283	肌肉组织异常	EMG: continuous motor unit activity at rest	Continuous electromyographic activity of motor units at rest, i.e., without voluntary movement of the muscles.	EMG:休息中持续的运动单位活动	在休息中，运动单位持续的肌电活动，即无意识的肌肉运动。
HP:0100284	肌肉组织异常	EMG: myotonic discharges	High frequency discharges in electromyography (EMG) that vary in amplitude and frequency, waxing and waning continuously with firing frequencies ranging from 150/second down to 20/second and producing a sound that has been referred to as a dive bomber sound.	肌电图:肌强直性放电	肌电图出现不同振幅和频率的高频放电，产生150/s至20/s的频率波动，并会产生俯冲轰炸机样声音。
HP:0100285	肌肉组织异常	EMG: impaired neuromuscular transmission	An electromyographic finding associated with erratic or absent neuromuscular transmission with erratic, moment-to-moment changes in the shape of the motor unit potential (MUP).	肌电图:神经肌肉接头传递受损	肌电图提示不稳定或无神经肌肉传递伴不稳定的、形状时刻变化的运动单位电位（MUP）。
HP:0100287	肌肉组织异常	EMG: slow motor conduction	The presence of reduced conduction velocity of motor nerves on electromyography.	肌电图:运动传导慢	肌电图提示运动神经上肌电传导速度减小。
HP:0100288	肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	EMG: myokymic discharges	The presence of spontaneous bursts of rapidly firing potentials that recur at regular intervals of 2-10 per second and are unaffected by voluntary effort. This is an electromyographic (EMG) finding.	肌电图:肌纤维颤搐放电	肌电图（EMG）显示以2-10次/秒的频率快速重复出现的自发性放电，不受意识控制。
HP:0100289	眼部异常	Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials	Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials	图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常	图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常。

HP:0100462	肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	Patchy sclerosis of the middle phalanx of the 4th toe	Uneven increase in bone density of the middle phalanx of the fourth toe. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	第四脚趾中节趾骨斑片状骨硬化	第四脚趾的中间指骨骨密度不均匀增加。根据其严重性和分布可在X线上表现为多种形式。

HP:0100570	肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	Carcinoid	A tumor formed from the endocrine (argentaffin) cells of the mucosal lining of a variety of organs including the stomach and intestine. These cells are from neuroectodermal origin.	类癌	由各种器官如胃和肠的粘膜内层的内分泌（嗜银）细胞形成的肿瘤。这些细胞来源于神经外胚层。
HP:0100571	心血管系统异常	Cardiac diverticulum	A cardiac diverticulum is a rare congential malformation which is either fibrous or muscular.	心脏憩室	一种罕见的先天性心脏畸形，可以是纤维性或肌肉性的。
HP:0100572	心血管系统异常	Fibrous cardiac diverticulum	A fibrous cardiac diverticulum refers to an aneurysm and usually appears as an isolated congenital anomaly.	纤维性心脏憩室	纤维性心脏憩室涉及动脉瘤，通常表现为单独的先天性异常。
HP:0100573	心血管系统异常	Muscular cardiac diverticulum	A muscular appendix which usually emerges from the left ventricular apex with normal myocardial contraction and is frequently associated with other congenital anomalies.	肌性心脏憩室	多见于左心室尖部的肌性膨出，不影响心肌收缩功能，常合并于其他先天性心脏畸形。
HP:0100574	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Biliary tract neoplasm	A `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `biliary system` (FMA:79646).	胆管新生物	胆管系统的新生物。

HP:0100576	眼部异常	Amaurosis fugax	A transient visual disturbance that is typically caused by a circulatory, ocular or neurological underlying condition.	一时性黑蒙	这通常是由血液循环，眼部或神经系统异常引起的瞬态视觉异常。

HP:0100579	心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	Mucosal telangiectasiae	`Telangiectasia` (HP:0001009) of the mucosa, the mucous membranes which are involved in absorption and secretion that line cavities that are exposed to the external environment and internal organs.	粘膜毛细血管扩张	粘膜的毛细血管扩张，毛细血管网分布于粘膜表面，是外界环境与内脏进行吸收、分泌等物质交换的部位。
HP:0100580	肿瘤,消化系统异常	Barrett esophagus	An abnormal change (metaplasia) in the cells of the inferior portion of the esophagus. The normal squamous epithelium lining of the esophagus is replaced by metaplastic columnar epithelium. Columnar epithelium refers to a cell type that is typically found in more distal parts of the gastrointestinal system.	Barrett食管	食管下部细胞的一种异常改变（化生）。食管的正常鳞状上皮层被化生的柱状上皮层取代。柱状上皮是指一种通常被发现于胃肠系统更远端部分的细胞类型。
HP:0100581	泌尿生殖系统异常	Megacalicosis	A nonobstructive dilatation of the renal `major calices` (FMA:15613) due to malformation of the renal papillae.	巨肾盏	由于肾乳头畸形造成的主肾盏非阻塞性扩张。
HP:0100582	头部和颈部的异常	Nasal polyposis	Polypoidal masses arising mainly from the mucous membranes of the nose and paranasal sinuses. They are freely movable and nontender overgrowths of the mucosa that frequently accompany allergic rhinitis.	鼻息肉	主要从鼻子和鼻窦的粘膜产生的息肉状肿块，经常伴随过敏性鼻炎，是能自由移动且非触痛的粘膜过度生长。

HP:0100593	骨骼系统异常	Calcification of cartilage	#####	软骨钙化	#####
HP:0100594	消化系统异常	Esophageal web	Thin (2-3mm) membranes of normal esophageal tissue consisting of mucosa and submucosa that can be congenital or acquired. Congenital webs commonly appear in the middle and inferior third of the esophagus, and they are more likely to be circumferential with a central or eccentric orifice. Acquired webs are much more common than congenital webs and typically appear in the cervical area (postcricoid). Clinical symptoms of this condition are selective (solid more than liquids) dysphagia, thoracic pain, nasopharyngeal reflux, aspiration, perforation and food impaction (the last two are very rare).	食管蹼	先天性或获得性的由粘膜层和粘膜下层组成的正常食管组织形成的薄膜（2-3mm）。先天性蹼通常出现在食管中、下三分之一，更可能是一个中心或偏心开孔的环状结构。获得性蹼较先天性蹼更为常见，通常出现在颈部区域（环状软骨后）。这种情况的临床症状包括选择性吞咽困难（固体多于液体）、胸痛、鼻咽返流、误吸、穿孔和食物嵌塞（最后两个非常罕见）。
HP:0100595	骨骼系统异常	Camptocormia	An abnormal forward-flexed posture e.g. forward flexion of the spine, which is noticeable when standing or walking but disappears when lying down. It is becoming an increasingly recognized feature of Parkinson&#39;s disease and dystonic disorders.	驼背	脊椎不正常的向前弯曲的姿势，站立或行走时明显，但平躺时前倾前屈位消失。它逐渐成为确认帕金森氏病和肌张力障碍性疾病的特征。
HP:0100596	头部和颈部的异常	Absent nares	The nostrils (the paired channels of the nose) are not present.	无鼻孔	鼻孔（鼻子的成对通道）不存在。

HP:0100601	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Eclampsia	An acute and life-threatening complication of pregnancy, which is characterized by the appearance of tonic-clonic seizures, usually in a patient who had developed pre-eclampsia. Eclampsia includes seizures and coma that happen during pregnancy but are not due to preexisting or organic brain disorders.	子痫	一种急性的危及生命的妊娠并发症，通常发生在子痫前期的孕妇中，症状为抽搐、惊厥和昏迷，需排除已存或器质性的脑病。

HP:0100603	胎儿产前发育或出生异常	Toxemia of pregnancy	Pregnancy-induced toxic reactions of the mother that can be as harmless as slight `Maternal hypertension` (HP:0008071) or as life threatening as `Ecplamsia` (HP:0100601).	妊娠毒血症	母亲妊娠中毒反应，症状轻微者，表现为轻度妊娠高血压而对母亲可不产生危害，症状严重者可表现为威胁母体生命的子痫。

HP:0100647	内分泌系统异常	Graves disease	An autoimmune disease where the thyroid is overactive, producing an excessive amount of thyroid hormones (a serious metabolic imbalance known as hyperthyroidism and thyrotoxicosis). This is caused by autoantibodies to the TSH-receptor (TSHR-Ab) that activate that TSH-receptor (TSHR), thereby stimulating thyroid hormone synthesis and secretion, and thyroid growth (causing a diffusely enlarged goiter). The resulting state of hyperthyroidism can cause a dramatic constellation of neuropsychological and physical signs and symptoms, which can severely compromise the patients.	Graves病	一种自身免疫性疾病，甲状腺过度活跃，产生过量的甲状腺激素（导致严重代谢失衡，称为甲状腺功能亢进和甲状腺毒症）。这是由于抗TSH受体的自身抗体（TSHR-Ab）激活TSH受体（TSHR），从而刺激甲状腺激素合成和分泌以及甲状腺生长（导致弥漫性甲状腺肿）引起的。甲状腺功能亢进症可引起神经心理和生理症状和体征，会严重影响患者健康。

Type I diabetes mellitus is manifested by the sudden onset of severe hyperglycemia with rapid progression to diabetic ketoacidosis unless treated with insulin.	1型糖尿病	一种胰腺不产生或产生很少胰岛素的慢性病症。1型糖尿病发病突然，特点是严重的高血糖，若不使用胰岛素治疗，即迅速发展为糖尿病酮症酸中毒

The swelling can also occur elsewhere, typically in the hands. Angioedema is similar to urticaria, but the swelling is subcutaneous rather than on the epidermis.	血管性水肿	面部皮肤的真皮、皮下组织、粘膜和粘膜下组织的迅速肿胀（水肿），通常在几分钟到几个小时即可涉及口周、口腔和/或喉的粘膜以及舌头。肿胀也可能发生在其他地方，典型的是手部。血管性水肿类似于荨麻疹，但肿胀部位主要在皮下组织而非表皮。

HP:0100753	神经系统异常	Schizophrenia	A mental disorder characterized by a disintegration of thought processes and of emotional responsiveness. It most commonly manifests as auditory hallucinations, paranoid or bizarre delusions, or disorganized speech and thinking, and it is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction. The onset of symptoms typically occurs in young adulthood, with a global lifetime prevalence of about 0.3-0.7%.	精神分裂症	一种以思维过程和情感反应崩解为特点的精神类疾病。大部分表现为幻听、妄想或怪异的妄想，或杂乱无章的言论和思想，伴随着显著社会或职业功能障碍，全球发病率大约为0.3-0.7％。

If untreated this will lead to the development of scoliosis over time.	代偿性脊柱侧凸	侧凸是腿长存在差异的结果（这可能是由于腿的偏身肥大或偏身萎缩），并导致骨盆倾斜的结果。如果不治疗，这将随着时间的推移导致脊柱侧弯。

HP:0500009	神经系统异常	Dysplastic gangliocytoma of the cerebellum	It is a rare, slowly growing tumor of the cerebellum, a gangliocytoma sometimes considered to be a hamartoma, characterized by diffuse hypertrophy of the granular layer of the cerebellum.	小脑发育不良性神经节细胞瘤 	这是一种罕见的缓慢生长的小脑神经节细胞瘤肿瘤，有时被认为是错构瘤，以小脑颗粒层弥漫性肥大为特征。
HP:0500010	代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	Increased cholesterol esters	An elevated concentration of circulating cholesterol esters, which are fatty acid esters of cholesterol and make up about two-thirds of total plasma cholesterol.	胆固醇酯水平增高	循环胆固醇酯浓度增高，循环胆固醇酯是脂肪酸与胆固醇作用生成的酯，占血浆总胆固醇的2/3
HP:0500011	头部和颈部的异常	Moon facies	A rounded, puffy face with fat deposits in the temporal fossa and cheeks, a double chin.	满月脸	圆圆的浮肿的脸，脂肪沉积在颞窝和脸颊，双下巴。
HP:0500012	内分泌系统异常	Abnormality of gonadotropin-releasing hormone level	A deviation from the normal circulating concentration of the normal gonadotropin-releasing hormone level secreted from the pituitary gland.	促性腺激素释放激素水平异常	血液循环中由腺垂体分泌的促性腺激素释放激素水平偏离正常范围
HP:0500013	内分泌系统异常	Lack of gonadotropin-releasing hormone pulsatility	Secretion of gonadotropin-releasing hormone that does not occur in a pulsatile fashion.	促性腺激素释放激素脉冲缺失	促性腺激素释放激素的分泌不以脉冲方式发生
HP:0500021	神经系统异常	Reduced brain gamma-aminobutyric acid level by MRS	An decreased level of gamma-aminobutyric acid in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).	MRS分析大脑γ-氨基丁酸水平偏低	磁共振波谱（MRS）分析显示大脑γ-氨基丁酸水平偏低
HP:0500022	内分泌系统异常	Abnormal serum dehydroepiandrosterone level	A deviation from the normal concentration of dehydroepiandrosterone in the circulation.	血清脱氢表雄酮水平异常	循环中脱氢表雄酮浓度异常
HP:0500023	肢体异常,肌肉组织异常	Shoulder muscle aplasia	['Absence of shoulder muscles.']	肩肌发育不全	肩肌缺如
HP:0500024	肌肉组织异常	Aplasia of the musculature of the pelvis	['Absence of the musculature of the pelvis.']	骨盆肌发育不全	骨盆肌缺如
HP:0500026	肌肉组织异常	Hypoplasia of the musculature of the pelvis	['Underdevelopment of the musculature of the pelvis.']	骨盆肌发育不良	骨盆肌欠发育
HP:0500027	消化系统异常	Aplastic colon	['Congenital absence of the colon']	结肠发育不全	先天性结肠缺如
HP:0500028	神经系统异常	Cotton wool plaques	Deposition of large, diffuse cotton wool amyloid plaques (CWPs) lacking a dense core and associated neuritic changes.	棉絮斑	缺乏致密中心的淀粉样斑块，呈现出大片弥漫棉絮状沉积，与神经炎的改变有关。
HP:0500030	消化系统异常	Abnormal hepatic glycogen storage	Change in normal glycogen storage content.	异常肝糖原储积	正常糖原储存过程发生改变。
HP:0500031	骨骼系统异常	Sclerosis of the carpal bones	An elevation in bone density in one or more carpal bones of the hand.	腕骨硬化	手一块或多块腕骨密度增加。
HP:0500032	神经系统异常	Abnormal neuron branching	Abnormality of the structure and branching of the dendrites of a neuron.	神经元分枝异常 	神经元树突的结构与分支的异常 
HP:0500033	免疫系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	Abnormal natural killer subset distribution	['Any abnormality in the proportion natural killer subsets relative to the total number of natural killer cells.']	NK细胞亚群分布异常	在总的NK细胞中，NK细胞亚群的比例异常。
HP:0500034	头部和颈部的异常	Nasolacrimal sac obstruction	Blockage of the nasolacrimal sac.	鼻泪囊阻塞	鼻泪囊闭锁。
HP:0500035	头部和颈部的异常	Nasolacrimal sac granuloma	A mass of granulation tissue in response to chronic dacryocystitis as polypoid formations or they follow accidental injury, from probing and as a reaction to retained foreign bodies in the sac.	鼻泪囊肉芽肿	慢性泪囊炎引起的大量肉芽组织，如息肉样组织，或因探查而意外损伤以及对囊中残留异物的反应。
HP:0500036	头部和颈部的异常	Nasolacrimal sac papilloma	Benign tumor of the nasolacrimal sac.	鼻泪囊乳头状瘤	鼻泪囊良性肿瘤。
HP:0500037	头部和颈部的异常	Nasolacrimal sac epithelial papillary carcinoma	The malignant epithelial neoplasm with papillary growths in the nasolacrimal sac.	鼻泪囊上皮乳头状癌	在鼻泪囊中有乳头状增生的恶性上皮肿瘤。
HP:0500039	头部和颈部的异常	Conjunctival cicatrization	An abnormality of the conjuctiva and ocular surface caused by conjunctival inflammation and associated with scarring.	结膜粘连	结膜发炎引起的结膜和眼球表面异常，并与结膜瘢痕有关。
HP:0500040	头部和颈部的异常	Dermolipoma of the conjunctiva	A benign tumor composed of adipose tissue and dense connective tissue usually located near the temporal fornix.	结膜皮样脂肪瘤 	由脂肪组织和致密结缔组织组成的良性肿瘤，通常位于颞穹窿附近。
HP:0500041	眼部异常	Myopic astigmatism	A condition where one or both of the two principal meridians focus in the front of the retina when the eye is at rest.	近视散光	当眼睛在放松时，一个或两个主子午线聚焦在视网膜前的一种散光。
HP:0500042	眼部异常	Latent hypermetropia	['A term to describe when farsightedness is masked when the accommodative muscles are used to increase the focusing power of the eye.']	隐性远视	一种术语，用于描述当调节性肌肉作用，眼睛的聚焦能力提高而遮盖远视状态。
HP:0500043	头部和颈部的异常	Eyelid retraction	With the eyes in primary position, the sclera is visible above the superior corneal limbus.	眼睑挛缩	当眼睛自然睁开时，角膜缘上方的巩膜显露。
HP:0500044	头部和颈部的异常	Upper eyelid retraction	An elevation of the eyelid above the normal level in the primary position.	上眼睑孪缩	眼睑高度高于第一眼位正常水平。
HP:0500045	头部和颈部的异常	Collier's sign	A unilateral or bilateral eyelid retraction due to midbrain lesions.	Collier氏症	因中脑损伤而引起的单侧或双侧眼睑收缩。
HP:0500046	眼部异常,免疫系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Seborrhoeic blepharitis	Inflamation of the eyelid due to overactivity of the sebaceous gland.	脂溢性睑缘炎	皮脂腺过度活跃导致的眼睑发炎
HP:0500047	头部和颈部的异常	Nasolacrimal sac lymphoma	A type of lymphoma that involves the nasolacrimal sac.	鼻泪囊淋巴瘤	一种累及鼻泪囊的淋巴瘤。
HP:0500048	头部和颈部的异常	Delayed canalization of nasolacrimal duct	A very common condition in which the extreme end of the nasolacrimal duct underneath the inferior turbinate fails to complete its canalization in the newborn period.	鼻泪管开放延迟（闭锁）	一种非常常见的情况，在新生儿期鼻泪管的末端位于下鼻甲下面，无法完成它的通气。
HP:0500049	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity	An avascular or abnormally vascularized retina that occurs in premature infants and can lead to blindness.	早产儿视网膜病	一种发生于早产儿的视网膜无血管或血管形成异常性疾病，可致失明。
HP:0500050	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 1	The retinal vessels stop and then a linear flat white line is present that usually runs the circumference of the vascular retina.	早产儿视网膜病变1期	在有血管和无血管的视网膜交界处出现一条白色分界线。
HP:0500051	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 2	The accumulating neovascularization thickens and manifests as a linear bump. The neovascularization remains along the surface of the retina and does not extend off the retina into the cortical vitreous.	早产儿视网膜病变2期	新生血管停留于视网膜表面，累积变厚显现为线性隆起，未延伸至皮质玻璃体。
HP:0500052	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 3	The neovascularization accumulates at the edge of the vascularized retina and extends into the vitreous (also called extra retinal fibrosis proliferation). In cases of Zone 2 and Zone 3, this may be sausage shaped. In more posterior Zone 1 disease, the stage 3 can appear as a direct extension of the normal retinal vessels but extending tangentially over the avascular retina.	早产儿视网膜病变3期	新生血管在视网膜血管区边缘聚集，并延伸至玻璃体（也称视网膜外纤维增生）。在发生于2区和3区的病例中，形态呈香肠状。在多数后1区病例中，3期可表现为正常视网膜血管的直接延伸，但是在无血管的视网膜区呈间接延伸。
HP:0500053	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4	Scar tissue that forms a continuous sheet coming up from the edge of the vascularized retina. This scar tissue can grow toward the vitreous base/posterior lens capsule resulting in traction, distortion, and even detachment.	早产儿视网膜病变4期	疤痕组织从有血管的视网膜边缘形成一张连续的薄片，向玻璃体基底部/晶状体后囊生长，导致视网膜牵拉、扭转甚至脱落。
HP:0500054	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4a	A detachment that involves the peripheral retina that does not extend into the macula.	早产儿视网膜病变4a期	周边视网膜脱离，不涉及黄斑。
HP:0500055	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4b	A detachment that involves the peripheral retina that involves the macula itself. The detachment usually starts in the temporal periphery although can also involve the nasal retina as well.	早产儿视网膜病变4b期	周边视网膜脱离，涉及黄斑。脱离始于颞侧缘，但也可累积鼻侧视网膜。
HP:0500056	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5	Funnel detachment from the retina with generally traction in all four quadrants.	早产儿视网膜病变5期	在四个象限内均发生牵拉性视网膜漏斗状脱离。
HP:0500057	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5a	An open funnel detachment of the retina with generally traction in all four quadrants.	早产儿视网膜病变5a期	在四个象限的牵引下，一种开放的漏斗式视网膜脱离。
HP:0500058	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5b	A closed funnel detachment of the retina with generally traction in all four quadrants.	早产儿视网膜病变5b期	在四个象限的牵引下，一种闭合的漏斗式视网膜脱离。
HP:0500059	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity zone I	Retinopathy which extends from the center of the optic disc to twice the distance from the center of the optic disc to the center of the macula.	早产儿视网膜病变 I 区	视网膜病变范围以视盘为中心，视盘到黄斑2倍距离为半径的圆形区域。
HP:0500060	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity zone II	Retinopathy which extends centrifugally from the edge of zone I to the nasal ora serrata.	早产儿视网膜病变 II 区	视网膜病变从 I 区边缘延伸至鼻侧锯齿缘。
HP:0500061	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity zone III	Retinopathy which is a residual crescent of retina anterior to zone II.	早产儿视网膜病变 III 区	 II 区外围的新月形区域到距离颞侧锯齿缘。
HP:0500062	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity plus	Venous dilatation and arteriolar tortuosity of the posterior retinal vessels and may later increase in severity to include iris vascular engorgement, poor pupillary dilatation (rigid pupil), and vitreous haze. This definition has been further refined in the later clinical trials in which the diagnosis of plus disease could be made if sufficient vascular dilatation and tortuosity are present in at least 2 quadrants of the eye.	早产儿视网膜病附加病变	视网膜后极部至少2个象限出现视网膜血管扩张、迂曲,严重的附加病变还包括虹膜血管充血或扩张、瞳孔散大困难(瞳孔强直),玻璃体可有混浊。
HP:0500063	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity pre-plus	As vascular abnormalities of the posterior pole that are insufficient for the diagnosis of plus disease but that demonstrate more arterial tortuosity and more venous dilatation than normal.	早产儿视网膜病附加前病变	后极部血管异常，表现为较多动脉迂曲和静脉扩张，但不足以诊断为附加病变。
HP:0500064	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity threshold	A retinopathy with a 50% likelihood of progressing to retinal detachment. Threshold disease is considered to be present when stage 3 retinopathy of prematurity (ROP) is present in either zone I or zone II, with at least 5 continuous or 8 total clock hours of disease, and the presence of plus disease.	早产儿视网膜阈值病变	阈值病变表现在I区或Ⅱ区的3期+,相邻病变连续至少达连续5个钟点,或累积达8个钟点，有50%的可能进展为视网膜脱离。
HP:0500065	眼部异常	Retinopathy of prematurity prethreshold	High risk patients who were in Zone 1 (no Plus or stage 3) or Zone 2 with Plus or stage 3 but not both.	早产儿视网膜阈值前病变	高危病人具备I区病变（不伴附加病变或者3期病变同时具备），或发生于Ⅱ区合并附加病变，或者未达到阈值期的3期病变。
HP:0500066	眼部异常	Latent myopia	The difference between total and manifest myopia.	隐性近视	总近视和显性近视之间的差。
HP:0500069	头部和颈部的异常	Paralytic ectropion	A type of ectropion associated with orbicularis muscle weakness caused by cranial nerve VII palsy.	麻痹性睑外翻	一种由于颅神经VII麻痹引起的眼轮匝肌无力所致的睑外翻。
HP:0500070	头部和颈部的异常	Conjunctival dermolipoma	A conjuctival lesion composed of adipose tissue and dense connective tissue. Such choristomas of dermal elements are normally found at the outer canthus, and have a gelatinous appearance. Classically, there is an indistinct posterior border (with the lesion frequently extending into the orbit) and a well-demarcated anterior border several millimetres posterior to the limbus.	结膜皮样脂肪瘤 	由脂肪组织和致密结缔组织构成的结膜病变。这种真皮成分的绒毛通常出现在外眼角，具有胶状外观。典型的，有一个模糊的后缘(病变经常延伸到眼眶)和一个边界清晰的前缘，距离角膜缘几毫米。
HP:0500072	眼部异常	Absolute eccentric fixation	Eccentric fixation in which the angle of eccentricity equals the objective angle of deviation.	绝对偏心注视	偏心注视，偏心角度等于物体偏差角度。
HP:0500073	眼部异常	Abnormal ocular alignment	Any deviation from the normal ocular alignment.	异常眼校准	任何相对于正常眼对齐度的偏离。
HP:0500074	眼部异常	Dissociated vertical deviation	An incomitant tendency for an occluded eye to elevate and extort which resolves on uncovering.	分离垂直性偏斜	共同趋势是被遮盖眼上转，去除遮盖后上转眼即可下转。
HP:0500075	眼部异常	Dissociated horizontal deviation	A change in horizontal ocular alignment, unrelated to accommodation, that is brought about solely by a change in the balance of visual input from the two eyes.	分离水平性偏斜	与调节无关的双眼水平校准的改变，此变化仅由双眼视觉输入平衡的变化引起。
HP:0500076	眼部异常	Alternating hypetropia	A type of vertical tropia in which, when one eye is fixing, the other eye is deviated upwards.	交替性上斜视	一种垂直性斜视，当一眼注视，另一眼向上偏移。
HP:0500077	眼部异常	Alternating hyperphoria	A type of vertical phoria in which, in dissociation, the occluded eye deviates upwards.	交替性上隐斜	一种垂直性隐斜，在遮盖实验中，被遮盖眼向上偏移。
HP:0500078	眼部异常	Alternating hypotropia	A type of vertical tropia in which, when one eye is fixing, the other eye is deviated downwards.	交替性下斜视	一种垂直性显斜，当一眼注视时，另一眼向下偏移。
HP:0500079	眼部异常	Alternating hypophoria	A type of vertical phoria in which, in dissociation, the occluded eye deviates downwards.	交替性下隐斜	一种垂直性隐斜，在遮盖实验中，遮盖眼向下偏移。
HP:0500081	眼部异常	Pseudophakia	The term pseudophakia refers to having an artificial lens implanted after the natural eye lens has been removed. During cataract surgery the natural cloudy lens is replaced by an pseudophakia intraocular lens (IOL).	假晶状体	术语假晶状体是指在眼球晶状体被移除之后植入人工晶状体。 即在白内障手术中，浑浊的晶状体被人工晶状体(IOL)取代。
HP:0550003	体壁的异常	Proximal scleroderma	Symmetrical thickening, tightening and induration of the skin of the fingers and the skin proximal to the metacarpophalangeal or metatarsophalangeal joints. These changes can involve the entire limb, face, neck and trunk.	近端硬皮病	手指和皮肤近端掌指的或跖趾关节对称的增厚,皮肤紧缩和硬化，这些改变可涉及整个肢体,面部,颈部和躯干。
HP:0550004	肿瘤,体壁的异常	Verruca plana	Slightly raised wart 2-5 mm in diameter often associated with viral infections, commonly persistent in immunodeficient individuals.	扁平疣	直径2-5mm的疣状隆起，常伴有病毒感染，在免疫缺陷个体中常持续存在。
HP:0550005	呼吸系统异常	Bilateral basilar pulmonary fibrosis	It is a bilateral reticular pattern of linear or lineonodular densities that are most pronounced in basilar portions of the lungs on standard chest x-ray. It is the third minor criterion for scleroderma diagnosis.	双侧基底部肺纤维化	它是一种在标准胸片上肺部最明显的线性或线结节密度的双侧网状结构。这是硬皮病诊断的第三个次要标准。
HP:3000002	耳部异常	Abnormal inner ear epithelium morphology	Any structural anomaly of an inner ear epithelium.	内耳上皮细胞形态异常	内耳上皮细胞的任何结构异常。
HP:3000003	骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of mandibular ramus	An abnormality of a mandibular ramus.	下颌支异常	#####

HP:3000007	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of mentalis muscle	An abnormality of a mentalis muscle.	颏肌异常	颏肌异常。
HP:3000008	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of mylohyoid muscle	An abnormality of a mylohyoid muscle.	下颌舌骨肌异常	下颌舌骨肌异常。
HP:3000009	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of nasalis muscle	An abnormality of a nasalis muscle.	鼻肌异常	鼻肌异常。
HP:3000010	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of orbicularis oris muscle	An abnormality of an orbicularis oris muscle.	口轮匝肌异常	口轮匝肌异常。
HP:3000011	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of palatoglossus muscle	An abnormality of a palatoglossus muscle.	腭舌肌异常	腭舌肌异常。
HP:3000012	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	Abnormality of palatopharyngeus muscle	An abnormality of a palatopharyngeus muscle.	腭咽肌异常	腭咽肌异常。
HP:3000013	肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	Abnormality of platysma	An abnormality of the platysma muscle.	颈阔肌异常	颈阔肌异常。
